yuktyaivoktAH| indravajropendravajrAviracitatvAdupajAtivRttam| yathA, "anantarApAditalakSmaCobhau pAdau bhavetAM vividhairvikalpaiH| yAsAmimAvanyayatiprapaJcau smRtAH smRtijJairupajAtayastAH||" iti| sa0- Ayurvedayati jJApayati prakRtijJAnarasAyanadUtAriSTAdyupadeCAdityAyurvedaH| tasyopadeCA AyurvedopadeCAH|  upadiCyanta AyurvedArthA upapattibhirityupadeCA AyurvedatantrANi| teSu paramAdaraH pAThAvabodhAnuSThAnarUpa utkRSTo yatnaH kAryaH| AyurvedopadeCeSviti bahuvacananirdeCAdayamartho bodhyate| bahuSvAyurvedatantreSu yatnaH kAryaH|  anekAyurvedAvalokanAddhi cikitsAyAM vaidyasya na manAgapi sandeho jAyate|  kiM kurvatA puruSeNa-AyuH kAmayamAnena jIvitamabhilaSatA| kimbhUtamAyuH, dharmArthasukhasAdhanam| dhriyate loko~aneneti dharmaH|  arthyate yAcyata ityarthaH|  sukhaM dvividham, tAdAttvikamAtyantikaM ca| tAdAtvikaM kiyatkAlAntarAsthAyitvAtsukhAvabhAsaM, na paramArthataH sukham| tathA coktam- (ca. sU. a. 28/37) 'tAdAtvasukhasaMjJeSu bhAveSvajJo~anurajyate'| iti| tadetatsaMjJAmAtreNa sukhaM na tvatyantamiti pradarCayituM sukhasaMjJeSviti muninoktam|  AtyantikaM sukhaM mokSAkhyaM, yatra na duHkhAnAM CleSaH|  teSAM sAdhanamupAyo dharmArthasukhasAdhanam|  

A0 ra0- prekSAvatpravRttyarthaM prayojanAdhikAriNau darCayati-Ayuriti|  prayojanaM cAyuH|  tasya ca prayojanatvaM dharmArthasukhasAdhanatvAt|  sukhaM kAmo mokSaCca|  ata eva yaH AyuH kAmayate so~atra adhikArI|  tena ca, AyurvedopadeCeSvasmadvAkyeSu, paramatyartham, Adaro vidheyaH pAThAvabodhAnuSThAnairyatitavyam|

A0 ra0- Ayurvedasya CabdAntarAnabhidheyatvaCaGkAM nirAkartuM purAvRttaM darCayati-brahmA smRtveti|  brahmA ayurvedaM smRtvA prajApatiM dakSamajigrahat grAhitavAn, adhyApitavAnityarthaH|  AyuSo vedamityasamAsakaraNamAyurvedalakSaNapratipAdanArtham|  AyuSaH sambandhI veda Ayurveda iti|  sambandhaCca pAlyapAlakalakSaNaH|  uktaM hi saGgrahe (sU. a. 1)-"AyuSaH pAlakaM vedamupavedamatharvaNaH" iti|  sa prajApatiraCvinAvAyurvedamajigrahat|  tAvaCvinau sahasrAkSamajigrahatAm|    sa indro~atriputrAdikAn munInajigrahat|  te~atriputrAdayo~agniveCAdikAn munInajigrahan|  te punaragniveCAdayaH, pRthak pratyekaM, tantrANi CAstrANi, tenire viracayAJcakruH|  saMkSepArthamAyurvedaM CabdAntarairabhidadhurityarthaH

sa0- tebhya iti| tebhyo granthebhyo~ativiprakIrNebhyo vikSiptebhya uccAvacoktArthatayaivetaCcetaCca gatebhyaH| ata eva kaCcidevArthaH kasmAdeva tantrAntarAjjJAyate| yathA CalyacikitsA suCrutapraNItAttantrAdevAvagamyate na tathAgniveCAdikAt| UrdhvAGgacikitsA ca janakapraNItAttantrAdyathAvagamyate na tathA suCrutapraNItAt| ataH prAyo bAhulyena sArataroccayaH kriyate| uccIyante saGgRhyante vikSiptAH padArthA anenetyuccayaH| yathA vA yavAdInAM bahukSetrajAtAnAmekasmin sthAne uccayo rACIkRtya sthApanaM vidhIyate tatheha sAratarANAmuccayaH| sArataragrahaNenaitad dyotayati, saGgraheNaiva sArANAmuccayaH kRtaH| anena tathA sAratarANAM pradeCAnAmuccayaH kriyata iti| kiM nAma aSTAGgahRdayam| etacca sAnvayArthamasya nAma| yathA CarIrasya sarvAvayavebhyaH pradhAnadeCo hi hRdayam, tathedamaSTAGgAyurvedasya pradhAnabhUtatvAd hRdayamiva hRdayam| tathA ca tantrAnte vakSyati (u. a. 40|88)- hRdayamiva hRdayametadityAdi| aSTau ca tAnyaGgAnyaSTAGgAni, teSAM pratyekaM hRdayaM, sAratarasaGgrahaNAt| kIdRCamaSTAGgahRdayam| nAtisaMkSepavistaram| saMkSepaCca vistaraCca saMkSepavistarau, atiCayena saMkSepavistarau yatra na, tannAtisaMkSepavistaram| atiCabdasyAtra pratyekaM sambandhaH| atisaMkSepaM kiJcittantraM yathA siddhasArAdi, kiJciccAtivistaraM yathA saGgrahAdi| idaM tu tantraM nAtisaMkSepavistaram| atisaMkSepoktaM svalpadhiyAM nopakRtaye| teSAM hi yathoktAgamamAtraM CreyaH, na tu vAkyArthaparyAlocanAdadhikaH parAmarCaH| ativistIrNaM tu pAThAvabodhAnuSThAnaisteSAM duHCakyaM syAt| tasmAdalpamadhyotkRSTabuddhiCiSyahitArthaM tantrametaduddiSTam|

A0 ra0- agniveCAdiCAstreSu satsvapi svaCAstrasyopayogaM darCayati-tebhya iti|  sArataroccayaH kriyate, mayeti CeSaH|  sAratarANAM bahUpayogAnAmarthAnAmuccayaH|  uccIyante ekatra kriyante vyastA arthA asminnityuccayaH|  nanu pUrvaCAstrANyapi mahAkaSAyasaGgrahAdiSu pradeCeSvevamityata Aha-aSTAGgahRdayam|  aSTAGgasyAyurvedasya hRdayaM sarvArthAdhiSThAnam|  saMjJA ceyamasya CAstrasya|  vakSyati hi (u. aM. 40/88)-"hRdayamiva hRdayametatsarvAyurvedavAGmayapayodheH" iti|  sarveSu pradeCeSu sArataroccaya ityarthaH|  nanu pUrvaCAstrANyapi kvacilleCena kvacitkArtsnyeneti sarvatra sArataroccayarUpANItyata Aha-nAtisaMkSiptavistRtam, atisaMkSepAtivistararahitaM sarvatra saMpUrNam|  nanu nyUnapUraNasya nirmUlatvAdaprAmANyamityata Aha-tebhyaH,agniveCAdiCAstrebhya evoccayaH kriyate|  nanvevaM cetkimanenetyata Aha-ativiprakIrNebhyaH, yatra prakaraNArthAH vicchidya vicchidya sarvatra kIryante tAni viprakIrNAni, yatra vAkyArthACca tAnyativiprakIrNAni iti|  etaduktaM bhavati| santi paraM pUrvaCAstreSu sarva evArthAH, kintu ativiprakIrNatvAt durgrahAH|  iha tu racanAviCeSeNa sugrahA ityasyopayogaH|  uktaM ca saGgrahe (su. a. 1)-"na mAtrAmAtramapyatra kiJcidAgamavarjitam|  te~arthAH sa granthabandhaCca saMkSepAya kramo~anyathA||" iti|

 kAyabAlagrahordhvAGgaCalyadaMSTrAjarAvRSAn||5|| aSTAvaGgAni tasyAhuCcikitsA yeSu saMCritA||6||

vAyuH pittaM kaphaCceti trayo doSAH samAsataH||6||

sa0- vAyuriti| ca samuccaye| kapho doSamadhye samuccIyate| ityanena prakAreNa, samAsataH saMkSepAt, trayo doSAH| nanu prastutatvAdiha dhAtusaMjJayA vAtAdayo nirdeSTuM nyAyyAH,  na doSasaMjJayA| eva samAsataH ' ityevaM nirdeCe kartavye yadeSAM pRthagvibhaktyA nirdeCaH kRtaH , sa pradhAnatvakhyApanArthaH| bahuvacanAdeva tritve labdhe trigrahaNaM niyamArtham| traya eva doSAH , na caturtho~astIti| tantrAntarIyA hi caturthaM doSamIhante| teSAM hyayamabhiprAyaH| yathA doSANAM sthAnalakSaNakAryavikAracikitsAdyupadeCastathA raktasyApi| tatra sthAnaM , sarvadehavyApitve~api doSatvaM kartuM pArayanti| yataH prAdhAnyAdanvarthanAmatvAcca vAtAdInAmeva doSatvaM, na rasAdInAm| vAtAdayo hi svAtantryAtpradhAnAH| dUSayantIti doSA iti teSAmeva cAnugatArthA saMjJA pravRttA| yathA pANDuroganidAne (ni.a.13) pittapradhAnA ityArabhya yAvat CleSmatvagraktamAMsAni pradUSyetyAdi| tadatra CleSmA pittena dUSyate| tathA CleSmavadraktasyApi doSatvaprasaGga iti yo manyeta, taM prati sa0- adhaCca madhyaCcordhvaM cAdhomadhyordhvAni, tAni saMCraya ACrayo yeSAM te~adhomadhyordhvasaMCrayAH| hRcca nAbhiCca hRnnAbhI, tayorhRnnAbhyoH| te  vAtAdayo vyApino~api sarvaCarIracarA api hRnnAbhyoradhomadhyordhvasaMCrayAH| viCeSeNeti vAkyaCeSaH| nanu kimidaM vAkyaCeSatvaM nAma| ucyate| yasmin khalu pade~anuccAryamANe~arthagatiM paCyantyAcAryAH, taccheSamiti| uccAraNakAle tena vinA~abhidheyasiddheH| vyAkhyAkAle tu mandabuddhivyutpattaye vyAcakSate| tatra nAbheradho vAyoH sthAnam| hRnnAbhyormadhye pittasya| hRdayAdUrdhvaM kaphasya| nanu hRnnAbhyoriti kathaM  nirdeCo yAvatA prANyaGgatvAdekavadbhAve sanapuMsakamiti napuMsakatve hRnnAbhi  iti prApnoti| atra brUmaH| prANyaGgAnAM samAhAra eva dvandva ityasya prAyikatvAnnaikavadbhAvaH| tadabhAvAcca tadACrayaM napuMsakatvaM na bhavati| tathA coktam| sarvo~api dvandvo vibhASaikavadbhavatIti| dRCyate cAnyatrApi| tathA ca rudrabhaTTaH   (rudraTaH kAvyAlaGkAre a.7/81)- - "kauTilyaM kacanicaye karacaraNAdharadaleSu rAgaste" ityAdi| tathA, asyaiva granthakRtaH (ni.a.7/19) "CiraHpRSThorasAM CUlaM" iti| tathA, (ni.a.16|6) "jAnujaGghorukaTyaMsahastapAdAGgasandhiSu" iti| tathA, "vAyuH sandhyasthimajjasu" ityAdi| tasmAddhRnnAbhyoriti prayogo nyAyya eva|

rAgAdirogAn satatAnuSaktAnaCeSakAyaprasRtAnaCeSAn||1|| autsukyamohAratidAJjaghAna  yo~apUrvavaidyAya namo~astu tasmai||1||

sa0 - rAga AdiryeSAM te rAgAdayaH| AdiCabdena dveSalobhAdiparigrahaH| rujantIti rogAH| dehamanasI santApayantItyarthaH| nanu manaHsthitatvAnmana eva te rujantIti vaktuM yuktam| maivam| santApaH| tadevaM rAgAdayo dvayaM rujantIti nyAyyametat| tathA satatAnuSaktAH sarvakAlaM prasRtAH, sahajA ityarthaH| aCeSakAyaprasRtAH| aCeSaCcAsau kAyaCcACeSakAyaH| tatra prasRtA anugatAH| sa0- tebhya iti| tebhyo granthebhyo~ativiprakIrNebhyo vikSiptebhya uccAvacoktArthatayaivetaCcetaCca gatebhyaH| ata eva kaCcidevArthaH kasmAdeva tantrAntarAjjJAyate| yathA CalyacikitsA suCrutapraNItAttantrAdevAvagamyate na tathAgniveCAdikAt| UrdhvAGgacikitsA ca janakapraNItAttantrAdyathAvagamyate na tathA suCrutapraNItAt| ataH prAyo bAhulyena sArataroccayaH kriyate| uccIyante saGgRhyante vikSiptAH padArthA anenetyuccayaH| yathA vA yavAdInAM bahukSetrajAtAnAmekasmin sthAne uccayo rACIkRtya sthApanaM vidhIyate tatheha sAratarANAmuccayaH| sArataragrahaNenaitad dyotayati, saGgraheNaiva sArANAmuccayaH kRtaH| anena tathA sAratarANAM pradeCAnAmuccayaH kriyata iti| kiM nAma aSTAGgahRdayam| etacca sAnvayArthamasya nAma| yathA CarIrasya sarvAvayavebhyaH pradhAnadeCo hi hRdayam, tathedamaSTAGgAyurvedasya pradhAnabhUtatvAd hRdayamiva hRdayam| tathA ca tantrAnte vakSyati (u. a. 40|88)- hRdayamiva hRdayametadityAdi| aSTau ca tAnyaGgAnyaSTAGgAni, teSAM pratyekaM hRdayaM, sAratarasaGgrahaNAt| kIdRCamaSTAGgahRdayam| nAtisaMkSepavistaram| saMkSepaCca vistaraCca saMkSepavistarau, atiCayena saMkSepavistarau yatra na, tannAtisaMkSepavistaram| atiCabdasyAtra pratyekaM sambandhaH| atisaMkSepaM kiJcittantraM yathA siddhasArAdi, kiJciccAtivistaraM yathA saGgrahAdi| idaM tu tantraM nAtisaMkSepavistaram| atisaMkSepoktaM svalpadhiyAM nopakRtaye| teSAM hi yathoktAgamamAtraM CreyaH, na tu vAkyArthaparyAlocanAdadhikaH parAmarCaH| ativistIrNaM tu pAThAvabodhAnuSThAnaisteSAM duHCakyaM syAt| tasmAdalpamadhyotkRSTabuddhiCiSyahitArthaM tantrametaduddiSTam|

A0 ra0- agniveCAdiCAstreSu satsvapi svaCAstrasyopayogaM darCayati-tebhya iti|  sArataroccayaH kriyate, mayeti CeSaH|  sAratarANAM bahUpayogAnAmarthAnAmuccayaH|  uccIyante ekatra kriyante vyastA arthA asminnityuccayaH|  nanu pUrvaCAstrANyapi mahAkaSAyasaGgrahAdiSu pradeCeSvevamityata Aha-aSTAGgahRdayam|  aSTAGgasyAyurvedasya hRdayaM sarvArthAdhiSThAnam|  saMjJA ceyamasya CAstrasya|  vakSyati hi (u. aM. 40/88)-"hRdayamiva hRdayametatsarvAyurvedavAGmayapayodheH" iti|  sarveSu pradeCeSu sArataroccaya ityarthaH|  nanu pUrvaCAstrANyapi kvacilleCena kvacitkArtsnyeneti sarvatra sArataroccayarUpANItyata Aha-nAtisaMkSiptavistRtam, atisaMkSepAtivistararahitaM sarvatra saMpUrNam|  nanu nyUnapUraNasya nirmUlatvAdaprAmANyamityata Aha-tebhyaH,agniveCAdiCAstrebhya evoccayaH kriyate|  nanvevaM cetkimanenetyata Aha-ativiprakIrNebhyaH, yatra prakaraNArthAH vicchidya vicchidya sarvatra kIryante tAni viprakIrNAni, yatra vAkyArthACca tAnyativiprakIrNAni iti|  etaduktaM bhavati| santi paraM pUrvaCAstreSu sarva evArthAH, kintu ativiprakIrNatvAt durgrahAH|  iha tu racanAviCeSeNa sugrahA ityasyopayogaH|  uktaM ca saGgrahe (su. a. 1)-"na mAtrAmAtramapyatra kiJcidAgamavarjitam|  te~arthAH sa granthabandhaCca saMkSepAya kramo~anyathA||" iti|

 kAyabAlagrahordhvAGgaCalyadaMSTrAjarAvRSAn||5|| aSTAvaGgAni tasyAhuCcikitsA yeSu saMCritA||6||

vAyuH pittaM kaphaCceti trayo doSAH samAsataH||6||

sa0- vAyuriti| ca samuccaye| kapho doSamadhye samuccIyate| ityanena prakAreNa, samAsataH saMkSepAt, trayo doSAH| nanu prastutatvAdiha dhAtusaMjJayA vAtAdayo nirdeSTuM nyAyyAH,  na doSasaMjJayA| dehadhAraNavardhakatvAt| ete muninApi carakeNa pUrvaM doSasaMjJayaiva nirdiSTAH| tathA ca tadgranthaH (sU.a.1/56)-  "vAyuH pittaM kaphaCcoktaH CArIro doSasaGgrahaH " iti| 'vAtapittakaphA doSAstraya eva samAsataH ' ityevaM nirdeCe kartavye yadeSAM pRthagvibhaktyA nirdeCaH kRtaH , sa pradhAnatvakhyApanArthaH| bahuvacanAdeva tritve labdhe trigrahaNaM niyamArtham| traya eva doSAH , na doSatvaM kartuM pArayanti| yataH prAdhAnyAdanvarthanAmatvAcca vAtAdInAmeva doSatvaM, na rasAdInAm| vAtAdayo hi svAtantryAtpradhAnAH| dUSayantIti doSA iti teSAmeva cAnugatArthA saMjJA pravRttA| yathA pANDuroganidAne (ni.a.13) pittapradhAnA ityArabhya yAvat CleSmatvagraktamAMsAni pradUSyetyAdi| tadatra CleSmA pittena dUSyate| tathA CleSmavadraktasyApi doSatvaprasaGga iti yo manyeta, taM prati brUmaH| viSama upanyAsaH| vAtAdayo hi sarvadaiva rasAdIn dUSayanti, na tu rasAdayaH kadAcidapi vAtAdIn dUSyanti| vAtAdInAM tu madhyAdyadi kaCciddUSyate, sa teSAmanyatamena| tathA ca prakRtilakSaNe sa0- adhaCca madhyaCcordhvaM cAdhomadhyordhvAni, tAni saMCraya ACrayo yeSAM te~adhomadhyordhvasaMCrayAH| hRcca nAbhiCca hRnnAbhI, tayorhRnnAbhyoH| te  vAtAdayo vyApino~api sarvaCarIracarA api hRnnAbhyoradhomadhyordhvasaMCrayAH| viCeSeNeti vAkyaCeSaH| nanu kimidaM vAkyaCeSatvaM nAma| ucyate| yasmin khalu pade~anuccAryamANe~arthagatiM paCyantyAcAryAH, taccheSamiti| uccAraNakAle tena vinA~abhidheyasiddheH| vyAkhyAkAle tu mandabuddhivyutpattaye vyAcakSate| tatra nAbheradho vAyoH sthAnam| hRnnAbhyormadhye pittasya| hRdayAdUrdhvaM kaphasya| nanu hRnnAbhyoriti kathaM  nirdeCo yAvatA prANyaGgatvAdekavadbhAve sanapuMsakamiti napuMsakatve hRnnAbhi  iti prApnoti| atra brUmaH| prANyaGgAnAM samAhAra eva dvandva ityasya prAyikatvAnnaikavadbhAvaH| tadabhAvAcca tadACrayaM napuMsakatvaM na bhavati| tathA coktam| sarvo~api dvandvo vibhASaikavadbhavatIti| dRCyate cAnyatrApi| tathA ca rudrabhaTTaH   (rudraTaH kAvyAlaGkAre a.7/81)- - "kauTilyaM kacanicaye karacaraNAdharadaleSu rAgaste" ityAdi| tathA, asyaiva granthakRtaH (ni.a.7/19) "CiraHpRSThorasAM CUlaM" iti| tathA, (ni.a.16|6) "jAnujaGghorukaTyaMsahastapAdAGgasandhiSu" iti| tathA, "vAyuH sandhyasthimajjasu" ityAdi| tasmAddhRnnAbhyoriti prayogo nyAyya eva|

tairbhavedviSamastIkSNo mandaCcAgniH samaiH samaH||8||

sa0- taiCca vAtAdibhiH puMso yathAkrameNAgnirviSamastIkSNo mandaCca bhavet| vAtAdayaCca samuditA eva CarIrajanane samarthAH, ityavaCyaM sarvaireva bhavitavyam| iha tu ya ekasya vyapadeCastatrotkarSo draSTavyaH| vAtotkarSeNa viSamaH, pittotkarSeNa tIkSNaH, kaphotkarSeNa manda iti| samairhAnyutkarSavarjitaiH samaH| lakSaNameSAmaGgavibhAge CArIre vakSyati (CA. a. 3/74)-  yaH  pacetsamyagevAnnamityArabhya yAvaccirAtpacediti| yatra tu dvayordoSayorutkarSatvaM, tatra sadvaidyena svadhiyA kalpyam| yathA, vAtapittayorutkarSe vAyoryogavAhitvAttIkSNaH| evaM vAtakaphayorutkarSe mandaH| kaphapittayostUtkarSe AhAraviCeSavaCAtkadAcittIkSNaH kadAcinmanda iti|

A0 ra0- agnyavasthAviCeSAkhyaM doSakAryamAha-tairiti|  tatra vAtenAgnirviSamo bhavet|  tIkSNaH pittena|  mandaH kaphena|  kramAdityanuvartate|  samaistribhiH samaH|  pAriCeSyAdviSamAdayastrayo viSamairdoSaiH|  vaiSamyaM ca vRddhireva, kSINAnAmIddRkkAryAdarCanAt|  aniyatapAko viSamaH, ACupAkastIkSNaH, cirapAko mandaH|  CeSaH samaH|  uktaM hi saGgrahe (sU.  a. 11)-"yAmaiCcaturbhirdvAbhyAM ca bhojyabhaiSajyayoH same|  pAko~agnau yuktayordrAktu tIkSNe mande punaCcirAt" iti|  yuktayorucitayoH|  saMsargasannipAtajAstvavasthA nidarCanatantrayuktyA jvaravadavagantavyAH|  yathA vAtakaphaje jvare CItaM, vAtapittaje dAhaH, vAyoryogavAhitvAt|  pittakaphaje sannipAtaje ca paryAyeNa dAhaCIte|  mitho viruddhatvena yugapadasambhavAnna cobhayorabhAvaH, viruddhakAryANAmapyArambhakatvadarCanAt|  uktaM ca saGgrahe (sU. a. 21)-"ArambhakaM virodhe~api mitho yadvadguNatrayam|  viCvasya dRSTaM yugapadvdyAdherdoSatrayaM tathA||" iti|  tadvadihApi vAtapittAbhyAM tIkSNatvaM, vAtakaphAbhyAM mandatvaM, pittakaphAbhyAM sannipAtAcca paryAyeNa tIkSNatvamandatve|  na caivaM catuSTvahAniH, avyavasthitatIkSNamandatvasya vaiSamye antarbhAvAt|

koSThaH krUro mRdurmadhyo madhyaH syAttaiH samairapi||9||

sa0-tairvAtAdibhiH, yathAkramaM krUramRdumadhyalakSaNaH koSTho bhavati| vAtotkarSeNa krUraH| pittotkarSeNa mRduH| kaphotkarSeNa madhyaH| samaiH punaretairhAnyutkarSavarjitairmadhya eva koSThaH| krUrAdInAM tu lakSaNaM vamanavirecanavidhau (sU.a.18/34) vakSyati| nanu samairvAtAdibhiH kathaM madhyakoSThatA syAditi| brUmaH| samAnAM vAtAdInAM madhye dvayorvAtapittayoH svaM svaM krUrakoSThatvamRdukoSThatvalakSaNAkhyaM ca viruddhaM karma yugapatkartuM na ghaTate| tRtIyastu sama eva kaphaH| so~anayormadhye madhyamAM vRttimACritya sthito naikenApi saha virudhyate| ata eva tatkAryaM madhyakoSThatAlakSaNaM te vAtapitte niSeddhuM naiva ghaTete| evaM ca tenAvaCyamAtmIyaM madhyakoSThatAlakSaNaM karma kartavyam, yato vAtakarmaNaH krUrakoSThatAlakSaNasya pittakarmaNo mRdukoSThatAlakSaNasya ca viruddhatvAt| ato madhyakoSThataiva samairvAtAdibhirnyAyyA| ityAMstu viCeSaH| pUrvo yo madhyakoSThaH  so~avaCyaM pramANAdhikena kaphena janyate| madhyaH syAttaiH samairapIti samagrahaNaliGgAt| itarastu madhyakoSThaH samadoSamadhyasthitena samenaiva svapramANasthitena CleSmaNA bhavatItyanayA rItyA hetubhedAdanyatvam| tathA madhyakoSThayorlakSaNabhedo~api dRCyate| yathA (ca.si.a.1/8)- "CleSmAdhikaCchardayate hyaduHkhaM viricyate mandakaphastu samyak" iti| tadayamatrArthaH| CleSmAdhike madhyakoSThe na samyag virecitvaM, samakaphe tu madhyakoSThe suvirecitvamiti|

A0 ra0-koSTAvasthAviCeSAkhyaM doSakAryamAha-koSTha iti|  tatra vAtena krUraH koSThaH syAt, pittena mRduH, kaphena madhyaH, tribhiH samairapi madhyaH|  atrApi pAriCeSyaM pUrvavadvyAkhyeyam|  madhyamena Codhanena hInayogI krUraH, atiyogI mRduH samyagyogI madhyaH|  saMsargasannipAtajAstvavasthAH pUrvavat|  yogavAhitvaM tvatra kaphasya|  yadAha khAraNAdiH- "vAtolbaNA syAdgrahaNI krUrakoSTasya dehinaH|  pittalA mRdukoSThasya yogavAhI tayoH kaphaH||" iti|  tena vAtakaphAbhyAM krUraH,  vAtapittAbhyAM kaphapittAbhyAM sannipAtAcca mRduH|  nanu "bahuvAtaCleSmabhyAM krUraH" iti suCrutena (ci.a,33) bahukaphasya krUratvamuktam, iha tu madhyatvam, iti virodhaH| maivam, suCrutavAkyasya saMsargaparatvAt|

vRddhiH samAnaiH sarveSAM viparItairviparyayaH||14||

sa0- sarveSAM doSadhAtumalAdInAM CarIrACritAnAM, samAnaistulyasadbhAvaiH, vRddhiH svapramANAdhikyam| viparItairviCiSTatayA vyavasthitaiH, viparyayaH kSayaH| ayanaM ayaH gatiH, viparItA gatirviparyayo~apacayaH| sAmAnyaviCeSairdravyaguNakarmabhedena triprakAro~adhigacchati| tathA cAhuH-   "sarveSAM sarvadA vRddhistulyadravyaguNakriyaiH| bhAvairbhavati bhAvAnAM viparItairviparyayaH"| dravyato yathoktam (saM.sU.a.19)-  "raktamApyAyyate raktena, mAMsaM mAMsena, medo medasA, asthi taruNAsthnA, majjA majnA, CukraM CukreNa, tathA garbhaCcAmagarbheNa"| tatra raktena raktamityubhayamapyaudakam| mAMsena mAMsamiti pArthivam| tathA, salilAtmakaM payastadAtmakameva CleSmANamabhivardhayati| tadvatkSIrajAtaM ghRtaM Cukram| tathA jIvantIkAkolyAdayaH somAtmAno dravyaviCeSAH saumyadhAtvekakAraNAni snehabalapuMstvaujAMsi| marIcapaJcakolabhallAtakAdayo buddhimedhAgnyAdIn saMvardhayanti| guNataH-  cocamocakharjUrANi pArthivAni dravyato nirdiSTAnyapi CleSmANamudakAtmakamabhivardhayanti, snigdhaguruCItAdiguNasAmAnyAt| karmApi trividhaM kAyavAGmanovyApArAtmakam| tatra kAyikAni- dhAvanalaGghanaplavanAdIni calatvasAmAnyAdvAyorvRddhaye| vAcikAni--bhASyAdhyayanageyAdIni, mAnasAni-manovyApArACcintAkAmaCokabhayAni, tAnyapi manasaH kSobhaNahetutvAdvAyorvRddhikarANi| tathA santApakRttvasAmAnyAtkrodherSyAdi pittasya| svapnAlasyaCayyAsukhAdIni sthairyasAmAnyAtkaphasyeti| viparyayastu kSayAya| yathAha| dravyataH (saM.sU.a.14, ca.sU.a.25)-  "gavedhukAnnaM karCanIyAnAm"| tatra vAtAtmikayA gavedhukayA pArthivAnAM mAMsAdInAM kraCimA kriyate| tathA taijasena kSAreNa CleSmaNaH| guNato yathA- AranAlamaudakaM CleSmANaM tadviparItairlaghurUkSoSNatIkSNaviCadaguNaiH kSapayati| karmataH-  nidrAlasyasaumanasyAni saparispandaM vAtamaparispandasvabhAvatayA~apacinvanti| tathA parispandarUpACcintAvyavAyavyAyAmA mandaparispandavaiparItyAtkaphamiti|      

A0 ra0- atha bahiraGgaM vyAcaSTe-doSadUSyavikRtyutpAdanadvAreNa yo vyAdhInAM kAraNaM, sa bahiraGgaH|  sa ca dvedhA, vRddhihetuH kSayahetuCca|  tatra vRddhihetumAha-vRddhiriti|  sarveSAM doSadUSyANAM samAnaistulyadharmakairdravyairvRddhirbhavet|  yathA rUkSAdiguNasya vAyoH, tatsamAnaguNaM CyAmAmAkAdi varddhanam|   sasnehAdiguNasya pittasya tailAdi|  snigdhAdiguNasya kaphasya kSIrAdi|  dUSyeCu svedaraktayoH pittavat vRddhihetuH|  CeSANAM CleSmavat|  vakSyati hi (sU.a. 11/26)-"tatrAsthani sthito vAyuH pittaM tu svedaraktayoH|  CelSmA CeSeSu tenaiSAmACrayACrayiNAM mithaH||  yadekasya tadanyasya varddhanakSapaNauSadham|  asthimArutayornaivam|" iti|  kSayahetumAha- viparItairiti| sarveSAM doSadUSyANAM viparItairviruddhadharmakairdravyairvRddherviparyayaH kSayo bhavet|yathA-  vAyorgodhUmadi kSapaNam| pittasya yavAdi| kaphasya kulatthAdi| dUSyeSu pUrvavat|

 rasAH svAdvamlalavaNatiktoSaNakaSAyakAH||14|| SaD dravyamACritAste ca yathApUrvaM balAvahAH||15||

sa0- svAdvAdayaH SaDrasAH, rasanendriyagrAhyatvAdrasAH| te ca rasA dravyaM paJcabhUtAtmakamACritAH, yathApUrvaM ca balAvahAH| yo yaH pUrvo yathApUrvaM, balAvahA balaprApakAH| balamAvahanti prApayantIti yAvat| tasmAtsarvebhyo rasebhyo madhuro rasaH prakarSeNa dehinAM balakaraH| kaSAyastu sarvebhyo jaghanyabalAvahaH| tatra svAdurmadhuro ghRtaguDAdiH| amlo~amlikAmAtuluGgAdiH| lavaNaH saindhavAdiH| tikto bhUnimbAdiH| USaNaH kaTuko marIcAdiH| kaSAyo harItakyAdiH| svAdurmadhuraparyAyaH| USaNaH kaTukaparyAyaH| yathA tryUSaNaM trikaTukamucyate| kaSAya eva kaSAyakaH, yathA kaTureva kaTukaH| SaDiti SaDeva, na nyUnA adhikA vA| yadyapi te rasA guNAH svAdvAdibhedatastathA saMsargatastathA~anurasatastAratamyaparikalpanAvaCato~api bhidyamAnarUpA api SaTtvaM nAtivartante|

A0 ra0- atha sAdharmyavaidharmyajJAnArthaM dravyadharmAnAha-te ca rasaprabhAvavIryavipAkaguNabhedAtpaJca|  tatra rasanAgrAhyo rasaH|  CeSo guNaH|  kAyAgnipAkajo viCiSTo raso vipAkaH|  tathaivotpanno guNo vIryam|  dravyasyAtmA prabhAvaH|  tatra rasabhedAnAha-rasA iti|  te ca svAdvAdayaH SaT|  svAdurmadhuraH, USaNaH kaTukaH|  te ca dravyamACritAH, dravyadharmA ityarthaH|  kSArasya dravyaviCeSavAcitvAdrasaviCeSavAcitve~api lavaNaviCeSavAcitvAnna saptamarasatvam|         balAvahAkhyaM rasakarmAha-te ceti|  te ca rasA yathApUrvaM balAvahAH|  yo yasmAtpUrvaH sa tasmAdadhikaM balamAvahati|  kaSAyo balyastata USaNastatastikta ityAdi|

 tatrAdyA mArutaM ghnanti trayastiktAdayaH kapham||15|| kaSAyatiktamadhurAH pittamanye tu kurvate||16||

sa0- tatra teSu raseSu madhye, AdyAstrayaH svAdvamlalavaNAH, mArutaM ghnanti Camayanti| anye tu tiktoSaNakaSAyAstameva cAnilaM kurvate kopayanti| tiktAdayastrayastiktoSaNakaSAyAH kaphaM ghnanti praCamayanti| anye tu madhurAmlalavaNAstameva kaphaM kurvate| kaSAyatiktamadhurAH pittaM ghnanti| anye tvamlalavaNakaTukAstadeva pittaM kurvate| etenedamuktaM bhavati| madhuro vAtapittaghnaH CleSmakaraH| amlo vAtaM hanti, kaphapitte tu janayati| lavaNo mArutaM hanti, kaphapitte tu kurute| tiktaH kaphapitte nACayati, vAtaM tu janayati| USaNaH kaphaM nACayati, vAtapitte tu janayati| kaSAyaH kaphapitte hanti, vAtaM tu karotIti|       

A0 ra0-  vAtAdInAM sAkSAdrasAkathanAdaspaSTe doSadravyayoH sAdharmyavaidharmye spaSTayati-tatrAdyA iti|  tatra teSu raseSu madhye, AdyAstrayo rasAH svAdvamlalavaNAH, mArutaM ghnanti|  tiktAdayastiktoSaNakaSAyAH kaphaM ghnanti|  kaSAyatiktamadhurAH pittaM ghnanti|  anye tu kurvata iti triSvapi yojyam|  tena tiktoSaNakaSAyA vAyuM kurvanti|  svAdvamlalavaNAH kapham|  amlalavaNakaTukAH pittam|  ata eva te te rasAstatra tatra santItyanumeyam|  uktaM ca kapilena-"kaTvamlalavaNaM pittaM svAdvamlalavaNaH kaphaH|  kaSAyatiktakaTuko vAyurdRSTo~anumAnataH||" iti|

 CamanaM kopanaM svasthahitaM dravyamiti tridhA||16||

sa0- iti anena prakAreNa CamanAdibhedena, tridhA triprakAraM, dravyam| anyena prakAreNa dvidhA athavA anekadhA| itiCabdaH prakArArthe~abhihitaH| yat kupitAn vAtAdIn doSAn Camayati, tacchamanam| yathA- tailaM ghRtaM mAkSikam| tatra tailaM snehauSNyagauravayogAdvAtaM tadviparItaguNaM Camayati| sarpirmAdhuryaCaityamAndyaguNayogAttadviparItaguNaM pittam| madhu ca raukSyataikSNyakaSAyayogAttadviparItaguNaM kapham| yadvAtAdIn doSAn rasAdIndhAtUn mUtrAdInmalAMCca kopayati, tatkopanam| yathA- yavakapATalamASamatsyAmamUlakasArSapamandakadadhikilATaviruddhamatsyapayaH prabhRti| doSAdInAM malaparyantAnAM svapramANasthitAnAM sAmyAnuvRttiheturyaddravyaM tat svasthebhyo hitam| yacca svAsthyAnuvRttiM karoti, RtucaryAdhyAye sevyatvenoktam| tathA mAtrACitIyAdhyAye raktaCAliSaSTikayavagodhUmajAGgalamAMsajIvantICAkadivyodakakSIrAdi| tathA yadUrjaskaraM rasAyanavAjIkaraNaM sarvadA CIlanIyatvena nirdiSTam|

A0 ra0-  prabhAvabhedAnAha- Camanamiti|  prabhAvo rasAdiSvantaraGga iti dyotayituM dravyaCabdenoktaH, dravyamiti tridheti|  CamanaM kopanaM svasthahitaM ceti traividhyam|  yad dravyaM samaiH samaviparItairvA rasAdibhiryuktamapi vAtAdIn Camayati tacchamanam|  tadyathA-madhuraCItApi jIvantI kaphaM Camayati|  kaTupAkaraso guruH snigdho~api rasonaH kaphavAtau|  yad dravyaM viparItaiH samaviparItairvA rasAdibhiryuktamapi vAtAdIn kopayati tatkopanam|  yathA-gurUSNasnigdhamadhuramapi phANitaM vAtaM kopayati|  taireva guNairmASaH pittakaphau|  yad dravyaM vAtAdInAM kSayavRddhyorheturapi svasthasya na tathA, tatsvasthahitam|  yathA-gurumadhurarUkSaCIto~api yavaH svasthasya pittaM na kSapayati|  gurumadhurasnigdhaCItamapi kSIraM svasthasya kaphaM na kopayati|  evaM sarvatrApi prabhAva udAharaNIyaH|  vakSyati ca (sU.a. 9/26)-"rasAdisAmye yatkarma viCiSTaM tatprabhAvajam|" iti|  anye tu CamanAdIn dravyabhedAnAhuH|  tattu na samyak|  dravyabhedatve yadeva CamanaM, tadeva kopanaM tadeva svasthahitamiti saGkaro na yuktaH|  dharmabhedatve tu rasAdisaGkaravadyuktaH|  kiJca dravyabhedACcedamI tadA rasAdidharmabhedAnAM prAkpaCcAdvA abhidheyAH syuH, na madhye|  tasmAtprabhAvabhedA eva CamanAdayaH|

uSNaCItaguNotkarSAttatra vIryaM dvidhA smRtam||17||

sa0- tatra tasmin dravye, vIryaM dvividham| viMCaterguNAnAM madhyAddvAvuSNaCItau, tadutkarSAdvIryamiti sarvAyurvedaprasiddhau, dvAveva guNau CItoSNau vIryakaraNahetU| vIryaM CaktiH| uSNaguNotkarSa uSNaguNAtiCaya eva kaCciduSNavIryAkhyAM labhate| tathA CItaguNotkarSaH CItaguNAtiCaya eva CItavIryAkhyAm| yadyapi nAnAtmakamapi dravyaM, tathApyagnISomAtmakatvAjjagato dvidhaiva vIryam|

tridhA vipAko dravyasya svAdvamlakaTukAtmakaH||17||

sa0- vipAkastrividhaH, sarvadravyANAM pariNAmakAlabhAvI kAryAnumeyo jATharAgnisambandhAdrasasya svarUpAntaraprAdurbhAvaH| sa tridhaiva, rasaSaTtve~api na SoDhA| tena kiJcitsvAdupAkaM, kiJcidamlavipAkaM, kiJcitkaTuvipAkaM, dravyam| tatra madhuralavaNayormadhuro vipAkaH| amlasyAmlaH| tiktakaTukaSAyANAM kaTukaH| sa ca kAryAnumeyaH| tathA ca vakSyati (sU.a.9/20)- 'jAThareNAgninA yogAdyadudeti rasAntaram| rasAnAM pariNAmAnte sa vipAka iti smRtaH' iti| ata eva sopasargaH pAkaCabda upAttaH| viCiSTaH pAko vipAkaH, na pAkamAtrasvarUpaH| tathA ca bhaTTArakacarakamunI (ca.sU.a.26/68)-'raso nipAte dravyANAM vipAkaH karmaniSThayA| vIryaM yAvadadhIvAsAnnipAtAccopalabhyate' iti| evaM karmaniSThAnumita ekarUpAvastho jATharAgnisaMyogAdyo rasAnAM rasAntarodbhavaH, sa eva vipAkaH| na tu yo jATharAgnisaMyogamAtrAdrasAnAmanekAvasthaH, prAGmadhuro~anantaraM sa eva pacyamAno~amlastato vipacyamAnaH sa eva kaTurvipAkaH|

A0 ra0-vipAkabhedAnAha-tridheti|  te ca trayaH, svAduramlaH kaTukaCceti|

gurumandahimasnigdhaClakSNasAndramRdusthirAH||18|| guNAH sasUkSmaviCadA viMCatiH saviparyayAH||18||

kAlArthakarmaNAM yogo hInamithyAtimAtrakaH||19|| samyagyogaCca vijJeyo rogArogyaikakAraNam||19||

sa0- kAlaH CItoSNavarSalakSaNastrividhaH| arthAH CabdasparCarUparasagandhA mahAbhUtaguNAH| tathA cAgamaH (ca.CA.a.1/29)- "arthAH CabdAdayo jJeyA gocarA viSayA guNAH" iti| karma kriyA, kAyavAGmanaCceSTA| kAlaCcArthaCca karma ca tAni kAlArthakarmANi, teSAM yogaH sambandhaH, kAlArthakarmaNAM yogaH| kimbhUtaH, hInamithyAtimAtrakastathA samyagyogaCceti| ye kAlAdInAM yogA hInamithyAtimAtrakAH, te rogaikakAraNam| teSAmeva yaH samyagyogaH, sa ArogyaikakAraNaM pradhAnakAraNamiti| ekaCabdaH pradhAnavacanaH| yathA- 'ekaH pArtho dhanurdharaH' iti| kAlasya hInayogaH svarUpahAniH| mithyAyogaH svarUpAdvaiparItyam| atiyogaH svarUpAtiCayaH| yathA- hInaCItatA hInoSNatA hInavarSatA hInayoge| CItakAlAvasare~atyauSNyamuSNakAlAvasare CItaM varSAkAle~avRSTirmithyAyoge|  atiCaityamatyauSNyamativarSaNamatiyoge| etadyogatrayaM rogakAraNam| samyagyogo yathAsvarUpasthitirArogyakAraNam| arthAnAM punaH svena svenArthenendriyasya hInaH saMyogo hInayogaH| puruSAnabhimatAdinArthajAtenendriyasya yogo mithyAyogaH| atyantasaMyogo~atiyogaH| ete trayo rogakAraNam| yathAsvaM samyagyoga ArogyakAraNam| kAyAdikarmaNo hInapravRttirhInayogaH| vegodIraNAdikaM sAmibhuktabhASaNAdikaM rAgadveSAdikaM ca yathAsvamuttaratra (sU.a.12/40) vakSyamANaM mithyAyogaH| atipravRttiratiyogaH| sarveSAM samA pravRttiH samayogaH| tena hInAdayo yogAstrayo rogakAraNam| samyagyogastvArogyakAraNam|

A0 ra0- uktadharmakANAM dravyANAm sadopayogAtsadaiva doSavaiSamye prApte viCeSamAha-kAlArtheti|  dravyANi carakoktAni (sU. a. 1/47)- "khAdInyAtmA manaH kAlo diCaCca dravyasaGgrahaH|" iti|  tatra kAlaH sAkSAdupayujyate|  mahAbhUtAni tvarthadvAreNa|  digAtmamanAMsi karmadvAreNa|  kAlo varSACItoSNabhedAt tridhA|  CabdasparCarUparasagandhabhedAdarthaH  paJcadhA|  kAyikavAcikamAnasikabhedAtkarma tridhA|  teSAmasamyagyogo rogakAraNaM, samyagyogastvArogyakAraNam|  tatrAsamyagyogastridhA, hInayogo mithyAyogo~atiyogaCceti|  CItAdInAM kAlalakSaNAnAmalpatvaM kAlasya hInayogaH, viparItasvalakSaNo mithyAyogaH, AdhikyamatiyogaH|  indriyairindriyArthAnAM yo~alpaH sambandhaH, so~arthasya hInayogaH, anucito mithyAyogaH, adhiko~atiyogaH|  alpA ceSTA karmaNAM hInayogaH, anucito mithyAyogaH, adhiko~atiyogaH|  asamyagyogAdviparItaH sarveSAM samyagyogaH|  etaduktaM bhavati|  yadyapi sarvadA dravyairyogastathApyasamyagyogo yadA, tadA doSavaiSamyam|  yadA samyagyogastadA doSasAmyam|  iti bahiraGgo hetuH|

rogAstu doSavaiSamyaM, doSasAmyamarogatA||20||

sa0- doSANAM vAtAdInAM, vaiSamyaM svapramANAdekasya dvayostrayANAM vA vRddhiH kSayo vA, rujAkaratvAdroga eva| vaiSamyaM viSamatA svarUpAccyAvaH| tataH kAryakAraNayorabhedena paThito roga iti| doSANAM sAmyaM svarUpAdapracyutiH samabhAvo~arogatA ArogyaM, svAsthyamiti yAvat|

nijAgantuvibhAgena tatra rogA dvidhA smRtAH||20||

sa0- tatra tayo rogArogyayoH, rogA dvidhA nijAgantubhedena| nijA vAtAdidoSajanmAnaH| Agantavo bAhyahetavaH| tathA cAcAryavacanam (saM.sU.a.22)-  "nijAstridoSotthAH| bAhyahetujAstvAgantavaH"| anayoriyAnviSeSaH| nije roge vAtAdayaH pUrvaM vaiSamyaM gatvA paCcAdvyathAmabhinirvartayanti| AgantavaH punaH vyathApUrvamevotpadyante, anantaraM tatra vAtAdayaH kupyantIti| anenobhayasya nijAgantubhedabhinnasya vyAdheCcetaH santApakatvaM boddhavyam|

  teSAM kAyamanobhedAdadhiSThAnamapi dvidhA||21||

sa0- teSAM nijAgantukAnAM vikArANAM rogANAM, kAyamanobhedena dvividhamadhiSThAnaM sthAnam| jvarAsrapittakAsAdInAM kAyaH| madamUrchAsannyAsagrahabhUtonmAdApasmArarAgadveSAdInAM manaH| adhitiSThantyasminnityadhiSThAnam| kAyaH CarIram| manaCcetaH|

sa0- manaCcetaH, tasya rajastamasI doSau, upaplavAvavidyAsambhavau| atra ca prAdhAnyAdAdau rajo nikSiptam| caCabdaH pavanAdInAmapyupasaGgrahArthaH| yasmAtte~api manaH saMCritya vikurvate| saGgrahe hyuktam (u.a.9)-  "SaDunmAdA bhavanti vAtapittakaphasannipAtA~~AdhiviSanimittAH" ityAdi| udAhRtau ityudAharaNamAtramuddeCamAtraM vacanamAtram| atrAyurvedaCAstre, rajastamasorna sAkalyena vyAkaraNamanilAdInAmiva| te khalvatra svabhAvasthAnAdibhiH prakArairaCeSamuktAH, na tu rajastamasI|

A0 ra0- duSTasya manaso rogAdhiSThAnatvAdduSTihetumAha-raja iti|  sa ca dvidhA, rajastamaCca|  dvau doSau dve duSTikAraNe ityarthaH|  na tvanayorvAtAdivaddoSatvam, tato~anantaramanukterdoSavijJAnIyAdiSu cAgrahaNAt|  kAyo~api duSTa eva rogAdhiSThAnam|  tasya tu doSA eva duSTikAraNam|

 darCanasparCanapraCnaiH parIkSeta ca rogiNam||22||

sa0- rogo~asyAstIti rogI vyAdhitaH, taM darCanAdibhiH parIkSeta| darCanena dRSTyA, kAsamehAdyArteSu pItaCuklavarNasaMsthAnapramANopacayacchAyAviNmUtraccharditAdikam| sparCanena hastakAyasparCena, jvaragulmavidradhyAdyArtam, tathA CItoSNastabdhaspandaClakSNakharasparCAdikaM ca| praCnena pRcchayA, CUlArocakacchardihRdardatvaM succhandaduCchandatvaM mRdukrUrakoSThatAM svapnadarCanamabhiprAyaM janmAmayapravRttinakSatradviSTeSTasukhaduHkhAni ca, ityAturamukhAtparIkSeta|

rogaM nidAnaprAgrUpalakSaNopaCayAptibhiH||22||

sa0- rogaM nidAnAdibhiH paJcabhiH parIkSeta| nidAnaM kAraNaM heturityanarthAntaram| taccAsannaviprakRSTabhedena dvidhA| Asannamapi dvividham, AsannAtyAsannabhedena| AsannaM rUkSalaghuCItAdidravyopayogaH| atyAsannaM tu yataH samanantarameva rogotpattiH| yathA vAtAdayo doSAH kruddhAH| viprakRSTaM yat AdikAle rudrakopAdi jvarAdInAm| tathA haviHprACAdi mehakuSThAdInAm| tenaivaMvidhamarthajAtamevaMvidhasya rogasya hetutvenopadiSTam, evaMvidhaCcotpanno~ato nidAnAjjJAyate rogaH| prAgrUpaM pUrvarUpaM bhaviSyato vyAdheraprakACitadoSaviCeSAdhiSThitasya lakSaNam, udbubhUSurjvarAdirAmayo vAtAdidoSaviCeSeNAliGgitarUpAbhAso yenAvabhAsyate, yathAyathamalpatvAdyadavyaktamasphuTaM liGgaM tatprAgrUpam| lakSaNaM punastadeva prAgrUpAdvilakSaNam, yena sakaladoSaviCeSAliGgitaH sphuTaliGgo vyAdhirdRCyate lakSyate| upaCayaH sukhAnubandhyAhArAdyupayogaH| evaMvidhenAhArAdikena hi tasya pIDA nAbhUt, evaMvidhena cAbhUt, ata upaCayAjjJAyate~ayaM roga iti| sa vyAdhisAtmyaH svAsthyahetuH sukhAvahaH| AptirnirvRttiH samprAptirAgatirjAtirityanarthAntaram| evaM duSTenaivaM sthAnasthitenaivamanugatenAnayA kalpanayaivaMmArgeNa doSeNeti parikalpanam, ata AptyA jJAyate~ayaM roga iti|

A0 ra0- rogitve hi jJAte ko~asau roga iti viCeSajJAnopAyamAha-rogamiti|  sa ca paJcadhA, nidAnaM prAgrUpaM lakSaNam upaCayaH AptiCca|  AptiH samprAptiH|  nidAnaM bahiraGgo hetuH|  prAgrUpaM pUrvajo rogaH|  rogasya hi rAjavat prakACamAnasya parivArabhUtA rogAH kecitpUrvaM prakACante, kecitsaha, kecitpaCcAt|  tatra ye pUrvaM, te pUrvarUpam|  ye saha, te rUpam|  ye paCcAtte upadravAH|  te cobhaye~api lakSaNapadena saGgRhItAH|  upaCayaH vyAdhisAtmyam|  AptirantaraGgo hetuH|  iti rogalakSaNam|

A0 ra0-uktamauSadhamasAdhye vyAdhau niSeddhuM sAdhyayApyAsAdhyavivekaM karoti|  tatra sAdhyo dvividhaH, sukhaH kRcchraCca|  tatra sukhasAdhyaM lakSayati-sarvauSadheti|  sarvauSadhakSamadehatvAdyekonaviMCatilakSaNo rogaH sukhaH-sukhasAdhyaH|  tAni ca lakSaNAni viparyayAtyantaviparyayAbhyAM saha likhyante, kRcchrAdiSUpayogAt|  sarvauSadhakSamadehajatvaM, katipayauSadhakSamadehajatvaM, auSadhamAtrAkSamadehajatvam| 1|  yuvajatvaM, bAlavRddhajatvaM, atibAlAtivRddhajatvam| 2|  puMjatvaM, strInapuMsakajatvaM, garbhiNIsUtikAstrIlakSaNanapuMsakajatvam| 3|  viSayAnAsaktendriyajatvaM, viSayAsaktendriyajatvaM, asadviSayAsaktendriyajatvam| 4|  amarmagatvaM, marmagatvaM, prANaharamarmagatvam| 5| alpanidAnatvaM, bahunidAnatvaM, yAvaduktanidAnatvam| 6| alpasamprAptitvaM, bahusamprAptitvaM, yAvaduktasamprAptitvam| 7| heturnidAnaM samprAptiCca|  alpapUrvarUpatvaM, bahupUrvarUpatvaM, yAvaduktapUrvarUpatvam| 8| alparUpatvaM, bahurUpatvaM, yAvaduktarUpatvam| 9| anupadravatvaM, sopadravatvaM, yAvaduktopadravatvam| 10| utpAdakadoSApekSayA viparItadUSyatvaM, yathA-pittaje rasagatvam|  tulyadUSyatvaM, yathA-pittaje raktagatvam|  tulyAnekadUSyatvaM, yathA-pittaje raktasvedagatvam| 11| viparItadeCatvaM, yathA-kaphaje jAMgalatvam|  tulyadeCatvaM, yathA-kaphaje~anUpagatvam|  tulyadeCajanmagatvaM, yathA-kaphaje janmaprabhRtisevitAnUpagatvam| 12|  atulyartutvaM, yathA-vAtaje CAradatvam|  tulyartutvaM, yathA-vAtaje grISmatvam|  tulyaprakopartutvaM, yathA-vAtaje vArSikatvam| 13|  viparItaprakRtitvaM, yathA-pittaje kaphaprakRtitvam|  tulyaprakRtitvaM, yathA-pittaje pittaprakRtitvam|  tulyanindyaprakRtitvaM, yathA-pittaje vAtapittaprakRtitvam|  vAtasya yogavAhitvAt| 14| pAdasampadbhAvatvaM, pAdavikRtatvaM, sarvapAdavikRtatvam| 15| anukUlagrahatvaM, pratikUlagrahatvaM, pratikUlasarvagrahatvam| 16| ekadoSatvaM, dvidoSatvaM, sarvadoSatvam| 17|  ekamArgatvaM, anekamArgatvaM, sarvamArgatvam| 18| anatikrAntavatsaratvaM, atikrAntavatsaratvaM, bahvatikrAntavatsaratvam| 19|

CastrAdisAdhanaH kRcchraH saGkare ca tato gadaH|||32||

sa0- yo gado rogaH, CastrAdisAdhanaH CastrAdibhiH sAdhyate, sa kRcchrasAdhyaH kRcchrapratIkAro mahadbhirupAyaiH sAdhyate tathA cireNa| tathA ca granthaH (saM.sU.a.2)-  "kRcchrairupAyaiH kRcchrastu mahadbhiCca cireNa ca||" AdigrahaNena kSArAgnikarmaviSalepAdayo gRhyante| tathA, saGkare ca-  tataH pUrvoktAtsAdhyaliGgAtsaGkIrNatve sati-  yo gada uptannaH, so~api kRcchrasAdhyaH| caCabdaH samuccaye| tatastasmAduktasAdhyalakSaNAdyaH saGkare dvitriviparyaye sati sthitaH| tathA ca-  yuvA AturaH kintu na vijitAtmA| vijitAtmA vA kintu rogo marmasthAnagaH| sarvauSadhakSame dehe jAtaH kintu vRddhaH| kadAcidyuvA na sarvauSadhakSamo dehaH| evamanayA diCA sarvamapyUhyam|

A0 ra0-  kRcchrasAdhyaM lakSayati-CastrAdIti|  yo gadaH CastrAdisAdhanaH, sa kRcchraH-kRcchrasAdhyaH|  yaCca gadastatastebhyaH sukhasAdhyalakSaNebhyo jAte saGkare sthitaH, so~api kRcchraH|  sukhasAdhyalakSaNasya tadviparyayeNa sahaikatrAvasthAnaM saGkaraH|  yathA-yuvajatvasya strIjatvena|  bAlajatvasya vRddhajatvena tu sahAnavasthAnAnna saGkaraH|  evaM sarvatra|  asya ca saGkaratraividhyAttraividhyam|  alpaviparyaye saGkare kRcchraH, tulyaviparyaye kRcchrataraH, bahuviparyaye kRcchratamaH|  tathA, CastrakSArAgnisAdhanatvAttraividhyam|  eteSAM SaNNAM saGkare tAratamyaM svayamUhyam|

CeSatvAdAyuSo yApyaH pathyAbhyAsAdviparyaye||32||

sa0- bAhulyena viparyaye sAdhyalakSaNaviparItatve satyAyuSo jIvitasya CeSatvAdakSINatvAnmArayitumasamarthaH, pathyairAhAravihArairyApyo yApanIyaH, nAsau pratyAkhyeyaH| etAvAnevAsya pratyAkhyeyAdvyAdherviCeSo yadAyuHCeSatvaM, yApyasya vyAdherAyuHCeSamAtraM varjayitvA yadanyattatsarvaM samAnaM prAyeNAsya ca pratyAkhyeyasya vyAdheH| kasya viparyaye sati ? prakRtatvAtsukhasAdhyasya| pathyairAhAravihArairabhyasanamabhyAsaH punaH punaH karaNam, tasmAddhitAhAravihArasevanAdyApyaH| sa ca cikitsAyAmalpaM sukhaM dattvA punaH so~alpenaiva hetunA pratanyate| tathA ca granthaH (saM.sU.a.2)-  "dattvAlpaM sukhamalpena hetunA sa pratanyate| yAti nACeSatAM rogaH karmajo niyatAyuSaH| prapatanniva viSkambhairdhAryate~atrAturo hitaiH"|

A0 ra0-  yApyaM lakSayati-CeSatvAditi|  tata ityanuvartate|  yo gadaH sukhasAdhyalakSaNaviparyaye sthitaH, sa yApyaH|  nanvauSadhairnivartate cetsAdhyatvaM, no cedasAdhyatvaM, kimidaM tRtIyaM yApyatvaM nAmetyata Aha-pathyAbhyAsAt CeSatvAt, pathyasyauSadhasyAbhyAso nityasevanaM, tasmAdyaccheSatvaM tato yApyaH|  CiSyate nivartamAno~api kArtsnyena na nivartata iti CeSaH|  sa ca niHCeSAnivartanAnna sAdhya eva, kiJcinnivartanAnnAsAdhya eva, kintu sAdhyAsAdhyo yApyAkhyaH|  sa ca kiyantaM kAlaM yApya ityAha-A AyuSaH, yAvadAyurasti tAvadyApyaH|  uktaM hi saGgrahe (sU. a. 2)- "dattvAlpaM sukhamalpena hetunA sa pratanyate|  yAti nACeSatAM rogaH karmajo niyatAyuSaH||  prapatanniva viSkambhairdhAryate~atrAturo hitaiH" iti|

anupakrama eva syAtsthito~atyantaviparyaye||33|| autsukyamohAratikRd dRSTariSTo~akSanACanaH||33||

sa0- na vidyata upakramaH pratIkAro yasya so~anupakramo~acikitsyaH, pratyAkhyeya iti yAvat| ko~asAvanupakramaH ? yo~atyantaviparyaye sthitaH| yo gado~arthAdyApyalakSaNAdavaCiSTAyuH CeSarUpAdatyantaviparyaye sthitaH, sarvakriyApathAtikrAntaH, majjaCukrAdigambhIradhAtugataH, marmasandhisamACritaH, so~anupakrama evAcikitsyaH, sAdhayitumaCakyatvAt| tathautsukyAdikRditi| autsukyaM ca mohaCcAratiCca tAH karotItyautsukyamohAratikRt| autsukyaM viSayotkaNThA, moho-  vaicityaM cittanACo~ajJAnam, aratirasukhaM na kutracidavasthitiH sthAnAsanAdiSvanirvRtiCcetasaH, etAvato yaH karoti so~anupakramaH| tathA dRSTariSTa iti| dRSTaM riSTaM maraNakhyApakaM cihnaM yasmin sa dRSTariSTaH, dRSTamaraNakhyApakalakSaNo~anupakrama eva| tathA~akSanACana iti| akSANIndriyANyucyante| cakSurAdInyapi nACayati so~akSanACanaH, indriyoparodhI rogo~anupakramo yaH CIghramindriyavighAtakRt| evaM purA parIkSya vyAdhicikitsAmArabheta| anyathA~avaCyaM svArthAdihAnimavApnuyAdvaidyaH| tathA ca granthaH (saM.sU.a.2)-  "vyAdhiM purA parIkSyaivamArabheta tataH kriyAm| svArthavidyAyaCohAnimanyathA dhruvamApnuyAt" iti|

A0 ra0- asAdhyaM lakSayati-anupakrama iti|  yo gadaH sukhasAdhyalakSaNAtyantaviparyaye sthitaH, yaCca autsukyamohAratikRt, yaCca dRSTariSTaH-dRSTamaraNacihnaH, yaCca akSanACanaH- sarvendriyavighAtI, sa caturvidho~anupakrama eva syAt|  nAstyupakramaH pratIkAro yasyetyanupakramaH|  evaCabdo yApyavyudAsArthaH|  yApyo~api niHCeSAnivartanAdanupakramaH, kintu kiJcinnivartanAtsopakramo~api|  ayaM tvanupakrama eva||  tasmAttatrauSadhaM kuryAdityarthAduktam|

 brAhme muhUrta uttiSThetsvastho rakSArthamAyuSaH||1||

sa0-rAtreCcaturdaCo muhUrto brAhmo muhUrtaH, viSuvati samarAtriMdive kAle dvighaTikopalakSaNaH| muhUrtasya ceha dvighaTikopalakSaNArthatvAtsarvasmin kAle rAtreCcaturghaTikAvaCeSe samutthAnaM kAryamiti sthitam| (svastho-nIrogaH kalyaH| sa AyuSo yathopacaritasya jIvitasya rakSArthaM brAhme muhUrta uttiSThedabhyutthAnaM kuryAt| muhUrto-nADikAdvayam| brahma-jJAnaM, tadarthamadhyayanAdyapi brahma, tasya yogyo muhUrto brAhmaH, paCcimayAmasya nADikAdvayam|) tasmin brAhme muhUrta uttiSThet| kimbhUtaH ? svastho~anAturaH| (suCrute sU.a.15/48)- "samadoSaH samAgniCca samadhAtumalakriyaH| prasannAtmendriyamanAH svastha ityabhidhIyate" iti svasthalakSaNam| kimarthamuttiSThet ? rakSArthamAyuSo jIvitasya| tadA hyuttiSThato vyAdhyalakSmyAdyabhAva evAyuSo rakSA bhavati| AtureNa dhAtusAmyArthaM svaptavyameva|

 CarIracintAM  nirvartya kRtaCaucavidhistataH||1|| arkanyagrodhakhadirakaraJjakakubhAdijam||2|| prAtarbhuktvA ca mRdvagraM kaSAyakaTutiktakam||2|| kanInyagrasamasthaulyaM praguNaM dvAdaCAGgulam||3|| bhakSayeddantapavanaM dantamAMsAnyabAdhayan||3||

athAto dinacaryAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH ||2|| iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-atheti sarveSvadhyAyeSu maGgalArthaH| tathA ata ityAnantarye prastutAbhisambandhe vA| athetyAdiCabdAnAM pUrvAdhyAye varNita evArthaH| mAGgaliko hyAcAryaH pratyadhyAyArambhe maGgalArthamathaCabdaM prayuGkte| dine dine caryA dinacaryA, dinasya vA  caryA dinacaryA| caraNaM caryA| ubhayalokahitamAhAravihAraceSTitamiti yAvat, pratidine yatkartavyam| dinacaryA yasminnadhyAye~astIti pUrvavat chapratyayamutpAdya tallope prakRtibhAvatvaM ca pratipAdya dinacaryeti niSpAdyate, tamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH| nanu, prastutAdAyuSkAmIyAdadhyAyAdanantaraM ko~asya sambandhaH ?| ucyate| yasmAdAyuSkAmeNa puruSeNa yatpradhAnamAyuSyaM tadAsevyaM prathamataH, tadanvanyAni yAnyAyuSyANi| ataH prathamaM tAvadAcArapradhAnena bhavitavyam| yataH,  "AcArAdAyurlabhyate" ityAcAryAH| yadyapyatra rAtricaryA~api vihitA, tathApi prAdhAnyAddinacaryA asminnadhyAye nirdiSTA| ato dinacaryAdhyAyo~ayamucyate|

A0 ra0 dinacaryAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-athAta iti|   yataH pUrvAdhyAye vyAdhipratIkAraH sAmAnyasaMkSepAbhyAM vyAkhyAtaH|  sa evedAnIM viCeSavistarAbhyAM vyAkhyeyaH|  sa ca hetvAdikrameNa|  tatrAdau bahuvaktavyatvAdbahiraGgo hetuH|  sa dvedhA-vihAraH AhAraCca|  vihAro dvedhA-niyatakAlo~aniyatakAlaCca| niyatakAlo dvedhA-dainandinaH ArtavaCca|  tatra dainandino~asminnadhyAye|  ata evAyaM dinacaryAkhyaH|  sa  ca prabodhAdiH|

 brAhme muhUrta uttiSThetsvastho rakSArthamAyuSaH||1||

tAmbUlaM kSatapittAsrarUkSotkupitacakSuSAm||||7|| viSamUrcchAmadArtAnAmapathyaM CoSiNAmapi||7||

sa0-kSataM vidyate yeSAM te kSatAH| arCa AditvAdac| evaM pittAsrA rUkSACca| utkupitamabhiSyannaM cakSurekaM dve vA yeSAM ta evam| kSatACca pittAsrACca rUkSACcotkupitacakSuSaCca, teSAmapathyamahitam| tathA viSArtAnAM mUrcchArtAnAM madArtAnAM CoSiNAM ca, ityapiCabdasyArthaH| CoSiNo- rAjayakSmiNaH|

abhyaGgamAcarennityaM, sa jarACramavAtahA||8|| dRSTiprasAdapuSTyAyuHsvapnasutvaktvadArDhyakRt||8||

sa0-abhyaGgaM nityaM satatamAcaret| nityagrahaNaM copalakSaNArtham| ekadvitridinAntaramapi yathoditamAcarato na doSaH| so~abhyaGgaH, AcaryamANo jarA ca CramaCca vAtaCca tAn hantIti kvip| tathA dRSTItyAdi| dRSTeH prasAdo- vaimalyaM dRSTiprasAdaH| CobhanA cAsau tvak ca sutvak, tasyA bhAvaH sutvaktvam| dRDhasya bhAvo dArDhyam| "varNadRDhAdibhyaH SyaJca" iti SyaJ| dRSTiprasAdAdInAM dvandvaH| tAni karoti yo~abhyaGgaH, sa evam|

dinacaryA adhyAyaH

athAto dinacaryAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH ||2|| iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-atheti sarveSvadhyAyeSu maGgalArthaH| tathA ata ityAnantarye prastutAbhisambandhe vA| athetyAdiCabdAnAM pUrvAdhyAye varNita evArthaH| mAGgaliko hyAcAryaH pratyadhyAyArambhe maGgalArthamathaCabdaM prayuGkte| dine dine caryA dinacaryA, dinasya vA  caryA dinacaryA| caraNaM caryA| ubhayalokahitamAhAravihAraceSTitamiti yAvat, pratidine yatkartavyam| dinacaryA yasminnadhyAye~astIti pUrvavat chapratyayamutpAdya tallope prakRtibhAvatvaM ca pratipAdya dinacaryeti niSpAdyate, tamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH| nanu, prastutAdAyuSkAmIyAdadhyAyAdanantaraM ko~asya sambandhaH ?| ucyate| yasmAdAyuSkAmeNa puruSeNa yatpradhAnamAyuSyaM tadAsevyaM prathamataH, tadanvanyAni yAnyAyuSyANi| ataH prathamaM tAvadAcArapradhAnena bhavitavyam| yataH,  "AcArAdAyurlabhyate" ityAcAryAH| yadyapyatra rAtricaryA~api vihitA, tathApi prAdhAnyAddinacaryA asminnadhyAye nirdiSTA| ato dinacaryAdhyAyo~ayamucyate|

A0 ra0 dinacaryAdhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-athAta iti|   yataH pUrvAdhyAye vyAdhipratIkAraH sAmAnyasaMkSepAbhyAM vyAkhyAtaH|  sa evedAnIM viCeSavistarAbhyAM vyAkhyeyaH|  sa ca hetvAdikrameNa|  tatrAdau bahuvaktavyatvAdbahiraGgo hetuH|  sa dvedhA-vihAraH AhAraCca|  vihAro dvedhA-niyatakAlo~aniyatakAlaCca| niyatakAlo dvedhA-dainandinaH ArtavaCca|  tatra dainandino~asminnadhyAye|  ata evAyaM dinacaryAkhyaH|  sa  ca prabodhAdiH|

 brAhme muhUrta uttiSThetsvastho rakSArthamAyuSaH||1||

sa0-rAtreCcaturdaCo muhUrto brAhmo muhUrtaH, viSuvati samarAtriMdive kAle dvighaTikopalakSaNaH| muhUrtasya ceha dvighaTikopalakSaNArthatvAtsarvasmin kAle rAtreCcaturghaTikAvaCeSe samutthAnaM kAryamiti sthitam| (svastho-nIrogaH kalyaH| sa AyuSo yathopacaritasya jIvitasya rakSArthaM brAhme muhUrta uttiSThedabhyutthAnaM kuryAt| muhUrto-nADikAdvayam| brahma-jJAnaM, tadarthamadhyayanAdyapi brahma, tasya yogyo muhUrto brAhmaH, paCcimayAmasya nADikAdvayam|) tasmin brAhme muhUrta uttiSThet| kimbhUtaH ? svastho~anAturaH| (suCrute sU.a.15/48)- "samadoSaH samAgniCca samadhAtumalakriyaH| prasannAtmendriyamanAH svastha ityabhidhIyate" iti svasthalakSaNam| kimarthamuttiSThet ? rakSArthamAyuSo jIvitasya| tadA hyuttiSThato vyAdhyalakSmyAdyabhAva evAyuSo rakSA bhavati| AtureNa dhAtusAmyArthaM svaptavyameva|

A0 ra0-  tatra prabodhaM vidhatte-brAhme mUhUrta iti|  rAtrerupAntyo muhUrto brAhmaH|  tatra uttiSThet-prabudhyet|  svastho nIrogaH|  rogiNastvaniyamaH|

 CarIracintAM  nirvartya kRtaCaucavidhistataH||1|| arkanyagrodhakhadirakaraJjakakubhAdijam||2|| prAtarbhuktvA ca mRdvagraM kaSAyakaTutiktakam||2|| kanInyagrasamasthaulyaM praguNaM dvAdaCAGgulam||3|| bhakSayeddantapavanaM dantamAMsAnyabAdhayan||3||

sa0-CarIrasya cintA CarIracintA- jIrNAjIrNanirUpaNAdikA, tAM nirvartya, tato mUtrapurISAdeH kRtaCaucavidhAnaH, tato~anantaraM dantapavanamarkAdikaM bhakSayet| saGgrahe~apyuktam (sU.a.3)- "brAhme muhUrta uttiSThejjIrNAjIrNaM nirUpayan" ityAdi| arkaH-  sUryAhvaH| nyagrodho-  yakSAvAsaH| khadiro-  gAyatrI| karaJjaCciribilvaH| kakubho~arjunaH| AdiCabdena mAlatIkaravIrAdiparigrahaH| kathaM bhakSayet ? dantAnAM mAMsAnyabAdhayannapIDayan| prAtaH-  pratyuSasi, bhuktvA ca-  AhAraM bhakSayitvA ca| mRdvagraM-  kUrcitAgram| tathA kaSAyakaTutiktakaM, rasatrayeNa hyanena mukhavairasyArocakaCleSmAdyapanayAH samyak sampadyante| arkAdyupAdAnAdeva kaSAyAditve labdhe, kaSAyAdigrahaNaM saGgrahAdigRhItasya saGgrahArthaM spaSTArthaM ca| arkAdigrahaNamudAharaNArthaM jJeyam| atra saMkSepavivakSayA na dantapavanasya gaNasaGgrahaH| dvAdaCAdyaGgulapramANatvaM CleSmAtakAdyaniSTadantapavananiSedhaCca tantrAntarokta (saGgrahokta) mapi nehoktam| suCrutenoktam (?) "ajagdhamanupakliSTaM SaDaSTadvAdaCAGgulam| pradeCanImukhasamaM mRdu syAddantadhAvanam| kUrcitAgraM" ityAdi|

A0 ra0- CaucaM vidhatte-CarIracintAmiti|  tataH-prabodhAnantaram|  kRtaCaucavidhirbhavet-smRtyuktavidhinA malotsargAdyAcamanaparyantaM kuryAt|  kiM kRtvA CarIracintAM nirvartya-niSpAdya|  kIdRCaM me CarIraM, kiJca mayA asya hitamanuSThitaM, kiMvA adyAnuSTheyamityAdi vimarCaH CarIracintA|  vakSyati hi (sU. a. 2/47)- "naktaMdinAni me yAnti kathambhUtasya samprati|  duHkhabhAGna bhavatyevaM nityaM sannihitaH smRtiH||" dharmaCAstre~api-"brAhme muhUrta utthAya cintayedAtmano hitam" iti|  tadA hi kRto vimarCo yathArtho bhavati, manasaH prasannatvAt|      dantadhAvanaM vidhatte-arketi|  prAtarbhuktvA ceti dvikAlaM dantapavanaM bhakSayet|  dantAH pUyante Codhyante~aneneti dantapavanaM-dantakASTham|  taccArkAdijam|  kakubho~arjunaH|  AdiCabdAdasanAdayaH|  tacca mUlam|  uktaM hi saGgrahe (sU. a. 3)-  "vaTAsanArkakhadirakaraJjakaravIrajam|  sarjArimedApAmArgamAlatIkakubhodbhavam||  kaSAyatiktakaTukaM mUlamanyadapIdRCam|  vijJAtavRkSaM kSuNNAgramRjvagranthi subhUmijam||" iti|  kanInyagrasamasthyaulyaM-kaniSThikAGgulyagrabhAgavatsthUlam|  praguNaM Rju|  kaSAyAdirasamarkAdibhyo~anyadapi grAhyam, arkAdyanabhivyaktakaSAyAdirasamapi grAhyamityubhayorgrahaNam|  bhakSaNena bhakSaNapUrvakaM dantagharSaNaM lakSyate, dantamAMsabAdhananiSedhAnyathAnupapatteH|  na hi bhakSaNamAtreNa dantamAMsAnAM pIDA|  uktaM ca saGgrahe (sU. a. 3)- "prAtarbhuktvA ca yatavAgbhakSayeddantadhAvanam|  vApyatrivargatritayakSaudrAktena ca gharSayet|  vApyaM-kuSTham|  trivargatritayaM-triphalA, trikaTukaM, trijAtakaM ca|  Canaistena tato dantAn dantamAMsAnyabAdhayan" iti|  gharSaNaM cAdhodantapUrvakam|  uktaM hi saGgrahe (sU. a. 3)-  "dantAn pUrvamadho gharSetprAtaH siJcecca locane|  toyapUrNamukho grISmaCaradoH CItavAriNA" iti|  Rtvantare koSNavAriNetyarthaH|

sa0-jIrNe- samyakpariNate pUrva AhAre, adyAt- bhuJjIta| kimadyAt ? hitaM- pathyam| mitaM- mAtrayA yuktam| pathyamapi hyatimAtraM hInamAtraM vA bhuktaM doSAya syAt, ato mitam| na vegAnityAdi| vAtaviNmUtrAdInAM sambandhino vegAnanunmukhIbhUtAn balAnnairayenna pravartayet| na vegita ityAdi| saJjAtavAtaviNmUtravegastamakRtvA nAnyakAryaH syAt| nAnyatkAryaM kuryAdityarthaH| nAjitvetyAdi| sAdhayituM CakyaH sAdhyaH, taM rogamajitvA nAnyakAryaH syAditi yojyam| sa hyupekSito duHsAdhyo~asAdhyo vA syAt| sAdhyaCabdopAdAnAdasAdhyAmayaM prati yatno na kAryaH, cikitsAnaiSphalyAditi dyotayati|

A0 ra0-bhojanaM vidhatte-jIrNa iti|  hyastane jIrNe~anne sati, adyAt-bhuJjIta|  kim ?  hitaM,-deCakAlAdyucitam, mitaM-yathoktamAtram|  nanu, vihAreSvAhArasyoktiraprastutA|  maivam|  kriyAprAdhAnyAdvihAratvamAhArasya|  kriyApradhAno hi vihAraH, kriyAdravyapradhAna AhAraH, ayameva vihArAhArayorbhedaH, kriyAdravyayorubhayatra bhAvAt|  saGgrahe (sU. a. 3) tu-"annapAnavidhAnena bhuJjItAnnaM vinA~atyayAt|  abhinandya prasannAtmA hutvA dattvA ca CaktitaH||  pAkaM sajalamekAnte yathAsukhamiti bruvan|  prayacchetsarvamuddiCya pAcayennAnnamAtmane|  nAnnamadyAnmUmUrSUNAM mRtAnAM duHkhajIvinAm|  strIjitaklIbapatitakrUraduSkarmakAriNAm||  gaNArigaNikAsatradhUrtAnAM paNinAM na ca|  notsaGge bhakSayedbhakSyAn jalaM nAJjalinA pibet||  sarvaM ca tilasambaddhaM nAdyAdastamite ravau||  na bhuktamAtra Ayasyenna niSiddhaM bhajetsukham||" iti|  evaM prabodhAdayo bhojanAntA baddhakramA vihArA uktAH|       tAMCcAvaCyakartavyAnmanyamAneSu nareSu  vegodIraNavegadhAraNavyAdhyupekSAH sambhAvyeran|  atastatpratiSedhaM karoti|  tatra vegodIraNaM niSedhati-na vegAniti|  vegAH-vAtaviNmUtrAdayaH|  kiM pravartamAnAnapi na pravartayet ?  netyAha-balAt, apravRttAnna pravartayedityarthaH|       vegadhAraNaM niSedhati-na vegita iti|  vegitaH-saJjAtavegaH san, anyakAryo na syAdvegAnevotsRjedityarthaH|       vyAdhyupekSAM niSedhati-nAjitveti|  AmayamajitvA~anyakAryo na syAt, Amayameva jayedityarthaH|  kiM sarvam ?  netyata Aha-sAdhyam, asAdhyastu prayatnavaiyarthyAdupekSya eva|  iti baddhakramavihArA vyAkhyAtAH|

sU.a.4)-RtuSvevaMvidheSveva vidhiH svAsthyAya dehinAm| nirdiCyate~anyarUpeSu viruddhajJAniko vidhiH| " iti| tasmAcchiCiraSaTkaprAvRTSaTkayoH saMjJAmAtreNaiva bhedaH| saMjJAbhedaM ca deCabhedenAha tasmin hyatyarthatIkSNoSNarUkSA mArgasvabhAvataH||3|| AdityapavanAH saumyAn kSapayanti guNAn bhuvaH||3|| tiktaH kaSAyaH kaTuko balino~atra rasAH kramAt||4|| tasmAdAdAnamAgneyam---------------------------|||4||

sa0-AdityaCca pavanACcAdityapavanAH, te tasmin kAle yasmAtsaumyAn guNAn bhuvaH sambandhinaH kSapayanti- vinACayanti| kIdRCAste ? atyarthaM- atiCayena tIkSNACcoSNACca rUkSACcAtyartha tIkSNoSNarUkSAH| kasmAdevaMvidhAste ? ityAha- mArgasvabhAvataH-  vartmasvAbhAvyAt| na ca svabhAvaH paryanuyogamarhati| mArgaH-  uSNAMCoruttaradiggamanam| yataCcAdityapavanA rUkSAstatastiktAdayo rasA balino bhavanti| kramAdityanena yathAsaMkhyamatra bodhayati| tena tiktaH CiCire, vasante kaSAyo, grISme kaTuko, balItyavatiSThate, na sarve tiktAdaya ekaikasminnRtAviti| tikta ityAdyasamAsakaraNaM jJApanArtham| tiktAdirekaiko balI bhavati| dvau tu svapramANAvasthitau| naivartau pRthagbhUya tiktAderbalavattvamityarthaH| yata evaM bhUmeH saumyaguNahAnirvardhanaM ca rUkSANAM rasAnAm, tasmAtkAraNAdAdAnamAgneyam|

A0ra0-Agneyatve hetumAha- tasminniti| hi- yasmAt, tasminkAle, bhuvaH saumyAn guNanAdityapavanAH kSapayanti| nanvAdityapavanAH sarvadA santo~api tadaiva kutaH kSapayanti? ityata Aha-atyarthatIkSNoSNarUkSAH, mandAdisaumyaguNaviparItatIkSNAdiguNodrekAdityarthaH| tadaivaivaM kutaH? ityAha-mArgasvabhAvataH,- mArgasvabhAvAbhyAM| svabhAvaH prakRtatvAtkAlasya| uktaM hi saGgrahe(sU.a.4)-"kAlasvabhAvamArgaparigRhItaH" iti| mArgo- makarAdirACiparicchinna AkACabhAgaH| yataCcAtra-asminkAle, tiktAdayo rasA balinaH, kramAditi yathAsaMkhyenottarottarACca| tena CiCire tikto balI, tato~api vasante kaSAyaH, tato~api grISme kaTuka iti| tasmAditi  AgneyaguNairviparItAnAM saumyaguNAnAM hAnestulyaguNAnAM tiktAdInAM vRddheCcAdAnamAgneyam|

 ------------------------Rtavo dakSiNAyanam||4|| varSAdayo visargaCca-----------------------||5||

sa0-yat- yasmAt, balamayaM kAlo visRjati- dadAti dakSiNAyanAkhyaH, tasmAdvisargo~anvarthasaMjJaH kAlaH| hi- yasmAt, atra- visargAkhye kAle, saumyatvAt- somabhUyiSThatvAt, somo balavAn, tadACritarAtrivRddhidarCanAt| hIyate raviH-  tadACritadinahAnyupalabdherhInaCaktiH sampadyate| kadA ? mahItale- bhUpRSThe, CAntatApe sati| kaiH ? meghavRSTyanilaiH CItaiH| CItairityupalakSaNArtham, visargakAlatvAnmRdubhiH snigdhairapIti| ata eva snigdhA rasA amlalavaNamadhurA balino bhavanti| atrApi kramAdityanuvartate| pUrvavacca vyAkhyeyam|

A0 ra0-visargasaMjJAM nirvakti-yadbalamiti|  yat-yasmAt, ayaM kAlaH saumyatvAddhetorbalaM visRjati-dadAti, ato visargAkhyaH|      saumyatve hetumAha-atra soma iti|  hi-yasmAt, atra-asmin kAle mArge ca, tadvaCAtsomo  balavAn bhavati|  raviCca hIyate-tyajyate, prakRtatvAdbalena|  na kevalaM kAlamArgavaCAt, kintu CItairmeghavRSTyanilaiCca|  vRSTyA vinA~api chAyAyA eva kAraNatvAnmeghAnAM pRthaggrahaNam|  tathA, iha-asmin kAle, amlAdyAH snigdhA rasA balino bhavanti|   kasminsati ?  taireva meghAdyaiH CAntatApe mahItale sati|  AdAne hyAdityapavanatApitAyAM bhuvi saumyaguNakSayAdrUkSA rasA balina Asan|  visarge punaH CAntatApAyAM bhuvi saumyaguNalAbhAt snigdhA rasA balina ityarthaH|  cakAreNa kramAdityanukRSyate|  tena varSAsvamlo balI, tato~api Caradi lavaNaH, tato~api hemante madhura iti siddham|  somavRddhyA, sUryahAnyA, snigdharasabalitvena ca visargasya saumyatvamiti vAkyArthaH|  kAlamArgayoH kAraNatvaM saGgrahe~apyuktam (sU. a. 4)- "kAlamArgameghavAtavarSAbhihatapratApe dakSiNAyanage~arke CaCini cAvyAhatabale" iti|  mArgo~atra karkaTAdirACiSaTkaparicchinna AkACabhAgaH|

CIte~agryaM vRSTigharme~alpaM balaM madhyaM tu CeSayoH||7||

sa0-CItasvabhAve kAle hemantaCiCirAkhye nRNAmagryaM balaM bhavati| vRSTiCca gharmaCca tasminvRSTigharme- varSAgrISmAkhye kAle~alpam| turavadhAraNe| CeSayoH-  CaradvasantayorRtvormadhyameva balam| nanu, vasante AdAnakAlatvAdatyarthatIkSNoSNarUkSairAdityapavanaiH CoSyamANeSu balavRddhihetuSu bhuvaH saumyeSu guNeSu, kathaM madhyabalatvamiti ? atra brUmaH| varSAdiSu triSvRtuSu balamupacitaM krameNaivApacIyate| yathA- kRSNapakSe candraH| tasmAddIrghakAlAnuvRttaM balamupacitaM vasante krameNaivApacIyate, iti madhyabalatvaM yuktam| anenaiva hetunA CiCire~agryabalatvam| yataH sakalena visargiNA kAlena yadupacitamatiCayena balaM tat CiCire prArambhamAtrAdAnakAle~apacIyamAnamapi balaM na hInaM lakSyate| yathA- kRSNapakSAdau candraH kSIyamANaH, iti yuktamuktaM CIte~agryaM balaM vasante ca madhyaM balamiti|

A0 ra0-yenaiva krameNa balamupacIyate, tenaiva cApacIyata ityAha-CIte~agryamiti|  CIte-hemantaCiCirayoH, agryaM -bhAgatrayapUrNaM balam|  vRSTigharme-prAvRDgrISmayoH, alpaM -bhAgadvayonam|  CeSayoH-CaradvasantayoH, madhyaM-ekabhAgonam|  (ye tu CiCire caturbhAgapUrNasya balasya vasante bhAgadvayonatvaM vidhAya madhyaM balaM kalpayanti|  tadasat|  krameNApacitau vasante bhAgadvayonatAnupapatteH|  utkRSTamadhyAlpatayA atra madhyatvaM vedyam|  ekabhAgonaM madhyaM, dvibhAgonamalpamiti|) yAvadbalaM visargasyAntye dine tAvadAdAnasyAdye, yAvadvisargasyopAntye tAvadAdAnasya dvitIye|  evaM yAvadvisargasyAdye tAvadAdAnasyAntye, iti hemantaparyantaM vAcyam|  iti RtunirNayaH|

balinaH CItasaMrodhAddhemante prabalo~analaH||7|| bhavatyalpendhano dhAtUn sa pacedvAyuneritaH||8||  ato hime~asminseveta svAdvamlalavaNAnrasAn||8||

sa0-kila visargAbhivarddhitabalatvAtpumAn balI bhavati| tasya balinaH puMso hemante kAle CItasaMrodhAddhetoranalo~agnirbalI bhavati| yataH sarvataH srotorodhAjjATharo~agnirAntaraireva sverarcirbhirabhivardhate| vardhitaCcAsau yuktamAhAraM samyakpacati| pakvAccAhArAdbalamabhyadhikaM jAyate| hemante ityanena etat dyotayati, asminneva kAle CItasaMrodhAt prabalo~agnirbhavati, na tu RtvantaropajanitaCItasaMrodhAt| tathA hi- anyartujena CIte nAgnisAdo bhavati, yathA- varSAsu| tatra hi vRSTivAtAbhyAM bhavati CItam, na cAgnidIptiH| tathA cASTAGgasaGgrahe (sU.a.4)- "vRSTivAtAkule tvahni bhojanaM kledavAtajit| pariCuSkaM laghusnigdhamuSNAmlalavaNaM bhajet" iti| iha punaranekarUpaM gauravayuktaM bhojanaM Casyate| vakSyati hi- "ato hime~asmin" ityArabhya yAvat "rasAn snigdhAnpalaM puSTam" ityAdi| tathoktam- "USmA bahiH pratihato himaCItavAtairantaH CarIravivaraM pratipadyamAnaH| svasthAnapiNDitavapurbhavati pracaNDaH CIte~anilAnalaharo vidhiriSyate~ataH" iti| tathA, yadyapi "tatra sattvaCarIrotthaM" ityArabhya yAvat "tathorjaskarayogajam" ityAdinA (hR.CA.a.3/78) granthenAhAro yuktajasyaikasyaiva balasya heturityukto granthakRtA| tathA~api yuktyA nirUpyamANaH sahajakAlajayorapi balayorAhAra eva hetuH, anuvRttihetutvAt| tathA hyAhAraM vinA CarIrameva na syAt| tadanayA yuktyA trividhamapi balamAhArajamiti boddhavyam| nanu, yadi prabalo~analo bhavati, tataH kim ? ityAha- alpendhana ityAdi| alpamindhanamAhArAkhyaM yasya so~alpendhanaH san, so~analo, dhAtUn- rasAdIn pacet| kIdRCaH ? vAyuneritaH-  vAtoddIpitaH| ataH-  asmAdanantaroktAddhetoralpendhanatve sati dhAtupAkAkhyAt| asmin hime CIte svAdvamlalavaNAkhyAn rasAn seveta| nAnyartusambhave hima ityasyArthasya dyotanAya (asmin) hima ityuktam|

A0 ra0-atha RtucaryAmAha|  tAM ca CiCirAdyuddeCe~api hemAntAdikrameNa, CiCiracaryAyA hemantacaryAmUlatvAt|  tatra sopapattikAM madhurAdisevAM vidhatte-balina iti|  yato hemante analaH prabalo bhavati|  sa cAlpendhanaH san dhAtUn pacet|  ato madhurAdIn seveta|  prAbalye hetumAha-CItasaMrodhAt, romakUpAnAvRNvatA CItenArciSAM bahiH pracAre vArite piNDitoSmatvAt prabalaH|  nanvevaM varSAsvapyApadyeta ityata Aha-balinaH, balitve sati CItasaMrodhAt|  varSAsu punarbalahAniH|  nanu, prabalaCcettatkiM snigdhoSNavIryAmlalavaNAn seveta ?  ityata Aha-vAyuneritaH,-CItajanitavAyunA sandhukSitaH, sa dhAtUn pacet|  amlalavaNau ca snigdhoSNavIryatvAcchItasya tajjanitavAyoCca viparItau|  ayaM vidhiH kiM hemantamAtre ?  netyAha-hime,-CItayukte|  hemante viCeSye satyapyasminniti padaM hemanta eva hime eva, ayam vidhirnAnyadeti niyamArtham|  idaM copalakSaNam|  tena yasyartoryallakSaNaM, tadyukta eva tasminneva tadvidhiriti|  suCrutastu (u. a. 64/22) tiktakaTukasevAmapyAha-"hemante lavaNakSAratiktAmlakaTukotkaTam|  sasarpistailamahimamaCanaM hitamucyate||" iti|  sApyucitA, cIyamAnakaphapratyanIkatvAt|  hemante hi vAtakaphau cIyete|  yadAha khAraNAdiH-"pittaM CAmyati, tacchaityAdvAyuH CleSmA ca cIyate" iti|

dairghyAnniCAnAmetarhi prAtareva bubhukSitaH||9|| avaCyakAryaM sambhAvya yathoktaM CIlayedanu||9|| vAtaghnatailairabhyaGgaM mUrdhni tailaM vimardanam||10||  niyuddhaM kuCalaiH sArdhaM pAdAghAtaM ca yuktitaH||10||

sa0-etarhi- etasminkAle, bubhukSitaH prAtareva- pratyuSasi, nAnyakAle yatkiJciddinAtikrAntau satyAm, avaCyakAryaM- mUtrotsargAdikaM dinacaryoktaM, sambhAvya- sampAdya, yathoktaM- yathAnirdiSTam, anu- paCcat, vAtaghnatailAbhyaGgAdikaM CIlayet| yadyapi "bubhukSitaH, avaCyakAryaM sambhAvya yathoktaM CIlayedanu" ityuktam, tathApi bubhukSitena na tathAnyatkAryaM kAryam, yathA bhojanam| tathA coktam- "AhArakAle samprApte yo na bhuGkte bubhukSitaH| tasya sIdati kAyAgnirnirindhana ivAnalaH||" iti| tasmAdaucityAdbubhukSitenAhAraH kArya iti vedyam| nanvanyasminnapi kAle bubhukSitasyaivAhArAnujJAnAdiha bubhukSitagrahaNaM na kAryam| yuktamAha bhavAn| kintvasminkAle jATharAgniratyagnicchAyAnukArI bhavati| tato~asya jATharAgneratyagnerivopacAro yuktaH| yathA (carake ci.a.15/219, hRdaye ci.a.10/84)- "muhurmuhurajIrNe~api bhojyAnyasyopahArayet| nirindhano~antaraM labdhvA yathainaM na vipAdayet||" iti| abubhukSitasyaiva bhojanAdhikAritvamiti bhrAntinirAsAyeha bubhukSitagrahaNam| niCAnAM dairghyAditi viCiSTakAlopalakSaNArthaM kRtam| yadA~atra hemante Carvaryo dIrghA jAyante, tadaiSa vidhiH sarvo~anuSTheyo na prArabdhamAtra evAsminniti| nanvatra seveta CIlayedbhajedityekArthAbhidhAyIni bahUni kriyApadAni kiM nirdiSTAni ? ekenaivArthAdhigateH| atra brUmaH| kAryAntarasUcanArthametatpadatrayaM kRtam| tathA hi- "ato hime~asminseveta" ityatra yaH 

A0 ra0-dinacaryAvihitasyAbhyaGgAderviCeSamAha-dairghyAditi|  etarhi-etasminkAle, abhyaGgAdIn CIlayet|  kadA ?  prAtaH|  kimavaCyakAryaM bAdhitvA ?  netyAha-yathoktamavaCyakAryaM-CaucAdikaM, sambhAvya-samyak kRtvA|  kimajAtAnnapAneccha eva ?  netyAha-bubhukSita eva|  nanu prAtaH kathaM bubhukSitaH ?  ityata Aha-niCAnAM dairghyAt|  sambhAvyetyanena paCcAdarthe siddhe nairantaryArthamanugrahaNam|  abhyaGgasekapicavo vastiCceti caturvidhaM mUrdhatailam|  abhyaGgasya pRthagupAdAnamitarAvayavArtham|  vimardanaM-karAbhyAM pIDanam|  abhyaGgamUrdhatailavimardanAni vAtaghnatailairbalAtailAdibhiH CIlayet|   niyuddhaM-bAhuyuddham|  kuCalaiH-mallaiH|  pAdAghAtaM-pAdAbhyAM mardanam|  yuktitaH-mAtrAdyanatikrameNa|

kaSAyApahRtasnehastataH snAto yathAvidhi||11|| kuGkumena sadarpeNa pradigdho~agurudhUpitaH||11||  rasAn snigdhAn palaM puSTaM gauDamacchasurAM surAm||12|| godhUmapiSTamASekSukSIrotthavikRtIH CubhAH||12|| navamannaM vasAM tailaM, CaucakArye sukhodakam||13|| prAvArAjinakauCeyapraveNIkaucavAstRtam||13|| uSNasvabhAvairlaghubhiH prAvRtaH CayanaM bhajet||14||  yuktyA~arkakiraNAn svedaM pAdatrANaM ca sarvadA||14||

sa0-kaSAyeNa- rodhrAdinA, apahRtaH-  apanItaH, sneho yasya sa evam| tataH-  anantaraM, yathAvidhi- CAstroditena vidhAnena, snAtaH| kuGkumena- kACmIreNa, pradigdhaH-  anuliptaH| darpaH-  kastUrikA, tena saha vartate yatkuGkumaM tadevam| tathA, aguruNA- joGgakena dhUpitaH| rasAn- mAMsarasAn, snigdhAn bhajet| mAMsarasAnAM snigdhatve~api snigdhAniti viCeSaNamatiCayadyotanArtham| snigdhatamAn rasAnityarthaH| palaM- mAMsaM, puSTaM- meduraM, bhajet| tathA, guDasyedaM gauDaM tanmadyam| tathA, acchasurAM- surAmaNDaM, surAM- madirAM, ca bhajet| amlenAnnena kaSAyadravyaiCca yA kriyate sA surA  bhaNyate| nanu, dvidhaiva surA sevyatvenehAbhISTA, tatsurACabda eva nirdeSTuM nyAyyaH| tasminhi sAmAnyapade nirdiSTe dvidhaiva surA nirdiSTA bhavati| satyametat| kintvacchasurAM nitarAM bhajet, na tathA surAmiti jJApanArthaM dvayorupAdAnam| ata evAcchasurAmiti pUrvaM nirdiSTam| godhUmetyAdi| godhUmaCca piSTaM ca mASaCca ikSuCca kSIraM ca tAnyevam| godhUmapiSTamASekSukSIrebhya utthAnaM yAsAM vikRtInAM tA evam| utpUrvAttiSThateH supIti yogavibhAgAdbhAve kaH| "udaH sthAstambhoH pUrvasya" iti sasya takAraH| godhUmapiSTamASekSukSIrotthACca tA vikRtayaCca, tAH CubhAH-  ramyAH, bhajet| tathA, navaM- apurANamannaM, tathA vasAM bhajet| "CuddhamAMsasya yaH snehaH sA vasA parikIrtitA"| tathA, tailaM bhajet- bhakSayet| abhyaGgastu prAganujJAta eva| CaucakArye- CaucakriyAyAM, sukhodakaM- uSNodakaM, bhajet| prAvAraH-  kArpAso romavAn ghanaH paTaH, sthUlapaTakAdiH| ajinaM- sukhasparCaromacarma| kauCeyaM- paTTavasanam| praveNI- sUcIbANAkhyo vastraviCeSaH| kaucavaM- rAGkavavastrabhedaH, tavaraka ityanye| etairAstRtaM- dattapracchadapaTaM, CayanaM bhajet| kIdRk CayanaM bhajet ? uSNasvabhAvaiH - romaCikArallikAprAyaiH, prAvRtaH-  prakarSeNAcchAditaH| tathA, arkakiraNAnbhajet| katham ? yuktyA- samyagyogalakSaNayA| atisevitA hi glAnyAdIn kuryuH| tathA, svedaM bhajet| yuktyaivetyatrApi yojyam| atisevito hi svedo glAnyAdIn janayet| pAdatrANaM ca- pAdukAdikaM, sarvadA bhajet|

A0 ra0-udvartanAderviCeSamAha-kaSAyeti|  kaSAyApahRtasnehAdiko bhUtvA rasAdIn bhajet|  kaSAyeNApahRtaH snehaH-snehApaharaNamAtramudvartitaH, na tvanyakAlavadutpAditaraukSyaH|  yathAvidhi snAtaH, vidhiCcAtra CItakAlocitatvAt sarvAGgAnAmuSNodakena snAnam|  uktaM ca carakeNa (sU. a. 6/14)- "abhyaGgotsAdane murdhatailaM jentAkamAtapam" iti|  jentAkaM - sarvAGgoSNodakasnAnamiti bASpacandraH|  sadarpeNa-sakstUrikeNa|  pradigdho-anuliptaH|  rasAn-mAMsarasAn|  snigdhAn ghRtAdisaMskRtAn|  palaM-mAMsam|  puSTaM-meduram|  gauDaM-guDakRtaM madyam|  acchasurAM-surAmaNDam|  surAM-ghanasurAm|  acchasurAyAH pRthaggrahaNamatiCayabhajanArtham|  godhUmAdyutthAH-godhUmAdikRtA modakAdyAH|  piSTaM-CAlipiSTam|  CubhAH - hRdyAH|  navaM-anatikrAntavatsaram|  annaM-dhAnyam|  vasAM-mAMsasneham|  rasAditailAntaM bhojanopayogi|  sukhodakaM-kavoSNamudakam, tacca CaucakArye|  pAne tu CItameva|  pravAraH-kArpAsaromavAn ghanaH paTaH|  ajinaM-carma|  kauCeyaM-kRmikoCottham|  praveNI-sUcIbANAkhyaM vastram|  kuthakaH-kambalaH|  uSNasvabhAvairlaghubhirvastraiH prAvRtaH|  arkakiraNAn svedaM ca yuktyA-samyagyogena bhajet|  pAdatrANaM sarvadA-bahiCcaraNaM vinApi, bahiCcaraNe tu dinacaryAyAmuktameva|

sa0-mAsairityAdinA kAlopavarNanamAha| nanu, kAlopavarNanaM dinacaryAyAM kasmAnna kRtam ? ucyate| RtugauravodbhAvanArtham| Rtavo hi viCeSeNopayoginaH, vipratipatteCca| yathA- eke cAturmAsikamRtuM kRtvA CItoSNavRSTilakSaNAn hemantagrISmavarSAkhyAMstrInRtUnicchanti| apare tu dvimAsikAn CiCiravasantagrISmavarSACaraddhemantalakSaNAn SaDRtUniti| dve saMkhye yeSAM te dvisaMkhyAH, tairdvisaMkhyaiH| mAgha Adyo yeSAM phAlgunAdInAM ta evam| tairdvisaMkhyairmAghAdyairmAsaiH kramAt- paripATyA SaDRtava smRtAH| ke te ? ityAha- CiCirAdyAH-  CiCiravasantagrISmavarSACaraddhemantAH| upacArAdeva SaTtve labdhe SaDgrahaNaM paramatakSepArtham| tathA hi- kecit traya eva Rtava iti manyante| taistu RtubhistribhiH CiCirAdibhiruttarAyaNaM vidyAt- jAnIyAt| ayanamuttaraM- savituruttaramArgapratipattiH, uttarAyaNam AdAnaM jAnIyAt| AdAnamiti cAnvarthaM nAma iti pratipAdayati| tadA- tasmin kAle, nRNAM pratidinaM- anvahaM, balamAdatte- sAraM gRhNAti| ko~asau ? prakRtatvAdAdityaH|

sa0-AdityaCca pavanACcAdityapavanAH, te tasmin kAle yasmAtsaumyAn guNAn bhuvaH sambandhinaH kSapayanti- vinACayanti| kIdRCAste ? atyarthaM- atiCayena tIkSNACcoSNACca rUkSACcAtyartha tIkSNoSNarUkSAH| kasmAdevaMvidhAste ? ityAha- mArgasvabhAvataH-  vartmasvAbhAvyAt| na ca svabhAvaH paryanuyogamarhati| mArgaH-  uSNAMCoruttaradiggamanam| yataCcAdityapavanA rUkSAstatastiktAdayo rasA balino bhavanti| kramAdityanena yathAsaMkhyamatra bodhayati| tena tiktaH CiCire, vasante kaSAyo, grISme kaTuko, balItyavatiSThate, na sarve tiktAdaya ekaikasminnRtAviti| tikta ityAdyasamAsakaraNaM jJApanArtham| tiktAdirekaiko balI bhavati| dvau tu svapramANAvasthitau| naivartau pRthagbhUya tiktAderbalavattvamityarthaH| yata evaM bhUmeH saumyaguNahAnirvardhanaM ca rUkSANAM rasAnAm, tasmAtkAraNAdAdAnamAgneyam|

A0ra0-Agneyatve hetumAha- tasminniti| hi- yasmAt, tasminkAle, bhuvaH saumyAn guNanAdityapavanAH kSapayanti| nanvAdityapavanAH sarvadA santo~api tadaiva kutaH kSapayanti? ityata Aha-atyarthatIkSNoSNarUkSAH, mandAdisaumyaguNaviparItatIkSNAdiguNodrekAdityarthaH| tadaivaivaM kutaH? ityAha-mArgasvabhAvataH,- mArgasvabhAvAbhyAM| svabhAvaH prakRtatvAtkAlasya| uktaM hi saGgrahe(sU.a.4)-"kAlasvabhAvamArgaparigRhItaH" iti| mArgo- makarAdirACiparicchinna AkACabhAgaH| yataCcAtra-asminkAle, tiktAdayo rasA balinaH, kramAditi yathAsaMkhyenottarottarACca| tena CiCire tikto balI, tato~api vasante kaSAyaH, tato~api grISme kaTuka iti| tasmAditi  AgneyaguNairviparItAnAM saumyaguNAnAM hAnestulyaguNAnAM tiktAdInAM vRddheCcAdAnamAgneyam|

sa0-yat- yasmAt, balamayaM kAlo visRjati- dadAti dakSiNAyanAkhyaH, tasmAdvisargo~anvarthasaMjJaH kAlaH| hi- yasmAt, atra- visargAkhye kAle, saumyatvAt- somabhUyiSThatvAt, somo balavAn, tadACritarAtrivRddhidarCanAt| hIyate raviH-  tadACritadinahAnyupalabdherhInaCaktiH sampadyate| kadA ? mahItale- bhUpRSThe, CAntatApe sati| kaiH ? meghavRSTyanilaiH CItaiH| CItairityupalakSaNArtham, visargakAlatvAnmRdubhiH snigdhairapIti| ata eva snigdhA rasA amlalavaNamadhurA balino bhavanti| atrApi kramAdityanuvartate| pUrvavacca vyAkhyeyam|

A0 ra0-visargasaMjJAM nirvakti-yadbalamiti|  yat-yasmAt, ayaM kAlaH saumyatvAddhetorbalaM visRjati-dadAti, ato visargAkhyaH|      saumyatve hetumAha-atra soma iti|  hi-yasmAt, atra-asmin kAle mArge ca, tadvaCAtsomo  balavAn bhavati|  raviCca hIyate-tyajyate, prakRtatvAdbalena|  na kevalaM kAlamArgavaCAt, kintu CItairmeghavRSTyanilaiCca|  vRSTyA vinA~api chAyAyA eva kAraNatvAnmeghAnAM pRthaggrahaNam|  tathA, iha-asmin kAle, amlAdyAH snigdhA rasA balino bhavanti|   kasminsati ?  taireva meghAdyaiH CAntatApe mahItale sati|  AdAne hyAdityapavanatApitAyAM bhuvi saumyaguNakSayAdrUkSA rasA balina Asan|  visarge punaH CAntatApAyAM bhuvi saumyaguNalAbhAt snigdhA rasA balina ityarthaH|  cakAreNa kramAdityanukRSyate|  tena varSAsvamlo balI, tato~api Caradi lavaNaH, tato~api hemante madhura iti siddham|  somavRddhyA, sUryahAnyA, snigdharasabalitvena ca visargasya saumyatvamiti vAkyArthaH|  kAlamArgayoH kAraNatvaM saGgrahe~apyuktam (sU. a. 4)- "kAlamArgameghavAtavarSAbhihatapratApe dakSiNAyanage~arke CaCini cAvyAhatabale" iti|  mArgo~atra karkaTAdirACiSaTkaparicchinna AkACabhAgaH|

CIte~agryaM vRSTigharme~alpaM balaM madhyaM tu CeSayoH||7||

sa0-CItasvabhAve kAle hemantaCiCirAkhye nRNAmagryaM balaM bhavati| vRSTiCca gharmaCca tasminvRSTigharme- varSAgrISmAkhye kAle~alpam| turavadhAraNe| CeSayoH-  CaradvasantayorRtvormadhyameva balam| nanu, vasante AdAnakAlatvAdatyarthatIkSNoSNarUkSairAdityapavanaiH CoSyamANeSu balavRddhihetuSu bhuvaH saumyeSu guNeSu, kathaM madhyabalatvamiti ? atra brUmaH| varSAdiSu triSvRtuSu balamupacitaM krameNaivApacIyate| yathA- kRSNapakSe candraH| tasmAddIrghakAlAnuvRttaM balamupacitaM vasante krameNaivApacIyate, iti madhyabalatvaM yuktam| anenaiva hetunA CiCire~agryabalatvam| yataH sakalena visargiNA kAlena yadupacitamatiCayena balaM tat CiCire prArambhamAtrAdAnakAle~apacIyamAnamapi balaM na hInaM lakSyate| yathA- kRSNapakSAdau candraH kSIyamANaH, iti yuktamuktaM CIte~agryaM balaM vasante ca madhyaM balamiti|

A0 ra0-yenaiva krameNa balamupacIyate, tenaiva cApacIyata ityAha-CIte~agryamiti|  CIte-hemantaCiCirayoH, agryaM -bhAgatrayapUrNaM balam|  vRSTigharme-prAvRDgrISmayoH, alpaM -bhAgadvayonam|  CeSayoH-CaradvasantayoH, madhyaM-ekabhAgonam|  (ye tu CiCire caturbhAgapUrNasya balasya vasante bhAgadvayonatvaM vidhAya madhyaM balaM kalpayanti|  tadasat|  krameNApacitau vasante bhAgadvayonatAnupapatteH|  utkRSTamadhyAlpatayA atra madhyatvaM vedyam|  ekabhAgonaM madhyaM, dvibhAgonamalpamiti|) yAvadbalaM visargasyAntye dine tAvadAdAnasyAdye, yAvadvisargasyopAntye tAvadAdAnasya dvitIye|  evaM yAvadvisargasyAdye tAvadAdAnasyAntye, iti hemantaparyantaM vAcyam|  iti RtunirNayaH|

balinaH CItasaMrodhAddhemante prabalo~analaH||7|| bhavatyalpendhano dhAtUn sa pacedvAyuneritaH||8||  ato hime~asminseveta svAdvamlalavaNAnrasAn||8||

sa0-kila visargAbhivarddhitabalatvAtpumAn balI bhavati| tasya balinaH puMso hemante kAle CItasaMrodhAddhetoranalo~agnirbalI bhavati| yataH sarvataH srotorodhAjjATharo~agnirAntaraireva sverarcirbhirabhivardhate| vardhitaCcAsau yuktamAhAraM samyakpacati| pakvAccAhArAdbalamabhyadhikaM jAyate| hemante ityanena etat dyotayati, asminneva kAle CItasaMrodhAt prabalo~agnirbhavati, na tu RtvantaropajanitaCItasaMrodhAt| tathA hi- anyartujena CIte nAgnisAdo bhavati, yathA- varSAsu| tatra hi vRSTivAtAbhyAM bhavati CItam, na cAgnidIptiH| tathA cASTAGgasaGgrahe (sU.a.4)- "vRSTivAtAkule tvahni bhojanaM kledavAtajit| pariCuSkaM laghusnigdhamuSNAmlalavaNaM bhajet" iti| iha punaranekarUpaM gauravayuktaM bhojanaM Casyate| vakSyati hi- "ato hime~asmin" ityArabhya yAvat "rasAn snigdhAnpalaM puSTam" ityAdi| tathoktam- "USmA bahiH pratihato himaCItavAtairantaH CarIravivaraM pratipadyamAnaH| svasthAnapiNDitavapurbhavati pracaNDaH CIte~anilAnalaharo vidhiriSyate~ataH" iti| tathA, yadyapi "tatra sattvaCarIrotthaM" ityArabhya yAvat "tathorjaskarayogajam" ityAdinA (hR.CA.a.3/78) granthenAhAro yuktajasyaikasyaiva balasya heturityukto granthakRtA| tathA~api yuktyA nirUpyamANaH sahajakAlajayorapi balayorAhAra eva hetuH, anuvRttihetutvAt| tathA hyAhAraM vinA CarIrameva na syAt| tadanayA yuktyA trividhamapi balamAhArajamiti boddhavyam| nanu, yadi prabalo~analo bhavati, tataH kim ? ityAha- alpendhana ityAdi| alpamindhanamAhArAkhyaM yasya so~alpendhanaH san, so~analo, dhAtUn- rasAdIn pacet| kIdRCaH ? vAyuneritaH-  vAtoddIpitaH| ataH-  asmAdanantaroktAddhetoralpendhanatve sati dhAtupAkAkhyAt| asmin hime CIte svAdvamlalavaNAkhyAn rasAn seveta| nAnyartusambhave hima ityasyArthasya dyotanAya (asmin) hima ityuktam|

A0 ra0-atha RtucaryAmAha|  tAM ca CiCirAdyuddeCe~api hemAntAdikrameNa, CiCiracaryAyA hemantacaryAmUlatvAt|  tatra sopapattikAM madhurAdisevAM vidhatte-balina iti|  yato hemante analaH prabalo bhavati|  sa cAlpendhanaH san dhAtUn pacet|  ato madhurAdIn seveta|  prAbalye hetumAha-CItasaMrodhAt, romakUpAnAvRNvatA CItenArciSAM bahiH pracAre vArite piNDitoSmatvAt prabalaH|  nanvevaM varSAsvapyApadyeta ityata Aha-balinaH, balitve sati CItasaMrodhAt|  varSAsu punarbalahAniH|  nanu, prabalaCcettatkiM snigdhoSNavIryAmlalavaNAn seveta ?  ityata Aha-vAyuneritaH,-CItajanitavAyunA sandhukSitaH, sa dhAtUn pacet|  amlalavaNau ca snigdhoSNavIryatvAcchItasya tajjanitavAyoCca viparItau|  ayaM vidhiH kiM hemantamAtre ?  netyAha-hime,-CItayukte|  hemante viCeSye satyapyasminniti padaM hemanta eva hime eva, ayam vidhirnAnyadeti niyamArtham|  idaM copalakSaNam|  tena yasyartoryallakSaNaM, tadyukta eva tasminneva tadvidhiriti|  suCrutastu (u. a. 64/22) tiktakaTukasevAmapyAha-"hemante lavaNakSAratiktAmlakaTukotkaTam|  sasarpistailamahimamaCanaM hitamucyate||" iti|  sApyucitA, cIyamAnakaphapratyanIkatvAt|  hemante hi vAtakaphau cIyete|  yadAha khAraNAdiH-"pittaM CAmyati, tacchaityAdvAyuH CleSmA ca cIyate" iti|

dairghyAnniCAnAmetarhi prAtareva bubhukSitaH||9|| avaCyakAryaM sambhAvya yathoktaM CIlayedanu||9|| vAtaghnatailairabhyaGgaM mUrdhni tailaM vimardanam||10||  niyuddhaM kuCalaiH sArdhaM pAdAghAtaM ca yuktitaH||10||

sa0-etarhi- etasminkAle, bubhukSitaH prAtareva- pratyuSasi, nAnyakAle yatkiJciddinAtikrAntau satyAm, avaCyakAryaM- mUtrotsargAdikaM dinacaryoktaM, sambhAvya- sampAdya, yathoktaM- yathAnirdiSTam, anu- paCcat, vAtaghnatailAbhyaGgAdikaM CIlayet| yadyapi "bubhukSitaH, avaCyakAryaM sambhAvya yathoktaM CIlayedanu" ityuktam, tathApi bubhukSitena na tathAnyatkAryaM kAryam, yathA bhojanam| tathA coktam- "AhArakAle samprApte yo na bhuGkte bubhukSitaH| tasya sIdati kAyAgnirnirindhana ivAnalaH||" iti| tasmAdaucityAdbubhukSitenAhAraH kArya iti vedyam| nanvanyasminnapi kAle bubhukSitasyaivAhArAnujJAnAdiha bubhukSitagrahaNaM na kAryam| yuktamAha bhavAn| kintvasminkAle jATharAgniratyagnicchAyAnukArI bhavati| tato~asya jATharAgneratyagnerivopacAro yuktaH| yathA (carake ci.a.15/219, hRdaye ci.a.10/84)- "muhurmuhurajIrNe~api bhojyAnyasyopahArayet| nirindhano~antaraM labdhvA yathainaM na vipAdayet||" iti| abubhukSitasyaiva bhojanAdhikAritvamiti bhrAntinirAsAyeha bubhukSitagrahaNam| niCAnAM dairghyAditi viCiSTakAlopalakSaNArthaM kRtam| yadA~atra hemante Carvaryo dIrghA jAyante, tadaiSa vidhiH sarvo~anuSTheyo na prArabdhamAtra evAsminniti| nanvatra seveta CIlayedbhajedityekArthAbhidhAyIni bahUni kriyApadAni kiM nirdiSTAni ? ekenaivArthAdhigateH| atra brUmaH| kAryAntarasUcanArthametatpadatrayaM kRtam| tathA hi- "ato hime~asminseveta" ityatra yaH

sa0-kaSAyeNa- rodhrAdinA, apahRtaH-  apanItaH, sneho yasya sa evam| tataH-  anantaraM, yathAvidhi- CAstroditena vidhAnena, snAtaH| kuGkumena- kACmIreNa, pradigdhaH-  anuliptaH| darpaH-  kastUrikA, tena saha vartate yatkuGkumaM tadevam| tathA, aguruNA- joGgakena dhUpitaH| rasAn- mAMsarasAn, snigdhAn bhajet| mAMsarasAnAM snigdhatve~api snigdhAniti viCeSaNamatiCayadyotanArtham| snigdhatamAn rasAnityarthaH| palaM- mAMsaM, puSTaM- meduraM, bhajet| tathA, guDasyedaM gauDaM tanmadyam| tathA, acchasurAM- surAmaNDaM, surAM- madirAM, ca bhajet| amlenAnnena kaSAyadravyaiCca yA kriyate sA surA  bhaNyate| nanu, dvidhaiva surA sevyatvenehAbhISTA, tatsurACabda eva nirdeSTuM nyAyyaH| tasminhi sAmAnyapade nirdiSTe dvidhaiva surA nirdiSTA bhavati| satyametat| kintvacchasurAM nitarAM bhajet, na tathA surAmiti jJApanArthaM dvayorupAdAnam| ata evAcchasurAmiti pUrvaM nirdiSTam| godhUmetyAdi| godhUmaCca piSTaM ca mASaCca ikSuCca kSIraM ca tAnyevam| godhUmapiSTamASekSukSIrebhya utthAnaM yAsAM vikRtInAM tA evam| utpUrvAttiSThateH supIti yogavibhAgAdbhAve kaH| "udaH sthAstambhoH pUrvasya" iti sasya takAraH| godhUmapiSTamASekSukSIrotthACca tA vikRtayaCca, tAH CubhAH-  ramyAH, bhajet| tathA, navaM- apurANamannaM, tathA vasAM bhajet| "CuddhamAMsasya yaH snehaH sA vasA parikIrtitA"| tathA, tailaM bhajet- bhakSayet| abhyaGgastu prAganujJAta eva| CaucakArye- CaucakriyAyAM, sukhodakaM- uSNodakaM, bhajet| prAvAraH-  kArpAso romavAn ghanaH paTaH, sthUlapaTakAdiH| ajinaM- sukhasparCaromacarma| kauCeyaM- paTTavasanam| praveNI- sUcIbANAkhyo vastraviCeSaH| kaucavaM- rAGkavavastrabhedaH, tavaraka ityanye| etairAstRtaM- dattapracchadapaTaM, CayanaM bhajet| kIdRk CayanaM bhajet ? uSNasvabhAvaiH - romaCikArallikAprAyaiH, prAvRtaH-  prakarSeNAcchAditaH| tathA, arkakiraNAnbhajet| katham ? yuktyA- samyagyogalakSaNayA| atisevitA hi glAnyAdIn kuryuH| tathA, svedaM bhajet| yuktyaivetyatrApi yojyam| atisevito hi svedo glAnyAdIn janayet| pAdatrANaM ca- pAdukAdikaM, sarvadA bhajet|

sa0-kAnaneSu- upavaneSu, sthito madhyAhnaM gamayet- ativAhayet| ahno madhyo madhyAhnaH| "saMkhyAvisA" ityAdijJApakAtpUrvAparetyAdinA ekadeCisamAsaH| "ahno~ahna etebhyaH" ityahnAdeCaH| katham ? goSThyAM- krIDAyAM kathA goSTIkathAstAbhiH, citrAbhiH-  kamanIyAbhiH, na tvarthavyavahArasambandhinIbhiH| kIdRCaH san ? sukhI- rAgadveSAdirahitaH| kimbhUteSu kAnaneSu ? dakSiNadikpravRttairanilaiH CItAni, teSu dakSiNAnilaCIteSu| tathA, paritaH-  samantAjjalaM nityaM vahanti yAni teSu| AbhIkSNye NiniH| tathA, kvacitpradeCe adRSTaH-  ISaddRSTaH, kvacidatighanatvAt naSTaH-  na dRCyate, sUryo yeSUpavaneSu tAnyevaM teSu| tathA, maNInAM- vajramarakatAdInAM, kuTTimAni- viCiSTA bhuvaH, tAbhiH kAntiH-  CobhA, yeSAM tAnyevaM teSu| tathA, parapuSTaiH-  kokilaiH vighuSTeSu- kRtaCabdeSu| tathA, kAmasya karmAntAH kAmakarmAntAH-  madanavyApArAH| antaCabdo~atra praCaMsAvacane| yathodbhaTasya (kAvyAlaGkArasaGgrahe prathamavarge) vacanam- "vanAntadevatAveNyaH" iti) kAmakarmAntanimittaM bhUmayo yeSAM vanAnAM tAnyevaM teSu| vicitrANi- nAnArUpANi, puSpANi yeSAM te tathAvidhA vRkSA yeSAM tAnyevaM teSu| suSThu gandho yeSAM teSu| "gandhasyet" itItsamAsAntaH|

---------svasthacittasya candanArdrasya mAlinaH||38|| nivRttakAmatantrasya susUkSmatanuvAsasaH||38|| jalArdrAstAlavRntAni vistRtAH padminIpuTAH||39|| utkSepACca mRdUtkSepA jalavarSihimAnilAH||39|| karpUramallikAmAlA hArAH saharicandanAH||40|| manoharakalAlApAH CiCavaH sArikAH CukAH||40|| mRNAlavalayAH kAntAH protphullakamalojjvalAH||41|| jaGgamA iva padminyo haranti dayitAH klamam||41||

sa0-svasthacittasya- rAgAdyanupahatamanasaH, jalArdrAH  klamaM haranti| evaM tAlavRntAdayo yojyAH| antardIpakatvAdasya| tathA ca kIdRCasya ? candanArdrasya- candanenAnuliptasya| tathA, mAlinaH-  sragviNaH| tathA, nivRttaM kAmatantraM- puSpadhanvaparicchado yasya| tathA, suSThu sUkSme tanunI svacche vAsasI yasya sa evam| jalArdrAH-  pAnIyaplutAH CATikAH| tAlavRntAni- mayUrapicchAdikRtAni tAlavRntAkRtIni vyajanAni| tathA, vistRtAH-  mahAntaH, padminIpuTAH-  nalinIpatrANi, vIjanArtham| tathA, utkSepAH-  mayUrapicchAdikRtA vyajanaviCeSAH| te ca kimbhUtAH ? mRdurutkSepo yeSu te mRdUtkSepAH| jalavarSI himo~anilo yeSu utkSepeSu te jalavarSihimAnilAH| CItajalAbhyukSitairetairvAtaH kArya ityarthaH| karpUretyAdi| mAlACabdaH pratyekaM yujyate| sphaTikakarpUragrathitA mAlA mallikAmAlACcetyarthaH| tathA, hArAH-  muktAphaladAmAni| kimbhUtAH ?
