A0 ra0-dravyabhedAnAha-paJcabhUtAtmakamiti|  paJca saGkhyAkAni bhUtAnyeva AtmAno yasya tattathA, pArthivAdibhedAt paJcadhetyarthaH|  kAryakAraNayorabhedopacArAt bhUtaCabdena bhautikamucyate|  dravyamityanuvartate|

---------------------kSmAmadhiSThAya jAyate||1||   ambuyonyagnipavananabhasAM samavAyataH||2||   tannirvRttirviCeSaCca vyapadeCastu bhUyasA||2||

sa0-pRthvImAdhArIkRtvotpadyate| evaM pRthivyAkhyena bhUtena~~AdhAratvenopakRtya tena tadArabdhaM dravyamityucyate| tathA, ambu-salilaM, yoniH-kAraNaM, yasya tadambuyoni dravyam| evaM jalaM nAma mahAbhUtaM rasavattvAdyonitayopakRtya tena tadArabdhamityucyate| [muninA~apyuktam (ca. sU. a. 1|63)- "rasanArtho rasastasya dravyamApaH kSitistathA| nirvRttau ca viCeSe ca pratyayAH khAdayastrayaH||" iti| amISAM dravyAdInAmACrayakarmaNorbhedaCcintyaH|] tathA, agnipavananabhasAM samavAyAt-apRthagbhAvAt, tasya-dravyasya, nirvRttiH-niSpattiH| tathA, tasya dravyasya yo viCeSaH-idamanyadidamanyaddravyamityevaMrUpo nAnAsvabhAvaH, so~apyagnipavananabhasAM samavAyAt| evamagni pavananabhobhiH samavAyikAraNatvenopakRtya tairetaddravyamArabdhamityucyate| evaM ca sarvaM kAryadravyaM paJcamahAbhUtAtmakam, paJcabhirmahAbhUtairArabdhatvAt  yatra dravye yadbhUtaM bhUyiSThamadhikRtam, tena tasya vyapadeCaH-saMjJA bhavati| yathA,-pRthivyA~adhikayotpAditaM dravyaM pArthivam| evamApyaM taijasaM ca vedyam| tadevaM sarvaM dravyaM paJcabhUtAtmakaM sthitam|

A0 ra0-dravyotpattimAha-tattviti|  tat-dravyam, kSmAM-pRthivIm, adhiSThAya jAyate, mRdamiva ghaTaH, upAdAnakAraNaM pRthvItyarthaH|   ambu-udakaM, yoniH-vipariNAmakAraNaM yasya tadambuyoni|  yathA,-ghaTe niSpAdye mRdaH piNDIbhAvAdau|  agnyAdInAM sambandhAt tannivRttiH-sampUrNAvayavatvam, kAThinyakriyAvakACAdidAnena| viCeSaH-parasparam, so~api tata eva|  yathA,- piNDIbhUtAyA mRdo maNikakarakaCarAvAdibhedaH| sarveSAM paJcabhutAtmakatvAdabhede prApte bhedahetumAha-vyapadeCa iti|  vyapadeCaH-idaM pArthivamidamApyamityAdi bhedena vyavahAraH|  sa bhUyasA-adhikena bhUtena, yatra yasyAdhikyaM tasya tena vyapadeCaH|

tasmAnnaikarasaM dravyaM bhUtasaGghAtasambhavAt||3||

sa0-tasmAdbhUtasaGghAtasambhavAt kAraNAddravyaM naikarasaM-api tvanekarasam| evaM dravyavadrasasyApi bhUtasaGghAtasambhavatvam| ata eva pratidravyaM madhurAdirasasya nAnAsvAdopalambhaH| tathA ca, drAkSA~akSoDakSIrekSukSaudragokSurAdau dravye satyapi mAdhurye~aparo~apara AsvAda upalabhyate| evamamlAnAmapi mAtuluGgadhAnyAmlAdInAM dravyANAM nAnAsvAdopalambhaH| evaM lavaNAdInAmapi vedyam| api caiSAM drAkSAdInAmanekarasatvamAsvAdaviCeSAdanumIyamAnaM bhUyasA rasenAnyarasAbhibhavaM kRtvA vyapadiCyate idaM madhuramidamamlAdyanyatamam, mahAbhUtavat| yathA,-sarvaM dravyaM paJcamahAbhUtAtmakaM bhUyasA mahAbhUtenAnyamahAbhUtAbhibhavaM kRtvA yathA tena vyapadiCyate pArthivamidamApyamidamiti| nanu, dravyanirNaye prakRte pAJcabhautikaM yadeva dravyaM pratijJAtaM tadeva "tasmAt" ityAdinA nigamagranthenAtivAhayituM yuktam, na punaraprastutamanekarasatvam| tasmAdatraivaM granthaH kartuM nyAyyaH-"tasmAnnaikabhUtajaM dravyaM bhUtasaGghAtasambhavAt|" iti| atrocyate| SaNNAmapi rasAnAM yonirudakam| tataCcaikasyaiva mahAbhUtasyodakasaMjJasya rasakAraNatvaM prAptaM nAnyeSAm, nIrasatvAt| iti kRtvA na bhUtasaGghAtasambhavatvaM rasasya| ityevaMvidhAmACaGkAmapaninISurbhUtasaGghAtasambhavatvaM rasasya caikenaiva prayatnena "tasmAnnaikarasaM dravyaM  bhUtasaGghAtasambhavAt|" iti jagAda| muniCcAta eva rasasya bhUtasaGghAtasambhavatvaM spaSTaM kRtvovAca| yathA (ca. sU. a. 1|63)- "rasanArtho rasastasya dravyamApaH kSitistathA| nirvRttau ca viCeSe ca pratyayAH khAdayastrayaH||" iti| evaM bhUtasaGghAto rasAnAM dravyACritAnAmapi sambhavakAraNam| etacca rasabhedIye savistaraM kathayiSyAmaH|

A0 ra0-sarveSAM dravyANAM sarvadharmatvamAha-tasmAditi|  tasmAt-sarvabhUtArabdhatvAt sarvamapi dravyaM naikarasaM-anekarasam, sarvadharmamityarthaH|  rasaCabdo~atra dharmamAtropalakSaNaH|  sarvabhUtArabdhatve~apyekarasatve ko doSaH ?  ityACaGkyAha-bhUta saGghAtasambhavAditi|  rasAnAmapi bhUtasamudAyAdutpatteH|  vakSyati hi (hR.sU.a. 10/1)-"dvayolbaNaiH kramAdbhUtairmadhurAdirasodbhavaH|" iti|  sati ca kAraNe kAryeNAvaCyaM bhAvyam|

naikadoSAstato rogAstatra vyakto rasaH smRtaH||3|| avyakto~anurasaH kiJcidante vyakto~api ceSyate||4||

sa0-yataH sarvaM dravyamanekarasam| tataH-tasmAtkAraNAt, ekadoSA rogA jvarAdayo na bhavanti, api tvanekadoSAH, tridoSA ityarthaH| atrApi "vyapadeCastu bhUyasA" ityadhyAhAryam| tena tridoSAtmake~api jvare vAtAdhike vAtajvara evaM pittajvaraH CleSmajvara ityevaMrUpo vyapadeCa upapannaH| nanu, yadi sarvo jvaraH sannipAtajaH, tatkimiti vakSyati ? ayaM sannipAtajvara iti| brUmahe| samaviSamarUpaM CaktyutkarSamACritya yatra doSA vartante sa sannipAtajvara iti tantrakRtA purastAdvistareNa pratipAdayiSyate|      atha ko raso~anuraso vetyAha-tatretyAdi| tatra-tasmin dravye, yo vyaktaH-sphuTa upalabhyate, sa rasaH smRtastantrakRdbhiH| yaCcAvyakto-asphuTapratibhAso rasanendriyeNopalabhyate, so~anurasaH| hInArtho~atrAnuCabdaH, alpo rasa ityarthaH| na caitAvadevAnurasalakSaNamityAha-kiJcidityAdi| mukhakSiptasya harItakyAderdravyasya rasanendriyeNa kiJcidante vyakto~apyupalabhyate yaH so~apyanurasa iSyate, munibhiriti vAkyaCeSaH| ante ityanenaitadbodhayati,-ante-avasAne, na tvAdAvApAtamAtre na ca madhye| tayorhi rasasyaivopalambhaH| anuCabdasyAtra paCcAdarthatvAt paCcAt sphuTo~api kiJcidya upalabhyate so~apyanurasa ityarthaH|          

A0 ra0-tulyanyAyatvaprasaGgAt sarveSAM rogANAM sarvadoSajatvamAha-naikadoSA iti|  rogA naikadoSAH-sarve~api rogAH sarvadoSodbhavAH|  kutaH?  tata eva hetoH,-rogANAmapi bhUtasaGghAtasambhavAt|  bhUtasaGghAtasya tu triSu doSeSu vibhaktatvAt|  yathoktaM saGgrahe (sU.a. 20)-"vAyvAkACadhAtubhyAM vAyuH AgneyaM pittam, ambhaHpRthivIbhyAM CleSmA|" iti|  bhUtasaGghAtaM vinA na doSasaGghAtaH, taM vinA na rogotpattiriti, ataH sarve rogAstridoSajAH|  kecittu sarvadravyANAM sarvarasatvena sarvadoSasAmAnyAt sarvadoSakopanatvam, tato rogA naikadoSA iti vyAcakSate|  tadasat|  sAmAnyavadvaiparItyasyApi sattvAt|  sAmAnyaM prayojakamiti cet na, doSaghnadravyabhedAbhAvaprasaGgAt|  vaiparItyamapi kvacit prayojakamiti cet na, sarvadoSakopanatvaniyamavyAghAtAt|  sarvadoSakopanAnAM niyama iti cet na, dvyekadoSakopanadravyAbhAvaprasaGgAt|  bAhulyenaiva vyapadeCa iti cet na, dvidoSakopanaikaCamanadviCamanaikakopanadravyAbhAvaprasaGgAt|  siddhAnte~api sarveSAM sarvadharmatvasvIkArAnna doSaghnAdivibhAga iti cet na, tasya tasya dharmasya tatra tatra prayojakatvAt|  tathA ca vakSyati (Clo.22)-"kiJcidrasena kurute karma pAkena cAparam|  guNAntareNa vIryeNa prabhAveNaiva kiJcana||" ityAdi|  tasmAtpUrvameva vyAkhyAnaM yuktam|         sarveSAM sarvadharmatvAdaviCeSe prApte tannirAsArthaM dharmatAratamyamAha-tatra vyakta iti|  tatra-dravye, kaCciddharmaH sadyo vyaktaH kaCcidavyaktaH kaCcidISadvyaktaH kaCcidante vyaktaH|  teSvAdyo rasAkhyaH, itare trayo~anurasAkhyAH|

 gurvAdayo guNA dravye pRthivyAdau rasACraye||4||  raseSu vyapadiCyante sAhacaryopacArataH||5||

sa0-pRthivyAdau-pRthivyAdimahAbhUtArabdhe dravye, rasACraye gurvAdayo guNAH paramArthata ACritAH, na tu raseSu madhurAdiSu| yattu raseSu vyapadiCyante tat sAhacaryopacArataH| saha caratIti sahacaraH, tasya bhAvaH sAhacaryam| yasminneva guDAdau dravye madhuro rasa ACritastasminnapi guruguNa ACritaH, iti madhurarasaguruguNayoH sahacarabhAvaH| sAhacaryeNa-tulyACrayatvenopacAraH sAhacaryopacAraH, tasmAtsAhacaryopacArato, gurvAdayo guNA raseSu-madhurAdiSu vyapadiCyante| yathA,-gururmadhuro raso laghuramla ityAdi| na punaH paramArthato raseSu gurvAdayaH santi| asti ca sAhacaryeNa vyapadeCaH| yathA-ghRtasahacareNa ghRtasthenAgninA dagdho ghRtadagdha ityucyate|

A0 ra0-gurvAdInAM rasACrayatvAddravyasyAsarvadharmatve prApte parihAramAha-gurvAdaya iti|  gurvAdayo guNA dravya eva, na raseSu | yastu madhuro guruH, amlo laghurityAdi vyapadeCaH, sa sAhacaryopacArataH|  ekasminnACraye dvayoravasthAnaM-sAhacaryam|  sAhacaryameva kutaH?  ityAha-rasACraya iti|  dravyaM hi gurvAdInAmiva rasAnAmapyACrayaH|  ata ekACrayatvAtsAhacaryam, tena upacAraH-avidyamAnasyApyACrayACrayIbhAvasyAropaH|  nanu, kimetat rasAdvyatiriktaM dravyaM nAma ?  ityata Aha-pRthivyAdAviti|  pRthivyAdiCabdAbhilabhyaM dravyamityarthaH|

----------------------------jagatyevamanauSadham||10||   na kiJcidvidyate dravyaM vaCAnnAnArthayogayoH||10||

sa0-evaM-anena paJcamahAbhUtArabdhena gurvAdiguNayogena dravyANAM, jagati-bhuvane~asmin, anauSadhabhUtaM na kiJcid dravyamasti,-api tu sarvameva dravyaM yatsikatApAMsvAdikaM tadauSadhaM,-cikitsitam| vaCAnnAnArthayogayoH,-arthaCca yogaCca-arthayogau, arthaH-prayojanam, yogo-yuktiH, yathA,-anayA yuktyauSadhamidaM yojitamasya rogasya vijayAya syAdanayA cAsya rogasyeti, nAnAvidhau yAvarthayogau tayorvaCAt-sAmarthyAt, sarvamapi dravyamauSadham, rogapratIkArahetutvAt|          

A0 ra0-dravyamAtrasyauSadhatvamAha-jagatIti|  evaM-uktena prakAreNa, tasya tasya dravyasya tattadguNayogatvAt jagati na kiJciddravyamanauSadhaM vidyate-sarvameva dravyamauSadham|  kutaH?  nAnArthayogayorvaCAt,-arthaH-prayojanam, yogo-yojanA, nAnAvidhAvarthayogau-nAnArthayogau, tayoH|  etaduktaM bhavati,-yadekasminnarthe nopayujyate tadevAnyasminnupayujyate| yadekena yogena nopayujyate tadevAnyenopayujyate|  yathA,-atyantAnupayukto~api kharameSAdiviDraso binduCaH CvAsakAsAdau, atyantApathyo~api mASa iNDurIkRtaH sanavanIto~arditAdau|

sa0-yato vIryasyaiva karaNasAmarthyaM tena kAraNena gurvAdiSvevASTAsu vIryAkhyA anvartheti-anugatArtheti, bhaNyate| evakAro~avadhAraNArthaH| gurvAdiSveva vIryasaMjJA na tu rasavipAkaprabhAveSu [mandasAndrAdiSu vA]| kimbhUteSu gurvAdiSu ? samagretyAdi| samagrACca te guNACca, teSu sArAH-cirakAlAvasthitayo gurvAdaya eva| tathA ca, jATharAgnisaMyogenApi na madhurAdirasavat svabhAvamete jahati| sarteH susthira iti ghaJi sAraCabdaH| tathA, anyebhyo mandasAndrAdibhyo guNebhyo rasAdibhyo vA gurvAdayaH CaktyutkarSavivartinaH| CakteH-sAmarthyasya, utkarSaH-Adhikyam, viCeSeNa varto-vivartaH,-viCeSeNa bhavanam, CaktyutkarSasya vivartaH, sa vidyate yeSAM ta evam| kiJca, gurvAdInAM guNAnAM vyavahArAya-vyavahArArtham, mukhyatvAt-anyebhyo guNebhyo gurvAdayaH pradhAnabhUtA ityarthaH| tathA ca, (Clo. 4)-"gurvAdayo guNA dravye pRthivyAdau rasACraye|" ityuktam, na madhurAdayo guNA iti| tasmAt gurvAdInAM guNAnAM vyavahAramukhyatvaM rasAdibhyaH| tathA, bahvagragrahaNAt-bahugrahaNAdagragrahaNAcca, bahavo dravyarasAdayo gurvAdibhirgRhItA bhavanti| tathA cAyurvedaCAstreSu rasAdibhyo gurvAdInAmagre grahaNaM dRSTam| yathA,-vAtAdidoSaguNanirUpaNAyAM gurvAdInAmeva pUrvaM grahaNam, na rasAdInAm| tathA ca, "tatra rUkSo laghuH" ityAcAryo~apaThadvAyvAdilakSaNe (hR. sU. a. 1|11)| evaM gurvAdInAmevAgragrahaNAt gurvAdiSveva vIryAkhyA~anvarthA-anugatArtheti bhaNyate|

A0 ra0-nanu, evaM rasAdInAmapi vIryatvaprasaGga ityAha-gurvAdiSviti|  tena-carakeNa, gurvAdiSveva vIryAkhyA varNyate|  kutaH?  anvartheti kRtvA|  itiCabdo hetau|  yatasteSu kriyamANA vIryasaMjJA~anvarthA syAt|         anvarthatvameva darCayati-samagretyAdi|  karaNaM hi vIryam|  karaNaM ca sAdhakatamam|  sAdhakatamatvaM ca gurvAdInAmeva|  kutaH?  samagraguNasAratvAt|  samagreSu guNeSu madhye sthira (sAra)tvAt-cirasthAyitvAt, CaktyutkarSavivartanAt-utkRSTaCaktitvAt, vyavahArAya mukhyatvAt-loke CAstre ca  mukhyatvena vyavahriyamANatvAt, bahvagragrahaNAt-bahuguNagaNanAyAM prathamagrahaNAt|  vipAke~api sthiratvasya, prabhAve~api CakyutkarSasya, mRdukaThinAdAvapi vyavahAramukhyatvasya, raseSvapi bahvagragrahaNasya darCanAt caturNAmupAdAnam|

rasAnAmiti rUpANi karmANi madhuro rasaH||6|| AjanmasAtmyAtkurute dhAtUnAM prabalaM balam||7|| bAlavRddhakSatakSINavarNakeCendriyaujasAm||7||  praCasto bRMhaNaH kaNThyaH stanyasandhAnakRdguruH||8||  AyuSyo jIvanaH snigdhaH pittAnilaviSApahaH||8|| kurute~apyupayogena sa medaH CleSmajAn gadAn||9|| sthaulyAgnisAdasannyAsamehagaNDArbudAdikAn||9||

sa0-iti-parisamAptau| rasAnAM madhurAdInAM rUpANi-lakSaNAni samAptAni|   samprati teSAM karma yathAsvaM pradarCayannAha-  karmANIti| vakSyamANAnIti vAkyaCeSaH|           atha ko rasaH kiM karma karoti ? ityAha-madhuro raso dhAtUnAM balaM prabalaM kurute-prakRSTatayA CaktyA yuktaM balaM janayet, nijaM balaM yat tatprakRSTaM janayatItyarthaH| kutaH ? AjanmasAtmyAt,-janmaprabhRti dehasya sAtmyAdityarthaH| bAlabhAva eva hi kSIrAdinA puruSasya vRttiH| tathA, bAlAdInAM praCasto-hitaH| ojaso~adhikavardhanatvAt praCastaH| "ojastu tejo dhAtUnAM CukrAntAnAM paraM smRtam|" ityojolakSaNaM (hR. sU. a. 11|37) vakSyati| tathA, bRMhaNaH kaNThyaCca| stanyaM-kSIram, sandhAnaM-CleSaH, te karotIti stanyasandhAnakRt guruCca| tathA, AyuSyAdiguNaH| nanu, AyuSyajIvanayorekArthatvAdekataropAdAnameva yuktam| maivam| etayorbhinnArthatvAt| tathA hi,-AyuSyaH sa ucyate yo~aparimitAyuSo hitaH, adhikAyuSo hetutvAt| tathA ca muniH-(ca. sU a. 1|25)- "tenAyuramitaM lebhe" iti| yastvAyuSo niyatarUpasya tAmeva maryAdAmanubadhnAti, sa jIvayatIti jIvana ucyate| tadanayoH spaSTa eva bhedaH| tathA, jIvanamojasyamityabhinnArthau, kintvetayorapIha yadupAdAnaM tadojaso dvividhAyA api vRddheH kArako~ayamiti pratipAdayitum| tathA ca,-madhuro raso rudhirAdikrameNaujaso vRddhikaraH sAmAnyAdviCeSAcca| yathA,-kSIraM dhAtuvardhanamuktaM vRSyaM ca| tatra dhAtuvardhanatvenaiva vRSyatvasyoktatvAdvRSyaCabdopAdAnaM yAnyanyAni vRSyANi dravyANyAtmaguptAdIni, tebhyaH sakACAdviCeSeNACvevavRddhikaramiti dyotayituM kRtamiti| kuruta ityAdi| saH-madhuro rasaH, atyupayogena-atisevayA, medaHCleSmotthAn rogAn karoti| kAMstAn ? ityAha-sthaulyAdikAn|

A0 ra0-prakaraNArthamupasaMharati-rasAnAmiti|     rasalakSaNaprakaraNAnantaraM rasakarmaprakaraNamupakramate-karmANIti| madhurarasasya karmANyAha-madhuro rasa iti|  AjanmasAtmyAt-nirupAdhikasAtmyAdityarthaH|  prabalaM-itararasakRtebhyo balebhyaH|  balaM-dehadhAraNasAmarthyam|  bAlAdInAM praCasto-hitaH|  stanyaM-strIkSIram|  sandhAnaM-bhagnAnAM CleSaH|  AyuSyaH-ayurvRddhikaraH|  jIvanaH-mUrcchAdiharaH|       atimAtraCIlitasya madhurasya karmANyAha-kurute~atyupayogeneti|  sthaulyAdayo medaHCleSmajAnAmudAharaNam|  sannyAso -madAtyayanidAne vakSyamANaH|

amlo~agnidIptikRtsnigdho hRdyaH pAcanarocanaH||10|| uSNavIryo himasparSaH prINanaH kledano laghuH||10||  karoti kaphapittAsraM mUDhavAtAnulomanaH||11|| so~atyabhyastastanoH kuryAcchaithilyaM timiraM bhramam||11|| kaNDupANDutvavIsarpaCophavisphoTatRDjvarAn||12||

athAto rasabhedIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||   iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-rasAnAM bhedo rasabhedaH, tasmai hito rasabhedIyaH, tamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH-kathayiSyAmaH| "rasanArtho rasaH" iti muniH (ca. sU. a. 1|63)| tathA, abyoniH, apAmeva rasavattvAt| tathA ca muniH (ca. sU. a. 25|13)- "Apo hi rasavatyaH" iti| apAM cAvyaktarasatvAt prativyaktyanyAdRCo~anyAdRCo rasAnAM mahAbhUtavailakSaNyaja AsvAda AsvAdyate| tathA ca, madhurarasAdhiSThitAnAM kSIradrAkSekSuCarkarAdInAM prativyaktyanyAdRCo~anyAdRCo madhurarasAsvAda upalabhyate, na tvekarUpaH| evamamlAnAmAranAlakolAmlIkAdInAmapi pratidravyamanekarUpa AsvAdaviCeSa upalabhyate, na tveka eva|         

A0 ra0-rasabhedIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte atheti|  yataH pUrve~adhyAye (Clo.12)-"raso bhedairuttaratropadekSyate" ityuktam|  ata evAyaM rasabhedIyaH|

   kSmAmbhognikSmAmbutejaH khavAyvagnyanilagonilaiH||1|| dvayolbaNaiH kramAdbhUtairmadhurAdirasodbhavaH||1||

sa0-pRthivyAdibhirmahAbhUtairdvayolbaNaiH-dvyadhikaiH, kramAt-paripATyA, yathAsaGkhyamityarthaH, madhurAdInAM SaNNAM rasAnAmudbhavo-abhinirvRttirbhavati| dvayamulbaNaM yeSu bhUteSu tAni dvayolbaNAni, taiH dvayolbaNaiH| dvayolbaNaCabdopAdAnAcca dravyavadrasasyApi pAJcabhautikatvamiti pratipAdayati| katamat punarbhUtadvayaM katamasmin rase~adhikamArambhakaM syAditi yathAsaGkhyena darCayannAha-kSmAmbha ityAdi| bhUmijalAbhyAmadhikAbhyAM madhuraH, kSmAgnibhyAmamlaH, ambvagnibhyAM lavaNaH, khavAyubhyAM tiktakaH. agnivAyubhyAM kaTukaH, kSmAnilAbhyAM kaSAyaH| nanu, yathA bhUmitoyAdhikyAnmadhuraH, evamambuvAyvAdhikyAdanyo bhUmyAkACAdhikyAdanya ityevamAdivikalpairasaGkhyeyarasaprasaGgaH prApnoti| atrocyate| svabhAvAdadoSaH| eSAM bhUmyAkACAdInAmIdRCaH svabhAvo yatkenacideva bhUtAdhikyena vyavasthitAni bhUmyAdIni rasAntarotpAdanasamarthAni bhavanti, na sarveNeti|

teSAM vidyAdrasaM svAduM yo vaktramanulimpati||2||  AsvAdyamAno dehasya hlAdano~akSaprasAdanaH||2|| priyaH pipIlikAdInAm-----------------------||3||

doSAdInAM yathAsvaM ca vidyAdvRddhikSayau bhiSak||24|| kSayeNa viparItAnAM guNAnAM vardhanena ca||24|| vRddhiM malAnAM saGgAcca kSayaM cAti visargataH||25||

sa0-doSadhAtumalAnAM vRddhikSayau jAnIyAt| katham ? yathAsvaM doSAdInAM guNebhyo viparItA ye guNAsteSAM guNAnAM kSayeNa vardhanena ca dehagatena doSAdInAM yathAkramaM vRddhiM kSayaM ca vidyAt| yathA,-vAyorguNA rUkSalaghuCItAdayaH, teSAM viparItAH-snigdhagurUSNAdayaH, teSAM snigdhAdInAM dehe yadA kSayo dRCyate tadA vAyorvRddhiM vidyAt| yadA tu teSAM snigdhAdInAM dehe  vRddhirdRCyate tadA vAyoH kSayo jJeyaH| evaM svabuddhyA vikalpya malAnAM dhAtUnAM ca vAcyam| vRddhiM malAnAmityAdi| na kevalaM malAnAM pUrvoktena prakAreNa vRddhikSayau jJeyau, yAvadamunA~api vakSyamANena lakSaNena teSAM vRddhikSayau jJeyau, [iti caCabdena dyotayati]| evaM svabuddhyA vikalpya, malAnAM saGgAt-bahiraniHsaraNalakSaNAcca vRddhiM vidyAt| teSAmeva malAnAmativisargAt-atipravartanAt kSayaM vidyAt|

A0 ra0- nidAnamAha- doSAdInAmiti|  yathAsvaM viparItAnAM guNAnAM kSayeNa nidAnena doSAdInAM vRddhiM, vardhanena kSayaM, jAnIyAt|  tau ca rUkSAdInAM guNAnAM bahutvAlpatvAbhyAM kramAdbhavataH|  tatra kSayeNotpannaM vikAraM vAyorvRddhiriti vyavasyet, vardhanenotpannaM kSaya iti|  evaM pittAdiSvapi|  tathA, malAnAmapyatisaGgAnnidAnAddoSAdInAM vRddhiM vidyAt, ativisargAt kSayam|  tatrAtisaGgo-yathAkAlamaCodhanAdvegavidhAraNAdviSTambhakAhAravihAraCIlanAcca|  ativisargo-atiCodhanAdvegodIraNAtsraMsanAhAravihArasevanAcca|

malocitatvAddehasya kSayo vRddhestu pIDanaH||25||

sa0-dvAvapi malAnAM vRddhikSayau pIDAkarau dehasya| tatrApi ya eSAM kSayaH sa vRddhito~apyatiCayena pIDAkaraH, anaucityAt| dehinAM hi prAyeNa malakSayo~anucito-anabhyastaH, vRddhistUcitaiveti na tathA pIDAM karoti|

A0 ra0-kSayavRddhyoH- pIDAkaratve tAratmyamAha-malocitatvAditi|  doSAdInAM vRddhirdehapIDanI|  kSayastu tato~api dehapIDanaH|  kutaH?  malocitatvAt|  deho hi malasAtmyaH|  sAtmyaM ca bahvapi nAtibAdhate|  vakSyati(?)-"sAtmayaM hyACu balaM dhatte nAtidoSaM ca bahvapi|" iti|  malaCabdena doSadhAtumalAnAM grahaNam|  vakSyati hi (hR. sU.a. 19/86) - "viTCleSmapittAdimaloccayAnAM vikSepasaMhArakaraH sa yasmAt|" iti|

 tatrAsthani sthito vAyuH, pittaM tu svedaraktayoH||26|| CleSmA CeSeSu, tenaiSAmACrayACrayiNAM mithaH||26|| yadekasya tadanyasya vardhanakSapaNauSadham||27|| asthimArutayornaivaM, prAyo vRddhirhi tarpaNAt||27||  CleSmaNA~anugatA tasmAt saGkSayastadviparyAyAt||28|| vAyunA~anugato~asmAcca vRddhikSayasamudbhavAn||28||   vikArAn sAdhayecchIghraM kramAllaGghanabRMhaNaiH||29||

sa0-tatra-teSu vAtAdiSu madhye, asthni vAyuH sthitaH-ACritaH| pittaM tu svedaraktayoH sthitam| CleSmA CeSeSu-rasamAMsamedomajjaCukramUtrapurISAdiSu sthitaH| yataCcaivamACrayACrayibhAvo doSadhAtUnAM, tena hetunA, ACrayACrayiNAM mithaH-parasparaM, yadekasya-ACrayasya vardhanaM, tadanyasya-ACrayiNo~api vardhanam, yadACrayasya kSapaNaM tadACrayiNo~api kSapaNam| nanu, evamasthno vAtACrayasya yadvardhanaM tadasyACrayiNo vAtasyApi vardhanaM, yadasya kSapaNaM tadapi vAtasya kSapaNaM prApnotItyata Aha-asthItyAdi| asthimArutayornaivaM vardhanakSapaNauSadham, sambhavatItyadhyAhAryam| hi-yasmAt, prAyo-bAhulyena, yA vRddhiH-vardhanaM doSadhAtUnAm, sA tarpaNAt-bRMhaNAdbhavati| prAyograhaNaM vAyuparihArArtham| sA ca CleSmaNA~anugatA-anubaddhA| yata evaM yA vRddhiH sA santarpaNAt, tasmAddhetorya eSAM doSAdInAM kSayaH sa prAyo-bhUyiSTham, apatarpaNAt-laGghanarUpAdbhavati| sa ca saGkSayo vAyunA~anugataH| evaM yadasthno vardhanamauSadham, tat snigdhamadhurAdi bRMhaNarUpaM vAtasya kSapaNam| yacca vAtasya vardhanamauSadham, tat rUkSatiktAdyapatarpaNaM laGghanarUpamasthnaH kSapaNam| tadarthametaduktam-asmAccetyAdi| yata evaM vRddheH santarpaNarUpatvaM kSayasyApatarpaNarUpatvam, ato vRddhikSayasambhavAn vikArAn doSadhAtUnAM sambandhinaH kramAllaGghanabRMhaNaiH sAdhayet-upakramet| katham ? CIghraM cirotthitA hi te duCcikitsyAH syuH| vRddhyutthAn vikArAn laGghanaiH, kSayotthAn bRMhaNairiti kramArthaH|

A0 ra0-dUSyANAM vRddhikSayahetvAdivijJAnArthaM doSadUSyayorACrayACrayibhAvamAha-tatreti|  tatra-teSu doSAdiSu madhye|  CeSeSu-rasamAMsamedomajjaCukramUtrapurISAdiSu|      ACrayACrayibhAvasya phalamAha teneti|  tena-ACrayACrayibhAvena hetunA|  eSAM-doSAdInAm|  ACrayACrayiNAM AdhArAdheyabhAvena sthitAnAm|  yadekasya vardhanakSapaNauSadhaM tadevAnyasya|  katham?  mithaH,-parasparam|  yadACrayasya tadACrayiNaH, yadACrayiNastadACrayasyetyarthaH|  vardhanaM-vRddhi hetuH|  kSapaNaM-kSayahetuH|  auSadhaM-vaiSamyanivartakam, sAmyaheturityarthaH|      apavAdamAha-asthimArutayoriti|  asthimArutayorACrayACrayibhAve~apyevaM na jJeyam|  yaddhi vAyorvardhanaM rUkSAdi, tadasthnaH kSapaNam|  yadasthno vardhanaM snigdhAdi, tadvAyoH kSapaNam|  asthno vRddhau laGghanamauSadham|  vAyorvRddhau bRMhaNam|  asthikSaye bRMhaNamauSadham, vAtakSaye laGghanamiti|      athopaCayaM vivakSuCcikitsAmAha|  cikitsaiva hi prayujyamAnA upaCaya ucyate|  vakSyati hi (hR. ni. a. 1/6) -"hetuvyAdhiviparyastaviparyastArthakAriNAm|  auSadhAnnavihArANAmupayogaM sukhAvaham||  vidyAdupaCayaM vyAdheH sa hi sAtmyamiti smRtaH|" iti|  cikitsA ca dvividhA,-bRMhaNalaGghanabhedAt|  tatra bRMhaNalaGghane vibhajati-prAyo vRddhiriti|  vRddhijAn vikArAn laGghanena sAdhayet, kSayajAn bRMhaNena|  kuto~ayaM vibhAgaH?  hi-yasmAt, vRddhistarpaNAt -bRMhaNAdbhavati|  sA ca CleSmaNA~anugatA,-yatra yatra vRddhistatra tatra CleSmA, pittAdivRddhAvapi CleSmAnugamo~astItyarthaH|  tasmAtsarveSu vRddhivikAreSu laGghanamauSadham, hetuviparItatvAt CleSmAnugamena vyAdhiviparItatvAcca|  tathA, saGkSayastadviparyayAt-tarpaNaviparyayAllaGghanAdbhavati|  sa ca vAyunA~anugataH,-yatra yatra kSayastatra tatra vAyuH, kaphAdikSaye~api vAyoranugamo~astItyarthaH|  tasmAtsarveSu kSayavikAreSu bRMhaNamauSadham, hetuviparItatvAdvAtAnugamena vyAdhiviparItatvAcca|

 cayo vRddhiH svadhAmnyeva pradveSo vRddhihetuSu||22|| viparItaguNecchA ca------------------------------||23||

sa0-svadhAmnIye sthAne doSasya yA vRddhiH sa caya ucyate| citasya doSasya liGgamAha-pradveSa ityAdi| yadA hi vAtaCcito bhavati tadA rUkSAdiSu tadguNasAmAnyeSu pradveSaH syAt| tadviparItaguNeSu snigdhAdiSvabhilASaH syAt| evaM kaphapittayoCcitayorvyAkhyeyam| nanu, "pradveSo vRddhihetuSu" ityekameva lakSaNaM doSacayasattAnumApakaM kartuM nyAyyam| yadi vA "viparItaguNecchA ca" ityetat| kiM dvayorUpAdAnena ? atrocyate| kadAcidacito~api doSo vAtAkhyaH svapramANasthaH kSINo vA yasya sa vAtavRddhihetUn rUkSAdInna dveSTi, api tu tAnicchati, sAtmyavaCAt| yathA,-garbhiNI strI dohadavaCAt| tadevaM vyabhicAradarCanAt| "pradveSo vRddhihetuSu" "viparItaguNecchA ca" iti dvayamapi kartavyam| tena yadA tulyakAlaM puruSasya vAtasamAnaguNeSu tadvRddhihetuSu pradveSo jAyate, vAtaguNapratipakSeSu tatkSapaNahetuSu cAbhilASaH, tadA samyak niCcIyate vAtasyopacitiH, iti dvayamapyetaduktam|

A0 ra0- atha cayAdilakSaNam| tatra cayaM lakSayati -cayo vRddhiriti| doSasya vRddhiH-cayaH| sA ca prathamaM svadhAmnyeva bhavati| yAvAnevACayaH saJcAravatA doSeNa vyAptastAvAneva niHsaJcAreNa vyApyate, sa ca saMhatirUpatvAt saJcayAkhyaH| yadA sarva evACayo vyApyate tadA vRddhihetuSu-samAnaguNeSu pradveSa utpadyate, sa prakopaprArambharUpattvAt prakopAkhyaH| tataH parasyACayam praviCati tadA viparItaguNecchA, cakArAtsamAnaguNeSu dveSaCca| sa prasararUpatvAt prasarAkhyaH|

----------------------------------kopastUnmArgagAmitA||23|| liGgAnAM darCanaM sveSAmasvAsthyaM rogasambhavaH||23|| svasthAnasthasya samatA vikArAsambhavaH CamaH||24||

sa0-unmArgagAmitA-svasthAnaM tyaktvA doSasya yat punarmArgAntaragamanam, sa kopa ityucyate| kopasya tu liGgamAha-liGgAnAM sveSAM yathAyathaM darCanaM-udbhavaH| vAtAdInAM kupitAnAM yAni liGgAni doSAdivijJAnIye~abhihitAni vAtavyAdhinidAne ca vakSyante, teSAM lakSaNAnAmupalabdhiH, [ vaidyenAtureNa ca| yattat kopasya liGgam| tathA, asvAsthyaM-utpitsurogecchayA sAmAnyena dehamanobhibhUtatvam| tathA, rogasya-jvarAdeH, sambhavo-janma| nanu, "liGgAnAM darCanaM sveSAm" "asvAsthyam" "rogasambhavaH" iti kiM tritayamuddiSTam ? ekenaiva doSakopAvagamAdekamevopadeSTuM yuktam| naivam| vyabhicAradarCanAt| tathA hi vakSyati pANDurogacikitsite (Clo. 46)- "rUkSaCItagurusvAduvyAyAmabalanigrahaiH| kaphasammUrcchito vAyuryadA pittaM bahiH kSipet||" ityArabhya yAvat "pitte CAkhAsamACrite|" iti| tadevameSaH kAmalAkhyo rogaH pittaliGgadarCanAdapi na pittasya kopamanupayAti| ata eva pittaprakopakaraM bhRCAmlatIkSNakaTukAdi cikitsitamatra nirdiSTam| asvAsthyamityetadapi na doSakopasya niCcitaM liGgam| tathA hi-mAnasenApi bhayaCokAdinA~asvAsthyaM dRCyate| tathA, Agantavo~api rogA doSakopamantareNaivotpadyamAnA dRCyante| tasmAdrogasambhavAdapi doSakopo~ayamaniCcitaH| tadevaM lakSaNatritayenaivAnena doSakopo niCcetuM Cakyata iti tritayamapyetadvaktavyam|    svasthAnasthasyetyAdi| svasthAnaM-yathoddiSTaM pakvACayAdi| svasthAnAvasthitasyaiva vAtAdidoSasya yA samatA-svapramANatvam, vikArasya-rogasya, asambhavaH-anutpattiH, sa Cama ucyate|

A0 ra0- kopaM lakSayati- kopastviti| unmArgagAmitA-svamArgAdanyena mArgeNa gamanam,-kopaH| tatra yadA prathamaM sthAninamabhibhUya anyasthAnavyAptistadA sveSAM liGgAnAM-raukSyAdInAM darCanam, sa samantAdanyasthAnACrayaNAt sthAnasaMCrayAkhyaH| tato vikurvANo jvarAdirUpeNAbhivyajyate tadA asvAsthyaM-prakRtyanyathAtvam, sa rogarUpeNAbhivyaktatvAt vyaktyAkhyaH| tatastameva rogamavasthAntarANyanubhavannanubadhnAti tadA rogasambhavaH| sambhavaM-dIrghakAlAnuvartanamiti yAvat| so~avasthAbhedarUpatvAt bhedAkhyaH| etACca SaDavasthAH suCrutena spaSTamuktAH (sU. a. 21/36) - "saJcayaM ca prakopaM ca prasaraM sthAnasaMCrayam| vyaktiM bhedaM ca yo vetti doSANAM sa bhavedbhiSak||" tatprayojanaM ca " saJcaye~apahRtA doSA labhante nottarA gatIH| te tUttarAsu gatiSu bhavanti balavattarAH|" iti|   praCamaM lakSayati-svasthAnasthasyeti| svasthAnasthatvaM samatvamavikRtatvaM ceti militaM praCamalakSaNam| rasavarNasparCAdyanyatvaM-vikAraH|

sa0-sarveSAM rogANAM yasmAddoSA evaikakAraNam| ekaM-pradhAnaM ca tatkAraNaM-nimittamekakAraNam| yadi vA sarveSAM rogANAM doSA ekaM-tulyaM kAraNam, samAnaM kAraNamityarthaH| evaCabdo~avadhAraNArthaH| doSA eva kAraNam, nAparaM kiJcidvastujAtam| atra dRSTAntamAha-yathetyAdi| pakSI-prAcikAdiH, yathA sarvataH-samantAt, paripatan-bhraman, sarvamapyahaH-sakalamapi divasam, AtmIyAM chAyAM nAtyeti-nAtikrAmati, tayA vinA kSaNamapyasau nopalabhyata ityarthaH| tathA anyadapi nidarCanamAha-yathA vetyAdi| yathA vA kRtsnaM-niravaCeSam, etadvikArajAtaM-sthAvarajaGgamAdibhedabhinnaM jarAyujANDajAdibhedabhinnaM vA, vividhaM-nAnAprakAraM, trIn guNAn-sattvarajastamaH saMjJAn, nAtivartate-nAtyeti, tribhiretairvirahitaM na jAtucidbhavatItyarthaH| tathA svadhAtvityAdi| dhAtavo-doSadhAtumalAH CarIradhAraNasAmAnyAt, teSAM vaiSamyaM-svalakSaNato~anyathAtvam, svadhAtuvaiSamyaM nimittaM yasya tadvikArajAtaM trIn doSAnAtikrAmati, tridoSarahitaM na sambhavatItyarthaH| dhAtuvaiSamyaM ca pratirogamanyAdRCatvAnnAnAvidham| yattu yena dhAtuvaiSamyeNa janyate, tattasya svaM-svIyaM bhavati| yeSAM tu rogANAM devagrahAdi nimittaM na teSu tathA doSAnubandhaH, AgantukatvAt| Agantukanijayorhyayameva bhedaH,-yadAgantukeSu prathamaM rogodbhUtiH paCcAddoSAnubandhaH, nijeSu prAgdoSAnubandha iti| ye tu vyAcakSate,-sve ca te dhAtavaCca teSAM vaiSamyamiti| teSAM nAyamarthaH pratipAditaH syAt| svagrahaNaM cAtiricyate| yataH CarIrAntarAvasthAyino doSA vAtAdayaH CarIrAntare rogaM janayituM nAlam| tasmAtpUrvameva vyAkhyAnaM CreyaH|

----------------------------teSAM kope tu kAraNam||34||   arthairasAtmyaiH saMyogaH kAlaH karma ca duSkRtam||35|| hInAtimithyAyogena bhidyate tatpunastridhA||35||

sa0-teSAM-vAtAdInAM, kope kAraNam,-asAtmyaiH-anucitaiH, arthaiH-CabdasparCarUparasagandhAkhyaiH, CrotratvakcakSUrasanaghrANAkhyAnAmindriyANAM yaH saMyogaH, tathA kAlaH-CItoSNavarSAlakSaNo duSTaH, tathA karma-caihikamanyajanmajaM ca, yad duSkRtaM-aCubham, etattrayaM teSAM doSANAM kope hetuH| tuCabdaH samuccaye| na kevalaM rUkSAdayo vAtAdInAM kope kAraNam, yAvadasAtmyendriyArthasaMyogAdirapi| etacca (tat)- pUrvoktaM doSakopakAraNamasAtmyendriyArthasaMyogAdibhedena tridhA bhinnamapi, punaH-bhUyaH, tridhA-triprakAraM, bhidyate| katham ? hInAtimithyAyogabhedena|

  hIno~arthenendriyasyAlpaH saMyogaH svena naiva vA||36||   atiyogo~atisaMsargaH, sUkSmabhAsurabhairavam||36|| atyAsannAtidUrasthaM vipriyaM vikRtAdi ca||37||  yadakSNA vIkSyate rUpaM mithyAyogaH sa dAruNaH||37|| evamatyuccapUtyAdInindriyArthAn yathAyatham||38||  vidyAt------------------------------------------||38||

sa0-arthena-CabdAdinA, svenendriyasya-CrotrAdeH, alpo yaH saMyogaH sa hInaH-hInayogaH| naiva veti| athavA sarva sarvikayA tenArthena na saMyogaH, so~api hInayogaH| tasyaivendriyasya svenArthena yo~atisaMsargaH-atisevAlakSaNaH, sa tasya svenArthenAtiyogaH| tathA, sUkSmabhAsurabhairavamityAdi yadakSNA vIkSyate-nayanenAlokyate, sa tasya cakSurindriyasya svenArthena mithyAyogaH| evamanayA diCA sUkSmabhAsurabhairavam, tathA atyAsannAtidUrasthaM vipriyaM vikRtAdi ca yadakSNA rUpaM vIkSyate, sa dAruNo mithyAyogaH, timirAdihetutvAt| evaM-anayA cakSuSo rItyA, anyAnapIndriyArthAn yathAsvamindriyANAmatyuccapUtyAdIn mithyAyogarUpAn vidyAt| yadA~atyuccaparuSeSTavinACabhISaNAdyaniSTaH CabdaH CrotrendriyeNa gRhyate, tadA Crotrendriyasya svenArthena CabdAkhyena mithyAyogaH| yadA pUtiviSThAdyaniSTo gandho ghrANendriyeNa gRhyate, tadA ghrANendriyasya svenArthena gandhAkhyena mithyAyogaH| yadA snAnAnulepanAdInAM CItoSNAdInAM ca spRCyAnAmakramasevanena sparCaH sparCanendriyeNa gRhyate, tadA sparCanendriyasya svenArthena sparCAkhyena mithyAyogaH| tathA, rasanendriyeNa yo raso~aparipATyA yujyate, tathA~apathyadravyaniviSTo~api yo raso rasanendriyeNa gRhyate, sa tasya rasanendriyasya svena rasAkhyenArthena mithyAyogaH|

A0 ra0- tatrAsAtmyaviSayasevAyAstraividhyaM lakSayati -hIno~artheniti| indriyasya-cakSurAdeH, svenArthena-rUpAdinA, alpaH saMyogo naiva vA yogo-hInayogaH, viSayotkaNThAyA anivRttirhInatvamityarthaH|  utkaNThAnivRttAvapi sevanaM-atiyogaH| sUkSmAdirUpasevA, atyuccAdiCabdasevA, pUtyAdigandhasevA, atyamlAdirasasevA, atiCItAdisparCasevA ca, mithyAyogaH| bhAsuraM-atidIptam| bhairavaM-bhayaGkaram| vipriyaM-dviSTam|

kAyavAkcittabhedena karmApi vibhajettridhA||40||  kAyAdikarmaNo hInA pravRttirhInasaMjJakaH||40|| atiyogo~ativRttistu, vegodIraNadhAraNam||41|| viSamAGgakriyArambhapatanaskhalanAdikam||41||  bhASaNaM sAmibhuktasya rAgadveSabhayAdi ca||42||  karma prANAtipAtAdi daCadhA yacca ninditam||42|| mithyAyogaH samasto~asAviha vA~amutra vA kRtam||43||

sa0-yathA kAlastridhA nirUpitaH, tathA karmApi kAyavAkcittabhedena triprakAraM vibhajet| tatra kAyakarmaNastathA vAkkarmaNastathA cittakarmaNo hInA yA pravRttiH sa hInasaMjJako yogaH| atipravRttistvatiyogaH| kAyAdikarmaNo mithyAyogamadhikRtyAha-vegodIraNetyAdi| "vegodIraNadhAraNam" ityArabhya yAvat "patanaskhalanAdikam" yadetat kAyikaM karma, tasya karmaNa evaMrUpasya yA pravRttiH sa kAyakarmaNo mithyAyogaH| viSamAGgaiH kriyA-karma, viSama ArambhaH-ubhayalokaviruddhaH, tathA, viSamapatanam, viSamaskhalanam, AdiCabdena viSamagamanAdInAM grahaNam| sAmibhuktasya-ardhabhuktasya, yadbhASaNaM-jalpanam, evaMrUpA yA pravRttiH sa vAkkarmaNo mithyAyogaH| rAgadveSabhayAdi yadetanmAnasaM karma, tasya karmaNa evaMrUpA yA pravRttiH sa cittakarmaNo mithyAyogaH| tathA, dinacaryAdhyAyoktaM yatprANAtipAtAdi daCadhA-daCaprakAraM, karma ninditaM-aCubhaM nirdiSTaM "hiMsAsteya" ityAdinA granthena, tacca yathAyathaM kAyavAkcittAnAM karmaNAM mithyAyogaH| samasto~asAviha vA~amutra vA kRtaM-asmin loke kRtamanyatra vA loke kRtaM-AcaritaM sarvamevaM mithyAyogaH|

sa0-iti-prakAre| doSANAM lakSaNaM doSalakSaNaM,-yathAyathaM liGgam| iti-pUrvoktena prakAreNa, yaddoSalakSaNamuktam, taddarCanAdyaiH samyagupalakSayet-jAnIyAt| vaidya iti CeSaH| darCanAdyairityAdi(dya)Cabdena sparCanapraCnau gRhyete| kimbhUtaM doSalakSaNaM tat ? aCeSAmayavyApi,-aCeSACca ta AmayACcACeSAmayAstAn,-sarvAmayAn, sAdhu vyApnotIti| kimbhUto vaidyaH ? avahito,-dattAvadhAnaH| tathA, vyAdhyavasthAvibhAgajJaH,-vyAdheravasthAH-kAlakRtA daCAH, tAsAM vibhAgaH-pRthaktvam, yathA,-iyamasya vyAdheravastheyamanyAvastheti| avasthAbhedAccopakramabhedaH| tathA hi,-ekasyaiva jvarasya navasyAnya upakramo jIrNasyAnyaH| tadevaM vibhAgaM yo jAnAti sa vyAdhyavasthAvibhAgajJaH| tathA, ArtAn-vyAdhitAn, pratikSaNaM-muhUrte muhUrte, paCyan-Alokayan|

A0 ra0- CAstre~anuktaM svayamUhanIyamityAha-vikAranAmeti| yo vikArasya vAtajAditvaM jAnAti, nAma na jAnAti, CAstre~anuktatvAtsaGkIrNatvAdvA, sa na jihnIyAt-lajjAM na kuryAt| na hi nAmAdhInA sarvatra cikitsA| vAtajAdijJAnaM hi cikitsAyAM pradhAnaM kAraNam|

athAto doSopakramaNIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

 vAtasyopakramaH snehaH svedaH saMCodhanaM mRdu||1||   svAdvamlalavaNoSNAni bhojyAnyabhyaGgamardanam||1||   veSTanaM trAsanaM seko madyaM paiSTikagauDikam||2||   snigdhoSNA bastayo bastiniyamaH sukhaCIlatA||2||   dIpanaiH pAcanaiH siddhAH snehACcAnekayonayaH||3||   viCeSAnmedyapiCitarasatailAnuvAsanam||3||

sa0-vAtasyopakramaH snehaH, CreSThatvAcca prAgupAdAnaM snehasya| tataH svedaH| kRtasnehasvedasya ca saMCodhanam| tacca mRdu-na tIkSNam, tIkSNasya vAtakopahetutvAt| tathA, svAdvAdIni bhojyAni-bhakSyANi| abhyaGgaCca mardanaM cAbhyaGgamardanam| mardanaM-pANyAdinA| veSTanaM-CATakAdinA| trAsanaM-khaDgavyagrAgrahastarAjapuruSadarCanAdinA| nanu, bhICokAdibhirmArutasya kopa uktaH| vakSyati hi (hR. ni. a. 1|15) - "kriyAtiyogabhICoka" ityAdi| tat kathaM trAsanaM vAyorupakramaH ? ucyate| bhayaM vAtaprakopahetuH, na tu trAsanam| trAsanaM hi sarvavatavijayi| tasmAdvAtopaCAntyarthaM trAsanaM yuktam| yathA,-unmAdAdiSu| tathA ca vakSyati vAtonmAde (hR. u. a. 6|29) - "harSaNACvAsanottrAsabhayatADanatarjanam|" ityAdi| tathA, sekAdirupakramaH| seko-daCamUlakvAthAdinA| tathA, madyaM paiSTikaM gauDikaM ca vAtasyopakramaH| tathA, snigdhoSNA bastayo vAtasyopakramaH| snigdhoSNA ityuktyA rUkSaCItaM bastimatra nirAkaroti| tathA, bastiniyamo-yathAvidhi bastidAnam, vAtasyopakramaH| athavA bastiniyamaH-karmakAlayogAkhyastripaJcACadbastisaGkhyaH "prAk sneha ekaH paJcAnte" (hR. sU. a. 19|63) ityevamAdinA granthena yo darCitaH, sa vAtasyopakramaH| tathA sukhaM CIlayatIti sukhaCIlaH| CIlikAmibhikSyAcaribhyo NaH| tasya bhAvaH sukhaCIlatA,-saukhyavRttitvam| tilapriyAlAkSoDAdayo~anekA yonayo yeSAM te~anekayonayaH snehAH, te ca vAtasyopakrama iti yojyam| kimbhUtAH ? dIpanapAcanairdravyaiH siddhAH| viCeSeNa puSTamAMsarasastailamanuvAsanaM ca vAtasyopakramaH|

A0 ra0-pittasyauSadhamAha-pittasya sarpiSaH pAnamiti|  sugandhiCItahRdyAnAM dravyANAM-candanAdInAM ye gandhAsteSAmupasevanam|  kaNTheguNAnAM-kaNThAvalmbinAM, hArANaM-muktAvalInAM, ye maNayasteSAmurasA dhRtiH|  uCIraM-vIraNam|  pradoSaH-candraM vinA~api|  ayantraNamukhaM-yat mukhena niyantraNaM na karoti buddhyA tu karoti|  mugdhA-mRdulA|  udyAnadIrghikAH-krIDAvanavApyaH|  sutIrthaH-CobhanAvataraNamArgaH, vipulaH svacchaCca yaH salilACayaH, tasya saikate-sikatAmayapradeCe|  sAmbhojajalatIrayorantaH-sandhiH, yasminsaikate tattathA|  kAyamAnaM-tRNAdiracitAgAram|  saumyA bhAvAH-manaHprasAdanAH padArthAH, payaH sarpirvirekaCceti catuSTayaM viCeSAdauSadham|

pittasya sarpiSaH pAnaM svAduCItairvirecanam||4||   svAdutiktakaSAyANi bhojanAnyauSadhAni ca||4||   sugandhiCItahRdyAnAM gandhAnAmupasevanam||5||   kaNTheguNAnAM hArANAM maNInAmurasA dhRtiH||5||   karpUracandanoCIrairanulepaH kSaNe kSaNe||6||   pradoSaCcandramAH saudhaM hAri gItaM himo~anilaH||6||   ayantraNasukhaM mitraM putraH sandigdhamugdhavAk||7||   chandAnuvartino dArAH priyAH CIlavibhUSitAH||7||   CItAmbudhArAgarbhANi gRhANyudyAnadIrghikAH||8||   sutIrthavipulasvacchasalilACayasaikate||8||   sAmbhojajalatIrAnte kAyamAne drumAkule||9||   saumyA bhAvAH payaH sarpirvirekaCca viCeSataH||9||

sa0-upakrama ityanuvartate| sarpiSaH pAnamityAdi pittasyopakramaH| tathA, hArANAM-muktAdAmnAM kaNTheguNasaMjJAnAM vakSasA dhRtiH-dhAraNam| tathA, maNInAM-marakatacandrakAntapadmarAgAdInAm| tathA, karpUrAdibhiH pratikSaNamanulepanam| tathA, pradoSAdiH pittasyopakrama iti vartate| pradoSo-rAtrimukham| sudhAyA idaM saudhaM,-dhavalagRham| hAri-ramyam, gItaM-gAnam| tathA, mitramayantraNasukhaM-na vidyate yantraNA yasmiMstathAvidhaM sukhaM yasmiMstathAvidhaM mitram| tathA, sandigdhA-avyaktA, mugdhA-aprauDhA, vAg-vANI, yasya sa evaMvidhaH putraH| dArAH-kalatrANi, vallabhAH-suCIlACca| tathA, chandAnuvartinaH-cittAnuguNakAriNaH| CItAmbudhArA garbhe-abhyantare, yeSAM tathAvidhAni gRhANi| tathA, udyAnaM-upavanam| tathA, dIrghikAH-gRhapuSkariNyaH| tathA, saumyA bhAvAH pittasyopakramaH| kva sthitasya ? sutIrthavipulasvacchasalilACayasaikate yat kAyamAnaM-tRNagRham, tasmin| CobhanaM tIrthaM yasya sa evam| sutIrthaCcAsau vitatavimalajalACayaCca sutIrthavipulasvacchasalilACayaH tasya samIpe saikatam, tasmin| sikatA asmindeCe santIti saikatam, "sikatACarkarAbhyAM ca" ityaN| samUhArthe ThagdurnivAraH syAt| kIdRCe kAyamAne ? sAmbhojaM-sapadmaM, jalaM yasmiMstIrAnte sa evaM sAmbhojajalastIrAnto yasmin kAyamAne tasmin| tathA, drumaiH-vRkSaiH, Akule-vyApte| viCeSeNa tu payo ghRtaM virekaCcopakramaH|

A0 ra0-pittasyauSadhamAha-pittasya sarpiSaH pAnamiti|  sugandhiCItahRdyAnAM dravyANAM-candanAdInAM ye gandhAsteSAmupasevanam|  kaNTheguNAnAM-kaNThAvalmbinAM, hArANaM-muktAvalInAM, ye maNayasteSAmurasA dhRtiH|  uCIraM-vIraNam|  pradoSaH-candraM vinA~api|  ayantraNamukhaM-yat mukhena niyantraNaM na karoti buddhyA tu karoti|  mugdhA-mRdulA|  udyAnadIrghikAH-krIDAvanavApyaH|  sutIrthaH-CobhanAvataraNamArgaH, vipulaH svacchaCca yaH salilACayaH, tasya saikate-sikatAmayapradeCe|  sAmbhojajalatIrayorantaH-sandhiH, yasminsaikate tattathA|  kAyamAnaM-tRNAdiracitAgAram|  saumyA bhAvAH-manaHprasAdanAH padArthAH, payaH sarpirvirekaCceti catuSTayaM viCeSAdauSadham|

  CleSmaNo vidhinA yuktaM tIkSNaM vamanarecanam||10||   annaM rUkSAlpatIkSNoSNaM kaTutiktakaSAyakam||10||   dIrghakAlasthitaM madyaM ratiprItiH prajAgaraH||11||   anekarUpo vyAyAmaCcintA rUkSaM vimardanam||11||   viCeSAdvamanaM yUSaH kSaudraM medoghnamauSadham||12||   dhUmopavAsagaNDUSA niHsukhatvaM sukhAya ca||12||

sa0-vidhinA-CAstroktena, yuktaM tIkSNaM vamanavirecanaM kaphasyopakramaH| tathA, annaM rUkSAdiguNayuktam| tathA, madyaM purANam| ratiprItiH prajAgaraH,-ramaNaM-ratiH, tasyAH prItiH-sukham| tathA, prajAgaraH-atijAgaraNam| tathA, anekarUpo vyAyAmo-niyuddhadhanurAkarSaNAdikaH| viCeSeNa tu vamanaM yUSo mAkSikaM tathA medoghnaM yadauSadhaM tacca dhUmAdayaCca| tathA, niHsukhatvaM-sukhAbhAvo duHkharUpatvam, vAgdehamanaHkarmaNo duHkhadasyAnuSThAnAdyadasukhamutpadyate, tacca CleSmaNo vRddhasya vikArakaraNahetorupaCamAt sukhAya jAyate|

A0 ra0-CleSmaNa auSadhamAha-CleSmaNo vidhinA yuktamiti|  vidhinA yuktaM tIkSNaM Codhanam, tIkSNena Codhanena vyApado~asambhavAt|  ata eva mRdumadhyaM vAtapittayoH Codhanamuktam|  ratiprItiH-sambhoge prItiH, na tu ratiH|  vamanAdyaSTakaM viCeSAdauSadham|  sukhAya-sukhasAdhanAya|  dharmAya yanniHsukhatvaM-duHkhAnubhavaH nAdharmAya, tasya rogahetutvAt|

upakramaH pRthagdoSAn yo~ayamuddiCya kIrtitaH||13||   saMsargasannipAteSu taM yathAsvaM vikalpayet||13||

sa0-pRthak-pratyekaM, doSAn-vAtAdIn. uddiCya-ACritya, ya upakramaH kIrtitaH-uktaH, saMsarge sannipAte ca taM-upakramaM, yathAsvaM vikalpayet-pravRddhadoSAnusAreNa nirUpya prayuJjIta| yathA,-vAtapittasaMsarge vAtapittopakramau miCrau, vAtakaphasaMsarge vAtakaphopakramau, ityAdi| evaM sannipAte~api nirUpyopakramaH prayojyaH|

A0 ra0-saMsargasannipAtabhedAnAmauSadhamAha-upakrama iti|  yathAsvaM-svamAtmIyaM viCeSamanatikramya, vikalpayet|  yathA,- vAtapittasaMsarge vAtapittauSadhamelanamavirodhena|  tasminneva vAtAdhike vAtauSadhamAdhikyena, pittAdhikye pittauSadham, evamanyatrApi|

 graiSmaH prAyo marutpitte vAsantaH kaphamArute||14||   maruto yogavAhitvAt, kaphapitte tu CAradaH||14||

sa0-upakrama ityanuvartate| vAtapittasaMsarge grISmartucaryAvihita upakramaH prAyeNa yojyaH| yathA (hR. sU. a. 3|27) - "ato~asmin paTukaTvamlavyAyAmArkakarAMstyajet| bhajenmadhuramevAnnam" ityAdi sarvaM tyAjyaM sevyaM ca| kaphamArutasaMsarge vasantartubhavaH "tIkSNairvamananasyAdyaiH" (hR. sU. a. 3|19) ityAdirupakramo yojyaH| prAyeNetyatrApi yojyam| nanu, grISme~atyantaCItasevoktA, vasante ca tIkSNaM vamananasyAdyuktam| etacca dvayamapyekAntena pavanahetuH| tatkathamuktam ? "graiSmaH prAyo marutpitte vAsantaH kaphamArute|" ityACaGkyAha-maruto yogavAhitvAt| atrAyaM bhAvaH,-yadA kila vAyuH pittena yujyate tadA dAhAdikRt, na ca pitte same sati dAhAdikaM kartuM marutsamarthaH| api ca grISme CItameva sevyata iti nAyaM niyamaH| kiM tarhi? snigdhAdyapi| tasmAnmarutpitte grISmavidhiryuktaH| vasante ca kaphayogAt kaphavikArakAryeva bhavati pavanaH, yogavAhitvAt| atastIkSNo vamananasyAdirnyAyya eva| pittena saha sthitasya vAyoH pittacikitsA, kaphena saha sthitasya vAyoH kaphacikitsA, svabhAvavaCAditi bhAvaH| tathA ca granthaH,-"yogavAhI" (pR. 9|23) ityAdi| kaphapittasaMsarge tu CAradaH-CaradRtucaryAvihita upakramaH| nanu, sannipAte ka upakramaH ? brUmaH| varSartucaryAvihitaH| prAvRSi hi doSatrayakopa uktaH| ata eva tatrAha (hR. sU. a. 3|44) - "bhajetsAdhAraNaM sarvam" ityAdi|

A0 ra0-saMsargabhedAnAmauSadhAntaramAha-graiSma iti|  marutpitte saMsRSTe graiSma upacAraH kAryaH|  kaphamArute vAsantaH|  kaphapitte CAradaH|  tatra CAradasya kaphapittaghnatvAdyukto nirdeCaH|  graiSmasya pittaghnatvAdvAsantasya kaphapittaghnatvAdayuktaH, tatrAha-maruto yogavAhitvAditi|  yogaM-sambandhaM, vahati - nirvahati, dvitIyasyAnusaraNeneti-yogavAhI|  tena pittayuktasya vAyoH pittaghnenopaCAntiH, kaphayuktasya kaphaghnena|  prAyograhaNAdanucitAMCasya tyAgo~api|

 caya eva jayeddoSaM kupitaM tvavirodhayan||15||   sarvakope balIyAMsaM CeSadoSAvirodhataH||15||

sa0-cayakAla eva doSaM-vAtAdiM, jayet| yathA chinnamUlatvAnna vikurvIta| na kopakAlaM pratIkSeteti sUcanArtha evaCabdaH| kathaM jayet ? ityAha-kupitaM doSamavirodhayan| sarvadoSakope tu balavattaraM doSaM jayet| katham? CeSadoSAvirodhena| 

A0 ra0-auSadhakAlamAha-caya eveti|  caya eva doSaM jayet, na kopaM pratIkSeta|  atha kathaJciccayAtikrame kupitaM doSaM jayet|  taM punaravirodhayan jayet|  kupito~api dvividhaH,-prakRtisamasamaveto vikRtiviSamasamavetaCca|  tatra prathame doSasvarUpatulyaM rogasvarUpam, dvitIye viparItam|  yathA,- kaphajvare kaphaviparItamuSNatvam|  tatra jvarasvarUpasya kaphaprakopavirodhitvAdatyuSNamauSadhaM na kAryam|  vakSyati hi (hR. ci. a. 1/16) -"USmA pittAdRte nAsti jvaro nAstyUSmaNA vinA|  tasmAtpittaviruddhAni tyajetpittAdhike~adhikam||" iti|  sarveSAM yugapatkope yo balIyAn taM jayet, CeSadoSamavirodhayan|  saGgrahakArastvAha (sU. a. 21) - "kramAnmarutpittakaphAn sarvatra sadRCe bale|  vAtAdInAM yathApUrvaM yataH svAbhAvikaM balam||  Uce parACaro~apyarthamamumeva pramANayan|  yathopanyAsataH prAptamAdau doSe bhiSagjitam||  netRbhaGgena dRSTo hi samaM sainyaparAjayaH|  sthAnataH kecidicchanti prAk tAvat CleSmaNo vadham||  Cirasyurasi kaNThe ca pralipte~annaruciH kutaH|  tadabhAve kathaM bhojyapAnadravyAvacAraNam||  asatyabhyavahAre ca kuto doSasya nigrahaH|  tasmAdAdau kapho jeyaH kAyadvArArgalo hi saH||  madhyasthAyi yataH pittamACukAri ca cintyate|  ato vAtasakhasyAsya kuryAttadanu nigraham||  adhaHsthAyI ca tadanu nigrAhyaH syAtsamIraNaH|  ata eva ca pittAdiH kaphAnto~anyaiH kramaH smRtaH||  suCrutaCca na sarvatra matametaDbravIti tu|  jayejjvare~atisAre ca kramAt pittakaphAnilAn||  prAyeNa tApAtmatayA jvare pittaM viCiSyate|  viCaCca saratA pittAttathA ca mRdukoSThatA||  tasya cAnubalaH CleSmA gauravApaktijADyakRt|  vAyuCca vardhate~avaCyaM yastvahaHsu tayoH kSaye||  jvarAtisArayostasmAdeSa doSajaye kramaH|  kaphapittAnilAnanye kramAdAhustayorapi||  yasmAdAmaCayotkleCAdbhUyiSThaM tatsamudbhavaH|  krameNAdyena tatrApi pravRddhAn svACaye sthitAn||  svACayeSu praduSTAnAM sthitaivaM hyACukAritA|  vijJAya karmabhiH svaiH svairdoSodrekaM yathAbalam||  bheSajaM yojayettatra tantrI kuryAnna tu kramam|" iti|

 prayogaH CamayedvyAdhimekaM yo~anyamudIrayet||16|| |  nA~asau viCuddhaH Cuddhastu Camayedyo na kopayet||16||

sa0-yaH prayogo vyAdhiM CamayedanyamanyaM vyAdhimudIrayet-prakopayet, nAsau viCuddho-na CreSTha ityarthaH| sa tu viCuddhaH prayogo, yaH CamayedvyAdhiM na kopayet| tasmAdanyaM vyAdhimavirodhayan vyAdhiM jayet|

A0 ra0-tatrACuddhaprayogo heyaH Cuddha upAdeyaH|  tasmAttayorlakSaNamAha-prayoga iti|  doSANAM parasparaM na CamaH, ityuktaM saGgrahe (sU. a. 21) -"kruddhaM malamalaM jetuM nAlpabhAvAdubhAvapi|  doSA doSAtmakatvAcca na sAmye~api parasparam||  CItadravAmlalavaNakaTvAdiguNatulyatA|  dRSTA mithaCca doSeSu nAto~anyonyaM jayanti te||  ArambhakaM virodhe~api mitho yadvadguNatrayam|  viCvasya dRSTaM yugapadvyAdherdoSatrayaM tathA||" iti|

vyAyAmAdUSmaNastaikSNyAdahitAcaraNAdapi||17||   koSThAcchAkhAsthimarmANi drutatvAnmArutasya ca||17||      doSA yAnti tathA tebhyaH srotomukhaviCodhanAt||18||   vRddhyA~abhiSyandanAtpAkAtkoSThaM vAyoCca nigrahAt||18||      tatrasthACca vilamberan bhUyo hetupratIkSiNaH||19||

sa0-koSThAt-udarAt, CAkhAsthimarmANi doSA yAnti| kutaH ? iti hetucatuSTayamAha-vyAyAmAdibhiH CAkhAsthimarmANi doSA yAnti| tatra vyAyAmopajAtaCramasyordhvaM prapannaH pavano vyAyAmakRtakSobhaCramoSmAdibhiH praCithilaM calaM ca doSaM svAspadAt cyAvayitvA paryAkulaM CAkhAdiSu kSipati| tathA, agnyAtapAdisambandhina USmaNastaikSNyAt,-tIkSNena hyUSmaNA vilAyitA doSAstenaiva coSmaNA vivRteSu srotomukheSu satsu CAkhAdIni yAnti| ahitetyAdi| ahitena ca sevitena doSAH svapramANAdatiricyamAnAH koSThamApUrya vArSikA iva jalaughA nimnonnatAnIva CAkhAsthimarmANi prapadyante| api samuccaye| drutatvAdityAdi| drutatvAt-CIghravAhitvAt, mArutasya ca, koSThAcchAkhAsthimarmANi doSA yAnti|    srotasAM mukhAni, teSAM viCodhanaM-vivaraNam, tasmAddoSAH koSThaM yAnti| tathA, vRddhyAdibhiH| vRddhiH-svapramANAtirekaH| vRddhA hi doSAH svAni srotAMsyApUrya koSThaM yAnti| abhiSyandanaM ca nAgnitApAditIkSNoSNAdisaMCleSAdeva, api tu kSIradadhyAdyabhiSyandibhojanAdapi| evaM pAkAt,-pAcanAdibhiH pakvA doSAH kvacidanAsajjantaH koSThaM yAnti| kiJcaH ? vAyoCca nigrahAt,-caCabdAnna kevalaM pUrvebhyo hetubhyo yAvadvAyvapreraNAcca, iti cArthaH|    tatrasthAH-koSThasthACca doSA vilamberan-na rogAnutpAdayeyuH| yasmAtte bhUyo hetupratIkSiNaH, nimittakAraNahetuSu sarvAsAM prAyodarCanAddhetau prathamA, bhUyo hetupratIkSitvAdityarthaH| vRddho~api hi doSaH koSThe CAkhAdau vA mArgAntareNa gato hInaCaktitvAnna rogotpAdanasamartho bhavati|

A0 ra0-atha sthAnabhedopakrama ucyate|  tatra doSANAM sthAnAntaraprAptiprakAramAha-vyAyAmAditi|  vyAyAmAdibhiCcaturbhiH koSThasthA doSAH CAkhAkhyaM bahirmArgaM yAnti, madhyaM vA asthimarmAkhyam|    tathA CAkhAsthA asthimarmasthA vA srotomukhaviCuddhyAdibhiH paJcabhirhetubhiH koSThaM yAnti|  abhiSyandanaM-dravIbhAvaH| evaM doSAH koSThasthAH kiM kuryuH ?  ityAha-tatrasthACceti|  yatsthAnaM prAptAstatra vilambante, yAvatsthAnAntaragamane hetuM na labhante|  labdhe tu hetau punaH sthAnAntaraM yAntItyarthaH|

te kAlAdibalaM labdhvA kupyantyanyACrayeSvapi||19||

A0 ra0- lakSaNaskandhAnantaramauSadhaskandhamArabhate|  tatra doSopakramaNIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-atheti|  doSopakramaNasyaiva sarvarogauSadhatvAt|  upakramaNaM-auSadham|

 vAtasyopakramaH snehaH svedaH saMCodhanaM mRdu||1||   svAdvamlalavaNoSNAni bhojyAnyabhyaGgamardanam||1||   veSTanaM trAsanaM seko madyaM paiSTikagauDikam||2||   snigdhoSNA bastayo bastiniyamaH sukhaCIlatA||2||   dIpanaiH pAcanaiH siddhAH snehACcAnekayonayaH||3||   viCeSAnmedyapiCitarasatailAnuvAsanam||3||

sa0-vAtasyopakramaH snehaH, CreSThatvAcca prAgupAdAnaM snehasya| tataH svedaH| kRtasnehasvedasya ca saMCodhanam| tacca mRdu-na tIkSNam, tIkSNasya vAtakopahetutvAt| tathA, svAdvAdIni bhojyAni-bhakSyANi| abhyaGgaCca mardanaM cAbhyaGgamardanam| mardanaM-pANyAdinA| veSTanaM-CATakAdinA| trAsanaM-khaDgavyagrAgrahastarAjapuruSadarCanAdinA| nanu, bhICokAdibhirmArutasya kopa uktaH| vakSyati hi (hR. ni. a. 1|15) - "kriyAtiyogabhICoka" ityAdi| tat kathaM trAsanaM vAyorupakramaH ? ucyate| bhayaM vAtaprakopahetuH, na tu trAsanam| trAsanaM hi sarvavatavijayi| tasmAdvAtopaCAntyarthaM trAsanaM yuktam| yathA,-unmAdAdiSu| tathA ca vakSyati vAtonmAde (hR. u. a. 6|29) - "harSaNACvAsanottrAsabhayatADanatarjanam|" ityAdi| tathA, sekAdirupakramaH| seko-daCamUlakvAthAdinA| tathA, madyaM paiSTikaM gauDikaM ca vAtasyopakramaH| tathA, snigdhoSNA bastayo vAtasyopakramaH| snigdhoSNA ityuktyA rUkSaCItaM bastimatra nirAkaroti| tathA, bastiniyamo-yathAvidhi bastidAnam, vAtasyopakramaH| athavA bastiniyamaH-karmakAlayogAkhyastripaJcACadbastisaGkhyaH "prAk sneha ekaH paJcAnte" (hR. sU. a. 19|63) ityevamAdinA granthena yo darCitaH, sa vAtasyopakramaH| tathA sukhaM CIlayatIti sukhaCIlaH| CIlikAmibhikSyAcaribhyo NaH| tasya bhAvaH sukhaCIlatA,-saukhyavRttitvam| tilapriyAlAkSoDAdayo~anekA yonayo yeSAM te~anekayonayaH snehAH, te ca vAtasyopakrama iti yojyam| kimbhUtAH ? dIpanapAcanairdravyaiH siddhAH| viCeSeNa puSTamAMsarasastailamanuvAsanaM ca vAtasyopakramaH|

A0 ra0-pittasyauSadhamAha-pittasya sarpiSaH pAnamiti|  sugandhiCItahRdyAnAM dravyANAM-candanAdInAM ye gandhAsteSAmupasevanam|  kaNTheguNAnAM-kaNThAvalmbinAM, hArANaM-muktAvalInAM, ye maNayasteSAmurasA dhRtiH|  uCIraM-vIraNam|  pradoSaH-candraM vinA~api|  ayantraNamukhaM-yat mukhena niyantraNaM na karoti buddhyA tu karoti|  mugdhA-mRdulA|  udyAnadIrghikAH-krIDAvanavApyaH|  sutIrthaH-CobhanAvataraNamArgaH, vipulaH svacchaCca yaH salilACayaH, tasya saikate-sikatAmayapradeCe|  sAmbhojajalatIrayorantaH-sandhiH, yasminsaikate tattathA|  kAyamAnaM-tRNAdiracitAgAram|  saumyA bhAvAH-manaHprasAdanAH padArthAH, payaH sarpirvirekaCceti catuSTayaM viCeSAdauSadham|

sa0-upakrama ityanuvartate| sarpiSaH pAnamityAdi pittasyopakramaH| tathA, hArANAM-muktAdAmnAM kaNTheguNasaMjJAnAM vakSasA dhRtiH-dhAraNam| tathA, maNInAM-marakatacandrakAntapadmarAgAdInAm| tathA, karpUrAdibhiH pratikSaNamanulepanam| tathA, pradoSAdiH pittasyopakrama iti vartate| pradoSo-rAtrimukham| sudhAyA idaM saudhaM,-dhavalagRham| hAri-ramyam, gItaM-gAnam| tathA, mitramayantraNasukhaM-na vidyate yantraNA yasmiMstathAvidhaM sukhaM yasmiMstathAvidhaM mitram| tathA, sandigdhA-avyaktA, mugdhA-aprauDhA, vAg-vANI, yasya sa evaMvidhaH putraH| dArAH-kalatrANi, vallabhAH-suCIlACca| tathA, chandAnuvartinaH-cittAnuguNakAriNaH| CItAmbudhArA garbhe-abhyantare, yeSAM tathAvidhAni gRhANi| tathA, udyAnaM-upavanam| tathA, dIrghikAH-gRhapuSkariNyaH| tathA, saumyA bhAvAH pittasyopakramaH| kva sthitasya ? sutIrthavipulasvacchasalilACayasaikate yat kAyamAnaM-tRNagRham, tasmin| CobhanaM tIrthaM yasya sa evam| sutIrthaCcAsau vitatavimalajalACayaCca sutIrthavipulasvacchasalilACayaH tasya samIpe saikatam, tasmin| sikatA asmindeCe santIti saikatam, "sikatACarkarAbhyAM ca" ityaN| samUhArthe ThagdurnivAraH syAt| kIdRCe kAyamAne ? sAmbhojaM-sapadmaM, jalaM yasmiMstIrAnte sa evaM sAmbhojajalastIrAnto yasmin kAyamAne tasmin| tathA, drumaiH-vRkSaiH, Akule-vyApte| viCeSeNa tu payo ghRtaM virekaCcopakramaH|

sa0-vidhinA-CAstroktena, yuktaM tIkSNaM vamanavirecanaM kaphasyopakramaH| tathA, annaM rUkSAdiguNayuktam| tathA, madyaM purANam| ratiprItiH prajAgaraH,-ramaNaM-ratiH, tasyAH prItiH-sukham| tathA, prajAgaraH-atijAgaraNam| tathA, anekarUpo vyAyAmo-niyuddhadhanurAkarSaNAdikaH| viCeSeNa tu vamanaM yUSo mAkSikaM tathA medoghnaM yadauSadhaM tacca dhUmAdayaCca| tathA, niHsukhatvaM-sukhAbhAvo duHkharUpatvam, vAgdehamanaHkarmaNo duHkhadasyAnuSThAnAdyadasukhamutpadyate, tacca CleSmaNo vRddhasya vikArakaraNahetorupaCamAt sukhAya jAyate|

 graiSmaH prAyo marutpitte vAsantaH kaphamArute||14||   maruto yogavAhitvAt, kaphapitte tu CAradaH||14||

sa0-upakrama ityanuvartate| vAtapittasaMsarge grISmartucaryAvihita upakramaH prAyeNa yojyaH| yathA (hR. sU. a. 3|27) - "ato~asmin paTukaTvamlavyAyAmArkakarAMstyajet| bhajenmadhuramevAnnam" ityAdi sarvaM tyAjyaM sevyaM ca| kaphamArutasaMsarge vasantartubhavaH "tIkSNairvamananasyAdyaiH" (hR. sU. a. 3|19) ityAdirupakramo yojyaH| prAyeNetyatrApi yojyam| nanu, grISme~atyantaCItasevoktA, vasante ca tIkSNaM vamananasyAdyuktam| etacca dvayamapyekAntena pavanahetuH| tatkathamuktam ? "graiSmaH prAyo marutpitte vAsantaH kaphamArute|" ityACaGkyAha-maruto yogavAhitvAt| atrAyaM bhAvaH,-yadA kila vAyuH pittena yujyate tadA dAhAdikRt, na ca pitte same sati dAhAdikaM kartuM marutsamarthaH| api ca grISme CItameva sevyata iti nAyaM niyamaH| kiM tarhi? snigdhAdyapi| tasmAnmarutpitte grISmavidhiryuktaH| vasante ca kaphayogAt kaphavikArakAryeva bhavati pavanaH, yogavAhitvAt| atastIkSNo vamananasyAdirnyAyya eva| pittena saha sthitasya vAyoH pittacikitsA, kaphena saha sthitasya vAyoH kaphacikitsA, svabhAvavaCAditi bhAvaH| tathA ca granthaH,-"yogavAhI" (pR. 9|23) ityAdi| kaphapittasaMsarge tu CAradaH-CaradRtucaryAvihita upakramaH| nanu, sannipAte ka upakramaH ? brUmaH| varSartucaryAvihitaH| prAvRSi hi doSatrayakopa uktaH| ata eva tatrAha (hR. sU. a. 3|44) - "bhajetsAdhAraNaM sarvam" ityAdi|

A0 ra0-saMsargabhedAnAmauSadhAntaramAha-graiSma iti|  marutpitte saMsRSTe graiSma upacAraH kAryaH|  kaphamArute vAsantaH|  kaphapitte CAradaH|  tatra CAradasya kaphapittaghnatvAdyukto nirdeCaH|  graiSmasya pittaghnatvAdvAsantasya kaphapittaghnatvAdayuktaH, tatrAha-maruto yogavAhitvAditi|  yogaM-sambandhaM, vahati - nirvahati, dvitIyasyAnusaraNeneti-yogavAhI|  tena pittayuktasya vAyoH pittaghnenopaCAntiH, kaphayuktasya kaphaghnena|  prAyograhaNAdanucitAMCasya tyAgo~api|

vyAyAmAdUSmaNastaikSNyAdahitAcaraNAdapi||17||   koSThAcchAkhAsthimarmANi drutatvAnmArutasya ca||17||      doSA yAnti tathA tebhyaH srotomukhaviCodhanAt||18||   vRddhyA~abhiSyandanAtpAkAtkoSThaM vAyoCca nigrahAt||18||      tatrasthACca vilamberan bhUyo hetupratIkSiNaH||19||

sa0-koSThAt-udarAt, CAkhAsthimarmANi doSA yAnti| kutaH ? iti hetucatuSTayamAha-vyAyAmAdibhiH CAkhAsthimarmANi doSA yAnti| tatra vyAyAmopajAtaCramasyordhvaM prapannaH pavano vyAyAmakRtakSobhaCramoSmAdibhiH praCithilaM calaM ca doSaM svAspadAt cyAvayitvA paryAkulaM CAkhAdiSu kSipati| tathA, agnyAtapAdisambandhina USmaNastaikSNyAt,-tIkSNena hyUSmaNA vilAyitA doSAstenaiva coSmaNA vivRteSu srotomukheSu satsu CAkhAdIni yAnti| ahitetyAdi| ahitena ca sevitena doSAH svapramANAdatiricyamAnAH koSThamApUrya vArSikA iva jalaughA nimnonnatAnIva CAkhAsthimarmANi prapadyante| api samuccaye| drutatvAdityAdi| drutatvAt-CIghravAhitvAt, mArutasya ca, koSThAcchAkhAsthimarmANi doSA yAnti|    srotasAM mukhAni, teSAM viCodhanaM-vivaraNam, tasmAddoSAH koSThaM yAnti| tathA, vRddhyAdibhiH| vRddhiH-svapramANAtirekaH| vRddhA hi doSAH svAni srotAMsyApUrya koSThaM yAnti| abhiSyandanaM ca nAgnitApAditIkSNoSNAdisaMCleSAdeva, api tu kSIradadhyAdyabhiSyandibhojanAdapi| evaM pAkAt,-pAcanAdibhiH pakvA doSAH kvacidanAsajjantaH koSThaM yAnti| kiJcaH ? vAyoCca nigrahAt,-caCabdAnna kevalaM pUrvebhyo hetubhyo yAvadvAyvapreraNAcca, iti cArthaH|    tatrasthAH-koSThasthACca doSA vilamberan-na rogAnutpAdayeyuH| yasmAtte bhUyo hetupratIkSiNaH, nimittakAraNahetuSu sarvAsAM prAyodarCanAddhetau prathamA, bhUyo hetupratIkSitvAdityarthaH| vRddho~api hi doSaH koSThe CAkhAdau vA mArgAntareNa gato hInaCaktitvAnna rogotpAdanasamartho bhavati|

A0 ra0-atha sthAnabhedopakrama ucyate|  tatra doSANAM sthAnAntaraprAptiprakAramAha-vyAyAmAditi|  vyAyAmAdibhiCcaturbhiH koSThasthA doSAH CAkhAkhyaM bahirmArgaM yAnti, madhyaM vA asthimarmAkhyam|    tathA CAkhAsthA asthimarmasthA vA srotomukhaviCuddhyAdibhiH paJcabhirhetubhiH koSThaM yAnti|  abhiSyandanaM-dravIbhAvaH| evaM doSAH koSThasthAH kiM kuryuH ?  ityAha-tatrasthACceti|  yatsthAnaM prAptAstatra vilambante, yAvatsthAnAntaragamane hetuM na labhante|  labdhe tu hetau punaH sthAnAntaraM yAntItyarthaH|

 USmaNo~alpabalatvena dhAtumAdyamapAcitam||25||   duSTamAmACayagataM rasamAmaM pracakSate||25||

sa0-USmaNaH-agneH, alpabalatvena-daurbalyena, AdyaM-prathamaM, dhAtuM rasaM-rasAkhyam, apAcitamAmaM pracakSate-vadanti| AcAryA iti CeSaH| kimbhUtaM rasam ? AmACayagatam| tathA, duSTaM-vAtAdyanuCayitam| rasagrahaNamanilasya nirAsArtham| anyathA Adyo dhAturvAtAkhya ityACaGkyeta| vAtAdInAmapi hi dhAraNAddhAtusaMjJA~astyeva|

A0 ra0-AmalakSaNamAha-USmaNa iti|  uSmaNo -rasAgneH|  dhAtuM-na doSaM malaM vA|  AdyaM-na raktAdikam|  rasaM-na rasatvAtpracyutaM raktatvamaprAptam|

anye doSebhya evAtiduSTebhyo~anyonyamUrcchanAt||26||   kodravebhyo viSasyeva vadantyAmasya sambhavam||26||

sa0-anye-apare AcAryAH, doSebhya eva-vAtAdibhyo, atiduSTebhyo~anyonyamUrcchanAt-parasparamiCrIbhAvAt, Amasya sambhavaM kathayanti| kebhyaH kasyeva? yathA kodravebhyo viSasya sambhavaM kathayanti| [tathA doSebhya Amasya sambhavam| ]

A0 ra0-matAntareNAmalakSaNamAha-anya iti|  anyonyamUrcchanAt-parasparamekalolIbhAvAt|

Amena tena sampRktA doSA dUSyACca dUSitAH||27||   sAmA ityupadiCyante ye ca rogAstadudbhavAH||27||

sa0-tena-pUrvoktalakSaNena, Amena sampRktAH-saMyuktAH, doSA dUSyACca-rasAdayaH| kIdRCAH ? dUSitAH, taireva vAtAdibhiH| sahAmena sAmAH, ityupadiCyante-tatra tatra pradeCe tantre bhaNyante| ye ca rogAH-jvarAdayaH, tadudbhavAH-vAtAdidoSasamutthAH, tenAmena yuktAH sAmA ityucyante| yathehaiva (hR. ci. a. 1|18) - "ajIrNa iva CUlaghnaM sAme tIvraruji jvare|" ityAdi vakSyati| AmalakSaNaM caivaM paThanti-"dravaM gurvanekavarNaM hetuH sarvarogANAM snigdhaM picchilamAmaM tantumadanubaddhaCUlaM durgandhi" ityAdi| sAmAnAM ca vAtAdInAM saGgrahe pRthaglakSaNamuktam| te saGgrahaClokA yathA (sU. a. 21) - "vAyurAmAnvayaH sArtirAdhmAnakRdasaJcaraH| durgandhamasitaM pittaM kaTukaM bahalaM guru|| AvilastantumAMstyAnaH pralepI picchilaH kaphaH| viparyaye tu pakvatvaM tathA tAmraM samecakam|| pItaM ca pittamacchaM ca CleSmA~acchaH piNDito~athavA| viCadaCca saphenaCca dhavalo madhuro rase||" iti|

A0 ra0-sAmatvaM vyAcaSTe-Ameneti|  sAmairdoSairdhAtubhirmalaiCca janitA rogA api sAmA ucyante|

 sarvadehapravisRtAn sAmAn doSAn na nirharet||28||   lInAn dhAtuSvanutkliSTAn phalAdAmAdrasAniva||28||   ACrayasya hi nACAya te syurdurnirharatvataH||29||

sa0-sAmAn-doSAn-vAtAdIn, sarvasmin dehe pravisRtAn-vyAptACeSakAyAn, dhAtuSu-rasAdyeSu, lInAn-CliSTAn, anutkliSTAn-svasthAnAdacalitAn, na nirharet-vamanAdibhirna Codhayet| kutaH ? durnirharatvataH-duHkhena nirhartuM CakyatvAt| te hi nirhriyamANA ACrayasya-CarIrAkhyasya, nACAya syuH| yAvattu sarvadehapravisRtA na syuH| yathA bhuktAnantaraM jvarotpattau navAtisAre ca tadA vamanena harItakyA ca yathAyogaM nirhAro~anujJAta eva granthakRtA| atra dRSTAntamAha-phalAdityAdi| AmAt-apakvAt, phalAt-AmrAdeH, raso nirhriyamANo durnirharatvAt ACrayasya-phalasya, yathA nACAya bhavati, evaM doSA api|

A0 ra0-sAmeSu doSeSvavasthAviCeSeNa CodhanaM niSedhati-sarvadehapravisRtAniti|  vyAptadehAn dhAtulInAn anutkliSTAn sAmAn na Codhayet|  te hi durnirharatvAdACrayasya nACAya syuH|

sUtrasthAnam

dvividhopakramaNIyaH adhyAyaH

athAto dvividhopakramaNIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||   iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-dvividhaM-dviprakAraM ca tadupakramaNaM ca dvividhopakramaNam, tasmai hito dvividhopakramaNIyaH| CeSaM pUrvavat|    upakramaCca samAsato dvividhaH, tantrAntarapaThitAnAM caturNAmupakramANAmatraivAntarbhAvAt|

A0 ra0-dvividhopakramaNIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-atheti|  yataH pUrvAdhyAye doSANAmupakrama uktaH|  tasyedAnIM bhedA vAcyAH|  tatra dvau bhedau mukhyau|  ata evAyaM dvividhopakramaNIyaH|

upakramyasya hi dvitvAddvidhaivopakramo mataH||1||

sa0-hi-yasmAt, upakramyasya-cikitsyasya, dvitvAddhetorupakramo dvidhaiva mataH-iSTaH| evaCabdo~avadhAraNaM kurvan paramataM kSipati|

A0 ra0-upakramabhedAnAha-upakramyasyeti|  upakramyasya-rogasya|  dvitvAt-sAmanirAmabhedena|

ekaH santarpaNastatra dvitIyaCcApatarpaNaH||1||   bRMhaNo laGghanaCceti tatparyAyAvudAhRtau||2||   bRMhaNaM yadbRhattvAya laGghanaM lAghavAya yat||2||   dehasya---------------------------------------||3||

sa0-tatra-tayordvayorupakramayoH, eka santarpaNarUpa upakramo, dvitIyaCcApatarpaNarUpa upakramaH| bRMhaNo laGghanaCca tayoH-santarpaNApatarpaNayoH, paryAyau tatparyAyAvudAhRtau|| bRMhaNaM taducyate yaddehasya bRhattvAya bhavati| laGghanaM taducyate yaddehasya lAghavAya-lAghavotpAdanAya, bhavati|

A0 ra0-bRMhaNalaGghanayorlakSaNamAha-bRMhaNamiti|  yaddehasya bRhattvAya-sthaulyAya, tadbRMhaNam|  yallAghavAya-kACryAya, tallaGghanam|

 ----------------bhavataH prAyo bhaumApamitaracca te||3||

sa0-tacca tacca te,-santarpaNApatarpaNe, bhaumApamitaracca bhavataH| bhUmeridaM bhaumam| apAmidamApam| bhaumayuktamApaM santarpaNam| itarat-bhaumApAdanyadagnivAyvAkACAtmakamapatarpaNam| prAyograhaNAtkiJcidbhaumApamapyapatarpaNam| yathA,-yavakamasUramakuSThataNDulIyAdi| tathA, agnipavanotkaTasya kaTukasyApi CuNThIpippalyAdeH santarpaNatvam, vRSyatvena santarpaNakAryadarCanAt|

A0 ra0-laGghanabRMhaNe udAharati-bhavata iti|  bhaumamApyaM ca dravyaM bRMhaNam|  itarat-AgneyaM vAyavyaM nAbhasaM ca laGghanam|  iti vibhAgena te-dve bhavataH|

snehanaM rUkSaNaM karma svedanaM stambhanaM ca yat||3||   bhUtAnAM tadapi dvaidhyAddvitayaM nAtivartate||4||

sa0-snehanAdi yaccaturvidhaM karma, tadapi dvitayaM-santarpaNApatarpaNarUpaM, nAtivartate-nAtikrAmati| kuto hetoH ? ityAha-bhUtAnAM santarpaNApatarpaNarUpAt dvaidhyAt-dviprakArakatvAt|

A0 ra0-snehAdInAmupakramANAM bRMhaNe, rUkSAdInAM ca laGghane~antarbhAvamAha-snehanaM rUkSaNamiti|  bhUtAnAM dvaidhyAt-snehanarUkSaNAdikadravyakAraNAnAM pRthivyAdInAM bRMhaNalaGghanarUpadvaividhyAvyabhicArAt|

 CodhanaM CamanaM ceti dvidhA tatrApi laGghanam||4||

sa0-tatra-tayoH santarpaNApatarpaNayorbRMhaNalaGghanAparaparyAyayormadhye, yallaGghanaM-apatarpaNam, tat dvidhA| katham ? ityAha-CodhanaM CamanaM ceti| iti hetvarthe, yataH CodhanaM CamanaM ca tato dvidhetyarthaH|

A0 ra0-laGghanabhedAnAha-Codhanamiti|

yadIrayedbahirdoSAn paJcadhA CodhanaM ca tat||5||   nirUho vamanaM kAyaCiroreko~asravisrutiH||5||

sa0-yadauSadhaM doSAn-vAtAdInantaH sthitAn, bahirIrayet-kSipet, tacchodhanam| tacca paJcadhA,-paJcavidham| tadeva paJcavidhatvamAha-nirUha ityAdi| nirUho-bastiH, tathA vamanam, tathA kAyavirekaH CirovirekaCca, tathA~asravisrutiH-raktasrAvaCca, iti paJcadhA Codhanam| sarvaCarIrasya CiraHprabhRteradhomalanirharaNaM yat sa kAyavirekaCabdenocyate| yattu kevalaM CiraHsaMjJakasya CarIrAvayavasya ghrANenordhvamalanirharaNaM sa CirovirekaH|

A0 ra0-Codhanasya lakSaNaM bhedAMCcAha-yadIrayediti, nirUha iti|  yaddoSAn bahirniSkAsayettacchodhanam|  tattu nirUhAdibhedAt paJcadhA|  kAyareko-virecanam|  Ciroreko-nasyam|

na Codhayati yaddoSAn samAnnodIrayatyapi||6||  samIkaroti viSamAn CamanaM tacca saptadhA||6|| pAcanaM dIpanaM kSuttRDvyAyAmAtapamArutAH||7||

sa0-yadauSadhaM doSAn-vAtAdIn, na Codhayati-nAntaHsthitAn bahirniSkAsayati, tathA samAn-svapramANasthAn, nodIrayati-na cotkleCayati, viSamAMCca-svapramANAddhInAdhikabhavAvasthitAn, samIkaroti-svapramANasthAn vidadhAti, tacchamanamucyate| tacca saptadhA,-saptaprakAram, pAcanAdibhedena| pAcayatIti pAcanam| pacato~agneH paktuM CaktimadhikAM yadutpAdayati taddravyaM kriyA vA pAcanamucyate| yathA,-laGghanaM mustAdi vA| dIpanaM yathA,-ghRtAdi| tantrAntare ca dIpanapAcanayorlakSaNamuktam| yathA,_"yadagnikRtpacennAmaM dIpanaM tadyathA ghRtam| pAcanaM tadviparyastaM yathA vakSyAmi laGghanam||" iti| [kSArapANinA~apyuktam-"pAcanaM pAcayeddoSAn sAmAn Camanameva tu| dIpanaM hyagnikRttvAmaM kadAcitpAcayenna vA||" iti| ] kSuttRTCabdAbhyAM kSutRSNAnigrahAviha gRhItau|

A0 ra0-Camanasya lakSaNaM bhedAMCcAha-na CodhayatIti, pAcanamiti|  yaddoSAn na Codhayati-bahirna niSkAsayati, samAn-avikRtAn, nodIrayati-na vikRtiM nayati, viSamAn-vikRtAN, samIkaroti-prakRtiM nayati, tacchamanam|  tacca pAcanAdibhedAt saptadhA|  kSut-annavarjanam|  tRT-udakavarjanam|

 bRMhaNaM CamanaM tveva vAyoH pittAnilasya ca||7||

sa0-tuCabdo viCeSe| viCeSastu laGghanApekSayA| CodhanaM CamanaM ceti dvidhA laGghanamuktam| bRMhaNamapi CodhanaM bhavati| yathA,-dugdhAdidravyam, CodhanasvabhAvadravyAt| tena tathAvidhena dravyeNa kevalasya vAtasya pittayuktasya vA kopa ACaGkyate| yathA-laGghanena CodhanadravyeNa harItakyAdinA| tato bRMhaNasya viCeSArthastuCabdaH kRtaH| bRMhaNaM yacchodhanaM tanmarutaH kevalasya pittasahitasya vA Camanam, na tu laGghanaCodhanavatkopanam| evakAro~avadhAraNArthaH| bRMhaNaM CodhanarUpaM vAtasya pittayuktasya vA Camanamevoktam, na kopanaM jAtucidityarthaH| laGghanaM tUbhayarUpamapi vAtasya vAtapittayorvA kopenameva|

A0 ra0- CodhanaCamanavyatiriktasyauSadhasyAbhAvAt tayoCca laGghanabhedatvAt bRMhaNasyAnauSadhatve prApte, bRMhaNaM CamanamevetyAha-bRMhaNaM CamanaM tviti|  Cuddhasya pittasaMsRSTasya ca vAyorviSamasya samIkaraNAcchamanam |

bRMhayedvyAdhibhaiSajyamadyastrICokakarCitAn||8||   bhArAdhvoraHkSatakSINarUkSadurbalavAtalAn||8||   garbhiNIsUtikAbAlavRddhAn grISme~aparAnapi||9||

sa0-karCitaCabdasya vyAdhyAdibhiH pratyekaM sambandhaH| vyAdhikarCitAn bRMhayet| evaM CeSeSvapi yojyam| bhArAdibhiH kSINasya pratyekaM sambandhaH| bhArakSINAn bRMhayet| evaM CeSeSu| rUkSAdIn bRMhayet| grISme~aparAnapi-anyAnanuktAnapi bRMhayet| [itthaM ca grISme sarvAnapi bRMhayet,] atitarAM tu vyAdhikarCitAdIn bRMhayet|

A0 ra0-bRMhaNasya viSayamAha-bRMhayedityAdi|  grISme~aparAnapi-svasthAnapi|

sa0-yadauSadhaM doSAn-vAtAdIn, na Codhayati-nAntaHsthitAn bahirniSkAsayati, tathA samAn-svapramANasthAn, nodIrayati-na cotkleCayati, viSamAMCca-svapramANAddhInAdhikabhavAvasthitAn, samIkaroti-svapramANasthAn vidadhAti, tacchamanamucyate| tacca saptadhA,-saptaprakAram, pAcanAdibhedena| pAcayatIti pAcanam| pacato~agneH paktuM CaktimadhikAM yadutpAdayati taddravyaM kriyA vA pAcanamucyate| yathA,-laGghanaM mustAdi vA| dIpanaM yathA,-ghRtAdi| tantrAntare ca dIpanapAcanayorlakSaNamuktam| yathA,_"yadagnikRtpacennAmaM dIpanaM tadyathA ghRtam| pAcanaM tadviparyastaM yathA vakSyAmi laGghanam||" iti| [kSArapANinA~apyuktam-"pAcanaM pAcayeddoSAn sAmAn Camanameva tu| dIpanaM hyagnikRttvAmaM kadAcitpAcayenna vA||" iti| ] kSuttRTCabdAbhyAM kSutRSNAnigrahAviha gRhItau|

sa0-dUrvA-CAdvalam| anantA-yavAsakaH| nimbaH-prasiddhaH| vAsA-ATarUSakaH| AtmaguptA-kapikacchUH| gundrA-padaerakaH| abhIruH-CatAvarI| CItapAkI-CikhaNDikA kAkaNantikAbhedaH| priyaGguH-CyAmA| eSa dUrvAdirgaNaH, tathA vakSyamANo nyagrodhAdiH padmakAdiCca gaNaH, tathA CAliparNIpRCniparNyau, tathA padmaM-jalajam, vanyaM-kuTannaTam, tathA sArivAdiCca gaNaH, ete pittaM nACayanti| "mtau tau gau cecchAlinI vedalokaiH|"

A0 ra0- pittaghnagaNamAha-dUrvetyAdi| anantA-durAlabhA| gundrA-erakA CItapAkI-guJjA|sthire dve-CAliparNI pRCniparNI ca | vanyaM - kSudramustA | nyagrodhAdipadmakAdisArivAdayo-vakSyamANA gaNAH| atrApi punaruktAni dviguNAni| saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 14) - "dUrvAnantAmocarasamaJjiSThAparipelavakAlAkAlIyakakadalIkandalIpayasyAtmaguptAnArikelakharjUradrAk SAvidArIbadarIbalAnAgabalAnAgapuSpACatAvarICItapAkyodanapAkItRNaCUlyAMCumatIdvayAriSTakATarUSaketka TapriyaGgudhAtakIdhavadhanvanasyandanakhadirakadarapriyAlatAlaCAlasarjatiniCACvakarNagundrAvAnIrapa dmApadmakapadmabIjamRNAlakumudanalina saugandhikapuNDarIkaCatapatraCevAlakahlArotpalakAkolyutpalikACAlUkaCRGgATakakaserukakrauJcAdanapra bhRtIni CItavIryANi| sArivAdiH padmakAdiH paTolAdirnyagrodhAdirdAhaharomahAkaSAyastRNapaJcamUlaM ceti pittaCamanAni||" iti|

A0 ra0-snehavidhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte - atheti|  yataH pUrve~adhyAye bheSajAnyuktAni|  teSAM prayogo vaktavyaH|  sa ca snehanasvedanaCodhanAsthApananAvanadhUmagaNDUSACcotanatarpaNAdibhedAdanekadhA|  cikitsAkalikAyAM tu (Clo. 69-70) -"prAk pAcanaM snehavidhistataCca svedastatH syAdvamanaM virekaH|  nirUhaNAnvAsanabastikarma nasyaM kramaCceti bhiSagvarANAm||  rAsnApaTolapicumandapayobhirAdau CuNThyATarUSakaphalatrayavAribhirvA|  pakvAmadoSavapuSastadanantaraM hi sneho hitaH surabhivAsakakaTphalAdiH||" iti|  rAsnAkvAthAditrayaM CuNThIkvAthAditrayaM vA vAtAditraye kramAt pAcanam|  tatra snehanamasminnadhyAye|  ata evAyaM snehavidhiH|

guruCItasarasnigdhamandasUkSmamRdudravam||1|| auSadhaM snehanaM prAyo, viparItaM virUkSaNam||1||

sa0-gurvAdiguNayuktaM yaddravyaM tat snehanaM bhavati| viparItamato yallaghUSNasthirarUkSatIkSNasthUlakaThinasAndraguNopetaM tadvirUkSaNam| prAyograhaNaM virUkSaNe snehane ca yojyam| tathA ca,- laghvapi sArSapaM tailaM chAgaM ca dugdhaM tathA viSkirapratudamRgAkhyaM vargatrayaM snehanaM bhavati| tathA, uSNamapi matsyamahiSamAMsaM snehanaM bhavati| evaM rUkSaNe~api vedyam| tathA ca,- yavo guruCItasarAdiguNayukto~api virUkSaNaH, tathA rAjamASo~api| snehane prakRte~api virUkSaNopanyAso~anvayavyatirekeNa sutarAM snehasya samyakpratipAdanArthaH|

A0 ra0-tatra snehanaM dravyamAha-guruCIteti|     rUkSaNamAha-viparItamiti|  tasya snehanapUrvAGgatvAt viparItaM-laghvAdiguNam|

 sarpirmajjA vasA tailaM sneheSu pravaraM matam||2||  tatrApi cottamaM sarpiH saMskArasyAnuvartanAt||2|| mAdhuryAdavidAhittvAjjanmAdyeva ca CIlanAt||3||

sa0-sneheSu-kSIrAnUpAmiSAdiSu madhye, sarpirAdayaCcatvAraH snehAH prakarSeNa varAH| tatrApi ca-teSvapi caturSu madhye, sarpiruttamam, saMskArasyAnuvartanAt| nanu, yadi saMskAramanuvartate sarpistadAnIM maricacitrakAdidravyAbhisaMskRtasya ghRtasya CaityAdiguNaviparyAsaH prAptaH| na cedaM dRSTam| yadasya CaityAdayo guNA vinaCyantyauSNyAdayaCcotpadyante iti| atrocyate| anuCabdo~atra sahArthe, anekArthatvAnnipAtAnAm| tenAyamarthaH,-sarpiSo guNAH saMskAraguNaiH saha vartante, na tu tailAdInAm| tailavasAmajjAno hi saMskAravaCAt svaguNAMstyajanti| atra codAharaNaM yathA,-candanAdyaM tailamiti| ato dravyaguNAntarairanabhibhUtaguNatvAtsarpiSa itareSAM ca tailAdInAM dravyairabhibhUtaguNatvAduttamatvam| ata eva ca vAtapittajvarAdiSu vikAreSu ghRtasAdhyeSu bheSajaM tailaM neSTam, aniSTasampAdanAt| tailasAdhyeSu tu vikAreSu tadupaCAntyarthaM tathAvidhadravyasaMskRtaM ghRtamapISTam| taddhi na tathA~aniSTahetuH| tasmAt sarvasnehebhyaH sarpirevottamam, saMskArasyAnuvartanAditi nyAyAt nyAyyameva| mAdhuryAdihetoCca|

A0 ra0-snehanavaramAha-sarpiriti|      snehanottamamAha-tatrApIti|  saMskArasyAnuvartanAt-yathA CItaiH saMskRtaM CItatAm, uSNaiH saMskRtamuSNatAM bhajate ityAdi|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 25) - "mAdhuryAdavidAhitvAjjanmAdyeva ca CIlanAt|" iti|

pittaghnAste yathApUrvamitaraghnA yathottaram||3||

sa0-yo yaH pUrvo-yathApUrvam, yo ya uttaro-yathottaram| "yathAsAdRCye" ityavyayIbhAvaH| uttaramapekSya pUrvaH pUrvaM cApekSyottaraH| tena caturNAM snehAnAM yathAnirdiSTAnAM sarpirAdInAM traya eva snehA vasAmajjasarpiHsaMjJakA yathApUrvatvena sambadhyante, na tu tailAkhyaH snehaH, tasya pUrvatvAbhAvAt| na hyanyo~asmAt kaCciduttaro~asti, yadapekSyaiSaH pUrvatvamAtmana AsAdayet| tasmAnnAsti pUrvatvasambandhastailasya| [tathA, caturNAM snehAnAM traya eva snehA majjavasAtailAkhyA yathottaratvenAbhisambadhyante, na sarpiHsaMjJakaH snehaH, uttaratvAbhAvAt| na hyanyaH kaCcidasya pUrvo vidyate, yadapekSayaivottaratvamAtmana AsAdayatItyuktam| ] tadevaM yathApUrvaM pittaghnatvaM vasAmajjasarpiSAM sAmAnyenoktam| viCeSeNa ca-, vasA pittaghnI, majjA pittaghnataraH, sarpiH pittaghnatamamityarthaH| itaraghnA ityAdi| itarau-vAtakaphau pittApekSayA, tau ghnanti-parAkurvantItItaraghnAH| yathottaraM trayaH snehA majjavasAtailAkhyA vAtaCleSmaghnAH| tena majjA vAtaCleSmaghno vasA vAtaCleSmaghnatarA tailaM vAtaCleSmaghnatamamityavagantavyam| anye tvevaM vyAcakSate-CleSmaNi snehaniSedhAditaraghnA iti sAmAnyoktAvapi vAtaghnA iti gamyate| athavA dravyAntarasaMskRtasarpirAdyapekSayA kaphasyApItaraCabdena grahaNamiti|

A0 ra0-sarpirAdInAM snehaprayoge doSaviCeSeNa tAratamyamAha-pittaghhnA iti|  tailAdvasA, tato majjA, tataH sarpiH pittaghnam|  sarpiSo majjA, tato vasA, tatastailaM vAtaghnaM kaphaghnaM ca|  snehanasAdhye pittaroge~api tailasyAbhyanujJArthaM pittaghnatvamuktam|  evamanyatra|

ghRtAttailaM guru vasA tailAnmajjA tato~api ca||4||

sa0-ghRtAdguruNaH sakACAttailaM guru-gurutaramityarthaH| vasA tu tailAdgurutamA| tato~apyatiCayena majjA gurutamaH|

A0 ra0- sarpirAdInAM guruttve tAratamyamAha- ghRtAditi|

dvAbhyAM tribhiCcaturbhistairyamakastrivRto mahAn||4||

sa0-dvAbhyAM snehAbhyAM-sarpirvasAbhyAM sarpistailAbhyAM sarpirmajjabhyAmityAdi, dvAbhyAM dvAbhyAM yamako nAmnA snehaH| evaM tribhiH snehaistrivRtaH, caturbhirmahAsnehaH, 'ucyate' iti CeSaH|

A0 ra0-yamakAdisaMjJAtrayamAha-dvAbhyAmiti|  taiH-gurutvoktakramaiH|  tena ghRtatailAbhyAM yamakaH, ghRtatailavasAbhistrivRtaH, sarvairmahAn|  saGgrahe tu  (sU. a. 25) -"snehACayA dadhi kSIraM mAMsAsthiphaladAru ca|" iti|

svedyasaMCodhyamadyastrIvyAyAmAsaktacintakAH||5||  vRddhabAlAbalakRCA rUkSAH kSINAsraretasaH||5|| vAtArtasyandatimiradAruNapratibodhinaH||6|| snehyAH-------------------------------------||6||

sa0-svedyAdayaH snehyAH-snehArhAH| na hyasnehitaH svedya ityarthaH| evaM yo~api CodhyaH so~api pUrvaM snehyaH| svedyAH-svedArhAH| arhArthe kRtyapratyayo~atra NyaH| evaM saMCodhyAH-CodhanArhAH, madyAsaktAH stryAsaktA vyAyAmasaktACca, tathA cintakAH, tathA vRddhA bAlA abalAH-alpabalAH kRCA rUkSAH kSINarudhirAH kSINaCukrACca, vAtArtAH-vAtapIDitAH, syandAdiSu pratyekasmin yojyaH, syandinaH-akSirogayuktAH, timiriNaCca, dAruNapratibodhinaH-kRcchronmIlinaH, ete snehArhAH|

A0 ra0-snehanIyAnAha-svedyetyAdi|  svedyaH-kartavyasvedaH|  saMCodhyaH-kartavyaCodhanaH|  madyAdiSu triSvAsaktaH|  cintakaH-cintAparaH|  syando-netrakopaH|  dAruNapratibodhaH-kRcchronmIlanaH|

--------na tvatimandAgnitIkSNAgnisthUladurbalAH||6|| UrustambhAtisArA~~AmagalarogagarodaraiH||7|| mUrcchAcchardyaruciCleSmatRSNAmadyaiCca pIDitAH||7|| apaprasUtA yukte ca nasye bastau virecane||8||

sa0-atimandAgnyAdayo na snehyAH| atiCabdo yAvaddurbaleSu pratyekaM yojyaH| tenAtidurbalA na snehyA ityarthaH| ata evAlpabalAH snehyAH, na tvatidurbalAH, iti na pUrvAparavirodhaH| atitIkSNAgneH snehanAdatyagnivRddhiH| atisthUlasya cAgnimedasorvRddhiH| atidurbalasya ca jaraNACakteH snehasya vyApat| UrustambhAdibhiryAvanmadyaiCca pIDitA na snehyAH| apaprasUtA-srutagarbhA, na snehyeti liGgavacanavipariNAmaH| prayukte ca nasyAdikarmaNi sarva eva na snehyAH|

A0 ra0-asnehanIyAnAha-na tvatimandAgnItyAdi|  abalasya snehyatvamatidurbalasyAsnehyatvamityavirodhaH|  apaprasUtA-ayathAvatprasUtA|

tatra dhIsmRtimedhAdikAGkSiNAM Casyate ghRtam||8||

sa0-tatra-teSu sneheSu madhye, dhIsmRtyAdyabhilASiNAM ghRtaM Casyate, yAvadagnikAGkSiNAm| anye tu "medhAdikAGkSiNAM" iti paThanti| AdiCabdena svarAyurvarNAdiparigrahaH|

A0 ra0-ghRtasya viSayamAha-tatreti|  AdiCabdAt ghRtaguNoktA (hR. sU. a. 5/37) agnyAdayaH|

 granthinADIkRmiCleSmamedomArutarogiSu||9|| tailaM lAghavadArDhyArthikrUrakoSTheSu dehiSu||9||

sa0-tailaM granthyAdirogiSu Casyate| lAghavadArDhyArthiSu krUrakoSTheSu prANiSu ca Casyate|

A0 ra0-tailasya viSayamAha-granthItyAdi|

sa0-vAtAdInAM kSINadhAtunA pratyekaM sambandhaH| vAtakSINadhAtuSu evamAtapakSINadhAtuSvityAdi, CeSau-ghRtatailAbhyAmuktAbhyAmanyau vasAmajjAnau, Casyete| tathA rUkSAdiSvapi, evaM kleCasaheSu| atyagniSu-mahAgniSu balavadagniSviti draSTavyam, anyathA~atyagniSu snehaniSedhAt pUrvAparavirodhaH syAt| athavA, atyagniSvapi vasAmajjAnAvanujajJe, apavAdavAkyatvAdasyeti vyAkhyeyam| vAtenAvRtAH panthAnaH-chidrAkhyAH, yeSAM teSu ca Casyete CeSau|

dvAbhyAM caturbhiraSTAbhiryAmairjIryanti yAH kramAt||17||  hrasvamadhyottamA mAtrAstAstAbhyaCca hrasIyasIm||18|| kalpayedvIkSya doSAdIn prAgeva tu hrasIyasIm||18||

sa0-dvAbhyAM yAmAbhyAM-praharAbhyAM, yA snehasya mAtrA prayuktA jATharAnalavaCAjjarAM yAti sA tasya hrasvA mAtrA, caturbhiryAmairyA jIryati sA tasya madhyamA mAtrA, aSTAbhiryAmairyA jIryati sottamA mAtrA, kramAt-yathAkramaM, tA hrasvamadhyamottamA mAtrAH| tAbhyaCca-tisRbhyo mAtrAbhyo, hrasIyasIM-atiCayena hrasvAM mAtrAM kalpayet| vaidya iti CeSaH| hrasvamadhyottamA iti nirdeCe "GyApoH" ityAdinA hrasvaH| hrasvA mAtrA yAmadvayajaraNalakSaNA uktA, tato~apyarvAkkAlena yA jarAM yAti sA hrasIyasIti| doSAdIn-doSabheSajadeCakAlabalaCarIrAhArasattvasAtmyaprakRtIH vIkSya-Akalayya, prAk-pUrvameva, ajJAtakoSThe puruSa uttamamAtrAviSaye pUrvaM hrasIyasIM kalpayet| tato hrasvAM tato madhyamAM tata uttamAM ca prakalapyet| evaM madhyamamAtrAviSaye hrasIyasIM, hrasvamAtrAviSaye~api hrasIyasIM prAkkalpayet| anyathA pratyavAyabhayaM syAt| evakAro~avadhAraNe| tuCabdo yathottaramiti kramanirdeCArthaH| saGgrahe~apyuktam (sU. a. 25) - "ajJAtakoSThe hi bahuH kuryAjjIvitasaMCayam|" iti| iyaM hrasvA iyaM hrasvA iyamanayoratiCayena hrasvA iti hrasIyasI| hrasIyasItyatra Iyasuni "sthUladUra" ityAdinA valopaH| anyaistu paladvayapalacatuSTayapalaSaTkasaGkhyAvacchinnA mAtrA uktAH| na caitadyujyate| yato jaTharAnalaCaktimanapekSya snehamAtrAH prayujyamAnA anarthAyaiva| ato~asmAbhiH paladvayAdisaGkhyAvacchinnA noktAH| munerapi naitanmatam| tadgrantho hi (ca. sU. a. 13|29) - "ahorAtramahaH kRtsnamardhAhaM ca pratIkSate| pradhAnA madhyamA hrasvA snehamAtrA jarAM prati||" iti|

A0 ra0-acchapeyasya mAtrAtrayamAha-dvAbhyAmityAdi|      acchapeyasya caturthI mAtrAmAha-tAbhya iti|  doSAdIn vIkSya tAbhyo~api hrasIyasIM-yAmapariNAminIM mAtrAM, parikalpayet|      hrasIyasImeva prathamaM yojayedityAha-prAgeva tu hrasIyasImiti|  tatra heturuktaH saGgrahe (sU. a. 25) -"ajJAtakoSThe hi bahuH kuryAjjIvitasaMCayam|" iti|  mAtrANAM viSayaCcoktastatraiva (saM.sU.a. 25)-"tatra durbalamandAgnibAlavRddhasukhAtmakaiH|  apathyariktakoSThaiCca jvarAtIsArakAsibhiH||  hRasvA peyA sukhA sA hi parihAre~anuvartate|  ciraM ca balyA na ruje vyApannA~api prakalpate||  mehAruHpiTikAkuSThavAtaCoNitapIDitaiH|  madhyamA mRdukoSThaiCca snehanI syAtsukhena sA|  na balakSapaNI mandavibhraMCA Cuddhaye~apyalam|  mahAdehAnalabalakSuttRTkleCasahiSNubhiH||  gulmodAvartavIsarpasarpadaMCAbhipIDitaiH|  unmattaiH kRcchramUtraiCca mahatI CIghrameva sA||  sarvamArgAnusAreNa jayedvyAdhIn suyojitA|" iti|

sa0-hyastane~anne-AhAre, jIrNa eva-jIrNamAtra eva na tvannAbhilASe sati, Cuddhaye-CodhanArthaM, bahuH-uttamayA mAtrayA, sneho~acchaH-kevalaH, peyatvena Casyate| saJjAtabubhukSeNa tu pIto jATharAnalasya dIptatvAcchodhanakAryamakurvANastadyogyatAM cAnutpAdayannACveva jarAmupaiti| vamanamapi bubhukSitasya na sampadyate, kaphApaciteH pUrvoktAcca hetoH| tasmAdyuktamuktaM 'hyastane jIrNa evAnne' iti|

A0 ra0-acchapeyasyAnupAnamAha-vAryuSNamiti|      tuvarabhallAtakasnehayoruSNodakaM niSedhati-tauvarAruSkare na tviti|  uktaM hi saGgrahe (sU. a. 25) -"tauvarAruSkare na tu|  uSNopacAraH snehe syAduSNo hyuSNairvirudhyate||" iti|      yathAkAlamajIryati snehe punaruSNodakapAnamAha-jIrNAjIrNeti|       tasya phalamAha-tenodgAraviCuddhiriti|  jIrNAjIrNalakSaNamuktaM saGgrahe (sU. a. 25) - "tato guruprAvaraNo nivAte Cayane sthitaH|  jaraNAntaM pratIkSeta tRSyannuSNAlpavAripaH||  CirorugbhramaniSThIvamUrcchAsAdAruciklamaiH|  jAnIyAdbheSajaM jIryajjIrNaM tacchAntilAghavAt||  anulomAnilasvAsthyakSuttRSNodgAraCuddhibhiH|" iti|

A0 ra0-snehanaprayoge bhojananiyamamAha-bhojyo~annamiti|  bhojyo-bhojayitavyaH|  mAtrayA-alpamAnena|  CvaH pAsyan-snehapAnAtpUrvadine|  piban-yAvanti dinAni snehaM pibati tAvanti|  pItavAn-samApte snehapAne tAvantyeva dinAni|  asaGkaraM-nAnAjAtIyabhakSyAdisaGkararahitam|

sa0-tathA, asau snehasya pAtA uSNodakopacAryAdiguNayuktaH syAt| uSNodakamupacarituM sevituM-CIlamasya sa evam| tathA, brahmacArI-lalanAsaGgarahitaH| kSapACaya iti "adhikaraNe CeteH" ityac| kSapACaya ityanena divAsvapnasya rAtrijAgaraNasya ca niSedhaH| snehaM pibati yAvantyahAni, tAnyaparaM tAvatsaGkhyAni snehapAnarahitAnyapyahAni yAvat vyAyAmAdIMstyajet|  sarvakarmasu-vamanavirecanAdiSu, ayaM-"uSNodakopacArI syAt" ityAdikaH, kramo-vidhirityarthaH| yApanAdiSvahaHsvapnAjIrNavarjyo nAyaM vidhiriti pradarCanArthaM prAyograhaNam| vyAdhikSINeSu ca prAyo~ayameva vidhiH| atrapyatIsArAdiSvahaHsvapnAdInAmanujJAnAt prAyograhaNam|

A0 ra0-snehanaprayoge vihAraniyamamAha-uSNodakopacArI syAditi|  upacAraH-snAnapAnAdiH|  vyAyAmAdIMstyajet|  yAnayAnaM-aCvAdinA gamanam|  saMsthitiH-UrdhvatayA~avasthAnam|  nIcamatyuccaM vA upadhAnaM-ucchIrSakam|    snehanoktamuSNodakopacArAdiniyamaM svedanAdiSu vyAdhikSINeSu cAtidiCati-sarvakarmasviti|
