sUtrasthAnam

snehavidhiH adhyAyaH

tryahamacchaM mRdau koSThe krUre saptadinaM pibet||29||   samyaksnigdho~athavA yAvadataH sAtmyI bhavetparam||30||

sa0-mRdau koSThe sati puruSastridinamacchaM snehaM pibet| krUrakoSThe saptAhaM pibet| madhyakoSThastvata eva lakSaNAdadhigamyate| yathA,-catvAryahAni paJca vA snehaM pibediti| yadi ca [ mRdukoSThe ] tryaheNa samyaksnigdhalakSaNaM na syAt tadA catuSpaJcarAtramapi snehaM pibet| madhyakoSThastu SaDrAtramapi pibedityAha-samyaksnigdho~athavA yAvadityAdi| athavA naiSa niyamaH, samyaksnigdhalakSaNotpattireva niyamaH| ataH saptAhAdapyUrdhvamacchaH snehaH peyo yAvatsnigdhalakSaNaM syAt| ataHparaM snehaH sAtmyI bhavet| sAtmyIbhUte ca snehe yo doSaH sa saGgrahe kathitaH| yathA (sU. a. 25) - "sAtmyIbhUto hi kurute na malAnAmudIraNam| atiyogena vA vyAdhIn yathA~ambvogho~atiyojanAt||" iti| yadi tu saptAhenApi snigdhalakSaNaM notpadyate tadA dinamekaM viCramya punaH sneho yojya iti sadvaidyAH|

A0 ra0-acchapeyasya pAnAvadhimAha-tryahamityAdi|  mRdau koSThe tridinam, krUre saptadinam, yAvadvA snigdhalakSaNotpattirmRdau krUre ca|      avadhyatikrame doSamAha-ata iti|  sAtmyIbhUtasya doSatvamuktaM saGgrahe (sU. a. 25) -"sAtmyIbhUto hi kurute na malAnAmudIraNam|  atiyogena vA vyAdhIn yathA~ambvogho~atiyojanAt|| nihatya setuM mRtkoSThAt sravati kSapayanmRdam| sneho~apyagniM tathA hatvA sravati kSapayaMstanum||" iti|

 vAtAnulomyaM dIpto~agnirvarcaH snigdhamasaMhatam||30|| snehodvegaH klamaH samyaksnigdhe, rUkSe viparyayaH||31|| atisnigdhe tu pANDutvaM ghrANavaktragudasravAH||31||

sa0-samyaksnigdhe puruSe vAtAnulomyAdi klamAntaM lakSaNaM bhavati| varcaH-CakRt, snigdhaM tathA~asaMhataM-Cithilam| rUkSe-asnigdhe, viparyayo-vaiparItyam| atisnigdhe tu-snehasyAtiyojanAt, pANDutvAdayo bhavanti| sravaCabdasya ghrANAdibhiH pratyekaM sambandhaH|

A0 ra0-samyaksnigdhalakSaNamAha-vAtAnulomyamiti|  "mRdusnigdhAGgatA lAghavaM vimalendriyatA ca" ityadhikaM saGgrahe (sU. a. 25)|      asnigdhalakSaNamAha-rUkSa iti|  viparyayo-vAtaprAtilomyAdiH|      atisnigdhalakSaNamAha-atisnigdha iti|  pANDutvaM-pANDurogaH|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 25) -"gudadAhArucicchardimUrcchAtRSNApravAhikAH|  CuktodgArabhramaCvAsakAsAH snehAtisevanAt||" iti|

amAtrayA~ahito kAle mithyAhAravihArataH||32|| snehaH karoti CophArCastandrAstambhavisaMjJatAH||32|| kaNDUkuSThajvarotkleCaCUlAnAhabhramAdikAn||33||

sa0-amAtraH pItaH snehaH-sarpirAdiH, CophAdIn karoti| AdiCabdena balakSayajADyavAggrahAdayaH saGgrahoktA gRhyante| ahito-yo yasya pratiSiddhaH snehaH| tathA, akAle-grISmAdau pUrvaM pratiSiddhe| tathA, mithyAhArato-"dravoSNaM " ityAdiviparyayeNa| tathA, mithyAvihArataH-"uSNodakopacArI syAt" ityAdiviparyayeNa|

A0 ra0-mithyAsnigdhalakSaNamAha-amAtrayeti|  ahitaH-anucitaH|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 25) -"jaTharendriyadaurbalyajADyAmastambhavAggrahAn|  tAMstAn svadoSahetUtthAn pANDvAdIMCcAtiyogajAn||" iti|

kSuttRSNollekhanasvedarUkSapAnAnnabheSajam||33|| takrAriSTakhaloddAlayavaCyAmAkakodravam||34|| pippalItriphalAkSaudrapathyAgomUtraguggulu||34|| yathAsvaM pratirogaM ca snehavyApadi sAdhanam||35||

sa0-snehavyApadi-snehavidhivibhraMCe sati, kSuttRSNAdi sAdhanaM-cikitsA| kSuttRSNAnigrahau kSuttRSNACabdenAtroktau| ullekhanaM-vamanam| rUkSaCabdasya pAnAdibhistribhiryogaH| takrANi cAriSTACcetyevaM samAsaH| khalo-vyaJjanaviCeSaH prAguktaH| uddAlaH-CAliviCeSaH| yathAsvaM-doSAnuguNyena, pratirogaM-yadyasmin roge sve sve~adhyAya uktaM tat, tadapi sAdhanam|

A0 ra0-atisnigdhamithyAsnigdhayoCcikitsitamAha-kSuttRSNollekhanetyAdi|  ullekhanaM-vamanam|  rUkSaM pAnAditrayam|  uddAlo-vanakodravaH|  pratirogaM yathAsvaM ca-yasmin roge yaduktaM tadapi,kuryAt|

virUkSaNe laGghanavatkRtAtikRtalakSaNam||35||

sa0-virUkSaNe samyagutpanne tathA~atyarthotpanne ca laGghanavat kRtAtikRtalakSaNaM jJeyam| kRtaM cAtikRtaM ca kRtAtikRte, tayorlakSaNaM kRtAtikRtalakSaNam| kRtaCabdena samyakkRtamucyate| virUkSaNAyogalakSaNaM tu snehAtiyogalakSaNenaivoktam| tatra samyakkRtasya laGghanasya yallakSaNaM vimalendriyatAdi tadeva samyagvirUkSaNe kRte lakSaNaM bodhyam| tathA, atikRte virUkSaNe~atilaGghitasya lakSaNaM kArCyAdikaM vedyam|

A0 ra0-snehavyApadyuktavirUkSaNasya samyagyogAtiyogalakSaNamAha-virUkSaNa iti|  laGghanavat-laGghanasya samyagyoge "vimalendriyatA" ityAdi, atiyoge "atikArCyaM" ityAdi|  kRtaM-samyagyogaH|  atikRtaM-atiyogaH|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 25) -"snehena paittikasyAgniryadA tIkSNatarIkRtaH|  snehamACu jarAM nItvA punarojo~abhitaCcaran||  udIrayetsopasargAM pipAsAmasya cAdhikAm|  so~asUMstyajedyadyudakaM na pibedACu CItalam||  CItasekAvagAhAMCca tattRSNApIDito bhajet|  snehAgninA dahyamAnaH svaviSeNeva pannagaH|  ajIrNe balavatyAM tu CItairdihyAcchiromukham|  chardayettadaCAntau ca pItvA CItodakaM punaH|| rUkSAnnamullikhedbhuktvA tAdRCyAM tu kaphAnile|  samadoSaCca niHCeSaM snehamuSNAmbunoddharet||  tato doSAdibalataH pUrvoktaM ca vidhiM Crayet|  na sarpiH kevalaM pitte deyaM sAme viCeSataH||  sarvaM hyanurujeddehaM hatvA saMjJAM ca mArayet|" iti|

 snigdhadravoSNadhanvottharasabhuk svedamAcaret||36|| snigdhastryahaM sthitaH kuryAdvirekaM, vamanaM punaH||36||  ekAhaM dinamanyacca kaphamutkleCya tatkaraiH||37||

sa0-snigdhaCcAsau dravoSNadhanvottharasaCca, taM bhuGkte yaH sa snigdhadravoSNadhanvottharasabhuk| dhanvottharaso-jAGgaladeCamAMsasamudbhUto rasaH, taM bhuJjAnaH svedamAcaret| mAMsarasasya svabhAvata eva snigdhadravatvAt snigdhadravagrahaNamadhikayogAyeti vedyam| uSNaM-ubhayathA vIryato~agnisaMyogAcca| evambhUtaH puruSaH pUrvaM snigdho~anantaraM snigdhadravoSNadhanvottharasabhuk svedamAcaran dinatrayaM sthitaH san virekaM kuryAt| vamanaM punariti| yadA tu snehAdanantaraM vamanamevopayuGkte tadaikAhamanenaiva prakAreNa snigdhadravoSNadhanvottharasabhuk svedamAcaran sthito~anyacca dinaM-dvitIyamahaH, kaphamutkleCya-sthAnAt pracyAvya, sthito vamanaM kuryAt| kairutkleCya ? tatkaraiH,-kaphakaraNahetubhirmASakSIramatsyaguDAdibhiH| tatkarairiti kRJo hetvAdinA hetau TaH|

A0 ra0-snigdhasya samanantarameva svedaH kArya ityAha-snigdhadravoSNeti|  snigdhaH puruSo~anantarameva svedamAcaret|  svede ca kriyamANe snigdhadravoSNamannaM jAGgalamAMsarasaM ca bhuJjIta|      snigdhasya tridinaM viCrAntasya virecanaM kAryamityAha-tryahamiti|      snigdhasya dvyahaM viCrAntasya vamanaM kAryamityAha-vamanamiti|  snigdha ekAhaM viCrAnto dvitIye dine kaphakaraiH kaphamutkleCya tRtIye vamanaM kuryAt|

sa0-teSu-bAlAdiSu, prAjyamAMsarasAH-prabhUtamAMsAni niSkvAthya tadrasAH| tathA, snehabharjitA peyA| tathA, tilacUrNaH-palalAkhyaH, sasnehaphANitaH-[ snehena- ] sarpirAdinA yuktaH, phANitena-kSaudraguDavikAraviCeSeNa ca yuktaH| tathA, kRCarA tatheti snehaphANitayuktetyarthaH| tathA, kSIrapeyA-kSaireyI sarpiSmatyuSNA ca| [ tathA, ] dadhisaro vA saguDaH| [ tathA, ] peyA ca paJcaprasRtA, 'dve pale-prasRtaM viduH' paJca prasRtAni yasyAM sA paJcaprasRtA| keSAM punastAni paJca prasRtAni ? iti vyAcaSTe-snehaistaNDulapaJcamairiti| sarpistailaM vasA majjeti caturNAM snehAnAM catvAri prasRtAni taNDulACca prasRtamekamityarthaH| ete sapta pUrvoktAH sadyaH-CIghraM snehanAH,- tricaturairahobhirvinA~api snehanAH, niSparihArACca| na kevalameta eva sadyaHsnehanA ityAha-snehACca lavaNolbaNA iti| snehAH-sarpirAdayo~apakvA eva| kiM viCiSTAH ? lavaNolbaNAH-lavaNADhyAH, sadyaHsnehanA ityarthaH|

A0 ra0-sadyaHsnehanAn sapta yogAnAha-prAjyamAMsarasA iti|  prAjyamAMsAH-prabhUtamAMsA, alpodakasiddhA rasA ityekaH|  teSu-mAMsaraseSu, siddhA snehabhRSTA peyeti dvitIyaH|  snehaphANitAbhyAM yuktastilacUrNa iti tRtIyaH|  tAbhyAmeva yuktA kRCareti caturthaH|  uSNA ghRtADhyA kSIrasiddhA peyeti paJcamaH|  guDasahito dadhisara iti SaSThaH|  ghRtatailavasAmajjataNDulaiH pratyekaM prasRtapramANaiH kRtA peyeti saptamaH|      aSTamaM sadyaHsnehanamAha-snehACceti|

sa0-tApaH-tApasvedaH, agnitaptena vasanena, tathA phAlena-ayomayenAgnitaptena, tathA [ agnitaptena ] hastatalenApi| AdigrahaNAddAruvAlukAghaTikAkAMsyabhAjanAdayo gRhyante|

 upanAho vacAkiNvaCatAhvAdevadArubhiH||2||  dhAnyaiH samastairgandhaiCca rAsnairaNDajaTAmiSaiH||2|| udriktalavaNaiH snehacukratakrapayaHplutaiH||3||  kevale pavane, CleSmasaMsRSTe surasAdibhiH||3||  pittena padmakAdyaistu sAlvaNAkhyaiH punaHpunaH||4||

sa0-upanAho-bandhanam| kiNvaM-surAprakRtiH| CatAhvA-CatapuSpA| dhAnyairiti sAmAnyoktAvapi tilAtasImASAdIni yogyatvAdyAnyuSNavIryANi snigdhAni vA tAni prAyeNa prayojyAnIti| samastagrahaNaM gandhaireva yujyate| ata eva saGgrahe~avadat (sU. a. 26) - "sarvagandha" iti| gandhaiH-gandhadravyaiH kuSThAgurutagarasurasAdibhiH| tathA, rAsnAdibhiH| kimbhUtaiH pUrvoktaiH ? udriktalavaNaiH-lavaNADhyaiH| tathA, snehaCca cukraM ca takraM ca payaCca, taiH plutaiH-AloDitaiH| cukraM-amlam| takrasya cukratvAdeva grahaNe siddhe takragrahaNamatiCayArtham, atiCayena sAlvaNAkhye svede takraM prayojyamiti| kevale pavane vacAdibhirupAnAhasvedaH kAryaH| CleSmasaMsRSTe pavane surasAdibhiH-surasayugAdinA gaNena (hR. sU. a. 15|30)| pittena saMsRSTe pavane padmakAdyaiH-"padmakapuNDrau" (hR. sU. a. 15|12) ityAdibhiH| pittena saMsRSTe pavana ityatra kiJcideva pittena saMsRSTe pavane padmakAdibhirupanAhaH kArya ityavabodhyam, nAdhikena pittena yukte pavane, nApi tulyena pittena yukte pavana iti| evaM hyuktam (hR. sU. a. 13|14)- "graiSmaH prAyo marutpitte" vidhiH kAryaH| graiSmaCca vidhiH prAyeNa sarvaH CItaH| tatra svedo dUrotsArita eva| tasmAt kiJcitpittena saMsRSTe pavane padmakAdyairupanAhaH kArya iti vedyam| ete ca traya upanAhAH kevale vAyau tathA kaphayukte pittayukte ca krameNa yojyAH| ete ca sAlvaNAbhidhAnAH svedA ityAha-sAlvaNAkhyairiti| punaHpunariti asakRttaiH svedayojanA kAryetyarthaH| nirapAyo hi yathA~ayaM sAlvaNAparasaMjJa upanAhAkhyaH svedo na tathA~apare svedA iti| upanahyate-badhyate carmapaTAdinA, ityanvarthaM nAmAsyopanAha iti| sAlvaNa ityasya tantrAntaraprasiddhaM nAma| tathA ca dhanvantariH (su. ci. a. 4|14) - "kAkolyAdiH savAtaghnaH sarvAmladravyasaMyutaH| sAnUpaudakamAMsastu sarvasnehasamanvitaH|| sukhoSNaH spaSTalavaNaH sAlvaNaH parikIrtitaH|" iti| 'udriktalavaNaiH snehacukratakrapayaHplutaiH|' iti triSvapi svedeSu yojyam|

A0 ra0-upanAhasya lakSaNamAha-upanAha ityAdi|  vacAdibhiryaH svedaH kriyate sa upanAhaH|  kiNvaM-surAkAJjikAdyadhaHsthitadravyam|  gandhaiH-kuSThAdigandhadravyaiH|  eraNDajaTA-eraNDamUlam|  AmiSaM-mAMsam|  udriktalavaNaiH-saindhavAdyutkaTaiH|  snehAdibhiH plutaiH-AloDitaiH|  cukraM-suktam|  payaH-kSIram|  eSaH svedaH kevale pavane|  eSa eva CleSmasaMsRSTapavane surasAdivargeNa saha kAryaH|  pittena saMsRSTe pavane padmakAdivargeNa saha kAryaH|  sAlvaNAkhyaiH-sAlvaNa ityAkhyA upanAhasya yebhyaH padmakAdibhyastaiH|  padmakAdibhiryukta upanAhaH-sAlvaNAkhyaH|  uktaM ca suCrutena (ci.a. 4/14)-"kAkolyAdiH savAtaghnaH sarvAmladravyasaMyutaH|  sAnUpamAMsaH susvinnaH sarvasnehasamanvitaH||  sukhoSNaH spRSTalavaNaH sAlvaNaH parikIrtitaH|  tenopanAhaM kurvIta sarvadA vAtarogiNAm||" iti|  tadvyAkhyAnaM ca,- "kAkolyAdirgaNo grAhyo nASTavargakasaMjJitaH|  vAtaghno bhadradArvAdivargo~amlo dADimAdikaH||  sarvasnehaCcatuHsneho lavaNaM saindhavAdikam|  amlAdibhiCca saMskAryaH kAkolyAditrayaM tribhiH||" iti|  padmakAdireva tanmate kAkolyAdiH|  sa copanAhaH punaH punaH kAryaH|  upanAho-bandhanam|

snigdhoSNavIryairmRdubhiCcarmapaTTairapUtibhiH||4|| alAbhe vAtajitpatrakauCeyAvikaCATakaiH||5|| baddhaM rAtrau divA muJcenmuJcedrAtrau divAkRtam||5||

sa0-carmapaTTairbaddhaM-upanaddhamaGgaM, rAtrau divA muJcet| kimbhUtaiH ? snigdhoSNavIryaiH, tathA~apUtibhiH-adurgandhaiH suparikarmitatvAt| alAbhe-carmapaTTAnAmabhAve, vAtajitpatraiH-eraNDajAdibhiH, tathA kauCeyAdibhiH| kauCeyaM-rAGkavAdivastraviCeSam| AvikaM-kambalam| [ CATakaM-vastrakhaNDam| ] tairbaddhaM rAtrau divA muJcet| divA tu baddhaM rAtrau moktavyam|

sa0-USmA-bASpaH, tadAkhyaH sveda utkArikAdibhiH prayojyaH| tatra yavamASairaNDabIjAtasIkusumbhabIjAdibhiH piSTasvinnairlapyasikAkRtiryaH svedanopAyaH sA utkArikA| loSTaM-mRtpiNDaH| kapAlaM-karparam| upalaH-pASANaH| pAMsuH-dhUliH| tathA, patrabhaGgena-chadasamUhena| tathA, dhAnyena| karISo-gavAdiCakRccUrNaH| sikatA-vAlukA| tuSo-dhAnyatvak| etairutkArikAdibhistuSAntaiH svedo vidhAtavyaH| kimbhUtaiH ? anekopAyasantaptaiH,-aneke ca ta upAyACca, taiH santaptAH-uSNIkRtA ya utkArikAdayaH, taiH| kathaM prayojyaH ? ityAha-deCakAlataH| lyablope paJcamI ceyam| tena deCakAlAvapekSya| upalakSaNaM cedam| tena doSadUSyAdInapyapekSya svedo~ayaM prayojyaH| loSTakapAlapASANAnagnitaptAn sandaMCena gRhItvA svedyadoSAdyapekSayA~ambhasyamle dhAnyAmle CuktAdau vA nimajjayet| tadudbhUtabASpaiH svedaH Cayanasthasya kAryaH| athavA gavAdiCakRtA~~ArdreNa piNDIkRtenoSNena svedaH sa ca piNDasvedasaMjJaH| sa eva saGkarasveda ucyate| athavairaNDAdidravyayuktAni yavAdIni dhAnyAni sAmlakAdIni gRhItvA pihitamukhAyAmukhAyAM samyagupasvedya nivAte gRhe Cayanasthe kiliJje prastIryAvikakauCeyavAtaharapatrAnyatamottarapracchade rauravAjinaprAvArAdisvavacchannaM svedayet| athavA pUrvavatsvedyadravyANi kumbhyAmutkvAthya tannikaTopaviSTo ghanavastraprAvRta USmANaM gRhNIyAt| eSa saMstarasvedaH| evamanekopAyasantaptatvaM doSadUSyAdyapekSayA nirUpya svedo yojyaH|

A0 ra0-USmasvedasya lakSaNamAha-USmeti|  utkArikAdibhiH soSmAbhiH kambalAdiveSTitairyaH svedaH kriyate, sa USmasvedaH|  utkArikA-roTikA|  patrabhaGgena-khaNDaCaH kRtaiH patraiH|  dhAnyena-godhUmAdinA|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 26) -"USmasvedaH punaraSTadhA bhidyate,- piNDaH saMstaro nADI ghanACmA kumbhI kUpaH kuTI jentAkaCceti|  tatra kapAlapASANaloSThalohapiNDAnagnivarNAn sandaMCena gRhItvA~ambhasyamle vA nimajjayet|  tairArdrAvikavastreNa veSTitaiH CleSmamedobhUyiSThaM sarujamaGgaM granthimadvA svedayet|  pAMCusikatAgavAdikarISatuSadhAnyabusapulAkapalalairvA~amlotkvathitaiH pUrvavadveSTitairgavAdiCakRtA~~ArdreNa piNDIkRtenopanAhadravyotkArikAkRCarApayasapiNDairvA vAtarogiSviti piNDasvedaH|  sa eva ca saGkarAkhyaH|  yathArhasvedadravyANi pihitamukhAyAmukhAyAM samyagupasvedya nivAtaCaraNaCayanasthe kiliJje prastAryAvikakauCeyavAtaharapatrAnyatamottarapracchade rauravAjinaprAvArAdibhiH svavacchannaM svedayediti saMstarasvedaH|  pUrvavadevopasvedyokhAmukhe~anyAmukhAM nADImUlacchidrapramANapArCvacchidrAmabhisandhAyopalipya ca pArCvacchidrasthayA nADya CareSikAvaMCadalakiliJjakaraJjapatrAnyatamakRtayA gajAgrahastasaMsthAnayA vyAmadIrghayA~adhyarddhavyAmadIrghayA vA svAyAmacaturbhAgASTabhAgapariNAhamUlAgrasrotasA sarvato vAtaharapatrasaMvRtacchidrayA dvistrirvA vinamitayA sukhopaviSTasya svabhyaktaprAvRte~aGge bASpamupaharet|  bASpo hyanRjugAmI vihatacaNDavegastvacamavidahan sukhaM svedayatIti nADIsvedaH|  puruSAyAmamAtramadhikaM vA ghanaM samaM sukhaM ca CilAtalaM bhUpradeCaM vA vAtaharadArudIptenAgninA sarvatastApayitvA~agnimapohyoSNodakAmlAdibhirabhyukSya yathoktapracchade saMstaravatsvedayediti ghanACmasvedaH|  pUrvavatsvedadravyANi kumbhyAM samutkvAthyACliSyopaviSTastadUSmANaM gRhNIyAt|  bhUmau vA tAM nikhAya tadUrdhvamAsanaM CayanaM vA nAtighanapracchadaM paritaH pralambamAnakuthAkambalagoNikaM nidhAya tatrasthasyoSmANaM gRhNataH kumbhyAmagnivarNAnayoguDAnupalAMCca Canairnimajjayediti kumbhIsvedaH|  CayanasyAdho vistAradviguNakhAte kUpe vAtaharadArukarISAnyatarapUrNadagdhe vigatadhUme svAstIrNaCayanasthaM svedayediti kUpasvedaH|  kuTIM nAtyuccavistArAM vRttAmacchidrAmupanAhadravyakalkaghanapradigdhakuDyAM sarvato vidhUmapradIptakhadirAGgArapUrNahasantikAsamUhaparivRtAM vidhAya tanmadhye ca CayyAM tatrasthaM svedayediti kuTIsvedaH|" iti|  jentAkasvedastvaCakyatvAnna likhyate|

CigruvAraNakairaNDakaraJjasurasArjakAt||7|| CirISavAsAvaMCArkamAlatIdIrghavRntataH||8|| patrabhaGgairvacAdyaiCca mAMsaiCcAnUpavArijaiH||8|| daCamUlena ca pRthak sahitairvA yathAmalam||9|| snehavadbhiH surACuktavArikSIrAdisAdhitaiH||9|| kumbhIrgalantIrnADIrvA pUrayitvA rujArditam||10|| vAsasA~~AcchAditaM gAtraM snigdhaM siJcedyathAsukham||10||

sa0-CigrvAdijaiH patrasamUhaiH, tathA vacAdyaiH-vacAdigaNoktaiH, tathA mAMsairAnUpajairjalajaiCca, daCamUlena ca pRthak-vyastairdvitrAdibhiH, sahitairvA-samastairvA, yathAmalaM snehavadbhiH-doSaharaghRtAdyanyatamasnehayuktairyathAdoSaM surACuktavArikSIrAdisAdhitaiH, kumbhIH-sthAlIH, pUrayitvA, athavA galantIrnADIrvA-anavarataM dhArayA jalAdisravantIrvAridhAnikAsaMjJAH vaMCAdimayIH pUrayitvA, rujArditaM-pIDArtaM, gAtraM-aGgaM, vAsasA~~AcchAditaM tathA snigdhaM sat yathAsukhaM-sukhasparCaM kadAcidatyuSNaM kadAcidISaduSNaM siJcet|

A0 ra0-dravasvedamAha-CigruvAraNaketyAdi|  vAraNakaH-kaNTakikaraJjaH|  dIrghavRntaH-TiNTukaH|  CigrvAdInAM patrabhaGgaiH, vacAdyaiH-upanAhoktaiH, AnUpavArijairmAMsaiH, daCamUlena ca, iti caturbhirvargaiH pRthak sahitairvA doSAnusAreNa ghRtAdiyuktaiH surAdisAdhitaiH, galantIH kumbhIH-sacchidrA ghaTikAH, nADIH-vaMCAdinalikAH, pUrayitvA rujArditaM gAtraM snigdhaM vastrAcchAditaM ca kRtvA tAbhiH siJcet|  eSaH pariSekAkhyo dravasvedaH|

taireva vA dravaiH pUrNaM kuNDaM sarvAGgage~anile||11|| avagAhyAturastiSThedarCaHkRcchrAdirukSu ca||11||

sa0-taireva-pUrvoktaiH, svedadravaiH pUrNaM kuNDaM bhRCamavagAhya-praviCya, Aturo-rogI tiSThet| kIdRCe doSe ? ityAha-sarvAGgage~anile,-sarvaCarIravyApini vAyau| tathA, arCaHprabhRtirogakaSTapIDAsu| AdigrahaNena hastapAdapIDAsu ca| kuNDagrahaNamupalakSaNArtham| tena kUpakuTIsvedau ca vedyau| saGgrahe coktam (sU. a. 26)- "CayanasyAdhovistAradviguNakhAte kUpe vAtaharadArukarISAnyatarapUrNadagdhe vigatadhUme svAstIrNaCayanasthaM svedayediti kUpasvedaH| kuTIM nAtyuccavistArAM vRttAmacchidrAmupanAhadravyakalkaghanapradigdhakuDyAM sarvato vidhUmapradIptakhadirAGgArapUrNahasantikAsamUhaparivRtAM vidhAya tanmadhyasthitaCayyAsthaM svedayediti kuTIsvedaH| padmotpalAdibhiH saktupiNDyA vA~~AcchAdya cakSuSI| CItairmuktAvalIpadmamukulotpalabhAjanaiH|| muhuH karaiCca sajalaiH svidyato hRdayaM spRCet|" iti|

A0 ra0-dravasvedo dvividhaH,-pariSeko~avagAhaCca|  tatra pariSekamuktvA~avagAhamAha-taireveti| [taireva-pUrvoktaiH svedadravaiH pUrNaM kuNDaM bhRCamavagAhya-praviCya, rogI tiSThet|  kadetyAha-sarvaCarIravyApini vAyau, tathA~arCaHprabhRtirogapIDAsu|]  kRcchraM-mUtrakRcchram|  AdiCabdAdaCmaryAnAha - hastapAdapIDAsu ca|  kuNDagrahaNamupalakSaNArtham|  tena kUpakuTIsvedau ca vedyau|

 nivAte~antarbahiH snigdho jIrNAnnaH svedamAcaret||12||

sa0-apagatavAte deCe svedamAcaret| kimbhUtaH ? antaH snehapAnena bahiCcAbhyaGgAdinA snigdhaH| tathA, jIrNAnnaCca,-yena (yasya) hyastanamannaM jIrNam, AmAjIrNAdyAkrAntaM naraM varjayitvA tena svedArheNa nareNa sveda AcaraNIyaH|

tApo~agnitaptavasanaphAlahastatalAdibhiH||1||

sa0-tApaH-tApasvedaH, agnitaptena vasanena, tathA phAlena-ayomayenAgnitaptena, tathA [ agnitaptena ] hastatalenApi| AdigrahaNAddAruvAlukAghaTikAkAMsyabhAjanAdayo gRhyante|

A0 ra0-tApasya lakSaNamAha-tApa iti|  agnitaptairvastrAdibhiH kriyate yaH svedaH sa tApaH|  AdiCabdAtkAMsyavAlukAghaTikAsAkSAdagnayaH|

 upanAho vacAkiNvaCatAhvAdevadArubhiH||2||  dhAnyaiH samastairgandhaiCca rAsnairaNDajaTAmiSaiH||2|| udriktalavaNaiH snehacukratakrapayaHplutaiH||3||  kevale pavane, CleSmasaMsRSTe surasAdibhiH||3||  pittena padmakAdyaistu sAlvaNAkhyaiH punaHpunaH||4||

sa0-upanAho-bandhanam| kiNvaM-surAprakRtiH| CatAhvA-CatapuSpA| dhAnyairiti sAmAnyoktAvapi tilAtasImASAdIni yogyatvAdyAnyuSNavIryANi snigdhAni vA tAni prAyeNa prayojyAnIti| samastagrahaNaM gandhaireva yujyate| ata eva saGgrahe~avadat (sU. a. 26) - "sarvagandha" iti| gandhaiH-gandhadravyaiH kuSThAgurutagarasurasAdibhiH| tathA, rAsnAdibhiH| kimbhUtaiH pUrvoktaiH ? udriktalavaNaiH-lavaNADhyaiH| tathA, snehaCca cukraM ca takraM ca payaCca, taiH plutaiH-AloDitaiH| cukraM-amlam| takrasya cukratvAdeva grahaNe siddhe takragrahaNamatiCayArtham, atiCayena sAlvaNAkhye svede takraM prayojyamiti| kevale pavane vacAdibhirupAnAhasvedaH kAryaH| CleSmasaMsRSTe pavane surasAdibhiH-surasayugAdinA gaNena (hR. sU. a. 15|30)| pittena saMsRSTe pavane padmakAdyaiH-"padmakapuNDrau" (hR. sU. a. 15|12) ityAdibhiH| pittena saMsRSTe pavana ityatra kiJcideva pittena saMsRSTe pavane padmakAdibhirupanAhaH kArya ityavabodhyam, nAdhikena pittena yukte pavane, nApi tulyena pittena yukte pavana iti| evaM hyuktam (hR. sU. a. 13|14)- "graiSmaH prAyo marutpitte" vidhiH kAryaH| graiSmaCca vidhiH prAyeNa sarvaH CItaH| tatra svedo dUrotsArita eva| tasmAt kiJcitpittena saMsRSTe pavane padmakAdyairupanAhaH kArya iti vedyam| ete ca traya upanAhAH kevale vAyau tathA kaphayukte pittayukte ca krameNa yojyAH| ete ca sAlvaNAbhidhAnAH svedA ityAha-sAlvaNAkhyairiti| punaHpunariti asakRttaiH svedayojanA kAryetyarthaH| nirapAyo hi yathA~ayaM sAlvaNAparasaMjJa upanAhAkhyaH svedo na tathA~apare svedA iti| upanahyate-badhyate carmapaTAdinA, ityanvarthaM nAmAsyopanAha iti| sAlvaNa ityasya tantrAntaraprasiddhaM nAma| tathA ca dhanvantariH (su. ci. a. 4|14) - "kAkolyAdiH savAtaghnaH sarvAmladravyasaMyutaH| sAnUpaudakamAMsastu sarvasnehasamanvitaH|| sukhoSNaH spaSTalavaNaH sAlvaNaH parikIrtitaH|" iti| 'udriktalavaNaiH snehacukratakrapayaHplutaiH|' iti triSvapi svedeSu yojyam|

A0 ra0-upanAhasya lakSaNamAha-upanAha ityAdi|  vacAdibhiryaH svedaH kriyate sa upanAhaH|  kiNvaM-surAkAJjikAdyadhaHsthitadravyam|  gandhaiH-kuSThAdigandhadravyaiH|  eraNDajaTA-eraNDamUlam|  AmiSaM-mAMsam|  udriktalavaNaiH-saindhavAdyutkaTaiH|  snehAdibhiH plutaiH-AloDitaiH|  cukraM-suktam|  payaH-kSIram|  eSaH svedaH kevale pavane|  eSa eva CleSmasaMsRSTapavane surasAdivargeNa saha kAryaH|  pittena saMsRSTe pavane padmakAdivargeNa saha kAryaH|  sAlvaNAkhyaiH-sAlvaNa ityAkhyA upanAhasya yebhyaH padmakAdibhyastaiH|  padmakAdibhiryukta upanAhaH-sAlvaNAkhyaH|  uktaM ca suCrutena (ci.a. 4/14)-"kAkolyAdiH savAtaghnaH sarvAmladravyasaMyutaH|  sAnUpamAMsaH susvinnaH sarvasnehasamanvitaH||  sukhoSNaH spRSTalavaNaH sAlvaNaH parikIrtitaH|  tenopanAhaM kurvIta sarvadA vAtarogiNAm||" iti|  tadvyAkhyAnaM ca,- "kAkolyAdirgaNo grAhyo nASTavargakasaMjJitaH|  vAtaghno bhadradArvAdivargo~amlo dADimAdikaH||  sarvasnehaCcatuHsneho lavaNaM saindhavAdikam|  amlAdibhiCca saMskAryaH kAkolyAditrayaM tribhiH||" iti|  padmakAdireva tanmate kAkolyAdiH|  sa copanAhaH punaH punaH kAryaH|  upanAho-bandhanam|

snigdhoSNavIryairmRdubhiCcarmapaTTairapUtibhiH||4|| alAbhe vAtajitpatrakauCeyAvikaCATakaiH||5|| baddhaM rAtrau divA muJcenmuJcedrAtrau divAkRtam||5||

sa0-carmapaTTairbaddhaM-upanaddhamaGgaM, rAtrau divA muJcet| kimbhUtaiH ? snigdhoSNavIryaiH, tathA~apUtibhiH-adurgandhaiH suparikarmitatvAt| alAbhe-carmapaTTAnAmabhAve, vAtajitpatraiH-eraNDajAdibhiH, tathA kauCeyAdibhiH| kauCeyaM-rAGkavAdivastraviCeSam| AvikaM-kambalam| [ CATakaM-vastrakhaNDam| ] tairbaddhaM rAtrau divA muJcet| divA tu baddhaM rAtrau moktavyam|

sa0-CigrvAdijaiH patrasamUhaiH, tathA vacAdyaiH-vacAdigaNoktaiH, tathA mAMsairAnUpajairjalajaiCca, daCamUlena ca pRthak-vyastairdvitrAdibhiH, sahitairvA-samastairvA, yathAmalaM snehavadbhiH-doSaharaghRtAdyanyatamasnehayuktairyathAdoSaM surACuktavArikSIrAdisAdhitaiH, kumbhIH-sthAlIH, pUrayitvA, athavA galantIrnADIrvA-anavarataM dhArayA jalAdisravantIrvAridhAnikAsaMjJAH vaMCAdimayIH pUrayitvA, rujArditaM-pIDArtaM, gAtraM-aGgaM, vAsasA~~AcchAditaM tathA snigdhaM sat yathAsukhaM-sukhasparCaM kadAcidatyuSNaM kadAcidISaduSNaM siJcet|

A0 ra0-dravasvedamAha-CigruvAraNaketyAdi|  vAraNakaH-kaNTakikaraJjaH|  dIrghavRntaH-TiNTukaH|  CigrvAdInAM patrabhaGgaiH, vacAdyaiH-upanAhoktaiH, AnUpavArijairmAMsaiH, daCamUlena ca, iti caturbhirvargaiH pRthak sahitairvA doSAnusAreNa ghRtAdiyuktaiH surAdisAdhitaiH, galantIH kumbhIH-sacchidrA ghaTikAH, nADIH-vaMCAdinalikAH, pUrayitvA rujArditaM gAtraM snigdhaM vastrAcchAditaM ca kRtvA tAbhiH siJcet|  eSaH pariSekAkhyo dravasvedaH|

taireva vA dravaiH pUrNaM kuNDaM sarvAGgage~anile||11|| avagAhyAturastiSThedarCaHkRcchrAdirukSu ca||11||

sa0-taireva-pUrvoktaiH, svedadravaiH pUrNaM kuNDaM bhRCamavagAhya-praviCya, Aturo-rogI tiSThet| kIdRCe doSe ? ityAha-sarvAGgage~anile,-sarvaCarIravyApini vAyau| tathA, arCaHprabhRtirogakaSTapIDAsu| AdigrahaNena hastapAdapIDAsu ca| kuNDagrahaNamupalakSaNArtham| tena kUpakuTIsvedau ca vedyau| saGgrahe coktam (sU. a. 26)- "CayanasyAdhovistAradviguNakhAte kUpe vAtaharadArukarISAnyatarapUrNadagdhe vigatadhUme svAstIrNaCayanasthaM svedayediti kUpasvedaH| kuTIM nAtyuccavistArAM vRttAmacchidrAmupanAhadravyakalkaghanapradigdhakuDyAM sarvato vidhUmapradIptakhadirAGgArapUrNahasantikAsamUhaparivRtAM vidhAya tanmadhyasthitaCayyAsthaM svedayediti kuTIsvedaH| padmotpalAdibhiH saktupiNDyA vA~~AcchAdya cakSuSI| CItairmuktAvalIpadmamukulotpalabhAjanaiH|| muhuH karaiCca sajalaiH svidyato hRdayaM spRCet|" iti|

A0 ra0-dravasvedo dvividhaH,-pariSeko~avagAhaCca|  tatra pariSekamuktvA~avagAhamAha-taireveti| [taireva-pUrvoktaiH svedadravaiH pUrNaM kuNDaM bhRCamavagAhya-praviCya, rogI tiSThet|  kadetyAha-sarvaCarIravyApini vAyau, tathA~arCaHprabhRtirogapIDAsu|]  kRcchraM-mUtrakRcchram|  AdiCabdAdaCmaryAnAha - hastapAdapIDAsu ca|  kuNDagrahaNamupalakSaNArtham|  tena kUpakuTIsvedau ca vedyau|

A0 ra0- basterviSayamAha-vAtolbaNeSviti| "bastinA dIyate bastiM vA pUrvamanvetyato bastiH|" ityuktaM saGgrahe (sU. a. 28)|   baste sarvopakramaCreSThatvamAha-uapakramANAmiti| saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 28) - "CIghrasukhabRMhaNAdikAritvAdvikRtAniloccheditvAcca| sukhatvAdeva ca bastirbAlavRddhakRCasthUlakSINadhAtvindriyeSu ca strISu cAnilopasargAdaprajAsu kRcchraprajAsu copadiCyate| tathA~agnibalavarNamedhAsvarAyuH sukhaprado vayaHsthApanaH paGgurugNabhagnastabdhasaGkucitAnilAdhmAnaCUlArocakodAvartaparikartikAdiSu hita iti|" iti|    bastibhedAnAha-trividhastviti| saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 28) - "tatrAsthApanaM doSadUSyAdyanusAreNa nAnAdravyasaMyogAdinirvRttam| tasya bhedAH,-utkleCanaM CodhanaM CamanaM lekhanaM bRMhaNaM vAjIkaraNaM picchAbastirmAdhutailikamityAdayaH| mAdhutailikasya paryAyAH,-yApano yuktaratho doSaharaH siddhabastiriti| teSAM nAmabhireva ca svarUpamAkhyAtam| tadvayaHsthApanAddoSasthApanAdvA AsthApanamityucyate| CarIrarohaNAddoSanirharaNAdacintyaprabhAvatayA vA~asminnUhAsambhavAnnirUha iti| anuvAsanaM yathArhauSadhasiddhaH snehanArthe snehaH| snehavidhau sa caturddhA~abhihitaH| tasya bhedo mAtrAbastiH| sa peyasnehahrasvamAtrAtulyaH, sevyaH sadA~atra mAdhutailikavat| bAlavRddhAdhvabhArayAnavyAyAmacintAstrInityastrInRpeCvarasukumAradurbalAnilabhagnAlpAgnibhirniSparihAratayA sukho balyo varNyaH sRSTamalo doSaghnaCca| tathA~api tau nAjIrNe yojyau| na ca divAsvapnastayoH sevyaH| yataCcAsau anuvasannapi na duSyati, anuvAsanamapi vA dIyate, ityanuvAsanam| vAsanaM-bhojanam| uttarabastirapi sneho~anuvAsanavacchodhano nirUhavadapi ca kecidAhuH| sa nirUhAduttaramuttareNa vA mArgeNa dIyata ityuttarabastiH|" iti|

A0 ra0- anAsthApyAdInAM pANDvAdInAM cAnuvAsanaM niSedhati- nAnuvAsyA iti| anAsthApyAH-atisnigdhAdayaH| nirannaH-akRtAhAraH| viDbhedI-CithilamalaH| gurukoSThaH-AhAraM vinA~apyAhArapUrNa iva koSTho yasya| abhiSyandI-netrakopI| saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 28) -  tatrAtisnigdhAdInAM yathAsvamuktAH pRthagdoSAH| api ca| abhukte riktakoSThasya prayuktamanuvAsanam| saradUragasUkSmatvaiH| kSipramUrdhvaM prapadyate|| tena vAyorjayo na syAdvAtadhAmanyatiSThatA| kayAgnerACu nACastu viCeSAdativartinA|| snehaH sadyo~asitAhAraruddhe tvAmACaye~anilam| pakvasthaM hanti pakvasthaCcyavate cAnnapAkataH|| nirUhaCca samIraCca tIkSNavegAvubhAvapi| tAvannamUrcchitau tIkSNAvadho~annena sahAgatau|| UrdhvaM vA CakRtA sArddhaM saMsthitau koSTha eva vA| samalAhAraviSTabdhau haretAmACu jIvitam|| bhuktavAnanuvAsyo~asmAnna nirUhyo~atra bhuktavAn| pANDurogArtAdInAM doSAnutkleCya snehabastirudaraM janayet| pratiCyAyAdimatAM bhUya eva doSaM vivardhayet|" iti|

sa0-SaNmAse bAle~adhike vA apUrNavarSe netrasya paJcAGgulAni| AturAGgulapramANamiti gamyate| dairghyeNa cetyetadapyanuktaM gamyate| vakSyati hi (Clo. 12) - "svAGguSThena samaM mUle sthaulyena" iti| AsaptabhyaH-saptavarSANi maryAdIkRtya, SaDaGgulAni pramANam| AGatra maryAdAyAm, nAbhividhau| tena SaDvarSe bAle SaDaGgulAni netram| anyathA saptavarSasyApi SaDeveti prApnoti| vakSyati tu-"saptame sapta" iti| evaM ca pUrvAparaM vyAhataM syAt| tasmAnmaryAdAyAmAGityavehi| saptame varSe saptAGgulAni| dvAdaCe vatsare tAni-aGgulAnyaSTau netram| dvAdaCAnAM pUraNa iti " tasya pUraNe DaT" iti DaT| evaM SoDaCa ityatra| SoDaCe saMvatsare navAGgulAni netram| viMCAdvatsarAdUrdhvamekaviMCaprabhRtivarSeSu dvAdaCAGgulAni netram| nAto~apyadhikAnItyevaCabdArthaH| viMCatiCabdAt pUraNe DaTi tiviMCaterDitIti tilopAdviMCaCabdaH| varSAntareSu-antarAlasthiteSu varSeSu navamadaCamAdiSu, vIkSya-paryAlocya, netrasya pramANamabhivarddhayet| caCabdo bhinnakramaH| na kevalaM varSAntareSu pramANamabhivarddhayet| yAvadvayobalAdIni ca nirUpya pramANaM vRddhiM nayet|

sa0-sthaulyena-pariNAhena, svAGguSThena tulyaM mUle netram| tathA, agraM-prAntaH, tasmin kaniSThayA~aGgulyA samaM netraM syAt| kharanAde~apyuktam-"bastinetramRju ClakSNaM suvRttaM gulikAmukham| bhavedgopucchasaMsthAnaM supravAhaM trikarNikam|| yA tribhAgapraNayane maryAdA karNikA bhavet| dve karNike copariSTAdbastyAdhAre yathAntare|| svAGguSThakaparINAhaM mUlaM netrasya Casyate| madhyaM tvanAmikAtulyamagraM tulyakaniSThikam|| svenAGgulipramANena dairghyaM syAddvAdaCAGgulam| karkandhupravahaM chidraM CreSThamanyadyathAvayaH|| viMCadvAdaCaSaDvarSe dvAdaCASTaSaDaGgulam| karkandhukasatInAgramudgachidravahaM smRtam||" ityAdi| munirapyavocat (ca. si. a. 3|6) - "SaDdvAdaCASTAGgulasammitAni SaDviMCatidvAdaCavarSajAnAm| syurmudgakarkandhusatInavAhicchidrANi vartyA pihitAni caiva|| yathAvayo~aGguSThakaniSThikAbhyAM mUlAgrayoH syuH pariNAhavanti|" iti|

sa0-varSe pUrNe satyaGgulamAdAya svAGgulAtprabhRti krameNa tryaGgulaM chidraM mUle netrasya bhavati| kimbhUtaM chidram ? arddhasyArddhamarddhArddham| tasya-aGgulasyArddhArddhaM tadarddhArddham, tena pravarddhitam| tatra prathame varSe~aGgulamAtraM chidram, yAvadvarSANi SaT| saptame varSe sapAdamaGgulam, yAvadekAdaCa varSANi| dvAdaCe varSe sArddhamaGgulam, yAvatSoDaCa varSANi| SoDaCavarSasya tu pAdonamaGguladvayam| saptadaCe varSe~aGguladvayam| aSTAdaCe varSe sapAdamaGguladvayam| ekonaviMCativarSasya sArddhamaGguladvayam| viMCativarSasya pAdonamaGgulatrayam| ekaviMCativarSasya tryaGgulaM chidramiti kramo vedyaH| paramamityanenaitadgamayati,-paramaM-utkarSamACrityedaM mUlacchidram| madhyamaM tu mUlacchidraM "svAGguSThena" ityanenoktam| UnavarSasya tvarddhAGgulaM chidrametadapekSayA kalpyam| agre tu chidraM tadbhavati yanmudgAdi vahati| tatra vArSikasya mudgavAhi, yAvatSaDvarSam| saptavarSasya mASavAhi, yAvadekAdaCo~abdaH| dvAdaCavarSasya kalAyavAhi, SoDaCavarSasya klinnakalAyavAhi, ekaviMCativarSasya karkandhuvAhi, iti kramAdvayaHpramANam| UnavarSasya ca na mudgavAhi kalpyam| agracchidrapramANaM caitat "agre kaniSThayA" ityatrApi saGgacchata eva| dairghyapramANaM cAtra pakSe pUrvameva yojyam| "svAGguSThena samaM mUle sthaulyena" ityanena (ityatra) chidrapramANaM svamatyA bhiSajA prakalpyam| tathA, "tryaGgulaM paramaM chidraM" ityatra ca sthaulyapramANaM svadhiyaiva nirUpyam| tantrakRtA tu granthagauravabhayAduktaprAyatvAcceha noktam|

A0 ra0- yantracchidrapramANamAha-pUrNe~abde iti| SadaGgulasya yantrasya mUlacchidramaGgulapramANam| saptAGgulasya sArddhAGgulam| aSTAGgulasya dvyaGgulam| navAGgulasya sArddhadvyaGgulam| dvAdaCAGgulasya tryaGgulam| SaDaGgulasyAgracchidraM mudgavAhi| saptAGgulasya mASavAhi | aSATGgulasya kalAyavAhi| navAGgulasya klinnakalAyavAhi | dvAdaCAGgulasya hrasvabadaravAhi | aGgulamAnaM tu chidrasya vRttaparidhau jJeyam| " paJjcAGgulasya mUle~arddhAGgulam, agre vanamudgavAhi|" iti saGgrahoktaM (sU. a. 28) jJeyam|

AsthApyaM snehitaM svinnaM CuddhaM labdhabalaM punaH||20|| anvAsanArhaM vijJAya pUrvamevAnuvAsayet||21|| CIte vasante ca divA rAtrau kecittato~anyadA||21|| abhyaktasnAtamucitAtpAdahInaM hitaM laghu||22|| asnigdharUkSamaCitaM sAnupAnaM dravAdi ca||22|| kRtacaGkramaNaM muktaviNmUtraM Cayane sukhe||23|| nAtyucchrite na cocchIrSe saMviSTaM vAmapArCvataH||23|| saGkocya dakSiNaM sakthi prasArya ca tato~aparam||24||

sa0-AsthApyaM-nirUhaNArhaM, snigdhaM, tathA svinnaM, tathA CuddhaM-UrdhvAdhaH, tathA bhUyo~api labdhabalaM, tathA~anuvAsanayogyaM, viditvA pUrvameva nirUhAdanuvAsayet| CIte-hemantaCiCirayoH RtvoH, tathA vasante, divA~anuvAsayet| anyadA-CItAdvasantAccAnyasmin grISmaprAvRTCaradAkhye Rtau, rAtrAvanuvAsayet| keciditi bhinnakramaH, tato~anyadetyato~anantaraM draSTavyam| iti kecit "AhuH" iti vAkyaCeSaH| dhAnvantarAstu sarvathaiva rAtrAvanuvAsanaM necchanti| dhanvantarimatamevorarIkRtya saGgrahe~adhijage (sU. a. 28)- "na rAtrau praNayedbastiM doSotkleCo hi rAtrijaH| snehavIryayutaH kuryAdAdhmAnaM gauravaM jvaram||" iti| tadetaddeCAntarAdivaCAt pramANayitavyam| kimbhUtaM naram ? abhyaktasnAtaM,-pUrvamabhyaktaH paCcAtsnAtaH, tam| pUrvakAleti samAsaH| ucitAtpAdahInaM-yena yadbhojanamabhyastaM tasmAccaturthabhAgahInamaCitam| tathA, hitaM-laghuguNayuktam| tathA, kiJcit snigdharUkSam| tathA, sAnupAnaM dravAdi ca| AdiCabdena dravoSNamanabhiSyandItyAdiviCiSTaM bhuktavantamiti gamayati| uktaM ca saGgrahe (sU. a. 28)- "atisnigdhACino hyubhayamArgasaMsargAt sneho madamUrcchAgnisAdahRllAsAdIn janayati| rUkSACino viSTambhaM balavarNahAniM ca| alpamAtradravACino visRSTaviNmUtrasya cAnAvRto na tadAvaraNAdvyApadam|" iti| kimbhUtam ? kRtacaGkramaNaM-vihitagamanamAtram| tathA, tyaktamUtrapurISam| tathA, Cayane-CayanIye, sukhAvahe saMviSTaM-sthitam| kimbhUte ? nAtyucchrite,-nAtyunnate, na cocchIrSe-na connataCirodhare| kathaM saMviSTam ? vAmapArCvataH,-vAmapArCvena| saGkocya dakSiNaM sakthi vAmasakthna uparIti vRddhavaidyAH| tato-dakSiNasakthnaH, aparaM-vAmaM sakthi, prasArya| saGgrahe coktam (sU. a. 28) - "Cayane nAtyucchrite svAstRta ISadunnatapAdadeCe vAmapArCvena prAkCirasaM saMveCayet|" iti|

A0 ra0- nirUhyasyAnuvAsanamAha-AsthApyamiti| kRta snehanAdikamAsthApyamanuvAsanayogyatve sati pUrvamanuvAsayet|     anuvAsanakAlamAha-CIte vasante ceti| CIte vasante tato~anyadA ca divA~anuvAsayet| kecit tato~anyadA rAtrau iti vadanti| saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 28) - " avekSya vA doSAdIn| anyathA hi snehoktAmayaprAdurbhAvaH| dhanvantarIyAH punaH prAhuH| na rAtrau praNayedvastiM doSotkleSo hi rAtrijaH| snehavIryayutaH kuryAdAdhmAnaM gauravaM jvaram|| ahni sthAnasthite doSe vahnau cAnnarasAnvite| sphuTastrotomukhaM dehaM sneho yatparisarpati|| alpapittakaphaM rUkSaM bhRCaM vAtarujArditam| bhuktaM jIrNACanaM kAmaM rAtrAvapyanuvAsayet|| kevalAnilAtipIDitaM tvaCuddhamapyanirUpitavelamapyanuvAsayedAtyayikatvAt||" iti  | anuvAsanIyasya pUrvakartavyamAha-abhyaktasnAtamiti| ucitAt-nityabhojanAt, pAdahInam| aCitaM-bhuktavantam| dravAdi-dravapUrvam| na cocchIrSe-ucchIrSakaM vinA|

athAsya netraM praNayetsnigdhe snigdhamukhaM gude||24|| ucchvAsya bastervadane baddhe hastamakampayan||25|| pRSThavaMCaM prati tato nAtidrutavilambitam||25|| nAtivegaM na vA mandaM sakRdeva prapIDayet||26|| sAvaCeSaM ca kurvIta vAyuH CeSe hi tiSThati||26||

sa0-asya-evaMbhUtAvasthasyAturasya, gude snigdhe ghRtena kRte netraM [ snigdhaprAntaM praNayet| ] bastervadana ucchvAsya-vAtaM niHsArya, baddhe sati, nAtiCIghraM, nAtivilambitaM, nAtivegena, na ca mandaM kRtvA, tathA pRSThavaMCAbhimukhamekavArameva netraM prapIDayet| kathaM prapIDayet ? hastamakampayan| atidrutAdipIDanadoSA bastivyApatsiddhau (hR. ka. a. 5) vakSyamANAH| sAvaCeSaM ca snehaM kurvIta| kuto hetoH ? ityAha-yasmAt CeSe snehe vAyustiSThati|

A0 ra0- anuvAsane vaidyakRtyamAha-athAsyeti| asya - Aturasya, gude bastimucchvAsya-mRdukarasparCena vigatamArutaM kRtvA, pRSThavaMCaM prati-pRSThavaMCACrayeNa, praNayet| tataH-anantaram, auSadhaM praNayet|  nAtidrutavilambitamiti pIDanArambhaviSayam| nAtivegaM na vA mandamiti pIDanaviSayam| CeSe-auSadhaCeSe|

 datte tUttAnadehasya pANinA tADayetsphijau||27|| tatpArSNibhyAM tathA CayyAM pAdataCca trirutkSipet||27||  tataH prasAritAGgasya sopadhAnasya pArSNike||28|| AhanyAnmuSTinA~aGgaM ca snehenAbhyajya mardayet||28|| vedanArtamiti sneho na hi CIghraM nivartate||29|| yojyaH CIghraM nivRtte~anyaH sneho~atiSThannakAryakRt||29||

sa0-datte ca bastisnehe sati, uttAnagAtrasya tu tasya sphijau  hastenAhanyAt| tathA-tenaiva prakAreNa, tatpArSNibhyAM sphijau tADayet| CayyAM-khaTvAM ca, pAdataH-caraNadeCAt, trIn vArAnutkSipet, na tu mUrdhataH| tataH-CayyotkSepAdanantaraM, prasAritaCarIrasya dattagaNDukasya pArSNike-pArSNI, muSTyA~~AhanyAt| aGgaM-CarIraM ca, snehena-tailAdinA, abhyajya mardayet| kimevaM kriyate ? ityAha-aGgaM vedanArtaM-pIDAturaM, iti-hetoryasmAdACu sneho na nivartate| CIghramapayAte ca snehe satyaparaH sneho deyaH| kasmAdevaM vidhIyate ? ityAha-snehaH CarIrAbhyantare~atiSThan naiva kAryakRt-na snehane samartha ityarthaH|

A ra0- datte tvauSadhe vaidyaH svapANinA sphijau tADayet, tata AturapArSNibhyAm| tataH pAdataH CayyAmutkSipet| tataH pArSNI ca muSTinA~~ahanyAt| tririti pANitADanAdiSu caturSvapi yojyam| tato vedanArtamaGgaM mardayet| saGgrahe tu ( sU. a. 28) - "vamanAdadhikataraM kRtamaGgalamaCanArdrahastamaCaGkanIyaparivAraM nivAte veCmani pratate Cayane svAstRte ISadunnatapAdadeCe prAkCirasaM saMveCayet| atisnigdhACino hyubhayamArgasaMsargAtsneho madamUrcchAgnisAdahRllAsAn janayati| rUkSACino viSTambhaM balavarNahAniM ca| alpamAtradravACino visRSTaviNmUtrasya cAnAvRto na tadAvaraNAdvyApadam| ciramaCitavato vidAhAbhimukhabhaktasya jvaraM kuryAt| yataCca vAmapArCvACrayANi vahnigrahaNIgudavalImukhAni| tAni tatpArCvaCAyino nimnAni bhavanti| atastadauSadhamaskhalitaM prApnoti praveCanirgamAviti| saMviSTaM cainamRjusthitadehaM svabAhUpadhAnaM prasAritavAmasakthimAkuJcitetaraM tasyopari prasAritadakSiNabAhuM kArayet| pUrvameva tu vaidyo vartyA supihitAgracchidraM netraM bhAjanasyopari kRtvA dakSiNapAdAGguSThAGgulibhyAM karNikAyAmupariSTAnniSpIDyAvibandhAya CatAhvAsaindhavacUrNAvacUrNitaM prAgeva netrasparCAt pUrvavadabhimantritaM yathArhaM yathArhauSadhavipakvaM sukhoSNaM bastau snehamAsicyAvalIkocchvAsaM niHsAritavAtabudbudamauSadhAnte sUtreNa dvistrirvA bastimukhamAveSTya dakSINapANau netramupadhAya tiSThet| tato vAmahastapradeCinyA~abhyaktapraveCapradeCamapanItavartyuttAnavAmahastAGguSTodarapihitAgraM madhyamApradeCinyupagRhItakarNikamRjvanusukhamekamanA lAghavena netramAkArNikaM praveCayet| Aturo~api tadanulomamavalambeta| tataCca vaidyo bastimukhaM dakSiNahastAGguSThapradeCinIbhyAmamuJcannetramacAlayan hastadvayenottAnenaikagrahaNenaiva prapIDayet| anyathA hi vyApado bhavanti| anye tu triMCanmAtrAH pIDanakAlamAhuH| na ca bastau dIyamAne kSavakAsahAsajRmbhAspandanAnyAcaret| viNmUtrAnilavege tu netramAkRSya vegAnte CeSaM praNayet| tathA pArSNyaGgulipAdatalapiNDikAH sarujaM cAGgaM snehena pratilomaM vAkCatamAtraM CanairmRdgIyAt|" iti| vaidyakRtyasya phalamAha-iti sneha iti| " samanugacchati ca samantAtsirAH|" ityadhikaM saGgrahe (sU. a. 28)| pramAdAcchighranivRttau punastadevAnuvAsanaM kAryamityAha - sa0-atiraukSyAdanAgacchan sneho yadi jADyAgnisAdAdidoSAnna vidhatte, tata upekSetaiva-na tanniSkAsane yatetetyarthaH| adhyuSito rAtriM yadi snehastataH pariNatatvAt rasAdidhAtusamatAM gataH prAtaH-prabhAte, CuNThIdhAnyakAmbu kaduSNaM pibet| kevalameva vA-nagaradhAnyakarahitaM, koSNaM jalaM pibet|

iti snehaistricaturaiH snigdhe srotoviCuddhaye||35|| nirUhaM CodhanaM yuJjyAdasnigdhe snehanaM tanoH||35||

sa0-iti-pUrvoktena prakAreNa, snehaistribhiCcaturbhirvA snigdhe sati srotoviCodhanArthaM nirUhaM CodhanaM prayojayet| asnigdhe sati tanoH-CarIrasya, snehanaM prayojayet| trayo vA catvAro vA tricaturAH| saGkhyayAvyayeti samAsaH| caturo~acprakaraNe tryupAbhyAmupasaGkhyAnamityac samAsAntaH|

paJcame~atha tRtIye vA divase sAdhake Cubhe||36|| madhyAhne kiJcidAvRtte prayukte balimaGgale||36|| abhyaktasveditotsRSTamalaM nAtibubhukSitam||37|| avekSya puruSaM doSabheSajAdIni cAdarAt||37|| bastiM prakalpayedvaidyastadvidyairbahubhiH saha||38||

sa0-atha-anuvAsanAdanantaraM, paJcame tRtIye vA vAsare madhyAhne kiJcit-manAk, AvRtte-atikrAnte, tathA balimaGgale vihite sati, puruSaM kRtAbhyaktasveditaM tyaktamalaM kiJcidbubhukSitaM tathA prakRtyAdibhirjJAtvA doSAdIni viditvA| AdiCabdena sAtmyabalAdiparigrahaH| ityevaM sarvamavagamya vaidyo bastiM prakalpayet| nanu, "dUSyaM deCaM" (hR. sU. a. 12|67) ityAdinA sarvamuktamevaitat| tatkimanena ? iti| brUmaH| nirUhamapi sApAyaM paCyatetadAcAryeNa punaruktam| dUSyadeCAdimahatA yatnenAlocanIyamiti pratipAdanArtham| "nirUhamAtrA prathame" ityAdi ca sarvamatrAlocyam| kathaM prakalpayet ? ityAha-tadvidyaiH-vaidyakaCACtrajJairbahubhiH saha-sArddham|

A0 ra0- nirUhavidhimAha-paJcama iti| antyAnuvAsanadinAt tRtIye paJcame vA| sAdhake-jyotiHCAstrokte| Cubhe-aCaucAdirahite| avetya-jJAtvA| tadvidaiH-bastikuCalaiH| saGgrhe tu (sU. a. 28) - "AryAvalokitaM nAthamAryAM tAramAtmabhuvaM dhAtAramaCvinAvindramAtreyaM saptarSIn kACyapa videha patiprabhRtInagniveCAdIMCca tantrakArAn dIpagandhapuSpaphalabalidhUpairyajJa iva prakalpitabhAgAn kRtvA, oSadhIrvRddhavaidyAn dviijAtIMCca saMpUjya tadvidyasahito doSauSadhAdibalena yathArhamupakalpayedvastim| " iti|

 kvAthayedviMCatipalaM dravyasyASTau phalAni ca||38|| tataH kvAthAccaturthAMCaM snehaM vAte prakalpayet||39|| pitte svasthe ca SaSThAMCamaSTamAMCaM kaphe~adhike||39|| sarvatra cASTamaM bhAgaM kalkAdbhavati vA yathA||40||  nAtyacchasAndratA basteH palamAtraM guDasya ca||40|| madhupaTvAdiCeSaM ca yuktyA----------------------||41||

sa0-dravyasya-bastikalpoktasya, nirUhakalpanArthaM viMCatipalAni, tathA~aSTau phalAni-madanaphalAni, sAmAnyaparibhASayA SoDaCaguNaM jalaM dattvA kvAthayet| caturbhAgAvaCeSaCca grAhyaH| tataH-tasmAdevaMkRtAt, kvAthAccaturthAMCaM snehaM vAte prakalpayet| dvAdaCaprasRto hi nirUhaH| tatra snehaM SaTpalikaM kalpayedityarthaH| pitte~adhike svasthe ca puruSe SaSThAMCaM snehaM-catuSpalikaM, prakalpayediti prakRtam| kaphe~adhike aSTamAMCaM snehaM-tripalikaM, prakalpayet| nanu, svasthasya doSacAlanaM pratiSiddhaM tantrAntarIyaiH| tadgrantho hi-"yo hi saJcAlayetsuptaM vane siMhaM karAdibhiH| sa doSAMCcAlayet svasthAn pracchardanavirecanaiH||" iti| tasmAt svasthavRtte nirUhakalpanA na yukteti| tadetadasat| yasmAt prAgabhihitam (hR. sU. a. 4|35)- "CItodbhavaM doSacayaM vasante viCodhayan grISmajamabhrakAle| ghanAtyaye vArSikamACu samyak prApnoti rogAnRtujAnna jAtu||" iti| tasmAdAcAryavacanAjjJAyate svasthavRtte~api CuddhividhAnaM sammatamiti tantrakRtaH| tantrAntarIyaM mataM tvasadeva, CiSTavyavahAraviruddhatvAt| sarvatra-vAte pitte kaphe svasthe ca, kalkAt-peSyadravyAt, aSTamaM bhAgaM-trINi palAni, kalpayet| bhavati vetyAdi| yathA vA bastiratyaccho~atisAndro-atighano [ vA ] na bhavati tathA kalkaH kalpayitavyaH| palamAtraM guDasya ceti palAnnAdhikona iti jJApanArthaM mAtragrahaNam| madhupaTvAdiCeSaM ca yuktyA prakalpayet| tatreyaM yuktiH,-mAkSikasya palacatuSTayaM saindhavasya ca karSaH, AdigrahaNAt kvacidyavakSArasya karSaH, tathA mAMsarasasurAsavasuktakSIrakAJjikAnAM grahaNam|

A0 ra0- nirUhadravyANAM mAtrAmAha-kvAthayediti| yatra kvAthyasya viMCatipalAni tatrASTau madanaphalAni ityevaMparametat, na kvAthamAnaparam, prakuJcAdinirUheSvasambhavAt| kvAthAtmakAnnirUhAt dvAdaCaprasRtAccaturthAMCaM-prasRtatrayasammitaM, snehaM kalpayet| tataH kvAthAttAvantaM kvAthamapanIya, lyablope paJcamI| evaM kalkAdaSTamaM-sArdhaprasRtam| guDasya palamAtram| yuktyA madhu prasRtadvayasammitam, paTu-saindhavaM, akSasammitam| adiCabdAnmAMsarasakSIragomUtrakAJjikamadanaphalAni| uktaM hi suCrutena (ci. a. 38/30) - "kSaudraM mUtraM phalaM kSIramamlaM mAMsarasaM tathA| yuktyA pradApayeddhImAn nirUhe kalpanA tviyam||" iti|  tatra caturNAM dravANAM prasRtadvayam, madanaM tvekam, pAriCeSyAtkvAthasya prasRtacatuSTayam, evaM dvAdaCaprasRtatvam| uktaM hi suCrutena (ci. a. 38/37)- " datvA~~Adau saindhavasyAkSaM madhunaH prasRtadvayam| vinirmathya tato dadyAt snehasya prasRtatrayam|| ekIbhUte tataH snehe kalkasya prasRtaM kSipet| sammUrcchite kaSAyaM tu catuSprasRtasammitam|| vitarecca tadAvApamante dviprasRtonmitam| evaM prakalpito bastirdvAdaCaprasRto bhavet||" iti| yatvatra kalkasya prasRtamAnaM tat 'bhavati vA yathA nAtyacchasAndratA basteH' ityabhiprAyeNa| yaccAvApasya prasRtadvayamAnaM tadguDapalakalkatripalayogAt| iti vAte~adhike| pitte tu snehanyUnatA madhudugdhAbhyAM pUraNIyA| kaphe tu madhunaiva| uktaM hi vRndena (a. 76/5)- " madhusnehanakalkAkhyakaSAyAvApataH kramAt| trINi SaT dve daCa trINi palAnyanilarogiNAm|| pitte catvAri catvAri dve dvipaJca catuSTayam|  SaT trINi dve daCa trINi kaphe cApi nirUhaNam||" iti|

 -----------------------------sarvaM tadekataH||41|| uSNAmbukumbhIbASpeNa taptaM khajasamAhatam||41||  prakSipya bastau praNayetpAyau nAtyuSNaCItalam||42|| nAtisnigdhaM na vA rUkSaM nAtitIkSNaM na vA mRdu||42|| nAtyacchasAndraM nonAtimAtraM nApaTu nAti ca||43|| lavaNaM tadvadamlaM ca---------------------------||43||

sa0-tat-etat, sarvamauSadhamekataH-ekasmin kRtvA, bheSajapAkAtikrAntiparihArArthamuSNAmbukumbhIvASpeNa taptaM, khajena-dadhyAhananakASThena, samAhataM-AloDitaM, tathA "brahmadakSa" ityAdinA cAbhimantritaM, bastau prakSipya pAyau-gude, praNayet| nAtyuSNaM, nAtiCItalaM, nAtisnigdhaM, na vA rUkSaM, nAtitIkSNaM, na vA mRdu, nAtyacchaM nAtisAndraM-nAtighanaM, nonamAtraM, na cAtimAtraM, nApaTu-nAlavaNaM, nAtilavaNaM, tadvadamlaM ceti nAnamlaM, nAtyamlam| atiCabdaprayogAdatra madhyamAvasthAnugamaH|

A0 ra0- militAnAM nirUhadravyANAM saMskAramAha -sarvamiti| khajo-manthanadaNDaH| tadvat-nAnamlaM nAtyamlam| saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 28)- "tatra bASpamAtrAnutApAdauSadhasya vidAho na bhavati| khajapramathanAt kvAthasnehAdayaH samyaksaMyuktAH samyageva yogamArabhante| anyathA punaH kvAthAdInAmulbaNo~anyatamo~anyatamaM yathAsvaM doSamIrayet| atyuSNAdInAM tu pRthagvyApadaH sAdhanAni ca siddhiSUttarakAlamupadekSyante| api ca| tiryak praNIte hi na yAti dhArA gude vraNaH syAccalite tu netre | dattaH CanairnACayameti bastiH kaNThaM pradhAvedatipIDitastu|| stambhaM vidhatte~atimRdurhimaCca tatpAmlatIkSNo bhramadAhamohAn| snigdho~atijADyaM, pavanaM tu rUkSastanvalpamAtrAlavaNastvayogam|| karoti mAtrAbhyadhiko~atiyogaM kSAmaM tu sAndraH sucireNa ceti| dAhAtisArau lavaNo~ati kuryAttasmAtsuyuktaM samameva dadyAt||" iti|

UrdhvajatruvikAreSu viCeSAnnasyamiSyate||1||  nAsA hi Ciraso dvAraM tena tadvyApya hanti tAn||1|| virecanaM bRMhaNaM ca CamanaM ca tridhA~api tat||2||

virecanaM CiraHCUlajADyasyandagalAmaye||2|| CophagaNDakRmigranthikuSThApasmArapInase||3||

A0 ra0-Camananasyasya viSayamAha-Camanamiti|  akSirAjayaH-cakSuSi rekhAkArAH CirAH|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 29) - "akAlavalIpalitakhalatidAruNakaraktapittAdiSu" iti|

yathAsvaM yaugikaiH snehairyathAsvaM ca prasAdhitaiH||5|| kalkakvAthAdibhiCcAdyaM madhupaTvAsavairapi||5||

sa0-ye ye snehA yathAsvaM taiH| kimbhUtaiH ? yaugikaiH,-yogArhaiH sarSapatailAdibhiH, na tu ghRtAdibhiH| tathA, yathAsvaM-marIcaCuNThyAdibhiH, prasAdhitaiH-saMskRtaiH| tathA, kalkakvAthasvarasAdibhiCca yathAsvaM kaphaghnairgirikarNikAdijaiH sAdhitaM, AdyaM-virecanAkhyaM nasyaM, bhavati| na kevalametairyAvanmAkSikAdibhiCca| Asavo-madyaviCeSaH|

A0 ra0-virecananasyasya dravyANyAha-yathAsvamiti|  yathAsvaM-yo yasyocitaH snehaH, tena|  yathAsvaM-yadyasyocitamauSadhaM, tena|  sAdhitaiH snehaiH kalkaiH kvAthaiCcUrNAdibhiCca|  AdyaM-virecanam|  paTu-saindhavam|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 29)- "tatra bhIrustrIkRCasukumAreSu snehaH|  galarogasannipAtajvarAtinidrAmanovikArakRmiCirorogAkSispandanatimirakRcchraviSAbhipannAbhiSyannasarpadaSTavisaMjJeSu CeSAH|  teSveva ca bhUyasi doSe CIghrakAriNI ca cUrNaH|  sa hi nAsAyAmAvegakarataro bhavati|" iti|

bRMhaNaM dhanvamAMsottharasAsRk khapurairapi||6|| CamanaM yojayetpUrvaiH kSIreNa salilena vA||6||

sa0-bRMhaNaM nasyaM dhanvotthamAMsodbhavarasaiH syAt| tathA, asRjA-raktena, dhanvotthenaiva| tathA, khapuraiH-niryAsaviCeSaiH| apiCabdAdanyairapi pUrvoktaiH snehairatIkSNairbRMhaNaM bhavati| CamanaM nasyaM pUrvoktairatIkSNaiH snehairghRtAdibhistathA mAMsarasAdibhiryojayet| tathA, kSIreNa jalena ceti| suCrutastu spaSTataramuvAca (ci. a. 40|22)- "tattu nasyaM deyaM vAtAbhibhUte Cirasi dantakeCaCmaCruprapAtadAruNakakarNaCUlakarNakSveDatimirasvaropaghAtanAsAroga mukhaCoSeSvakAlajavalIpalitaprAdurbhAve dAruNaprabodhe vAtapaittikeSu cAnyeSu mukharogeSu vAtapittaharadravyasiddhena sneheneti| CirovirecanaM CleSmaNA~abhivyAptatAlukaNThaCirasAM nidrAbhibhUtAnAM  CirogauravaCUlapInasArddhAvabhedakakRmipratiCyAyApasmAragandhAjJAneSvanyeSu cordhvajatrugateSu kaphajeSu vikAreSu Cirovirecanadravyaistatsiddhena vA sneheneti|" tathA-"samyagviCuddhe Cirasi sarpirnasto niSecayet| avapIDastu CirovirecanavadabhiSyandasarpadaSTavisaMjJebhyo dadyAt, CirovirecanadravyANAmanyatamamavapiSyAvapIDya ca| cetovikArakRmiviSAbhipannAnAM cUrNaM pradhamet| CarkarekSurasakSIraghRtamAMsarasAnAmanyatamaM kSINAnAM CoNitapitte ca vidadhyAt| kRCadurbalabhIrUNAM sukumArasya yoSitAm| CRtAH snehAH CiraHCuddhyai kalkastebhyo yathA hitaH||" iti|  

A0 ra0-bRMhaNanasyasya dravyANyAha -bRMhaNamiti|  asRk-rudhiram|  khapuro-niryAso mocarasAdiH|  apiCabdAt bRMhaNadravyasAdhitasnehAdibhiCca|      Camananasyasya dravyANyAha-Camanamiti|  pUrvaiH-dhanvamAMsarasAdibhiH CamanauSadhasAdhitasnehAdibhiCca|

marCaCca pratimarCaCca dvidhA sneho~atra mAtrayA||7|| kalkAdyairavapIDastu sa tIkSNairmUrddharecanaH||7|| dhmAnaM virecanaCcUrNo-----------------------------||8||

sa0-atra-eSu nasyabhedeSu madhye, marCAkhyaH pratimarCAkhyaCceti sneho dvidhA-bhedadvayena bhavati| katham ? mAtrayA,-mAtrAbhedena, na tu vastubhedena| kalkAdyairityAdi| turavadhAraNe bhinnakramaH| kalkAdyairevAvapIDaH, na snehenApi| sa cAvapIDaH, tIkSNaiH-CuNThyAdibhiH kalkakvAtharasAdyaiH, na mRdubhiH| mUrddharecanaH-CirovirecanAkhyaM nAmAntaramasya| atIkSNaistu CamanasaMjJametadvirecanaM nasyam| punaH prakArAntaramAha-dhmAnamityAdi| cUrNo-marIcAdibhiH kRto, nAsayA praNIyamAno virecano-bahirdoSanirasano, dhmAnaM-pradhmAnAkhyaM nasyaM syAt|  

A0 ra0-marCAdIn paJca nasyabhedAnAha-marCaCceti|  marCapratimarCau-snehasya bahutvAlpatvakRtau bhedau|  avapIDaCirovirecanau-kalkAdinasyasya mRdutvatIkSNatvakRtau bhedau|  virecanacUrNakRtaM nasyaM dhmAnam-pradhamanAkhyam|  iti paJca|

yuJjyAttaM mukhavAyunA||8|| SaDaGguladvimukhayA nADyA bheSajagarbhayA||8||  sa hi bhUritaraM doSaM cUrNatvAdapakarSati||9||

sa0-taM-cUrNaM, mukhavAyunA-phUtkArAkhyena, yuJjyAt-praveCayet| katham ? nADyA, kAraNabhUtayA| kimbhUtayA ? SaDaGguladvimukhayA,-SaDaGgulAni yasyAH sA SaDaGgulA, dve mukhe yasyAH sA dvimukhA, SaDaGgulA cAsau dvimukhA ca SaDaGguladvimukhA, tayA| tathAvidhayA, tathA bheSajagarbhayA-trikaTukAdicUrNabharitayA| sa hi-cUrNo, bhUritaraM-bahutaraM, doSaM cUrNatvAdapakarSati, na tathA kalkakvAthAdayaH| tasmAdvirecanAkhyo~ayamityarthaH|

A0 ra0-pradhamanasya vidhimAha-yuJjyAditi|    pradhamanasya bahudoSaharatve yuktimAha-sa hIti|  cUrNaM hi bahudravagrAhitvAt bahudoSApakarSaNam|

pradeCinyaGgulIparvadvayAnmagnasamuddhRtAt||9||  yAvatpatatyasau bindurdaCASTau SaT krameNa te||10|| marCasyotkRSTamadhyonA mAtrAstA eva ca kramAt||10|| bindudvayonAH kalkAdeH-------------------------||11||

sa0-pradeCinI-aGguSThasamIpajA~aGgulI, tasyAH parvadvayaM, tasmAt| kimbhUtAt ? pUrvaM bhagnaM paCcAtsamuddhRtaM, tasmAt magnasamuddhRtAt tarjanIparvadvayAt yAvatparimANaM patati, asau binduH, 'ucyate' iti CeSaH| te-bindavo, yathAsaGkhyaM marCasya daCotkRSTA mAtrA, aSTau madhyamA mAtrA, SaT kaniSThA mAtrA| tA eva kramAnmAtrA bindudvayenonAH kalkasvarasAdeH| tenASTau bindava uttamA mAtrA, SaNmadhyamA, catvAraH kaniSThA, ityavatiSThate| yAvaditi yatparimANamasyeti| yattadetebhyaH parimANe vatup, A sarvanAmna ityAkArAdeCaH|

A0 ra0-marCAdimAnajJAnArthaM bindumAnamAha-pradeCinIti|  yAvatpatati tAvAn binduH, na prathamapatita eva|      marCasya mAtrAtrayamAha-daCASTAviti|  te-bindavaH|          avapIDaCirovirecanayormAtrAtrayamAha-tA eveti|  bindudvayonAH-aSTaSaTcaturbindukAH|

nasyavidhiH adhyAyaH

athAto nasyavidhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2|| iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||



UrdhvajatruvikAreSu viCeSAnnasyamiSyate||1||  nAsA hi Ciraso dvAraM tena tadvyApya hanti tAn||1|| virecanaM bRMhaNaM ca CamanaM ca tridhA~api tat||2||

sa0-jatru-vakSoMsayoH sandhiH| jatruNa UrdhvamUrdhvajatru| mayUravyaMsakAditvAt samAsaH| tatra vikArA UrdhvajatruvikArAH, teSUrdhvajatruvikAreSu-CirorogAdiSu viSaye, vamanaCirAvyadhAdayo~apISyanta eva| viCeSeNa tu nasyamiSyate| nAsAyAM kriyata iti nasyam| nAsikAyAH "paddanna" iti nasAdeCaH| nanu, kimiti nasyameteSu rogeSu viCeSeNeSTam ? ityAha-nAsA hItyAdi| yasmAt ghrANaM CirodvAram| tena dvAreNa CrotraCRGgATakaprAptamUrdhvaM netrakaNThAdiCirAmukhAnupraveCena, tat-Ciro, vyApya tAn-vikArAn hanti|tat-nasyaM, virecanabRMhaNaCamanAkhyabhedena tridhA syAt|

A0 ra0-nasyavidhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte atheti|      tatra nasyaviSayamAha-UrdhvajatruvikAreSviti|  viCeSAditivacanAditareSvapi|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 29) -"nAsayA praNIyamAnamauSadhaM nasyaM nAvanaM nastaH karmeti ca saMjJAM labhate|  nAsA hi Ciraso dvAram|  tatra niSecitamauSadhaM srotaHCRGgATakaM prApya, vyApya ca mUrddhAnaM netraCrotrakaNThAdiCirAmukhAni ca, muJjAdiSIkAmivAsaktAmUrddhvajatrugatAM vaikArikImaCeSAmACu doSasaMhatimuttamAGgAdapakarSati|" iti|[nasyabhedAnAha-virecanamiti|]  virecanaM bRMhaNaM CamanaM ceti trividhaM nasyam|

virecanaM CiraHCUlajADyasyandagalAmaye||2|| CophagaNDakRmigranthikuSThApasmArapInase||3||

sa0-CiraHCUlAdiSu virecanaM nasyamiSyate| apasmAro yadyapyUrdhvajatrusthito na bhavati, tathA~api virecananasyena CAmyatIti tadupAdAnam| upalakSaNaM cedam| kaphajeSu prasekAsyavairasyagandhAjJAnAdiSvapi virecanameva hitam|

A0 ra0-tatra virecanasya viSayamAha-virecanamiti|  jADyaM-CirasaH|  syando-netrakopaH|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 29) -"upadehakaNDUstambhasrAvaprasekavairasyArocakasvarabhedagandhAjJAnArbudadadrukoThAdiSu CleSmajeSu" iti|

yojayenna tu nAvanam||11|| toyamadyagarasnehapItAnAM pAtumicchatAm||11|| bhuktabhaktaCiraHsnAtasnAtukAmasrutAsRjAm||12|| navapInasavegArtasUtikACvAsakAsinAm||12|| CuddhAnAM dattabastInAM tathA~anArtavadurdine||13|| anyatrAtyayikAdvyAdheH-------------------||13||

sa0-toyAdi pItaM yaisteSAm| atra "AhitAgnyAditvAt" paranipAtaH| tathA pAtumicchatAM nAvanaM-nasyaM, naiva yojayet| toyAdipItAnAM pAtumicchatAM ca yojitaM nasyaM nAsAsyasyandopadehatimiraCirorogAn kuryAt| bhuktabhaktasya ca doSA UrdhvasrotAMsyAvRtya chardiCvAsakAsapratiCyAyAn janayeyuH| Cirobhyaktasya ca CirokSikarNaCUlakaNTharogapInasahanumanyAstambhArditaCiraHkampAn| CiraHsnAtasya snAtukAmasya ca mUrdhni stimito doSo jADyArucipInasAn| srutaraktasya ca kSAmatAmarucimagnisAdaM ca| navapratiCyAyasya srotorodhAt duSTapratiCyAyakeCaCAtakRmikaNDUvicarcikArogAn| mUtritoccAritAdivegArtAnAM bhRCataraM vegavidhAraNajAn vikArAn| sUtikAyAH srutaraktadoSAn| CvAsakAsinorvyAdhivivRddhim| CuddhAnAM kRtavamanavirecanAdInAM CvAsakAsasvarendriyahAniCirogauravakaNDUkRmidoSAn| dattabastInAM vivRtasrotastayA~ativyAptyA CvAsakAsAdIneva| tathA, anArtavadurdine sahasaiva CaityAcchirorugvepathustaimityatAlunetrakaNDUpAkamanyAstambhakaNTharoga pratiCyAyArUMSikAH| eSu ca nasyadoSeSu jAteSu yathAsvamAyatanaM doSodrekaM cApekSya snehasvedaCirovirekavaktralepasekatIkSNAvapIDadhUmagaNDUSAdIni yathAsvaM kuryAt| saGgrahe viCeSaH (sU. a. 29)- "garbhiNyACca bhaktadveSajvaramUrcchArddhAvabhedakAH syuH| apatyaM ca vyaGgaM vikalendriyamunmAdApasmArayuktaM vA syAt| viCeSeNa tu garbhiNI rUkSe nasyakarmaNi varSAbhUkAkolIkapikacchUbhiH CRtaM payaH pibet| balAvidAryaMCumatImedAbhirvA| ebhireva ca CRtaM haviH| vAtaharasiddhaCca snehaH Cirobastau karNapUraNe ca yojyaH| sarvaM ca bRMhaNamannapAnam|" iti| toyapItAdiSu sadaiva kiM nasyaM na yojyam ? ityAha-anyatretyAdi| Atyayike vyAdhau nasyaM yojyameva|

A0 ra0-pItatoyAdInAM nasyaM niSedhati-yojayediti|  pAtumicchatAM-toyAdInyeva|  bhuktabhakto-bhuktavAn|  navapInasaH-apakvapInasaH|  vegArtaH-utpannaviNmUtrAdivegaH|  anArtavadurdine-avArSikAbhre|  AtyayikAdvyAdheranyatra niSedhaH|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 29) -"tatra bhuktabhaktasya nasyenerito doSa UrdhvasrotAMsyAvRtya chardiCvAsakAsapratiCyAyAn janayet|  snehAdipItapAtukAmAnAmakSinAsAsyasyandopadehatimiraCirorogAn|  CiraHsnAtasya CirokSikarNaCUlakaNTharogapInasahanumanyAstambhArditaCiraHkampAn|  snAtukAmasya mUrddhastaimityajADyArucipInasAn|  srutaraktasya kSAmatAmarucimagnisAdaM ca|  mUtritoccAritAdivegArtAnAM bhRCataraM vegavidhAraNajAn vikArAN|  abhihatasya tIvratarAM rujam|  kRtavamanAdInAM CvAsakAsasvarendriyahAniCirorogagauravakaNDUkRmidoSAn|  [ dattabastInAM vivRtasrotastayA~ativyAptyA CvAsa kAsAdIneva| ] garbhiNyA bhaktadveSajvaramUrcchArdhAvabhedakAH syuH, apatyaM ca vyaGgaM vikalendriyamunmAdApasmArayuktaM vA|  sUtiyAyAH srutaraktoktAN doSAn|  navapratiCyAyasya srotorodhAt duSTapratiCyAyakeCaCAtakRmikaNDUvicarcikAH|  CvAsakAsinorvAtavyAdhivRddhiH|  akAladurdine sahasaiva CaityAcchirorugvepathustaimityatAlunetrakaNDUpAkamanyAstambhakaNTharogapratiCyAyArUMSikAH|  teSu yathAsvamAyatanaM doSodrekaM cApekSya snehasvedaCirovaktralepasekatIkSNAvapIDadhUmagaNDUSAdInAcaret|  viCeSeNa tu garbhiNI rUkSe nasyakarmaNi varSAbhUkAkolIkapikacchUbhiH CRtaM payaH pibet|  balAvidAryaMCumatImedAbhirvA|  Abhireva ca CRtaM haviH|  vAtaharasiddhaCca snehaH Cirobastau karNapUraNe ca yojyaH|  sarvaM ca bRMhaNamannapAnam|  bhuktabhaktAdiSvapi cAtyayikavyAdhyAturamapekSeta|" iti|

-------------------------atha nasyaM prayojayet||13||  prAtaH CleSmaNi, madhyAhne pitte, sAyaMniCoCcale||14|| svasthavRtte tu pUrvAhNe CaratkAlavasantayoH||14|| CIte madhyaMdine, grISme sAyaM varSAsu sAtape||15|| vAtAbhibhUte Cirasi hidhmAyAmapatAnake||15|| manyAstambhe svarabhraMCe sAyaMprAtardinedine||16|| ekAhAntaramanyatra----------------------------||16||

sa0-pUrvaM snigdhaM paCcAt svinnamuttamAGgaM-Ciro, yasya tasya| tathA, prAk-pUrvaM, kRtamAvaCyakaM-avaCyakaraNIyamuccAramUtrotsargadantadhAvanAdikaM, yena sa prAkkRtAvaCyakaH, tasya| tathA, nivAtasthAne CayanaM yattatra sthitasya sataH, bhUyo jatrUrdhvaM svedayet| athetyAdi| atha-anantaram, uttAnaspaSTasthitaCarIrasya sato hastacaraNe prasArite, tathA kiJcidunnatacaraNasya kiJcicchirasi nAmite sati, nAsApuTamekaM pidhAya-sthagayitvA, paryAyeNa-na tu yugapat, bhaiSajyaM niSecayet| kIdRCam ? uSNAmbutaptaM,- uSNodakoSNIkRtam| kena pariSecayet ? praNADyA, athavA picunA-kArpAsAdimayena| datte nasye sati pAdatalaskandhahastakarNAdi mardayet| AdiCabdena grIvAlalATAdiparigrahaH| suCrute cAbhyadhAyi (ci. a. 40|25)- "vastrAvacchAditanetrAya vAmahastapradeCinyagronnAmitanAsikAgrAya viCuddhasrotasi dakSiNahastena snehamuSNAmbuprataptaM rajatasuvarNatAmramaNimRtpAtraCuktInAmanyatamasthamanavacchinnadhAramAsiJcet|" iti| CanairityAdi| tato-mardanAnantaraM, Canairucchidya pArCvayorubhayorniSThIvet| (saGgrahe tu sU. a. 29)- "anabhyavaharan| kaphasahitamabhyavahRtamagnimavasAdayeddoSaM ca saMvarddhayet| ekapArCvaniSThIvane na sarvAH CirA bheSajena samyagvyApyante| punaHpunaCcainaM svedayet|" evaM-anena krameNa, AbheSajakSayAt kuryAt| (prAyaH saGgrahokto~ayamagrimo granthaH-) na tu nasyamAtrA sakRdeva prakSeptavyA| hInamAtraM cauSadhaM na deyam| taddhi doSAnutkleCyAnirharan gauravArucikAsaprasekapInasacchardikaNTharogAn kuryAt| adhikamatiyogadoSAn kuryAt| sakRdeva sarvaM dattamucchindyamAnaM CirorogapratiCyAyaghrANakledAnucchvAsoparodhaM ca kuryAt| atyuSNaM dAhapAkajvararaktAgama [ CirorugdRSTidaurbalya ] mUrchAbhramAn| atiCItaM hInadoSAneva| atyunnataCirasaH samyagapratipadyamAnaM tAneva hInadoSAn| atyavanataCiraso dUragamanAnmUrcchAjADya [ kaNDUdAha ] jvarAn| saGkucitagAtrasya samyagdhamanIraprApnuvaddoSotkleCaM [ vedanAM stambhaM vA ] kuryAt|

sa0-bastau netraM bastinetram, bastinetreNa samaM-tulyaM, dravyaM-dhAtudArvasthiveNujaM, yasya-dhUmanetrasya, tadbastinetrasamadravyaM dhUmanetraM CilpinA kArayedbhiSak| kimbhUtaM netram ? trayaH koCAH parvANi, yasya tat trikoCam| tathA, Rju-avakam| tathA, mUlaM cAgraM ca tasmin yathAsaGkhyamaGguSThabadarAsthipraveCam| mUle~aGguSThapraveCamagre kolAsthipraveCamityarthaH| aGguSThaCca kolAsthi ceti samAhAradvandvaH| tatpraviCatyasminniti "padarujaviCanti" iti ghaJ|

tIkSNasnehanamadhyeSu trINi catvAri paJca ca||8|| aGgulAnAM kramAtpAtuH pramANenASTakAni tat||9||

sa0-yathAsaGkhyaM dairghyeNa tIkSNasya trINyaSTakAni-caturviMCatiraGgulAni, syuH| snehane ca dhUme catvAryaSTakAni-dvAtriMCadaGgulAni, syuH| madhyame ca dhUme paJcASTakAni-catvAriMCadaGgulAni, syuH| parvAnekatvaM sUkSmatvaM dairghyaM ca netrasyeha kRtam| evaM hi nayanakarNAdInAM na bAdhako dhUmaH syAditi| tathA ca muniH (ca.sU.a.5|48)-"dUrAdvinirgataH parvacchinno nADItanUkRtaH| nendriyaM bAdhate dhUmaH" iti|

A0 ra0-tIkSNAdibhedena dhUmanetrasya pramANamAha-tIkSNasnehanamadhyeSviti|  dhUmapAGgulAni caturviMCatistIkSNanetram, dvAtriMCatsnigdhanetram, catvAriMCanmadhyanetram|  saGgrahe tu (sU.a. 30)-"evaM hi dhUmo dUrAtpravRtto netrasya parvacchedAdUrdhvaM tanutayA ca CanaiH CliSyannabAdhako bhavati|" iti|  tathA (saM. sU. a. 30)-"kAsaghne vAmane ca daCAGgulam|  vraNadhUpanArthamaSTAGgulam|  kalAyaparimaNDalaM kulatthavAhisrota iti|  kAsaghnAdiSu tu netrAbhAve nalavaMCairaNDAdInAmanyatamAM nADIM yojayet|" iti|

RjUpaviSTastaccetA vivRtAsyastriparyayam||9|| pidhAya cchidramekaikaM dhUmaM nAsikayA pibet||10||

sa0-Rju-spaSTaM, upaviSTaH-AsInaH| tathA, taccetAH-dhUmapAnagatacittaH| tathA, prasAritamukhaH| tathA, netragatadRSTirityapi draSTavyam| kathaM pibet ? triparyayam| AkSepavisargau-ApAnaH, tribhirApAnaiH-paryayaH| tathA, chidramekaikaM pidhAya, prakRtatvAnnAsikAyA eva| tadevaMvidhaH san nAsikayA pibet| ekaikamiti "ekaM bahuvrIhivat" iti dvitvasublopau| tenAyamarthaH,-  ekaM  nAsApuTaM pidhAyApareNa nAsApuTenAkRSya dhUmaM pibet| aparaM nAsApuTaM pidhAya tadapareNAkRSya tathaiva pibedityarthaH|

A0 ra0-dhUmapAnavidhimAha-RjUpaviSTa iti|  triparyayaM-triparivartam|  vAmaM pidhAya dakSiNena pibet dakSiNaM pidhAya vAmena pibedityekaH parivartaH|  saGgrahe tu (sU.a.30)-"prAkRtocchvAsaniHCvAso netrAgraniviSTadRSTiH|" iti|

prAk pibennAsayotkliSTe doSe ghrANaCirogate||10|| utkleCanArthaM vaktreNa, viparItaM tu kaNThage||11||

sa0-nAsAgate Cirogate vA doSa utkliSTe-svasthAnAccalite sati, prAk-pUrvaM, nAsikayA pibet| anutkliSTe doSa utkleCanArthaM vaktreNa prAk pibet, paCcAnnasikayA| kaNThage tu doSa utkleCanArthaM prAGnAsikayA pibet paCcAdvaktreNeti viparItatvam|

A0 ra0-doSasthAnAvasthAbhedena dhUmapAne viCeSamAha-prAk pibediti|  ghrANaCirogate doSe svayamutkliSTe CodhanArthaM yo dhUmastaM pUrvaM nAsikayA pibet, paCcAdvaktreNa|  tasminnevAnutkliSTe utkleSanArthaM yo dhUmastaM pUrvaM vaktreNa pibet, paCcAnnAsikayA| kaNThage tUtkliSTe prAgvaktreNa,paCcAnnAsikayA | anutkliSTe prAGnAsikayA, paCcAdvaktreNa|

jatrUrdhvakaphavAtotthavikArANAmajanmane||1|| ucchedAya ca jAtAnAM pibeddhUmaM sadA~~AtmavAn||1|| snigdho madhyaH sa tIkSNaCca, vAte vAtakaphe kaphe||2||  yojyaH--------------------------------------------||2||

sa0-AtmavAn-sumatirhitAhAravihAro, jatruNa UrdhvaM CleSmavAtodbhavAnAM vikArANAM-rogANAM, ajanmane-anutpattyai, tathotpannAnAmucchedAya-vinACAya, sadA dhUmaM pibet|sa ca dhUmaH snigdhamadhyatIkSNabhedena tridhA| yathAkramaM vAte snigdho, vAtakaphe madhyaH, kaphe tIkSNo, yojyaH|

A0 ra0-dhUmapAnavidhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte|  atheti|    dhUmabhedAnAha-snigdha iti|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 30)-"tatra CamanaH prAyogiko madhyama iti paryAyAH, bRMhaNaH snehano mRduriti, Codhano virecanastIkSNa iti ca|" iti| "tathA kAsaghno vAmano vraNadhUpanaCca|" ityanyadbhedatrayam|           

 -------------------na raktapittArtiviriktodaramehiSu||2|| timirordhvAnilAdhmAnarohiNIdattabastiSu||3|| matsyamadyadadhikSIrakSaudrasnehaviSACiSu||3|| Cirasyabhihate pANDuroge jAgarite niCi||4||

sa0-raktapittArtyAdiSu dhUmo nAvachAraNIyaH| nanu, vAte vAtakaphe kaphe ca dhUmasyAnujJAtatvAt pittArtau prAptireva nAsti| tatkiM pratiSedhena? brUmaH| vAtaprakRtervAtapittArtau satyAM kaCcidbhiSakpACo bhrAntyA prakRtyanurUpopakramacikIrSayA dhUmaM yojayet, tanniSedhArthamidamuktam| athavA vAtaCleSmaprakRteH pittArtau pittaprakRtervA vAtaCleSmArtau dhUmo na yojya iti pratipAdanArthamidaM gaditam| aCiCabdo matsyAdiSu viSAnteSu pratyekaM yojyaH| atra ca yathAsambhavaM pAnaM madyAdeH, bhojanaM ca matsyAdeH aCanaCabdenocyate| caturvidhe~apyAhAre aCanaCabdenAstyeva vyavahAraH| yathA (hR.sU.a. 8|1)-"mAtrACI sarvakAlaM syAt" iti kecicca yavAgUpAyinyapi dhUmapAnaM necchanti|

A0 ra0-gaNDUSavidhimAha-nivAta iti|  saGgrahe tu  (sU.a.31)-"sukhopaviSTastanmanAH svinnamRditagalakapolalalATadeCo varamadhyAvarAM kramAdvaktrArdhabhAgatribhAgacaturbhAgapUraNIM dravamAtrAM kalkaM vA kolapramANam|  kavale tu paryAyeNa kapolau kaNThaM ca saJcArayet|  ayameva kavalagaNDUSayorviCeSaH|  punaCcAsya svedamardanAnyAcaret|  evamutkliSTakapho vaktraM pratipadyate|" iti|

kaphapUrNAsyatA yAvatsravadghrANAkSatA~athavA||11||

sa0-kaphena pUrNaM kaphapUrNamAsyaM yasya sa kaphapUrNAsyaH, tasya bhAvaH kaphapUrNAsyatA,-kaphapUrNamukhatA, yAvadbhavet| athavA sravat ghrANAkSi yasya sa sravadghrANAkSaH, "bahuvrIhau sakthyakSNoH" iti Sac| tasya bhAvaH sravadghrANAkSatA yAvatsyAt, tAvadgaNDUSAn dhArayet| evaM gaNDUSAH paJca sapta vA dhArayitavyAH, yAvatsvAsthyaM syAt|

A0 ra0-gaNDUSadhAraNAvadhimAha-kaphapUrNAsyateti|  saGgrahe tu (sU. a. 31)-"bheSajasyAnupahatiH kaphena|  evaM trIn paJca sapta vA gaNDUSAn dhArayet|  yAvadvA samyagdhUmapItaliGgotpattiH|  tasya svAsthyena yogaM, jADyarasAjJAnAruciprasekopalepairayogaM, mukhaCoSapAkaklamArucihRdayadravasvarasAdakarNanAdairatiyogamupalakSayet|  teSAM yathAsvaM pratikurvIta|" iti|

asaJcAryo mukhe pUrNe gaNDUSaH, kavalo~anyathA||12||

sa0-mukhe pUrNe sati yaH saJcArayitumaCakyaH syAt sa gaNDUSa ucyate| anyathA-mukhe~apUrNe sati yaH saJcArayituM Cakyate, sa kavala ucyate|

A0 ra0-gaNDUSakavalayorbhedamAha-asaJcArya iti|  apUrNe-kiJcidUne, saGgrahe tathaivoktatvAt|  kavalo~anyathA-kapolau kaNThaM ca saJcAryaH|

manyACiraHkarNamukhAkSirogAH    prasekakaNThAmayavaktraCoSAH||12|| hRllAsatandrArucipInasACca    sAdhyA viCeSAtkavalagraheNa||12||

sa0-tasya-CirobastervidhAnamucyate| niSaNNasya-upaviSTasya narasya| kva ? pIThe jAnutulye, tathA mRdau-akaThine| kimbhUtasya narasya ? Cuddho-vamanAdinA, aktaH-tailAdinA, svinnaH-svedena, deho yasya tasya CuddhAktasvinnadehasya| kadA ? dinAnte,-aparAhne vibhAvaryAM vA| carmapaTTaM-gavyaM mAhiSaM vA, tathA dvAdaCAGgulavistIrNaM, tathA CirastulyaM, tathA~~AkarNaM-karNaM yAvat, bandhanasthAnaM yasya, tadevaMvidhaM carmapaTTaM cailaveNikayA saMyamya mASakalkena lepayet| kadA ? lalATe vastraveSTite| saGgrahe tUktam (sU.a.31)-"atha CuddhatanoH sAyaM rAtrau vA nivAtasthasya svabhyaktasvinnasya sopACrayAsanopaviSTasya keCAnte ClakSNaM tryaGgulaM mASapiSTena susUkSmeNa sadyaH sukhAmbunA mRditenobhayataH pradigdhaM vastrapaTTaM badhnIyAt| tatastasyopari sandhAya bastimAkarNaM bastimUlaM ca dRDhamavalIkaM samaM cailaveNikayA baddhvA punarmASapiSTenAparisrAvi kRtvA yathAvyAdhi doSadUSyahitaM siddhamanyatamaM snehaM sukhoSNamAsecayet|" iti| tata evaM kRte sati vyAdhivaCena pakvaM snehaM koSNamupariccidreNAvasecayet| keCabhUmerupariSTAdaGgulaM yAvat|       

A0 ra0-CirobastividhimAha-vidhistasyeti|  lalATaCabdena keCarahitaH pradeCaH, tasmin vastraveSTite|  AkarNaM-karNAdadho na veSTayedityarthaH, AbandhanasthAnaM-yAvati pradeCe basterbandhanaM tAvantaM pradeCaM veSTayet|  CiraHsamaM-CiraHparidhimityarthaH|  veSTanavastramapyubhayato mASakalkena lepayet|  uktaM hi saGgrahe (sU.a. 31)-"keCAnte ClakSNaM tryaGgulaM susUkSmeNa mASapiSTena sadyaH sukhAmbumRditenobhayataH pradigdhaM vastrapaTTaM badhnIyAt|" iti|

sa0-ACcotanaM cAJjanaM ca, tayorvidhiryasminnadhyAye sa evam| CeSaM pUrvavat|

A0 ra0-ACcotanAJjanavidhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-atheti|

sarveSAmakSirogANAmAdAvACcotanaM hitam||1|| ruktodakaNDUgharSACrudAharAganibarhaNam||1||

sa0-sakalAnAmapi nayanAmayAnAM prathamamACcotanaM-pariSeko, hitam| yatastadACcotanamupayuktaM rujAdighnaM syAt| saGgrahe coktam (sU.a.32)-"avyakteSveva rujAdiSu tulyaguNaM pakSmaparihAreNACcotanenaivAkSikoCAlepanam| tacca biDAlakasaMjJam|" iti|

A0 ra0-ACcotanasya viSayamAha-sarveSAmiti|  saGgrahe tu (sU.a.32)-"nAnAdravyakalpanayA ca rAgACrugharSarugdAhatodabhedapAkaCophakaNDUghnam|  avyakteSvevaMguNameva pakSmaparihAreNAkSikoCAlepanam|  tacca punarbiDAlasaMjJam|  tayorakAlo rAtriH|  kAlastu sarvamaharvedanotpattirvA|" iti|

 uSNaM vAte, kaphe koSNaM, tacchItaM raktapittayoH||2||

sa0-tat-ACcotanaM, marutyuSNaM, kaphe kiJciduSNaM, rakte pitte ca CItaM, hitam|

A0 ra0-ACcotanasya doSabhedenoSnatvAdi vidhatte|  uSNamiti|

 nivAtasthasya vAmena pANinonmIlya locanam||2|| Cuktau pralambayA~anyena picuvartyA kanInike||3|| daCa dvAdaCa vA bindUn dvyaGgulAdavasecayet||3|| tataH pramRjya mRdunA cailena, kaphavAtayoH||4|| anyena koSNapAnIyaplutena svedayenmRdu||4||

sa0-nivAtasthAnasthitasyAturasya vaidyo vAmena pANinonmIlya locanamapAGgadeCe bhAjanaM nidhAya, anyena-dakSiNakareNa, picuvartyA CuktyAM pralambayA daCa dvAdaCa vA bindUn dvyaGgulAt-nAtinikaTAnnAtidUrAt, kanInike~avasecayet| tata iti anantaraM, komalena vastrakhaNDena pramRjya-CodhayitvA, anyena-CodhanAt, cailena koSNajalaplutenAkSi mRdu svedayet-nAtiCayena| kayordoSayoH? vAtakaphayoH,-na tu pittaraktayorityarthaH|

A0 ra0-ACcotanavidhimAha-nivAtasthasyeti|  anyena-dakSiNena hastena|  Cuktau pralambayA-CuktisthadravanimagnArddhayA|  kanInake-nAsAsaMlagnanetrAnte|  dvyaGgulAt-netravartyagrayordvyaGgulamantaraM kRtvA|  saGgrahe tu (sU.a.32)-"evamasya na bindupAtenAkSitADanAdrAgAdayo jAyante|" iti|       ACcotanAnantaraM kRtyamAha-tataH pramRjyeti|  pramArjanaM sarvatra|  kaphavAtayostvanyena cailena svedanaM ca|

atyuSNatIkSNaM rUgrAgadRGnACAyAkSisecanam||5|| atiCItaM tu kurute nistodastambhavedanAH||5|| kASAyavartmatAM gharSaM kRcchrAdunmeSaNaM bahu||6|| vikAravRddhimatyalpaM saMrambhamaparisrutam||6||

sa0-atyarthamuSNamatitIkSNaM vA~~ACcotanaM ruje-rogAya, rAgAya-lohitimre, dRgvinACAya ca syAt| atiCItaM tvakSisecanaM nistodAdIn vidhatte| nistodaH-sUcyeva vyadhaH| stambhaH akSNaH stambhanamiva| vedanA-CUlam| kaSAyavartmatvaM kurute| gharSo-vartmanoH parasparaM saMCleSaH| bahu-atimAtraM, ACcotanaM kRcchreNonmeSaNaM vidhatte| atyalpamakSisecanaM vikAravRddhiM kurute|  aparisrutamakSisecanaM saMrambhaM-netrakSobhaM, vidhatte|          

A0 ra0-atyuSNatIkSNasyACcotanasya doSamAha-atyuSNatIkSNamiti|         atiCItasya doSamAha-atiCItaM tviti|         atimAtrasya doSamAha-kaSAyavartmatAmiti|  kaSAyavartmatAM rUkSavartmatvam|         atyalpasya doSamAha-vikAravRddhimiti|         netrAdaparisrutasya doSamAha-saMrambhamiti|  saMrambhaM-CophAdiprAdurbhAvam|

gatvA sandhiCiroghrANamukhasrotAMsi bheSajam||7|| UrdhvagAnnayane nyastamapavartayate malAn||7||

sa0-sandhyAdInAM dvandvaH| tataH srotaHCabdena SaSThIsamAsaH| sandhiCabdenehAkSikoCasambandhinaH sandhayo gRhyante| tena-akSikoCasandhisrotAMsi CirAsrotAMsi ghrANasrotAMsi mukhasrotAMsi gatvA nayane kSiptamauSadhamUrdhvagAn malAnapavartayate|

A0 ra0-ACcotanasya phalamAha-gatveti|  netre nyastamauSadhaM sandhyAdIn gatvA jatrUrdhvagAn rogAn hanti|

athAJjanaM CuddhatanornetramAtrACraye male||8|| pakvaliGge~alpaCophAtikaNDUpaicchilyalakSite||8|| mandagharSACrurAge~akSNi prayojyaM ghanadUSike||9||  Arte pittakaphAsRgbhirmArutena viCeSataH||9||

sa0-atha-ACcotanAdanantaraM, aJjanaM prayoktavyam| kIdRCasyAturasya? CuddhA tanuryasya  saH, tasya| male netramAtrACraye-na tvadhikaCarIravyApini| tathA, pakvaliGge| pakvaliGgatA kathaM vedyA? iti viCeSaNadvAreNAha-alpaCophenAtikaNDvA paicchilyena ca lakSite-avagate, 'pakvaliGge sati| kIdRCe~akSNi? mandAH-alpAH, gharSACrurAgA yasya tasmin| tathA, ghanA dUSikA-netramalo, yasminnayane tasmin| etadapi pakvaliGgameva| pittena kaphena raktena cAture, mArutena cAture viCeSeNAJjanaM prayojyam|

A0 ra0-aJjanasya viSayamAha-athAJjanamiti|  CophAlpatvAdyupalakSIte pakvalakSaNe sati, tathA gharSAdyalpatve dUSikAghanatve ca|

 lekhanaM ropaNaM dRSTiprasAdanamiti tridhA||10|| aJjanam------------------------------------||10||

sa0-aJjanaM ca lekhanAdibhedena tridhA| likhyate-CastreNeva, CukrArmAdInIti lekhanam| ropyate-saMrohyate, abhiSyandAdInIti ropaNam| prasAdyate-nirmalIkriyate, aneneti prasAdanam| dRSTeH prasAdanaM dRSTiprasAdanam| saGgrahe yat snehanamaJjanaM kathitaM tadiha ropaNadRSTiprasAdanayorevAntarbhUtatvAt pRthaGnoktam|

A0 ra0-aJjanasya bhedAnAha-lekhanamiti|  saGgrahe tu (sU.a. 32)-"na doSavegodaye, na cAnirhRtadoSe|  tatra hi doSotkleCena rAgAdivRddhiH CukrapAkatimirotpattiCca|" iti|

 ----------------------lekhanaM tatra kaSAyAmlapaTUSaNaiH||10||

sa0-anekaprakArANi yAni CalyAni-CastraveNupASANAdirUpANi, vividheSu CarIrapradeCeSu niviCante, teSAmAharaNe AkraSTuM, yo~abhyupAyastadyantram| 'ucyate' iti CeSaH| tathA, arCobhagandaranADIvraNAdInAM CastrAdiyojane sati CeSasya-nirujasyAGgasya, parirakSAyAM-rakSAnimittam, svasthasyAGgasya CastrAdyAbAdhAnivRttyarthamityarthaH| tathA, bastinasyAdikarmaNi ya upAyastacca yantram| tathA ghaTikAdi ca yantraM pavanAkarSaNAya raktAdyAkarSaNAya ca| jAmbavauSThasandaMCAdIni ca yantrANi|

sa0-rUpANi ca kAryANi ca rUpakAryANi| anekAni vicitrANi, rUpakAryANi teSAM tAni yantrANi nAnAprakArANi| tatra rUpaM-kaGkamukhasvastikAdyAkAratvam| kAryaM-asthyAdilagnaCalyaharaNAdikam| yataCcaivaM yantrANAM nAnAvidhatvam, atastAni buddhyA vikalpya kAryAnurodhAt kalpayet|      yAni yAni sthUlAni yathAsthUlam| "yathA sAdRCye" ityavyayIbhAvaH| yathAsthUlayantrakaraNena vyutpannamatiH CeSANAmapi yantrANAmutpAdane vikalpaM kartuM samartho bhavediti bhAvaH|

sa0-yena pArCvena Calyamuddhriyate tadyantrANAM mukhaM vedyam| kaGkAdInAM pakSimRgANAM mukhaistulyAni yantrANAM mukhAni kuryAt| AdiCabdena gRdhrahaMsahariNAdiparigrahaH|  tAni tatsaMjJakAni| ca evArthe, tAni yantrANi tannAmAnyeva| yathA,-kaGkamukhaM siMhamukhamityAdi|  aSTAdaCAGguletyAdi, svastikAkhyAni yantrANi vidyAt| kIdRCAni ? aSTAdaCAGguladairghyANi, bhUriCo-bAhulyena, AyasAni-CastramayAni| dantAdimayAnAmapi kvaciddarCanAt bhUriCa ityuktam| tathA, kaNThapradeCe kIlakairbaddhAni| kIdRCaiH kIlakaiH ? masUrAkArAH paryantA yeSAM taiH| yatra pradeCe yantrANAM hastagrahastatra tanmUlam| tatrAGkuCavannatAni-pariNatAni| taiH-kaGkamukhAdibhiH, asthisaMlagnaCalyasya-kANDaphalAdeH, AharaNaM-AkarSaNamiSyate|

sa0-arCasAM sambandhi yantrakaM gostanAkRti caturaGgulaM mAnato dairghyeNa syAt| yantrakamityAkarSakaM syAt| nAhe-pariNAhe, paJcAGgulam| yatpaJcAGguladIrgheNa sUtreNa veSTyate, tatpramANaM sthaulyamityarthaH| etat puMsAmeva paJcAGgulaM nAhe syAt| strINAM tu pariNAhe SaDaGgulaM yantrakaM syAt, svabhAvata eva tAsAM gudasya mahattvAt| vyAdherdarCane dvicchidraM-ubhayapArCvacchidraM yantram|  karmaNi-CastrakSArAdyavacAraNe, ekacchidraM yantram| asya yantrasya madhye tryaGgulaM chidram| aGguSThamadhyatulyavistAraM, tathA tadUrdhvato~ardhAGgulocchritA udvRttA karNikA yasya tadevam|

CalAkAjAmbavauSThAnAM kSAre~agnau ca pRthak trayam||36|| yuJjyAt sthUlANudIrghANAM----------------------------------||36||

sa0-CalAkACca jAmbavauSThAni ca teSAM pRthak trayaM kSAre kSArapAtane, [ Agnau-] AgnidAhakaraNe ca yuJjyAt| kimbhUtAnAM  CalAkAjAmbavauSThAnAm ? sthUlANudIrghANAM,-sthUlACcANavaCca dIrghACca, teSAm| tatra CalAkAstistro jAmbavauSThAni ca trINi, kSAre tathA dAhane, evaM dvAdaCaitAni CalAkAkhyAni yantrANIti|

A0 ra0-kSArAgniprayogArthaM tisraH CalAkAstrINi ca jAmbavauSThAnyAha-CalAkAjAmbavauSThAnAmiti|  sthUlaM ca sthUlA ca aNuCca aNu ca dIrghA ca dIrghaM ca tAni sthUlANudIrghANItyekaCeSeNa nirdeCaH|  aNu-sUkSmaM hrasvaM ca|  tena sthUladIrghaM sUkSmahrasvaM madhyaM ceti trividhaM CalAkAyantraM jAmbavauSThaM ca|  jambUphalavadoSTho yasya tajjAmbavauSTham, CalAkAviCeSa eva|  saGgrahe~apyuktam (sU.a. 34)-"kSArAgnikarmArthaM jAmbavauSThAni dvAdaCadaCASTAGgulAni kramAt dvyaGgulAGgulArddhAGgulaphalAni|  CalAkACca sthUlasUkSmadIrghahrasvamadhyAH|" iti|

SaDviMCatiH sukarmArairghaTitAni yathAvidhi||1|| CastrANi romavAhIni bAhulyenAGgulAni SaT||1|| surUpANi sudhArANi sugrahANi ca kArayet||2||  akarAlAni sudhmAtasutIkSNAvartite~ayasi||2||  samAhitamukhAgrANi nIlambhojacchavIni ca||3|| nAmAnugatarUpANi sadA sannihitAni ca||3|| svonmAnArdhacaturthAMCaphalAnyekaikaCo~api ca||4||  prAyo dvitrANi, yuJjIta tAni sthAnaviCeSataH||4|| (maNDalAgraM vRddhipatramutpalAdhyarddhadhArake |1| arpaiSaNyau vetasAkhyaM CarAryAsyatrikUrcake||1| kuCAsyaM sATavadanamantarvaktrArdhacandrake (kam)||2||  vrIhimukhaM kuThArI ca CalAkAGguliCastrake||2|  baDiCaM karapatrAkhyaM kartarI nakhaCastrakam||3||  dantalekhanakaM sUcyaH kUrco nAma khajAhvayam||3||  ArA caturvidhAkArA tathA syAtkarNavedhanI(nam)||3.5|| ||4||

sa0-bAhulyena CastrANi SaDaGgulAni bhavanti|  tathA SaDviMCatisaGkhyAni, tathA sukarmAraiH-karmakuCalairnaraiH, yathAvidhi { ghaTitAni }-samyaGniSpAditAni, tathA romavAhIni-lomaCAtanasamarthAni, tathA surUpANi-CobhanAkArANi, tathA sudhArANi-CobhanadhArANi, tathA sukhena gRhyante-sugrahANi ca, kArayet| kva ? ayasi| kIdRCe ? suSThu dhmAtaM sudhmAtaM, tathA sutIkSNaM svAvartitaM ca yadayaH-CastraM, tasmin| kIdRCAni CastrANi ? akarAlAni-sudarCanAni| tathA, samAhitaM-suSThukRtaM, mukhAgraM-phalaM, yeSAM tAni samAhitamukhAgrANi| tathA, nIlotpaladyutIni| tathA, nAmnA~anugataM rUpaM yeSAM tAni-anvarthanAmAnItyarthaH| tathA, sarvakAlaM sannihitAni-samIpasthAni| tathA, svaM ca tadunmAnaM ca svonmAnaM-AtmIyaM pramANaM, tasmAtsakACAdardham, tasya caturthAMCaH-aSTabhAgaH, phalaM yeSAM tAnyevam| api ceti samuccaye| evaMvidhAni CastrANyekaikaCaH sthAnaviCeSAt dvitrANi prayuJjIta| ekaikaCa iti "ekaM bahuvrIhivat " iti dvitvasublopau, tataH CaspratyayaH|

A0 ra0-CastrANAM sAmAnyalakSaNamAha-SaDviMCatiriti|  sukarmAraiH-uttamalohakAraiH|  romavAhIni-romacchedIni|  akarAlAni-Arjavavanti|  ayasi-lohe ghaTitAni, tRtIyArthe saptamI|  samAhitaM-samyagghaTitaM, mukhAgraM-phalaM, yeSAM tAni|  svonmAnasya-aGgulaSaTkasya, ardhacaturthAMCaH-adhyuSTo bhAgaH,- saptamAMCadvayasahitaM yavadaCakam, tatparimANaM phalaM yeSAM tAni|  ekaikaCo dvitrANi-pratyekaM dve trINi vA, kArayet|         SaDviMCaterupayogamAha-yuJjIteti|

maNDalAgraM phale teSAM tarjanyantarnakhAkRti||5||   lekhane chedane yojyaM pothakICuNDikAdiSu||5||

Rju-spaSTamagraM yasya tadRjvagram, tadunnate Cophe syAt| gambhIre tu Cophe tat-vRddhipatramanyathA| kathamanyathA ? ityAha-natetyAdi| pRSThataH-pRSThadeCe, natamagraM yasya tannatAgraM bhavatIti|

A0 ra0-vRddhipatramAha-vRddhipatramiti|  unnate gambhIre ca Cophe Rjvagram|  anyathAbhUte Cophe pRSThato natAgram|  sthAnavaCena dIrghamukhaM hrasvamukhaM ca|

A0 ra0-CastrasthApanArthaM CastrakoCamAha-syAditi|  saGgrahe tu (sU.a. 34)-"hasta eva cAtra pradhAnatamastadadhInatvAdyantraCastrANAm|  tatra kSAreNa pAyitaM CastraM CaraCalyAsthicchedaneSu, udakena mAMsacchedane, tailena pATanabhedanaCirAvyadhasnAyucchedaneSu ca prayuJjIta|  dhArA punarbhedanAnAM mAsUrI, lekhanAnAmardhamAsUrI, vyadhanAnAM visrAvaNAnAM ca kaiCikI, chedanAnAmardhakaiCikI|  niCAnI tu teSAM ClakSNA CilikA mASamudgaprabhA|  dhArAsaMsthApanaM ca CAlmalIphalakam|  atha yogyA|  na cAdhikRtaCAstre~apyakRtayogyaH, yogyA-abhyAsaH, subhahuCo vA~apyadRSTakarmA CastrakarmaNi pravarteta, CirAsnAyumarmAdivyAptatvAddehasya|  tasmAt saromacarmapuSpaphalAlAbutrapusodakapaGkapUrNadRtibhastivadhramAMsapeCikotpalanAlAdiSu yathArhamAharaNAdiyogyAM kuryAt|  tathA ghaTapArCvasrotasyambhobhiH paripUrNena netreNa bhastipIDanayogyAm|    mRdumAMsakhaNDeSvagnikSArAvacaraNayogyAm|  pustamayapuruSAGgapratyaGgeSu bhandhanayogyAm|  api ca|  yuktakArI bhiSagbubhUSuH puruSaM sampUrNagAtramaviSahatamadIrghavyAdhipIDitaM niSkRSTAntramavahantyAmApagAyAM muJjabalvajaveSTitaM paJjarasthamaprakACe deCe kothayet|  taM samyakprakuthitaM coddhRtyAyatadehaM kRtvoCIraveNukUrcAdInAmanyatamena CanaiH CanairavaghRSya tvagAdIn sarvAneva vAhyAbhyantarAnaGgasirAsrAyvAdInavayavAnAcAryopadarCitenAgamena cakSuSA ca lakSayet|  iti CAstreNa yaddRSTaM dRSTaM pratyakSataCca yat|  samAgataM tadubhayaM bhUyo jJAnaM vivardhayet||" iti|

madhuraM lavaNaM kiJcidaCItoSNamasaMhatam||1|| padmendragopahemAviCaCalohitalohitam||1|| lohitaM prabhavaH CuddhaM, tanostenaiva ca sthitiH||2||
