 vakrarjutiryagUrdhvAdhaH CalyAnAM paJcadhA gatiH||1||  dhyAmaM CopharujAvantaM sravantaM CoNitaM muhuH||1||  abhyudgataM budbudavatpiTikopacitaM vraNam||2||  mRdumAMsaM ca jAnIyAdantaHCalyaM samAsataH||2||

sa0-vakrAdibhedabhinnA CalyAnAM paJcaprakArA gatiH-gamanam| kadAcicchalyAni vakraM kRtvA, tiryagvA UrdhvaM vA, adho vA, gacchantiH kadAcidRju kRtvA| evamubhayathA tiryagUrdhvAdhobhedagamanAcchalyAnAM paJcadhA gatiH|evaMvidhaM vraNamantaHCalyaM jAnIyAt| samAsataH - saGkSepeNa| dhyAmaM-CyAmavarNam| tathA, CopharujAvantam| tathA, muhuH CoNitaM sravantam| tathA, abhyudgataM-Abhimukhyenocchritamunnatam| tathA, budbudena tulyaM vartate budbudavat| tathA, piTakairupacitaM-vyAptam|  tathA, mRdumAMsaM-komalamAMsam|

A0 ra0-CalyAharaNavidhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-atheti|         CalyagatibhedAnAha-vakrarjviti|  saGgrahe tu (sU.a.37)-"trividhA gatiH CalyAnAmUrdhvamadhastiryak ca|  sA punaH pratyekamRjuvakrabhedena dvividhA|" iti| antaHCalyasya lakSaNamAha-dhyAmamiti|

 viCeSAttvaggate Calye vivarNaH kaThinAyataH||3||  Copho bhavati-----------------------------------||3||

sa0-viCeSeNa punastvaggate Calye Copho vivarNastathA kaThino dIrghaCca syAt|

A0 ra0-tvaggataCalyasya lakSaNamAha-viCeSAditi|  viCeSAditi vacanAt sAmAnyalakSaNamapyatra jJeyam|

 -------------mAMsasthe coSaH Copho vivarddhate||3||  pIDanAkSamatA pAkaH CalyamArgo na rohati||4||

sa0-mAMsagate Calye coSaH syAt| 'sarvAGgINastIvro~aratimAn dAhaCcoSa ucyate' ityAhuH| tathA Copho vivarddhate| tathA, pIDanasyAkSamatvaM pAkaCca, CalyamArgaCca rohaM na yAti|

A0 ra0-mAMsagatasya lakSaNamAha-mAMsastha iti|  coSaH-AcUSaNeneva vyathA|

peCyantaragate mAMsaprAptavacchvayathuM vinA||4||

sa0-peCImadhyagate mAMsagatena tulyaM lakSaNam, CothaM varjayitvA| mAMsAvayavaviCeSo dIrghatantvAkRtiH peCItyucyate|

A0 ra0-peCIgatasya lakSaNamAha-peCyantaragata iti|

 AkSepaH snAyujAlasya saMrambhastambhavedanAH||5||  snAyuge durharaM caitat----------------------||5||

sa0-snAyuge Calye snAyujAlasyAkSepAdyAH syuH| AkSepaH-AkarSaNam| saMrambhaH-kSobhaH| stambhaH-stabdhatA|  vedanA - CUlam|  etacca-snAyugaM CalyaM, duHkhena hartuM Cakyate|

A0 ra0-snAyugatasya lakSaNamAha-AkSepa iti|  etat-snAyugatamanyebhyo durharaM ca|

 -----------------------------sirAdhmAnaM sirACrite||5||

sa0-sirACrite Calye sirANAmAnAhaH syAt|

A0 ra0-CirAgatasya lakSaNamAha-CirAdhmAnamiti|  CirAdhmAnaM-CirANAM vAyurpUrNatvam|

 svakarmaguNahAniH syAtsrotasAM srotasi sthite||6||

sa0-srotogate Calye srotasAM svakarmaguNayorhAniH syAt| yathA,-kaNThasrotaHsthite Calye pAnAbhyavaharaNasya nirodho jAyate guNo~api yastasyApraduSTatvAdilakSaNaH so~apyasya hIyata iti| evamanyeSAM svakarmaguNahAnirvyAkhyeyA|

A0 ra0-srotogatasya lakSaNamAha-svakarmaguNahAniriti|  svakarma-prANAdInAM yathAvadvahanam|  svaguNo-mArdavAdiH|

 dhamanIsthe~anilo raktaM phenayuktamudIrayet||6||  niryAti CabdavAn syAcca hRllAsaH sAGgavedanaH||7||

sa0-dhamanIsthe Calye vAyurlohitaM saphenaM prerayet|  tathA saCabdo marunniryAti, hRllAsaCcAGgapIDAyuktaH syAt|

A0 ra0-dhamanIgatasya lakSaNamAha-dhamanIstha iti|

 saGgharSo balavAnasthisandhiprApte~asthipUrNatA||7||

sa0-asthisandhiprApte Calye balavAn saGgharSaH-kSobhaH, syAt| tathA, asthipUrNatA ca jAyate|

A0 ra0-asthisandhigatasya lakSaNamAha-saGgharSa iti|  balavAn saGgharSaH-duHsahasaGghaTTanam|

sUtrasthAnam

CalyAharaNavidhiH adhyAyaH

naikarUpA rujo~asthisthe CophaH-----------------------||8||

sa0-asthisthe Calye, anekAkArAH (naikarUpAH)-nAnAvidhAH, rujo- bhagnarugNamRditapIDitAvanunnaprAyAH syuH, CophaCca|

A0 ra0-asthigatasya lakSaNamAha-naikarUpA iti|

 -------------------------------tadvacca sandhige||8|| caiSTAnivRttiCca bhavet-----------------------||8||

sa0-sandhigate Calye tadvadeva-asthisthaCalyena tulyaM lakSaNam| tathA, sandhisthaCalyAkrAntAvayavasya ceSTAnivRttiH-vyApAroparamaCca bhavati| pUrvamasthisandhigatasya Calyasya lakSaNamuktam| adhunA CarIrasandhigataCalyasya lakSaNam| anyo hi CarIrasandhiH| tathA ca rAjayakSmanidAne vakSyati (hR. ni. a. 5|5)-"CarIrasandhInAviCya" iti|

A0 ra0-sandhigatasya lakSaNamAha-tadvaditi|

 -------------------------ATopaH koSThasaMCrite||8||  AnAho~annaCakRnmUtradarCanaM ca vraNAnane||9||

sa0--koSThasaMCrite-udarACrite Calye, ATopaH-kSobhaH tathA~~AnAho-jaTharAdhmAnam, tathA vraNamukhe~annaCakRnmUtradarCanaM ca syAt|

A0 ra0-koSThagatasya lakSaNamAha-ATopa iti|

 vidyAnmarmagataM CalyaM marmaviddhopalakSaNaiH||9||

sa0-marmasthaM CalyaM marmaviddhopalakSaNairvidyAt-jAnIyAt|  marmaviddhasya ca lakSaNaM  saGgrahe kathitam| yathA (CA. a. 7) "dehaprasuptirgurutA sammohaH CItakAmitA| svedo mUrcchA vamiH CvAso marmaviddhasya lakSaNam||" iti|

A0 ra0-marmagatasya lakSaNamAha-vidyAditi|  upalakSaNaM lakSaNam|  tacca "viddhe~ajasramasRksrAvo" ityAdinA CArIrake (hR.CA. a. 4/47) vakSyate|

yathAsvaM ca parisrAvaistvagAdiSu vibhAvayet||10||

sa0-na kevalaM sAmAnyalakSaNena-dhyAmAdinA, tathA tvagAdisthaCalyaviCeSalakSaNena, tvagAdisthaM CalyaM lakSayet| yAvat yathAsvaM parisrAvaistathA~anurUpairvibhAvayet|

A0 ra0-tvaggatAdInAM srAvato lakSaNamAha-yathAsvamiti|  yathAsvamiti yatra yadACritaM dravaM tatra tatsravati|  yathA,- tvaggate lasIkA, CirAdigate raktam, asthigate majjA ityAdi|

 ruhyate CuddhadehAnAmanulomasthitaM tu tat||10||

sa0-tat-prAGnirdiSTaM CalyaM, ruhyate-rohaM yAti| kimbhUtAnAM puMsAm ? vamanavirecanAdibhiH CuddhadehAnAm| ruhyata iti karmakartarIti kecit, tacca na yuktam| yataH karmasthabhAvakAnAM karmasthakriyANAM ca kartA karmavadbhavati| na kartRsthabhAvakAnAM na ca kartRsthakriyANAmityuktam| ruhiCca kartRsthakriyaH| tasmAt rohatIti ruT| ruDivAcaratIti kyaGanto~ayam| rUDhAbhAso hyayam, na tu samyagrUDhaH|  tathA ca vakSyati-"doSakopa" ityAdi| tasmAdasya rUDhAbhAsatvAdeSaiva vyutpattiryuktA|

A0 ra0-antaHCalyo~api svaguNenaiva rUDho vraNo bhavatItyAha-ruhyata iti|  ruhyate svayameva|  karmakartaryAtmanepadam|  tat-Calyam|  Calyena CalyakSataM lakSyate, tasyaiva ropaNArhatvAt|

doSakopAbhighAtAdikSobhAdbhUyo~api bAdhate||11||

sa0-yatastacchalyamasamyagrUDhatvAt bhUyo~api bAdhate|  prAkkRtabAdhamapi punarapi pIDAM janayati| kuto hetoH ? ityAha-doSakopaCcAbhighAtaCca, tAvAdI yeSAM dhAvanalaGghanAdInAM te evaM,  taiH kSobhaH-saMrambhaH, tasmAt| doSakopakSobhAt abhighAtAdikSobhAt bAdhate|

A0 ra0-antaHCalyaM rUDhamapi punarbAdhata ityAha doSakopeti|

tvaGnaSTe yatra tatra syurabhyaGgasvedamardanaiH||11|| rAgarugdAhasaMrambhA yatra cAjyaM vilIyate||12||  ACu CuSyati lepo vA tatsthAnaM Calyavadvadet||12||

sa0-tatra-teSu tvaGnaSTAdiSu CalyeSu madhye, tvaGnaSTaM yatra pradeCe syAt tatra-tasthAne, abhyaGgAdibhirlauhityaCUladAhakSobhAH syuH|  yatra vA sthAne ghRtaM styAnaM yojitaM vilIyate tatsthAnaM Calyavat-saCalyaM vadet| yadvA lepaH-candanAdinA datto, yatrACveva CuSyati, tatsthAnaM-tvagdeCaM, CalyavajjAnIyAt|

A0 ra0-atha naSTaCalyajJAnopAyaH|  tatra tvaGnaSTasyopAyamAha-tvaGnaSTa iti|

mAMsapraNaSTaM saMCuddhyA karCanAcchlathatAM gatam||13|| kSobhAdrAgAdibhiH CalyaM lakSayet-------------------||13||

sa0-mAMsapraNaSTaM-mAMsenAdRCyatAM prAptaM, saMCuddhyA-vamanavirecanAdikayA, yatkarCanaM-kRCatvaM kRtaM, tasmAt ClathatAM CithilatvaM  prAptaM, kSobhAt- anekaprakArAdvedanArUpAt, tathA rAgAdibhirlakSayet|

A0 ra0-mAMsanaSTasyopAyamAha Calyasya kSobhAdyatra rAgAdayastatra Calyam|

 ------------------------------------tadvadeva ca||13||  peCyasthisandhikoSTheSu naSTam----------------||14||

sa0-tadvaditi tena-mAMsapraNaSTena, tulyaM vartate| yathA,-CuddhyA karCanAt ClathatAM gataM kSobhAdrAgAdibhirlakSayediti|

CalyAharaNavidhiH adhyAyaH

 -------------------------------asthiSu lakSayet||14|| asthnAmabhyaJjanasvedabandhapIDanamardanaiH||14||

sa0-asthiSu naSTaM CalyamasthnAmabhyaJjanAdibhirlakSayet|

A0 ra0-asthinaSTasyopAyamAha-asthiSviti|  'kSobhAdrAgAdibhiH' ityanuvartate|

 prasAraNAkuJcanataH sandhinaSTaM tathA~asthivat||15|| naSTe snAyuCirAsrotodhamanISvasame pathi||15|| aCvayuktaM rathaM khaNDacakramAropya rogiNam||16|| CIghraM nayettatastasya saMrambhAcchalyamAdiCet||16||

sa0-sandhinaSTaM CalyamasthinaSTaCalyavallakSayet   snAyuCirAsrotodhamanISu naSTe Calye, asame pathi-viSame mArge, rathamAropya rogiNaM-CalyavantaM, CIghraM nayet-ACveva deCAntaraM prApayet| kimbhUtaM ratham ? khaNDaM cakram yasya sa khaNDacakraH, tam| tatastasya-rathasya, saMrambhAt-kSobhAt, CalyamAdiCet-lakSayet|

A0 ra0-sandhinaSTasyopAyamAha-prasAraNAkuJcanata iti|   asthivat-abhyaJjanAdibhiCca|   snAyvAdiSu caturSunaSTasyopAyamAha-naSTa iti|  asame pathi-uccanIce mArge|

 marmanaSTaM pRthaGnoktaM teSAM mAMsAdisaMCrayAt||17||

sa0-marmanaSTaM CalyaM pRthak nAbhihitam| kutaH ? teSAM-marmaNAM, mAMsAdireva prAGnirdiSTo yataH saMCrayo, na tu pRthaGmarmANi vidyante| { tathA ca saGgrahe(sU. a. 37)-"marmapraNaSTe~apyananyabhAvAnmAMsAdibhyo marmaNAmuktaM parIkSaNaM bhavati|" iti|

A0 ra0-marmanaSTasyopAyAnuktau hetumAha-marmanaSTamiti|  teSAM-marmaNAM, mAMsAdigatatvAt-mAMsAdinaSTakathanenaivoktatvAt|

sAmAnyena saCalyaM tu kSobhiNyA kriyayA saruk||17||

sa0-sAmAnyena-sAmAnyalakSNena, kSobhiNyA kriyayA-saMrambhotpAdakena karmaNA CvasanaprANAyAmAdikena, yat saruk sthAnaM tat saCalyaM jAnIyAt|

A0 ra0-naSTasya sAmAnyalakSaNamAha-sAmanyeneti|

 vRttaM pRthu catuSkoNaM tripuTaM ca samAsataH||18|| adRCyaCalyasaMsthAnaM vraNAkRtyA vibhAvayet||18||

sa0-vRttaM-vartulam| pRthu-pArCvAparapArCvAbhyAM yatparicchidyate| catuSkoNaM-caturasram| tripuTaM-tryasram| samAsataH-saGkSepeNa|| adRCyasya-anupalabdhasya, Calyasya saMsthAnaM-AkRtiM, vraNAkRtyA-vraNasaMsthAnena, vibhAvayet-vidyAt|

A0 ra0-adRCyasya CalyasyAkRtirvraNAkRtyA jJeyetyAha-vRttamiti|  vRttaM-koNarahitam|  pRthu-dvikoNam|  tripuTaM-trikoNam|  saMsthAnaM-AkRtiH|

 teSAmAharaNopAyau pratilomAnulomakau||19||

sa0-teSAM-adRCyAnAM CalyAnAm| AkarSaNopAyau dau pratilomAnulomakau| pratilomaH-CarIrAntaHpraveCaviparyayaH|  anulomaH-CarIrAntaHpraveCAnugataH| 

pratilomAnulomayornirharaNaviSayamAha-

A0 ra0-CalyAharaNopAyabhedAnA(vA)ha-teSAmiti|  yatra pratikUlamAharaNaM sa pratilomaH, yatrAnukUlaM so~anulomaH|

 arvAcInaparAcIne nirharettadviparyayAt||19||

sa0-tayoH-pratilomAnulomayorviparyayaH, tasmAdviparyayAt, anulomaM parAcInamAnayedityarthaH|

A0 ra0-tayorviSayamAha-arvAcInaparAcIna iti|  arvAcInaM-adhogatam, tadviparyayAdUrdhvaM nirharet|  parAcInaM-Urdhvagatam, tadviparyayAdadho nirharet|  UrdhvaM nirharaNaM-pratilomam, adhaH-anulomam|  uktaM ca saGgrahe (sU.a.37)-"pratilomamarvAcInamAnayet, anulomaM parAcInam|" iti|

sukhAhAryaM yataCcchittvA tatastiryaggataM haret||20||

sa0-tiryaggataM CalyaM yato-yasmAddehadeCAt, chitvA-vilupya, sukhAhAryaM sampadyate-sukhenAhartuM Cakyate, tataH-tasmAddehadeCAt, chittvoddharet|  chittvetyatra yadyapi karma kiJcinna nirdiSTaM, tathA~api tvaGmAMsAdInAM yogyatvAtteSAmeva karmatvaM bodhyam|  mAMsAdIni chhittvoddharedityarthaH|

A0 ra0-tiryaggataM tvavasthAbhedenobhayorviSaya ityAha-sukhAhAryamiti|  tiryaggataM yenopAyena sukhAhAryaM tena haret|  praveCapArCvAdanyena pArCvena yadA sukhAhAryaM tadA chittvA-CastreNa dvAraM kRttvA, haret|

 CalyaM na nirghAtyamuraHkakSAvaGkSaNapArCvagam||20||  pratilomamanuttuNDaM chedyaM pRthumukhaM ca yat||21||

sa0-CalyamurogatamuraHsthaM kakSAsthaM vaGkSaNasthaM pArCvasthaM ca na nirghAtyaM-na nirghAtanIyam| tathA pratilomaM-nAnulomagataM, tathA~anuttuNDaM vAribudbudavannonnataM, tathA chedyaM CalyaM, tathA pRthumukhaM-vistIrNAnanaM, ca na nirghAtyam|

A0 ra0-urogatAdiSu CalyeSu nirghAtanaM niSedhati-Calyamiti|  pratilomaM-Urdhvagatam|  anuttuNDaM-adRCyamukham|  chedyaM-chedanArham|

 naivAharedviCalyaghnaM naSTaM vA nirupadravam||21||

sa0-viCalyaM hantIti viCalyaghnam| tAvajjIvati yAvatsaCalyaH| CalyApAye tu mriyate tannAharedeva|  viCalyasya tasya prANaharaNatvAt| etatsvarUpaM marmavibhAge spaSTaM kRtvA vakSyate| naSTaM veti vACabdaCcArthe|  naSTaM-adRCyatAM prAptaM ca, yannirupadravaM-tannimittarogarahitaM, nAharet, pratyavAyabhayAt|

A0 ra0-anAharaNIyaM CalyamAha-naivAharediti|  viCalyaghnaM-"utkSepau sthapanI trINi viCalyaghnAni tatra hi|" (hR.CA.a. 4/55) ityukteSu marmasu sthitam|

sUtrasthAnam

CalyAharaNavidhiH adhyAyaH

 athAharetkaraprApyaM kareNaiva------------------||22||

sa0-karaprApyaM-hastagrAhyaM CalyaM, karaNaivAharet-nApareNa kaGkamukhAdinA|

A0 ra0-hastAhAryaM CalyamAha-atheti|

 -----------------------------------itaratpunaH||22||  dRCyaM siMhAhimakaravarmikarkaTakAnanaiH||22||

sa0-itarat-akaraprApyaM tu CalyaM, dRCyaM siMhamukhAdibhiryantrairAharet|

A0 ra0-siMhamukhAdisvastikayantrAhAryaM CalyamAha-itaraditi|  itarat-kareNAprApyam|

athAtaH CastrakarmavidhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

A0 ra0-  CastrakarmavidhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-atheti|

sa0-Castrasya karma Castrakarma,- CastrAvacAraNakriyA, tasya vidhiH-itikartavyatA, CastrakarmavidhiH, tam| CeSaM pUrvavat| 

  nanu, yadyayaM CastrakarmavidhiH, tataH Castrakarmagrantha evAdau nirdeSTuM yuktaH, (Clo. 14)- "prAk  CastrakarmaNaCceSTaM bhojayedannamAturam|" ityAdi| na tu "vraNaH saJjAyate prAyaH" ityAdi| atrocyate| CastrakarmavidheH pUrvaM viSayo nirdiSTuM yuktaH| yataH CastrakarmavidherupAyo~ayam, ityasyaiva pUrvamupanyAso yukta ityAha-

vraNaH saJjAyate prAyaH pAkAcchvayathupUrvakAt||1|| tamevopacarettasmAdrakSan pAkaM prayatnataH||1|| suCItalepasekAsramokSasaMCodhanAdibhiH||2||

sa0-prAyo vraNaH pAkAt saJjAyate| kimbhUtAt ? CvayathuH pUrvo yasya pAkasya sa CvayathupUrvakaH, tasmAt| CvayathupAkamantareNApi CastrAdyabhighAtAt vraNo jAyata iti prAyograhaNam| yasmAcchvayathupUrvakAt pAkAt vraNaH saJjAyate, atastameva-CvayathuM, upacaret-upakramet| kiM kurvan ? pAkaM prayatnena rakSan| katham ? suCItalepasekAdibhiH| suCItAbhyAM-sparCato vIryataCca, lepasekAbhyAm| tathA, raktamokSaNena| tathA, saMCodhanena-vamanena virekeNa ca| AdigrahaNAt kaSAyapAnaghRtapAnAdInAM grahaNam|     

A0 ra0- CastrakarmaviSayasya vraNasyotpattimAha-vraNa iti|vraNasyotpattipratibandhamAha-tameveti| tameva-Cvayathumeva| CastrakarmaNi bheSajavidhAnaM bheSajAsAdhye Castrakarma vidhAtavyamiti jJApanArtham| uktaM hi saGgrahe (sU. a. 38)- "dvividhe~api hi vyAdhAvupAyApekSe nija Agantau vA bheSajaviSayAtIte Castrakarma prayujyate|" iti|

Copho~alpo~alpoSmaruksAmaHsavarNaH kaThinaH sthiraH||2||

sa0-Amo yaH CophaH saH pramANato~alpaH| tathA, alpoSmA| tathA, alparuk-alpaCUlaH| tathA, savarNaH-tvaksamAnavarNaH| tathA, kaThino-na mRduH, pakvavat| tathA, sthiro-na pakvavaccalaH| sa AmaH sAma iti "so~aci lope cetpAdapUraNam" iti sulopaH|

A0 ra0- apakvasya CvayathorlakSaNamAha-Copha iti| AmaH-apakvaH| USmA-auSNyam| ruk-CUlam| sthiraH-CanairvardhamAnaH|

 pacyamAno vivarNastu rAgI bastirivAtataH||3|| sphuTatIva sanistodaH sAGgamardavijRmbhikaH||3|| saMrambhArucidAhoSAtRDjvarAnidratAnvitaH||4||  styAnaM viSyandayatyAjyaM vraNavatsparCanAsahaH||4||

sa0-sa  CophaH pacyamAno vivarNo-na tvaksamAnavarNaH| tathA rAgI-lohitavarNaH|  tathA, bastirivAtataH-stabdho vAtapUrNadRtivat|  chAgAdInAM tu mUtrAdhAro bastirityucyate| tathA, sphuTatIva| { tathA, } sanistodaH-saha nistodena vartata iti sanistodaH| niyataprabandhapravRttA ruk-nistodo, vicchinnA tu CUlamityucyate| sAGgetyAdi| aGgAnAM mardaH- kSobhaH, sahAGgamardavijRmbhikAyAM vartata iti sAGgamardavijRmbhikaH| tathA, saMrambhAdibhiryutaH|  anvitaCabdena pratyekaM saMrambhAdInAM sambandhaH| saMrambho-vAgviSayAtItAnAM svasaMvedyAnAmanekarUpANAM pIDanavighaTTanacchedanabhedanadaMCanAdInAM rujAM prAdurbhAvaH|  sarvAGgINastIvro-dAhaH|  aratimAn dAha uSA ucyate|  tathA, sa pacyamAno ghRtaM styAnamupayuktaM vilInayati|  tathA, sparCanaM na sahate vraNavat|

A0 ra0- pacyAmAnasya Cophasya lakSaNamAha-pacyamAna iti| vivarNaH-tvagviparItavarNaH| rAgI-raJjanaCaktimAn, lepauSadhaM varNAntaraM nayatItyarthaH| sphuTati-viSliSTAvayatvaM vrajati| saMrambho-jhaTiti rujAdivRddhiH|

 pakve~alpavegatA mlAniH pANDutA valisambhavaH||5|| nAmo~anteSUnnatirmadhye kaNDUCophAdimArdavam||5|| spRSTe pUyasya saJcAro bhavedbastAvivAmbhasaH||6||

sa0-pakve sati, alpavegatA bhavati, na tu saMrambhaH|  tathA, glAniH-mlAnatvam| tathA, pANDutvaM valInAM codbhavaH| tathA, anteSu-paryanteSu, nAmo-nimnatvam, madhya unnatiH|  nAmo~anteSvityuktyaiva madhya unnatitvaM labdhameva, unnatigrahaNaM tvatiCayArtham, tenottuNDitvaM gamyate|  tathA, kaNDvAdimRdutvaM syAt| tathA, spRSTe tasmin sati pUyasya saJcAro bhavati,  basterantaHsthitasya yathA~ambhasaH saJcAraH|

A0 ra0- pakvasya Cophasya lakSaNamAha-pakva iti| alpavegatA-upadravAlpatvam| kaNDUCophAdayo lakSaNAni| upadravAstu-aGgamardAdayaH|

CUlaM narte~anilAddAhaH pittAcchophaH kaphodayAt||6|| rogo raktAcca pAkaH syAdato doSaiH saCoNitaiH||7||

sa0-vAtaM vinA CUlaM na bhavati| pittamantareNa dAho na syAt| kaphodayAdvinA Copho na syAt| CophaH kaphAditi vaktavya udayagrahaNaM viCeSadyotanArtham| raktAdRte-raktaM vinA, rAgasya lauhityasya sambhavo na|  tena kaphAdhikaiH sarvairdoSaiH CoNitasahitaiH CvayathupAkaH syAditi gamyate|

A0 ra0- raktadoSatrayakAryatvaM pAkasyAha-CUlamiti|

pAke~ativRtte suSirastanutvagdoSabhakSitaH||7|| valIbhirAcitaH CyAvaH CIryamANatanUruhaH||8||

sa0-pAke cAtivRtte-atikrAnte, suSiro~antasthaH CophadeCaH sampadyate|  tathA, tanuH-tanvI, tvak yasmin sa tanutvak| tathA, doSabhakSitaH-pUyavAn, doSaCabdeneha pUya ucyate, tena bhakSitatvAt suSiratvaM tanutvaktvaM  cAsya|  tathA, valIbhirAcito-vyAptaH| tathA, CyAmavarNaH| tathA, CIryamANatanUruhaH-patadromA|

A0 ra0- atipakvasya Cophasya lakSaNamAha-pAka iti| ativRtte-pramANamatikrAnte| suSiraH-CUnyodaraH| tanutvak-viralatvak| doSabhakSitaH-pUyabhakSitamAMsAdiH| tanUruhaM-roma|

 kaphajeSu tu CopheSu gambhIraM pAkametyasRk||8||  pakvaliGgaM tato~aspaSTaM yatra syAcchItaCophatA||9||  tvaksAvarNyaM rujo~alpatvaM ghanasparCatvamaCmavat||9||  raktapAkamiti brUyAttaM prAjJo muktasaMCayaH||10||

sa0-yadyapi tribhireva doSaiH CoNitAnvitaiH pAko jAyate, tathA~api kaphajeSvityukteradhikatarakapheSviti gamyate|  kaphajeSviti bahuvacananirdeCAt dehadeCabahutvAdyeSu dehadeCeSvasau kapho jAyate, teSu kaphajeSu CopheSu gambhIraM-durlakSyamatiCayenAntarnigUDhatvAt, asRk pAkameti| ata eva pakvaliGgaM-pakvalakSaNaM, aspaSTaM durlakSyaM, syAt| tathA, yatra CItaguNayogAt, CItaCcAsau CophaCca CItaCophaH, tasya bhAvaH CItaCophatA| tathA, tvaksamAnavarNatvam|  tathA, rujaH stokatvam| tathA, ghanasparCatvaM-nibiDasparCatA syAt, aCmavat-hastAdinA spRSTe pASANatulyaH sparCa upalabhyate| taM-tathAbhUtaM CvayathupAkaM, raktapAkamityevaM prAjJo-dhImAn, brUyAt-na tu CophaM pakvamiti kathayet| katham ?  muktasaMCayaH,- CoNitaM pakvaM nAtra Copha ityevaM vadedityarthaH|

vraNaH saJjAyate prAyaH pAkAcchvayathupUrvakAt||1|| tamevopacarettasmAdrakSan pAkaM prayatnataH||1|| suCItalepasekAsramokSasaMCodhanAdibhiH||2||

sa0-prAyo vraNaH pAkAt saJjAyate| kimbhUtAt ? sa0-sa  CophaH pacyamAno vivarNo-na tvaksamAnavarNaH| tathA rAgI-lohitavarNaH|  tathA, bastirivAtataH-stabdho vAtapUrNadRtivat|  chAgAdInAM tu mUtrAdhAro bastirityucyate| tathA, sphuTatIva| { tathA, } sanistodaH-saha nistodena vartata iti sanistodaH| niyataprabandhapravRttA ruk-nistodo, vicchinnA tu CUlamityucyate| sAGgetyAdi| aGgAnAM mardaH- kSobhaH, sahAGgamardavijRmbhikAyAM vartata iti sAGgamardavijRmbhikaH| tathA, saMrambhAdibhiryutaH|  anvitaCabdena pratyekaM saMrambhAdInAM sambandhaH| saMrambho-vAgviSayAtItAnAM svasaMvedyAnAmanekarUpANAM pIDanavighaTTanacchedanabhedanadaMCanAdInAM rujAM prAdurbhAvaH|  sarvAGgINastIvro-dAhaH|  aratimAn dAha uSA ucyate|  tathA, sa pacyamAno ghRtaM styAnamupayuktaM vilInayati|  tathA, sparCanaM na sahate vraNavat|

---------------------------------pAke tu sumahatyapi||18||  pATayet dvyaGgulaM samyagdvyaGgulatryaGgulAntaram||18|| eSitvA samyageSiNyA paritaH sunirUpitam||19||  aGgulInAlavAlairvA yathAdeCaM yathACayam||19||  yato gatAM gatiM vidyAdutsaGgo yatra yatra ca||20||  tatra tatra vraNaM kuryAtsuvibhaktaM nirACayam||20||  AyataM ca viCAlaM ca yathA doSo na tiSThati||21||

sa0-pAke tu sumahatyapi pATayet| dvyaGgulaM-dvyaGgulaparimANaM vraNaM, samyak kuryAt,-nAdhikam| dvyaGguletyAdi| aGguladvayamathavA~aGgulatrayamantarIkRtya punaranyaM vraNaM kuryAt,-na tvAsannam|  tathA, eSiNyA samyageSitvA-gaveSayitvA, paritaH-samantAt, sunirUpitaM-suparyAlocitam| na kevalameSiNyA, yAvadaGgulyA, nAlena-padmotpalAdijena, vAlairvA-varAhAdisambandhibhiH, anveSya yathAdeCaM yathACayaM vraNaM kuryAt| taM ca pradeCaM darCayitumAha-yata ityAdi| yato yasmin pradeCe gatAM-dUrayAtAM, gatiM-nADIM, jAnIyAt tasmin pradeCe vraNaM kuryAt| yatra yatra CvayathupradeCe, utsaGgaM-unnatiM, vidyAt tatra tatra pradeCe vraNaM kuryAt| kiMbhUtaM vraNam ? suSThu vibhaktau pArCvAparapArCvAdivibhAgau yasya taM tathAvidham| tathA, nirACayam,-na vidyata ACayaH-pUyAderdoSasya sthAnaM, yasya tathAbhUtaM nirACayaM kuryAt|  tathA, AyataM-dIrgham, tathA viCAlaM-vistirNaM, kuryAt| evaM kRte sati doSaH-pUyAkhyo, na tiSThati-na sthitiM labhate|

CArIrasthAnam

athAto garbhAvakrAnti CArIraM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2|| iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

CarIramadhikRtya kRto granthaH CArIraH| garbhasyAvakrAntiH-avakramaNaM samprAptiH, yathA~agarbho garbhatAM sampadyata ityarthaH| garbhAvakrAntirvidyate yasminnadhyAya iti matvarthe kapratyayaH| tasya "adhyAyAnuvAkayorluk" iti luk| athAdiCabdAnAmarthA AyuSkAmIyAdhyAye (hR.sU.  a.1) vyAkhyAtA eva|

 Cuddhe CukrArtave satvaH  svakarmakleCacoditaH||1|| garbhaH sampadyate yuktivaCAdagnirivAraNau||1||

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

CukraM-antyo dhAtuH| Rtau bhavamArtavam, strINAM yadapatyamArgAt CuddhamISatkRSNaM vigandhaM ca vAyupreritaM lohitaM pravartate tadArtavamucyate| CukraM cArtavaM ca CukrArtavam, piNDe pitroH sambandhi garbhabIjam, tasmin CukrArtave, Cuddhe-vAtAdibhiradUSite~adhiSThAnabhUte, satvo-jIvaH, garbhaH sampadyate| kila nAsau garbhaH, atha ca garbhatAmAsAdayati| kIdRCaH satvaH ? svakarmetyAdi| karmANi-pUrvajanmArjitAni CubhACubhAni, svAni ca tAni karmANi ca svakarmANi| kleCayanti-lokAn duHkhayantIti, kleCAH| te ca-avidyAsmitArAgadveSAbhiniveCAH| atathAvastuni tatheti ("anityACuciduHkhAnAtmasu nityaCucisukhAtma) khyAtiH-avidyA| dRgdarCanaCaktyorekAtmatA - asmitA| sukhAnuCayI-rAgaH| duHkhAnuCayI-dveSaH| svarasavAhI viduSo~api tathA rUDhaH-abhiniveCaH" (pAta.yo.sU 2/5-6-7-8-9)| svakarmANi ca kleCACca, svakarmakleCAH, taiCcoditaH-prerito garbhaH sampadyate, na tu karmakleCaviyuktaH| ata eva vItarAgANAM janmAsambhavaH, karmakleCarahitatvAt| tathA coktam-"cittameva hi saMsAri rAgAdikleCadUSitam| tadeva tairvinirmuktaM muktamityabhidhIyate||" iti| atha kiM Cuddhe CukrArtave eva svakarmakleCacodita eva garbhaH sampadyate~athavA~anyadapi kiJcidapekSate ? ityAha-yuktivaCAditi| yojanaM yuktiH, upAdeyasyArthasyetikartavyatAsAdhanopAyArtham| yuktervaCaH-sAmarthyaM prabhAvo, yuktivaCaH| tataH Cuddhe CukrArtave svakarmakleCacodita eva sa satvo garbhaH sampadyate, nAnyathA| katham ? ityAha-yuktivaCAdagnirivAraNau| tathA hi,- mathyamanthanamathakAdisAmagrImantareNAraNAvagniryathA na jAyate, tathA garbho~api yathoktasAmagrIvaikalyAt na bhavati| sakalasAmagrIsadbhAvata eva bhavatIti bhAvaH| 

bIjAtmakairmahAbhUtaiH sUkSmaiH satvAnugaiCca saH||2|| mAtuCcAhArarasajaiH kramAtkukSau vivarddhate||2||

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

bIjAtmakaiH-garbhajarAyusvabhAvaiH CukrArtavarUpatAM pariNataiH| kaiH ? mahAbhUtaiH, -AkACAdibhiH satvarajastamomayaiH, "tatra satvabahulamAkACam, rajobahulo vAyuH, satvarajobahulo~agniH, satvatamobahulA ApaH, tamobahulA pRthvI ceti|" (su.CA. a.1/20) ityevaMrUpaiH| saH-garbhaH, kukSau vivarddhate-viCeSeNa vRddhiM yAti| kimbhUtaiH ? sUkSmaiH,-atIndriyairyogidRCyaiH| tathA, satvaM-ceto~anugacchantIti satvAnugAni, taiH| yatra satvaM tiSThati tatrAvaCyaM tAnyapi tiSThanti, sAtvAnuCAyitvAtteSAm| tathA coktam (carake CA. a.2/37)-"atIndriyaistairatisUkSmarUpairAtmA kadAcinna viyuktapUrvaH|" ityAdi| caCabdo hetusamuccayArthaH| [ na kevalaM mahAbhUtairhetubhUtairgarbho vivarddhate yAvanmAtuCcAhArarasajairityato vakSyamANAddhetorapi varddhata ityarthaH| mAturityAdi| mAtuH sambandhibhirAhArarasajaiCca kukSau vivarddhate| caCabdo~atrAnuktasamuccayArthaH| ] na kevalaM pUrvoktAdyathAnirdiSThAddhetorgarbhaH kukSau vivarddhate, yAvadanirdiSTAdapi mAtuH saumanasyAdeH kalalArbuda peCyAdyavasthAbhAvena viCeSato vRddhiM yAtIti| kathaM vivarddhate ? ityAha-kramAt,-na jhaTityeva| nanu, "mAtuCcAhArarasajaiH" iti kathamuktam ? yataH paJcabhUtAtmaka evAhArarasaH| na ca yadAtmako~asau sa tasyaiva janmakAraNaM bhavitumarhati, avyatiriktatvAt| tasmAdevamayaM vyAkhyAtavyaH,-AhArarase jAtairAhArarasajaiH| saptamyantAdupapadAjjanerDaH| mAturAhArarasAtmanA pariNatairiti| 

tejo yathA~arkaraCmInAM sphaTikena tiraskRtam||3|| nendhanaM dRCyate gacchatsatvo garbhACayaM tathA||3||

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

na kevalaM dRCyatvAdRCyatvAbhyAM vastusadbhAvAsadbhAvau vyavasthApyete, yenAdRCyatvAtsatvasya kukSau praveCAsambhavaH| kintarhi ? tatkAryAnyathAnupapattyA~api vastusadbhAvo vyavasthApyata eva| tathA ca,- yathA~arkaraCmInAM sambandhi tejaH sphaTikena-sUryakAntAkhyena, tiraskRtaM-vyavahitaM, sphaTikasyAdhastAt sthitamindhanaM gacchat-vrajat, na dRCyate| atha ca tejaHkAryamindhanaM gataM [dRCyate nAnyasambandhi kAryam| tadevaM tejaHkAryAnyathAnupapattyA tejasa indhanagamanaM ], tathA tatra tasya sadbhAvo~apyadhigamyate| evaM satvo garbhACayaM gacchan-vrajan, na dRCyata eva| vastuprabhAvAdgacchati ca| satvaCabda upalakSaNArthaH, mahAbhUtAnyapi tadantargatAni na dRCyanta eva, atha ca kAryeNopalabhyanta eva| tadevaM satvAnuyAyibhirmahAbhUtairgarbhaH kukSau vivarddhate, na tu kevalaiH satvAnadhiSThitaiH| cetovakrAntyA hi kramAtkalalAdinA vastujAtaM  vivRddhivimalatAmApadyate, nAnyathA mRtaCarIravat| 

kAraNAnuvidhAyitvAtkAryANAM tatsvabhAvatA||4|| nAnAyonyAkRtIH satvo dhatte~ato drutalohavat||4||

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

kAraNaM-hetuM, avaCyamanuvidadhatIti kAraNAnuvidhAyIni|  AvaCyake NiniH| kAraNasvabhAvAni kAryANi bhavanti sarvANyeva, tasmAddhetoH kAryANAM tatsvabhAvatA| svabhAvaCabdaH sadRCArthaH| tacchabdena kAraNaM parAmRCyate, tasya-kAraNasya svabhAvatA, tatsAdRCyam| tasmAtkAryakAraNasAdRCyAddhetoH satvo - mahAbhUtAnuga ekarUpa eva, anekarUpA nAnAyonyAkRtIH- jAtibimbaviCeSAn, dhatte-dhArayati| kathamiva ? drutalohavat| yathA rUpyAdivastujAtamagninA drutarUpatAM gatamekarUpameva sikthAdikalpitAyAM nAnArUpAyAM manuSyAdyAkRtau tanniSiktaM tAM tAmAkRtiM yathAkalpitAM dhatte, evaM sa satvo nAnAyonau gacchati, tAM tAM yathAsvamAkRtiM dhArayati| 

ata eva ca Cukrasya bAhulyAjjAyate pumAn||5|| raktasya strI, tayoH sAmye klIbaH- ----------||5||

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

ata eva ca - pUrvoktAtkAryakAraNasAdRCyAkhyAddhetoH, Cukrasya - puMretaso, bAhulyAt- bahutvAt, sAmarthyalabhyAcca strIretorajolpatvAt pumAn jAyate na strI, tathAvidhasya kAraNasyAbhAvAt| ["tathA, ata eva-pUrvoktAtkAryakAraNasAdRCyAt strIretaso" raktasya, bAhulyAt-bAhutvAt, sAmarthyalabhyAcca puMretolpatvAt strI jAyate na pumAn, tathAvidhasya kAraNasyAbhAvAt| ] puMreto hi balavat, alpaM strIrajo~abhibhUya puMgarbhasya kAraNatAM yAti| yadA tu strIrajaso balavatvamalpatvaM ca puMretasaH, tadA~alpaM tu puMreto~abhibhUya strIrajaH stryAkhyasya garbhasya kAraNatAmApadyate| yadA tu CukrArtavayoH sAmyaM-tulyatvaM bhavati, tadA na strI na pumAn jAyate, api tu liGgadvayAliGgitaH klIbaH-SaNDho, jAyate| evaM pituH sambandhi CukraM strIraktamiCritaM garbhakAraNam| na kevalaM pitRsambandhyeva mAturvA| dAruvAhinA tUktam-"strIpuMsayostu saMyoge yadyAdau visRjetpumAn| CukraM, tataH pumAn vIro jAyate balavAn dRDhaH|| atha cedvanitA pUrvaM visRjedraktasaMyutam| tato rUpAnvitA kanyA jAyate dRDhasaMhatA||" iti| ata eva ca puMgarbhAH kecitkiJcinmAtRsadRCA dRCyante, strIgarbhACca kecitkiJcitpitRsadRCA dRCyante| nanu, "rasAdraktaM tato mAMsaM mAMsAnmedastato~asthi ca| asthno majjA tataH CukraM CukrAdgarbhaH prajAyate||" (hR. CA. a. 3/62) ityaviCiSya nirdiSTam,  na tu puMCukrAdgarbhaH prajAyata ityevaM nirdiSTam| ubhayorapi ca strIpuMsayoravaCyaM saptadhAtukatvamabhyupagantavyam, na puMsa eva| tadevaM taruNInAM kusumaCarAkrAntamAnasAnAM tathAvidhena puruSasaMyogena vinA kevalAt smRtisaMsparCadarCanAccalitaprastruta (rakta)retasAM kimiti garbho na jAyate ? CukrArtavaM hi garbhakAraNam| tacca sannihitameveti kecit| tAn brUmahe| puMCukrAbhAvAt| puMCukraM hi strIretoraktayuktaM garbhakAraNam| na ca tadatrAsti| tadabhAvAdgarbhasyAnutpattiH| tathA saGgrahe~apyadhyagISTa (CA. a. 1)-"yoSito~api sravantyeva CukraM puMsaH samAgame| garbhasya tu na tatkiJcitkarotIti na cintyate||" iti| 

 …………………………… CukrArtave punaH||5|| vAyunA bahuCo bhinne yathAsvaM bahvapatyatA||6||

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

vAtena yathAsvaM CukrArtave bahuCo bhinne-bahudhA kRte sati, bahvapatyatA bhavati| yathAsvamiti yadA CukramAdhikyena vartamAnaM vAtena bahudhA bhidyate tadA puMgarbhAnekatvam, yadA tu strIraja Adhikyena vartamAnaM vAyunA bahudhA bhidyate tadA strIgarbhAnekatvam, iti bahvapatyatA bhavati| sUkarasArameyAdijAtiSu tvanenaiva hetunA sadA~anekApatyatA| 

viyonivikRtAkArA jAyante vikRtairmalaiH||6||

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

viyonayaCca vikRtAkArACca viyonivikRtAkArAH, te tathAvidhA garbhA jAyante| katham ? ityAha-vikRtairmalaiH| vAtAdibhirduSTairunmArgagAmibhiH|

 mAsi mAsi rajaH strINAM rasajaM sravati tryaham||7|| vatsarAddvAdaCAdUrdhvaM yAti paJcACataH kSayam||7||

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

strINAM mAsi mAsi-pratimAsaM, rajo-raktaM, tryahaM sravati-trINi dinAni pravartate| nanu, "Cuddhe CukrArtave" iti pUrvaM CukramevoddiSTam, tatastasyaiva nirdeCo nyAyya iti CukramAnupUrvIprAptamullaGghya kasmAdraktaM nirdiSTam? ucyate| bahuvaktavyatvAt| rakte hi bahuvaktavyamasti, atastadeva prAgvaktuM yuktam| tryahamiti "kAlAdhvanoH" iti dvitIyA| kimbhUtaM rajaH ? rasAjjAtaM - rasajam| nanu, raktaM rasajameva| vakSyati hi (hR. CA. a. 3/62)- "rasAdraktaM tato mAMsaM" ityAdi| tatkimarthaM rasajamityuktam ? brUmahe| rasAt-AhArarasAt pariNamato jAtaM rasajamityatra nirdiSTam, na tu rasadhAtoH, ityacodyametat| kutaHprabhRti tadrajaH pravartate ? ityAha-vatsarAdityAdi| dvAdaCAdvarSAdUrdhvaM-anantaraM, sravati| paJcACato varSAdUrdhvaM-pareNa, kSayaM yAti| dvAdaCAnAM pUraNaM varSamiti "tasya pUraNo DaT" iti DaT| dvAdaCAditi prAyikametat, ekAdaCavArSikANAmapi strINAM raktapravRttidarCanAt| paJcACataH kSayamityatrApyevameva cintyam|

pUrNaSoDaCavarSA strI pUrNaviMCena saGgatA||8|| Cuddhe garbhACaye mArge rakte Cukre~anile hRdi||8|| vIryavantaM sutaM sUte tato nyUnAbdayoH punaH||9|| rogyalpAyuradhanyo vA garbho bhavati naiva vA||9||

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

"pUrNAni SoDaCavarSANi yasyAH sA, evaMvidhA strI pUrNaviMCena nareNa saGgatA-mithunatAM yAtA satI, garbhACayAdiSu CuddheSu vIryavantaM-sAmarthyayuktaM, putraM sUte-janayati| prAyikaM caitat, arvAgapi sAdhugarbhadarCanAt| ata evAyameva tantrakAro~anyathA saGgrahe jagAda (CA. a. 1)- ""SoDaCavarSAyAM paJcaviMCativarSaH putrArthaM prayateta|"" iti| viMCateH pUraNa iti DaTiti ""viMCateH"" iti tilope viMCaCabdaH| pUrNo viMCo yasyeti pUrNaviMCaH| garbhasyACayo garbhACayaH, tasmin| Cuddhe-nirmale, vAtAdibhiraduSTe| tathA, mArge-prakRtatvAdapatyamArge, vAtAdibhiraduSTe| tathA, rakte - strIrajasi, Cuddhe| tathA, Cukre-puMbIje, Cuddhe| tathA, anile Cuddhe - pittAdibhiranAvRte| tathA, hRdi-Cuddhe-doSAnadhiSThite~asantapte| 
tataH-pUrvoktAdvayaHparimANAt, nyUnAbdayoH-hInavarSayoH strIpuruSayoH paJcadaCASTAdaCavarSayoH, rogI bhavati| rogItyatiCaya inirmatvarthIyaH| tathotpanno~alpAyuradhanyaCca-apraCasto, garbho bhavati| na bhavatyeva vA|"

CArIrasthAnam

athAto garbhAvakrAnti CArIraM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2|| iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

CarIramadhikRtya kRto granthaH CArIraH| garbhasyAvakrAntiH-avakramaNaM samprAptiH, yathA~agarbho garbhatAM sampadyata ityarthaH| garbhAvakrAntirvidyate yasminnadhyAya iti matvarthe kapratyayaH| tasya "adhyAyAnuvAkayorluk" iti luk| athAdiCabdAnAmarthA AyuSkAmIyAdhyAye (hR.sU.  a.1) vyAkhyAtA eva|

 Cuddhe CukrArtave satvaH  svakarmakleCacoditaH||1|| garbhaH sampadyate yuktivaCAdagnirivAraNau||1||

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

CukraM-antyo dhAtuH| Rtau bhavamArtavam, strINAM yadapatyamArgAt CuddhamISatkRSNaM vigandhaM ca vAyupreritaM lohitaM pravartate tadArtavamucyate| CukraM cArtavaM ca CukrArtavam, piNDe pitroH sambandhi garbhabIjam, tasmin CukrArtave, Cuddhe-vAtAdibhiradUSite~adhiSThAnabhUte, satvo-jIvaH, garbhaH sampadyate| kila nAsau garbhaH, atha ca garbhatAmAsAdayati| kIdRCaH satvaH ? svakarmetyAdi| karmANi-pUrvajanmArjitAni CubhACubhAni, svAni ca tAni karmANi ca svakarmANi| kleCayanti-lokAn duHkhayantIti, kleCAH| te ca-avidyAsmitArAgadveSAbhiniveCAH| atathAvastuni tatheti ("anityACuciduHkhAnAtmasu nityaCucisukhAtma) khyAtiH-avidyA| dRgdarCanaCaktyorekAtmatA - asmitA| sukhAnuCayI-rAgaH| duHkhAnuCayI-dveSaH| svarasavAhI viduSo~api tathA rUDhaH-abhiniveCaH" (pAta.yo.sU 2/5-6-7-8-9)| svakarmANi ca kleCACca, svakarmakleCAH, taiCcoditaH-prerito garbhaH sampadyate, na tu karmakleCaviyuktaH| ata eva vItarAgANAM janmAsambhavaH, karmakleCarahitatvAt| tathA coktam-"cittameva hi saMsAri rAgAdikleCadUSitam| tadeva tairvinirmuktaM muktamityabhidhIyate||" iti| atha kiM Cuddhe CukrArtave eva svakarmakleCacodita eva garbhaH sampadyate~athavA~anyadapi kiJcidapekSate ? ityAha-yuktivaCAditi| yojanaM yuktiH, upAdeyasyArthasyetikartavyatAsAdhanopAyArtham| yuktervaCaH-sAmarthyaM prabhAvo, yuktivaCaH| tataH Cuddhe CukrArtave svakarmakleCacodita eva sa satvo garbhaH sampadyate, nAnyathA| katham ? ityAha-yuktivaCAdagnirivAraNau| tathA hi,- mathyamanthanamathakAdisAmagrImantareNAraNAvagniryathA na jAyate, tathA garbho~api yathoktasAmagrIvaikalyAt na bhavati| sakalasAmagrIsadbhAvata eva bhavatIti bhAvaH| 

bIjAtmakairmahAbhUtaiH sUkSmaiH satvAnugaiCca saH||2|| mAtuCcAhArarasajaiH kramAtkukSau vivarddhate||2||

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

bIjAtmakaiH-garbhajarAyusvabhAvaiH CukrArtavarUpatAM pariNataiH| kaiH ? mahAbhUtaiH, -AkACAdibhiH satvarajastamomayaiH, "tatra satvabahulamAkACam, rajobahulo vAyuH, satvarajobahulo~agniH, satvatamobahulA ApaH, tamobahulA pRthvI ceti|" (su.CA. a.1/20) ityevaMrUpaiH| saH-garbhaH, kukSau vivarddhate-viCeSeNa vRddhiM yAti| kimbhUtaiH ? sUkSmaiH,-atIndriyairyogidRCyaiH| tathA, satvaM-ceto~anugacchantIti satvAnugAni, taiH| yatra satvaM tiSThati tatrAvaCyaM tAnyapi tiSThanti, sAtvAnuCAyitvAtteSAm| tathA coktam (carake CA. a.2/37)-"atIndriyaistairatisUkSmarUpairAtmA kadAcinna viyuktapUrvaH|" ityAdi| caCabdo hetusamuccayArthaH| [ na kevalaM mahAbhUtairhetubhUtairgarbho vivarddhate yAvanmAtuCcAhArarasajairityato vakSyamANAddhetorapi varddhata ityarthaH| mAturityAdi| mAtuH sambandhibhirAhArarasajaiCca kukSau vivarddhate| caCabdo~atrAnuktasamuccayArthaH| ] na kevalaM pUrvoktAdyathAnirdiSThAddhetorgarbhaH kukSau vivarddhate, yAvadanirdiSTAdapi mAtuH saumanasyAdeH kalalArbuda peCyAdyavasthAbhAvena viCeSato vRddhiM yAtIti| kathaM vivarddhate ? ityAha-kramAt,-na jhaTityeva| nanu, "mAtuCcAhArarasajaiH" iti kathamuktam ? yataH paJcabhUtAtmaka evAhArarasaH| na ca yadAtmako~asau sa tasyaiva janmakAraNaM bhavitumarhati, avyatiriktatvAt| tasmAdevamayaM vyAkhyAtavyaH,-AhArarase jAtairAhArarasajaiH| saptamyantAdupapadAjjanerDaH| mAturAhArarasAtmanA pariNatairiti| 

tejo yathA~arkaraCmInAM sphaTikena tiraskRtam||3|| nendhanaM dRCyate gacchatsatvo garbhACayaM tathA||3||

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

na kevalaM dRCyatvAdRCyatvAbhyAM vastusadbhAvAsadbhAvau vyavasthApyete, yenAdRCyatvAtsatvasya kukSau praveCAsambhavaH| kintarhi ? tatkAryAnyathAnupapattyA~api vastusadbhAvo vyavasthApyata eva| tathA ca,- yathA~arkaraCmInAM sambandhi tejaH sphaTikena-sUryakAntAkhyena, tiraskRtaM-vyavahitaM, sphaTikasyAdhastAt sthitamindhanaM gacchat-vrajat, na dRCyate| atha ca tejaHkAryamindhanaM gataM [dRCyate nAnyasambandhi kAryam| tadevaM tejaHkAryAnyathAnupapattyA tejasa indhanagamanaM ], tathA tatra tasya sadbhAvo~apyadhigamyate| evaM satvo garbhACayaM gacchan-vrajan, na dRCyata eva| vastuprabhAvAdgacchati ca| satvaCabda upalakSaNArthaH, mahAbhUtAnyapi tadantargatAni na dRCyanta eva, atha ca kAryeNopalabhyanta eva| tadevaM satvAnuyAyibhirmahAbhUtairgarbhaH kukSau vivarddhate, na tu kevalaiH satvAnadhiSThitaiH| cetovakrAntyA hi kramAtkalalAdinA vastujAtaM  vivRddhivimalatAmApadyate, nAnyathA mRtaCarIravat| 

kAraNAnuvidhAyitvAtkAryANAM tatsvabhAvatA||4|| nAnAyonyAkRtIH satvo dhatte~ato drutalohavat||4||

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

kAraNaM-hetuM, avaCyamanuvidadhatIti kAraNAnuvidhAyIni|  AvaCyake NiniH| kAraNasvabhAvAni kAryANi bhavanti sarvANyeva, tasmAddhetoH kAryANAM tatsvabhAvatA| svabhAvaCabdaH sadRCArthaH| tacchabdena kAraNaM parAmRCyate, tasya-kAraNasya svabhAvatA, tatsAdRCyam| tasmAtkAryakAraNasAdRCyAddhetoH satvo - mahAbhUtAnuga ekarUpa eva, anekarUpA nAnAyonyAkRtIH- jAtibimbaviCeSAn, dhatte-dhArayati| kathamiva ? drutalohavat| yathA rUpyAdivastujAtamagninA drutarUpatAM gatamekarUpameva sikthAdikalpitAyAM nAnArUpAyAM manuSyAdyAkRtau tanniSiktaM tAM tAmAkRtiM yathAkalpitAM dhatte, evaM sa satvo nAnAyonau gacchati, tAM tAM yathAsvamAkRtiM dhArayati| 

ata eva ca Cukrasya bAhulyAjjAyate pumAn||5|| raktasya strI, tayoH sAmye klIbaH- ----------||5||

CArIrasthAnam

vAtAdikuNapagranthipUyakSINamalAhvayam||10|| bIjAsamarthaM retosram-----------------||10||

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

AdiCabdena pittaCleSmaNoH parigrahaH| vAtAdayaCca kuNapaM ca granthiCca pUyaCca kSINaM ca malaM ceti dvandvaH| eta AhvayaH- saMjJAH, yasya retosrasya tadevam| AhvayaCabdaH pratyekaM vAtAdiSu yojyaH| retaCcAsraM ca retosraM vAtAdyAhvayam| vAtasaMjJaM CukraM vAtaCukram| evaM pittaCukraM kaphaCukram| kuNapagandhitvAtkuNapaM nAma CukraM kuNapaCukram, tadraktena duSTena bhavati| evaM granthiCukraM pUyaCukraM kSINaCukram| malAhvayaM tu dvidhA,-mUtrapurISabhedAt| mUtrasadRCaM CukraM mUtraCukram| evaM purISaCukram| Artavamapi CukravaddoSadUSitamabIjameva| tasya liGgaM nAma ca Cukravadvedyam| yathA,-vAtArtavaM pittArtavamityAdi, yAvatpurISArtavamiti| sAdhyAsAdhyavibhAgaCca tadvadeva| CukrArtavadoSeSu ca cikitsAmapi tulyAM brUte| yatra tu viCeSaM drakSyati, tatra viCeSamabhidhAsyati| yathA (Clo.15)-"pibedgranthyArtave pAThA" ityAdi|

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

"puSpekSaNAt-puSpasya darCanAdevAnantaraM, strI tryahaM-trINi dinAni, kalyANaM-CubhaM, avaCyaM dhyAyati-cintayatIti kalyANadhyAyinI syAt| AvaCyake NiniH| tathA, mRjA-snAnakriyA, alaGkAraH-kaTakAdiH puSpAdirvA, alaGkriyate-bhUSyate CarIramebhiriti kRtvA, evaM gandhamAlyasyApyalaGkAratvam| tathA ca vakSyati (hR. ci. a. 5/82)- ""gandhamAlyAdikAM bhUSAm"" iti| mRjAlaGkArAbhyAM rahitA-varjitA| tathA darbhANAM saMstaraH-CayyA, tatra Cete sA darbhasaMstaraCAyinI| ""vrate"" iti NiniH| tathA, kSaireyaM-kSIrasiddhaM, yAvakaM-yavAnnaviCeSaM, parNe CarAve haste vA bhuJjIta-bhakSayet| kiyanmAtram ? stokaM-alpamAtram| tatkSaireyamupayuktaM kIdRCaM syAt ? ityAha-koSThaCodhanakarSaNamiti| CodhanaM ca karSaNaM ca CodhanakarSaNam| koSThasya CodhanakarSaNamiti SaSThIsamAsaH| CarIrasya mahAstroto madhyamo bhAga AmapakvasyACayaH koSThaCabdavAcyaH| sa eva garbhAdhiSThAnam, atastasyaiva Codhanam| tathA, tadaGgAnAM karSaNamiti vyAkhyeyam| na punaH koSThasya CodhanamanyeSAM cAGgAnAM karSaNam| tathA hi-trivRdAdinA viricyate, naivamanena yAvakena| vastusvAbhAvyAt koSThaCodhanakarSaNamAtrameva kriyate| kSaireyamiti ""kSIrADDhaJ"" iti DhaJ| yAva eva yAvaka iti ""yAvAdibhyaH kan"" iti kan| tathA, brahmacAriNI-tyaktavyavAyA, syAt|  tataH-tryahAdUrdhvaM,caturthe vAsare snAtA, tathA CuklAni mAlyAnyambarANi ca yasyAH saivam, tathA CuciH-antarbahiCca pavitrA satI, puraH-pUrvaM, patiM paCyet| saGgrahe~apyuktam (CA. a. 1)- caturthe tvahanyudvartitA CItasalilasnAtA~anuliptA~alaGkRtA CuklamAlyAmbarA kRtamaGgalasvastyayanaivaMvidhameva bhartAraM paCyedananyamanAH| tadA hi yAdRCaM paCyati cintayati vA tAdRCameva prasUta iti|"" iti| tatkiM tryahameva RtuH, atraiva puSpadarCanAt athottarakAlamapi ? ityACaGkyAha----

puSpadarCanAtprabhRti yAvaddvAdaCarAtrayastAvadRturyoSitaH, na punastryahameva, yatra puSpaM pravartate, iti RtuCabdena darCayati| atra-asmin dvAdaCaniCAvadhAvRtukAle, yAH pUrvAstistro niCAH,  yAsu prAyaH puSpaM pravartate, tA nindyAH-garhyAH sadbhiH| na tatra sanmatiH striyaM saGgacchet| ata evAtra brahmacAritvopadeCaH| tathA, ekAdaCI niCA nindyA-apraCastA| caCabdo~atrAnuktAyAstrayodaCyAH samuccayArthaH| trayodaCyAM hi mithunIbhAve napuMsakasyotpattiriti kecidAhuH| yugmAsu-caturthaSaSThASTamadaCamadvAdaCalakSaNAsu niCAsu, saGgame putraH syAt, acintyatvAdRtubhAvasya| tAsu hi rAtriSvArtavamalpIbhavati| anyAsu -ayugmAsu niCAsu paJcamIsaptamInavamISu, kanyA jAyate| tadA hi CukramalpIbhavati, pUrvoktAddhetoH| yadi punarAhArAdivaCAt CukrasyAdhikatvamayugmAsu, yugmAsu cArtavapUrNatA syAt, tadA pumAn stryAkRtirdurbalo hInAGgo vA jAyate, strI ca puruSAkRtirdurbalA hInAGgA vA| ekAdaCItrayodaCyostu napuMsakamiti| tadevaM dampatI puMgarbhamicchantau yugmAsu niCAsu puMsavanAdikaM karmAcaretAm, strIgarbhamicchantau tvayugmAsu rAtriSu|

athetyAnantarye maGgalasUcako nirdiSTaH| ata evAyamatrArthaH-RtukAlAdanantaraM maGgalapUrvikAM sarvAmimAM vakSyamANAmitikartavyatAM kuryAditi| upAdhyAyaH-purohito~atharvavedavit, putrIyaM-putrAya hitaM, vidhimitthaM kurvIta| katham ? vidhivat na yathAkathaJcit| vidhivaditi praCaMsAyAM matup| kriyAviCeSaNaM caitat, tena praCastaM vedoktamanyUnAtiriktavidhAnaM yathA bhavati tathAvidhaM kurvItetyavatiSThate| brahmANadivarNatrayasyemaM vidhiM kurvIta| CUdrAyAH punarnamaskAraparAyAH-namaskArapradhAnAyAH, yathoktaM sarvaM vidhiM mantravarjitaM kuryAt| putrIyamiti "putrAccha ca" iti cchaH|

garbhasya saGge-saktau, yoniM kRSNasarpanirmokena dhUpayet-dhUpanaM yonau kuryAt| dhUpayediti "gupUdhUpa" ityAdinA AyapratyayaH, tato vidhau liG|  tathA, hiraNyapuSpImUlaM pANinA pAdena ca sA garbhiNI dhArayet| athavA, suvarcalAM viCalyAM vA dhArayet|  etat-garbhasaGgoktaM, jarAyoH-aparAkhyasya, apatane-aniSkrAntau, kAryaM-vidhAtavyam|  na kevalaM garbhasaGgoktaM kAryaM yAvadenAM-apatitajarAyuM, bAhvordvayorutkSipya vikampayet-vidhunIta| saGgrahe tUktam (CA. a. 3)- "na cedaparA patati tato dakSiNena pANinA nAbherupariSTAdbalavadutpIDyAnyena pRSThata upasaGgRhya vidhunuyAt|" iti|  tathA, pArSNyA kaTImAkoTayediti punaH punaH kaTyAM pArSNighAtaM kuryAdityarthaH|  tathA, sphijau yutau suSThu nipIDayet|  tathA, veNyA-keCaracanAviCeSAkhyayA, tAlukaNThaM spRCet|  saGgrahe~apyuktam (CA. a. 3)- "veNyA~aGgulyA vA keCaveSTitayA vA tAlukaNThaM parAmRCet|" iti|  tathA, mUrdhni-mastake, snuhIpayaH-sudhAdugdhaM dadyAt|  tathA bhUrjAdibhirdravyaiH pRthak-pratyekaM, athavA dvAbhyAM kRtvA, samastairvA, yonyA lepanaM dhUpanaM ca kAryamiti CeSaH| kuSThatAlIsapatrayoH kalkaM vA surAmaNDena-surAbhAgenoparisthitena, tAM pAyayet|  athavA, kulatthAnAM yUSeNa-kvAthena, pAyayet|  bAlvajenAsavena vA| balvajaM vAriNA Asutya rAtrau dhAritaM tacchItakaSAyo bAlvaja Asava ucyate|  saGgrahe~apyuktam (CA. a. 3)- "bhUrjapatrakAcamaNisarpanirmokaiCca yoniM dhUpayet| bhUrjaguggulubhyAM vA| CAlimUlasiddhena vA sarpiSA yonimabhyajya kaTukAlAbujAlinInimbasarpanirmokairdhUpayet|  anabhyaktAM vA kaTutailamiCraiH kalkIkRtairvA tailAktairAlimpet|  guDanAgarakalkena vA| tadeva vA bhakSayet| lAGgalImUlakalkena vA pANipAdamudaraM ca limpet|" iti| tathoktam (saM. CarIramadhikRtya kRto granthaH CArIraH| garbhasyAvakrAntiH-avakramaNaM samprAptiH, yathA~agarbho garbhatAM sampadyata ityarthaH| garbhAvakrAntirvidyate yasminnadhyAya iti matvarthe kapratyayaH| tasya "adhyAyAnuvAkayorluk" iti luk| athAdiCabdAnAmarthA AyuSkAmIyAdhyAye (hR.sU.  a.1) vyAkhyAtA eva|

 Cuddhe CukrArtave satvaH  svakarmakleCacoditaH||1|| garbhaH sampadyate yuktivaCAdagnirivAraNau||1||

CukraM-antyo dhAtuH| Rtau bhavamArtavam, strINAM yadapatyamArgAt CuddhamISatkRSNaM vigandhaM ca vAyupreritaM lohitaM pravartate tadArtavamucyate| CukraM cArtavaM ca CukrArtavam, piNDe pitroH sambandhi garbhabIjam, tasmin CukrArtave, Cuddhe-vAtAdibhiradUSite~adhiSThAnabhUte, satvo-jIvaH, garbhaH sampadyate| kila nAsau garbhaH, atha ca garbhatAmAsAdayati| kIdRCaH satvaH ? svakarmetyAdi| karmANi-pUrvajanmArjitAni CubhACubhAni, svAni ca tAni karmANi ca svakarmANi| kleCayanti-lokAn duHkhayantIti, kleCAH| te ca-avidyAsmitArAgadveSAbhiniveCAH| atathAvastuni tatheti ("anityACuciduHkhAnAtmasu nityaCucisukhAtma) khyAtiH-avidyA| dRgdarCanaCaktyorekAtmatA - asmitA| sukhAnuCayI-rAgaH| duHkhAnuCayI-dveSaH| svarasavAhI viduSo~api tathA rUDhaH-abhiniveCaH" (pAta.yo.sU 2/5-6-7-8-9)| svakarmANi ca kleCACca, svakarmakleCAH, taiCcoditaH-prerito garbhaH sampadyate, na tu karmakleCaviyuktaH| ata eva vItarAgANAM janmAsambhavaH, karmakleCarahitatvAt| tathA coktam-"cittameva hi saMsAri rAgAdikleCadUSitam| tadeva tairvinirmuktaM muktamityabhidhIyate||" iti| atha kiM Cuddhe CukrArtave eva svakarmakleCacodita eva garbhaH sampadyate~athavA~anyadapi kiJcidapekSate ? ityAha-yuktivaCAditi| yojanaM yuktiH, upAdeyasyArthasyetikartavyatAsAdhanopAyArtham| yuktervaCaH-sAmarthyaM prabhAvo, yuktivaCaH| tataH Cuddhe CukrArtave svakarmakleCacodita eva sa satvo garbhaH sampadyate, nAnyathA| katham ? ityAha-yuktivaCAdagnirivAraNau| tathA hi,- mathyamanthanamathakAdisAmagrImantareNAraNAvagniryathA na jAyate, tathA garbho~api yathoktasAmagrIvaikalyAt na bhavati| sakalasAmagrIsadbhAvata eva bhavatIti bhAvaH| 

bIjAtmakairmahAbhUtaiH sUkSmaiH satvAnugaiCca saH||2|| mAtuCcAhArarasajaiH kramAtkukSau vivarddhate||2||

bIjAtmakaiH-garbhajarAyusvabhAvaiH CukrArtavarUpatAM pariNataiH| kaiH ? mahAbhUtaiH, -AkACAdibhiH satvarajastamomayaiH, "tatra satvabahulamAkACam, rajobahulo vAyuH, satvarajobahulo~agniH, satvatamobahulA ApaH, tamobahulA pRthvI ceti|" (su.CA. a.1/20) ityevaMrUpaiH| saH-garbhaH, kukSau vivarddhate-viCeSeNa vRddhiM yAti| kimbhUtaiH ? sUkSmaiH,-atIndriyairyogidRCyaiH| tathA, satvaM-ceto~anugacchantIti satvAnugAni, taiH| yatra satvaM tiSThati tatrAvaCyaM tAnyapi tiSThanti, sAtvAnuCAyitvAtteSAm| tathA coktam (carake CA. a.2/37)-"atIndriyaistairatisUkSmarUpairAtmA kadAcinna viyuktapUrvaH|" ityAdi| caCabdo hetusamuccayArthaH| [ na kevalaM mahAbhUtairhetubhUtairgarbho vivarddhate yAvanmAtuCcAhArarasajairityato vakSyamANAddhetorapi varddhata ityarthaH| mAturityAdi| mAtuH sambandhibhirAhArarasajaiCca kukSau vivarddhate| caCabdo~atrAnuktasamuccayArthaH| ] na kevalaM pUrvoktAdyathAnirdiSThAddhetorgarbhaH kukSau vivarddhate, yAvadanirdiSTAdapi mAtuH saumanasyAdeH kalalArbuda peCyAdyavasthAbhAvena viCeSato vRddhiM yAtIti| kathaM vivarddhate ? ityAha-kramAt,-na jhaTityeva| nanu, "mAtuCcAhArarasajaiH" iti kathamuktam ? yataH paJcabhUtAtmaka evAhArarasaH| na ca yadAtmako~asau sa tasyaiva janmakAraNaM bhavitumarhati, avyatiriktatvAt| tasmAdevamayaM vyAkhyAtavyaH,-AhArarase jAtairAhArarasajaiH| saptamyantAdupapadAjjanerDaH| mAturAhArarasAtmanA pariNatairiti| 

tejo yathA~arkaraCmInAM sphaTikena tiraskRtam||3|| nendhanaM dRCyate gacchatsatvo garbhACayaM tathA||3||

na kevalaM dRCyatvAdRCyatvAbhyAM vastusadbhAvAsadbhAvau vyavasthApyete, yenAdRCyatvAtsatvasya kukSau praveCAsambhavaH| kintarhi ? tatkAryAnyathAnupapattyA~api vastusadbhAvo vyavasthApyata eva| tathA ca,- yathA~arkaraCmInAM sambandhi tejaH sphaTikena-sUryakAntAkhyena, tiraskRtaM-vyavahitaM, sphaTikasyAdhastAt sthitamindhanaM gacchat-vrajat, na dRCyate| atha ca tejaHkAryamindhanaM gataM [dRCyate nAnyasambandhi kAryam| tadevaM tejaHkAryAnyathAnupapattyA tejasa indhanagamanaM ], tathA tatra tasya sadbhAvo~apyadhigamyate| evaM satvo garbhACayaM gacchan-vrajan, na dRCyata eva| vastuprabhAvAdgacchati ca| satvaCabda upalakSaNArthaH, mahAbhUtAnyapi tadantargatAni na dRCyanta eva, atha ca kAryeNopalabhyanta eva| tadevaM satvAnuyAyibhirmahAbhUtairgarbhaH kukSau vivarddhate, na tu kevalaiH satvAnadhiSThitaiH| cetovakrAntyA hi kramAtkalalAdinA vastujAtaM  vivRddhivimalatAmApadyate, nAnyathA mRtaCarIravat| 

kAraNAnuvidhAyitvAtkAryANAM tatsvabhAvatA||4|| nAnAyonyAkRtIH satvo dhatte~ato drutalohavat||4||

kAraNaM-hetuM, avaCyamanuvidadhatIti kAraNAnuvidhAyIni|  AvaCyake NiniH| kAraNasvabhAvAni kAryANi bhavanti sarvANyeva, tasmAddhetoH kAryANAM tatsvabhAvatA| svabhAvaCabdaH sadRCArthaH| tacchabdena kAraNaM parAmRCyate, tasya-kAraNasya svabhAvatA, tatsAdRCyam| tasmAtkAryakAraNasAdRCyAddhetoH satvo - mahAbhUtAnuga ekarUpa eva, anekarUpA nAnAyonyAkRtIH- jAtibimbaviCeSAn, dhatte-dhArayati| kathamiva ? drutalohavat| yathA rUpyAdivastujAtamagninA drutarUpatAM gatamekarUpameva sikthAdikalpitAyAM nAnArUpAyAM manuSyAdyAkRtau tanniSiktaM tAM tAmAkRtiM yathAkalpitAM dhatte, evaM sa satvo nAnAyonau gacchati, tAM tAM yathAsvamAkRtiM dhArayati| 

ata eva ca Cukrasya bAhulyAjjAyate pumAn||5|| raktasya strI, tayoH sAmye klIbaH- ----------||5||

ata eva ca - pUrvoktAtkAryakAraNasAdRCyAkhyAddhetoH, Cukrasya - puMretaso, bAhulyAt- bahutvAt, sAmarthyalabhyAcca strIretorajolpatvAt pumAn jAyate na strI, tathAvidhasya kAraNasyAbhAvAt| ["tathA, ata eva-pUrvoktAtkAryakAraNasAdRCyAt strIretaso" raktasya, bAhulyAt-bAhutvAt, sAmarthyalabhyAcca puMretolpatvAt strI jAyate na pumAn, tathAvidhasya kAraNasyAbhAvAt| ] puMreto hi balavat, alpaM strIrajo~abhibhUya puMgarbhasya kAraNatAM yAti| yadA tu strIrajaso balavatvamalpatvaM ca puMretasaH, tadA~alpaM tu puMreto~abhibhUya strIrajaH stryAkhyasya garbhasya kAraNatAmApadyate| yadA tu CukrArtavayoH sAmyaM-tulyatvaM bhavati, tadA na strI na pumAn jAyate, api tu liGgadvayAliGgitaH klIbaH-SaNDho, jAyate| evaM pituH sambandhi CukraM strIraktamiCritaM garbhakAraNam| na kevalaM pitRsambandhyeva mAturvA| dAruvAhinA tUktam-"strIpuMsayostu saMyoge yadyAdau visRjetpumAn| CukraM, tataH pumAn vIro jAyate balavAn dRDhaH|| atha cedvanitA pUrvaM visRjedraktasaMyutam| tato rUpAnvitA kanyA jAyate dRDhasaMhatA||" iti| ata eva ca puMgarbhAH kecitkiJcinmAtRsadRCA dRCyante, strIgarbhACca kecitkiJcitpitRsadRCA dRCyante| nanu, "rasAdraktaM tato mAMsaM mAMsAnmedastato~asthi ca| asthno majjA tataH CukraM CukrAdgarbhaH prajAyate||" (hR. CA. a. 3/62) ityaviCiSya nirdiSTam,  na tu puMCukrAdgarbhaH prajAyata ityevaM nirdiSTam| ubhayorapi ca strIpuMsayoravaCyaM saptadhAtukatvamabhyupagantavyam, na puMsa eva| tadevaM taruNInAM kusumaCarAkrAntamAnasAnAM tathAvidhena puruSasaMyogena vinA kevalAt smRtisaMsparCadarCanAccalitaprastruta (rakta)retasAM kimiti garbho na jAyate ? CukrArtavaM hi garbhakAraNam| tacca sannihitameveti kecit| tAn brUmahe| puMCukrAbhAvAt| puMCukraM hi strIretoraktayuktaM garbhakAraNam| na ca tadatrAsti| tadabhAvAdgarbhasyAnutpattiH| tathA saGgrahe~apyadhyagISTa (CA. a. 1)-"yoSito~api sravantyeva CukraM puMsaH samAgame| garbhasya tu na tatkiJcitkarotIti na cintyate||" iti| 

 …………………………… CukrArtave punaH||5|| vAyunA bahuCo bhinne yathAsvaM bahvapatyatA||6||

vAtena yathAsvaM CukrArtave bahuCo bhinne-bahudhA kRte sati, bahvapatyatA bhavati| yathAsvamiti yadA CukramAdhikyena vartamAnaM vAtena bahudhA bhidyate tadA puMgarbhAnekatvam, yadA tu strIraja Adhikyena vartamAnaM vAyunA bahudhA bhidyate tadA strIgarbhAnekatvam, iti bahvapatyatA bhavati| sUkarasArameyAdijAtiSu tvanenaiva hetunA sadA~anekApatyatA| 

viyonivikRtAkArA jAyante vikRtairmalaiH||6||

viyonayaCca vikRtAkArACca viyonivikRtAkArAH, te tathAvidhA garbhA jAyante| katham ? ityAha-vikRtairmalaiH| vAtAdibhirduSTairunmArgagAmibhiH|

 mAsi mAsi rajaH strINAM rasajaM sravati tryaham||7|| vatsarAddvAdaCAdUrdhvaM yAti paJcACataH kSayam||7||

strINAM mAsi mAsi-pratimAsaM, rajo-raktaM, tryahaM sravati-trINi dinAni pravartate| nanu, "Cuddhe CukrArtave" iti pUrvaM CukramevoddiSTam, tatastasyaiva nirdeCo nyAyya iti CukramAnupUrvIprAptamullaGghya kasmAdraktaM nirdiSTam? ucyate| bahuvaktavyatvAt| rakte hi bahuvaktavyamasti, atastadeva prAgvaktuM yuktam| tryahamiti "kAlAdhvanoH" iti dvitIyA| kimbhUtaM rajaH ? rasAjjAtaM - rasajam| nanu, raktaM rasajameva| vakSyati hi (hR. CA. a. 3/62)- "rasAdraktaM tato mAMsaM" ityAdi| tatkimarthaM rasajamityuktam ? brUmahe| rasAt-AhArarasAt pariNamato jAtaM rasajamityatra nirdiSTam, na tu rasadhAtoH, ityacodyametat| kutaHprabhRti tadrajaH pravartate ? ityAha-vatsarAdityAdi| dvAdaCAdvarSAdUrdhvaM-anantaraM, sravati| paJcACato varSAdUrdhvaM-pareNa, kSayaM yAti| dvAdaCAnAM pUraNaM varSamiti "tasya pUraNo DaT" iti DaT| dvAdaCAditi prAyikametat, ekAdaCavArSikANAmapi strINAM raktapravRttidarCanAt| paJcACataH kSayamityatrApyevameva cintyam|

pUrNaSoDaCavarSA strI pUrNaviMCena saGgatA||8|| Cuddhe garbhACaye mArge rakte Cukre~anile hRdi||8|| vIryavantaM sutaM sUte tato nyUnAbdayoH punaH||9|| rogyalpAyuradhanyo vA garbho bhavati naiva vA||9||

"pUrNAni SoDaCavarSANi yasyAH sA, evaMvidhA strI pUrNaviMCena nareNa saGgatA-mithunatAM yAtA satI, garbhACayAdiSu CuddheSu vIryavantaM-sAmarthyayuktaM, putraM sUte-janayati| prAyikaM caitat, arvAgapi sAdhugarbhadarCanAt| ata evAyameva tantrakAro~anyathA saGgrahe jagAda (CA. a. 1)- ""SoDaCavarSAyAM paJcaviMCativarSaH putrArthaM prayateta|"" iti| viMCateH pUraNa iti DaTiti ""viMCateH"" iti tilope viMCaCabdaH| pUrNo viMCo yasyeti pUrNaviMCaH| garbhasyACayo garbhACayaH, tasmin| Cuddhe-nirmale, vAtAdibhiraduSTe| tathA, mArge-prakRtatvAdapatyamArge, vAtAdibhiraduSTe| tathA, rakte - strIrajasi, Cuddhe| tathA, Cukre-puMbIje, Cuddhe| tathA, anile Cuddhe - pittAdibhiranAvRte| tathA, hRdi-Cuddhe-doSAnadhiSThite~asantapte| 
tataH-pUrvoktAdvayaHparimANAt, nyUnAbdayoH-hInavarSayoH strIpuruSayoH paJcadaCASTAdaCavarSayoH, rogI bhavati| rogItyatiCaya inirmatvarthIyaH| tathotpanno~alpAyuradhanyaCca-apraCasto, garbho bhavati| na bhavatyeva vA|"

CArIrasthAnam

garbhAvakrAntiradhyAyaH

athAto garbhAvakrAnti CArIraM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2|| iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

CarIramadhikRtya kRto granthaH CArIraH| garbhasyAvakrAntiH-avakramaNaM samprAptiH, yathA~agarbho garbhatAM sampadyata ityarthaH| garbhAvakrAntirvidyate yasminnadhyAya iti matvarthe kapratyayaH| tasya "adhyAyAnuvAkayorluk" iti luk| athAdiCabdAnAmarthA AyuSkAmIyAdhyAye (hR.sU.  a.1) vyAkhyAtA eva|

 Cuddhe CukrArtave satvaH  svakarmakleCacoditaH||1|| garbhaH sampadyate yuktivaCAdagnirivAraNau||1||

CukraM-antyo dhAtuH| Rtau bhavamArtavam, strINAM yadapatyamArgAt CuddhamISatkRSNaM vigandhaM ca vAyupreritaM lohitaM pravartate tadArtavamucyate| CukraM cArtavaM ca CukrArtavam, piNDe pitroH sambandhi garbhabIjam, tasmin CukrArtave, Cuddhe-vAtAdibhiradUSite~adhiSThAnabhUte, satvo-jIvaH, garbhaH sampadyate| kila nAsau garbhaH, atha ca garbhatAmAsAdayati| kIdRCaH satvaH ? svakarmetyAdi| karmANi-pUrvajanmArjitAni CubhACubhAni, svAni ca tAni karmANi ca svakarmANi| kleCayanti-lokAn duHkhayantIti, kleCAH| te ca-avidyAsmitArAgadveSAbhiniveCAH| atathAvastuni tatheti ("anityACuciduHkhAnAtmasu nityaCucisukhAtma) khyAtiH-avidyA| dRgdarCanaCaktyorekAtmatA - asmitA| sukhAnuCayI-rAgaH| duHkhAnuCayI-dveSaH| svarasavAhI viduSo~api tathA rUDhaH-abhiniveCaH" (pAta.yo.sU 2/5-6-7-8-9)| svakarmANi ca kleCACca, svakarmakleCAH, taiCcoditaH-prerito garbhaH sampadyate, na tu karmakleCaviyuktaH| ata eva vItarAgANAM janmAsambhavaH, karmakleCarahitatvAt| tathA coktam-"cittameva hi saMsAri rAgAdikleCadUSitam| tadeva tairvinirmuktaM muktamityabhidhIyate||" iti| atha kiM Cuddhe CukrArtave eva svakarmakleCacodita eva garbhaH sampadyate~athavA~anyadapi kiJcidapekSate ? ityAha-yuktivaCAditi| yojanaM yuktiH, upAdeyasyArthasyetikartavyatAsAdhanopAyArtham| yuktervaCaH-sAmarthyaM prabhAvo, yuktivaCaH| tataH Cuddhe CukrArtave svakarmakleCacodita eva sa satvo garbhaH sampadyate, nAnyathA| katham ? ityAha-yuktivaCAdagnirivAraNau| tathA hi,- mathyamanthanamathakAdisAmagrImantareNAraNAvagniryathA na jAyate, tathA garbho~api yathoktasAmagrIvaikalyAt na bhavati| sakalasAmagrIsadbhAvata eva bhavatIti bhAvaH| 

bIjAtmakairmahAbhUtaiH sUkSmaiH satvAnugaiCca saH||2|| mAtuCcAhArarasajaiH kramAtkukSau vivarddhate||2||

bIjAtmakaiH-garbhajarAyusvabhAvaiH CukrArtavarUpatAM pariNataiH| kaiH ? mahAbhUtaiH, -AkACAdibhiH satvarajastamomayaiH, "tatra satvabahulamAkACam, rajobahulo vAyuH, satvarajobahulo~agniH, satvatamobahulA ApaH, tamobahulA pRthvI ceti|" (su.CA. a.1/20) ityevaMrUpaiH| saH-garbhaH, kukSau vivarddhate-viCeSeNa vRddhiM yAti| kimbhUtaiH ? sUkSmaiH,-atIndriyairyogidRCyaiH| tathA, satvaM-ceto~anugacchantIti satvAnugAni, taiH| yatra satvaM tiSThati tatrAvaCyaM tAnyapi tiSThanti, sAtvAnuCAyitvAtteSAm| tathA coktam (carake CA. a.2/37)-"atIndriyaistairatisUkSmarUpairAtmA kadAcinna viyuktapUrvaH|" ityAdi| caCabdo hetusamuccayArthaH| [ na kevalaM mahAbhUtairhetubhUtairgarbho vivarddhate yAvanmAtuCcAhArarasajairityato vakSyamANAddhetorapi varddhata ityarthaH| mAturityAdi| mAtuH sambandhibhirAhArarasajaiCca kukSau vivarddhate| caCabdo~atrAnuktasamuccayArthaH| ] na kevalaM pUrvoktAdyathAnirdiSThAddhetorgarbhaH kukSau vivarddhate, yAvadanirdiSTAdapi mAtuH saumanasyAdeH kalalArbuda peCyAdyavasthAbhAvena viCeSato vRddhiM yAtIti| kathaM vivarddhate ? ityAha-kramAt,-na jhaTityeva| nanu, "mAtuCcAhArarasajaiH" iti kathamuktam ? yataH paJcabhUtAtmaka evAhArarasaH| na ca yadAtmako~asau sa tasyaiva janmakAraNaM bhavitumarhati, avyatiriktatvAt| tasmAdevamayaM vyAkhyAtavyaH,-AhArarase jAtairAhArarasajaiH| saptamyantAdupapadAjjanerDaH| mAturAhArarasAtmanA pariNatairiti| 

tejo yathA~arkaraCmInAM sphaTikena tiraskRtam||3|| nendhanaM dRCyate gacchatsatvo garbhACayaM tathA||3||

na kevalaM dRCyatvAdRCyatvAbhyAM vastusadbhAvAsadbhAvau vyavasthApyete, yenAdRCyatvAtsatvasya kukSau praveCAsambhavaH| kintarhi ? tatkAryAnyathAnupapattyA~api vastusadbhAvo vyavasthApyata eva| tathA ca,- yathA~arkaraCmInAM sambandhi tejaH sphaTikena-sUryakAntAkhyena, tiraskRtaM-vyavahitaM, sphaTikasyAdhastAt sthitamindhanaM gacchat-vrajat, na dRCyate| atha ca tejaHkAryamindhanaM gataM [dRCyate nAnyasambandhi kAryam| tadevaM tejaHkAryAnyathAnupapattyA tejasa indhanagamanaM ], tathA tatra tasya sadbhAvo~apyadhigamyate| evaM satvo garbhACayaM gacchan-vrajan, na dRCyata eva| vastuprabhAvAdgacchati ca| satvaCabda upalakSaNArthaH, mahAbhUtAnyapi tadantargatAni na dRCyanta eva, atha ca kAryeNopalabhyanta eva| tadevaM satvAnuyAyibhirmahAbhUtairgarbhaH kukSau vivarddhate, na tu kevalaiH satvAnadhiSThitaiH| cetovakrAntyA hi kramAtkalalAdinA vastujAtaM  vivRddhivimalatAmApadyate, nAnyathA mRtaCarIravat| 

kAraNAnuvidhAyitvAtkAryANAM tatsvabhAvatA||4|| nAnAyonyAkRtIH satvo dhatte~ato drutalohavat||4||

kAraNaM-hetuM, avaCyamanuvidadhatIti kAraNAnuvidhAyIni|  AvaCyake NiniH| kAraNasvabhAvAni kAryANi bhavanti sarvANyeva, tasmAddhetoH kAryANAM tatsvabhAvatA| svabhAvaCabdaH sadRCArthaH| tacchabdena kAraNaM parAmRCyate, tasya-kAraNasya svabhAvatA, tatsAdRCyam| tasmAtkAryakAraNasAdRCyAddhetoH satvo - mahAbhUtAnuga ekarUpa eva, anekarUpA nAnAyonyAkRtIH- jAtibimbaviCeSAn, dhatte-dhArayati| kathamiva ? drutalohavat| yathA rUpyAdivastujAtamagninA drutarUpatAM gatamekarUpameva sikthAdikalpitAyAM nAnArUpAyAM manuSyAdyAkRtau tanniSiktaM tAM tAmAkRtiM yathAkalpitAM dhatte, evaM sa satvo nAnAyonau gacchati, tAM tAM yathAsvamAkRtiM dhArayati| 

ata eva ca Cukrasya bAhulyAjjAyate pumAn||5|| raktasya strI, tayoH sAmye klIbaH- ----------||5||

ata eva ca - pUrvoktAtkAryakAraNasAdRCyAkhyAddhetoH, Cukrasya - puMretaso, bAhulyAt- bahutvAt, sAmarthyalabhyAcca strIretorajolpatvAt pumAn jAyate na strI, tathAvidhasya kAraNasyAbhAvAt| ["tathA, ata eva-pUrvoktAtkAryakAraNasAdRCyAt strIretaso" raktasya, bAhulyAt-bAhutvAt, sAmarthyalabhyAcca puMretolpatvAt strI jAyate na pumAn, tathAvidhasya kAraNasyAbhAvAt| ] puMreto hi balavat, alpaM strIrajo~abhibhUya puMgarbhasya kAraNatAM yAti| yadA tu strIrajaso balavatvamalpatvaM ca puMretasaH, tadA~alpaM tu puMreto~abhibhUya strIrajaH stryAkhyasya garbhasya kAraNatAmApadyate| yadA tu CukrArtavayoH sAmyaM-tulyatvaM bhavati, tadA na strI na pumAn jAyate, api tu liGgadvayAliGgitaH klIbaH-SaNDho, jAyate| evaM pituH sambandhi CukraM strIraktamiCritaM garbhakAraNam| na kevalaM pitRsambandhyeva mAturvA| dAruvAhinA tUktam-"strIpuMsayostu saMyoge yadyAdau visRjetpumAn| CukraM, tataH pumAn vIro jAyate balavAn dRDhaH|| atha cedvanitA pUrvaM visRjedraktasaMyutam| tato rUpAnvitA kanyA jAyate dRDhasaMhatA||" iti| ata eva ca puMgarbhAH kecitkiJcinmAtRsadRCA dRCyante, strIgarbhACca kecitkiJcitpitRsadRCA dRCyante| nanu, "rasAdraktaM tato mAMsaM mAMsAnmedastato~asthi ca| asthno majjA tataH CukraM CukrAdgarbhaH prajAyate||" (hR. CA. a. 3/62) ityaviCiSya nirdiSTam,  na tu puMCukrAdgarbhaH prajAyata ityevaM nirdiSTam| ubhayorapi ca strIpuMsayoravaCyaM saptadhAtukatvamabhyupagantavyam, na puMsa eva| tadevaM taruNInAM kusumaCarAkrAntamAnasAnAM tathAvidhena puruSasaMyogena vinA kevalAt smRtisaMsparCadarCanAccalitaprastruta (rakta)retasAM kimiti garbho na jAyate ? CukrArtavaM hi garbhakAraNam| tacca sannihitameveti kecit| tAn brUmahe| puMCukrAbhAvAt| puMCukraM hi strIretoraktayuktaM garbhakAraNam| na ca tadatrAsti| tadabhAvAdgarbhasyAnutpattiH| tathA saGgrahe~apyadhyagISTa (CA. a. 1)-"yoSito~api sravantyeva CukraM puMsaH samAgame| garbhasya tu na tatkiJcitkarotIti na cintyate||" iti| 

 …………………………… CukrArtave punaH||5|| vAyunA bahuCo bhinne yathAsvaM bahvapatyatA||6||

vAtena yathAsvaM CukrArtave bahuCo bhinne-bahudhA kRte sati, bahvapatyatA bhavati| yathAsvamiti yadA CukramAdhikyena vartamAnaM vAtena bahudhA bhidyate tadA puMgarbhAnekatvam, yadA tu strIraja Adhikyena vartamAnaM vAyunA bahudhA bhidyate tadA strIgarbhAnekatvam, iti bahvapatyatA bhavati| sUkarasArameyAdijAtiSu tvanenaiva hetunA sadA~anekApatyatA| 

viyonivikRtAkArA jAyante vikRtairmalaiH||6||

viyonayaCca vikRtAkArACca viyonivikRtAkArAH, te tathAvidhA garbhA jAyante| katham ? ityAha-vikRtairmalaiH| vAtAdibhirduSTairunmArgagAmibhiH|

 mAsi mAsi rajaH strINAM rasajaM sravati tryaham||7|| vatsarAddvAdaCAdUrdhvaM yAti paJcACataH kSayam||7||

strINAM mAsi mAsi-pratimAsaM, rajo-raktaM, tryahaM sravati-trINi dinAni pravartate| nanu, "Cuddhe CukrArtave" iti pUrvaM CukramevoddiSTam, tatastasyaiva nirdeCo nyAyya iti CukramAnupUrvIprAptamullaGghya kasmAdraktaM nirdiSTam? ucyate| bahuvaktavyatvAt| rakte hi bahuvaktavyamasti, atastadeva prAgvaktuM yuktam| tryahamiti "kAlAdhvanoH" iti dvitIyA| kimbhUtaM rajaH ? rasAjjAtaM - rasajam| nanu, raktaM rasajameva| vakSyati hi (hR. CA. a. 3/62)- "rasAdraktaM tato mAMsaM" ityAdi| tatkimarthaM rasajamityuktam ? brUmahe| rasAt-AhArarasAt pariNamato jAtaM rasajamityatra nirdiSTam, na tu rasadhAtoH, ityacodyametat| kutaHprabhRti tadrajaH pravartate ? ityAha-vatsarAdityAdi| dvAdaCAdvarSAdUrdhvaM-anantaraM, sravati| paJcACato varSAdUrdhvaM-pareNa, kSayaM yAti| dvAdaCAnAM pUraNaM varSamiti "tasya pUraNo DaT" iti DaT| dvAdaCAditi prAyikametat, ekAdaCavArSikANAmapi strINAM raktapravRttidarCanAt| paJcACataH kSayamityatrApyevameva cintyam|

pUrNaSoDaCavarSA strI pUrNaviMCena saGgatA||8|| Cuddhe garbhACaye mArge rakte Cukre~anile hRdi||8|| vIryavantaM sutaM sUte tato nyUnAbdayoH punaH||9|| rogyalpAyuradhanyo vA garbho bhavati naiva vA||9||

"pUrNAni SoDaCavarSANi yasyAH sA, evaMvidhA strI pUrNaviMCena nareNa saGgatA-mithunatAM yAtA satI, garbhACayAdiSu CuddheSu vIryavantaM-sAmarthyayuktaM, putraM sUte-janayati| prAyikaM caitat, arvAgapi sAdhugarbhadarCanAt| ata evAyameva tantrakAro~anyathA saGgrahe jagAda (CA. a. 1)- ""SoDaCavarSAyAM paJcaviMCativarSaH putrArthaM prayateta|"" iti| viMCateH pUraNa iti DaTiti ""viMCateH"" iti tilope viMCaCabdaH| pUrNo viMCo yasyeti pUrNaviMCaH| garbhasyACayo garbhACayaH, tasmin| Cuddhe-nirmale, vAtAdibhiraduSTe| tathA, mArge-prakRtatvAdapatyamArge, vAtAdibhiraduSTe| tathA, rakte - strIrajasi, Cuddhe| tathA, Cukre-puMbIje, Cuddhe| tathA, anile Cuddhe - pittAdibhiranAvRte| tathA, hRdi-Cuddhe-doSAnadhiSThite~asantapte| 
tataH-pUrvoktAdvayaHparimANAt, nyUnAbdayoH-hInavarSayoH strIpuruSayoH paJcadaCASTAdaCavarSayoH, rogI bhavati| rogItyatiCaya inirmatvarthIyaH| tathotpanno~alpAyuradhanyaCca-apraCasto, garbho bhavati| na bhavatyeva vA|"

svaM-AtmIyaM, ca tadauSadhaM ca svauSadham, vAtAdyauSadhamityarthaH| tena vAyoH kupitasya yadauSadhaM-praCamopAyaH snigdhoSNAmlalavaNAdi, pittasya madhuraCItakaSAyAdi, CleSmaNaH kaTukarUkSakaSAyAdi, tattasya bheSajamityavatiSThate| viCeSatastu-"vAtaje CukradoSe vasukasaindhavaphalAmlasiddhaM yavakSArapratIvApaM sarpiSpAnam, bilvavidArIsiddhaM kSIrayuktamAsthApanam, madhubhadradArusiddhaM tailamanuvAsanam, kSIrakulIrarasasiddhaM tailamanuvAsanamuttarabastiCca| paittike kANDekSuCvadaMSTrAguDUcIkvAthasiddhaM mUrvAmadhUkapratIvApaM sarpiSpAnam, trivRccUrNaH saghRto virekaH payasyACrIparNIsiddhaM kSIrayuktamAsthApanam, madhukamudgaparNIsiddhaM tailamanuvAsanamuttaravastiCca| ClaiSmike pASANabhedACmantakAmalakakvAthasiddhaM pippalImadhukacUrNapratIvApaM sarpiSpAnam, madanaphalakaSAyo vamanam, dantIviDaGgacUrNastailalIDho virekaH, rAjavRkSamadanaphalakaSAyapragADhamAsthApanam, madhukapippalIsiddhaM tailamanuvAsanamuttarabastiCca| vAtaje puSpadoSe bhArgIbhadradArusiddhaM sarpiSpAnam, kACmaryakSudrasahAsiddhaM vA kSIram, madhukaCRgAlavinnAkalkaM payaHsarpiHsahitaM  priyaGgutilakalkaM vA yonau dhArayet, saralamudgaparNIkaSAyaH prakSAlanam| pittaje kAkolIdvayavidArImUlakvAthamutpalapadmakakvAthaM madhukapuSpakACmaryaphalakvAthaM vA saCarkaraM pibet, CvetacandanakvAthaM vA sakSaudram|" ityAdikaM saGgrahAt (CA. a. 1) bodhyam|

CukraM CuklaM guru snigdhaM madhuraM bahalaM bahu||17|| ghRtamAkSikatailAbhaM sadgarbhAya ArtavaM punaH||17|| lAkSArasaCaCAsrAbhaM dhautaM yacca virajyate||18||

"Cuddhe CukrArtava iti pUrvaM CukrasyopadeCAtprAdhAnyAcca Cukrasya pUrvamupanyAsaH| ""tatrAhArarasasya samyakpariNatasya kramAnmajjAnamanuprAptasya sAraH CukrasaMjJAM labhate| tacca kSIra iva sarpirikSurasa iva guDaH CarIre CukradharAM kalAmACritya sarvAGgavyApitayA sthitam| viCeSataCca majjamuSkastaneSu| harSodIritaM tu saGghaTTanena hRdayAveCAt piNDIbhUtamaGgAdaGgAtpravartate (saGgrahe CA. a.1)|"" tacca CuklAdiguNayuktaM Cukram| tathA, ghRtAbhaM mAkSikAbhaM tailAbhaM vA sadgarbhAya-CobhanagarbhArthaM, bhavati| tatra ghRtAbhena gauravarNatvaM garbhasya, mAkSikAbhena CyAmavarNatvaM, tailAbhena kRSNavarNatvaM, bhavati| 
 ""raktameva strINAM mAsi mAsi garbhakoSThamanuprApya tryahaM pravartamAnamArtavamAcakSate| atiprasaGgenAnRtau vA pravartamAnaM tadevAsRgdarAdisaMjJAM labhate"" (saM.CA.a.1)| yadArtavaM lAkSA rasAbhaM-alaktakarasasadRCam , tathA CaCarudhirasadRCam, tathA yacca dhautaM sadvirajyate-vastrAdilagnaM dhautaM sallauhityaM jahAtItyarthaH| tadIdRCamArtavaM tu sadgarbhAya sampadyate| 

 "

CuddhaCukrArtavaM svasthaM saMraktaM mithunaM mithaH||18|| snehaiH puMsavanaiH snigdhaM CuddhaM CIlitabastikam||19||

CukraM cArtavaM ca CukrArtave, Cuddhe CukrArtave yasya mithunasya tacchuddhaCukrArtavam,-strIpuruSayugalaM, samupAcarediti sambandhaH| tathA, svasthaM-arogaM, rogaleCenApyanAkrAntam| tathA, mithaH parasparaM, saMraktaM-anurAgayuktamanyonyadarCanena kusumacApAviSTamevaMvidham| snehaiH puMsavanaiH-yathAbhimatagarbhagrahaNaprabhAvaiH phalasarpirmahAkalyANakAdibhiH, snigdham| tathA, CuddhaM-kRtavamanavirecanam| tathA CIlitabastikam, CIlitAH-abhyAsenAnuSThitAH, bastayo yena-mithunena, taccIlitabastikam| na sakRdevAnuSThitabastikamityarthaH| 

naraM viCeSAtkSIrAjyairmadhurauSadhasaMskRtaiH||19||

viCeSAt-viCeSeNAtiCayena, naraM kSIrairghRtaiCca samupAcarediti sambandhaH| viCeSAdityanenaitat dyotayati| viCeSeNa naraM kSIrAjyaiH samupAcaret, na punarnArImapi tairna samupAcarediti| kimbhUtaiH ?  madhurauSadhasaMskRtaiH madhurANi-madhuraprAyANi madhuraprabhAvAni ca tAnyauSadhAni-jIvaniyAdInI, [ca]tairmadhurauSadhaiH, saMskRtaiH-siddhaiH|

nArIM tailena mASaiCca samupAcaret| caCabdo~atra bhinnakramaH| pittalaiCca samupAcaredityarthaH| pittalAni hi raktavRddhihetavaH| uktaM hi (hR. sU. a. 11/26)-"ACrayACrayiNAM mithaH| yadekasya tadanyasya varddhanakSapaNauSadham||" iti| evaM ca tailaM pittakRttvAdevopanyastam| viCeSAdityatrApyanuvartate| kSIrAjyebhyo~api viCeSeNa nAriM tailadibhiH samupAcaredityarthaH| puruSasya tu rajaso~abhAvAttadvRddhihetavastailAdayo nopayujyanta eva| 

 kSAmaprasannavadanAM sphuracchroNipayodharAm||20|| svastAkSikukSiM puMskAmAM vidyAdRtumatIM striyam||21||

kArCyahetuM vinA kSAmaM, tathA prasannaM-nirmalaM, vadanaM-mukhaM, yasyAH saivaMbhUtA, tAm| CroNiCca payodharau ca CroNipayodharam, sphurat-kampamAnaM, CroNipayodharaM yasyAH sA, tAm| CroNiH-kaTiH| sraste-ca(ga)lite, ivAkSiNI kukSiCca yasyAH sA tAm| tathA, puMsi kAmaH-abhilASo, yasyAH sA, tAm| evaMvidhAM striyamRtumatIM-RtuyuktAM, vidyAt| tasyAH sa garbhagrahaNakAla ityarthaH| puMskAmAmiti "saMpuMkAnAM so vaktavyaH" iti makArasya sakAradeCAdrutvAbhAvaH| 

padmaM saGkocamAyAti dine~atIte yathA, tathA||21|| RtAvatIte yoniH, sA CukraM nAtaH pratIcchati||22||

yathA divA praphullaM padmamanantaraM divasAtikrAntau saGkocamAyAti-mukulabhAvaM prApnoti, tatsvabhAvatvAttasya| tathA-tenaiva prakAreNa, RtAvatIte-atikrAnte dvAdaCarAtrasvabhAve yoniH saGkocamAyati| sA ca-yoniH, [ataH] saGkucitatvAt CukraM na pratIcchatIti| 

 mAsenopacitaM raktaM dhamanIbhyAmRtau punaH||22|| ISatkRSNaM vigandhaM ca vAyuryonimukhAnnudet||23||

mAsena yadupacitamAhArarasato vRddhiM prAptaM raktaM tatpunarmAsenopacitaM raktamRtau vAyuryonimukhAnnudet-prerayet| vidhau liG| tadA yonimukhaM vivRtaM sampadyate| kena nudet ? dhamanIbhyAM - srotoviCeSAbhyAM| kimbhUtaM raktam ? ISAtkRSNaM, tathA vigandhaM  -visragandharahitam| prakRtisthaprerakapavanasamparkAdISatkRSNatA, na tu kupitasamIraNapreraNasaMCleSavaCAdivAtyantaM kRSNatA| nApi pittena tathAbhUtena yuktam, yena visragandhi syAt| nApi CleSmaNA tathAbhUtena yuktam, yena tadvarNayuktaM syAt| tasmAcchuddhaM viCiSTe kAle yonimukhAtpravartamAnaM raktamArtavasaMjJAM labhate| tadeva cAnyadA yonimukhAtpravartamAnamasRgdarasaMjJAmAsAdayati| CuddhaM ca raktaM puSpasaMjJam, garbhAkhyasya phalasya bhaviSyato~abhivyaJjakatvAt| ata evAha-

tataH puSpekSaNAdeva kalyANadhyAyinI tryaham||23|| mRjAlaGkArarahitA darbhasaMstaraCAyinI||24|| kSaireyaM yAvakaM stokaM koSThaCodhanakarSaNam||24|| parNe CarAve haste vA bhuJjIta brahmacAriNI||25|| caturthe~ahni tataH snAtA CuklamAlyAmbarA CuciH||25|| icchantI bhartRsadRCaM putraM paCyetpuraH patim||26||

"puSpekSaNAt-puSpasya darCanAdevAnantaraM, strI tryahaM-trINi dinAni, kalyANaM-CubhaM, avaCyaM dhyAyati-cintayatIti kalyANadhyAyinI syAt| AvaCyake NiniH| tathA, mRjA-snAnakriyA, alaGkAraH-kaTakAdiH puSpAdirvA, alaGkriyate-bhUSyate CarIramebhiriti kRtvA, evaM gandhamAlyasyApyalaGkAratvam| tathA ca vakSyati (hR. ci. a. 5/82)- ""gandhamAlyAdikAM bhUSAm"" iti| mRjAlaGkArAbhyAM rahitA-varjitA| tathA darbhANAM saMstaraH-CayyA, tatra Cete sA darbhasaMstaraCAyinI| ""vrate"" iti NiniH| tathA, kSaireyaM-kSIrasiddhaM, yAvakaM-yavAnnaviCeSaM, parNe CarAve haste vA bhuJjIta-bhakSayet| kiyanmAtram ? stokaM-alpamAtram| tatkSaireyamupayuktaM kIdRCaM syAt ? ityAha-koSThaCodhanakarSaNamiti| CodhanaM ca karSaNaM ca CodhanakarSaNam| koSThasya CodhanakarSaNamiti SaSThIsamAsaH| CarIrasya mahAstroto madhyamo bhAga AmapakvasyACayaH koSThaCabdavAcyaH| sa eva garbhAdhiSThAnam, atastasyaiva Codhanam| tathA, tadaGgAnAM karSaNamiti vyAkhyeyam| na punaH koSThasya CodhanamanyeSAM cAGgAnAM karSaNam| tathA hi-trivRdAdinA viricyate, naivamanena yAvakena| vastusvAbhAvyAt koSThaCodhanakarSaNamAtrameva kriyate| kSaireyamiti ""kSIrADDhaJ"" iti DhaJ| yAva eva yAvaka iti ""yAvAdibhyaH kan"" iti kan| tathA, brahmacAriNI-tyaktavyavAyA, syAt|  tataH-tryahAdUrdhvaM,caturthe vAsare snAtA, tathA CuklAni mAlyAnyambarANi ca yasyAH saivam, tathA CuciH-antarbahiCca pavitrA satI, puraH-pUrvaM, patiM paCyet| saGgrahe~apyuktam (CA. a. 1)- caturthe tvahanyudvartitA CItasalilasnAtA~anuliptA~alaGkRtA CuklamAlyAmbarA kRtamaGgalasvastyayanaivaMvidhameva bhartAraM paCyedananyamanAH| tadA hi yAdRCaM paCyati cintayati vA tAdRCameva prasUta iti|"" iti| tatkiM tryahameva RtuH, atraiva puSpadarCanAt athottarakAlamapi ? ityACaGkyAha----
"

 Rtustu dvAdaCa niCAH pUrvAstisro~atra ninditAH||26|| ekAdaCI ca, yugmAsu syAtputro~anyAsu kanyakA||27||

puSpadarCanAtprabhRti yAvaddvAdaCarAtrayastAvadRturyoSitaH, na punastryahameva, yatra puSpaM pravartate, iti RtuCabdena darCayati| atra-asmin dvAdaCaniCAvadhAvRtukAle, yAH pUrvAstistro niCAH,  yAsu prAyaH puSpaM pravartate, tA nindyAH-garhyAH sadbhiH| na tatra sanmatiH striyaM saGgacchet| ata evAtra brahmacAritvopadeCaH| tathA, ekAdaCI niCA nindyA-apraCastA| caCabdo~atrAnuktAyAstrayodaCyAH samuccayArthaH| trayodaCyAM hi mithunIbhAve napuMsakasyotpattiriti kecidAhuH| yugmAsu-caturthaSaSThASTamadaCamadvAdaCalakSaNAsu niCAsu, saGgame putraH syAt, acintyatvAdRtubhAvasya| tAsu hi rAtriSvArtavamalpIbhavati| anyAsu -ayugmAsu niCAsu paJcamIsaptamInavamISu, kanyA jAyate| tadA hi CukramalpIbhavati, pUrvoktAddhetoH| yadi punarAhArAdivaCAt CukrasyAdhikatvamayugmAsu, yugmAsu cArtavapUrNatA syAt, tadA pumAn stryAkRtirdurbalo hInAGgo vA jAyate, strI ca puruSAkRtirdurbalA hInAGgA vA| ekAdaCItrayodaCyostu napuMsakamiti| tadevaM dampatI puMgarbhamicchantau yugmAsu niCAsu puMsavanAdikaM karmAcaretAm, strIgarbhamicchantau tvayugmAsu rAtriSu|

upAdhyAyo~atha putrIyaM kurvIta vidhivadvidhim||27|| namaskAraparAyAstu CUdrAyA mantravarjitam||28||

athetyAnantarye maGgalasUcako nirdiSTaH| ata evAyamatrArthaH-RtukAlAdanantaraM maGgalapUrvikAM sarvAmimAM vakSyamANAmitikartavyatAM kuryAditi| upAdhyAyaH-purohito~atharvavedavit, putrIyaM-putrAya hitaM, vidhimitthaM kurvIta| katham ? vidhivat na yathAkathaJcit| vidhivaditi praCaMsAyAM matup| kriyAviCeSaNaM caitat, tena praCastaM vedoktamanyUnAtiriktavidhAnaM yathA bhavati tathAvidhaM kurvItetyavatiSThate| brahmANadivarNatrayasyemaM vidhiM kurvIta| CUdrAyAH punarnamaskAraparAyAH-namaskArapradhAnAyAH, yathoktaM sarvaM vidhiM mantravarjitaM kuryAt| putrIyamiti "putrAccha ca" iti cchaH|

avandhya evaM saMyogaH syAdapatyaM ca kAmataH||28||

evaM-yathoktavidhyanuSThAne, dampatyoryaH saMyogo-mithunIbhAvaH, sa na vandhyaH syAt| api tu saphalo garbhasambhavaheturbhavedityarthaH| na kevalaM dampatyoH saMyoga evaM niSphalo na bhavet, apatyaM ca kAmataH-yathAbhimataM puMgarbharUpaM strIgarbharUpaM vA, syAt| 

santo hyAhurapatyArthaM dampatyoH saGgatiM rahaH||29||

rahaHCabdena grAmyavacasA~atra grAmyadharmaM sUcayati| hi yasmAt, santaH-sAdhavaH, apatyArthaM-apatyajananAya, dampatyoH strIpuruSayoH, rahaH-ekAnte, viCiSTakAlocitaM viCiSTasaMyogaM saGgatimAhuH, na grAmyasukhalipsAyai| 

durapatyaM kulAGgAro gotre jAtaM mahatyapi||29||

duSTApatyaM strIgarbhaH puMgarbho vA, mahatyapi gotre jAtaM-utkRSTe~api kula utpannaM, AGgArakAryakaraNasAmarthyAtsamastatkulavinACahetutvAtkulAGgAra ityucyate|

icchetAM yAdRCaM putraM tadrUpacaritAMCca tau||30|| cintayetAM janapadAMstadAcAraparicchadau||30||

tau-dampatI, yAdRCaM putramicchetAM-kAmayetAM, tadrUpacaritAn rUpaM-varNasaMsthAnapramANAkRtyAdi| tathA caritaM-CraddhACrutasatyArjavAnRCaMsyadAnadayAdAkSiNyasvabhAvAdi| tasya-manISitasya, sadRCe rUpacarite yeSAM tAn janapadAn cintayetAM-dhyAyetAM| putraCabdo~apatyamAtropalakSaNArtho~atra| tathA hi duhitaramapi kaCcidicchatyeva| kimbhUtau tau pitarau ? tadAcAraparicchadau| AcaraNaM-AcAraH, kulAnurUpasya deCAnurUpasya cetikartavyatAlakSaNasya karmaNo~anuSThAnam| paricchado-manujagavACvadhanadhAnyavastrAlaGkAraratnarathAyudhagRhodyAnavINApaNavagAyanaCayyAstaraNAdiH| AcAraCca paricchadaCcAcAraparicchadau| tadityanenAbhilaSitApatyaM parAmRCyate| tasyaivAcArapariccadau yayostau dampatI icchA sadRCarUpacaritAn janapadAn dhyAyetAm|

karmAnte ca pumAn sarpiHkSIraCAlyodanACitaH||31|| prAgdakSiNena pAdena CayyAM mauhUrtikAjJayA||31||  Arohet strI tu vAmena tasya dakSiNapArCvataH||32|| tailamASottarAhArA tatra mantraM prayojayet||32||

karmAnte ca-putrIyavidhyanuSThAnAvasAne ca, pumAn strItaH prAk-pUrvaM, CayyAmArohet-Akramet| kimbhUtaH ? sarpiHkSIraCAlyodanACitaH,-sarpirmiCrakSIraCAlyodanenACito-bhojitaH| kathamArohet ? dakSiNena pAdena, mauhUrtikAjJayA-jyotiH CAstravidAdiSTaH| strI tu vAmena pAdena tasya dakSiNapArCvataH CayyAmArohet, mauhUrtikAjJayeti yojyam| turavadhAraNe, ubhayatrApi| pumAn dakSiNenaiva pAdena prAgeva, strI paCcAdeva vAmenaiva pAdena puMso dakSiNapArCvata eva, CayyAmArohet, nAnyathA kRtveti|"pumAn sarpiHkSIraCAlyodanACitaH" ityuktam| striyAstu tatkAlocitamAhAraM nirUpayannAha-tailetyAdi| tailaM ca mASaCca, tAbhyAmuttaraH-adhikaH, AhAro yasyAH saivam| uttaraCabdo~atra tailamASau pittalau raktavRddhihetU tayA~atyantaM sevitavyau, na punastathA CukravRddhikarANyanyAnyapi kSIrAdIni dravyANiti pratipAdayati| tatra ca mantraM vakSyamANaM prayojayet-paThet|

tadeva mantramaaha....
aum Ahirasi Ayurasi sarvataH pratiSThAsi dhAtA tvAM 
dadhAtu vidhAtA tvAM dadhAtu brahmavarcasA bhaveti||33|| brahmA bRhaspatirviSNuH somaH sUryastathA~aCvinau||33|| bhago~atha mitrAvaruNau vIraM dadatu me sutam||33||

AhirasItyAdi [ vIraM dadatu me sutamityantaM mantraM paThet ]

sAntvayitvA tato~anyonyaM saMviCetAM mudAnvitau||34|| uttAnA tanmanA yoSittiSThedaGgaiH susaMsthitaiH||34||

tato-mantrapAThAdanantaraM, parasparaM sAntvayitvA-priyavacanAdinA prItimutpAdya, samviCetAM-mithunIbhAvaM gacchetAm| kimbhUtau? mudA-harSeNa, anvitau-yutau| tatra ca saMveCane yoSiduttAnA taccittA cAvayavaiH susaMsthitaistiSThet| 

tathA hi bIjaM gRhNAti doSaiH svasthAnamAsthitaiH||35||

hi-yasmAt, tathA-tena prakareNa, sA bIjaM gRhNAti, doSaiH-vAtAdibhiH svasthAnAvasthitaiH sadbhiH| saGgrahe tUktam (CA. a. 1)- "na cAsAvadhastiSThet| tathA hi strIceSTaH pumAn jAyate puMceSTA vA strI| na ca nyubjAM pArCvagatAM vA seveta| nyubjAyA vAto balavAn sa yoniM pIDayati| dakSiNapArCvagAyAH CleSmA pIDitaCcyuto~apidadhAti garbhACayam| vAmapArCvagAyAstadvatpittaM vidahati raktaCukre| tasmAduttAnA bIjaM gRhNIyAt|" iti|

liGgaM tu sadyogarbhAyA yonyA bIjasya saGgrahaH||35|| tRptirgurutvaM sphuraNaM CukrAsrAnanubandhanam||36|| hRdayaspandanaM tandrA tRDglAnirlomaharSaNam||36||

sadyaH-tatkSaNAt, garbho yasyAH saivam, tasyAH sadyogarbhAyA lakSaNaM bIjasya-garbhAkhyasya, yonyA-karaNabhUtayA, saGgrahaH samyaggrahaNam| tathA, tRptiriva tRptiH gurutvaM sphuraNaM ca kukSerbhavati| tathA, CukraM cAsraM ca-CukrAsre, anubandhanaM-pravartanam, nAnubandhanaM-ananubandhanam, CukrAsrayorapravartanaM-CukrAsrAnanubandhanam,-CukrAsrayoryonimukhAdavamanaM bahiraniHsaraNam, atra ca yonyA gRhItabIjatvaM hetuH| tathA, hRdayaspandanAdayaH paJca sadyogarbhAyA lakSaNAni bhavanti| lomaharSaNaM harSavaCAdbhavati| tathA ca saGgrahe (CA. a. 2)- "praharSo hRllAsaH" ityAdi| 

avyaktaH prathame mAsi saptAhAtkalalIbhavet||37|| garbhaH puMsavanAnyatra pUrvaM vyakteH prayojayet||37||

saptAhAdarvAggarbhagolakaH CleSmapiNDIbhUto bhavet | saptAhAdanantaraM yAvanmAsastAvadavyaktAkRtiH kalalIbhavet| atra kalalIbhUte yAvatstrIpuruSAdyutpattilakSaNA  vyaktirna bhavati tAvadvyakteH prAk prathame mAsi puMsavanAni prayojayet| nanu, "Cuddhe CukrArtave satvaH svakarmakleCacoditaH| garbhaH sampadyate"(Clo.1) ityuktam tatra yadi prAkkRtena karmaNA strIgarbhaH kukSimAkSiptastadA puruSaprayatne satyapi puMgarbhaH kartuM na Cakyate||tasmAtpuMsavanamanarthakamevetyACaGkyAha----
