CArIrasthAnam

marmavibhAgaH adhyAyaH

athAto marmavibhAgaM CArIraM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2|| iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

mriyate~asminnaGga upahata iti marma|  vibhajanaM-vibhAgaH, marmaNAM vibhAgo marmavibhAgaH|  so~asminnadhyAye~astIti marmavibhAgaH|  arCa AditvAdac|  CArIrasthAna pratibaddhatvAcca CArIraH|  CeSaM pUrvavat|  

saptottaraM marmaCatam-----------------||1||

saptottarANi-adhikAni, yasmin-Cate, tadevam|

-----------------------------teSAmekAdaCAdiCet||1||  pRthaksakthnostathA bAhvostrINi koSThe navorasi||1|| pRSThe caturdaCordhvaM tu jatrostriMCacca sapta ca||2||

teSAM-marmaNAM madhye, pRthak-pratyekaM kRtvA, sakthnordvayorbAhvoCca dvayorekAdaCAdiCet, evaM catuCcatvAriMCanmarmANi CAkhAsu vidyAt|  koSThe-jaThare, trINi marmANi|  urasi-vakSasi, navasaGkhyAni|  pRSThe caturdaCa|  jatrorUrdhvaM-jatruNa upariSTAt, triMCattathA sapta, evaM saptatriMCadityarthaH|  jatroriti puMstvamatra cintyam|  athavA 'anityamAgamaCAsanam' ityatra num na kRtaH| 

madhye pAdatalasyAhurabhito madhyamAGgulim||2||  talahRnnAma rujayA tatra viddhasya paJcatA||3||

pAdatalasya madhye-madhyapradeCe, madhyamAGgulimabhito-madhyamAGguleH pAdasambandhinyA Abhimukhyena, yatpAdatalaM-pAdapRSThaM, tatra talahRnnAma marmAhuH, pUrvAcAryA iti CeSaH|  madhyamAGgulimiti "abhitaH [ paritaH samayAnikaSAhApratiyoge~api" iti ] Cabdaprayoge dvitIyA|  tatra-tasmin, viddhasya-Ahatasya, paJcatA-maraNaM, bhavati|  kayA? rujayA,-vedanayA|

aGguSThAGgulimadhyasthaM kSipramAkSepamAraNam||3||

aGguSThaCcAGguliCca, tayormadhyasthaM-aGguSThAGgulimadhyasthitaM, kSipraM nAma marma|  tadviddhamAkSepamAraNaM-AkSepakAkhyena vAtavyAdhinA mArayati|

 tasyordhvaM dvyaGgule kUrcaH pAdabhramaNakampakRt||4||

tasyordhvaM-tasya kSiprAkhyasya marmaNa upariSTAt, dvyaGgule-dvyaGgulaM vimucya, kUrco nAma marma|  tadviddhaM pAdasya bhramaNaM kampaM ca karoti|

gulphasandheradhaH kUrcaCiraHCopharujAkaram||4||

gulphasandheradhaH kUrcaCiro nAma marma|  tadviddhaM CopharujAkaram|

 jaGghAcaraNayoH sandhau gulpho rukstambhamAndyakRt||5||

jaGghAcaraNayoH sandhau-sandhipradeCe, gulpho nAma marma|  tadviddhaM ruk ca stambhaCca mAndyaM ca, tAni karoti|  stambhaH stabdhatvamivAGgasya|

jaGghAntare tvindrabastirmArayatyasRjaH kSayAt||5||

jaGghAntare-jaGghAmadhye pArSNiprabhRtidvAdaCabhiraGgulaiH, indrabastirnAma marma|  tadviddhaM raktakSayAnmArayati, nAnyathA|  tasmAdraktastambhane yatitavyamiti pratipAdanArthamasRkkSayAditi heturupanyastaH|  eSa eva nyAyo~anyatrApyanusartavyaH|  tena yatra yaddhetukaM mAraNAdikaM karma vyadhe kathitaM, tatra taccikitsAyAM yatitavyamiti|

jaGghorvoH saGgame jAnu khaJjatA tatra jIvataH||6||

jaGghorvoH saGgame-sandhau, jAnunAma marma|  tatra-jAnuni viddhe, puruSo mriyata eva|  atha jIvati tato~asya jIvataH puMsaH khaJjatA syAditi|  arthAt prAyeNa maraNaM puruSasyeti bodhayati|

 iti sakthnostathA bAhvormaNibandho~atra gulphavat||8||  kUrparaM jAnuvatkauNyaM tayorviTapavatpunaH||9||  kakSAkSamadhye kakSAdhRk kuNitvaM tatra jAyate||9||

iti-evamanena prakAreNa, sakthnordvayoH pratyekamekAdaCa marmANi bhavanti|  tathA bAhvoH-tenaiva prakAreNa bAhvoH, talahRdAdInyekAdaCa marmANi bhavanti|  atha kiJcinmAtramatra viCeSamAha - maNItyAdi|  atra-bAhumarmasu, gulphena tulyo maNibandhaH, saMjJAmAtrabhedaH, jAnutulyaM kUrparam|  tayoH-maNibandhakUrparAkhyayorbAhumarmaNoH, viddhayoH kauNyaM-pANipANyaGgulIkubjatvam|  viTapetyAdi|  kakSA cAkSaCca kakSAkSau, tayormadhye viTapena tulyaM kakSAdhRksaMjJaM marma|  tatra viddhe sati kuNitvaM-bAhupANyaGgulikubjatA, jAyate|  

sthUlAntrabaddhaH sadyoghno viDvAtavamano gudaH||10||

sthUlAntrasUkSmAntrabhedAt dvidhA~antram|  tatra sthUlAntrabaddho gudo nAma marmaviCeSaH|  sa ca viDvAtau-vAtavarcasI, vamati- udgirati, iti viDvAtavamanaH|  bAhulakAtkartari lyuT|  sa gudaH sadyaH-tatkSaNAdeva, hanti|   sadyoghna iti "amanuSyakartRke ca" iti Thak| gudaCabdasyAtra puMstvaM cintyam, na cArdharcAdiSvayamasti|  

 mUtrACayo dhanurvakro bastiralpAsramAMsagaH||10|| ekAdhovadano madhye kaTyAH sadyo nihantyasUn||11|| Rte~aCmarIvraNAdviddhastatrApyubhayataCca saH||11|| mUtrasrAvyekato bhinne vraNo rohecca yatnataH||12||

mUtrasyACaya AdhAro mUtrACayo-yatra mUtraM tiSThati, sa dhanurvakraH-cApavat kuTilaH|  anenAsya saMsthAnamuktam|  sa ca bastinAma marmaviCeSaH|  asraM ca mAMsaM cAsramAMse, alpe asramAMse gacchati| "anyebhyo~api dRCyate" iti DaH|  tatrastho na bahuraktamAMsapradeCa ityarthaH|  tathA, ekamadhovadanaM yasyAsAvekAdhovadanaH|  kaTyA madhya iti sthAnanirdeCaH|  kaTyA madhyapradeCe~asAvavatiSThate|  sa viddhaH sadyaH-tatkSaNAdeva, asUn-prANAn, nihanti| Rte~aCmarIvraNAt-aCmaryAharaNArthaM yo vraNaH kriyate taM vraNaM varjayitvA|  tatrApi-aCmarIvraNe, ubhayataH-ubhayapArCvataCca, sa viddhastadA~asau sadyo~asUnnihanti|  tasmin bastAveka [taH-eka]pArCvato, bhinne-viddhe sati, mUtrasrAvI vraNaH syAt|  sa ca yatnataH-AdareNopakrAnto, rohati nAnyathA|

dehAmapakvasthAnAnAM madhye sarvasirACrayaH||12|| nAbhiH so~api hi sadyoghno--------------------------------||13||

AmaM ca pakvaM cAmapakve, sthAnaM ca sthAnaM ca sthAne, AmapakvayoH sthAne AmapakvasthAne, dehaCcAmapakvasthAne ca dehAmapakvasthAnAni, teSAM madhye|  tatraikatvAddehasya dehamadhyapradeCe, tathobhayorAmapakvACayayormadhye-antarAle, nAbhirnAma marma|  sa sarvAsAM sirANAM-sakalaCarIragAnAM ACrayaH-AdhAraH|  so~api hi sadyoghnaH|  apiH samuccaye|  hiryasmAdarthe|  na kevalaM gudabastI sadyoghnau yAvannAbhirapi viddhaH sadyoghnaH|  nAbhiCabdasya puMstavaM  cintyam|

 ------------------------------dvAramAmACayasya ca||13|| satvAdidhAma hRdayam stanoraH koSThamadhyagam||13||

hRdayaM nAma yanmarma tadapi sadyoghnam|  taccAmACayasya dvAraM -mukham|  tena hi dvAreNAnnapAnamAmACaye praviCati|  tacca satvAdInAM-satvarajastamasAM, tathA vijJAnasya-indriyANAM cArthapaJcakasya, tathA~~AtmanaH-cetasaH, dhAma-sthAnam|  tacca stanoraH koSThamadhyagam|  stanau coraCca koSThaCca stanoraHkoSThaM, tasya madhyaM tatra gacchati-sthitiM badhnAti, koSThavakSasoH stanayoCca madhye sthitamityarthaH|

stanarohitamUlAkhye dvyaGgule stanayorvadet||14|| UrdhvAdho~asrakaphApUrNakoSTho naCyettayoH kramAt||14||

stanarohitaM ca mUlaM ca prakRtatvAtstanasyaiva, te|  stanarohitastanamUle Akhye-saMjJe, yayoste stanarohitamUlAkhye dve marmaNI vadet|  kva pradeCe ?  stanayoH|  kramAditi vakSyamANamihApi sambadhyate|  tena stanayorUrdhvaM dvyaGgule stanarohite|  stanayoradho dvyaGgule stanamUle|  tayoH-stanarohitastanamUlAkhyayormarmaNorviddhayoH, puruSo~asrakaphApUrNakoSThaH kramAt-yathAkramaM, naCyet|  tena stanarohite viddhe satyasRjA pUrNakoSThe naro naCyet, stanamUle viddhe kaphena pUrNakoSTho naCyet|

CArIrasthAnam

marmavibhAgaH adhyAyaH

apastambhAvuraH pArCve nADyAvanilavAhinI||15|| raktena pUrNakoSTho~atra CvAsAtkAsAcca naCyati||15||

urasaH pArCve dve nADyAvapastambhAkhye marmaNI|  anilavAhinI-vAtavahe|  atra marmadvaye viddhe raktena pUrNakoSThaH CvAsakAsAbhyAM vipadyate|

pRSThavaMCorasormadhye tayoreva ca pArCvayoH||16|| adho~aMsakUTayorvidyAdapAlApAkhyamarmaNI||16||  tayoH koSThe~asRjA pUrNe naCyedyAtena pUyatAm||17||

pRSThavaMCasya tathorasaH, anayormadhye-antarAle, tayoreva ca pRSTorasoH, ye pArCve, tayoruparibhAgayoraMsakUTayoradhaH, apAlApAkhye dve marmaNI vidyAt|  tayorviddhayo raktena koSThe pUrNe, pUyatAM yAtena-gatena, lohitena naCyet|  yAvadraktaM pUyatAM na yAtaM tAvajjIvati|  na tu raktakoSThapUraNamAtrAdeva mriyata iti bhAvaH|  

pArCvayoH pRSThavaMCasya CroNIkarNau prati sthite||17|| vaMCACrite sphijorUrdhvaM kaTIkataruNo smRte||18|| tatra raktakSayAtpANDurhInarUpo vinaCyati||18||

pRSThavaMCasya pArCvayoH-ubhayataH, pratiCroNIkarNau sthite|  vaMCACrite-vaMCaprativaddhe, sphijorUrdhvaM-upariSTAt, dve~asthinI kaTIkataruNe-etatsaMjJe dve marmaNI, smRte-ukte|  tatra-tasminmarmadvaye viddhe, raktakSayAtpANDurhInarUpo-vigatakAntiH san, naro vinaCyati|

pRSThavaMCaM hyubhayato yau sandhI kaTipArCvayoH||19||  jaghanasya bahirbhAge marmaNI tau kukundarau||19|| ceSTAhAniradhaHkAye sparCAjJAnaM ca tadvyadhAt||20||

pRSThavaMCasyobhayoH kaTipArCvayoryau sandhI jaghanasya bahirbhAge - nAntaH, tau kukundarau nimnAkArau sandhimamarNI|  tadvyadhAt-tayorvyadhAt, adhaHCarIre ceSTAhAniH-gamanAkuJcanaprasAraNAdAvadhaHkAyo~aCaktaH sampadyata ityarthaH|  tathA, sparCAjJAnaM-sparCAsaMvittirbhavati|  pRSThavaMCamubhayata iti "ubhasarvatasoH" ityAdinA dvitIyA|

pArCvAntaranibaddhau yAvupari CroNikarNayoH||20|| ACayaccAdanau tau tu nitambau taruNAsthigau||21|| adhaHCarIre Copho~atra daurbalyaM maraNaM tataH||21||

pArCvAntare-pArCvamadhye, nibaddhau-pratibaddhau lagnau, pArCvAntaranibaddhau yau, tathA CroNikarNayorupari-upariSTAt, mUtrAdInAM ya ACayAH-AdhArA bastyAdayaH, teSAM chAdanau, nitambau-nitambasaMjJau marmaviCeSau|  tau ca taruNAsthigau-taruNasaMjJe~asthni sthitAvityarthaH|  atra-asminmarmadvaye viddhe sati, adhaHkAye Copho bhavati|  tathA, daurbalyaM prakRtatvAdadhaHCarIra eva|  daurbalyaM-alpabalatvaM svavyApArAkSamatvam|  tato-daurbalyAdanantaraM, maraNaM bhavati|

pArCvAntaranibaddhau ca madhye jaghanapArCvayoH||22|| tiryagUrdhvaM ca nirdiSTau pArCvasandhI tayorvyadhAt||22|| raktapUritakoSThasya CarIrAntarasambhavaH||23||

pArCvayorantaraM-madhyaM, tatra nibaddhau-saMCliSTau, sandhI marmaviCeSau pArCvasandhI iti nirdiSTau|  tataCcaikasmin pArCvAntara ekaH sandhirdvitIyasmin pArCvAntare dvitIyaH sandhiH|  kva sthitau katham ?  jaghanasya pArCve jaghanapArCve, tayormadhye tiryagUrdhvaM ca|  evamekasmin jaghanapArCvamadhya ekaH sandhirdvitIyasmin dvitIyaH sthita iti|  tayorvyadhAt puMso raktapUritakoSThasya CarIrAntarasambhavaH-aparaCarIrotpattiH, maraNamityarthaH|

stanamUlArjave bhAge pRSThavaMCACraye sire||23|| bRhatyau, tatra viddhasya maraNaM raktasaGkSayAt||24||

stanayormUlaM-stanamUlaM  tasyArjave bhAge-spaSTa uddeCe, pRSThavaMCACraye sire-pRSThavaMCasyobhayapArCvapratibaddhe sire, bRhatyau-etatsaMjJe marmaNI|  tatra-marmadvaye, viddhasya maraNaM bhavati raktasaGkSayAt, nAnyathA|

bAhumUlAbhisambaddhe pRSThavaMCasya pArCvayoH||24|| aMsayoH phalake bAhusvApaCoSau tayorvyadhAt||25||

bAhvormUle bAhumUle,-yatra bAhU pratiSThitau|  mUle hi pratiSThA, vRkSamUlavat|  pRSThavaMCasya pArCvadvaye bAhumUlayorAbhimukhyena sambaddhe-saMCliSTe|  ke te ?  aMsayoH phalake|  asamAsanirdeCaCcchandonurodhAt|  phalakasya ca napuMsakatvaM lokACrayatvAlliGgasyeti|  aMsaphalakAkhye dve marmaNI|  tayorvyadhAt bAhusvApaCoSau bhavataH|   svApa iva svApaH, yathA suptasya niCcetanamaGgaM bhavati tathA bAhU aMsaphalake viddhe bhavataH|

grIvAmubhayataH snAvnI grIvAbAhuCirontare||25|| skandhAMsapIThasambandhAvaMsau bAhukriyAharau||26||

grIvAyA ubhayoH pArCvayoH snAvnI dve aMsAvucyete|  kva sthitau ?  grIvAbAhuCirontare|  grIvAyAstathA bAhvoH CirasaCca madhye teSAmantarAle sthitau|  kiM prayojanau?  skandhetyAdi|  aMsayoH pITha iva pIThe,-pratiSThAne, yatrAMsau tiSThataH|  skandhe cAMsapIThe ca, teSAM sambandhaH-prayojanaM, yayostAvevAMsau viddhau bAhvoH kriyA-AkuJcanaprasAraNAdikA, tAM harataH, tau bAhukriyAharau|

kaNThanADImubhayataH sirA hanusamACritAH||26|| catasrastAsu nIle dve manye dve marmaNI smRte||27|| svarapraNACavaikRtyaM rasAjJAnaM ca tadvyadhe||27||

kaNThanADyAH pArCvayordvayoH sirA yACcatasro hanvoH samACritAH, tAsu madhye dve sire nIle nAma dve marmaNI, manye nAma dve marmaNi smRte, tantrakRdbhiriti CeSaH|  tAsAM vyadhastadvyadhaH, tasmin tadvyadhe svarapraNACAdayo jAyante|   svarasya praNACaH svarapraNACaH,-svarahAniH|  athavA vaikRtyam, tacca prakRttvAtsvarasyaiva, svarabhAvAnyathAtvamityarthaH|  rasAjJAnaM-rasAnavabodhaH|

CArIrasthAnam

marmavibhAgaH adhyAyaH

kaNThanADImubhayato jihvAnAsAgatAH sirAH||28|| pRthak catasrastAH sadyo ghnantyasUnmAtRkAhvayAH||28||

kaNThanADyA ubhayapArCvayoH sirA jihvAgatAstathA nAsAgatAH pRthak-pratyekaM, ekasmin pArCve catasraH dvitIye pArCve catasraH|   tA mAtRkAhvayAH-mAtRkAsaMjJAH, viddhAH sadyo~asUn ghnanti|  etAni mAtRkAkhyAni sirAmarmANi|

kRkATike CirogrIvAsandhau, tatra calaM CiraH||29||

CiraCca grIvA ca, tayoH sandhAne yau sandhI pArCvadvaye kRkATikAkhye te dve marmaNI|  tatra-tasminmarmadvaye viddhe, calaM-sakampaM, Ciro bhavati|

adhastAtkarNayornimne vidhure CrutihAriNI||29||

adhastAtkarNayoH-karNapRSThayoradho, nimne-nonnate, vidhurAkhye dve marmaNI|  te ca viddhe satI CrutiM-CabdaCravaNaM, harataH, CrutihAriNI|

phaNAvubhayato ghrANamArgaM CrotrapathAnugau||30|| antargalasthitau vedhAdgandhavijJAnahAriNau||30||

phaNau nAma marmaviCeSau ghrANamArgasyobhayoH pARCvayoH CrotrapathAnugau-CrotramArgaprAptau|  antargalasthitau-galAbhyantare sthitau|   phaNAviva saMsthAnaM rUpamanayoH phaNAviti nAma|  tau vedhAdgandha vijJAnaM-gandhopalabdhiH, taddharatastau gandhavijJAnahAriNau|

netrayorbAhyato~apAGgau bhruvoH pucchAntayoradhaH||31|| tathopari bhruvornimnAvAvartAvAndhyameSu tu||31||

netreyordvayorbAhyataH-bahirbhAge, bhruvoH pucchAntayoH-avasAnayoH, adhaH, apAGgau nAma marmaviCeSau prasiddhAveva|  tathoparIti tenaivApAGgoddiSTena nyAyena bhruvoH pucchAntayorupari nimnAvAvartasaMjJau|  eSu tu-apAGgAvartAkhyeSu caturSu, viddhasya narasyAndhyaM bhavati|

anukarNaM lalATAnte CaGkhau sadyovinACanau||32||

atrApi bhruvoH pucchAntayorupari lalATAvasAne~anukarNaM - karNasamIpe, CaGkhau marmaviCeSau|  tau viddhau puruSasya sadyovinACanau bhavataH|

 keCAnte CaGkhayorUrdhvamutkSepau, sthapanI punaH||32||  bhruvormadhye, traye~apyatra Calye jIvedanuddhRte||33|| svayaM vA patite pAkAtsadyo naCyati tUddhRte||33||

keCAvasAne CaGkhayorUrdhvaM-upari, utkSepau marmaNI|  sthapanI punarmarma bhruvormadhye|  traye~apyatra-asmin marmatraye dvAvutkSepAvekA sthapanI evaMbhUte, viddhe puruSo~anuddhRte Calye jIvet|  kAlAntareNa pAkAt-pAkena hetunA, svayaM vA patite Calye sati,-na tUddharaNahetunA, jIvet puruSaH|  sadya ityAdi|  uddhRte tu Calye sadya eva naro naCyati, vAyukopAditi bhAvaH|

jihvAkSinAsikACrotrakhacatuSTayasaGgame||34||  tAlunyAsyAni catvAri srotasAM, teSu marmasu||34|| viddhaH CRGgATakAkhyeSu sadyastyajati jIvitam||35||

jihvA cAkSiNI ca nAsikA ca Crotre ca tadevam|  tasya khAni, teSAM catuSTayaM-catvAri srotAMsi, teSAM saGgamaH-sannipAtaH, tasmiMstAluni-yatra jihvAdInAM tarpaNAni srotAMsi sannipatyAvatiSThante, jihvAdisrotasAM catvAryAsyAni CRGgATakAkhyAni|  teSu marmasu viddhaH puruSaH  sadyastyajati jIvitaM-viddhamAtra eva prANairviyujyate|

kapAle sandhayaH paJca sImantAstiryagUrdhvagAH||35|| bhramonmAdamanonACaisteSu viddheSu naCyati||36||

CiraH sambandhinaH paJca sandhayaH|  paJcAnAM kapAlakhaNDAnAM saMCleSA ye CirasyavatiSThante tiryagUrdhvagAH, ta eva sImantAkhyA marmaviCeSAH|  teSu-sImantAkhyeSu, viddheSu bhrameNa tathonmAdena tathA manonACena-cittavismRtyA ca, naCyati|

Antaro mastakasyordhvaM sirAsandhisamAgamaH||36|| romAvarto~adhipo nAma marma sadyo haratyasUn||37||

mastakasyAbhyantarato yaH sthitaH, tathordhvaM-prakRtatvAnmastakasyaivopari, sirAsandhisamAgamaH-sirAsandhInAM sannipAto, romAvartalakSaNaH so~adhipo nAma marmaviCeSaH|  marmaNAmadhipo yathArthanAmA, tadAyattAni hi sarvANi marmANItyarthaH|  so~adhipo viddho narasya sadyo~asUn harati-puruSaM mArayatItyarthaH|  

CArIrasthAnam

marmavibhAgaH adhyAyaH

viSamaM spandanaM yatra pIDite ruk ca marma tat||37||

yatra-yasmin dehadeCe, viSamaM spandanaM-sphuraNaM, tanmarma|   yatra ca dehadeCe pIDite sati ruk ca viSamA bhavati, tacca marma|  atrApi viSamamiti sambadhyate|  viSamaM ca viSamA ca viSamam, "napuMsakamanapuMsakenaikavacca" iti napuMsakaCeSaH|  tadevaM marmalakSaNaM dvidhA mantavyam,-kasyacinmarmaNaH sirAdhamanyAdikasya viSamaM spandanaM prAyo lakSaNam, mAMsAsthijAtIyasya marmaNaH pIDanAt prAyaH pIDotpattirlakSaNamiti|  saGgrahe ca marmaviddhasya lakSaNamuktam|  yathA (CA. a. 7)- "dehaprasuptirgurutA sammohaH CItakAmitA|  svedo mUrcchA vamiH CvAso marmaviddhasya lakSaNam||"  iti|  maraNakAritvAnmarma, maraNasadRCaduHkhadAyitvAdvA|idAnIM marmaNAM suprabhedaM lakSaNaM SaTprakAramAha-  

mAMsAsthisnAyudhamanIsirAsandhisamAgamaH||38||  syAnmarmeti ca tenAtra sutarAM jIvitaM sthitam||38||

mAMsAdInAM sandhyantAnAM svajAtyapekSo yaH samAgamaH-sannipAtaH, sa marmAkhyaH, tanmarmeti tasyaiva nAma|  tadevaM mAMsapeCIsamAgamo mAMsamarma, asthnAM samAgamo~asthimarma, snAyUnAM samAgamaH snAyumarma, dhamanInAM samAgamo dhamanImarma, sirANAM samAgamaH sirAmarma, sandhInAM samAgamaH sandhimarmeti|  yato mAMsAdInAM yaH samAgamaH sa eva marmetyucyate, tena hetunA, atra sutarAM jIvitaM sthitaM-prANA vyavasthitAH|  nanu, yadi mAMsAdInAM samAgamo marmetyabhidhIyate, tadAnImanekasaGkhyAkAni marmANi CarIre sambhavyeran|  mAMsapeCyAdibhAvAnAmanekasaGkhyACrayatvAt|  tathA ca,-mAMsapeCICatAni paJca puMsAmuktAni strINAM  tu viMCatyadhikAni (hR. CA. a. 3/17)|  evamasthyAdInyapyanekAnyuktAni|  tataCca marmaNAmasaGkhyeyatvaM prApnoti|  evaM ca "saptottaraM marmaCatam" (Clo 1) iti virudhyata ityAha-

bAhulyena tu nirdeCaH SoDhaivaM marmakalpanA||39|| prANAyatanasAmAnyAdaikyaM vA marmaNAM matam||39||

saptottarameva marmaNAM Catamityeva na|  kiM tarhi ? pUrvoktena nyAyena bahUni marmANi|  "saptottaraM marmaCatam" ityayaM tu yo nirdeCaH  sa bAhulyena-bhUyasA, yeSAM marmaNAM marmatvena prasiddhistadviSaya eva|  evaM-anena prakAreNa mAMsAsthyAdInAM samAgamo marmeti, marmaNAM-SoDhA-SaDvidhA, kalpanA bhavati|  kalpanACabdenaitatpratipAdayati,-tadevaM manuSyasya prasiddhito jIvitadhAmatvena marmaNAM kalpanA-nirUpaNA|  prANetyAdi|  athavA na marmaNAM SoDhA kalpanA| kiM tarhi ? prANAyatanasAmAnyAt-jIvitasyAdhiSThAnamityevaMlakSaNAt, aikyaM-ekatvaM, marmaNAM mataM-na SaTtvam|  evamekaiva marmakalpanA|  evaM saGkSepavistarakauCalaM marmasu darCitam|  mAMsAdInAM sandhyantAnAM yathAsvaM pratiniyatAni marmANi saGkhyayA~abhidhAtumAha-

mAMsajAni daCendrAkhyatalahRtstanarohitAH||40||

jaGghayorindrAkhye dve marmaNI, bAhvordve eva, talahRdAkhyAni catvAri-pAdayordve hastayordve iti, stanarohite dve-pratyekaM stane ekaikam, evaM daCa mAMsajAni|

CaGkhau kaTIkataruNe nitambAvaMsayoH phale||40|| asthnyaSTau-------------------------------------||41||

asthnyaSTau marmANi|  CaGkhau dve marmaNI, kaTIkataruNe dve, nitambau dve, aMsayoH phalake dve, ityevamaSTau marmANi|

------------------snAvamarmANi trayoviMCatirANayaH||41|| kUrcakUrcaCiro~apAGgakSiprotkSepAMsabastayaH||41||

snAvamarmANi trayoviMCatiH|  katham ? ANayaCcatvAri-pratyekamUrumadhye ekaikaM bAhvoH pratyekamekaikam, evaM catvAryANayaH kUrcAkhyAni catvAri-hastaryodve pAdayordve|  kUrcaCiraHsaMjJAni catvAri-pAdayordve hastayordve iti catvAri|  apAGgAkhye dve-"netrayorbAhyataH (Clo.31) ityAdinA nirdiSTe dve|  kSiprAkhyAni catvAri-"aGguSThAGgulimadhyasthaM kSipraM" (Clo.3) iti, tacca pAdadvaye dvividhaM hastadvaye ca|  utkSepau dvau-"keCAnte CaGkhayorUrdhvamutkSepau" (Clo.32) iti|  aMsAkhye dve-"skandhAMsapIThasambandhAvaMsau" (Clo 26) iti|  bastireko-"mUtrACayo" (Clo.10) ityAdinoktaH|  evaM snAvamarmANi trayoviMCatiH|

gudApastambhavidhuraCRGgATAni navAdiCet||42|| marmANi dhamanIsthAni----------------------||42||

gudaH-sthUlAntrabaddha ekaH|  apastambhAkhye dve-"apastambhAvuraHpArCve nADyAvanilavAhinI|" (Clo.15)iti, vidhurAkhye dve-"adhastAtkarNayornimne vidhure" (Clo.29) iti|  CRGgATakAkhyAni catvAri-"jihvAkSinAsikA" (Clo.34) ityAdinoktAni|  evaM dhamanIsthAni-dhamanyACritAni, nava marmANi|

-----------------------saptatriMCatsirACrayAH||42||  bRhatyau mAtRkA nIle manye kakSAdharau phaNau||43|| viTape hRdayaM nAbhiH pArCvasandhI stanAdhare||43|| apAlApau sthapanyurvyaCcatasro lohitAni ca||44||

sirACrayA marmaviCeSAH saptatriMCat|  katham ?  ityAha-bRhatyAvityAdi|  bRhatyau dve-"stanamUlArjave bhAge" (Clo 23) ityAdinokte|  mAtRkAkhyAni-"kaNThanADImubhayato jihvAnAsAgatAH" (Clo.28) ityAdinoktAnyaSTau|  nIlAkhye dve sire manyAkhye [ca] dve-"kaNThanADImubhayataH sirAhanusamACritAH|  catasraH (Clo.26) ityAdinoktAni|  kakSAdharau dvau-yathoktam (Clo.9) "kakSAkSamadhye kakSAdhRk" ityAdi|  phaNau dvau-"phaNAvubhayato" (Clo.30) ityAdinA kRtalakSaNau|  viTape dve-"muSkavaGkSaNayormadhye (Clo.8) pratyekaM sakthnyekam, dvitIye~apyevam|  hRdayamekameva, tasya lakSaNam (Clo.13)-"dvAramAmACayasya ca" ityAdi|  nAbhireka eva, tallakSaNam (Clo.12)- "dehAmapakvasthAnAnAM" ityAdi|  pArCvasandhI dvau-"pArCvAntaranibaddhau ca" (Clo.22) ityAdinoktau|  stanAdhare-stanayoradho, dve|  apAlApau dvAveva-"pRSThavaMCorasoH (Clo.16) ityAdinoktau|  sthapanI ekaiva, tallakSaNam, (Clo.33)-"bhruvormadhye" iti|  urvyaCcatasraH-Urvordvayordve bAhvoCca, "urvyUrumadhye" (Clo.7) iti tasyA lakSaNam, iti sakthnostathA bAhvoH (Clo.8) iti cAtideCaH|  lohitAnIti lohitAkSanAmAni catvAri, "UrumUle lohitAkSaM" sakthivadbAhvoH" (Clo.7-8) iti tallakSaNam| samprati sandhimarmANyAha-

sandhau viMCatirAvartau maNibandhau kukundarau||44|| sImantAH kUrparau gulphau kRkATyau jAnunI patiH||45||

sandhau viMCatirmarmANi|  AvartAkhye dve, tayorlakSaNam (Clo. 31)-"tathopari bhruvornimnAvAvartau" iti|  maNibandhau dvau, tallakSaNam (Clo.8)-maNibandho~atra gulphavat" iti|  kukundarau dvau, tallakSaNam (Clo.19)-"jaghanasya bahirbhAge marmaNI tau kukundarau|" iti|  sImantAkhyAni paJca, tallakSaNam (Clo.35)-"kapAlasandhayaH paJca sImantAH" iti|  kUrparau dvau, tallakSaNam (Clo.9)-"kUrparaM jAnuvat" iti|  kUrparaCabda ubhayaliGgaH|  gulphau dve marmaNI, tayorlakSaNam (Clo.5)-"jaGghAcaraNayoH sandhau gulphaH" iti|  kRkATyau dve, tallakSaNam (Clo.29)-"kRkATike CirogrIvAsandhI" iti|  jAnunI dve, tayorlakSaNam (Clo.6)-"jaGghorvoH saGgame jAnu" iti|  patiH-adhipatirmarmaNAm, taccaikam, tallakSaNam (Clo.36)-"Antaro mastakasyordhvaM" ityAdinoktam|  evaM saptottaraM marmaCataM mAMsAdiparikalpanayA kalpitam|

athAto garbhavyApadaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||1|| iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||1||

"rakte tvatisravati tata eva nyagrodhAdisiddhAt kSIrasarpiSo~akSamAtraM prACayet|  kevalAdeva vA kSIrasarpiSo~akSamAtraM na tu nyagrodhAdiCRGgasiddhAt kSIrasarpiSaH|  padmAdikiJjalkaM ca madhuCarkarAbhyAM yuktaM lehayet|  
 madhunA vA dhAtakyAdicUrNam|  madhunaiva nyagrodhAditvacAM CRGgANAM ca kalkam|  sakSaudraM va CaCAdyanyatamarudhiram| RddhyAdikaM ca payasa nIlotpalAdIni taNDalAmbhuvAsArasayoranyatareNa|  pakvo mRlloSThastathoktaH|  Ajena payasa gandhapriyaGvAdIni|

adRSTaCoNitAM tu madhukapayasyAsuradAruphiH siddhaM        payaH       pAyayet||5|| tAmravalyaCmantakaCatAvarIpayasyAphirvA||5|| vidAryyAdigaNena vA||5|| CvadaMSTrAsvarasakSIrasiddhaM vA sarpiH||5|| palANDurasasiddhaM vA sakSaudram||5||

 asampUrNatrimAsAyAstu puSpadarCane garphaH prAyo na tiSTha-    tyasaJjAtasAratvAt||6||

CArIrasthAnam

vikRtivijJAnIyaH adhyAyaH

athAto vikRtivijJAnIyaM CArIraM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2|| iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

prakRtiH-svabhAvaH, prakRteH-svabhAvAt, pracyutiH-vikRtiH, tasyA vijJAnaM-avabodhaH, sa vidyate yasminniti "matau chaH sUktasAmnoH" iti chaH, "adhyAyAnuvAkayorluk" iti tasya pAkSikatvAnna luk, vikRtivijJAnIyaH, taM CArIraM vyAkhyAsyAmaH|  CeSaM pUrvavat| vikRtiH punaratra riSTameva vijJeyam|

puSpaM phalasya dhUmo~agnervarSasya jaladodayaH||1|| yathA bhaviSyato liGgaM riSTaM mRtyostathA dhruvam||1|| (AyuSmati kriyAH sarvAH saphalAH samprayojitAH||1|| bhavanti bhiSajAM bhUtyai kRtajJa iva bhUbhuji||1|| kSINAyuSi kRtaM karma vyarthaM kRtamivAdhame||2|| ayaCo dehasandehaM svArthahAniM ca yacchati||2|| tarhIdAnIM gatAsUnAM lakSaNaM sampracakSate||3|| vikRtiH prakRteH prAjJaiH pradiSTA riSTasaMjJayA)||3||

yathA phalasya bhAvino-bhaviSyataH puSpam, agnerbhAvino dhUmaH, varSasya bhAvino jaladodayaH, tathA-tenaiva dRSTAntena, mRtyorbhaviSyato riSTaM liGgaM-gamakaM, dhruvaM-niCcitam| druvaCabdanirdeCAdidaM dyotayati,-riSTacchAyAnukAri tadAbhAsarUpaM mRtyorna liGgamiti|

ariSTaM nAsti maraNaM dRSTariSTaM ca jIvitam||2||

na vidyate pUrvaM riSTaM yasya maraNasya tadariSTaM tathAvidhaM maraNaM nAsti|  tathA, dRSTaM riSTaM yasya jIvitasya tadevaMbhUtaM jIvitamapi nAsti|  yattu puSpAdarCane~api vaTavRkSAdau phalasadbhAvo dRCyate, tattu kvacideva na sarvatra, iti nAyaM doSo~atra cintyaH|

ariSTe riSTavijJAnaM na ca riSTe~apyanaipuNAt||2||

paramArthena yadriSTatvena na ca niCcayIkRtaM, tasminnariSTe riSTavijJAnaM-riSTatvAvagamaH| na ca riSTe~api riSTavijJAnaM keSAJcidbhavati|  kuto hetoH ? ityAha-anaipuNAt| nipuNasya bhAvo naipuNam| "hAyanAntayuvAdibhyo~aN" ityaN| na naipuNamanaipuNaM tasmAt-mithyAjJAnAdityarthaH| tadevaM yadabhrAntariSTaM tadavyabhicAritvAnmaraNaM niCcitaM sUcayati| yadanyadriSTacchAyAnukAri "yaM naraM sahasA rogo" ityAdilakSaNaM tadbhrAntameva| yathA-adhUme bASpAdau dhUma iti jJAnam|  na ca tasmAnmithyAjJAnAdagnyupalabdhirniCcitA bhavati|  tasmAdyuktamuktaM "ariSTaM nAsti maraNaM" ityAdi|  munirapyAha (?) (saGgrahe~apyuktam, CA. a.10)_"ariSTaM nAsti maraNaM dRSTariSTaM ca jIvitam|  ariSTe riSTavijJAnaM na ca riSTe~apyanaipuNAt|| iti|  suCrutastu paThati (sU. a. 28/5)-"dhruvaM hi riSTe maraNaM brAhmaNaistatkilAmalaiH|  rasAyanatapodAnatatparairvA nivAryate|| iti|

kecittu taddvidhetyAhuH sthAyyasthAyivibhedataH||3||

kecidAcAryAstat-riSTaM, dvidhA vadanti|  katham ?  ityAha-sthAyItyAdi|  tRtIyArthe tasiH|  sthAyyasthAyibhedena dviprakAram|

doSANAmapi bAhulyAdriSTAbhAsaH samudbhavet||3|| sa doSANAM Came CAmyetsthAyyavaCyaM tu mRtyave||4||

apiCabdaH samuccaye bhinnakramaH| riSTAbhAsaCca doSANAM bAhulyAtsamudbhavet|  doSANAM Came-doSANAM CAntau satyAM, saH-riSTAbhAsaH, CAmyet-na tu maraNAya sampadyate|  sthAyi tu riSTamavaCyaM mRtyave-maraNAya, jAyate|  nanu, "ariSTaM nAsti maraNaM' ityayuktamivAbhAti| riSTamantareNApyakAlamRtyo rAjacaurAgnyudakAdibhirdarCanAt|  atra saJcakSmahe|  kAlamRtyoreva riSTapUrvakatvAt|  tathA ca vakSyati (Clo.14)-sarve te kAlacoditAH|"  tathA ca (Clo.61)-vaCagAH  samavartinaH|" iti|  samavartI hi kAlamRtyureva|

rUpendriyasvaracchAyApraticchAyAkriyAdiSu||4|| anyeSvapi ca bhAveSu prAkRteSvanimittataH||5|| vikRtiryA samAsena riSTaM taditi lakSayet||5||

rUpaM-gaurAdivarNaviCeSaH, gauraH CyAmaH kRSNo gauraCyAmaH kRSNaCyAma iti dehaprakRtivarNAH|  tadbhedAstu padmagaurAdayaH|   "nIlaCyAmatAmrahAridraCuklAdayastu vikRtayaH" (saM.CA. a.9)-  tathA, cakSuSA yadgrAhyaM vastujAtaM saMsthAnAdi tadapi rUpam| indriyANi-cakSurAdIni|  svaraH-CabdaH, pratipuruSaM viCiSTo ravaH| chAyA-varNaprabhACrayA vakSyamANalakSaNA| praticchAyA pratibimbam| kriyA-dehavAGmAnovyApAraH|  tatra dhAvanaplavanAdyanekarUpo vyAyAmo nRtyasthAnakAdiH-kAyiko vyApAraH|   gItAdhyayanAdiH-vAciko vyApAraH|  rAgadveSabhayerSyAdiH-mAnasaH|  AdiCabdo~anyeSAmapi CarIragatAnAM bhAvAnAM grahaNArtham| rUpaM cendriyANi ca svaraCca cchAyA ca praticchAyA ca kriyAdayaCca, teSu rupAdiSu bhAveSu, tathA~anyeSvapi prAkRteSu bhAveSu, animittataH-akasmAnnimittamantareNaiva, yA vikRtiH sA (tat) samAsena riSTamiti lakSyet-jAnIyAt| prakRtau bhavAH_-prAkRtAH|  yathA vAtaprakRtau caladhRtismRtyAdayaH| tadevaM rUpAdiSu bhAveSu kriyAdiparyanteSvanyeSu ca prAkRteSu bhAveSu yA vikRtiH-svabhAvapracyutiH, sA (tat) saGkSepeNa riSTam| vistaratastvanekadhA vakSyamANam|

keCaroma nirabhyaGgaM yasyAbhyaktamivekSyate||6||

keCACca romANi ca tat keCaroma, yasya nirabhyaGgaM-abhyaGgarahitaM, abhyaktamivekSyate-dRCyate, sa kAlacodita iti vacanavipariNAmena sambandhaH|  evamuttaratrApi|  etadrUpavikRterudAharaNam|

yasyAtyarthaM cale netre stabdhAntargatanirgate||6|| jihme vistRtasaGkSipte saGkSiptavinatabhruNI||7|| udbhrAntadarCane hInadarCane nakulopame||7|| kapotAbhe alAtAbhe srute lulitapakSmaNI||8||

netraCabdena netrAdhiSThAnamiSTam, nendriyam|  yasya cale locane~atyarthaM-atiCayenetaCcetaCca paribhramataH|  tathA, yasya netre stabdhe-niCcle|  tathA, yasyAntargate-antaHpraviSTe|  tathA, yasya nirgate-bahiryAte|  tathA, yasya jihme-kuTile|  tathA, yasya vistRte-vistAraM gate|  tathA, yasya netre saGkSipte-saGkucite|   tathA, saGkSipte viCeSeNa nate bhruvau yayoste saGkSiptavinatabhruNI|   tathA, udbhrAntadarCane-vibhrAntadRSTinI|  tathA, hInadarCane-alpadarCane naSTadRSTinI vA|  tathA, nakulopame-nakulalocanAbhe|  samudAyeSu hi pravRttAH CabdA avayaveSvapi vartanta iti nakulaCabdo~atra nakulalocanaviSayo vedyaH|  yathA ca nAgAnandanATake (aM.1/17)-"cakSustAmarasAnukAri hariNA vakSaHsthalaM spardhate" iti|  atra hi harivakSasA vakSaH spardhate ityayamartho vedyaH| athavA nakulalocane upamA yayoste nakulopame, ityatra uttarapadalopI samAsaH| evaM kapotAbhe| tathA, alAtAbhe-ulmukasadRCe| tathA,srute-nirnimittamaCru parisravataH| tathA, lulite-vAtoddhata iva pakSmaNI yayoste lulitapakSmaNI|

nAsikA~atyarthavivRtA saMvRtA piTikAcitA||8|| ucchUnA sphuTitA mlAnA---------------------------------||9||

tathA, yasya nAsikA nirnimittamatyarthaM-atiCayena, vivRtA|  athavA, saMvRtA-saGkucitA|  tathA, piTikAcitA-piTikAbhirvyAptA|  tathA, ucchUnA-UrdhvaM CvayathunA~~AkrAntA|  tathA, sphuTitA mlAnA ca|

CArIrasthAnam

vikRtivijJAnIyaH adhyAyaH

athAto vikRtivijJAnIyaM CArIraM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2|| iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

prakRtiH-svabhAvaH, prakRteH-svabhAvAt, pracyutiH-vikRtiH, tasyA vijJAnaM-avabodhaH, sa vidyate yasminniti "matau chaH sUktasAmnoH" iti chaH, "adhyAyAnuvAkayorluk" iti tasya pAkSikatvAnna luk, vikRtivijJAnIyaH, taM CArIraM vyAkhyAsyAmaH|  CeSaM pUrvavat| vikRtiH punaratra riSTameva vijJeyam|

puSpaM phalasya dhUmo~agnervarSasya jaladodayaH||1|| yathA bhaviSyato liGgaM riSTaM mRtyostathA dhruvam||1|| (AyuSmati kriyAH sarvAH saphalAH samprayojitAH||1|| bhavanti bhiSajAM bhUtyai kRtajJa iva bhUbhuji||1|| kSINAyuSi kRtaM karma vyarthaM kRtamivAdhame||2|| ayaCo dehasandehaM svArthahAniM ca yacchati||2|| tarhIdAnIM gatAsUnAM lakSaNaM sampracakSate||3|| vikRtiH prakRteH prAjJaiH pradiSTA riSTasaMjJayA)||3||

yathA phalasya bhAvino-bhaviSyataH puSpam, agnerbhAvino dhUmaH, varSasya bhAvino jaladodayaH, tathA-tenaiva dRSTAntena, mRtyorbhaviSyato riSTaM liGgaM-gamakaM, dhruvaM-niCcitam| druvaCabdanirdeCAdidaM dyotayati,-riSTacchAyAnukAri tadAbhAsarUpaM mRtyorna liGgamiti|

ariSTaM nAsti maraNaM dRSTariSTaM ca jIvitam||2||

na vidyate pUrvaM riSTaM yasya maraNasya tadariSTaM tathAvidhaM maraNaM nAsti|  tathA, dRSTaM riSTaM yasya jIvitasya tadevaMbhUtaM jIvitamapi nAsti|  yattu puSpAdarCane~api vaTavRkSAdau phalasadbhAvo dRCyate, tattu kvacideva na sarvatra, iti nAyaM doSo~atra cintyaH|

ariSTe riSTavijJAnaM na ca riSTe~apyanaipuNAt||2||

paramArthena yadriSTatvena na ca niCcayIkRtaM, tasminnariSTe riSTavijJAnaM-riSTatvAvagamaH| na ca riSTe~api riSTavijJAnaM keSAJcidbhavati|  kuto hetoH ? ityAha-anaipuNAt| nipuNasya bhAvo naipuNam| "hAyanAntayuvAdibhyo~aN" ityaN| na naipuNamanaipuNaM tasmAt-mithyAjJAnAdityarthaH| tadevaM yadabhrAntariSTaM tadavyabhicAritvAnmaraNaM niCcitaM sUcayati| yadanyadriSTacchAyAnukAri "yaM naraM sahasA rogo" ityAdilakSaNaM tadbhrAntameva| yathA-adhUme bASpAdau dhUma iti jJAnam|  na ca tasmAnmithyAjJAnAdagnyupalabdhirniCcitA bhavati|  tasmAdyuktamuktaM "ariSTaM nAsti maraNaM" ityAdi|  munirapyAha (?) (saGgrahe~apyuktam, CA. a.10)_"ariSTaM nAsti maraNaM dRSTariSTaM ca jIvitam|  ariSTe riSTavijJAnaM na ca riSTe~apyanaipuNAt|| iti|  suCrutastu paThati (sU. a. 28/5)-"dhruvaM hi riSTe maraNaM brAhmaNaistatkilAmalaiH|  rasAyanatapodAnatatparairvA nivAryate|| iti|

kecittu taddvidhetyAhuH sthAyyasthAyivibhedataH||3||

kecidAcAryAstat-riSTaM, dvidhA vadanti|  katham ?  ityAha-sthAyItyAdi|  tRtIyArthe tasiH|  sthAyyasthAyibhedena dviprakAram|

doSANAmapi bAhulyAdriSTAbhAsaH samudbhavet||3|| sa doSANAM Came CAmyetsthAyyavaCyaM tu mRtyave||4||

apiCabdaH samuccaye bhinnakramaH| riSTAbhAsaCca doSANAM bAhulyAtsamudbhavet|  doSANAM Came-doSANAM CAntau satyAM, saH-riSTAbhAsaH, CAmyet-na tu maraNAya sampadyate|  sthAyi tu riSTamavaCyaM mRtyave-maraNAya, jAyate|  nanu, "ariSTaM nAsti maraNaM' ityayuktamivAbhAti| riSTamantareNApyakAlamRtyo rAjacaurAgnyudakAdibhirdarCanAt|  atra saJcakSmahe|  kAlamRtyoreva riSTapUrvakatvAt|  tathA ca vakSyati (Clo.14)-sarve te kAlacoditAH|"  tathA ca (Clo.61)-vaCagAH  samavartinaH|" iti|  samavartI hi kAlamRtyureva|

rUpendriyasvaracchAyApraticchAyAkriyAdiSu||4|| anyeSvapi ca bhAveSu prAkRteSvanimittataH||5|| vikRtiryA samAsena riSTaM taditi lakSayet||5||

rUpaM-gaurAdivarNaviCeSaH, gauraH CyAmaH kRSNo gauraCyAmaH kRSNaCyAma iti dehaprakRtivarNAH|  tadbhedAstu padmagaurAdayaH|   "nIlaCyAmatAmrahAridraCuklAdayastu vikRtayaH" (saM.CA. a.9)-  tathA, cakSuSA yadgrAhyaM vastujAtaM saMsthAnAdi tadapi rUpam| indriyANi-cakSurAdIni|  svaraH-CabdaH, pratipuruSaM viCiSTo ravaH| chAyA-varNaprabhACrayA vakSyamANalakSaNA| praticchAyA pratibimbam| kriyA-dehavAGmAnovyApAraH|  tatra dhAvanaplavanAdyanekarUpo vyAyAmo nRtyasthAnakAdiH-kAyiko vyApAraH|   gItAdhyayanAdiH-vAciko vyApAraH|  rAgadveSabhayerSyAdiH-mAnasaH|  AdiCabdo~anyeSAmapi CarIragatAnAM bhAvAnAM grahaNArtham| rUpaM cendriyANi ca svaraCca cchAyA ca praticchAyA ca kriyAdayaCca, teSu rupAdiSu bhAveSu, tathA~anyeSvapi prAkRteSu bhAveSu, animittataH-akasmAnnimittamantareNaiva, yA vikRtiH sA (tat) samAsena riSTamiti lakSyet-jAnIyAt| prakRtau bhavAH_-prAkRtAH|  yathA vAtaprakRtau caladhRtismRtyAdayaH| tadevaM rUpAdiSu bhAveSu kriyAdiparyanteSvanyeSu ca prAkRteSu bhAveSu yA vikRtiH-svabhAvapracyutiH, sA (tat) saGkSepeNa riSTam| vistaratastvanekadhA vakSyamANam|

keCaroma nirabhyaGgaM yasyAbhyaktamivekSyate||6||

keCACca romANi ca tat keCaroma, yasya nirabhyaGgaM-abhyaGgarahitaM, abhyaktamivekSyate-dRCyate, sa kAlacodita iti vacanavipariNAmena sambandhaH|  evamuttaratrApi|  etadrUpavikRterudAharaNam|

yasyAtyarthaM cale netre stabdhAntargatanirgate||6|| jihme vistRtasaGkSipte saGkSiptavinatabhruNI||7|| udbhrAntadarCane hInadarCane nakulopame||7|| kapotAbhe alAtAbhe srute lulitapakSmaNI||8||

netraCabdena netrAdhiSThAnamiSTam, nendriyam|  yasya cale locane~atyarthaM-atiCayenetaCcetaCca paribhramataH|  tathA, yasya netre stabdhe-niCcle|  tathA, yasyAntargate-antaHpraviSTe|  tathA, yasya nirgate-bahiryAte|  tathA, yasya jihme-kuTile|  tathA, yasya vistRte-vistAraM gate|  tathA, yasya netre saGkSipte-saGkucite|   tathA, saGkSipte viCeSeNa nate bhruvau yayoste saGkSiptavinatabhruNI|   tathA, udbhrAntadarCane-vibhrAntadRSTinI|  tathA, hInadarCane-alpadarCane naSTadRSTinI vA|  tathA, nakulopame-nakulalocanAbhe|  samudAyeSu hi pravRttAH CabdA avayaveSvapi vartanta iti nakulaCabdo~atra nakulalocanaviSayo vedyaH|  yathA ca nAgAnandanATake (aM.1/17)-"cakSustAmarasAnukAri hariNA vakSaHsthalaM spardhate" iti|  atra hi harivakSasA vakSaH spardhate ityayamartho vedyaH| athavA nakulalocane upamA yayoste nakulopame, ityatra uttarapadalopI samAsaH| evaM kapotAbhe| tathA, alAtAbhe-ulmukasadRCe| tathA,srute-nirnimittamaCru parisravataH| tathA, lulite-vAtoddhata iva pakSmaNI yayoste lulitapakSmaNI|

nAsikA~atyarthavivRtA saMvRtA piTikAcitA||8|| ucchUnA sphuTitA mlAnA---------------------------------||9||

tathA, yasya nAsikA nirnimittamatyarthaM-atiCayena, vivRtA|  athavA, saMvRtA-saGkucitA|  tathA, piTikAcitA-piTikAbhirvyAptA|  tathA, ucchUnA-UrdhvaM CvayathunA~~AkrAntA|  tathA, sphuTitA mlAnA ca|

CArIrasthAnam

vikRtivijJAnIyaH adhyAyaH

--------------------yasyauSTho yAtyadho~adharaH||9|| UrdhvaM dvitIyaH syAtAM vA pakvajambUnibhAvubhau||9||

yasyauSTho-dantacchadaH, adharaH-anuttaraH, adho yAti|  dvitIyaH-upariSTAdbhavo yo dantacchadaH, sa UrdhvaM yAti|  tathA,  yasya ca pakvajambUphalanIlau dvAvoSThau bhavataH|

dantAH saCarkarAH CyAvAstAmrAH puSpitapaGkitAH||10|| sahasaiva pateyurvA--------------------------------||10||

tathA, yasya dantAH saCarkarAH-CarkarAbhirAcitAH, tathA CyAvAstathA tAmrACca varNataH, tathA puSpitAH-saJjAtapuSpAH, tathA paGkitAH-saJjAtapaGkAH kardamopaliptA iva, tathA sahasaiva - jhagityeva, yasya vA dvijAH pateyuH-bhraMCeyuH|

----------------------------------jihvA jihmA visarpiNI||10|| CUnA CuSkA guruH CyAvA liptA suptA sakaNTakA||11||

tathA, yasya jihvA-jihvendriyAdhiSThAnaM, jihmA-kuTilA, tathA visarpiNI-kAraNaM vinA viCeSeNa sarpati tacchilA, tathA CUnA-nimittaM vinA~api [CvayathuyuktA], tathA CuSkA guruCca, tathA CyAvA, tathA liptA, tathA suptA-suptavatsuptA rasAjJAnAdvicetanetyarthaH, tathA sakaNTakA-kaNTakAciteva|

CiraH CirodharA voDhuM pRSThaM vA bhAramAtmanaH||11|| hanU vA piNDamAsyasthaM Caknuvanti na yasya ca||12||

yasya puMsaH CirodharA-grIvA, Ciro voDhuM na Caknoti|  tathA, yasya pRSThaM vA Atmano bhAraM-pRSThasya voDhRtvenoparyArUDhaM grIvAdikaM dhArayituM, na Caknoti| yasya vA puMso hanU bhaktapiNDaM-kavalaM, AsyasthaM voDhuM na CaknutaH| evaM CirodharAdIni trINyaGgAni svamAtmIyaM kAyaM yasya voDuM na Caknuvanti, sa kAlacodita iti yojyam|

yasyAnimittamaGgAni gurUNyati laghUni vA||12||

yasyAnimittaM-kAraNaM vinA, aGgAnyatigurUNi kadAcidatilaghUni vA bhavanti|

viSadoSAdvinA yasya khebhyo raktaM pravartate||13||

tathA, yasya viSadoSamantareNa khebhyaH-chidrebhyo, raktaM pravartate-AyAti|

utsiktaM mehanaM yasya vRSaNAvatiniHsRtau||13|| ato~anyathA vA yasya syAt sarve te kAlacoditAH||14||

"yasya mehanaM-liGgaM, utsiktaM-UrdhvaM gatam|  tathA, vRSaNAvatiniHsRtau-pralambau|  ato~anyathA vA-uktaprakArAdviparItaH prakAro yaH so~anyathA, yathA-vRSaNAvutsiktAvatiniHsRtaM mehanamiti|  
""keCaroma nirabhyaGgaM"" (Clo.6) ityArabhya yAvat ""ato~anyathA vA"" ityetatparyantagranthoktaM lakSaNaM yeSAM jAtaM te puruSAH sarve kAlena-mRtyunA, coditAH-antakenAtmasAtkRtA ityarthaH|  
nanu, atra kAlaniyamo na kRtaH kiyatA kAlena mRtyurbhavati mAsenArdhamAsena vA ? iti sandehAnna yuktametat|  atra brUmaH| anirdiSTakAlAnAM saMvatsaro~avadhiriti vyavasthA vedyA|  tathA cAha (Clo.24)-""varSAntaM tasya jIvitam"" tathA (Clo.25)-""so~api varSaM na jIvati"" ityAdivacanAnnAsti varSAdUrdhvaM jAtariSTasya jIvitamiti niCcayaH|"

yasyApUrvAH sirAlekhA bAlendvAkRtayo~api vA||14|| lalATe bastiCIrSe vA SaNmAsAnna sa jIvati||15||

yasya-puMsaH svasthasya nirnimittameva, lalATe bastervA Cirasi, apUrvAH-abhinavA na tu prAgavasthitAH, sirAlekhAH-sirArAjayo, dRCyante|  athavA bAlendvAkRtayo-vakrAH, sa pumAn SaNmAsAnna jIvati|

padminIpatravattoyaM CarIre yasya dehinaH||15|| plavate plavamAnasya SaNmAsAstasya jIvitam||16||

tathA, yasya puMsaH plavamAnasya-jale snAnaM kurvataH, CarIre padminIpatravat-padminIpatrasthitatoyavat, toyaM plavate-anavasthitasthiti bhavati, tasyApi SaNmAsA na jIvitam|  padminIpatravaditi saptamyarthe vatirna SaSThyarthe, CarIra iti saptamyA nirdiSTatvAt|  tathA coktaM bhASyakRtA-"upamAne yaH saMCayaH sa upameyAdvyAvartate|" iti|

haritAbhAH sirA yasya romakUpACca saMvRtAH||16|| so~amlAbhilASI puruSaH pittAnmaraNamaCnute||17||

yasya sirA haritAbhA romakUpACca saMvRtAH syuH, sa naro~amlAbhilASI san pittena mRtyuM prApnoti|

CArIrasthAnam

vikRtivijJAnIyaH adhyAyaH

yasya gomayacUrNAbhaM cUrNaM mUrdhni mukhe~api vA||17|| sasnehaM, mUrdhni dhUmo vA, mAsAntaM tasya jIvitam||18||

yasya puruSasya gomayacUrNasadRCaM cUrNaM sasnehaM mUrdhni mukhe vA bhavet, tathA mUrdhni dhUmo yasya vA bhavati, tasya mAsAntaM jIvitaM syAt|

mUrdhni bhruvorvA kurvanti sImantAvartakA navAH||18|| mRtyuM svasthasya SaDrAtrAttrirAtrAdAturasya tu||19||

sImantAnAmAvartakAH-maNDalAni,-sImantAvartakAH, Cirasi bhruvorvA navAH-apUrvAH, svasthasya SaDrAtrAnmRtyuM kurvanti|  Aturasya punastrirAtrAt kurvanti|  anekArthatvAddhAtUnAM sUcayantItyarthaH, na tu viSavanmAraNe teSAM kartRtvam|  tarhi sUcayantItyetadeva kasmAnna kRtam ?  brUmaH|  yadotpadyante sImantAvartakAstadA niCcitaM sthAyi riSTaM samutpannamityavagantavyamiti pratipAdanArthaM kurvantItyuktam|

 jihvA CyAvA mukhaM pUti savyamakSi nimajjati||19|| khagA vA mUrdhni lIyante yasya taM parivarjayet||20||

tathA, yasya jihvA CyAvA bhavati, tathA mukhaM pUti-durgandhi,  tathA savyaM-vAmamakSi, nimajjati-antaHpraviCati, tathA yasya khagAH-pakSiNaCca, mUrdhni lIyante-CliSyanti, taM parivarjayet|  vaidya iti CeSaH|

yasya snAtAnuliptasya pUrvaM CuSyatyuro bhRCam||20|| ArdreSu sarvagAtreSu so~ardhamAsaM na jIvati||21||

yasya snAtAnuliptasya-pUrvaM snAtaH paCcAdanuliptastasya, ArdreSu sarvagAtreSu pUrvaM-Adau, bhRCamuraH CuSyati-atiCayena vakSaH CoSamAyAti, so~ardhamAsaM-pakSaM, na jIvati| nanu,, "ArdreSu sarvagAtreSu" iti na vaktavyam, punaruktatvAt|  tathA hi-"pUrvaM CuSyatyuro bhRCam" ityukte "ArdreSu sarvagAtreSu" ityarthAdgamyata eva|  anyathA pUrvagrahaNamanarthakaM syAt|  maivam|  atra hi bhRCagrahaNAt pUrvamuro  bhRCaM CuSyati, na punaranyAnyapi gAtrANi na CuSyantItyAyAti|  na caitadiSTaM CAstrakRtaH|  ata eva "ArdreSu" ityAha|  tadayamartho~atrAbhipretaH-yathaivoraso bhRCaM CoSaH, tathaiva CeSANAmaGgAnAM bhRCArdratA syAditi, etacca pratipAdayituM "ArdreSu" ityuktam|  sarvagAtreSvAdreSu satsu pUrvamuro bhRCaM CuSyatItyaitadACcaryam|  ACcaryatvAdriSTam|

akasmAdyugapadgAtre varNau prAkRtavaikRtau||21|| tathaivopacayaglAniraukSyasnehAdi mRtyave||22||

tatra prAkRto varNo-gaurAdiH, prAguktaH, vaikRtastu varNo-nIlAdiH, tau prAkRtavaikRtau varNau yasya nimittamantareNApi tulyakAlaM dehe bhavataH, tau mRtyave|  tathaivopacayaglAnyAdayaH parasparaM pratipakSabhUtA yugapadyasyotpadyante tasya mRtyave|  AdiCabdena CaityauSNyAdIni gRhyante|

yasya sphuTeyuraGgulyo nAkRSTA na sa jIvati||22|| kSavakAsAdiSu tathA yasyApUrvo dhvanirbhavet||23|| hrasvo dIrgho~ati vocchvAsaH pUtiH surabhireva vA||23||

yasya AkRSTA aGgulyo na sphuTeyuH-na truTeyuH, sa na jIvati|  yasya kSavAdiSvapUrvo dhvaniH-alaukikaH CabdaH, syAt sa na jIvati|  yasyocchvAso~atihrasvo~atidIrgho vA bhavet, athavocchvAsaH pUtigandhiH surabhirvA yasya, sa na jIvati|

AplutAnAplute kAye yasya gandho~atimAnuSaH||24|| malavastravraNAdau vA varSAntaM tasya jIvitam||24||

tathA, AplutAnAplute-snAtAsnAte, kAye yasya mAnuSamatikrAntaH-atimAnuSaH, gandhaH-surabhirasurabhirvA, bhavati|  yasya malavastravraNAdau vA~atimAnuSo gandhaH syAt, varSAntaM tasya jIvitaM-tatkSaNAdArabhya tAvadasAvavasthitajIvito yAvadvarSam|  tadante-vatsarAnte, mRtyubhAk jAyata ityarthaH|

bhajante~atyaGgasaurasyAdyaM yUkAmakSikAdayaH||25|| tyajanti vA~ativairasyAtso~api varSaM na jIvati||25||

Cobhanasya rasasya bhAvaH saurasyam, aGgasya saurasyamaGgasaurasyam, atiCayenAGgasaurasyAddhetoryUkAmakSikAdayo yaM bhajante, athavA yamativairasyAttyajanti, so~api varSaM na jIvati|

satatoSmasu gAtreSu CaityaM yasyopalakSyate||26|| CIteSu bhRCamauSNyaM vA svedaH stambho~apyahetukaH||26||

tathA, yasya satatoSmasu-sadoSNeSu, gAtreSu-avayaveSu, bhRCaM CaityamupalakSayate-upalabhyate, CIteSu  vA gAtreSu bhRCamauSNyaM yasyopalabhyate, bhRCaCabdasyAtra hi viSayadvaye~api sambandhaH|  yasyAhetukaH-nirnimittaH, aGgeSvatisvedaH, tathA svedaviSayo yaH stambhaH, so~api yasya syAt, so~api varSaM na jIvatIti yojyam|

yo jAtaCItapiTikaH CItAGgo vA vidahyate||27|| uSNadveSI ca CItArtaH sa pretAdhipagocaraH||27||

jAtAH CItAH piTikA yasya sa jAtaCItapiTikaH,-kaphodbhUtapiTikAkrAntadeho, yo vidahyate-vidAhamanubhavati, CItAGgaH san yo vA vidahyate, tathoSNaM dveSTi yaH puruSaH CItArtaH san, sa pretAdhipagocaraH-sa mRtyunA~~AtmasAtkriyata ityarthaH|

CArIrasthAnam

vikRtivijJAnIyaH adhyAyaH

urasyUSmA bhavedyasya jaThare cAtiCItatA||28|| bhinnaM purISaM tRSNA ca yathA pretastathaiva saH||28||

urasi-yasyoSmA-auSNyaM, bhavet, jaThare--udare cAtiCaityam, purISaM bhinnaM tRSNA ca bhavati, sa pretatulyaH, prAptamaraNatvAditi bhAvaH|

mUtraM purISaM niSThyUtaM CukraM vA~apsu nimajjati||29|| niSThyUtaM bahuvarNaM vA yasya mAsAtsa naCyati||29||

yasya mUtraM purISaM niSThyUtaM CukraM vA apsu nimajjati-bruDati, yasya vA niSThyUtaM-niSThIvanaM, anekavarNaM bhavati, asau mAsena naCyati|

ghanIbhUtamivAkACamAkACamiva yo ghanam||30|| amUrtamiva mUrtaM ca mUrtaM cAmUrtavatsthitam||30|| tejasvyatejastadvacca CuklaM kRSNamasacca sat||31|| anetrarogaCcandraM ca bahurUpamalAJchanam||31|| jAgradrakSAMsi gandharvAn pretAnanyAMCca tadvidhAn||32||  rUpaM vyAkRti tattacca yaH paCyati sa naCyati||32|| saptarSINAM samIpasthAM yo na paCyatyarundhatIm||33|| dhruvamAkACagaGgAM vA sa na paCyati tAM samAm||33||

"maraNAbhimukhaH puruSo viparyAsakAribhirdoSairaghanAdi ghanAdirUpaM manyate, ghanAdi vA~aghanAdi manyate, tadviparyayeNa|  ata evopamArthamivaCabdaM prAyuGkta|  aghano ghanaH sampanno ghanIbhUtaH|   cvipratyayAntasyAsya  ""cvau"" itItvam|  ghanIbhUtamivAntarikSamantarikSamiva ghanaM medinIdharmamantarikSamUrdhvasthaM yattadadhaHsthaM pAtAlasthamiva paCyati, sa naCyatIti vakSyamANena sambandhaH|  
 caCabdo bhinnakrama ivaCabdaCca|  amUrtaM ca vAtAdikaM mUrtamiva-rUpavantamiva, paCyati|  mUrtaM ca vahnyAdikamamUrtamiva sthitaM yaH paCyati sa naCyati|  bheDo~apyadhIte (iM.a.7)- ""yasya darCanamAyAti vAyurambaragocaraH|  vahnirnAyAti dIpto~api tasyAyuHkSayamAdiCet||"" iti|   tathA, tejasvi-yadvastvagnyAdikaM bhAsvaraM, tadatejo-nistejo, yaH paCyati|  tejasvIti ""asmAyAmedhA"" ityAdinA viniH|   tadvacceti tejasvyatejodarCanena tulyaM-tadvat, CuklaM kRSNaM yaH paCyati, asacca yadvastu tatsat yaH paCyati sa naCyati|netreSu rogo netrarogaH sa vidyate yasya naiva so~anetrarogI, timirAdikamantareNa bahurUpaM candraM paCyati-bahUn CaCAGkAnAlokayata ityarthaH|  yo vA alAJchanaM-akalaGkaM, candraM paCyati sa naCyati|  eSu ca ghanIbhUtamityAdiSu viCiSTeSu vastuviparyAsadarCanamAtralakSaNasyaikasminnevodAharaNatvena riSTe darCayituM yukte yadanekariSTapradarCanaM tatprapaJcArthaM vedyam|   AsannamaraNo naro jAgradeva yathAsvarUpANi rakSaHpiCAcAdIni yaH paCyati, na viparyayavasturUpANi|  yatastadAnIM taireva sa upAsyate|  tathA ca vakSyati (Clo.130)-""yamadUtapiCAcAdyairyatparAsurupAsyate|"" iti|  rakSAMsIti bahuvacananirdeCo bahurAkSasadarCane sutarAmasya riSTasya paripUrNatvamiti dyotayitum|   ekasminnapi hi rAkSase dRSTe riSTaM bhavatyeva|  jAtau vA bahuvacanam|   anyAMCca tadvidhAn-rAkSasAdiprakArAn, yaH paCyati|  tathA, vikRtA-draSTuM duHCakyA, AkRtiryasya-rUpasya, tadrUpaM vyAkRti, rakSaHpiCAcAdivyatiriktaM tattat-anekaM, yaH paCyati sa naCyati|

 yo naro~arundhatIM saptarSINAM samIpasthAM na paCyati, sa tAM samAM na paCyati-sa tasya saMvatsarasyAntare mriyata ityarthaH|  saptarSINAM samIpasthAmityarundhatyA viCeSaNaM saptarSisamIpe~arundhatyAH sthitirbhavatIti vedayati|  tathA cAnyaiH sAmAnyenaivoktam|  yathA ""arundhatIM dhruvaM caiva somacchAyAM mahApatham|  yo na paCyenna paCyetsa naraH saMvatsarAtparam||"" iti|  tathA, yo dhruvaM na paCyati, tathA AkACagaGgAM yo na paCyati, sa tAM samAM na paCyati|  "

meghatoyaughanirghoSavINApaNavaveNujAn||34|| CRNotyanyAMCca yaH CabdAnasato na sato~api vA||34|| niSpIDya karNau CRNuyAnna yo dhukadhukAsvanam||35|| tadvadgandharasasparCAn manyate yo viparyayAt||35|| sarvaCo vA na yo, yaCca dIpagandhaM na jighrati||36|| vidhinA yasya doSAya svAsthyAyAvidhinA rasAH||36|| yaH pAMsuneva kIrNAGgo yo~aGge ghAtaM na vetti vA||37|| antareNa tapastIvraM yogaM vA vidhipUrvakam||37|| jAnAtyatIndriyaM yaCca teSAM maraNamAdiCet||38||

meghAdijAn veNuparyantAn CabdAMstathA~anyAMCca CabdAMstathA rUpAnmahato yaH puruSo~asataH-parairanupalabhyamAnAn, CRNoti, tathA meghAdijAMstathA~anyAMCca yaH CabdAn sato-vidyamAnAn, na CRNoti, teSAM maraNamAdiCediti vakSyamANasya vacanavipariNAmenAtra sambandhaH kAryaH|   yo dhukadhukACabdaM karNAvaGgulIbhirniSpIDya na CRNuyAt|  tairmeghAdijaiH CabdaistulyaM-tadvat|  yathA-meghAdijAn CabdAn yo~asataH CRNoti sataCca na CRNoti, tadvadyo gandharasasparCAn viparyayAt-vaiparItyena manyate, na yathAvastu jAnAti|  tatra gandhaviparyayo yathA-sugandhi durgandhaM manyate|  rasaviparyayo yathA-madhuramamlamamlaM madhuramityAdi|  sparCaviparyayo yathA mRdusparCaM kharasparCaM manyate|  sarvasarvikayA gandhAdIn vA yo~api na manyate, so~api naCyati|  tatkAlanirvANasya dIpasya yo gandhaM na jighrati-ghrANendriyeNa nAnubhavati|  vidhinA-CAstraprayuktena, prayuktA rasA yasya doSAya-rogAya, avidhinA-CAstravidhivyatikrameNa, prayuktAH svAsthyAya syuH|  tathA, yaH pAMsunA-rajaseva, kIrNAGgo-dhUlidhUsaritaCarIraH|  yaCcAGge ghAtaM-hatiM, na vetti|  tapastIvramantareNa-ugraM tapo vinA, yaH puruSo~atIndriyaM-indriyebhyo~atikrAntaM vetti, indriyANAmagocaraM svargAdi vetti,  tathA yogaM vA vidhipUrvakamantareNa yo~atIndriyaM jAnAti|  teSAM-pUrvoktAnAM sarveSAM, maraNamAdiCet|  yogaH-cittavRttinirodhaH, vidhipUrvako yathACAstraM samyagupadeCaH|  tathA, anyo~api yogo-rasAyanAdiH|  yujyata iti yogo-vidhiviCeSaH|  CAstroddiSTarasAyanAJjanAdinA~api hyatIndriyaM dRCyate dUravyavahitAdi|

hIno dInaH svaro~avyakto yasya syAdgadgado~api vA||38|| sahasA yo vimuhyedvA vivakSurna sa jIvati||39||

yasya puruSasya svaraH-Cabdo, nimittamantareNa hino~athavA dIno-dainyayukto, bhavati|  avyaktaH-asphuTo, yasya syAt|  gadgado-ghargharo, vA yasya bhavati|  yo vA vivakSuH-vaktumicchan, kAraNamantareNa vimuhyet-vaktuM na Caknoti, sa na jIvati|

svarasya durbalIbhAvaM hAniM ca balavarNayoH||39|| rogavRddhimayuktyA ca dRSTvA maraNamAdiCet||40||

svarasya-Cabdasya, daurbalyaM dRSTvA balavarNayoCca hAnimayuktyA dRSTvA maraNamAdiCet|  caCabdaH samuccaye|  rogavRddhimayuktyA ca dRSTvA narasya maraNamAdiCet|  ayuktyA-nirnimittamevetyarthaH|

apasvaraM bhASamANaM prAptaM maraNamAtmanaH||40|| CrotAraM cAsya Cabdasya dUrataH parivarjayet||41||

svabhAvasvarAdapagataM bhraSTaM-apasvaraM,-hInasvaraM kRtvA, yo naro~ahaM mariSyAmi mariSyAmItyevamAtmano maraNaM bhASate parasya, taM tathAbhUtaM dUrAdeva varjayet-vaidyo na cikitset| tathA, asya Cabdasya-ahaM mariSyAmItyevaMbhUtasya yo naraH CrotA, tamapi vaidyo dUrato varjayet|

saMsthAnena pramANena varNena prabhayA~api vA||41|| chAyA vivartate yasya svapne~api preta eva saH||42||

saMsthAnaM-pratipuruSaM vilakSaNaM samaviSamaM rUpam, AkRtirityarthaH|  tatra yadi CarIrasya samaM saMsthAnaM bhavati, chAyA tvasya viSamA dRCyate, tadA riSTam|  tathA, yadi CarIrasya viSamaM saMsthAnaM chAyA tu samA bhavati, tadA riSTam|  tathA, yadi dIrghapramANasya sato hrasvA chAyA bhavati hrasvapramANasya vA dIrghA bhavati, tadapi riSTam|  evaM saMsthAnena pramANena ca chAyAvivRttirvedyA|  tathA, yasya nAbhasI chAyA AgneyyA chAyA yA varNato dRCyate sA varNavivRttiH|  evaM pRthivyAdimayISu chAyAsu varNavivRttiryojyA|  tathA, yasya yathAbhUtA prabhA sA~anyathAbhUtA bhavati sA prabhAvivRttiH|  evaM saMsthAnAdyanyatamena yasya chAyA vivartate-anyathAbhUtA~anyathA|  sampadyate, svapne~api sa pumAn preta eva, kiM punarjAgradavasthAyAM na pretaH ?  iti evakAreNa riSTasyAsyAvyabhicAritvaM sUcayati|  utpannaCcennarasya chAyAyA anyathAbhAvaH, tadAnIM puruSo yamasAtsampanno mantavya ityarthaH|

AtapAdarCatoyAdau yA saMsthAnapramANataH||42|| chAyA~aGgAtsambhavatyuktA praticchAyeti sA punaH||43|| varNaprabhACrayA yA tu sA chAyaiva CarIragA||43||

yA CarIrAdAtapAdarCatoyaghRtAdau CarIrasaMsthAnapramANAnurUpA sambhavati pratibimbakarUpA, sA praticchAyetyucyate|  tasyA hi na varNaprabhe ACrayaH|  yasyAH punarvarNaprabhe ACrayaCcchAyAyAH,  sA CarIragaiva-CarIrasthaiva, chAyA|  na praticchAyAvaccharIrAdanyatrAtapAdarCatoyAdau kutracidapayAti pratibimbakarUpatayA|

bhavedyasya praticchAyA chinnA bhinnA~adhikA~~AkulA||44|| viCirA dviCirA jihmA vikRtA yadi vA~anyathA||44|| taM samAptAyuSaM vidyAnna cellakSyanimittajA||45|| praticchAyAmayI yasya na cAkSNIkSyeta kanyakA||45||

yasya puMsaH praticchAyA chinnA-dvidhA, dRCyate|  athavA bhinnA - kiJcitsacchidreva yasya dRCyate|  tathA, yasyAdhikA dRCyate-na yathA pramANA|  yasya vA AkulA-calasvarUpA aniCcitapratibimbA, bhavati|  tathA, yasya viCirA-CirorahitA|  tathA, yasya dviCirA|   tathA, yasya jihmA-kuTilA|  vikRteti uktaprakArAdanyathA anyena prakAreNa, yasya vikRtA dRCyate AtApAdarCatoyAdau, taM pUrvoktaM ca sarvameva, samAptAyuSaM-kSINajIvitaM, vidyAt|  na cedityAdi|  lakSayituM pratyakSAdibhiH pramANaiH CakyaM-lakSyam|  CakyArthe kRtyaH|  lakSyaM ca tannimittaM ca, tasmAttathAvidhAnnimittAdvikRtAjjAtA [prati] cchAyA yadi na bhavati tadA riSTam, nAnyathA|  praticchAyAmayI kanyakA-pratibimbakumAriketi yA loke prasiddhA, sA~akSNi-netre, yasya nekSyeta-nopalabhyeta, taM samAptAyuSaM vidyAt|

vikRtivijJAnIyaH adhyAyaH

khAdInAM paJca paJcAnAM chAyA vividhalakSaNAH||46|| nAbhasI nirmalA~~AnIlA sasnehA saprabheva ca||46|| vAtAdrajo~aruNA CyAvA bhasmarUkSA hataprabhA||47|| viCuddharaktA tvAgneyI dIptAbhA darCanapriyA||47|| CuddhavaidUryavimalA susnigdhA toyajA sukhA||48|| sthirA snigdhA ghanA CuddhA CyAmA CvetA ca pArthivI||48||

"khAdInAM mahAbhUtAnAM paJcAnAM paJca chAyA bhavanti|  nanu, khAdInAM paJcatvAcchAyAnAM paJcatvamarthAllabdhameva|  tatkiM paJcagrahaNena ?  astvevaitat|  kintu yathA khAdibhyaH paJcabhyo dravyamekaM bhUtotkarSApakarSabhedAccAsaGkhyeyaM dravyam, tathA chAyAnAmapyekatvaM bhUtotkarSApakarSabhedAccAsaGkhyeyatvamACaGkyeta, tadACaGkAnivRttyarthaM paJcagrahaNam|  paJcaiva chAyA bhavanti, nonAdhikA iti|  kimbhUtACcchAyAH ?  vividhalakSaNAH,-vividhaM lakSaNaM vakSyamANaM yAsAM tA evam|  
 AkACajA chAyA nirmalA-CuddhA|  tathA, AnIlA-ISannIlA, ityAkArapraCleSo~atra vedyaH|  ""CuddhavaidUryavimalA"" hi ""toyajA"" (Clo.48) iti vakSyati|  tathA, kiJcitsnigdhA|  saprabhetyanena Cobhanatvamuktam|  etadeva sphuTayitumivaCabdaM tantrakRt prAyuGkta|  anyathA chAyAprabhayorbhinnaviSayatvAdanupapannametadvAkyaM syAt|  bhedaCcAnayoradhunaiva vakSyati (Clo.51)|vAtAdrajoruNAdiyuktA chAyA bhavati|  
 AgneyI viCuddharaktavarNA, dIptAbhA, tathA darCanaM priyaM yasyAH saivaMvidhA, bhavati|   toyajA chAyA nirmalavaidUryavimalA, suSThu snigdhA, sukhA-sukhAvahA|
 pArthivI chAyA sthirAdiguNayuktA|  nanu, ca, agnijalabhuvAM svayaM varNAdiyogAdAgneyyAdikAnAM tadvarNakatvamupapannam|  nabhomArutayostu svayaM varNAdyayogAtkathaM tacchAyAnAM varNAdiyogo yujyeta ?  iti kecit|  tAn brUmahe|  acintyatvAddhetuphalasyAdoSaH|  tathA hi,-madhurAdayo rasAH kAlAdamUrtAdbhavanto dRCyante yathA, tathA tacchAye apyete bhaviSyataH|  tatra yasya narasya karmAdisahAyaM nabhaCcchAyAmutpAdayati tasya nAbhasIti yujyata eva|  evaM vAyavyAmapi vAcyam|"

vAyavI rogamaraNakleCAyAnyAH sukhodayAH||49||

vAyavI chAyA rogAdyarthaM jAyate|  anyAH-CeSACcatasraH, chAyAH sukhodayAH-sukhAvahAH|

prabhoktA taijasI sarvA, sA tu saptavidhA smRtA||49|| raktA pItA sitA CyAvA haritA pANDurA~asitA||50||

Asanne lakSyate chAyA vikRSTe bhA prakACate||52|| nAcchAyo nAprabhaH kaCcidviCeSACcihnayanti tu||52|| nRNAM CubhACubhotpattiM kAle chAyAsamACrayAH||53||

"nikaTe chAyA lakSyate|  prabhA punarvikRSTe-dUrapradeCe, prakACate-dUrAdavabhAsata ityarthaH|  yathA-pASANAdiparipUrNAnAmapi parvatAdipradeCAnAM dUrAdvilakSaNaiva kAntiH prakACate|  
evaM chAyAprabhayoranyatvaM pradarCya tayoreva vyApti pradarCayati-
kaCcidapi puruSaCcchAyArahitaH prabhAhInaCca nAsti|  viCeSAstu nRNAM CubhACubhotpattiM kAle viCiSTe cihnayanti-vyaJjayantItyarthaH|  kimbhUtA viCeSAH ?  chAyAsamACrayAH-chAyACritAH|"

nikaSanniva yaH pAdau cyutAMsaH parisarpati||53|| hIyate balataH CaCvadyo~annamaCnan hitaM bahu||54|| yo~alpACI bahuviNmUtro bahvACI cAlpamUtraviT||54|| yo vA~alpACI kaphenArto dIrghaM Cvasiti ceSTate||55|| dIrghamucchvasya yo hrasvaM niHCvasya paritAmyati||55|| hrasvaM ca yaH praCvasiti vyAviddhaM spandate bhRCam||56||   Ciro vikSipate kRcchrAdyo~aJcayitvA prapANikau||56|| yo lalATAtsrutasvedaH ClathasandhAnabandhanaH||57|| utthApyamAnaH sammuhyedyo balI durbalo~api vA||57|| uttAna eva svapiti yaH pAdau vikaroti ca||58|| CayanAsanakuDyAderyo~asadeva jighRkSati||58|| ahAsyahAsI sammuhyan yo leDhi daCanacchadau||59|| uttarauSThaM parilihan phUtkArAMCca karoti yaH||59|| yamabhidravati cchAyA kRSNA pItA~aruNA~api vA||60|| bhiSagbheSajapAnAnnagurumitradviSaCca ye||60|| vaCagAH sarva evaite vijJeyAH samavartinaH||61||

nikaSan-gharSayanniva, yaH pAdau cyutAMsaH-srastAMsaH san, bhUmau parisarpati|  tathA, ye vakSyamANACca te sarve samavartino vaCagA iti yojyam; antadIpakAlaGkAratvAdasya|  tathA yo~annamaCnan- bhaktaM bhakSayan, balAnnityaM hIyate |kimbhUtamannam? hitaM-pathyam| bahu- bhUri| yo~alpACI bahuviNmUtro yaCca bahvaCI-bahvaCnAti, nityamalpaviNmUtraCca|yaCcA(yo vA~)lpACI kaphenArtaH-pIDIto, dIrghaM Cvasiti_ bahuCvAsaM muJcati| tathA, ceSTate-pariluThati| tathA, yo dIrghamucchvasya - bahUrddhvaM CvAsaM muktvA, anantaraM hrasvaM niHCvasya - alpaM CvAsaM pratyAvRtyAntaH kRtvA, paritAmyati- duHkhAyate| yaCca hrasvaM praCvasiti| vyAviddhaM- viSamaM kRtvA, nADIbhiH spandate bhRCaM - atiCayena sphurati| yaH prapANIkau- pANyoH paCcAdbhAgasthitAvavayavaviCeSau, aJcayitvA- saGkocya, kRcchreNa Ciro_ mUrdhAnaM, vikSipate| yo lalATAt - alikAt, srutasvedaH san Cithilasandhibandho bhavati | ya utthApyamAno balI durbalo vA sammuhyet - mohamupaiti| ya uttAna eva - jAtucitpArCve na svapiti| yaCca pAdau vikaroti- vikRtiM nayati| yaH CayanAderasat- avidyamAnameva vastu, grahItumicchati| yaH ahAsye- hAsyaviSayAbhAve~api,abhIkSNaM hasan sammuhyaN daCanacchadau leDhi- jihvayA parimRCati| yaCcottarauSThaM parilihan phUtkArAn- nAnAvidhAn CabdAn, karoti| yaM -naraM,chAyA~abhidravati-abhibhavati| kIdRCI?kRSNA pItA~aruNA~api vA | ye ca bhiSagAdidviSaH| ete sarve samavartino vaCagA vijJeyAH| samaM vartate rAgadveSau hitvA samavartI,- yamaH| sarva evatyetat"nikaSanniva yaH pAdau" ityata Arabhya yAvat"bhiSagbheSajapAnAnnagurumitradviSaCca ye|"ityetatparyantasya granthasya sambandhArtham|

(grIvAlalATahRdayaM yasya svidyati CItalam||61|| uSNo~aparaH pradeCaCca CaraNaM tasya devatAH)1||61|| [pUrvarUpANi sarvANi jvarAdiSvatimAtraya1||61|| yaM viCaMti viCatyenaM mRtyurjvarapuraHsaraH1||61||

(yasya grIvAdikaM CItalaM sat svidyati-svedayuktaM bhavati, aparaH pradeCaCcoSNaH, tasya CaraNaM-rakSaNaM, devatA nAnyat|)

yo~aNujyotiranekAgro duHcchAyo durmanAH sadA||62|| baliM balibhRto yasya praNItaM nopabhuJjate||63|| nirnimittaM ca yo medhAM CobhAmupacayaM Criyam||63|| prApnotyato vA vibhraMCaM sa prApnoti yamakSayam||64||

yaH pumAnaNujyotiH-stokadRk, kecittvalpatejA ityAhuH|  tathA, anekAgro-vyAkulacetAH|  duHcchAyo-vivarNacchAyo ninditakAntirvA|  durmanAH sadA-satatameva CokAkrAntamAnasaH|   tathA, yasya puMso baliM praNItaM-tannAmoddiCya pradattaM, balibhRto-balibhujo vAyasAdayo, nopabhuJjate-na khAdanti, sa yamakSayaM prApnotIti sambandhaH|  balibhRta ityatiCayArtham|  kila kAkA api nAdanti kiM punaranye ?  ityarthaH|  tathA, yo naro nirnimittaM medhAdijananarasAyanAdikAraNamantareNa medhAdIn prApnoti|  ato vA-medhAdibhyo, bhraMCaM prApnoti|  so~antakagRhaM prApnoti|  CrIratra dhanaM rAjyaM vA|  upacayaH-CarIrapuSTiH|

guNadoSamayI yasya svasthasya vyAdhitasya vA||64|| yAtyanyathAtvaM prakRtiH SaNmAsAnna sa jIvati||65||

yasya narasya guNamayI-satvAdimayI, prakRtirdoSamayI-vAtAdimayI, svasthasyAturasya vA~anyathAtvaM yAti-svabhAvaM hitvA, sa SaNmAsAnna jIvati|

bhaktiH CIlaM smRtistyAgo buddhirbalamahetukam||65|| SaDetAni nivartante SaDbhirmAsairmariSyataH||66||

jvaro balavAnityAdilakSaNaH kSINAdilakSaNaM puruSaM hanti|  balavAn-hetvAdibhirbalavadbhiryutaH|  gambhIraH-aCeSadhAtvantargataH|  dairgharAtriko-dIrghakAlAnubandhI, anye tu rAtrijAgarakArItyAhuH|  dIrghA hi jAgrato rAtriH|  tathA coktam-"dIrghaCrAntasya yojanam|" iti|  tathA, pralApAdiyuktaH|  kIdRCamAturam ?  kSINaM-dhAtukSayayuktam|  tathA, akSAmaM-sabalam, glAno na bhavatyatha ca saktavacanaH, tamakSAmaM saktavacanam|   tathA, raktanetraM hRdayaCUlAnvitam hantIti yojyam|   yaCca jvaraH saCuSkakAsaH pUrvAhNe~athavA~aparAhNe bhavetsa dvividho~api hanti|   tathA yaH CleSmakAsasamanvito jvaro balamAMsavihInasya puMsaH syAt, sa taM nihanti|  iti riSTatrayametat|  nanu ca, "hetubhirbalibhiryukto bahubhirbahulakSaNaH|  jvaraH prANAntakRdyaCca CIghramindriyanACanaH||" (ca. ci. a. 3/49) ityeSa jvarasya riSTaprakAraH kasmAnnoktaH ?  ucyate|  uktaprAya evAyaM balavAniti vacanAt|

raktapittaM bhRCaM raktaM kRSNamindradhanuSprabham||74|| tAmrahAridraharitaM rUpaM raktaM pradarCayet||74|| romakUpapravisRtaM kaNThAsyahRdaye sajat||75|| vAsaso~araJjanaM pUti vegavaccAti bhUri ca||75|| vRddhaM pANDujvaraccardikAsaCophAtisAriNam||76||

raktapittamIdRgrUpaM kartRbhUtaM naraM hanti|  kIdRk ?  bhRCaM-atyarthaM, raktaM-lohitam|  tathA, atikRSNam|  bhRCaCabdo hi dvayorapi yujyate|  tathA, indradhanuSprabhaM-nAnAvarNamityarthaH|  kiledRCe raktapitte rasamedomajjAdimiCrasya raktasya sravaNAnnAnAvarNatvaM sampadyate|  yacca raktapittaM kartRbhUtaM tAmrahAridraharitaM raktaM ca rUpaM dRCyamAkACaM vA pradarCayet, tannihanti|  yacca raktapittaM vinA~api varNai romakUpebhyaH samastebhyaH prakarSeNa visRtaM-yAtaM pravRttam, tacca nihanti|  tathA, kaNThe mukhe hRdaye ca tulyakAlaM sajat-saMCliSyat sAnuSaGgam, tacca hanti|  vAsaso~araJjanamiti vAsasaH araJjanamityakArapraCleSo~atra bodhyaH|  vastrasya hi jIvaCoNitaM  CuddhaCoNitarUpatvAnna raJjakam|   atastena raktaM vastraM samanantaraM prakSAlitaM CuddhaM sampadyate, na rAgayuktam|  tathA hyasmin vyAdhau raktapittAbhyAM parasparamavibhAgApannatvAdvastrasya raJjanaM prAptam|  raktena hi pittasahitena vastraM rajyate, na ca taddhautaM CuddhaM sampadyate|  tathA coktam (hR. ka. a. 3/34)- "CuklaM vA bhAvitaM vastramAvAnaM koSNavAriNA|  prakSAlitaM vivarNaM syAtpitte, CuddhaM tu CoNite||" iti|  tathA, pUti-durgandhi, taddhi dhAtUnupakledayati, upaklinnAnAM dhAtUnAmatyarthaM duSTatA, iti nihantyeva| tathA, [ati] vegavat-vegena nirgatya ruddhaM punarvegena pravartata iti|  tathA, bhUri-prabhUtam|  evaMvidhaM ca raktapittaM nihanti|  vRddhaM-udriktaM raktapittaM sat, pANDvAdiyutaM naraM hanti|

jvarAtisArau CophAnte CvayathurvA tayoH kSaye||94|| durbalasya viCeSeNa jAyante~antAya dehinaH||94|| Cvayathuryasya pAdasthaH parisraste ca piNDike||95||   sIdataH sakthinI caiva taM bhiSak parivarjayet||95||  AnanaM hastapAdaM ca viCeSAdyasya CuSyataH||96||   CUyete vA vinA dehAtsa mAsAdyAti paJcatAm||96||

"jvarAtisArau svatantrasya CophasyAnte- avasAne, jAyete| athavA CvayathustayoH-  jvarAtisArayoH , kSaye jAyate| evaM jvarAtisAraCophA yasya CarIriNo jAyante tasya te~antAya- mRtyave, jAyante| durbalasya viCeSeNantAya, CIghrakAritvAt|

vAtASThIlA~atyantaM pravRddhA hRdi tiSThantI dAruNA- atirukkarI , tRSAyuktasya puMsaH CIghrameva jIvitahAriNI bhavati|

CaithilyaM piNDike vAyurnItvA nAsAM ca jihmatAm||104|| kSINasyAyamya manye vA sadyo muSNAti jIvitam||105||   nAbhIgudAntaraM gatvA vaGkSaNau vA samACrayan||105|| gRhItvA pAyuhRdaye kSINadehasya vA balI||106|| malAn bastiCiro nAbhiM vibaddhya janayan rujam||106|| kurvan vaGkSNayoH CUlaM tRSNAM bhinnapurISatAm||107|| CvAsaM vA janayan vAyurgRhItvA gudavaGkSaNam||107|| vitatya parCukAgrANi gRhItvoraCca mArutaH||108|| stimitasyAtatAkSasya sadyo muSNAti jIvitam||108||

"vAyuh piNDike CaithilyaM nItvA tathA nAsAM jihmatAM-  kuTilatAM nItvA tathA kSINasya narasya manye vA Ayamya AyAmayitvA drAg jIvitaM  muSNAti||vAyurnAbhIgudayoranantaraM-  madhyaM gatvA vaGkaSNau vA samACrayan jIvitaM  muSNAti|balI vA pavanaH pAyuM hRdayaM ca gRhItvA avaSTabhyaH , kSINadehasya puMsaH sadyo  muSNAti jIvitam| vAyurmalAn vibaddhya-  sanniruddhya , bastiCironAbhiM ca vibaddhya rujaM janayan sadyo muSNAti  jIvitam| 
vAyurvaGkSaNayoH CUlaM tathA tRSNAM kurvan  bhinnapurISatAM ca vidadhadathavA CvAsaM janayan gudaM vaGkSaNau ca gRhItvA sadyo muSNAti jIvitam|
mArutaH parCukAnAM-  pArCvAsthnAM , agrANi-  prAntAni , vitatya -prastArya , tathoraH-  vakSo , gRhItvA stimitasya-  ArdratAM gatasya sasvedasya niCcalasya vA , tathA AtatAkSasya-  prasAritanetrasya , sadyo muSNAti jIvitam|"

sahasA jvarasantApastRSNA mUrcchA balakSayaH||109|| viCleSaNaM ca sandhInAM mumUrSorupajAyate||109||

sahasA- jhaTityeva , jvarasantApaH , tathA tRSNA mUrcchA balakSayaH sandhiviCleSaCca , ityetanmumUrSoH-  sadyo mariSyato jAyate|

 gosarge vadanAdyasya svedaH pracyavate bhRCam||110|| lepajvaropataptasya durlabhaM tasya jIvitam||110||

gosarge-  gavAM mokSakAle pratyUSasi , lepajvareNa-  SleSmajvareNopataptasya yasya vadanAt svedaH pracyavate , tasya durlabhaM jIvitam| durlabhamiti '' ISadduHsuSu" ityAdinA khal| " na sudurbhyAM '' iti numniSedhaH| nanu ,riSTAnAM niScitAnAmihAbhidhAnaprastAvAt  kimidamaniCcitamuktaM durlabhamiti? maivam| ekAntika evArtho~ayaM hi durlabhaCabdaH| tathA ca vAlmIkinA jagade-  " putra vIkSasva  pitaraM suhRSTaM ca kuru priyaM| durlabhaM jIvitaM hyasya punaH putro bhaviSyati||" iti| tasmAddurlabhaCabdasya nAsti jIvitamityeSa niCcita evArthaH prasiddhaH|

pravAlagulikAbhAsA yasya gAtre masUrikAH||111|| utpadyACu vinaCyanti na cirAtsa vinaCyati||111||

masUrikAH-  masUrasaMsthAnAH piTikAH pravAlaguTikAsadRCA yasya CarIra utpadya CIghraM vinaCyanti , sa naro drAgeva vinaCyati|

 masUravidalaprakhyAstathA vidRmasannibhAH||112|| antarvaktrAH kiNAbhACca visphoTA dehanACanAH||112||

masUravidalAkArAH , tathA pravAlasadRCAH , tathA~antaH-  madhye , vaktraM-  mukhaM , yeSAM te , tathA kiNAbhAH , ete catuSprakArA api visphoTA dehasya nACanAH|

kAmalA~akSNormukhaM pUrNaM CaGkhayormuktamAMsatA||113|| santrAsaCcoSNatA~aGge ca yasya taM parivarjayet||113||

yasyAkSNoH kAmalA-  pItAbhAsatvaM bhavati , mukhaM pUrNaM-  svAbhAvikam, CaGkhayormuktamAMsatvam , santrAsaH , uSNatA cAGge bhavati , tamAturaM varjayet-  ayaCaH parihRtaye na cikitset|

akasmAdanudhAvacca vighRSTaM tvaksamACrayam||114||

akasmAt-  kAraNaM vinA , tvaksamACrayaM vighRSTaM yasyAnudhAvacca lakSyate tamapi vaidyo varjayet|

(candanoCIramadirAkuNapadhvAGkSagandhayaH||114|| CaivAlakukkuTaCikhAkuGkumAlamaSIprabhAH||114||   ) yo vAtajo na CUlAya syAnna dAhAya pittajaH||114|| ) yo vAtajo na CUlAyasyAnna dAhAya pittajaH||115|| kaphajo na ca pUyAya marmajaCca ruje na yaH||115|| acUrNaCcUrNakIrNAbho yatrAkasmAcca dRCyate||115|| rUpaM CaktidhvajAdInAM sarvAMstAnvarjayedvraNAn||116||

yo vraNo vAtajo  liGgAnumitaH CUlAya na bhavati , pittajo na dAhAya , kaphajaCca na pUyAya , marmajaCca na pIDAyai| tathA ,yo vraNo~acUrNaCcUrNenAkIrNAbhaH - cUrNavyApta iva dRCyate| tathA yasmin vraNe kAraNaM vinA-  akasmAt , rUpaM CaktidhvajAdInAM dRCyate| AdiCabdena CalyatomarAdiparigraH| tAn sarvAn vraNAn varjayet|

viNmUtramArutavahaM kRmiNaM ca bhagandaram||116||

viNmUtramArutA yena niHsaranti kRmijuSTaCca yaH taM ca bhagandaraM varjayet| kRmiNamiti "pAmAditvAt"(`lomAdipAmAdipicchAdibhyaH CanelacaH|') napratyayaH|

ghaTTayan jAnunA jAnu pAdAvudyamya pAtayan||117|| yo~apAsyati muhurvaktramAturo na sa jIvati||117||

yaCcAturo jAnunA jAnu ghaTTayan tathA pAdAvudyamya-utkSipya, pAtayan-  saGkSipan , muhurmuhurAtmIyaM vaktraM- mukhaM, apAsyati-kAraNaM vinA~anyatra nayati, sa na jIvati|

dantaiCchindannakhAgrANi taiCca keCAMstRNAni ca||118|| bhUmiM kASThena vilikhan loSTaM loSTena tADayan||118|| hRSTaromA sAndramUtraH CuSkakAsI jvarI ca yaH||119|| muhurhasan muhuHkSveDan CayyAM pAdena hanti yaH||119|| muhuCchidrANi vimRCannAturo na sa jIvati||120||

yaCcAturo hRSTaromA sAndramUtraH tathA CuSkakAsI tathA jvarI , sa idamidaM kurvanna jIvati| kiM tat ? ityAha- dantaiCchindannakhAgrANi, tathA taireva- dantaiH , keCAMCchindan, tathA- tRNAni chindan , tathA bhuvaM kASThena vilikhan , loSTamaparaloSTena taDayan, muhuH punaH punarhasan ,tathA muhuH kSveDan-  CabdaM kurvan , muhuH CayyAM pAdena yo hanti , tathA chidrANi-  aparAdhAn vimRCan-  ghoSayan| kecidvyAcakSate,- chidrANi-nAsikAdIni, vimRCan- saMspRCan, iti|

mRtyave sahasA~~Artasya tilakavyaGgaviplavaH||120|| mukhe, dantanakhe puSpaM, jaThare vividhAH sirAH||121||

Artasya-Aturasya, sahasA jAto mukhe-vadane, tilakavyaGgaviplavo mRtyave-maraNAya|  tathA, dantACca nakhACca dantanakhaM, tasmin dantanakhe, sahasA puSpaM jAtamAturasya mRtyave|  tathA, jaThare sahasA vividhAH-nAnAvidhA varNena saMsthAnena ca, sirA jAtA Artasya mRtyave-maraNaM sUcayantItyarthaH|

UrdhvaCvAsaM gatoSmANaM CUlopahatavaGkSaNam||121|| Carma cAnadhigacchantaM buddhimAn parivarjayet||122||

UrdhvaCvAsAdimantamAturaM sumatirvarjayet-na cikitset|

vikArA yasya vardhante prakRtiH parihIyate||122|| sahasA sahasA tasya mRtyurharati jIvitam||123||

vikArAH-jvarAdayaH, yasyAturasyAkasmAdvardhante|  prakRtiH-svabhAvaH, parihIyate|  yathA, CUraH kAtaraH syAt, dAtA vA tRSNAvAn, ityAdi|  athavA, prakRtiH-vAtAdiH, tena vAtaprakRtiH pittaprakRtirbhavet, ityAdi|  tasya sahasA-CIghrameva, jIvitaM mRtyurharati|

yamuddiCyAturaM vaidyaH sampAdayitumauSadham||123|| yatamAno na Caknoti durlabhaM tasya jIvitam||124||

yamAturamuddiCya bhiSagyatamAna auSadhaM sampAdayituM na Caknoti, tasya durlabhaM jIvitam|

vijJAtaM bahuCaH siddhaM vidhivaccAvacAritam||124|| na sidhyatyauSadhaM yasya nAsti tasya cikitsitam||125||

yasyAturasyauSadhaM vijJAtaM bahuCaH siddhaM vidhAnena copayuktaM na sidhyati, tasya cikitsitaM nAsti|

bhavedyasyauSadhe~anne vA kalpyamAne viparyayaH||125|| akasmAdvarNagandhAdeH svastho~api na sa jIvati||126||

yasyauSadhe-kaSAyaghRtalehAdau,  tathA~anne-bhaktasUpAdike, vA kalpyamAne viparyayaH-anyathAsampattirvarNagandharUpAdeH, akasmAt-nimittaM vinA~api bhavet, sa svastho~api na jIvati|

nivAte sendhanaM yasya jyotiCcApyupaCAmyati||126|| Aturasya gRhe yasya bhidyante vA patanti vA||127|| atimAtramamatrANi durlabhaM tasya jIvitam||127||

yasya cAturasya gRhe nivAta indhanasahitaM jyotiH-agnyAdirUpaM CAmyati, tasya durlabhaM jIvitam| yasya cAturasya gRhe~amatrANi-bhAjanAni, atimAtraM-atyantaM bhidyante, athavA patanti, tasya durlabhaM jIvitam|

CArIrasthAnam

dUtAdivijJAnIyaH adhyAyaH

athAto dUtAdivijJAnIyaM CArIraM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2|| iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

dUtaH-strIpuruSAdirya AtureNa preSyate sa kathyate|  dUta AdiryeSAM te dUtAdayaH|  AdigrahaNAdvaidyasya gRhAnnirgacchataH pathi gacchato yAvadAturagRhe praveCaH, praviSTasyApi yAni CubhACubhasUcakAni nimittAni dRCyante CrUyante ca, teSAM parigrahaH|  dUtAdInAM vijJAnaM dUtAdivijJAnam|  yathaite dUtAdayaH CubhA ete~aCubhA iti viCiSTaM-niCcitaM, jJAnaM-avabodhaH, pariccheda ityarthaH|  tasmai hito dUtAdivijJAnIyaH|  CeSaM pUrvavadvyAkhyeyam|

pAkhaNDACramavarNAnAM savarNAH karmasiddhaye||1|| ta eva viparItAH syurdUtAH karmavipattaye||1||

pAkhaNDaH-SaNNavatibhedabhinno vrAtyaviCeSaH|  ACramAH-brahmacArigRhasthabhikSuvaikhAnasabhedena catvAraH|  varNAH-brAhmaNakSatriyaviTCUdrACcatvAraH|  te ca pratilomAnulomato bahavaH|  teSAM pAkhaNDAdInAM ye savarNAH-samAnavarNAstulyajAtayo, dUtAste ca karmasiddhaye-karmasiddhyarthaM bhavanti, karmasiddhiM sUcayantItyarthaH yathA-pAkhaNDasya pAkhaNDo dUtaH, brahmacAriNo brahmacArI, gRhasthasya gRhastho, vAnaprasthasya vAnaprastho, bhikSorbhikSuH yAvacchUdrasya CUdraH Cubha iti|  ta eva-pAkhaNDAdayo, viparItAH-vijAtIyAH savarNA ye na bhavanti te, karmavipattaye-cikitsAnaiSphalyAya bhavanti, cikitsAnaiSphalyaM sUcayantItyarthaH|

dInaM bhItaM drutaM trastaM rUkSAmaGgalavAdinam||2|| CastriNaM daNDinaM SaNDhaM muNDaCmaCrujaTAdharam||2|| amaGgalAhvayaM krUrakarmANaM malinaM striyam||3|| anekaM vyAdhitaM vyaGgaM raktamAlyAnulepanam||3|| tailapaGkAGkitaM jIrNavivarNArdraikavAsasam||4|| kharoSTramahiSArUDhaM kASThaloSTAdimardinam||4|| nAnugaccedbhiSagdUtamAhvayantaM ca dUrataH||5||

savarNamapi dUtaM dInabhItAdiviCeSaNaviCiSTaM yAvatkASThaloSTAdimardinaM bhiSag dRSTvA nAnugaccheccikitsAnaiSphalyAditi|  rUkSavAdinaM-paruSabhASiNam|  amaGgalavAdinaM-mariSyatyasau patiSyati na jIvatItyAdyamaGgalavAdI, tam|  tathA, SaNDhaM-napuMsakam| tathA, muNDaM-kRtavapanaM, CmaCru-mukhavyaJjanaM, yasya sa evam|  muNDaCmaCruCcAsau jaTAdharaCca tam|  tathA, amaGgalaH-akalyANaH, Ahvayo-nAma, yasya tam|  vyaGgaM-hInAGgam|  tailapaGkAbhyAmaGkitaM-digdham|  tathA, jIrNAdikaM vAso yasya tam|  tathA, dUrAdAhvayantaM-AkArayantaM, nAnuyAyAt|

aCastacintAvacane nagne chindati bhindati||5|| juhvAne pAvakaM piNDAn pitRbhyo nirvapatyapi||6|| supte muktakace~abhyakte rudatyaprayate tathA||6|| vaidye dUtA manuSyANAmAgacchanti mumUrSatAm||7||

cintA ca vacanaM ca cintAvacane, aCaste cintAvacane yasyeti matvarthe bahuvrIhiH|  vaidye~aCastacintAM kurvati, aCasta vacanaM coccArayati|  manuSyANAM mumUrSatAM-AsannamRtyUnAM, sambandhino dUtA AyAnti|  mumUrSatAmiti  "ACaGkAyAmupasaGkhyAnam (yAM san vaktavyaH) " iti san|  "mriyaterluGhliGoCca" iti niyamAdAtmanepadAbhAvaH|  tathA ca kimbhUte ?   nagne-vivastre, chindati bhindati kiJcit|  tathA, pAvakaM-agniM juhvAne, pitRbhyaCca piNDAn nirvapati-anuprayacchati, yAvadaprayate - aCucau|  manuSyANAmityupalakSaNam, stryAdayo~apIha gRhyanta eva|

vikArasAmAnyaguNe deCe kAle~athavA bhiSak||7|| dUtamabhyAgataM dRSTvA nAturaM tamupAcaret||8||

vikAreNa-jvarAdinA, sAmAnyaH-tulyo, guNo yasyAsau vikArasAmAnyaguNaH, tasmiMstathAvidhe, deCe kAle vA dUtamabhyAgataM-sammukhamAgacchantaM, dRSTvA bhiSaktamAturaM-dUtasya preSakaM, nopacaret|  yathA,-kaphaje jvarAdAvAmaye ghRtodakAdidravasamIpe deCe~anUpe vA kAle vA pratyuSasyAgato dUto~aCubhaH|  pittAmaye vahnyAdinA santapte deCe kAle madhyAhne dUto~aCubhaH|  vAtaroge paruSarUkSasikatApASANaCarkarAdiviCiSTe deCe kAle sAyAhne dUto~aCubhaH|  viparItastu CubhaH|  chardimehAtIsArAdiSu setubhaGgo~aCubhaH|  eSveva setubandhaH CubhaH|

spRCanto nAbhinAsAsyakeCaromanakhadvijAn||8|| guhyapRSThastanagrIvAjaTharAnAmikAGgulIH||9|| kArpAsabusasIsAsthikapAlamuCalopalam||9|| mArjanICUrpacailAntabhasmAGgAradaCAtuSAn||10|| rajjUpAnattulApACamanyadvA bhagnavicyutam||10|| tatpUrvadarCane dUtA vyAharanti mariSyatAm||11||

tadityanena vaidyaH parAmRCyate|  tasya pUrvadarCanaM-prathamadarCanaM, tasmin sati tatkAla eva, mariSyatAM-AsannamaraNAnAM, sambandhino dUtA nAbhyAdi spRCanto vyAharanti|  "lakSaNahetvoH kriyAyAH" iti hetAvatra CatRpratyayaH|  nAbhyAdisparCanaM hi mumUrSudUtavyAharaNasya hetuH|  mumUrSorvayaM dUtA iti pratipAdayantItyarthaH|   anAmikA~aGguliH-kanIyasInikaTasthitA|  daCA-vastravartiH|   upAnat-carmapAdukA|  tulA-mAnaviCeSaH|  na kevalaM nAbhyAdi spRCanto~aparamapi ca bhagnavicyutaM ca spRCanta iti yojyam|

tathA~ardharAtre madhyAhne sandhyayoH parvavAsare||11|| SaSThIcaturthInavamIrAhuketUdayAdiSu||12|| bharaNIkRttikA~~ACleSApUrvA~~ArdrApaitryanairRte||12||

nAbhyAdikamaspRCanto~apyardharAtrAdiSvAgacchanto mariSyatAM dUtA vyAharanti|  ardharAtra iti "ahaHsarvaikadeCa" ityatra cakArAdac samAsAntaH|  Agacchanta ityatrApi yojyam|  paitryanaiRta iti maghAmUlAkhye nakSatre|  AdiCabdenotpAtadarCanakRSNacaturdaCyAdayo gRhyante|  saGgrahe~apyuktam (Ca. a.12)- "madhyAhnobhayasandhyArdharAtracaturthISaSThInavamIparvadineSu grahoparAgotpAtadarCanabharaNIkRttikArdrA~~ACleSAmaghAmUlapUrvAsu cACubhaH|" iti|

yasmiMCca dUte bruvati vAkyamAturasaMCrayam||13|| paCyennimittamaCubhaM taM ca nAnuvrajedbhiSak||13||

yasmin dUte AturasaMCrayaM-AturapratibaddhaM, vAkyaM bruvati satyaCubhaM nimittaM bhiSak paCyet|  taM-dUtamAturacikitsArthamAgataM, nAnuvrajet| 

tadyathA vikalaH pretaH pretAlaGkAra eva vA||14|| chinnaM dagdhaM vinaSTaM vA tadvAdIni vacAMsi vA||14|| raso vA kaTukastIvro gandho vA kauNapo mahAn||15|| sparCo vA vipulaH krUro yadvA~anyadapi tAdRCam||15|| tatsarvamabhito vAkyaM vAkyakAle~athavA punaH||16|| dUtamabhyAgataM dRSTvA nAturaM tamupAcaret||16||

tadyathACabdo~aCubhanimittasaMdarCanasambandhArthaH|  vikalaH-aGgahInaH kANakuNThAdikaH|  preto-mRta eva|  pretAlaGkAro yo mRtasyAnulepanavastrAdinA~alaGkAro vidhIyate|  chinnaM-rajjvAdikam|  dagdhaM-vastrAdikam|  vinaSTaM vA-ghaTabhAjanAdikam|  tadvAdIni-chinnadagdhavinaSTavAcakAni, vacAMsi-vacanAni, CrotreNa CrUyante|  raso vA kaTukastIvra ityanena rasAdhAraM dravyamanAhArapratibaddhamupalakSayate|  raso hi rasanendriyagrAhya eva|  tasmAt kaTukarasAdhiSThitaM dravyaM maricAdi kaTukarasaCabdeneha gRhyate|  loke~api rasena dravyaM vyapadiCyata eva|  yathA-idaM madhuraM dravyamidamamlamiti|  tadevamutkaTakaTukarasAdhiSThitaM dravyaM yadA cakSuSA gRhyate vaidyena, tadA na Cubham|  tIvragrahaNAdatIvrasya kuTherakAdernirAsaH|   gandhaCca kauNapo-mahAn durgandho~atiCayena, tatkAla eva ghrANendriyeNa gRhyate, sparCo vA vistIrNaH krUraH-atiduHsahaH, tatkAla evAgnyAdisambandhI sparCanendriyeNa gRhyate, so~aCubhaH|  yadveti|  athavA~aparamapi yattAdRCaM -vikalAdyaCubhanimittasadRCamanirdiSTamapi raktakaravIrakusumAdikaM, tatsarvaM vAkyamabhitaH-AturACrayAdvAkyAdagre, athavA vAkyakAle-AturACrayavAkyamadhye vikalAdyaCubhanimittaM tadAnImapyaCubhasUcakatvAt tasmin kAle, dUtamabhyAgataM-Abhimukhyena tatkAlamevAgataM, dRSTvA yenAsau preSito dUtastamAturaM nopAcaret|

hAhAkranditamutkruSTamAkruSTaM skhalanaM kSutam||17|| vastrAtapatrapAdatravyasanaM vyasanIkSaNam||17|| caityadhvajAnAM pAtrANAM pUrNAnAM ca nimajjanam||18|| hatAniSTapravAdACca dUSaNaM bhasmapAMsubhiH||18|| pathaHcchedo~ahimArjAragodhAsaraThavAnaraiH||19|| dIptAM prati diCaM vAcaH krUrANAM mRgapakSiNAm||19|| kRSNadhAnyaguDodaCvillavaNAsavacarmaNAm||20|| sarSapANAM vasAtailatRNapaGkendhanasya ca||20|| klIbakrUraCvapAkAnAM jAlavAgurayorapi||21|| charditasya purISasya pUtidurdarCanasya ca||21|| niHsArasya vyavAyasya kArpAsAderarerapi||22|| CayanAsanayAnAnAmuttAnAnAM tu darCanam||22|| nyubjAnAmitareSAM ca pAtrAdInAmaCobhanam||23||

 hAhAkranditamityAdikamaCobhanamiti vakSyamANena sambandhaH|   hAheti kranditaM-ruditaM kvaNanaM hAhAkranditam|  tathA, utkruSTaM uccaiH kRtvA kruSTaM, AkruSTaM-AkroCaH|  skhalanaM-patanaM, vaidyasyA~anyasya vA|  kSutaM-cikkA|  vastrAdInAM-vaidyasya sambandhinAM, vyasanaM-vinACaH|  vyasaninAM-ApadgatAnAM, IkSNaM-AlokanaM,  na Cobhanamiti sarvatra yojyam|  
 caityAdInAM nimajjanaM-patanaM bruDanaM ca|  tathA, hata ityevaMrupANAmaniSTAnAM-amaGgalAnAM, pravAdAH-uccairuccaritAni vAkyAni|  dUSaNaM bhasmapAMsubhiH-vaidyasyaiva pathi gaccato bhasmanA pAMsunA va vikiraNamaCobhanam, karmasiddhyabhAvAdAturasyApi maraNasUcakatvAt|  evamanyatrApyubhayoraCobhanatvaM yojyam|  pathaHccheda iti mArgasya chedaH|  kaiH ?  sarpamArjArAdibhiH|  saraThaH-sarpasadRCI raktavarNAdimukhI prANijAtiCcakralaNDa ityaparaparyAyaH|
 yasyAM diCi sUryaH sthitaH sA dIptA bhaNyate|  tathA coktam ""aGgAriNyarkanirmuktA, dIptA tasyAM divAkaraH|  pradhUmitaiSyarsUryA vai, CAntAH paJcetarA diCaH||"" iti|  dIptAM diCaM prati yA vAco-vANyaH, krUrANAM-kravyabhujAM, mRgANAM-dvIpiCRgAlAdInAM, pakSiNAM-gRdhraCyenAdInAM, tA aCobhanA iti liGgavipariNAmena sambandhaH|  
 kRSNadhAnyAdInAM yaddarCanaM vaidyasya pathi gacchata AturagRhe praviCato vA tadaCobhanam, aCubhasUcakatvAt|  udaCvit-takram|   sarSapo-raktAbhAsaH|   krUro-niSThuravAdI|  CvapAkaH-cANDAlaH|   jAlaM-AnAyaH|  vAgurA-mRgabandhanI|  pUtiH-durgandhiH|  durdarCanaH-karAlAkRtiH|  niHsArasya-vyapetasArasya vastunaH|   vyavAyasya-maithunasya|  kArpAsAderityAdiCabdena kArpAsabusasIsAderdUtacintAnirdiSTasya (Clo. 9) grahaNam|  kArpAsAdeH padArthasya darCanaM pathi gacchata AturagRhaM praviCato vA~aCobhanam|  arerdarCanamaCobhanam|  prakRtatvAdvaidyasyAtmaCatrudarCanam|   tathA, CayanAdInAmuttAnAnAM-UrdhvamukhasthitapAdAnAM darCanam, tathetareSAM-pAtrAdInAM ghaTaCarAvodaJcanAdInAmadhomukhAnAM, darCanamaCobhanam|

tadityanena vaidyaH parAmRCyate|  tasya pUrvadarCanaM-prathamadarCanaM, tasmin sati tatkAla eva, mariSyatAM-AsannamaraNAnAM, sambandhino dUtA nAbhyAdi spRCanto vyAharanti|  "lakSaNahetvoH kriyAyAH" iti hetAvatra CatRpratyayaH|  nAbhyAdisparCanaM hi mumUrSudUtavyAharaNasya hetuH|  mumUrSorvayaM dUtA iti pratipAdayantItyarthaH|   anAmikA~aGguliH-kanIyasInikaTasthitA|  daCA-vastravartiH|   upAnat-carmapAdukA|  tulA-mAnaviCeSaH|  na kevalaM nAbhyAdi spRCanto~aparamapi ca bhagnavicyutaM ca spRCanta iti yojyam|

hAhAkranditamutkruSTamAkruSTaM skhalanaM kSutam||17|| vastrAtapatrapAdatravyasanaM vyasanIkSaNam||17|| caityadhvajAnAM pAtrANAM pUrNAnAM ca nimajjanam||18|| hatAniSTapravAdACca dUSaNaM bhasmapAMsubhiH||18|| pathaHcchedo~ahimArjAragodhAsaraThavAnaraiH||19|| dIptAM prati diCaM vAcaH krUrANAM mRgapakSiNAm||19|| kRSNadhAnyaguDodaCvillavaNAsavacarmaNAm||20|| sarSapANAM vasAtailatRNapaGkendhanasya ca||20|| klIbakrUraCvapAkAnAM jAlavAgurayorapi||21|| charditasya purISasya pUtidurdarCanasya ca||21|| niHsArasya vyavAyasya kArpAsAderarerapi||22|| CayanAsanayAnAnAmuttAnAnAM tu darCanam||22|| nyubjAnAmitareSAM ca pAtrAdInAmaCobhanam||23||

 hAhAkranditamityAdikamaCobhanamiti vakSyamANena sambandhaH|   hAheti kranditaM-ruditaM kvaNanaM hAhAkranditam|  tathA, utkruSTaM uccaiH kRtvA kruSTaM, AkruSTaM-AkroCaH|  skhalanaM-patanaM, vaidyasyA~anyasya vA|  kSutaM-cikkA|  vastrAdInAM-vaidyasya sambandhinAM, vyasanaM-vinACaH|  vyasaninAM-ApadgatAnAM, IkSNaM-AlokanaM,  na Cobhanamiti sarvatra yojyam|  
 caityAdInAM nimajjanaM-patanaM bruDanaM ca|  tathA, hata ityevaMrupANAmaniSTAnAM-amaGgalAnAM, pravAdAH-uccairuccaritAni vAkyAni|  dUSaNaM bhasmapAMsubhiH-vaidyasyaiva pathi gaccato bhasmanA pAMsunA va vikiraNamaCobhanam, karmasiddhyabhAvAdAturasyApi maraNasUcakatvAt|  evamanyatrApyubhayoraCobhanatvaM yojyam|  pathaHccheda iti mArgasya chedaH|  kaiH ?  sarpamArjArAdibhiH|  saraThaH-sarpasadRCI raktavarNAdimukhI prANijAtiCcakralaNDa ityaparaparyAyaH|
 yasyAM diCi sUryaH sthitaH sA dIptA bhaNyate|  tathA coktam ""aGgAriNyarkanirmuktA, dIptA tasyAM divAkaraH|  pradhUmitaiSyarsUryA vai, CAntAH paJcetarA diCaH||"" iti|  dIptAM diCaM prati yA vAco-vANyaH, krUrANAM-kravyabhujAM, mRgANAM-dvIpiCRgAlAdInAM, pakSiNAM-gRdhraCyenAdInAM, tA aCobhanA iti liGgavipariNAmena sambandhaH|  
 kRSNadhAnyAdInAM yaddarCanaM vaidyasya pathi gacchata AturagRhe praviCato vA tadaCobhanam, aCubhasUcakatvAt|  udaCvit-takram|   sarSapo-raktAbhAsaH|   krUro-niSThuravAdI|  CvapAkaH-cANDAlaH|   jAlaM-AnAyaH|  vAgurA-mRgabandhanI|  pUtiH-durgandhiH|  durdarCanaH-karAlAkRtiH|  niHsArasya-vyapetasArasya vastunaH|   vyavAyasya-maithunasya|  kArpAsAderityAdiCabdena kArpAsabusasIsAderdUtacintAnirdiSTasya (Clo. 9) grahaNam|  kArpAsAdeH padArthasya darCanaM pathi gacchata AturagRhaM praviCato vA~aCobhanam|  arerdarCanamaCobhanam|  prakRtatvAdvaidyasyAtmaCatrudarCanam|   tathA, CayanAdInAmuttAnAnAM-UrdhvamukhasthitapAdAnAM darCanam, tathetareSAM-pAtrAdInAM ghaTaCarAvodaJcanAdInAmadhomukhAnAM, darCanamaCobhanam|
