-------------------------------------tAsu sAdhayet||29||   Adye dve, varjayedantye sarvaliGgAM ca veginIm||29||   sarvACca saJcitAmasya sthavirasya vyavAyinaH||30||   vyAdhibhiH kSINadehasya bhaktacchedakSatasya vA||30|| iti hidhmAnidAnam||30||

sa0-tAsu-paJcasu hidhmAsu madhye, Adye dve ye hidhme-bhaktodbhavAkSudrAkhye, te sAdhayet-cikitset, sAdhyatvAt| antye ye dve-mahAhidhmAgambhIrAkhye, te varjayet-nopakramet, asAdhyatvAt| Adau bhave Adye, evamantye, "digAditvAt (dibhyo yat" iti) yat| tathA veginIM ca-yamalAkhyAM, sarvaliGgAM yathoktalakSaNAM varjayet| na kevalametA eva varjayet, yAvatsarvA api hidhmA evaMbhUtasya puruSasya jAtA varjayet| kimbhUtasya ? sa0-anekaiH jvarAtIsArAdibhiH, parivRtaH| tathA, bahUnAM rogANAM-gulmAtIsArAdInAM, purogamaH-pradhAnaCca| yathA hi rAjA prAk paCcAt rathebhACvajanairanugamyate, tathA~ayaM rogo rogaiH| rAjayakSmetyAdayaCcatasraH saMjJAH|

nakSatrANAM dvijAnAM ca rAjJo~abhUdyadayaM purA||2||   yacca rAjA ca yakSmA ca rAjayakSmA tato mataH||2||   dehauSadhakSayakRteH kSayastatsambhavAcca saH||3||   rasAdiCoSaNAcchoSo rogarAT teSu rAjanAt||3||

sa0-nakSatrANAM-aCvinyAdInAM, tathA dvijAnAM-brAhmaNAnAM ca, yo rAjA-candraH, tasya purA-pUrvaM, abhavat| pUrvakalpe hi rohiNyAmatisaktasya candrasya CvaCuraM dakSamanRtavAdena vaJcayato~apamAnitaduhitRsnehavaCAdudbhUtakrodhAt prajApaterdakSataH rAjayakSmA~abhavaditi CrUyate| tasmAdrAjJo yakSmA rAjayakSmetyucyate SaSThIsamAsavyutpattyA| yacca-yasmAcca, rAjA ca yakSmA ca-rAjAca rogANAM madhye anekarogAnIkaparivRtatvena yakSmA ca, tato rAjA cAsau yakSmA ca rAjayakSmA~abhimato munInAmiti CeSaH| tathA dehaCcauSadhaM ca, tayoH kSayaH, tasya kRtiH-kAraNaM, tato dehauSadhakSayakRteH kSaya ityucyate| anena cAsya vyAdherbahukAlasthAyitvaM dyotayati| kilAyaM vyAdhirbahutaraM kAlamavatiSThate na ca CAntiM gacchati| yAvaddehaH kSIyate, auSadhAnyapi kSIyante, na punarayaM vyAdhiH, iti dehauSadhakSayakRteH kSaya ityucyate| tatsambhavAcca saH| tadityanena dehauSadhakSayaH pratyavamRCyate| sa sambhavo-janma, yasyAsau tatsambhavaH, tasmAdapi kSaya ityucyate| evamanyo~api yo vyAdhirdehauSadhakSayakArI, so~api kSayAkhyasya vyAdheH sambhavaH-kAraNam, tasmAjjAyata ityarthaH| rasAdInAM CoSaNAt CoSa iti bhaNyate| rogetyAdi| bahuSu rogeSu madhye rogatvenaiSa eva bhrAjate, tasmAdrogarADityucyate|

A0 ra0-nAmanirvacanamAha-nakSatrANAmiti|  rAjJaH-candrasya, yakSmA-rogo, rAjayakSmA|  athavA, rogANAM rAjA yakSmA ceti rAjayakSmA|  dehamauSadhaM ca kSiNotIti kSayaH|  athavA, CukrAdikSayAt sambhavatIti kSayaH, kAryakAraNayorabhedopacArAt|  rasAdayo dhAtavaH CuSyantyaneneti CoSaH| [rAja]vadrogeSu rAjata iti rogarAT|

sAhasaM vegasaMrodhaH CukraujaHsnehasaGkSayaH||4||   annapAnavidhityAgaCcatvArastasya hetavaH||4||

sa0-sAhasaM-kAyena vAcA vA~ayathAbalamArambhaH| vegasaMrodho-vAtaviNmUtrAdInAmunmukhIbhUtAnAM dhAraNam| CukraM ca ojaCca snehaCca teSAM saGkSayo-vinACaH| atra snehaCabdena dehasneho grAhyaH, dehaCabdalopaM kRtvA~ayaM nirdiSTaH| tathA ca muniH (ca. ci. a. 8|2)- "dehasnehaparikSayAt" iti| tathA, annapAnayoryathACAstraM yo vidhistasya tyAgo-anyathAsevanamanyathA~abhyavahAraH| tasya-rAjayakSmaNaH, catvAraH sAhasAdayo hetavaH| pAThAdeva catuHsaGkhyAtve labdhe caturgrahaNaM niyamArtham| yadyapi sAhasAdaya ete pratyekamanekaprakAratayA bhinnAH, tathA~api sAhasAdicatuSTayaM nAtikrAmantItyarthaH|        tathA~asmin rAjayakSmAkhye sAhasaje vegasaMrodhaje CukraujaHsnehasaGkSayaje~annapAnavidhityAgaje vA caturvidhe viCeSeNa pavano hetuH|

A0 ra0-hetucatuSTayamAha-sAhasamiti|  ojaH-CukramalaH|  sneho-majjamalaH|

tairudIrNo~anilaH pittaM kaphaM codIrya sarvataH||5||   CarIrasandhInAviCya tAn sirACca prapIDayan||5||   mukhAni srotasAM ruddhvA tathaivAtivivRtya vA||6||   sarpannUrdhvamadhastiryagyathAsvaM janayedgadAn||6||

sa0-taiH-sAhasAdibhiH, udIrNo~anila idamidaM kurvan yathAsvaM gadAn janayet| udIrNaH-ulbaNaH pittaCleSmabhyAmadhikaH| ata eva pittamudIrya-svasthAnAccyAvayitvA, tathA kaphaM sarvataH-sarvasmAt udIrya, tathA CarIrasandhIn-daCAdhikaCatadvayasaGkhyAtAn Atreyamatena tu dvisahasrasaGkhyAtAn, AviCya-teSAmantaH-praveCaM kRtvA, tAMCca-sandhIn, prapIDayan-prakarSeNa mardayanniva, tathA sirA api sakalaCarIragAH prapIDayan, tathA~anyeSAM srotasAM mukhAni-dvArANi ruddhvA, tathaiva tAni vA ativivRtya-prasArya srotomukhAni| sarpannityAdi| UrdhvaM sarpan vAyuH pInasAdIn vyAdhIn janayet, adhaH sarpan viDbhraMCaM viTCoSaM vA kuryAt, tiryak sarpan pArCvarujaM vA kuryAt, iti yathAsvaMCabdasyArthaH|

rUpaM bhaviSyatastasya pratiCyAyo bhRCaM kSavaH||7||   praseko mukhamAdhuryaM sadanaM vahnidehayoH||7||   sthAlyamatrAnnapAnAdau CucAvapyaCucIkSaNam||8||   makSikAtRNakeCAdipAtaH prAyo~annapAnayoH||8||   hRllAsaCchardiraruciraCnato~api balakSayaH||9||   pANyoravekSA pAdAsyaCopho~akSNoratiCuklatA||9||   bAhvoH pramANajijJAsA kAye baibhatsyadarCanam||10||   strImadyamAMsapriyatA ghRNitvaM mUrddhaguNThanam||10||   nakhakeCAtivRddhiCca, svapne cAbhibhavo bhavet||11||   pataGgakRkalAsAhikapiCvApadapakSibhiH||11||   keCAsthituSabhasmAdirACau samadhirohaNam||12||   CUnyAnAM grAmadeCAnAM darCanaM CuSyato~ambhasaH||12||   jyotirgirINAM patatAM jvalatAM ca mahIruhAm||13||

A0 ra0-pUrvarUpamAha-rUpaM bhaviSyata iti|  bhRCaM kSavaH-nAsArogeSu|  sadanaM-svakAryAkSamatvam|  sthAlI-yatrAnnaM pacyate|  amatraM-yatrAnnaM bhujyate|  pANyoravekSA-kIdRCau me pANI iti jijJAsA|  baibhatsyadarCanaM-sundareSvasundaratvabuddhiH|  ghRNitvaM-sakRpatvam|  pataGgAbhibhavAdayo jvaladvRkSadarCanAntAH [ svapne bhavanti ]|

sa0-doSaiH-vAtapittakaphaiH, kapholbaNatvAt srotodvAreSu ruddheSu-pihiteSu satsu, rasaH svasthAna eva vidahyamAno-na samyagraktatAM prApnuvan, tAMstAn-anekAn kaNThoddhvaMsAdIn, upadravAn kuryAt| kimbhUtairdoSaiH ? evaM na sambhAvyata ityapiCabdArthaH|         nanu, yadyevaM tatkathamanyebhyo dhAtubhyo viCeSeNa dhAraNasvabhAvebhyo vinA kSayI jIvet? ityACaGkyAha-upastabdha iti| saH-kSayI, CakRtA-purISeNa, kevalamupastabdhaH-kRtAvaSTambho, vartate-prANiti, pUrvoktanyAyena kiJcidAhArarasApyAyitairdhAtubhirdhAraNasvabhAvairdhRtamAtraH| nanu, "vidahyamAnaH svasthAne rasastAMstAnupadravAn| kuryAdagacchanmAMsAdInasRk cordhvaM pradhAvati||" ityanena raktasya sattA pradipAditA| "raso~apyasya na raktAya" ityanena kSayiNo raktasyAbhAvaH pratyapAdi| tadime vAkye parasparaM vyAghnAte| atrocyate| nAnayorvAkyayoH parasparaM virodhaH| yataH " asRk cordhvaM pradhAvati" ityanena na taddhAturUpatAM prAptamuktam| kintarhi ? vAtAdIneva vimRCetkRmitRSNAmadauhRde||37||   CUlavepathuhRllAsairviCeSAt kRmijAM vadet||38||   kRmihRdrogaliGgaiCca-----------------------||38|| |iti chardinidAnam||4|||38||

sa0-kAraNe kAryopacArAt kRmyAdiCabdaireva chardaya ucyante| kRmitRSNAmagarbhiNIdauhRdaje chardiSi vAtAdIneva yathA yathaM svalakSaNairvimRCet-vicArayellakSayet| na hi vAtAdInantareNaitAH chardayaH kathaJcidapi sambhavanti| ata evaivakAro~avadhAraNArtho~atra vyadhAyi| evaM kRmijAM kadAcidvAyucchardilakSaNopetAmathavA pittacchardilakSaNopetAM kaphacchardilakSaNopetAM vA yathAyathaM lakSayet| evaM tRSNAmadauhRdacchardiSi vAtAdIn vimRCet| viCeSeNa CUlavepathuhRllAsaiH kRmijAM vadet| kRmihRdrogalakSaNaiCca-anantarameva vakSyamANaiH, kRmijAM vadet|

atha hRdroganidAnam||38||   ---------------------smRtAH paJca tu hRdgadAH||38||   teSAM gulmanidAnoktaiH samutthAnaiCca sambhavaH||39||

sa0-hRdgadAH paJca smRtAH, tantrakRdbhiriti CeSaH| [teSAM-hRdrogANAM, gulmanidAnoktaiH-vakSyamANaiH, samutthAnaiH-kAraNaiH, sambhavaH-utpattiH| ]

A0 ra0-  atha hRdrogaprakaraNam|  tatra hRdrogabhedAnAha-smRtA iti|  vAtapittakaphasannipAtakrimibhiH|  saGgrahe tu (ni. a. 5) -"teSAM gulmanidAnoktaiH samutthAnaiCca sambhavaH|" iti|  samutthAnaiH-hetubhiH|

vAtena CUlyate~atyarthaM yudyate sphuTatIva ca||39||   bhidyate CuSyati stabdhaM hRdayaM CUnyatA dravaH||40||   akasmAddInatA Coko bhayaM CabdAsahiSNutA||40||   vepathurveSTanaM mohaH CvAsarodho~alpanidratA||41||

sa0-vAtena hRdroge~atyarthaM hRdayaM CUlyate| atyarthaCabdenedaM gamayati,-anyeSvapi hRdrogeSu hRdayaM CUlyate~atiCayena tu vAtaje hRdroge iti| tathA, tudyate-prAjaneneva| CUlaM-santatA pIDA| todo-vicchinno~atiCayena rugudbhavaH| tathA, hRdayaM sphuTatItyAdikriyAdiyutaM bhavati| tathA, CUnyatA dravatvaM ca, prakRtatvAddhRdayasyaiva syAditi bodhyam|

A0 ra0-vAtajalakSaNamAha-vAteneti|  CUlyate-pIDaneneva|  tudyate-nisvanenava|  sphuTati-viCIryateti|  bhidyate -vidAraNeneva|  CUnyatA dravaH, akasmAddInatACokAdIni [ca] nava hRdayasya|

pittAttRSNA bhramo mUrcchA dAhaH svedo~amlakaH klamaH||41||   chardanaM cAmlapittasya dhUmakaH pItatA jvaraH||42||

sa0-pittAt-pittena, tRSNAdaya syuH|

 --------------------------kRmibhiH CyAvanetratA||43||   tamaHpraveCo hRllAsaH CoSaH kaNDUH kaphasrutiH||44||   hRdayaM pratataM cAtra krakaceneva dAryate||44||   cikitsedAmayaM ghoraM taM CIghraM CIghrakAriNam||45|| iti hRdroganidAnam||45||

sa0-kRmibhiCca hRdroge CyAvAkSitAdyAH syuH| atra-kRmihRdroge, hRdayaM krakaceneva-karapatreNeva, [ pratataM- ] santataM, dAryate| taM-kRmihRdrogAkhyamAmayaM, ghoraM-atiduHsahaM, CIghrakAriNaM-ACuvighAtakAriNaM, CIghraM-ACveva, cikitset| mahAmarmaNo hRdayasya kRmibhirbhakSaNAt|

A0 ra0-kRmijalakSaNamAha-kRmibhiriti|  vaGgasene (hRdayarogAdhikAre Clo. 1-4) -"atyuSNagurvamlakaSAyatiktaCramAbhighAtAdhyaCanaprasaGgaiH|  saJcintanairvegavidhAraNaiCca hRdAmayaH paJcavidhaH pradiSTaH|| dUSayitvA rasaM doSA viguNA hRdayaM gatAH|  hRdi bAdhAM prakurvanti hRdrogaM taM pracakSate||'  iti hRdroganidAnam|

atha tRSNAnidAnam||45|| vAtAtpittAtkaphAttRSNA sannipAtAdrasakSayAt||45|| SaSThI syAdupasargAcca vAtapitte tu kAraNam||46|| sarvAsu tatprakopo hi saumyadhAtupraCoSaNAt||46||sarvadehabhramotkampatApatRDdAhamohakRt||47|| jihvAmUlagalaklomatAlutoyavahAH sirAH||47||   saMCoSya tRSNA jAyante-------------------||48||

sa0-vAtAdibhiH paJca tRSNAH syuH| SaSThI syAdupasargAcca| upAdAnAdeva SaTsaGkhyAyA labdhatvAt SaSThItyetadvacanaM niyamArtham| AmodbhavAdyA yA vakSyamANAstRSNAstAH sarvAstRSNAnAM SaTtvaM nAtikrAmanti, vAtapittajatvAt| prAyeNa tAsAmAsvevAntarbhAvaH| sarvAsu-pUrvoktAsu vakSyamANAsu ca tRSNAsu, vAtapitte kAraNam|hi-yasmAt, saumyasya CarIragatasya dhAtoH-CleSmaNo rasAderdhAtoH, AhAravihArAdinA yatpraCoSaNaM tasmAt, tayoH-vAtapittayoH, prakopo 'jAyate' ityadhyAhAryam| kimbhUtaH prakopaH ? sarvadehabhramotkampatApatRDdAhamohakRt|jihvAdisirAH saMCoSya tRSNAH samutpadyante|

A0 ra0-atha tRSNAnidAnam|  tatra tRSNAbedAnAha -vAtAditi|  vAtapittahetukatvamAha-vAtapitte tviti|      ukte yuktimAha-tatprakopo hIti|  hi-yasmAt, tayoH-vAtapittayoH prakopaH, sarvasmin dehe bhramAdIn karoti|  saumyAn dhAtUn praCoSya tasmAt |  tAbhyAM vinA na tRSNotpattiH|  bhramAdInAM grahaNaM tRSNopadravatvajJApanArtham|     tRSNAsamprAptimAha-jihvAmUlagaleti|

nidAnasthAnam

madAtyayAdinidanam adhyAyaH

athAto madAtyayAdinidAnaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||   iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-pUrvavadvyAkhyA|

tIkSNoSNarUkSasUkSmAmlaM vyavAyyACukaraM laghu||1|| vikASi viCadaM madyamojaso~asmAdviparyayaH||1||

sa0-tIkSNoSNAdiguNaM madyam| asmAt-madyAt, ojaso viparyayo-vaiparItyam, yathA-mandaCItasnigdhasAndramadhurasthiracirakRdguruClakSNapicchilatvam|

tIkSNAdayo viSe~apyuktACcittopaplAvino guNAH||2||   jIvitAntAya jAyante viSe tUtkarSavRttitaH||2||

sa0-eta eva tIkSNAdayo daCa guNA viSe~apyuktAH| cittamupaplAvituM CIlaM yeSAM te cittopaplAvinaH,-cittavibhramakAriNaH| na kevalaM madya ityapiCabdArthaH| nanu, yadi ta eva tIkSNAdayo guNA viSe, ta eva madye, tatkathaM viSasthA eva tIkSNAdayo mArayanti na madyasthAH ? ityatra yuktimAha-jIvitAntAyetyAdi| viSasthAstIkSNAdayo ye guNAste mAraNAya sampadyate, utkarSavRttitaH-utkarSavartanAt|

tIkSNAdibhirguNairmadyaM mandAdInojaso guNAn||3||   daCabhirdaCa saGkSobhya ceto nayati vikriyAm||3||   Adye made-----------------------------------||4||

sa0-tIkSNAdibhirdaCabhirguNairmandAdInojasaH sambandhino guNAn saGkSobhya-samantAdduSTatAmApAdya, ceto vikriyAM-vikAraM nayati, Adye made| nanu, tIkSNAdibhirmandAdInityetAvadevAstu, kiM daCabhirdaCetyanena? pAThAdeva hi daCasaGkhyA~avagamiSyate| astyetat| kintu sarvaireva tIkSNAdibhiH sarvAnapi mandAdIn saGkSobhya ceto vikriyAM madyaM nayati, na tu kiyadbhirapi tIkSNAdibhiH kiyata eva mandAdIn, iti pratipAdanAya saGkhyAgrahaNam| utkarSatAratamyatastvastyeva viCeSaH, tena sarvatra made naiva tulyaH kSobha iti vedyam| Adye ca made yathAsvaM prabodhajanake pumAn sthito madyapAnAttAdAtvikaM sukhaM samadhigacchatItyanuktamapi sambhAvyate| tathA ca muniH (ca. ci. a. 24|64)- "paJcasvartheSu kAnteSu yA ratiH prathame made| yUnAM vA sthavirANAM vA tasyA nAstyupamA bhuvi||" iti|

-------------dvitIye tu pramAdAyatane sthitaH||4|| durvikalpahato mUDhaH sukhamityadhimucyate||4||

sa0-anantaraM dvitIye tu made sthitaH-prAptaH, svArthairduSTaistaistairvikalpairhataH-puruSArthAdvinaSTaH, ata eva mUDhaH-kAryAkAryAnabhijJaH, sukhamityadhimucyate-sukhamiti jJAnena prathamamadotpannena tadAnImadhimucyate-adhikaM kRtvA tena sukhena parityajyate| tAdAtvikamAdyaM sukhaM nAnubhavati, ojaso vihatatvAt| anye tvAhuH,-avamucyate-niCcinoti sukhametadityabhiniviCate| kimbhUte made sthitaH ? pramAdAyatane, pramAdAnAM-sAhasAnAmihAmutra cACubhahetUnAM, [ Ayatane- ] sthAne|

madhyamottamayoH sandhiM prApya rAjasatAmasaH||5||   niraGkuCa iva vyAlo na kiJcinnAcarejjaDaH||5||

sa0-madhyamottamayoH-dvitIyatRtIyayoH, sandhiM prApya-antaraM labdhvA, puruSo rAjasatAmaso na kiJcidaCubhaM nAcaret-api tu sarvamaCubhamAcaret| rAjasasahitastAmaso rAjasatAmasaH| CAkapArthivAditvAt madhyama (uttara) padalopI samAsaH, rAjaso vA tAmaso vetyarthaH| rAjasatAmasagrahaNAt sAtvikaH puruSo nedRCImavasthAM prApnotIti gamayati| niraGkuCa iva vyAlaH| yathA,-vyAlo-duSTahastI, jaDo-badhiraH, tathA niraGkuCo, na kiJcidaCubhaM nAcaret, unmArgapravRttatvAt| tantrAntare caivamuktam-"sAtvike CaucadAkSiNyaharSamaNDanalAlasaH| gItAdhyayanasaubhAgyasuratotsAhakRnmadaH|| rAjase duHkhaCIlatvamAtmatyAgaM sasAhasam| kalahaM sAnubandhaM ca karoti puruSe madaH|| aCaucanidrAmAtsaryAgamyAgamanalolatAH| asatyabhASaNaM cApi kuryAdvai tAmase madaH||" iti| vyAlagrahaNAdyaH CuddhasvabhAvo hastI sa sRNirahito~api kadAciddhastyArohaCabdaCravaNAt kAlocitaM saGketamupalabhya yuktamAcaratyeveti, ato vyAlo niraGkuCa iti dvitayamupanyastam| tejasaH kiJciccheSatvAt nindyAmimAmavasthAM prAptaH|

iyaM bhUmiravadyAnAM dauHCIlyasyedamAspadam||6|| eko~ayaM bahumArgAyA durgaterdeCikaH param||6|| niCceSTaH Cavavacchete tRtIye tu made sthitaH||7|| maraNAdapi pApAtmA gataH pApatarAM daCAm||7||

sa0-avadyAnAM-nindyAnAM, iyaM-madAvasthA, bhUmiH-AkaraH| tathA, dauHCIlyasya-asamAhitatvasya, idaM-madAvasthAntaraM, AspadaM-AvasathaH| eko~ayaM-madaviCeSo, bahumArgAyAH-anekamukhAyA durgateH, paraM kRtvA deCikaH-AcAryaH|tRtIye-uttame made, sthito narastejaso vihatatvAt niCceSTaH-ceSTayA kAyavAGmanolakSaNayA rahitaH, ata eva Cavavacchete-mRtAnukalpaH svapiti| evaM ca satyasau pApAtmA maraNAdapi pApatarAmavasthAM prAptaH| yato mRto maraNAtsamanantarameva CarIrAntaraM prApya sukhAdIn vindate| tRtIyAM madAvasthAM prAptastu puruSo~aparaCarIrAprApterna kathaJcit sukhAdyanubhavatIti maraNAdapyasya nikRSTatvam|

dharmAdharmaM sukhaM duHkhamarthAnarthaM hitAhitam||8|| yadAsakto na jAnAti kathaM tacchIlayedbudhaH||8||

sa0-yasminnAsakto-yadAsakto, dharmAdIn na jAnAti| tat-tathAvidhaM madyaM, budho-matimAn, kathaM CIlayet-abhyaset| tatra dharmo-dAnAdhyayanadevagurupUjAdikaH| adharmo-hiMsAdiH| sukhaM-AhlAdako~anubhavaH| duHkhaM-upatApaH| arthaH-ubhayalokahitam| anarthaH-ahitam| CIlayedityanena tatrAsaktiM niSedhati, na tu madyapAnamapi|

madye moho bhayaM CokaH krodho mRtyuCca saMCritAH||9|| sonmAdamadamUrcchAyAH sApasmArApatAnakAH||9|| yatraikaH smRtivibhraMCastatra sarvamasAdhu yat||10||

sa0-madye~atipIte mohAdayaH saMCritAH-ACritAH, madyAtipAnAdanantaraM mohAdInAM sadbhAvAt| athavA kimatra bahunA~abhihitena| yatra-yasmin madye, smRtervibhraMCo-lopaH, tatra yatkiJcidvidyate tatsarvamasAdhu-aCobhanam| yatraujasau na vihatirhRtprabodhaCca sa prathamo madaH| yatrAlpA vihatirojasaH sa madhyamaH| yatra sarvasyaujasau vihatiH sa uttamaH| tathA ca muniH (ca. ci. a. 24|35) - "ojasyavihate pUrvo hRdi ca pratibodhite| madhyamo vihate~alpe tu vihate tUttamo madaH||" iti|

ayuktiyuktamannaM hi vyAdhaye maraNAya vA||10|| madyaM trivargadhIdhairyalajjAderapi nACanam||11||

sa0-yasmAdayuktyA yojitamannamapi-yatprANakaraM tadapi, karmavaCAdvyAdhaye maraNAya vA sampadyate| madyaM tvayuktiyojitaM trivargAderapi nACanam| yuktipItaM punastadeva trivargAdInAM sAdhanamityapiCabdena dyotayati|

----------------------gudaH sthUlAntrasaMCrayaH||3|| ardhapaJcAGgulastasmiMstisro~adhyardhAGgulAH sthitAH||4|| valyaH, pravAhiNI tAsAmantarmadhye visarjanI||4|| bAhyA saMvaraNI tasyA gudauSTho bahiraGgule||5|| yavAdhyardhaH pramANena romANyatra tataH param||5||

sa0-sthUlAntraM saMCrayaH-ACrayo, yasya sa evaMvidho gudaH| sthUlaM yadantraM tatra pratibaddha ityarthaH| kiMpramANo~asau ? ardhapaJcAGgulaH| ardhenonAni paJca-ardhapaJca| CAkapArthivAditvAtsamAsaH| ardhapaJca aGgulAni yasya so~ardhapaJcAGgulaH,-sArdhacaturaGgulaparimANaH| tasmin-gude, tisro valyaH-trisaGkhyAH sthitAH| kiMparimANAH ? adhyardhAGgulAH, adhikamardhamaGgulaM pratyekaM parimANaM yAsAM tA evam| atha tAsAM-tisRNAm, arthAnugatAni nAmAnyAha-tatra-malapravAhaNAdantaH-antare sthitA valI, pravAhiNIti kathyate| madhye-madhyasthitA valI, malasya pravahato bahirvisarjanAt visarjanIti bhaNyate| gudasya bAhye sthitA malasya saMvaraNAt saMvaraNItyucyate| tasyAH-saMvaraNIsaMjJAyA valeH, aGgule-tatparimANe, bahiH-bAhye, gudauSThaH sthitaH| pramANena-parimANato, gudauSThau yavAdhyardhaH-sArdhayavapramANaH| tato-gudauSThAt, paraM-parato bahiH, romANyatra gude, jAyante|

sa0-tatra-tAsvaCmarISu madhye, vAtAdyA~aCmarI tasyAmutpannAyAM satyAM pumAn bhRCArtyArtaH-atyantaM pIDayA pIDito, dantAn khAdati| tathA, vepate-kampate| mehanaM-meDhraM, mRdgAti-malayati| nAbhiM ca hastAbhyAM pIDayati| kiM kurvan ? aniCaM-anavarataM, kvaNan-nAnAvidhaduHkhodbhAvakaM CabdaM vidadhat| tathA, sahAnilena-vAtasahitaM, CakRnmuJcati| tathA, muhurmehati-mUtraM punaHpunaH sRjati| binduCo-binduM binduM kRtvA| asya ca-narasya, aCmarI CyAvA varNataH, tathA rUkSA kaNTakaiCciteva-vyAptA, bhavet|

sa0-etAH-tisro~aCmaryo, bAlAnAmeva bhavanti| tathA ca tantrAntare (suCrute ni. a. 3|11)- "tisro~aCmaryo divAsvapnaCIlanAdhyaCanaCItasnigdhamadhurAhArapriyatvAdbAlAnAmeva bhavanti|" iti| teSAM ca bAlAnAM jAtAstA bhUyasA grahaNAharaNe sukhAH| grahaNaM-baDiCAdinA, AharaNaM-CastrAdinA, tasmin sukhAH-sukhopAyAH| atraiva hetumAha-ACrayetyAdi| ACrayaH-AdhAraH, upacayo-vRddhiH, tayoralpatvaM, tasmAddhetorbalAnAmaCmaryA ACrayo~alpo bhavati, yatrAsAvaCmarI jAyate| ata eva cACrayAnusAreNopacayo~apyaCmaryA bAlAnAmalpo bhavati| atastA grahaNAharaNe sukhAH| mahatAM tu yathoktahetvabhAvAdgrahaNAharaNe tA duHkhAvahAH|

 --------------------------aCmaryeva ca CarkarA||18|| aNuCo vAyunA bhinnA sA tvasminnanulomage||19|| nireti saha mUtreNa pratilome vibadhyate||19||

sa0-aCmaryeva ca pavanenANuCo bhinnA satI CarkarA syAt, na tu tasyA anyadupAdAnakAraNamityarthaH| sA-CarkarA, asmin-pavane, anulomage-anulomaM kRtvA sthite sati, mUtreNa saha nireti-bahirniSkrAmati| pratilome vAyau sA sarkarA vibadhyate- na tu bahirniSkrAmati| aCmarI tvanulomage~api maruti na nireti-mUtreNa saha na niSkrAmati, ityanayorbhedaH| aCmarINAM bhallAtakAdisaMsthAnanirdeCastadanusAreNAharaNArthaM bastyavayavavipATanamupayujyate| CyAvAdivarNanirdeCaCca bahirniSkrAntAnAM CyAvAdivarNanidarCanena vAtAdInanumAya tatkRtAnAM vraNAnAM cikitsArthamupayujyate| nanu ca, saMsthAnenaiva vAtAdyanumAnamaCmarIvraNasya bhaviSyatIti varNanirdeCo~anarthakaH| maivam| saMsthAnaM prAyikamiti kecinmanyante, tasmAdvarNanirdeCo~api vAcyaH| prAyikatve ca taddvayorupAdAnaM liGgam|

sa0-mUtrasandhAriNaH puruSasya basteH-mUtradhArasya, mukhaM-dvAraM, ruddhvA mAruto mUtrasaGgaM kuryAdrujaM kaNDUM ca| sa vAtabastirmUtrAghAtaviCeSaH| kadAcit-adRSTavaCAt, vAyustaM bastiM svadhAmataH-svasthAnAt, pracyAvya-cyAvayitvA, udvRttaM-UrdhvamukhaM, garbhAbhaM-garbhasadRCaM, sthUlaM-svapramANAt pravRddhaM, tathA viplutaM-caJcalaM, karoti| caCabdAnna kevalaM bastibhraMCamevaMvidhaM karoti, yAvattatra rugAdInapi| mUtraM ca binduCaH-bindubinduH pravartate| bastau ca pIDite-hastAdinA, mUtraM dhArayA-avicchinnaM, pravartate| eSa dvividho vAtabastiriti nAmnA smRtaH| sa ca prathamo dustaro-duHkhena kRcchreNa tarituM Cakyate| dvitIyo vAtabastirdustarataro yataH prabalAnilaH| ata eva cAtra prabalAnilatvAnmUtrasya binduCaH pravartanam|

sa0-saH-CleSmAdiH, bhavo-janma, yeSAM te tadbhavAH kaphAdisamutthAH, tenaiva-viCiSTena samprAptiviCeSeNa, sAdhyayApyaparityAjyAH syuH| tathA ca,-kaphapramehA vapurAdidUSaNamAtrotthitatvAt sAdhyAH, pittapramehANAM saumyadhAtukSaye vapurAde raktasya ca dUSaNena samutthAnAdyApyatvam, vAtapramehAstu sarvadhAtukSayodbhUtatvAdasAdhyAH| anyadapi hetvantaraM sAdhyayApyAsAdhyatve vakti-sametyAdi| samaM cAsamaM ca samAsame,-samAnAsamAne, samAsame kriye yayostAvevam, tayorbhAvaH samAsamakriyatA, tayA| tathA, mahAtyayatayA| mahAMCcAsAvatyayo-vinACaH CarIravighaTanarUpo mahAtyayaH, tasya bhAvo mahAtyayatA, tayA| tatra kaphasya tathA CarIrakledAdeH pramehadUSyasyApyatarpaNarUpayaikayaiva kriyayA sAdhyatvAt kaphapramehAH sAdhyAH| pittasya CItamadhurAdirUpA kriyA pramehANAM rUkSatIkSNAdikA dUSyapratipakSatvAdaupayikIti tasmAtte pittapramehA yApyAH| vAtapramehANAM rUkSatIkSNAdi tu pathyam| vAtasya snigdhamadhurAdikaM santarpaNarUpaM pathyam| tadevaM viruddhakriyatvAdvAtapramehA asAdhyAH| apiceti samuccaye|

sAmAnyaM lakSaNaM teSAM prabhUtAvilamUtratA||7||

sa0-teSAM-pramehANAM, sAmAnyalakSaNaM prabhUtamUtratA~~AvilamUtratA ca|

tAsu mehavaCAcca syAddoSodreko yathAyatham||36||

sa0-tAsu-piTikAsu, mehAnurodhAddoSodreko yathAyathaM-yathAsvaM syAt| vAtamehajAsu vAtAdhikyaM pittamehajAsu pittAdhikyaM kaphamehajAsu kaphAdhikyam| udrekaCabdenaitaddyotayati,-tridoSajAH sarvA evaitA iti|

prameheNa vinA~apyetA jAyante duSTamedasaH||36|| tAvacca nopalakSyante yAvadvastuparigrahaH||36||

sa0-etAH-pUrvoktAH piTikAH, prameheNa vinA~api-apramehiNo~api puMso, duSTamedaso jAyante| jAtA api tAstathAvidhasya narasya tAvanna lakSyante-yathAyathaM lakSaNaM notpadyate, yAvat-yathAsvaM, pRSThodarAdi vastvAsAmAdhAratvena tantrakRtA yatparibhASitaM tanna parigRhItam| evaM cireNa kAlenotpannA api jJAyanta ityarthaH |

hAridravarNaM raktaM vA mehaprAgrUpavarjitam||37||  yo mUtrayenna taM mehaM raktapittaM tu tadviduH||37|| svedo~aGgagandhaH CithilatvamaGge      CayyAsanasvapnasukhAbhiSaGgaH||38|| hRnnetrajihvACravaNopadeho      ghanAGgatA keCanakhAtivRddhiH||38|| CItapriyatvaM galatAluCoSo      mAdhuryamAsye karapAdadAhaH||39|| bhaviSyato mehagaNasya rUpaM      mUtre~abhidhAvanti pipIlikACca||39||

sa0-mehasya yat prAgrUpaM tena varjitaM hAridravarNaM raktaM vA yo mUtrayet taM mehaM na viduH, kintarhi ? tat raktapittamityAhuH|   etadbhaviSyato-bhAvino, mehagaNasya-viMCatisaGkhyasya, sveda ityAdi rUpam| na kevalametat prAgrUpaM yAvatpipIlikA mUtre~abhidhAvanti| madhurarasapriyatvAtteSAM| munistvatra nakhavRddhiM na jagAda (?)|

dRSTvA pramehaM madhuraM sapicchaM      madhUpamaM syAddvividho vicAraH||40|| sampUraNAdvA kaphasambhavaH syAt       kSINeSu doSeSvanilAtmako vA||40||

sa0-madhUpamaM-mAkSikatulyaM, madhuraM tathA saha picchayA-CAlmalIniryAsatulyayA, vartata iti sapiccham| evaMvidhaM pramehaM dRSTvA tadAnIM dvividho vicAraH syAt| sampUraNAtkAraNAt kimayaM kaphasambhavo meho~apatarpaNasAdhyaH ? uta kSINeSu doSeSu-kaphAdidoSakSayAt, santarpaNasAdhyo~anilAtmakaH syAt ? iti sandeho mandabuddheH| tIkSNamatistu kaphamehAn vAtamehAMCca liGgAntaraiH samyagvettyeva|

athAto vidradhivRddhigulmanidAnaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH ||2|| iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH ||2|| bhuktaiH paryuSitAtyuSNarUkSaCuSkavidAhibhiH||1|| jihmaCayyAviceSTAbhistaistaiCcAsRkpradUSaNaiH||1|| duSTatvaGmAMsamedosthisnAyvasRkkaNDarACrayaH||2|| yaH Copho bahirantarvA mahAmUlo mahArujaH||2|| vRttaH syAdAyato yo vA smRtaH SoDhA sa vidradhiH||3|| doSaiH pRthaksamuditaiH CoNitena kSatena ca||3||

sa0-paryuSitAdibhirbhuktaiH, tathA jihmaCayyAviceSTAbhiH, vividhACceSTA viceSTAH, CayyA ca viceSTACca CayyAviceSTAH, jihmACca tAH CayyAviceSTACca, tAbhiH| jihmAH kuTilA vakrA iti paryAyAH| tathA taistaiH-tatratatrAsRkpradUSaNaiCca nirdiSTaiH, yaH Copho jAyate duSTatvagAdyACrayo bahiH-bahirbhAge, antaH-antarbhAge vA, sa CIghravidAhitvAcchophaH SoDhA-SaTprakAro, vidradhiH smRtaH-abhihitaH| CophaCabdaH pRSodarAditvAtsAdhuH| tvak ca mAMsaM ca medaCca asthi ca snAyuCcAsRk ca kaNDarA ca, tA evam| "sumahAn snAyusaGghAtaH kaNDaretyabhidhIyate|" duSTAH-doSairdUSitAH, tvaGmAMsAdaya AdhAro yasya sa duSTatvaGmAMsamedosthisnAyvasRkkaNDarACrayaH| tathA, mahamUlastathA mahArujaH, anenAsya durupakramatvamuktam| tathA, vRttaH syAt, athavA Ayato-na vartulaH, ityanenAsya saMsthAnamuktam|     pRthagdoSaiH-vAtapittakaphaistrayaH, samuditaiH-sannipAtena caikaH, tathA CoNitena-doSAdhiSThitena, kSatena-CastrAdighAtAdinA, ceti|

nidAnasthAnam

pANDurogaCophavisarpanidAnam adhyAyaH

 athAtaH pANDurogaCophavisarpanidAnaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2|| iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2|| pittapradhAnAH kupitA yathoktaiH kopanairmalAH||1|| tatrAnilena balinA kSiptaM pittaM hRdi sthitam||1|| dhamanIrdaCa samprApya vyApnuvatsakalAM tanum||2|| CleSmatvagraktamAMsAni pradUSyAntaramACritam||2|| tvaGmAMsayostatkurute tvaci varNAn pRthagvidhAn||3|| pANDuhAridraharitAn pANDutvaM teSu cAdhikam||3|| yato~ataH pANDurityuktaH sa rogaH-------------||4||

sa0- yatra malAH-vAtAdayaH, pittapradhAnA yathoktaiH-sarvaroganidAnAdyuktaiH, kopanaiH kupitAH-kruddhAH, pANDurogahetavaH| katham ? ityAha-tatretyAdi| [ tatra- ] teSu tathAbhUteSu satsu, vAtena balinA-balavatA, kSiptaM pittaM hRdi sthitamanantaraM tatpittaM dhamanIrdaCa-hRdi sthitAH, samprApya-ACritya, sakalAM tanuM vyApnuvat-aCnuvAnam| sakalaCabdopAdAnaM mUtrapurISAdInAmapi grahaNArtham| ata evAkhyAsyati (Clo. 9) - "kRSNarUkSAruNasirAnakhaviNmUtranetratA|" iti| tathA CleSmatvagraktamAMsAni pradUSya| kimbhUtaM pittam ? tvaGmAsayorantaraM-madhyamACritam| tat-pittaM, tvaci varNAn pRthagvidhAn-nAnAprakArAn, pANDuhAridraharitAn kurute| teSu-varNeSu madhye, yato-yasmAt, atiCayena pANDutvamadhikamataH-asmAt, sa rogaH pANDurityuktaH-saMjJitaH| nanu, 'pittapradhAnAH' iti kathamuktam ? yAvatA (yato) vAyorbalIyastvAt 'vAtapradhAnAH' iti vaktuM yuktaM syAt| balIyastvaM cAnantarameva pratipAditaM 'tatrAnilena balinA kSiptaM' iti| asadetat| yato nAtra balIyastvAbalIyastvakRte prAdhAnyAprAdhAnye vivakSite| kintarhi ? pANDurogakaraNaM prati kartRtvAkartRtve| pittasya ca pANDurogakaraNaM prati mukhyaM kartRtvam, ataH 'pittapradhAnAH' iti yuktamuktam| nanu, yadi trayo doSAH pANDurogahetavaH, kathaM tarhi vakSyati ? (Clo. 7) - "sa paJcadhA pRthagdoSaiH samastairmRttikAdanAt|" iti| ucyate| sarvaH pANDurogastridoSaja eva| kintu hetuviCeSairyo rUpabhedastena paJcAtmakaH Cophavat, iti na kiJcidatrAyuktam|

----------------------------------tena gauravam||4|| dhAtUnAM syAcca CaithilyamojasaCca guNakSayaH||4|| tato~alparaktamedasko niHsAraH syAcchlathendriyaH||5|| mRdyamAnairivAGgairnA dravatA hRdayena ca||5||  CUnAkSikUTaH sadanaH kopanaH SThIvano~alpavAk||6|| annadviT CiCiradveSI CIrNaromA hatAnalaH||6|| sannasaktho jvarI CvAsI karNakSveDI bhramI CramI||7||

sa0-tena-pANDurogeNa, dhAtUnAM-rasarudhirAdInAM, gauravaM CaithilyaM ca syAt| tathA, ojaso guNakSayo-mAdhurya(manda)CaityAdInAmojoguNAnAM (hR. ni. a. 6|1) vinACaH| tata eva-ojoguNakSayAt, pANDvAmayI naro~alparaktamedaskaH| alpe raktamedasI yasya sa evam| tathA, niHsAro-durbalaH syAt|tathA ClathendriyaH| [ ClathAni- ] CithilAni, indriyANi-vAkpANipAdapAyUpastharUpANi, yasya sa ClathendriyaH| tathA, indriyaCabdena buddhIndriyANAM cakSurAdInAmadhiSThAnAnyupalakSyante| nanu, pittapradhAnAH kupitA iti pittavRddhiruktA| pittavRddhyA ca raktavRddhyA bhavitavyam| tatkathamuktamalparaktateti ? atrocyate| doSANAmanyonyadUSaNAt dUSyasya ca doSairdUSitatvAt prasAdaparamparayA~apuSTau satyAM kiTTabAhulyAt pitta[sya]adhikyam, na raktasya prasAdAtmakasya, iti pittAdhikyamalparaktatA cetyupapannam| tathA, aGgaiH-avayavaiH, mRdyamAnairivAsau nara upalakSitaH, tathA hRdayena dravatA ca| tathA, CUnAvakSikUTau yasya sa evam| tathA, sadanaH-aGgasAdavAn| tathA, kopanAdikaH syAt|

sa paJcadhA pRthagdoSaiH samastairmRttikAdanAt||7||

sa0-saH-pANDurogaH, paJcadhA syAt| katham ? ityAha-pRthagdoSaiH sannipAtena mRdbhakSaNAcca| nanu, mRttikAdanAt pRthagpANDurogo na vAcyaH, pRthagvAtAdidoSaje pANDuroge~antarbhUtatvAt| mRdA hi vAtAdiprakopo vidhIyate tiktoSaNAdibhiriva| vAtAdiprakopaCca pANDurogakRt| tasmAtpRthaGmRdo na yukto nirdeCaH| atra brUmaH| mRdo~anye ye vAtAdiprakopahetavaH pANDurogasampAdane sambhAvanAyogyAH, te pANDurogaM sampAdya hetusvarUpasattayA vinivartante| mRttikA tu tIkSNaiH saMCodhanairvinA pANDurogaM yAvatkAye~avatiSThate| ityayaM vAtAdikopahetubhyo~anyebhyo mRdaH pANDurogaM prati viCeSaH| tasmAnmRdA pRthak pANDurogo vaktuM nyAyyaH|

sa0-mithyAhArAdinA tathA sAdhunindAvadhAdibhiH pApmabhiH karmabhiH sadyaH sevitaiH-anuSThitaiH, prAktanairvA-anyajanmAcaritaiH| sevitagrahaNena sAtatyAnuSThAnaM dyotayati| tena kadAcitkaraNatvameSAM na kuSThaheturiti gamyate| taistathAbhUtaiH karmabhirmithyAhArAdinA ca IritAH-duSTAH, malAH-vAtapittakaphAH, CirAstiryaggAminIH prapadya-ACritya, tvaglasIkAsRgAmiSaM dUSayanti| tadeva ca tvagAdikaM CithilIkRtya tataH-anantaraM, bahirniCcaranto-bAhyadeCe prasarantaH, tvaco [ yat ] vaivarNyaM kurvanti tatkuSThamuCanti, munaya iti CeSaH|

kAlenopekSitaM yasmAtsarvaM kuSNAti tadvapuH||4|| prapadya dhAtUnvyApyAntaH sarvAn saMkledya cAvahet||4|| sasvedakledasaGkothAn kRmIn sUkSmAn sudAruNAn||5|| lomatvaksnAyudhamanItaruNAsthIni yaiH kramAt||5|| bhakSayecchvitramasmAcca kuSThabAhyamudAhRtam||6||

sa0-tasya-pavanasya, karmoktam| kva? doSavijJAne,-doSavijJAnIyAdhyAye (hR. sU. a. 11)| kimbhUtaM karma ? prAkRtavaikRtam| prakRtau bhavaM prAkRtaM-svAbhAvikamutsAhocchvAsAdilakSaNam| vaikRtaM tu-"vRddhastu kurute~anilaH| kArCyakArSyoSNa" ityAdigranthanirdiSTam| etatsamAsAt-saGkSepato, vAyoH karma| vyAsato-vistarataH punaH, doSabhedIye nAma dhAma coktamityanuvartanIyam| pratyekaM paJcadhA| ekamekaM prati pratyekaM nAma dhAma ca| prANAdibhedena nAma paJcadhA| dhAma-sthAnamapi, paJcadhA mUrdhAdibhedena| prANasya murdhA sthAnam, "prANo~atra mUrdhagaH" (hR. sU. a. 12|4) iti vacanAt| tathA, "uraH sthAnamudAnasya" iti| tathA, "vyAno hRdi sthitaH" iti| tathA, "samAno~agnisamIpasthaH" iti| tathA, "apAno~apAnagaH" iti| tathA, cAro~api paJcadhA| caraNaM-cAro gatiH| tathA coktam (hR. sU. a. 12|4) -"prANa uraHkaNThacaraH" "udAno nAsAnAbhigalacaraH" "vyAnaH kRtsnadehacaraH" "samAnaH koSThacaraH" "apAno bastimeDhrorugocaraH" iti| vyApAro~api vAyoH prANAdibhedena paJcadhA| tatra prANAsya vyApAro "buddhihRdayendriyacittadhRk" ityAdiH, udAnasya vyApAro "vAkpravRttiH" ityAdiH, vyAnasya vyApAro "gatyapakSepaNotkSepaNAdikaH", samAnasya vyApAro~annagrahaNAdikaH, apAnasya vyApAraH CukrArtavAdInAM niSkramaNarUpatvam, evaM vistareNa doSabhedIye vAtaH prANAdibhedena paJcadhA nAmAdibhiruktaH|

 ---------------------bAhyAyAmaCca tadvidhaH||24|| dehasya bahirAyAmAt pRSThato nIyate CiraH||25|| uraCcotkSipyate tatra kandharA cAvamRdyate||25|| danteSvAsye ca vaivarNyaM prasvedaH srastagAtratA||26|| bAhyAyAmaM dhanuSkambhaM bruvate veginaM ca tam||26||

cikitsAsthAnam

athAto jvaracikitsitaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2|| iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

jvaracikitsitam adhyAyaH

sa0-iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSaya ityanenAgamaCaraNatvamAtmanaH pratipAdayati|

A0 ra0-atha cikitsAsthAnamArabhyate, nidAnasthAnAnantaratvAt|  tatrAdau jvaracikitsA[mAha]-athAta iti|  vyAkhyA pUrvavat|  cikitsitaM-vyAdhipratIkAraH, taM vyAkhyAsyAma iti|

AmACayastho hatvA~agniM sAmo mArgAn pidhAya yat||1|| vidadhAti jvaraM doSastasmAtkurvIta laGghanam||1|| prAgrUpeSu jvarAdau vA, balaM yatnena pAlayan||2|| balAdhiSThAnamArogyamArogyArthaH kriyAkramaH||2||

jvaracikitsitam adhyAyaH

sa0-AmACayastho doSo vahniM hatvA|  sahAmena vartata iti sAmaH|  tatha, mArgAn pidhAya-strotAMsi sthagayitvA, yatyasmAddhetoH, jvaraM vidadhAti, tasmAtkAraNAllaGghanaM kurvIta|  laGghanamatropavAsaH|  tathA coktam|  "laGghanasyAviCeSoktAvupavAsaM prakalpayet|" iti|  ata evAyamapi vakSyati (Clo. 10)- "tasmAdAdoSapacanAjjvaritAnupavAsayet|" iti|  kadA laGghanaM kurvIta ?  ityAha-prAgUpeSu-pUrvalakSaNeSUtpannamAtreSveva, jvarAdau vA-utpannamAtre jvare sati|  kiM kurvan laGghanaM kurvIta ?  ityAha-balaM yatnena pAlayan,- prANAMstAtparyeNa rakSan, tadavirodhenetyarthaH|  nanu, kuta evaM vidhIyate ?  ityAha-balAdhiSThAnamityAdi|   yasmAdArogyaM-svAsthyaM, balAdhiSThAnam|  balamadhiSThAnaM-ACrayo, yasya tadevam|  tathA, kriyAkrama ArogyArthaH-svAsthyaprayojanaH|gh

A0 ra0-laGghanamAha-AmACayastha iti|  AmACayasthatvAdicatuSTayaM laGghanasAdhyatve hetuH|  prAgrUpajJAnadine laGghanaM kAryam|  tadatikrame [jvarAdau] rUpajJAnadine||  laGghanasyArogyArthatvAt, Arogyasya balAdhInatvAt, yAvanna balakSayastAvat [laGghanaM] kAryam|  vaGgasene tu (jvarAdhikAre Clo.141)-"jvarasya pUrvarUpeSu vartamAneSu buddhimAn|  pAyayetsarpiracchaM tu tataH sa labhate sukham||  vidhirmArutajeSveSa paittikeSu virecanam|  mRdu pracchardanaM tadvat kaphajeSu vidhIyate||  sarvaM tridoSajeSUktaM yathAdoSaM vikalpayet|" iti|  etacca prakRtideCakAlAdibhirdoSasya jJAne sati jJeyam, pUrvarUpeNAjJAnAt|  tatra ca laGghanamevAniSiddham|

laGghanaiH kSapite doSe dIpte~agnau lAghave sati||3|| svAsthyaM kSuttRD ruciH paktirbalamojaCca jAyate||3||

jvaracikitsitam adhyAyaH

sa0-laGghanaiH-upavAsaiH, doSe-pUrvokte, kSapite-kSayaM nIte, tathA~agnau dIpte-samiddhe sati, tathA lAghave~aGgAnAM sati, svAsthyAdi jAyate|  svAsthyaM-yathAprakRtitvam|   ruciH-annAbhilASaH|  paktiH-pAka Amasya|  balaM-utsAhaH|  ojaH-paraM dhAtutejaH|  kSapidhAturanukto~pi dhAtugaNe CiSTaprayogavaCAdaGgIkRtaH|  laGghanairiti jAtau bahuvacanam(?)|  tena kadAcidekenaiva laGghanena  kadAcidanekairdoSakSayo jAyata iti jJeyam|

A0 ra0-laGghanaphalamAha-laGghanairiti|  laGghanAni dvAdaCa vamana virecanabastinasyaraktasrAvadIpanapAcanAnnavarjanodakavarjanavyAyAmAtapamArutabhedAdbhavanti|

tatrotkRSTe samutkliSTe kaphaprAye cale male||4|| sahRllAsaprasekAnnadveSakAsaviSUcike||4|| sadyobhuktasya saJjAte jvare sAme viCeSataH||5|| vamanaM vamanArhasya CastaM--------------||5||

jvaracikitsitam adhyAyaH

sa0-tatra-tasminmale, utkRSTe-svajanmaguNakarmalakSaNato~adhike|  tathA, kaphaprAye-kaphabahule vAtAkhye pittAkhye veti sAmarthyAdgamyate|  samutkliSTe-svasthAnAccalite bahiraniryAte|   tathA, cale-Cithile, utkliSTe~api hi kadAcit sthAnAvaSTambhAdacalaH syAt|  etadeva kaphotkliSTAdikaM darCayati-sahRllAsetyAdi|  hRllAsAdInAM dvandvaH|  saha tairvartate yastasmin|  hRllAsaH-udvamanamivAnubhavaH|  udvamanaM-hRdayasya|  prasekaH-pAnIyasyeva niSThIvanam|  sadyobhuktasyetyAdi|  IdRCe male sati sadyaH kRtAhArasya jvare saJjAte viCeSeNa sAme jvare vamanArhasya vamanaM Castam|  vamanArhAH-vamanavirecanavidhau proktAH|

A0 ra0-jvaraviCeSe vamanamAha-tatrotkRSTa iti|  utkRSTadoSAdiSvekAdaCeSu jvareSu vamanaM Castam|  tathA~api sAme viCeSeNa|  utkRSTaH-atiprabhUtaH|  samutkliSTo-bahirnirjigamiSuH|  kaphaprAyaH-CleSmabahulaH|  calaH-caJcalaH|

-----------------------kuryAttadanyathA||5|| CvAsAtIsArasammohahRdrogaviSamajvarAn||6||

jvaracikitsitam adhyAyaH

sa0-anyathA-uktavidhiviparyayeNa, tat-vamanaM kRtaM, CvAsAdIn kuryAt|  tathA,-anutkliSTaH kaphapradhAnaH sthiro hRllAsAdirahito-viparItaH|

A0 ra0--anyathAvamane doSamAha-kuryAttaditi|

pippalIbhiryutAn gAlAn kaliGgairmadhukena vA||6|| uSNAmbhasA samadhunA pipetsalavaNena vA||7|| paTolanimbakarkoTavetrapatrodakena vA||7|| tarpaNena rasenekSormadyaiH kalpoditAni va||8|| vamanAni prayuJjIta balakAlavibhAgavit||8||

jvaracikitsitam adhyAyaH

sa0-gAlo-madanaphalam, asya nirapAyatvAcchreSThatvAcca pippalyAdidravyebhyo~anena sahopayogibhyo bahUpayogitayA pradhAnavibhaktyA prAgupanyAsaH|  anyathA "kalpayetsadRCAn bhAgAn pramANaM yatra noditam|" (hR. ka. a. 6/24)  iti madanaphalena pippalyAdInAM ca tulyaM pramANaM prApnuyAt|  pippalIbhiryutAn gAlAnathavA CakrayavairyutAnathavA madhuyaSTikayA vA yutAnathavoSNAmbunA mAkSikayutena vA saha pibet|  athavA paTolAdInAM patrodakena vA saha pibet|  athavA tarpaNAdibhiH pibet|  athavA kalpoditAni-vamanakalpoktAni vamanAni yogyAni prayuJjIta|  balakAlavibhAgaviditi asyAM dehabalAvasthAyAM tathA vyAdhibalAvasthAyAM cedaM vamanaM dAtuM yogyamiti yo vibhAgaM vetti sa balakAlavibhAgavit|

A0 ra0-vamanayogAnAha-pippalIbhiryutAniti|  pippalIndrayavayaSTImadhuyuktairmadanaphalaistrayaH|  samadhUSNodakasalava NodakapaTolAdyudakamade(nthe)kSurasamadyairAloDanArthe pratyekam|  kalpoditAni vA-yathAlAbhaM yathAsAtmyaM yathAdoSaM ca prayogArthamanekadhopadeCAt|  ata evoktaM balakAlavibhAgavit|  evaM sarvatra jJeyam|

kRte~akRte vA vamane jvarI kuryAdviCoSaNam||9|| doSANAM samudIrNAnAM pAcanAya CamAya ca||9||

jvaracikitsitam adhyAyaH

sa0-vamane yogyo yo jvarI sa kRte vamane, aparastu vamane~ayogyaH so~akRte vamane, viCoSaNaM-upavAsalakSaNaM, kuryAt|   evaM kRtavamano~akRtavamano vA jvarI sarvathA laGghanaM kuryAt|  kimartham ?  ityAha-doSANAM-vAtAdInAM, samudIrNAnAM-samantAtsamutthAnAM, pAcanAya-paktyarthaM, CamAya-CAntyarthaM ca|  nirAmANAM punaH samudIrNAnaM CAntyarthameva|

A0 ra0-annavarjanamAha-kRte~akRte veti|  kRte vamane vamanayogyatvAbhAvAdakRte vA|  apakvAnAM pAcanAya, pakvAnAM CamanAya|

doSeNa bhasmanevAgnau channe~annaM na vipacyate||10|| tasmAdAdoSapacanAjjvaritAnupavAsayet||10||

jvaracikitsitam adhyAyaH

sa0-doSeNa-AmAkhyena vAtAdinA vA sahaikalolIbhUtena, agnau channe-cchAdite, annamAmACayasthaM na vipacyate bhasmaneva|  yathA bAhye~agnau sthagite toyataNDulAdikaM sthAlIsthaM na vipacyate, tathaivAmACayasthamannamAmena channe~agnau na vipacyate|  yataCcaivaM tasmAddhetorAmadoSasya-pUrvoktasya, pacanaM-pAkamavadhiM kRtvA, jvaritAnnarAnupavAsayet|

A0 ra0-viCeSeNa yuktimAha-Amena bhasmaneveti|

tRSNagalpAlpamuSNAmbu pibedvAtakaphajvare||11||  tatkaphaM vilayaM nItvA tRSNAmACu nivartayet||11|| udIrya cAgniM strotAMsi mRdUkRtya viCodhayet||12|| lInapittAnilasvedaCakRnmUtrAnulomanam||12|| nidrAjADyAruciharaM prANAnAmavalambanam||13|| viparItamataH CItaM doSasaGghAtavarddhanam||13||

jvaracikitsitam adhyAyaH

sa0-[ tRSNak- ] tRSNAvAnnaraH, alpAlpaM-stokaM stokaM,  vAtakaphajvare uSNAmbu pibet|  tRSNagiti " svapitRSornajiG"  iti najiG|  alpAlpamiti "prakAre guNavacanasya" iti dvitvam|  tat-uSNAmbu pItaM, kaphaM-vAtastyAnaM, vilayaM nItvA-vilInavigrahatAmApAdya, tRSNAmACu nivartayet, tarpaNa svabhAvatvAt|  tathA, agnimudIrya-samiddhaM kRtvA, srotAMsi viCodhayet|  kiM kRtvA ?  mRdUkRtya,-teSAM srotasAM mArdavamutpAdya|   tathA, lInAni-apravRttasvarUpANi ca, tAni pittAnilasvedaCakRnmUtrANi ca, teSAmanulomanaM-pravartanam|  tathA, prANAnAM-jIvitAkhyAnAM, avalambanam|  taduSNaM jalamACritya tathA prANAH pravartanta ityarthaH|  anena coSNAmbukarmakathanavyAjena vAtakaphajvarasvarUpamapi kiJcit prakACayati|  yathA,-vAtaCoSitena kaphena styAnIbhUtenAtra tRSNA jAyate, tathA~adhikamagnimAndyam, srotasAmaCuddhatvam, tathA lInAni pittAdInyatra syuH, iti|

A0 ra0-udakavarjanamAha-tRSNagalpAlpamiti|  tacca na sarvathA, kiJcAlpAlpamuSNAmbu SaDaGgAdiCRtaM vA|  tatrAdyaM vAtakaphajvare, dvitIyaM pittajvarAdau|  tRSNak-tRSAvAn|          uSNAmbuguNAnAha-tatkaphaM vilayaM nItveti|  lInAnAM pittAdInAmanulomanam|    CItAmbudoSAnAha-viparItamataH CItamiti| doSasaGghAtaH-AmapittaCleSmarasAdisaGghAtaH|

uSNamevaMguNatve~api yuJjyAnnaikAntapittale||14|| udriktapitte davathudAhamohAtisAriNi||14|| viSamadyotthite grISme kSatakSINe~asrapittini||15||

jvaracikitsitam adhyAyaH

sa0-evaMguNamapyuSNAmbu ekAntapittale-kevalapittale jvariNi, vA, na yuJjyAditi|  tathA, udriktaM-adhikaM, pittaM yasmiMstasmiMCca na yuJjyAt|  tatha, taduSNAmbu davathvAdimati nare na yuJjyAt|  cakSurAdibhyo yastIvra USmA pravartate sa davathuH|   sarvAGgINastIvra USmA-dAhaH|  moho-bhramaH|  tathA, viSamadyAbhyAmutthite-jAte jvare|  tathA, grISmakAle|  tathA, kSataCca kSINaCca kSatakSINaH, kSataH-uraHkSataH, kSINo-dhAtvapacayavAn, tasmiMstathAbhUte nare na yuJjyAt|  tathA,asrapittini-raktapittavati [ nare, na yuJjyAt ]|

sa0-gAlo-madanaphalam, asya nirapAyatvAcchreSThatvAcca pippalyAdidravyebhyo~anena sahopayogibhyo bahUpayogitayA pradhAnavibhaktyA prAgupanyAsaH|  anyathA "kalpayetsadRCAn bhAgAn pramANaM yatra noditam|" (hR. ka. a. 6/24)  iti madanaphalena pippalyAdInAM ca tulyaM pramANaM prApnuyAt|  pippalIbhiryutAn gAlAnathavA CakrayavairyutAnathavA madhuyaSTikayA vA yutAnathavoSNAmbunA mAkSikayutena vA saha pibet|  athavA paTolAdInAM patrodakena vA saha pibet|  athavA tarpaNAdibhiH pibet|  athavA kalpoditAni-vamanakalpoktAni vamanAni yogyAni prayuJjIta|  balakAlavibhAgaviditi asyAM dehabalAvasthAyAM tathA vyAdhibalAvasthAyAM cedaM vamanaM dAtuM yogyamiti yo vibhAgaM vetti sa balakAlavibhAgavit|

AmACayastho hatvA~agniM sAmo mArgAn pidhAya yat||1|| vidadhAti jvaraM doSastasmAtkurvIta laGghanam||1|| prAgrUpeSu jvarAdau vA, balaM yatnena pAlayan||2|| balAdhiSThAnamArogyamArogyArthaH kriyAkramaH||2||

sa0-na kevalaM jvare pittaviruddhAni tyajet|  yAvat snAnAdIMCca tyajet|  snAnAdInAM pittaharatvACaGkayA sevyatve prApte~acintyaprabhAvatvAt jvare viruddhAnIti tatsevanaM niSedhati|  pradehaH candanAdyanulepaH|  pariCeSaM ca laGghanaM tyajet, yallaGghanamupayuktamupavAsalakSaNaM tato yadanyattat pariCeSam,-CuddhyAdyekAdaCaprakAraM ca, tattyajet|  upavAsalakSaNaM tu laGghanaM navajvare kartavyameva|

ajIrNa iva CUlaghnaM sAme tIvraruji jvare||18|| na pibedauSadhaM taddhi bhUya evAmamAvahet||18|| AmAbhibhUtakoSThasya kSIraM viSamaheriva||19||

sa0-yathA~ajIrNe sAme tIvrarujyapi CUlaghnamauSadhaM na pibet, pratyavAyabhayAt|  tathaiva sAme jvare dAruNapIDAvati tadAnImAmapaktyarthaM mustAparpaTakAdyauSadhaM kvAthAdikalpanAkalpitaM na pibet|   hi-yasmAt, tat-auSadhaM pItaM, asyAmavasthAyAmAmAbhibhUta koSThasya prayuktaM bhUya evAmamAvahet|  atra ca sAma ityukte bahvAma iti gamyate|  alpe hyajIrNe bheSajamanujJAtameva|  tathA covAca tantrakAraH (hR.sU.a.8/19)-"jIrNACane tu bhaiSajyaM yuJjyAtstabdhagurUdare|  doSaCeSasya pAkArthamagneH sandhukSaNAya ca||" iti|  tasmAtsAmo bahvAma iti bodhyam|  athAtra dRSTAntamAha - kSIraM viSamaheriva|  yathA kSIraM viSaghnamapyabhihitamahInAM tadeva viSaM kuryAt|

A0 ra0-niSedhe yuktimAha-ajIrNa iva CUlaghnamiti|  yathA viSaghnamapi kSIraM viSAbhibhUtakoSThe viSavardhanam,    evamAmaghnamapyauSadhaM AmAbhibhUtakoSThe Amavardhanam|  vaGgasene tu(?)-"vaiyAtyAdyadhiko~apyatra bhedaH kartumihecchati|  kadA tenaiva kartavyo bhedo naivAnyathA bhavet||  kaSAyaM pippalImUlatrivRccUrNAvacUrNikam|  sAmajvare kaphoraske etatsraMsanamucyate||  yavakSArAnvito yadvA kvAtho dhAnyapaTolayoH|" iti|

A0 ra0-peyopacAramAha-yuktaM laGghitaliGgairityAdi| yathAsvauSadhasiddhAbhiriti|  SaDahaM mRdutvaM vA-yathA~asmin jvare yadauSadhaM pAcanaM CamanaM vA|  maNDapUrvAbhiH-prathamadine maNDaH prayujyate, dvitIyadinAdau prayuktAbhiH|  AditaH-Adau, ante yUSai rasaiCcetyarthaH|  etena prathamadine maNDaH, dvitIyatRtIyacaturtheSu peyAH-yavAgUvilepyaH, "yavAgvAM ca" (Clo.37) iti vakSyamANatvAt, cakAreNa vilepI, paJcame yUSaudanaH, SaSThe rasaudanaH, iti SaDahamupAcaret|  yUSaudanarasaudanau yuktyA hi, "ityayaM SaDaho neyaH" (Clo.38) iti vakSyati|  jvaramRdutvAdyavekSya yAvadhyantare (?) prakArAntaraM svayamUhyam|      uktopacAraphalamAha-tasyAgniriti|  tasya-laGghitasya| tAbhiH-maNDAdirasayUSarasapeyAdibhiH|

sa0-kaSAyasya-mustAparpaTakAdeH, pAnaM kaSAyapAnam, tena|  tathA, pathyAnnaiH-peyAyUSAdibhiH, daCAha iti-anena prakAreNa, laGghite-atikrAnte|  tatheti prAyeNa kSINaH kaphaH sambhAvyate~ato daCAhe laGghita ityuktam|  AmajvarasaMjJAnivRttistu SaDahAdUrdhvaM saptame~ahnyaSTame vA~ahani jvarasya jAyate|  tathA ca muniH (ca. ci. a. 3/272)- "saptAhena hi pacyante saptadhAtugatA malAH|  nirAmaCcApyataH prokto jvaraH prAyo~aSTame~ahani||" iti|  tasmAt kaSAyapAnapathyAnnairityAdito daCAhe laGghite kaphe mande-kSINaprAye, sarpirdadyAt|  kimbhUte jvare ?  vAtapittottare,- vAtapittAdhike|  asyAmavasthAyAM pakveSu-nirAmeSu vAtAdidoSeSu, sarpirdadyAt|  pakveSu sarpirdattamamRtaM-mahAguNamityarthaH|  anyathA punaH apakveSu doSeSu kaphottare, tatsarpirdattaM viSopamaM-viSatulyaM, daCAhe~atikrAnte~api syAt|  ato~asyAmavasthAyAM sarpirdattaM jvarasya tadupadravANAM ca vRddhiM karoti, tasmAdasyAmavasthAyAM sarpiHpAnamayuktam|  tatra-kaphottare jvare sati, laGghanAdikramaM kuryAt|  kiyantaM kAlam ?  AkaphasaGkSayAt,- yAvatkaphasya-jvarakAriNo~adhikasya, saGkSyaH-samyak kSayaH, na dhAtukSayo~api yAvat|  yataH kaphajvare~api viDaGgAdisarpirvakSyati (Clo. 93)|         

A0 ra0-asarpiSkasya bhojanasyAvadhimAha-kaSAyapAnapathyAnnairiti|  pakveSu doSeSu daCAhe~anatIte~apyamRtopamaM sarpiH|  apakveSvatIte~api viSopamam, jvaropadravavardhanAt|  tatra-tathAvidhe cirapAkajvare, laGghanAdikramameva kuryAt, na sasarpiSkabhojanAdiSTaM  [bRM]haNakramam|  siddhayoge tu pathye viCeSa uktaH (jvarAdhikAre Clo. 42)- "CramopavAsAnilaje hito nityaM rasaudanaH||  mudgayUSaudanaCcApi deyaH kaphasamutthite|  sa eva sitayA yuktaH CItaH pittajvare hitaH||  mudgAmalakayUSastu vAtapittAtmake hitaH|  mudgAmalakayUSastu gADhaviTke vidhIyate||  CuSkamUlakayUSastu kaphavAtAtmake hitaH|  nimbakUlakayUSastu hitaH pittakaphAtmake||  kUlakaH-paTolam| laghunA paJcamUlena pippalyA saha dhAnyayA|  mahatyA paJcamUlyA tu vyAghrIduHsparCagokSuraiH||  siddhAni bhiSagannAni prayuJjIta yathAkramam|  vAtapitte CleSmapitte kaphavAte tridoSaje|| (Clo. 164)-yavakolakulatthAnAM mudgamUlakaCuNThayoH|  ekaikaM muSTimAhRtya pacedaSTaguNe jale||  paJcamuSTika ityeSa vAtapittakaphApahaH|  Casyate gulmaCUle ca CvAse kAse kSaye jvare||  mUlakaCuNThaH-CuSkamUlakam|  paJcamuSTikayUSeNa trikaNTakakRtena vA|  AdoSaCamanAtpathyaM trikaNTenaiva sAdhayet||  mahAdAho vidhAtavyo yUSaCcaNakasambhavaH|  mustAparpaTakairAto niryUhena prasAdhitaH||  kaphapittajvaraharo yUSo dhAnyapaTolayoH|  (vaGgasene jvarA. Clo. 416)-yavakoLakulatthaistu mudgamUlakaCuNThakaiH||  dhAnyAkaviCvaiH saMyuktairyUSo vAtakaphApahaH|  saptamuSTika ityeSa sannipAtajvarApahaH||  kaphavAtAmadoSaghnaH kaNThahRdvaktraCodhanaH||" iti|  iti navajvaraH|

rUkSaM hi tejo jvarakRttejasA rUkSitasya ca||84|| vamanasvedakAlAmbukaSAyalaghubhojanaiH||85|| yaH syAdatibalo dhAtuH sahacArI sadAgatiH||85|| tasya saMCamanaM sarpirdIptasyevAmbu veCmanaH||86||

sa0-rUkSaM yattejastajjvarakRt|  rUkSamiti vacanAddehoSmA jATharo~analo gRhyate, tasyaiva jvarakRttvAt|  tathoktam (hR.ni.a.2/3)- "malAstatra svaiHsvairduSTAH" ityAdi yAvat|  "jvaraM nirvartayanti te|" ityAdi jATharAnalasyaiva jvarakRtatvam|  tena jvarakRtA rUkSeNa tejasA rUkSitasya ca puMsaH sarpiH saMCamanam|   caCabdAccAnyasyApi|  ata evAha-vamanetyAdi|  vamanAdibhI raukSyakRdbhiH kRtaistadAnIM yaH syAt-bhavet, atibalaH-pravRddhatvAdatisamartho dhAtuH|  ko dhAtuH ?  sahacArI,-yaH saha carati tacchIlo vAtAkhyo dhAturagninA saha carati|  nanu, evaM parasparasahacarabhAvatve~agnirapi vAyunA saha carati, tato~agnisvabhAvatvAt pittAkhyo~api dhAturiha sahacArI prAptaH, tannivRttyarthaM sadAgatirityAha|  sadAgatitvaM vAyorevAnvarthatvenopapadyata iti pittasyAgrahaNam|  kiM kasya yathA saMCamanam ?  ambu veCmano-gRhasya, dIptasya-jvalitasya, jalaM yathA|

A0 ra0-sarpiHprayoge yuktimAha-rUkSamityAdi|  hi-yasmAt, jIrNAvasthAyAM nirAmaM tejo jvaraM karoti|  tena ca tejasA rUkSitasya jvariNaH, tathA vamanAdibhirnavajvaropakramai rUkSitasya, sahacArI-sakhA, punastadeva vardhayati|  tato dhAtUn nayati|  tasya-tathAnuvRttasya jIrNajvarasyAnuvRttau pradhAnabhUtasya vAyoH, sarpiH saMCamanam|

sa0-yasmAdghRtaM sarveSAM vAtapittajitAmagryaM yathA na tathA~anyAnyauSadhAni vAtapittajintIti|  ata eva prAgabhyadhAt (Clo. 82)- "sarpirdadyAtkaphe mande vAtapittottare jvare|" ityAdi|   yasmAccha ghRtaM saMskAramanurudhyate-anuvartate|  guNAntarAdhAnaM-saMskAraH|  taM ca yasmAdghRtaM suSTvatiCayavailakSaNyAdanurudhyate-AtmasAtkaroti|  tailAdirapi snehaH saMskAramanuvartate|  na tu yathA ghRtaM svaCaityamajahadeva saMskAramanuvartata iti|  etaccha snehavidhau pratipAditameva|  amumeva ca nyAyamaGgIkRtya munirapyavocat (ca.ni.a.1/40)-"nAnyaH snehastathA kaCcit saMskAramanuvartate|   yathA sarpirataH sarpiH sarvasnehottamaM matam||" iti|  hi-yasmAt, sutarAM saMskAramanurudhyate ghRtam, tasmAdghRtaM jIrNe vAtapittottare nirvikalpaM dadyAt|  kIdRCam ?  yathAsvauSadhasAdhitam,-yathAyathaM vyAdhipratipakSairauSadhaiH pakvam|

sa0-ghRtaM viparItaM jvaroSmANaM jayet|  jvaranirvartaka USmA-jATharo~analo, rUkSatIkSNAdiguNaH sa paktisthAnAnnirasto jvaranirvartako ghRtasya snigdhaCItatvAdiguNayogAdviparItaH, evaM viparItaM jvaroSmANaM ghRtaM jayet|  pittaM ca CaityataH-CaityAdghRtaM jayet, na snehAt, "pittaM sasnehaM" (hR.sU.a.1/11) iti vacanAt|  snehAt-snigdhatvAt, RtaM vAtaM jayet na tu CaityAt, "CIto~anilaH" (hR.sU.a.1/11) iti vacanAt|  kaphaM snigdhaCItatvAdinA tulyaM yogasaMskArAbhyAM jayet|  yogo-yuktiH kaphajvaraharairdravyaiH saha yojanA, saMskAro-guNAdhAnam, yogaCca saMskAraCca yogasaMskArau, tAbhyAM ghRtaM kaphaM jayet|  nanu, viparItaM jvaroSmANaM ghRtaM jayediti na ghaTate, ghRtasyAgnivRddhihetutvAt|  tathA ca vakSyati (hR.chi.a.10/68)-"snehameva paraM vidyAddurbalAnaladIpanam|   nAlaM snehasamiddhasya CamAyAnnaM sugurvapi||" iti|  atrAcakSmahe|  ghRtaM snehanatvadIpanatvAbhyAM vAtaCamanaM kurvaJjvaroSmAkSepatvaM vAtasya vinivArya jvaroSmaNo~api raukSyataikSNyAdiyutasya ghRtaM viparItaguNatvAcchamaM karoti, na vRddhim|  nanu, yathA  snehAdvAtaM Camayati tathA tata eva snehAtkimiti ghRtaM samAnaguNatvAt pittaM Camayati ? bRUmaH|  jIrNajvare laGghanAdibhiratirUkSeNa jvaroSmaNA pittaM rUkSameva sampannaM snehabhAgaparikSayAnna sasneham, ataH kathaM kRtvA jvarayatu ?|  tacca ghRtaM pittameva Camayati, na vAtaM kopayati, dravyaprabhAvatvAtsasnehanatvAcca|

athAtaH kAsacikitsitaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2|| kevalAnilajaM kAsaM snehairAdAvupAcaret||1|| vAtaghnasiddhaiH snigdhaiCca peyAyUSarasAdibhiH||1|| lehairdhUmaistathA~abhyaGgasvedasekAvagAhanaiH||2|| bastibhirbaddhaviDvAtaM, sapittaM tUrdhvabhaktikaiH||2|| ghRtaiH kSIraiCca, sakaphaM jayetsnehavirecanaiH||3||

sa0-kevalAnilajaM kAsaM-doSAntarAsaMsRSTaM, snehaiH-vAtaghnasiddhaiH, AdAvupAcaret|  nanu,Cuddhasya vAtasya snehaireva pradhAnopakrama AdimadhyAvasAneSu, na punaranya upakramaH, tasmAdAdAvityanena nArthaH|  atrocyate|  vAtaH kevalo doSAntarAvRtamArgaH kAsasya kAraNam, na tvanAvRtamArgaH|  tathA ca kAsasamprAptAvuktam (hR. ni. a. 3/19)-tatrAdho vihato~anilaH|  UrdhvaM pravRttaH" ityAdi|  evaM vAtasya vihatau yo doSaH kAraNaM kaphAdiH, tasya rUkSAdyupakrameNaiva CamaM kRtvA~anantaraM kAsena sahopakramamasya bhiSajaH kuryuriti teSAM bhrAntinirasARthamAdAvityuktam|  tathA, peyAdibhirupAcaret|  tathA, baddhau viDvAtau yasminkAse taM bhastibhirupAcaret|  sapittaM ca vAtakAsamUrdhvabhaktikaiH-bhaktasamanantaraM pIyamAnairghRtairbhojayet kSIraiCca|  Urdhvabhaktikairiti UrdhvabhaktAdibhiH|  mayuravyaMsakAditvAt samAsaH, adhyAtmAditvAThThaJ|  tathA, vAtaghnasiddhairityeSvapi yojyam|  tathA, sakaphaM vAtakAsaM snehavirecanairupAcaret|

vItatvagasthikUSmANDatulAM svinnAM punaH pacet||114|| ghaTTayan sarpiSaH prasthe kSaudravarNe~atra ca kSipet||114|| khaNDAcchataM kaNACuNThyordvipalaM jIrakAdapi||115|| trijAtadhAnyamaricaM pRthagardhapalAMCakam||115|| avatAritaCIte ca datvA kSaudraM ghRtArdhakam||116|| khajenAmathya ca sthApyaM tannihantyupayojitam||116|| kAsahidhmAjvaraCvAsaraktapittakSatakSayAn||117|| uraHsandhAnajananaM medhAsmRtibalapradam||117|| aCvibhyAM vihitaM hRdyaM kUSmANDakarasAyanam||118||

sa0-gogajAdInAM CakRdrasaM bahukaphaH samAkSikamekaikaCo lihyAt, athavA pibet|  athavA, catuSpadAM carmAdijAM maSIM pibet|  CvAsI kaphAdhiko~aCvagandhAyACca maSIM tadvat-madhunA, lihyAt|  CaThIpauSkarAdiN vA madhunA lihyAt|  pauSkaraM sakaNaM vA lihyAt|  gairikAdIn vA lihyAt, kapitthajaM svarasaM vA|  kapitthasvarasena dhAtryAdIn lihyAt|  pathyAviDaGgAdIn ghRtakSaudreNa vA lihyAt|  kolAdIn vA pUrvavallihyAt, guDAdIn vA|  athavA, lehasya-agastyAdeH, auSadhAnAM cUrNAni mAMsarasAdibhiH pibet|

cikitsAsthAnam

rAjayakSmAdicikitsitAdhyAyaH

 )
balino bahudoSasya snigdhasvinnasya Codhanam||1||  UrdhvAdho yakSmiNaH kuryAtsasnehaM yanna karCanam||1||  athAto rAjayakSmAdicikitsitaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-evaMbhUtasya rAjayakSmiNa UrdhvAdhaH CodhanaM-vamanaM virecanaM ca kuryAt, asnigdhasvinnasya CodhanAnarhatvAt|  snigdhasvinnagrahaNaM tvatiCayArtham|  kimbhUtaM Codhanam ?  sasnehaM,-ISatsnigdham, tathA yanna karCanaM-dehasya na kSapaNam|  yakSmaNa iti "dvandvopatApa" ityAdinA inirmitvarthAMyaH|

A0 ra0-atha rAjayakSmacikitsitam|  tatra CodhanamAha-balino bahudoSasyeti|

phayasA phalayuktena madhureNa rasena vA||2||  sarpiSmatyA yavAgvA vA vamanadravyasiddhayA||2||  vamet-----------------------------------------||3||

A0 ra0-vamanamAha----
payaseti|  rasena-mAMsarasena|

sa0-phayasA-kSIreNa madanaphalAnvitena, rAjayakSmI vamet|  evaM tena vamanaM kAryam|  madhureNa vA mAMsarasena madanaphalayuktena vamet|  athavA, yavAgvA GRtavatyA tathA vamanadravyeNa-madanaphalAdinA, siddhayA vamet|

 ----------virecanaM dadyAtrivRcCyAmAnRpadrumAn||3||  CarkarAmadhusarpirphiH payasA tarpaNena vA||3||  drAkSAvidArIkACmaryamAMsAnAM vA rasairyutAn||4||

sa0-trivRdAdInekaikaCaH CarkarAmadhusarpiryutAn virecanaM dadyAt|  athavA payasA trivRdAdIn dadyAt|  tarpaNena vA saha trivRdAdIn virecanaM dadyAt|  rasairiti bahuvacananirdeCAd drAkSAdInAM pRthagrasairiti bodhyam|

A0 ra0-virecanamAha----
virecanamiti|  CarkarAditribhiryuktaiH|  drAkSAdicaturbhiH pRthak|  vaGgasene (rAjayakSmAdhikAre Clo. 30)-"balino bahudoSasya paJcakarmANi kArayet|  yakSmiNaH kSINaCukrasya tatkRtaM syAdviSopamam||  CukrAyattaM balaM puMsAM malAyattaM ca jIvitam|  ato viCeSAtsaMrakSedyakSmiNo malaretasI"|| iti|-

 CuddhakoSThasya yuJjIta vidhiM bRMhaNadIpanam||4||  hRdyAni cAnnapAnAni vAtaghnAni laghUni ca||5||

sa0-CuddhakoSThasya sato yakSmaNo bRMhaNaM dIpanaM ca vidhiM prayuJjIta|  tathA~annapAnAni hRdyAni-hRdayapriyANi tathA vAtaghnAni laghUni ca yuJjIta|  bAhulyenaitaduktam|

A0 ra0-Cuddhasya kRtyamAha----CuddhakoSThasyeti|

 CAliSaSTikagodhUmayavamudgaM samoSitam||5||  [laghuma(cA)cyutavIryaM ca sujaraM balakRcca yat||6||  ]
AjaM kSIraM ghRtaM mAMsaM kravyAnmAMsaM ca CoSajit||6||

A0 ra0-yakSmaghnAnnapAnamAha----CAliSaSTiketi|  samA-saMvatsaraH|  kravyAnmAMsACinAM mAMsam|

sa0-tathA CAlyAdikaM varSoSitaM yuJjIta|  AjaM kSIraM ghRtaM mAMsaM tathA kravyAnmAMsaM ca kSayajit|

 kAkolUkavRkadvIpigavACvanakuloragam||6||  gRdhrAphAsaKaroSTraM ca hitaM CadmopasaMhitam||7||  jJAtaM jugupsitaM taddhi CardiSe na balaujase||7||

sa0-kAkolUkAdikametanmAMsaM hitam|  kimbhUtam ?  CadmanopasaMhitam-kAkAdayastittiryAdiCabhdena deyA ityarthaH|  kimityevaM kriyate ?  ityAha-yasmAttat jugupsitaM jJAtaM sat CardiSe sampadyate, na bhalAya na vaujase|

A0 ra0-kAkAdimAMsabhakSaNopAyamAha----kAkolUketi|

 mRgAdyAH phittakaphayoH phavane phrasahAdayaH||8||  vesavArIkRtAH pathyA rasAdiSu ca kalpitAH||8||  phRSTAH sarpaSatailena sarpiSA vA yathAyatham||9||  rasikA mRdavaH snigdhAH paTudravyAphisaMskRtAH||9||  hitA maulakakaulatthAstadvadyUSACca sAdhitAH||10||

A0 ra0-mAMsapAkaprakAramAha----
mRgAdyA iti|  mRgAdyACcatvAro vargAH|  prasahAdyACcatvAraH|  yathAyathaM-pitte sarpiSA, kaphavAtayoH sarSapatailena|  rasikAH-surasAH|  paTu-dravyalakSaNam|  yUSAnAha-hitA iti| tadvat-mAMsarasavat|-

sa0-mRgAdyAH-mRgaviSkirapratudA[daya]H, pittakaPayorhitAH|  vAte [prasahAdayaH-] prasahamahAmRgApUcarAdayo, hitAH|  kimbhUtAH ? vesavArIkRtAH-piSTAH, pathyAH|  tathA, rasAdayo-mAMsarasAdayaH kalpitAH|  tathA, sarSapatailena bhRSTAH, sarpiSA vA deCakAlAdyapekSayA yathAyathaM bhRSTAH|  tathA, rasikAH-praCastarasavantaH, praCaMsAyAM hyeSa matvarthIyaH|  mRdavo-na tIkSNAH|  tathA snigdhAH saindhavAdibhiH kRtasaMskArA hitAH|  tadvat-tathaiva, mUlakAdikRtA yUSAH|

 sapippalIkaM sayavaM sakulatthaM sanAgaram||10||  sadADimaM sAmalakaM snigdhamAjaM rasaM pibet||11||  tena SaDvinivartante vikArAH pInasAdayaH||11||

sa0-pippalyAdibhiH saMskRtamAjaM mAMsarasaM ghRtAdisnehena snigdhaM pibet, ityatra mAMsAnAmavaCyaM snigdhatve~api snigdhagrahaNameSAM ghRtAdisnehena snigdhatvaM kAryamiti pratipAdayati|  tena rasena pItena, SaT vikArAH pInasAdayaH-"pInasaCvAsakAsAM samUrdhasvararujaH" (hR.ni.a.5/13), CAmyanti|

A0 ra0-AjamAMsarasamAha----
sapippalIkamiti|  pInasAdayaH-ekAdaCasvAdyAH SaT|  asya pAkavidhiH [ siddhayoge rAjayakSmAdhikAre Clo.3]-"dravyato dviguNaM mAMsaM sarvato~aSTaguNaM jalam|  pAdasthaM saMskRtaM cAjye SaDaGgo yUSa ucyate||" iti|  saGgrahe tu (ci.a. 7)-"koladADimaniryAsapiSTayA~asthivihInayA|  drAkSayA svacchadhAnyAmlaplutAloDitakalkayA||  kAryaH sauvarcalavyoSapatrailAdIpyakAnvitaH|  samAkSikaH sakarpUraH salavaGgaH sakesaraH|  candrakAnto yathArthAkhyaH CoSahA~agnirucipradaH|  CuktAmradhAtrIsvarasairdrAkSAyAH kalkitaM palam||  guDaSaTpalasaMyuktaM yuktaM ClakSNaiCca kArSikaiH|  vRkSAmladhAnyadraviDIrAjikAdADimoSaNaiH|  palena nAgapuSpasya kiJcitsauvarcalena ca|  sasevyapatratvaktoyaH surasArasamUrcchitaH||  bhUribhUstRNako rAgaH kalpyo rucyaH samAkSikaH||" iti|  draviDI-elA|  toyaM-vAlakam|  surasArasaH-tulasIrasaH, tena mUrcchitaH-ekalolIbhAva nItaH|  bhUri-udbhUtarasagandhi, bhUstRNaM yatra sa tathA|  rAgaH-pAnakabhedaH|

 pibecca sutarAM madyaM jIrNaM srotoviCodhanam||12||  pittAdiSu viCeSeNa madhvariSTAcCavAruNIH||12||  siddhaM vA paJcamUlena tAmalakyA~athavA jalam||13||  parNinIphiCcatasRphirdhAnyanAgarakeNa vA||13||  kalpayeccAnukUlo~asya tenAnnaM Cuci yatnavAn||14||

sa0-atitarAM jIrNaM purANaM, ca madyaM srotoviCuddhikaraM pibhet|  pittAdiSu pittakaPavAteSu, yathAyuktyA madhvAdIn viCeSeNa pibhet|  athavA, paJcamUlena-hrasvena, siddhaM jalaM pibhet|  tAmalakyA vA jalaM parNinIbhiCcatasRbhirvA jalaM pakvaM pibhet|  dhAnyanAgarakAbhyAM vA CRtaM pibhet|  asya ca-yakSmiNaH, anukUlo yatnavAn paricArako~annaM Cuci tena-paJcamUlAdijalena, kalpayet|  anukUlAdigrahaNamatrAtiCayArtham|

pibecceti|  sutarAM-anyebhyo dravyebhyaH|  madhu-mArdvIkaM,tatpitte|  ariSTaM kaphe|  acchavAruNI vAte|  

				pAnIyamAha-siddhaM veti|

 daCamUlena payasA siddhaM mAMsarasena vA||14||  balAgarbhaM ghRtaM yojyaM kravyAnmAMsarasena vA||15||  sakSaudraM payasA siddhaM sarpirdaCaguNena vA||15||

AmACayotkleCabhavAH prAyaCcchardyo hitaM tataH||1||  laGghanaM prAgRte vAyorvamanaM tatra yojayet||1||  balino bahudoSasya vamataH pratataM bahu||2||  athAta-chardihRdrogatRSNAcikitsitaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH 
iti ha smAhuratreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-utkleCanaM-utkleCo,-doSANAmucchUnAvasthaiva|  AmACayotkleCAt sambhavo-janma, yAsAM tA AmACayotkleCabhavAH prAyaCcchardyo yatastasmAt prAk-prathamaM, laGghanaM hitam|  prAyograhaNaM vAtajAyAM chardyAmAmACayotkleCAsambhavArthaM vAyorRte tadyojayet|  kArye kAraNopacArAdevaM nirdiSTam|  vAtajAM hi chardi muktvA~anyAsu chardiSu laGghanaM kAryam|  laGghane kRte~apyanu paCAntavegAsu tatra-tAsu chardiSu, vamanaM kAryam|  balinaH puMso-na durbalasya, athavA bahudoSasya, tathA pratataM-anArataM, bahu vamato vamanaM yojayet|

 tato virekaM kramaCo hRdyaM madyaiH phalAmphuphiH||2||  kSIrairvA saha sa hyUrdhvaM gataM doSaM nayatyadhaH||3||  CamanaM cauSadhaM rUkSadurbalasya tadeva tu||3||

sa0-tato-vamanAdanantaraM virekauSadhaM kramaCo-na sahasA, yojayet|  kimbhUtaM virekadravyam ?  hRdyaM-hRdayAya hitam|  kaiH saha ?  madyaiH-mArdvIkAdibhiH|  tathA, PalAmbhubhiH-CobhanadrA kSAdiPalaniSpAditavAribhiH|  athavA, kSIraiH-gokSIrAdibhiH saha|  kimevaM syAt ?  ityAha-sa hyUrdhvamityAdi|  yasmAtsaH-virekaH, UrdhvaM gataM doSaM Cardyanugamadho nayati|  na kevalaM CodhanaM-vamanaM virecanaM vA, tatra yojayet|  yAvacCamanamapi yadauSadhaM tadapi tatra yojayet|  rUkSadurbhalasya punaH puMsastadeva-Camanameva, yojayet, CodhanAsahatvAt|

 pariCuSkaM priyaM sAtmyamannaM laghu ca Casyate||4||  upavAsastathA yUSA rasAH kAmbalikAH khalAH||4||  CAkAni lehA bhojyAni rAgaSADavapAnakAH||5||  bhakSyAH CuSkA vicitrACca phalAni snAnagharSaNam||5||  gandhAH_ sugandhayo gandhaphalapuSpAnnapAnajAH||6||  bhuktamAtrasya sahasA mukhe CItAmbusecanam||6||

madAtyayAdicikitsitAdhyAyaH

 )
yaM doSamadhikaM paCyettasyAdau pratikArayet||1||  kaphasthAnAnuphUrvyA ca tulyadoSe madAtyaye||1||  AthAto madAtyayAdicikitsitaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

saM-yaM doSaM-tatra madAtyaye vAtAdikaM, ulbaNaM phaCyet-lakSayejjAnIyAt|  tasya-doSasya, Adau-phrathamata eva, phratikArayet-phratikAraM kuryAt|  evaM viSamadoSo madAtyayaCcikitsyaH|  tulyadoSe phunarmadAtyaye kaphasthAnAnuphUrvyA doSAn phratikArayet| 


	kimetyevaM kriyate ?  ityAha-

 pittamArutaparyantaH prAyeNa hi madAtyayaH||2||

saM-hi-yasmAt, kAlakrameNa pittamArutAvasAno bhAhulyena madAtyayaH syAt|  prathamaM kaPasyAdhikyam|  tataH pittamArutA vadhikau bhavataH|  kaPasthAnAnupUrvIvyAKyAnaM jvaracikitsite (Clo.148) vyAKyAtam|

 hInamithyAtipItena yo vyAdhirupajAyate||2||  samapItena tenaiva sa madyenopaCAmyati||3||

sa0-hInamithyAtipItena madyena yo vyAdhirutpadyate, saH-vyAdhiH, tenaiva madyena samapItena-samyaGmAtrayA pItena, CAmyati|  "yAvad dRSTerna sambhrAntiryAvanna kSobhate manaH|  tAvadeva virantavyaM madyAdAtmavatA sadA||" (Clo.14) ityevaM lakSaNaM pAnaM samameva pItam|  yenaiva mArdvIkenAthavA mAdhavena gADAdinA vA yo jAto vyAdhiH sa tenaiva mArdvIkAdinA CAmyati|  


	kuta evaM syAt ? ityAha-

 madyasya viSasAdRCyAt------------------------||3||

sa0-yathA tIkSNAdibhirdaCabhirguNairviSaM yuktaM tathaiva tatsaGkhyA taireva guNairmadyamapi yuktam|  tataCca madyenaiva CAntiryuktA|  


	nanu, yadi viSasAdRCyaM madyasya, tato yathA viSasya viSAntareNa CAntistathA madyasyApi madyAntareNa CAntiH prAptetyACaGkhyAha-

 --------------viSaM tUtkarSavRttiphiH||3||  tIkSNAdiphirguNairyogAdviSAntaramapekSate||4||

sa0-satyametat|  evaM prAptam|  kintu guNairdaCabhirutkarSavRttibhiH-adhikaCaktisvarUpaiH, tIkSNAdibhiryogAt-sambandhAt, viSaM viSAntaramapekSate|  na tu taddhInAttadeva svotthe roge praCamAyAlam|  madyaM tu hInavRttibhirdaCabhirguNairyogAnna madyAntaramapekSate|  evaM tIkSNAdInAM guNAnAM hInotkarSabhedAdviSAnmadyasya vailakSaNyam|

 tIkSNoSNenAtimAtreNa pItenAmlavidAhinA||4||  madyenAnnarasakledo vidagdhaH kSAratAM gataH||5||  yAn kuryAnmadatRNmohajvarAntardAhavibhramAn||5||  madyotkliSTena doSeNa ruddhaH srotaHsu mArutaH||6||  sutIvrA vedanA yACca CirasyasthiSu sandhiSu||6||  jIrNAmamadyadoSasya prakAGkSAlAghave sati||7||  yaugikaM vidhivadyuktaM madyameva nihanti tAn||7||

saM-svabhAvata eva tIkSNoSNena tathA~atimAtreNa tathA~amlavidAhinA madyena pItenAnnarasakledo vidagdhaH kSAratAM ca gato yan madAdIn kuryAt|  tathA mAruto madyotkliSTena doSeNa srotaHsuruddho yA dAruNA mUrdhAdiSu vedanAH kuryAt tAn-madAdIn, tACca vedanAH madyameva yaugikaM vidhinA yuktaM nihanti|  kimbhUtasya puruSasya ?  jIrNAmamadyadoSasya, tathA prakAGkSAyAM lAghavesati, te ca tACca tAn, "pumAn striyA" ityekaCeSaH|  nanu, yadi madyameva tAnnihanti tataCcikitsAntarArambho na yuktaH|  maivam|  bahvayo hi cikitsAH pratirogaM proktAH|  tasmAccikitsAntaropanyAso yukta eva|  


	nanu, kathaM tAn madyameva nihanti ?  ityAha-

 kSAro hi yAti mAdhuryaM CIghramamlopasaMhitaH||8||  madyamamleSu ca CreSThaM doSaviSyandanAdalam||8||

sa0-yasmAt kSAro~amlopasaMhito drAgeva mAdhuryaM yAti|  amleSu madhye madyaM doSaviSyandanAt [alaM-] paryAptam|

 tIkSNoSNAdyaiH purA proktairdIpanAdyaistathA guNaiH||9||  sAtmyatvAcca tadevAsya dhAtusAmyakaraM param||9||

sa0-purA-madAtyayanidAnoktaistIkSNoSNAdyairguNaiH (ni. a. 6/1) tathA madyavargoktairdIpanAdyairguNaiH (sU. a. 5/62) karaNabhUtaiH, tadeva-madyaM, suSThu dhAtusAmyakaram|  dhAtusAmyakaramiti hetau TaH|

 saptAhamaSTarAtraM vA kuryAtpAnAtyayauSadham||10||  jIryatyetAvatA pAnaM kAlena vipathACritam||10||

sa0-saptAhamathavA~aSTarAtraM pAnAtyayauSadhaM kuryAt-nAdhikaM kAlam|  yata etAvatA kAlena vimargasthaM tat pAnaM-madyapAnaM, pariNamati|

 paraM tato~anuphadhnAti yo rogastasya pheSajam||11||  yathAyathaM prayuJjIta kRtapAnAtyayauSadhaH||11||

sa0-tataH-tasmAtkAlAt, paraM-UrdhvaM, yo rogo~anubadhnAti, tasya-rogasya, kRtapAnAtyayauSadhaCca yathAsvaM bheSajaM prayuJjIta|  


	iti sAmAnyena cikitsitamuktvA viCeSeNAha-

 tatra vAtolbaNe madyaM dadhAtipiSTakRtaM yutam||12||  bIjapUrakavrukSAmlakoladADimadIpyakaiH||12||  yavAnIhapuSAjAjIvyoSatrilavaNArdrakaiH||13||  CulyirmAMsairharitakaiH snehavadbhiCca sakubhiH||13||  uSNasnigdhAmlalavaNA medyamAMsarasA hitAH||14||  AmrAmrAtakapeCIbhiH saMskRtA rAgaSADavAH||14||  godhUmamASavikRtirmRduCcitrA mukhapriyA||15||  ArdrikArdrakakulmASasuktamAMsAdigarbhiNI||15||  surabhirlavaNA CItA nirgadA vA~acchhavAruNI||16||  saraso dADimAt kvAthaH paJcamUlAtkanIyasaH||16||  CuNThIdhAnyAttathA mustusuktAmbhocchhAmlakAJjikam

sa0-[tatra-] teSu madAtyayeSu madhye, vAtAdhike madAtyaye piSTakRtaM madyaM dadyAt|  bIjapUrakAdibhirdeCasAtmyAdivaCAdyastaiH samastairyathAyogayuktam|  tathA, medyasya-medurasya, mAMsasyarasA hitAH|  kimbhUtAH ?  uSNAH snigdhAmalalavaNACca|  tathA, rAgAH SADavACcAmrAmrAtakapeCIbhiH saMskRtA hitAH|  lakSaNameSAmRtucaryAmuktam (hR.sU.a.3/30)|  tathA, godhUmamASayorvikRtirhitA|  kimbhUtA ? mRduH-atIkSNA, citrA-nAnAprakArA, mukhapriyA-vadanarucikRt|  tathA, ArdrikAdigarbhiNI|  [tathA,] acchavAruNI ca hitA|  kimbhUtA ?  surabhirlavaNA CItA ca|  tathA nirgadA-purANA|  tathA, dADimAtsvaraso hitaH|  paJcamUlAt kanIyaso-hRsvAt, kvAthaH|  CuNThIdhAnyAcca kvAtho hitaH|  tathA, mastvAdi hitam|  tathA, abhyaJjanAdi uSNaM hitam|  prAvaraNaM-AcchhadanaM, ghanaM hitam, agarujaCca dhUpo ghano-bahulo, hitaH|  agarukuGkumapaGkAnulepanaM hitam|  tathA, priyA harSeNa-prItyA, AliGganaM-pariSvaGgaH, tatra yuktAH, saMvAhaneSu-CarIramardaneSu ca, yuktA hitAH|  kucACcoravaCca CroNayaCca tena CAlante yAstA evam|  tathA, yauvane noSNA~aGgayaSTiH-CarIralatA, yAsAM tA evam|

 pittolbaNe bahujalaM CArkaraM madhu vA yutam||19||  rasairdADimaKarjUraphavyadrAkSAparUSajaiH||20||  suCItaM sasitAsaktu yojyaM tAdRk ca pAnakam||20||  svAduvargakaSAyairvA yuktaM madyaM samAkSikam||21||

saM-pittAdhike madAtyaye bhahujalaM CArkaraM-madyaviCeSaM yojyam|  madhu-makSikaM vA, rasairdADimAdijairyuktam|  tacca suSThu CItaM kRtvA yojyam|  paruSakANyatra madhurANi yojyAni nAmlAni, teSAM kaPapittakaratvAt|  tathA ca muniH (ca. sU. a. 27/132) "amlaM paruSakaM drAkSA bhadarANyArukANi ca|  pittaCleSmaprakopINi" iti|  tAdRk ca-suCItaM, panakaM yojyam|  kimbhUtam ? saha sitAsaktubhirvatate yattadevam|  saktavaCca lAjAnAM yojyAH, yogyataratvAt, na tu yavAnAm|  tathA, svAduvargasya kvAthena saMyuktaM madyaM  samAkSikaM yojyam|

 CAliSaSTikamaCnIyAcCaCAjaiNakapiJjalaiH||21||  satInamudgAmalakapaTolIdADimai rasaiH||22||

sa0-CAliSaSTika bhuJjIta|  kaiH saha ? CaCAdijai rasairde CAdisAtmyavaCAt satInAdijaiCca rasaiH|

sa0-tRDvidAhavAn madAtyayI kaphapittaM samutkliSTaM-samutthitaM svasthAnAccyutAbhAsaM, samyagvamet|  kiM kRtvA ?  ambu CItaM pItvA, madyaM vA bhUriNekSurasena saMyutaM pItvA, athavA drAkSArasaM pItvA|  paraM-anantaraM, saMsargI tarpaNAdiH suSThu hitaH|  kRtavamanAdikasyAnantaraM peyAdikramaH saMsargItyucyate|  evaM kRte sati tasya-madAtyayinaH, agnirdIpyate|  kimbhUtaH ?  doSaCeSasyAnnasya-AhArasya ca, pAcanaH|

 kAse saraktaniSThIve pArCvastanarujAsu ca||24||  tRSNAyAM savidAhAyAM sotkleCe hRdayorasi||25||  guDUcIphadramustAnAM paTolasyAthava rasam||25||  saCRGgapheraM yuJjIta tittiripratiphojanam||26||

 madyAtipAnAdabdhAtau kSINe tejasi coddhate||29||  yaH CuSkagalatAlovSTho jihvAM niSkRSya ceSTate||30||  pAyayetkAmato~ambhastaM niCIthapavanAhatam||30||

sa0-madyAtipAnAddhetorabdhAtau kSINe-alpIbhUte, tejasi coddhate-kSobhite sati, yaH puruSaH CuSkagalatAlvoSThaH san jihvAM niSkRSya-niHsArya, ceSTate-itaCcetaCca luThti, taM-naraM, kAmataH-icchayA, ambho niCIthe yaH pavanastenAhataM pAyayet|

 yadidaM karma nirdiSTaM pRthagdoSabalaM prati||43||  sannipAte daCavidhe tacCheSe~api vikalpayet||44||

sa0-"tatra vAtolbaNe madyaM" (Clo. 12) ityAdi|  "pittolabaNe bahujalaM" (Clo 19) ityAdi, tathA "ullekhanopavAsAbhyAM jayecchleSmolbaNaM" (Clo 33) ityAdi ca trividhaM sannipAtaM pRthagdoSabalaM prati lakSIkRtya karma nirdiSTaM karmadamuktam|  na kevalamatra trividhe sannipAte, CeSe~api daCavidhe sannipAte vikalpayet-vividhaM kRtvA kalpayet,- kuryAT, vaidya iti CeSaH|  etaduktaM bhavati,-vAtolbaNe madAtyayaje sannipAte yatkarma nirdiSTaM tathA pittolbaNe madAtyayaje sannipAte yatkarma nirdiSTaM tadeva vAtapittolbaNe kuryAt|  evaM doSabalamapekSya sarvasmin madAtyaye cikitsitaM kuryAT|  sa daCavidhaH sannipAtaH CiSyahitAya padyena pradarCyate,-"utkarSeNa tveko madyena dvau tadA~a~adimaH|  utkarSeNa yadA dvau tu madhyenaiko dvitIyakaH||  eko madhyena doSaH syAd dvAvalpena tRtIyakaH|  utkarSeNaika eva syAdalpena dvau caturthakaH||  utkarSeNa yadA dvau tu alpenaikaCca paJcamaH|  eko~alpena tu madhyena dvau doSAviti SaSThakaH||  utkarSeNa samastAH syurevaM bhavati saptamaH|  madhyena sarve~api yadA tadA bhavati cASTamaH||  alpena sarve~api yadA tadA tu navamaH smRtaH|  alpeneko madhyenaikastadA tvantya iti sphuTAH||  sannipAtasya muninA daCa bhedAH prakIrtatAH|" iti|

 tvaGnAgapuSpamagadhAmaricAjAjidhAnyakaiH||44||  paruSakamadhUkailAsurAhvaiCca sitAnvitaiH||45||  sakapittharasaM hRdyaM pAnakaM CaCibovitam||45||  madAtyayeSu sarveSu peyaM rucyagnidIpanam||46||

sa0-tvagAdibhiH CarkarAnvitaiH kapittharasayuktaM karpUrakRtAdhivAsaM pAnakaM sarveSu madAtyayeSu pAtavyaM rucyagnivRddhikaram|

 nAvikSophya mano madyaM CarIramavihanya vA||46||  kuryAnmadAtyayaM tasmAdiSyata harSaNI kriyA||47||

sa0-madyaM yasmAnmAnasaM nAvikSobhya-api tu manasaH prakSobhaNaM kRtvA, na ca CarIrasya vihananamakRtvA, evameva yathA kathaJcinmadAtyayaM kuryAt|  yataCcaivaM tasmAddhetorharSotpAdikA kriyA eSTavyA|  nAkSobhyetyayaM pATho na CreyAn, lyabAdeCasyAtra durlabhatvAt|

sa0-yA-surA, aCvinaM mahattejo-dIptaM, dadhAti|  ACvinamityaCvinoridamityaN, "nastaddhite" iti Tilope prApte "inaNyanapatye" iti prakRtibhAvaH|  yA ca surA sArasvataM balaM utsAhaM, endraM ca vIryaM-Cakti, vaiSNavaM ca prabhAvaM-mAhAtmyaM, dadhAti|  yA ca madanasyAstraM-praharaNaM, balabhadrasya yA puruSARthaH-paraM prayojanam|  yA ca sautrAmANyAM yajJe dvijAsye hutACe ca hUyate|  yA ca mahodadheH sarvauSadhisampUrNAddevadAnavairviloDyamAnAt lakSmyAdibhiH sahotpannA|  yA ca surA madaCaktimatyajantI bahubhirmadhvAdibhirAkAraiH sthitA|  yAM surAM pItvA vilAsinyo mRgalocanAH, yathArthaM-anvarthaM, nAma bibhrati vilAso vidyate yAsAmiti|  yA pItvA kulavAmalocanA~apyuddhatamAnasA satyanaGgAliGgitairaGgairmunerapi cetaH kvApi nayati|  taraGgabhaGgA-kuTilA, bhrukuTistayA tarjanAni-praNayakalahaviCeSAH, tairmAnityA mAnasamekaM prasAdya dvayorapi-strIpuMsayoH, nirvRtiM-saukhyaM, yA surA karoti|  yAM surAmAsvAdya narAH samare tRNamiva prANAMstyajanti|  kIdRSi yuddhe ? sa0-sAdhAraNe-CaradvasantAdike kAle, tathA vyabhre-vigatAbde|  tathA nAtidurbalamarCasaM-api tu kiJcitsaprANam|  atra yogyaparatvAt kRtvetyadhyAhRtya sambandhaH kAryaH|  tathA viCuddhakoSThAdikaM kRtvA tato~asmai-arCasAya, yantraM nidadhyAditi|  saGgrahe coktam (ci.a.10)-"atha khalu balavantamarCobhirupadrutaM yathArhasnehopasnigdhasvinnamanilavedanAvRddhiCamanArthaM snigdhamuSNamalpamannaM dravaprAyaM bhuktavantaM Cuci kRtasvastyayanaM muktaviNmUtramavyathaM same Cucau vivikte deCe sAdhAraNevyabhre kAle same phalake CayyAyAM vA pratyAdityagudamanyasyotsaGgeniSaNNapUrvakAyamuttAnamunnatakaTIkaM yantraNaCATakena parikSeptagrIvAsakthisandhideCamalajjArhairAptaparicArakaiH suparigRhItaM kRtvA tato~asmai ghRtAbhyaktaM yantrakaM niddhyAt|" iti|  arCasamiti arCAsi vidyante yasyetyarthaH, arCaAditvAdac|  kimbhUtam ?  viCuddho-vamanavirecanAdinA, koSTho yasya tam|  tathA, annamACitaM kRtvA|  kimbhUtam ?  laghu-svabhAvAt, alpaM camAtrayA|  tathA, anulomanaM-vAtavarcasAM prAyeNa pravartakam|  tathA, CuciM-mRjjalAbhyAM kRtvA|  tathA, kRtaM svastyayanaM yasya tam|  tathA, mukte-visRSTe, viNmUtre yena tam|  tathA, atryathaMvyathArahitamanyena vyAdhinA~apIDitam|  tathA, Cayane vyapACritaM-CayyAmACritya sthitam|  athavA, phalake-AsanaviCeSe, vyapACritam|  athavA, anyanarotsaGge vyapACritam|  utsaGgaviCeSAtsthAnakaviCeSaH|  narotsaGge vyapACritamityevaM siddhe~anyagrahaNaM vaidyasya nirAsArtham|  anyotsaGge vyapACritamiti kathaM kRtvA ?  pUrveNa kAyenottAnaM kRtvA-nAdhareNa|  tathA, pratyAdityagudam|  prati-Abhimukhyena, AdityaM pratyAdityaM gudaM yasya tam|  yasyAM diCyAdityo gataH tasyAM diCyarCasena sammukhaM gudaM kRtvA sthAtavyamityarthaH, samaM ca|  tathA, samyagunnataH kaTideCoyasya tam|  atha-samunnatakaTideCakaraNAdanantaraM, arCasaM sakthnostathA CirodharAyAM parikSiptaM-samantAtkSiptamAkrAntaM kRtvA|  kena ?  yantraNavAsasA|  yantraNArthaM vAsaH-kArpAsAdimayaM, yantraNavAsastena|  Rju-spaSTaM kRtvA, sthitam|  tathA, tamAturaM paricArakairalambitaM-niCcalaM kRtbA~avaSTabhya samyak sthApitam|  tataH-anantaraM, asmai-durnAmavate, sarpiSA~abhyaktapAyave ghRtAbhyAktaM yantrakamRju-anusukhaM kRtvA, CanairnidadhyAt-praNayet|  tataH-anantaraM gudapraNihitayantrAnte, pravAhaNAt-pravAhaNenahetunA, yantre praviSTaM durnAma dRSTvA|  atha(nu) [ca]-paCcAcca, CalAkayA cailakhaNDaprAvRtadehayotpIDya-prakRtatvAddurnAma UrdhvaM pIDayitvA|  vaidyo yathoktavidhinA-sUtrasthAnoditena, kSAreNArdramarCo dahet|  evetyavadhAraNe|  kSAreNaiva nAgninA|  itaratCuSkaM durnAma, kSAreNa jvalanena vA dahet|  yathoktavidhinetyatrApi yojyam|  mahadveti|  bahuddurnAma tu balavataH puMsaH chittvA vA CastreNa kSArAgnibhyAM yathAyogaM dahet|  atha-anantaraM, AturaM vItayantraM vidhAya svabhyaktapAyujaghanamavagAhe nidhApayet-tatra nihitaM vidadhyAdityarthaH|  tataH-anantaraM, asyAcAraM-"uSNodakopacArI syAt" (hR.sU.a. 16/26) ityAdikaM, AdiCet|  ekaikaM durnAma iti-anena pUrvoktena prakAreNa, saptAhAtsamupAcaret-na tulyakAlaM sarvANi|

 CAgAni navanItAjyakSIramAMsAni, jAGgalaH||119||  anamlo vA kadamlo vA savAstukaraso rasaH||119||  raktaCAliH saro daGnaH SaSTikastaruNI surA||120||  taruNaCca surAmaNDaH CoNitasyauSadhaM param||120||

 yavAsakuCakACAnAM mUlaM puSpaM ca CAlmaleH||125||  nyagrodhodumbarACvatthaCuGgACca dvipalonmitAH||126||  triprasthe salilasyaitatkSIraprasthe ca sAdhayet||126||  kSIraCeSe kaSAye ca tasmin pUte vimiCrayet||127||  kalkIkRtaM mocarasaM samaGgA candanotpalam||127||  priyaGguM kauTajaM bIjaM kamalasya ca kesaram||128||  picchAbastirayaM siddhaH saghRtakSaudraCarkaraH||128||  pravAhikAgudabhraM CaraktasrAvajvarApahaH||129||

sa0-yavAsAdInAM mUlaM CAlmaleH puSpaM tathA nyagrodhAdInAM ca CuGgA etad dravyakadambakaM pratyekaM dvipalapramANaM jalaprasthatraye kSIraprasthe ca pAcayet|  kSIraCeSe ca kaSAye tasmin pUte sati kalkIkRtaM mocarasAdi miCrayet|  mocarasAdayo~atra satribhAgamAtraCANakarSamAtrA grAhyA. (?), bastikalpe koCAtakAdau niruhe  (hR. ka. a. 4/17) viMCatipalapramANe kArSikANAmeva dravyANAmabhyanujJAnAt|  ayaM picchAbastiH siddho ghRtamAkSikaCarkarAnvitaH pravAhikAdiharaH|  alpayA mAtrayA niruho bastireva picchAbastirucyate|

 yaSTyAhvapuNDarIkeNa tathA mocarasAdiphiH||129||  kSIradviguNitaH pakvo deyaH sneho~anuvAsanam||130||

sa0-madhuyaSTikayA prapauNDarIkeNa tathA mocarasAdibhiH-pUrvoktaiH (Clo.127) kalkIkRtaiH, kSIradviguNitaH pakvaH san sneho~anuvAsanaM deyaH|

 madhukotpalarodhnAmbu samaGgA bilvacandanam||130||  cavikA~ativiSA mustaM pAThA kSAro yavAgrajaH||131||  dArvItvaGkSAgaraM mAMsI citrako devadAru ca||131||  cAGgerIsvarase sarpiH sAdhitaM taistridoSajit||132||  arCotisAragrahaNIpANDurogajvarArucau||132||  mUtrakRcCre gudaphraMCe phastyAnAhe pravAhaNe||133||  picCAsrAve~arCasAM CUle deyaM tatparamauSadham||133||

 vyAtyAsAnmadhurAmlAni CItoSNAni ca yojayet||134||  nityamagnibalApekSI jayatyarCaHkRtAn gadAn||134||

sa0-vyatyAsena-viparyayeNa, madhurANyamlAni ca CItAnyuSNAni ca nityamagnibalApekSI yojayet|  evaM cArCaHkRtAmatiCayinIM rujaM jayati|

 udAvartArtamaphyajya tailaiH CItajvarApahaiH||135||  susnigdhaiH svedayetpiNDairvartimasmai gude tataH||135||  aphyaktAM tatkarAGguSThasanniphAmanulomanIm||136||  dadyAcCyAmAtrivRddantIphiphphalInIphalaiH||136||  vicUrNitairdvilavaNairguDagomUtrasaMyutaiH||137||  tadvanmAgadhikArAThagRhadhUmaiH sasarSapaiH||137||

atIsAracikitsitAdhyAyaH
