atIsAro hi bhUyiSThaM bhavatyAmACayAnvayaH||1||  hatvA~agniM vAtaje~apyasmAtprAk tasmiMllaGghanaM hitam||1||  athAto~atIsAracikitsitaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-hi-yasmAt, bAhulyenAgniM hatvA-mandIkRtya, AmACayAnvayo bhavatyatIsAraH|  asmAtkAraNAdasmin-atIsArAkhyevyAdhau, vAtaje~api pUrvaM laGghanaM hitam|  AmACayo~anvayojanmabhUrutpattiH yasya sa AmACayAnvayaH| apiCabdAtkvacitkaphAdije sutarAM laGghanaM hitamiti dyotayati|  laGghanaCabdena copavAsa eveha gRhyate, CodhanAdInAM laGghanAnAmavasthAvaCAducyamAnatvAt|  bhUyiSTagrahaNena kvacidbhayajAdAvatIsAre vyabhicAraH, nAsAvAmACayAnvayaH|  prAggrahaNena nottarakAle laGhghanaM hitam|  tadA hi rogasvabhAvAddhAtvapacayo~avaCyaMbhAvI|  laGghanamapi dhAtvapacayahetuH, atastatrAyuktam|

 CUlAnAhaprasekArtaM vAmayedatisAriNam||2||

sa0-CUlAdibhirArtamatIsAriNaM vAmayet, na tatra prAg laGghanaM hitam|  vamanaM caitatsAmAnyaM pittajAdiSvapyevaMrUpeSu cikitsitaM bodhyam, na kevalaM vAtaje|

 doSAH sannicitA ye ca vidagdhAhAramurcCitAH||2||  atIsArAya kalpante teSUpekSaiva pheSajam||3||  phRSotkleCapravRtteSu svayameva calAtmasu||3||

sa0-ye ca doSAH sannicitAH-atiCayena vRddhiM gatAH, tathA vidagdhenapakvApakvarUpeNa, AhAreNa mUrcCitAH-ekatAM prAptAH, atIsArAya kalpantesampadyante| teSu tathotkleCanaM-utkleCAKyavikArakaraNaM pratyunmuKatAbhIjasyAGkurotpattAvucCUnAvastheva, atiCayenoskleCo bhRCotkleCastena pravRttAH-atIsArakaraNaM prati samudyatAsteSu, tathA svayameva-yatnaM vinA, calAtmasu-calasvabhAveSu, teSu-tathAbhUteSu, upekSApathyACitvena samyak pravartanameva bheSajam, na tu pAcanAdikamityarthaH|  

	saGgrahaNauSadhaM kuTajatvagAdikaM vyAdhipratipakSabhUtaM kasmAdatra na prayujyate ?  api cAgnyasaGgrahe paThiSyati (hR. u. a. 40/49)- "kuTajo~atIsAre" iti|  tasmAdatra saGgrAhauSadhaM dAtumucitamiti yo manyate taM pratyAha-

 na tu saGgrahaNaM yojyaM pUrvamAmAtisAriNi||4||

sa0-saGgrahaNaM bheSajaM pUrvamAmAtisAriNi puruSe na yojyam|  tuCabhdo~avadhAraNArthaH|  atra pUrvagrahaNaM paCcAdISadAmAtisAriNidIyamAnaM yujyata eveti dyotayati|  sAme doSe~atIsArakAriNi prathamamapi bhedanamauSadhaM dAtuM(dattaM) viCiSTAyAmavasthAyAM samAnakAryamapi kadAcidatIsAriNo guNAya sampadyate nAtIsArapratipakSabhUtamapi ca saGgrahaNamauSadhamiti kRtvA|

 api cAdhmAnagurutACUlastaimityakAriNi||4||  prANadA prANadA doSe vibaddhe sampravartinI||5||

sa0-vibhaddhe-alpAlpaM kRtvA pravartamAne, doSe~ata eva vibhandhatvAdAdhmAnAdikAriNi tathAbhUte~asmindoSe~asaGgrahaNamapathyamapi prANadA-harItakI, prANAn dadAtIti-prANadA, bhavatIti| evaM bhahudoSANAmatIsAriNAM prAyeNaiSa upakramo bhodhyaH|

 pibetprakvathitAstoye madhyadoSo viCoSayan||5||  phUtIkapippalICuNThIvacAdhAnyaharItakIH||6||  athavA bilvaghanakAmustanAgaravAlakam||6||  biDapAThAvacApathyAkRmijinnAgarANi vA||7||  CuNThIGanavacAmAdrIbilvavatsakahiGgu vA||7||

sa0- madhyadoSo~atIsArI bhUtIkAdIH pibet| kimbhUtAstAH ? toye prakvathitAH|  nanu, kvathitA ityetAvadevAstu, kiM praCabdena ? brUmaH| prakarSeNa kvathitAH pramathyArUpeNa CRtAH prakvathitA ityasyArthasya pratipAdanArthaM praCabdokAri| pramathyAyACca tantrAntare lakSaNamuktam| tathA- "CRtaH kaSAyo niryUhaH kvAtho yUSo~akRtaCca saH|  kRtayUSaH pramathyA ca dravyAtkalkIkRtAcchRtaH||" iti| tadevaM dravyaM kalkIkRtya piSTvA yatkriyate sa kRtayUSo bhaNyate| sa eva ca pramathyACabdavAcyaH|  tasmAnmadhyadoSo~atIsArI bhUtIkAdIni piSTvA prakarSeNa kvAthayitvA pramathyArUpeNa pibedityavatiSThate|  muninA~apyuktam (ca. ci. a. 19/22)- "pramathyAM madhyadoSebhyo dadyAddIpanapAcanIm|" iti|  kiM kurvan pibet ?  viCoSayan,- laGghayan, prakRtatvAdAtmAnameva| athavA, bilvadhanikAdIni pibet|  athavA, biDAdIni CuNThyAdIni vA pibet|

 Casyate tvalapadoSANAmupavAso~atisAriNAm||8||

sa0-alpadoSANAmatisAriNAmupavAsaH Casyate| tuCabdo~avadhAraNArthaH|  atropavAsa evAlpadoSANAM Casyate na bahudoSamadhyadoSokto~apara upakramaH, sa na tathA teSAM Casyata iti| sarvamatIsAriNaM doSadeCAdyanurodhena kadAcilaGGayet|

 vacAprativiSAphyAM vA mustApaparTakena vA||8||  hnIpheranAgarAphyAM vA vipakvaM pAyayejjalam||9||

sa0-tRSi saJjAtAyAM doSadeCAdyanurodhena kadAcidvacAprativiSAbhyAM vipakvaM jalaM pAyayet kadAcinmustAparpaTakena kadAcidvAlakanAgarAbhyAm| pAyayedityatra kartrabhiprAye kriyAPale parasmaipadam, anyathA "na pAdamya" ityAdinA parasmaipadaniSedhaH syAt|

 yukte~annakAle kSutkSAmaM laghvannaprati phojayet||9||  tathA sa CIghraM prApnoti rucimagnibalaM balam||10||

sa0-yukte-yogye, annakAle kSutkSAmamatisAriNaM laghvannapratibhojayet, nAparavyAdhyArtamiva laGGanocitaM samyaglaGGanAdanantarameva bhojayet| api tu samyaglaGGitalakSaNotpannamapyatIsAriNaM kiJcitkAlapratIkSaNaM kRtvA bhojayediti kSAmaCabhdena dyotayati| alpaM laghvannaM laghvannaprati, "suppratinA mAtrArthe" iti samAso~avyayIbhAvaH| evaM kriyamANe saH-atisArI, drAgeva ruciM prApnoti, tathA vahnibhalaM dehabhalam [ca]|

 takreNAvantisomena yavAgvA tarpaNena vA||10||  surayA madhunA vA~atha yathAsAtmyamupAcaret||11||

sa0-kadAcittakreNa kadAcitkAJjikena kadAcitpeyayA kadAcittarpaNena kadAcitsurayA| kadAcinmArdvIkeNeti yathAsAtmyamupAcaret|

grahaNIdoSacikitsitAdhyAyaH

 athAto grahaNIdoSacikitsitaM vyAKyAsyamaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-grahaNyAmACrito doSo grahaNIdoSaH,-tadACritasthAnoditakArI vAtAdyanyatamaH, tasya cikitsitaM grahaNIdoSacikitsitam|  CeSaM pUrvavat|

 grahaNImACritaM doSamajIrNavadupAcaret||1||  atIsAroktavidhinA tasyAmaM ca vipAcayet||1||

sa0-grahaNimACritaM doSamajIrNavadupAcaret-tattulyasAdhanena laGghano(nAdyu)ktopacArAdinopakramet| atIsAroktavidhinA tasya-grahaNidoSavataH puMso, yathAdoSamAM vipAcayet|

 annakAle yavAgvAdi paJcakolAdiphiryutam||2||  vitaretpaTulaghvannaM punaryogAMCca dIpanAn||2||

sa0-annakAle-samyag jAtAyaM kSudhi, yavAgvAdyannaM-peyAvilepyodanalakSaNaM, vitaret-dadyAt|  kimbhUtam ? paJcakolAdibhiryutam|  AdiCabhdenAnyairapyevaMprakArairdravyairdIpanAdiguNayuktairyuktam|  tathA, paTu-lavaNam, laghu-ubhayathA mAtrayA prakRtyA ca|  punaH-bhUyo, dIpanAn SADavAdIn yogAn vitaret|

 dadyAtsAtiviSAM peyAmAme sAmlAM sanAgarAm||3||  pAne~atIsAravihitaM vAri takraM surAdi ca||3||

sa0-tathA, Ame sati peyAM dadyAt| kimbhUtAm ? nAgarAtiviSAyutAm| tathA, sAmlAM-ISadamlAm| pAne~atIsAravihitaM vAri takraM surAdi ca sAtmyAdivaCAd yathAyogyaM tasmai dadyAt|

 grahaNIdoSiNAM takraM dIpanagrAhilAghavAt||4||  pathyaM, madhurapAkitvAnna ca pittapradUSaNam||4||  kaSAyoSNavikACitvAdrUkSatvAcca kaphe hitam||5||  vAte svAdvamlasAndratvAtsadyaskamavidAhi tat||5||

sa0-grahaNidoSiNAM takraM pathyam|  kasmAt ? dIpanagrAhilAghavAt|  dIpanagrAhiCabdayoratra bhAvapradhAnayornirdeCaH, yathA "hyekayordvivacanaikavacane" ityatra|  ata evaitau bhAvapratyAntena lAghavaCabdena saha nirdiSTau|  bhASyakArastvAha-"dvandvAtparo yaH CrUyate sa sarvaiH sambadhyate|" iti| tena dIpanagrAhiCabdayorapi bhavapratyayArthasambandho bhavatIti|  madhurapAkitvAt pittapradUSaNaM ca na bhavati|  nacapadena prakarSadUSaNaM pittasya takraM niSidhyate| tenArthAt kiJcit pittakaramityuktaM bhavati| kaSAyoSNavikACitvAdrUkSatvAcca kaphe hitam|  takraM rUkSatvAcceti pRthaGkSirdeCAdrUkSatvasya takragatasya yathA kaphe hitatvaM dravyasvabhAvAnna tathA kaSAyAdInAmetad dyotayati|  vAte svAdvamlasAndratvAttakraM pathyam|  kimbhUtam ?  sadyaskaM-sadyoviloDitam, ata eva na vidAhi|  nanu, grahaNIdoSiNAM takraM pathyamityetAvadastu|  kiM hetunirdeCena ? atrocyate| laghvAdiguNebhyaH prAGkSirUpittebhyo~adhikAn vikACitvamadhurapAkAdInabhidhAtuM dIpanAdayo~api tatprasaGgAnnirdiSTAH| api ca, grahaNIdoSiNAM takraM pathyam yathA dIpanAdiguNayogAttathAnyadapi yaddravyamevaMguNaM grahaNIdoSacikitsite noktaM tadapi grahaNIdoSiNAM pathyamiti hetunirdeCena dyotyate|  dravyasvabhAvAttu viCeSeNa grahaNIdoSiNAM takraM pathyamiti|  eSa ca nyAyo~anatrApi sahetukadravyakathane yojyaH|  kiJca yattadornityAbhisambandhAdevaMnirdeCAccAyamartho~avatiSThate,- yadevaMvidhaM takraM tad grahaNIdoSiNAM pathyam, nAnyAdruCaM yadanuddhRtasnehamathavA~ardhoddhRtasnehaM tathA~atijAtatvAdamlaM tathA~asadyaskaM vidAhi ca, tatsarvaM grahaNIdoSiNAmapathyameva|  takre ca rUkSasvAdvamlAdayo guNAH parasparaviruddhA Api dravyaprabhAvAt kaphavijayitvaM vAtavijayitvaM ca yathAyogaM kurvantyeva svaM svaM karma, yathA satvarajastamaHsaMjJA guNAH|

 caturNAM prasthamamlAnAM tryUSaNAcca palatrayam||6||  lavaNAnAM ca catvAri CarkarAyAH palASTakam||6||  taccUrNaM CAkasUpAnnarAgAdiSvavacArayet||7||  kAsAjIrNAruciCvAsahRtpANDuplIhagulmanut||7||

sa0-amlAnAM caturNAM-koladADimavRkSAmlacukrikANAM, prastham|  kecittu vRkSAmlAmlavetasadADimabadarANAmityAhuH|  trikaTukAt palatrayam|  lavaNAnAM ca catvAri palAni|  CarakarAyAH palAnyaSTau|  tadetaccUrNaM CAkAdiSvavacArayet-miCrayet|  tacca kAsAdijit|

 nAgarAtiviSAmustaM pAkyamAmaharaM pibet||8||  uSNAmphunA vA tatkalkaM nAgaraM vA~athavA~aphayAm||8||  sasaindhavam vacAdiM vA tadvanmadirayA~athavA||9||

sa0-nAgarAdi pAkyaM kvAthayitvA~a~amaghnaM pibet| athavA, teSAM-nAgarAdInAM, kalkamuSNAmbunA pibet| athavA, CuNThImuSNAmbunA pibet harItakIM va|  vacAdigaNaM vA saindhavAnvitaM  tadvat-uSNAmbunA, pibet| vacAdimeva madirayA vA pibet|

 varcasyAme sapravAhe pibedvA dADimAmbunA||9||  biDena lavaNaM piSTaM bilvacitrakanAgaram||10||  sAme kaphAnile koSTharukkare koSNavAriNA||10||

sa0-phurISa Ame tathA saphravAhe biDenophalakSitaM lavaNaM biDalavaNaM phiSTaM dADimAmbunA vA phibet|   sAme vAtakaphe koSTharujAkare bilvAdIni koSNavAriNA phibet|

 kaliGgahiGgvativiSAvacAsauvarcalAphayam||11||  CardihRdrogaCUleSu peyamuSNena vAriNA||11||  pathyAsauvarcalAjAjIcUrNaM maricasaMyutam||12||

sa0-CardyAdiSu kaliGgAdikaM koSNena vAriNA peyam| pathyAdikaM cUrNaM samaricamuSNajalena pibet| pUrvaguNam|

 pippalIM nAgaraM pAThAM sArivAM bRhatIdvayam||12||  citrakaM kauTajaM kSAraM tathA lavaNapaJcakam||13||  cUrNIkRtaM dadhisurAtanmaNDoSNAmbukAJjikaiH||13||  pibedagnivivRddhyarthaM koSThavAtaharaM param||14||

sa0-pippalyAdikaM sUkSmarajIkRtaM dadhyAdibhiragnidIptyarthaM pibhet| tasyAH surAyA maNDastanmaNDaH| koSThavAtaharaM caitaccUrNaM syAt|

 paTuni paJca dvau kSArau maricaM paJcakolakam||14||  dIpyakaM hiGgugulikA bIjapUrarase kRtA||15||  koladADimatoye vA paraM pAcanadIpanI||15||

sa0-lavaNapaJcakAdibhirguTikA bhIjapUrarase kRtA koladADimajale vA kRtA~atiCayena pAcanI dIpanI ca syAt|

 tAlIsapatracavikAmaricAnAM palaM palam||16||  kRSNAtanmUlayordve dve pale CuNThI palatrayam||16||  caturjAtamuCIraM ca karSAMCaM ClakSNacUrNitam||17||  guDena vaTakAn kRtvA triguNena sadA bhajet||17||  madyayUSarasAriSTamastupeyApayonupaH||18||  vAtaCleSmAtmanAM chardigrahaNIpArCvahRdrujAm||18||  jvaraCvayathupANDutvagulmapAnAtyayArCasAm||19||  prasekapInasaCvAsakAsAnAM ca nivRttaye||19||  abhayAM nAgarasthAne dadyAttatraiva viDgrahe||20||  chardyAdiSu ca paitteSu caturguNasitAnvitAH||20||  pakvena vaTakAH kAryA guDena sitayA~api vA||21||  paraM hi vahnisamparkAllaghimAnaM bhajanti te||21||

sa0-tAlIsapatrAdInAM pratyekaM palam|  pippalI pale dve|  pippalImUlasya dve|  CuNThI palatrayam|  caturjAtamuCIraM ca pRthak karSabhAgam| guDena triguNena vaTakAn kRtvA madyAdIn piban sadA bhajet|  kimarthamityAha-vAtakaphAtmakacchardyAdInAM CAntyartham|  tatra ca (traiva)-eteSveva ca vaTakeSu, viDgrahe-viDvibandhe sati, abhayAM nAgarasthAne dadyAt| chardyAdiSu pUrvokteSu pittodbhaveSu satsu guDavarjaM caturguNasitayA yuktA vaTakAH kAryAH|  vaTakAnAM vidhAnamAha-pakvena guDena vaTakAH kAryAH, sitayA vA pakvayA kAryAH|  kimiti pakvena kriyante ? ityAha-yasmAtkAraNAdagnisamparkAt te-vaTakAH, paraM laghutvaM bhajanti|  laghorbhAvo laghimA, "pRthvAdibhya imanic|" "TeH" iti TilopaH|

athainaM parikvAmaM mArutagrahaNIgadam||22||  dIpanIyayutaM sarpiH pAyayedalpaCo phiSak||22||  kiJcitsandhukSite tvagnau saktaviNmUtramArutam||23||  dvyahaM tryahaM vA saMsnehya svinnAphyaktaM nurUhayet||23||  tata eraNDatailena sarpiSA tailvakena vA||24||  sakSAreNAnile CAnte srastadoSaM virecayet||24||

sa0-mArutagrahaNIgadA vidyante yasyeti "arCaAditvAt(bhyo~a)ac"|  enaM-mArutagrahaNIgadavantaM, dIpanIyauSadhayutaM-paJcakolaprAyadravyAnvitaM, vahnisandhukSaNArthamalpamAtrayA ghRtaM pAyayet|  kiJcitsandhukSite-manAk sandIpite, tvagnau sati saktaviNmUtrapavanaM naraM dve dine trINi vA sasnehya-snehayitvA, anantaraM svinnAbhyaktaM kRtvA  niruhayet|  tato-niruhAdanantaraM, mArute CAnte satyeraNDatailenAthavA tailvakena (hR.ci.a.29132) ghRtena sakSAreNa srastadoSaM-pracyutadoSaM, virecayet|

 CuddharUkSACayaM baddhavarcaskaM cAnuvAsayet||25||  dIpanIyAmlavAtaghnasiddhatailena taM tataH||25||  nirUDhaM ca viriktaM ca samyakcApyanuvAsitam||26||  laghvannapratisaMyuktaM sarpiraphyAsayetpunaH||26||

sa0-Cuddho rUkSa ACayo yasya sa evam, tathA baddhaM varcaH-purISaM yasya tam, CuddharUkSACayamitihetau prathamA, CuddharUkSACayatvena vaddhavarcaskamityarthaH|  tathAvidhaM naramanuvAsayet|  kena ? dIpanIyAni-nAgarAdIni, amlani-vRkSAmlamAtuluGgadADimAdIni, vAtaghnAni-kuSTharAsrairaNDAdIni, tairdIpanIyAmlavAtaghnaiH siddhatailena| nirUDhaM viriktaM ca vidhinA cAnuvAsitaM mAtrayetyarthaH, samyak cApyanuvAsitaM laghvannapratisaMyuktaM punaH sarpiH CIlayet|

 paJcamUlAbhayAvyoSapippalImUlasaindhavaiH||27||  rAsnAkSAradvayAjAjIviDAGgaCaThibhirghRtam||27||  Cuktena mAtuluGgasya svarasenArdrakasya ca||28||  CuSkamUlakakolAmlacukrikAdADimasya ca||28||  takramastusurAmaNDasauvIrakatuSodakaiH||29||  kAJjikena ca tatpakvamagnidIptikaraM param||29||  CUlagulmodaraCvAsakAsAnilakaphApaham||30||

sa0-paJcamUlAdibhiH kalkairdravyaiH CuktAdibhirdravadravyaiH sAmAnyaparibhASayA ghRtaM pacet| paJcamUlamiha mahadgrAhyam, sutarAM vAtaghnatvAt| etacca ghRtaM paramagnidIptikaraM CUlAdighnam|

 sabIjapUrakarasaM siddhaM vA pAyayeddhRtam||30||

 tailamaphyaJjanArthaM ca siddhamephiCcalApaham||31||

sa0-ebhiH paJcamUlAdibhirghRtauSadhaiH siddhaM tailaM vA~abhyaJjanArthaM hitam|

 eteSAmauSadhAnAM vA pibeccUrNaM suKAmbunA||31||  vAte CleSmAvRte sAme kaphe vA vAyunoddhate||32||

sa0-eteSAmauSadhAnAM paJcamUlAdInAM cUrNamuSNAmbhunA vA pibhet|  kasyAmavasthAyAmityAha-vAte| kimbhUte? CleSmAvRte, tathA sAme kaPe vA, vAtenoddhate sAme vA|

 agnernirvApakaM pittaM rekeNa vamanena vA||32||  hatvA tiktalaghugrAhidIpanairavidAhibhiH||33||  annaiH sandhukSayedagniM cUrNaiH snehaiCca tiktakaiH||33||

sa0-agnipittayorgrahaNyACrayatvAd dravatvAcca yadagneH plAvakaM pittamUrdhvAdhaH prapannaM tadyathAsannadeCaM vamanena virekeNa vA hatvA, AnantaraM tamagnimannaistiktalaghugrAhidIpanaiH sandhukSayet|  kimbhUtaiH ? avidAhibhiH,-na tu sAmAnyena dIpanaiH|  na kevalamevaMvidhairannairagniM sandhukSayet, tathA ca cUrNaiH snehaiCca taM sandhukSayet| kimbhUtaiH ? tiktakaiH-tiktadravyabhUyiSThaiCcUrNaistiktadravyasAdhitaiH snehaiCca|

 paTolanimbatrAyantItiktAtiktakaparpaTam||34||  kuTajatvakphalaM mUrvA madhuCigruphalaM vacA||34||  dArvItvakpadmakoCIrayavAnImustacandanam||35||  saurASTryativiSAvyoSatvagelApatradAru ca||35||  cUrNitaM madhunA lehyaM peyaM madyairjalena vA||36||  hRtpANDugrahaNIrogagulmaCUlArucijvarAn||36||  kAmalAM sannipAtaM ca muKarogAMCca nACayet||37||

sa0-madhuCigruH-sobhAJjanakaviCeSaH, tasya PalaM CvetamaricAKyam|  etatpaTolAdikaM cUrNitaM madhunA lehyamathavA jalena peyaM madyairvA| tacca hRdrogAdIn nACayet|

 phUnimphakaTukAmustAtryUSaNendrayavAn samAn||37||  dvau citrakAdvatsakatvagphAgAn SoDaCa cUrNayet||38||  guDaCItAmbunA pItaM grahaNIdoSagulmanut||38||  kAmalAjvarapANDutvamehArucyatisArajit||39||

sa0-atha-rAjapRcchanAdanantaram, AturamupasnigdhAdirUpaM kRtvA tato~asya nAbheradho~abhyajyAt| pUrvamupasnigdhaH paCcAcchuddhastamupasnigdhaCuddham| tathA, abhuktaM-akRtAhAram| tathA, manAk karCitam| tathA, abhyaktasvinnaCarIraM ca| tathA, kRtamaGgalaM-vihitasvastyayanam| tathA, narasyAnyasyAGkamACritam| kimbhUtasya ? kRtvA-tatra nItvA, tathA bastiM nirvalikaM kRtvA, tathA tamanAyataM-avistIrNaM sanniveCya, anantaramaGgulibhyAM-vAmahastatarjanImadhyamAbhyAM, prakRtatvAdaCmarImutpIDayet| tAvadyAvacchalyaM-aCmaryAkhyaM, granthirivonnataM syAt| anantaraM sevanyA vAmapArCve sevanIM yavamAtreNa tya(mu)ktvA-varjayitvA, pATayecchastreNa| kiyanmAtram ? aCmamAnena,-aCmarIpramANena, na tu tato~adhikamUnaM vA| vraNaM ca kRtvA~aCmarIM samagraM-niravaCeSaM yathA bhavatyevaM, sarpaphaNavadagravakreNa yantreNAharet,-tathA cAkarSedyathA sA hriyamANA na bhidyate| bhinnA hi punarvRddhimiyAt| strINAM tu bastiH pArCvato bhavan garbhACayACrayo yasmAttata utsaGgavadadhaH CastraM nyaset-pAtayet| ataH-asmAcchastrapAtanavidhAnAt, anyathA~aCmaryAharaNArthaM CastrapAtanena mUtrasrAvI vraNo bhavet| na kevalaM strINAM mUtraprasekakSaNanAnmUtrasrAvI vraNo bhavet| yAvad dIrghakAlAnubandhI mUtraprasekakSaNanAnnarasyApi| api ca-anyacca, ekadhA-ekato, bastibhedo~aCmarIhetuH-tannimittaH, sidhyati kriyAbhyAsAnnityamativRddhatvAcca Calyasyeti, na tu sahasA CastrAdyabhighAtahetuja ekato bhinno~api bastiH sidhyati| marmavibhAge~apyavAdIt (hR.  mohino balinaH kuryAdAdau vamanarecane||1||  snigdhasya sarSapAriSTanikumphAkSakaraJjajaiH||1||  tailaistrikaNTakAdyena yathAsvaM sAdhitena vA||2||  snehena mustadevAhvanAgaraprativApavat||2||  surasAdikaSAyeNa dadyAdAsthApanaM tataH||3||  nyagrodhAdestu pittArtaM rasaiH SuddhaM ca tarpayet||3||

sa0-bhalavato mehinaH puMso~aparebhya upakramebhyastattadyogyebhyaH prathamaM vamanavirecane kuryAnmehakledapraSamanAya| kimbhUtasya ? sarSapAdijaistailaiH snigdhasya, trikaNTakAdyena vA snehenasnigdhasya, "trikaNTakaniSArodhra" (Slo. 17) ityAdisneho vakSyamANaH, yathAsvaM doSasAtmyAdivaSAddravyaiH sAdhitena vA snehena snigdhasya| tato-vamanavirecanakaraNAdanantaraM jAtabhalAya mehine, "surasayuga" (hR. sU. a. 15|30) ityAdeH sambhandhinA kaSAyeNAsthApanaM dadyAt| kimbhUtam ? mustAdiprativApavat| sa prativApo vidyate yasya tadevam| pittale punaH "nyagrodhapippala" (hR. sU. a. 15|41) ityAdeH kaSAyeNAsthApanaM dadyAt| prativApAntarAnirdeSAdatra pUrvokta eva prativApo yojyaH| anantaraM SuddhaM pramehiNaM rasaistarpayet| yadyapi rasairiti sAmAnyanirdeSAttrividhadeSasaJjAtaprANimAMsarasaistarpaNaM prAptaM tathA~api yogyatAvaSAt jAGgalaprANimAMsarasaistarpayediti bhodhyam, na tvAnUpAdimAMsarasairiti| teSAM medomUtrakaPAvahatvena vyAdhivardhanahetutvAt|

 mUtragraharujAgulmakSayAdyAstvapatarpaNAt||4||  tato~anubandharakSArthaM SamanAni prayojayet||4||

sa0-yato~apatarpaNAnmUtragrahAdIni jAyante tato hetoranubhandharakSArthaM SamanAni prayojayet| anyathA prameha upaSAnto~api nidAnaleSamAsAdya punaH prAdurbhavet| nanu, mUtragrahAdInyetAvadastu SeSA AdiSabhdenaiva grahISyante| kiM mUtragraharujAgulmakSayAdyA iti ? satyam| mUtragraharujAgulmakSayA yathA~avaSyamapatarpaNAt pramehiNo jAyante tathA nApare tajjAtIyA iti|

sa0-asaMSodhyo-vamane garbhiNyAdiH, vireke navajvarAdiH, etasyAsaMSodhyasya tAnyeva-SamanAni, sarveSu prameheSu pAyayet| evetyavadhAraNe, na tu SodhanAdirUpamityarthaH|

sa0-yavAnAM vikRtirapUpAdiH pramehe hitA| athavA, yavAnAM gajASvagudamuktAnAmapUpAdivikRtirhitA| veNujAnAM vA yavAnAM vikRtirhitA| tRNadhAnyAni-nIvAraSyAmAkAdIni, tathA mudgAdyAstathA purANaSAliH SaSTikaSceti hitAni| SrIkukkuTasaMjJo~amlaH Kalako hitaH| kimbhUtaH ? tilasarSapakiTTajaH,- tilasarSapapiNyAkajanmA tadupAdAnakAraNo na mudgAdyupAdAnakAraNaH, sa ca mAlavakeSu prasiddhaH, ArdrakaSakalanistuSagodhUmAdinA ca kriyate| tathA, kapitthAdayo hitAH| taiH-kapitthAdibhiH, kRtA rAgAH SADavASca hitAH| tiktaSAkAdIni ca hitAni| SreSThA-triPalA| SUlyAnIti SUle pakvAni| "SUlAtpAke" ("SUloKAdyat") iti yat| tAni ca supakvatvAt pariSuSkANi| tathA, ayaskRtiH-vakSyamANA (Slo. 29)| tathA, madhvAdayaH purANAH| pakvarasajaH sIdhuH| tathA, asanAdisAravargasyAmbho (hR. sU. a. 15|19) darbhajalaM mAkSikodakaM ca hitam|

vidradhivRuddhicikitSitAdhyAyaH

 )

	vidradhiM sarvamevAmaM SophavatsamuphAcaret||1||  pratataM ca haredraktaM pakve tu vraNavatkriyA||1||  athAto vidradhivRddhicikitsitaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-AmaM sarvameva vidradhiM Sophavaduphakramet| anavarataM ca raktamAharet| anantaraM phakve sati vraNavatkriyA|

    viSeSeNa vikitsitamAha-

 paJcamUlajalairdhautaM vAtikaM lavaNottaraiH||2||  phadrAdivargayaSTyAhvatilairAlepayedvraNam||2||  vairecanikayuktena traivRtena viSodhya ca||3||  vidArIvargasiddhena traivRtenaiva ropayet||3||

sa0-vAtikaM vraNaM-vAtavidradhAvarthAjjAtaM, paJcamUlajalaiH prakSAlitaM "bhadradAru nataM" (hR. sU. a. 15|5) ityAdinA madhuyaSTikayA tilaiSca lavaNAdyai(dhikai)rlepayet| vairecanikayuktena-"nikumbhakumbha" (hR. sU. a. 15|2) ityAdivargoktena yuktena, traivRtena-traivRtAKyena snehena, viSodhya-SodhayitvA, tato "vidAripaJcAGgula" (hR. sU. a. 15|9) ityAdidravyasiddhena traivRtenaiva snehena vraNaM ropayet|

 kSAlitaM kSIritoyena limpedyaSTyamRtAtilaiH||4||  paittaM ghRtena siddhena maJjiSThoCIrapadmakaiH||4||  payasyAdviniCACreSThAyaSTIdugdhaiCca ropayet||5||  nyagrodhAdipravAlatvakphalairvA------------------||5||

gulmaM baddhaSakRdvAtaM vAtikaM tIvravedanam||1||  rUkSaSItodphavaM tailaiH sAdhayedvAtarogikaiH||1||  pAnAnnAnvAsanAphyaGgaiH snigdhasya svedamAcaret||2||  AnAhavedanAstamphaviphandheSu viSeSataH||2||  athAto gulmacikitsitaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||  srotasAM mArdavaM kRtvA jitvA mArutamulbaNam||3||  phitvA viphandhaM snigdhasya svedo gulmamapohati||3||

sa0-[vAtikaM gulmaM tIvrarujaM purISavAtagrahaM rUkSaSItodbhUtaM vAtacikitsitoktaistailaiH sAdhayet| pAnAnnAnvAsanAbhyaGgaiH snigdhasya gulminaH svedamAcaret|] pAnaSabhdena snehapAnaM vedyam, snigdhasyeti vacanAt| AnAhAdiSu viSeSeNa svedamAcaret| yasmAtsvedaH snigdhasya puMsaH srotomRdutvaM vidhAya mArutamulbhaNaM ca jitvA tathA vibhandhaM bhittvA gulmamapohati|

sa0-sajale jaThariNo jaThare tailaiH-tilAnAM tailaiH sarSapairaNDatailAdibhiCca, anilaghnairabhyaktasya tathoSNAmbunA svinnasyAkakSaM-kakSAntaM yAvat, udare paTTena-vastreNa veSTite, tadudaraM vastreNaiva veSTayitvA baddhacchidrodarayoryatkathitaM sthAnaM tasmin sthAne~aGgulapramANaM vidhyet| tasmiMCca chidre nADIM nidhAya jalasyodarasthasyArdhaM srAvayet| jalasrAvAdanantaramasya-udariNo, nADImAkRSya salavaNena tailena vraNamabhyajya baddhvA ca vAsasA jaTharaM veSTayet| tRtIye divase~athavA caturthe yAvadASoDaCaM dinaM tasya-udariNo, viCramya viCramyAlpaCaH-alpamalpaM kRtvA, jalaM-doSaM, srAvayet| sahasA hi pracurajalasrAvaNAdapAyaH syAt| tasmAt srutidivasAdanantaraM tRtIye caturthe paJcamAdau vA dine CarIrabalAbalamapekSya SoDaCadinaM maryAdIkRtya jalasrAvaNaM kAryam| jaTharaM ca CithilaM vAsasA gADhataraM viveSTayet| niHsrute ca jale~asau jaTharI laGghitaH san peyAmasnehalavaNAM< pibet| naJatra ISadarthaH| ISat snehalavaNaM kledarakSArthaM vAtakoparakSArthaM ca| anyathA hi 'rUkSAM nirlavaNAM pibet' ityevaM nirdeCamAcAryaH kuryAt|

sa0-pANDvAturaH kalyANakAkhyaM (hR. u. a. 6|27) , sarpirAdau pibet| AdAvityanenaitadgamayati,-asmin vyAdhau prAdhAnyena pittacikitsA kAryA, tadanu vAtakaphayoH| tathA ca pittasyaivaitadvyAdhikartRtve prAdhAnyam| ata eva ca nidAne~adhyagISTa (hR. ni. a. 13|1)- "pittapadhAnAH kupitAH" ityAdi| tasmAt pittasyopaCAntyai sarpiHpAnaM yuktam| paJcagavyaM ghRtaM-apasmArapratiSedhoktam (hR. u. a. 7|20)| mahAtiktaM-kuSThacikitsitoktam (hR. ci. a. 19|8)| AragvadhAdigaNena (hR. sU. a. 15|17) vA pakvaM ghRtaM pibet|

 dADimAtkuDavo dhAnyAtkuDavArdhaM palaM palam||2||  citrakAcchRGgaberAcca pippalyardhapalaM ca taiH||2||  kalkitairviMCatipalaM ghRtasya salilADhake||3||  siddhaM hRtpANDugulmArCaHplIhavAtakaphArtinut||3||  dIpanaM CvAsakAsaghnaM mUDhavAtAnulomanam||4||  duHkhaprasavinInAM ca bandhyAnAM ca praCasyate||4||

sa0-dADimasya kuDavam, dhAnyakAtkuDavArdham, citrakaCuNThyoH pratyekaM palam, pippalyA dvau karSau, taiH piSThairghRtasya palAni viMCatiM toyADhake pacet| tacca siddhaM hRdayAdyartijit, dIpanAdiguNayuktaM ca| duHkhaprasavinInAM strINAM vandhyAnAM-aprasavinInAM ca, Casyate|

sa0-snehitaM pANDurogiNaM tIkSNairvAmayet| punarapi snigdhaM ca bahuSaH kSIreNa Sodhayet| kevalena vA payasA Sodhayet|

 dantIphalarase koSNe kASmaryAJjalimAsutam||6||  drAkSAJjaliM vA mRditaM tat pibet pANDurogajit||6||  mUtreNa phiSTAM phathyAM vA tatsiddhaM vA phalatrayam||7||

sa0-dantIPalarase koSNe kASmaryAJjalimAsutaM pibhet, tadetadubhayamapi pANDurogaghnam| gomUtreNa piSTAM haritakIM vA pibhet| tena-gomUtreNa, siddhaM-kvathitaM, PalatrayaM vA pibhet|

 mUtre sthitaM vA saptAhaM payasA~ayorajaH pibet||9||  jIrNe kSIreNa phuJjIta rasena madhureNa vA||9||

sa0-gomUtre saptAhaM sthitaM lohacUrNaM kSIreNa pibhet| jIrNe tasmin dugdhena sahAnnaM bhuJjIta| mAMsarasena vA madhureNa-na tvamlena|

 CuddhaCcobhayato lihyAtpathyAM madhughRtadrutAm||10||

sa0-CuddhaCcobhayataH-pAyuto mUrdhataCca, harItakIM madhghRtadrutAM lihyAt|

 vAsAguDUcItriphalAkaTvIphUnimphanimphahaH||13||  kvAthaH kSaudrayuto hanti pANDupittAsrakAmalAH||13||

sa0-sarvatra doSaje Cvayathau sarvAGgaje tathA sAme viCoSitaH san laghu bhuktvA koSNena jalena nAgarAdi pibet| viCoSaNamatropavAsaH| athavA, vijayAdIn koSNAmbhasA pibet| doSabahulo navAyasaM-pANDurogoktaM (hR. ci. 16|14) , pibet| CudhyarthaM gomUtreNa harItakIH CIlayet| triphalAkvAthena saha kaTukAtrivRtAlohacUrNatrikaTukANi CIlayet| gugguluM vA CilAjatu vA triphalAkvAthenaiva CIlayet|

sa0-daSamUlakaSAyasyADhake pathyASataM pacet| atra ca sAmAnyaparibhASayA kvAthyadravyasya ca daSamUlasya dvAtriMSat palAni bhavanti| evaM ca tantrAntare virodhaH| tathA ca tatraivaM kathyate, (ca. ci. a. 12|50)- "dvipaJcamUlasya tulAkaSAye kaMse~abhayAnAM ca SataM guDAcca|" iti| tadevaM virodhaM paSyanto vyAKyAmevaMvidhAM vidvAMso vidadhati,-daSamUlasya tulA, tasyAH kaSAyo daSamUlakaSAya iti| mayUravyaMsakAditvAduttarapadalopi samAsaH| evaM daSamUlasya palaSataM tatkvAthasyADhake pathyASataM pacet| guDatulAM dattvA tasmin lehe vicUrNitaM trijAtakAdi dadyAt| eteSAM ca pramANaM vAsiSThalehavet (hR. ci. a. 3|133) kalpyam| yavakSArasya karSamAtraM deyam| tantrAntare hyuktam-"vyoSAccatuSpalaM dadyAttripalaM trisugandhataH| karSamAtraM yavakSArAt" iti| SIte ca sati mAkSikAt prasthArdhaM deyam| tat-etat, upayojitaM pravRddhaSoPAdIn hanti| KaranAdastu jagAda-"daSamUlADhakamabhayASatasahitaM pAcayedapAM droNe| avaSeSitacaturaMSe tasmin punaH prakSipet pathyAH||" iti| upajAtivRttam|

sa0-trivRccUrNaM trAyantyA rasena yuktaM drAkSArasena vA triphalArasena vA virecanaM yojyam, kSIreNa ghRtena vA trivRccUrNaM yuktam| koSThagate doSe viCeSeNa CodhanaM yojyam|

kAryaM cAsmai kuSThadRSTaM vidhAnam||7||

sa0-gomUtraM citrakAdiyuktaM mAkSikAnvitaM ghRtakumbhe sthApitaM pakSaM yAvat pakSAdUrdhvaM Cvitravataitatpeyam| asmai ca-CvitriNe, kuSThoktaM vidhAnam| asmai iti kriyAgrahaNAtsampradAnatvam| [CAlinIvRttam| ]

 mArkavamathavA svAdedphRSThaM tailena lohapAtrastham||8||  bIjakaSRtaM ca dugdhaM tadanu pibocCvitranASAya||8||

sa0-bhRGgarAjaM vA tailena bhRSTaM lohapAtrasthaM KAdet| bhuktvA ca paScAdbhIjakaSRtaM kSIraM SvitraSAntyai pibhet| AryA|

 pUtikArkavyAdhighAtasnuhInAM
mutre piSTAH pallavA jAtijACca||9|| pAmAkoThAn duSTanADIvraNAMCca||9||

sa0-pUtikAdInAM pallavA gomUtre piSTAstathA jAtipallavA gomUtre piSTAH pralepena CvitrAdIn ghnanti|

 dvaipaM dagdhaM carma mAtaGgajaM vASvitre lepastailayukto variSThaH||10||

sa0-dvIpasambandhi carma dagdhaM hastijaM ca carma dagdhaM tailAnvito lepaH Svitre~atiSayena varaH|

 pUtiHkITo rAjavRkSodphavena
kSAreNAktaH Svitrameko~api hanti||10||

sa0-pUtiHkITo rAjavRkSajena kSAreNa lepata eka eva SvitraM hanti| pUtiHkITo-varSAkAlodbhavaH pilindiketi loke prasiddhaH| SAlinyau vRtte|

nahni cCAyAyAM SoSayetsphoTahetUn||11||  evaM vArAMstrIMstaistataH SlakSNapiSTaiH

vAtavyAdhicikitsitAdhyAyaH

 )

kevalaM nirupastamphamAdau snehairupAcaret||1||  vAyuM sarpirvasAmajjatailapAnairnaraM tataH||1||  snehaklAntaM samASvAsya payophiH snehayetpunaH||2||  yUSairgrAmyodakAnUparasairvA snehasaMyutaiH||2||  athAto vAtavyAdhicikitsitaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||  pAyasaiH kRsaraiH sAmlalavaNaiH sAnuvAsanaiH||3||  nAvanaistarpaNaiScAnnaiH susnigdhaiH svedayettataH||3||  svaphyaktaM snehasaMyuktaiH SaGkarAdyaiH punaH punaH||4||

sa0-kevalaM-SuddhaM , tathA nirupastambhaM-anyenAdhAnakena samIpasambhavinA~anAdhAritaM , IdRSaM vAyuM snehairAdAvevopAcaret| katham ? ityAha-sarpirityAdi| nanu, tailasya pavanavijaye prAdhAnyAdevaM nirdeSaH kartuM yuktaH , tailavasAmajjasarpiHpAnairiti| yuktamAha bhavAn| kintu, AjanmasAtmyAt sarpiH pradhAnamanavaratamiti sarpiH prAgupanyastam| sarpiHpAnAdibhistAvat snehayet yAvat "snehodvegaH klamaH " (hR. sU. a. 16|30) ityAdi snehalakSaNaM syAt| snehaklAntaM ca naraM payobhiH samASvAsya punaryUSAdibhiH snehAnvitaiH snehayet| tathA tarpaNaiScAnnaiH susnigdhaiH snehayet| tataH-anantaraM , suSTvabhyaktaM antaM SaGkarAdyaiH-svedaiH svedavidhigaditaiH, punaH punaH svedayet|

eva svedite sati yo guNaH syAttamAha-

 snehAktaM svinnamaGgaM tu vakraM stabdhaM savedanam||4||  yatheSTamAnAmayituM suKameva hi Sakyate||5||

sa0-snehAbhyaktaM gAtraM svinnaM sadvakraM tathA stabhdhaM tathA sarujaM yatheSTaM suKamevAnAmayituM Sakyate| "jalahvalahmalanamAmanupasargANAM vA mitvam|" iti nAmayitumityatra na hRsvatvam|

etadeva dRSTAntadvAreNa pratipAdayannAha--

 SuSkANyapi hi kASThAni snehasvedopapAdanaiH||5||  SakyaM karmaNyatAM netuM kimu gAtrANi jIvitAm||6||

sa0-hi-yasmAt, SuSkANyapi kASThAni snehasvedasaMyojanena karmaNyatAM netuM Sakyante| kimuta jIvatAM gAtrANi na Sakyante ? Sakyanta evetyarthaH| Sakyamiti pUrvoktakramamAtre napuMsakatvamekatvaM ca| yathA kAlidAsasya-"SakyamaGgulibhiruddhRtairadhaH SAKinAM patitapuSpakomalaiH| patrajarjaraSaSiprabhAlavairebhirutkacayituM tavAlakAn||" iti|

 harSatodarugAyAmaSophastamphagrahAdayaH||6||  svinnasyASu praSAmyanti mArdavaM copajAyate||7||

sa0-svinnasya puMso harSAdayaH SIghraM praSAmyanti| mRdutvaM ca gAtreSu jAyate|

 snehaSca dhAtUn saMSuSkAn puSNAtyASUpayojitaH||7||  phalamagniphalaM puSTiM prANAMScAsyAphivardhayet||8||

sa0-tathA, sninnasya sneha upayojito dhAtUn viSuSkAn drAgeva puSNAti| tathA, asya-vAtarogiNo, bhalAdInabhivardhayet|

 asakRttaM punaH snehaiH svedaiSca pratipAdayet||8||  tathA snehamRdau koSThe na tiSThantyanilAmayAH||9||

sa0-taM-AturaM, punaH snehasvedAbhyAM yojayet| tathA-evaM kRte snehamRdau koSThe sati sarve vAtarogA naSyanti|

 yadyetena sadoSatvAtkarmaNA na praSAmyati||9||  mRduphiH snehasaMyuktairpheSajaistaM viSodhayet||10||

sa0-anena karmaNA cenna praSAmyati vAtAmayastadA taM-vAtAmayinaM, mRdubhirdravyaiH-karNikArAdibhiH, snehAnvitairviSodhayet|

 ghRtaM tilvakasiddhaM vA sAtalAsiddhameva vA||10||  payasairaNDatailaM vA pibeddoSaharaM Civam||11||

sa0-tilvakena pakvaM sAtalayA vA pakvaM kSIreNa vA sahairaNDatailaM pibet| tacca pItaM doSaharaM SivaM ca syAt|

nanu, kimityanulomanaM kriyate ? ityAha-

 snigdhAmlalavaNoSNAdyairAhArairhi malaScitaH||11||  sroto baddhvA~anilaM rundhyAttasmAttamanulomayet||12||

sa0-yasmAt snigdhAdibhirAhArairmalaScitaH srotAMsi ruddhvA vAyuM rundhyAt, tasmAnmArutamanulomayet|

 durbalo yo~avirecyaH syAttaM nirUhairupAcaret||12||  dIpanaiH pAcanIyairvA phojyairvA tadyutairnaram||13||  saMSuddhasyotthite cAgnau snehasvedau punarhitau||13||

sa0-yo naro durbhalo virecanAnarho bhavet taM-naraM, nirUhairupAcaret| kimbhUtaiH ? dIpanai pAcanIyaiSca| athavA, tadyutaiH-dIpanIyapAcanIyayutaiH, bhojyairupAcaret| anantaraM samyakSuddhasya vahnau cotthite sati punarapi snehasvedau hitau|

kevalaM nirupastamphamAdau snehairupAcaret||1||  vAyuM sarpirvasAmajjatailapAnairnaraM tataH||1||  snehaklAntaM samASvAsya payophiH snehayetpunaH||2||  yUSairgrAmyodakAnUparasairvA snehasaMyutaiH||2||  athAto vAtavyAdhicikitsitaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||  pAyasaiH kRsaraiH sAmlalavaNaiH sAnuvAsanaiH||3||  nAvanaistarpaNaiScAnnaiH susnigdhaiH svedayettataH||3||  svaphyaktaM snehasaMyuktaiH SaGkarAdyaiH punaH punaH||4||

sa0-kevalaM-SuddhaM , tathA nirupastambhaM-anyenAdhAnakena samIpasambhavinA~anAdhAritaM , IdRSaM vAyuM snehairAdAvevopAcaret| katham ? ityAha-sarpirityAdi| nanu, tailasya pavanavijaye prAdhAnyAdevaM nirdeSaH kartuM yuktaH , tailavasAmajjasarpiHpAnairiti| yuktamAha bhavAn| kintu, AjanmasAtmyAt sarpiH pradhAnamanavaratamiti sarpiH prAgupanyastam| sarpiHpAnAdibhistAvat snehayet yAvat "snehodvegaH klamaH " (hR. sU. a. 16|30) ityAdi snehalakSaNaM syAt| snehaklAntaM ca naraM payobhiH samASvAsya punaryUSAdibhiH snehAnvitaiH snehayet| tathA tarpaNaiScAnnaiH susnigdhaiH snehayet| tataH-anantaraM , suSTvabhyaktaM antaM SaGkarAdyaiH-svedaiH svedavidhigaditaiH, punaH punaH svedayet|

eva svedite sati yo guNaH syAttamAha-

 snehAktaM svinnamaGgaM tu vakraM stabdhaM savedanam||4||  yatheSTamAnAmayituM suKameva hi Sakyate||5||

sa0-snehAbhyaktaM gAtraM svinnaM sadvakraM tathA stabhdhaM tathA sarujaM yatheSTaM suKamevAnAmayituM Sakyate| "jalahvalahmalanamAmanupasargANAM vA mitvam|" iti nAmayitumityatra na hRsvatvam|

etadeva dRSTAntadvAreNa pratipAdayannAha--

 SuSkANyapi hi kASThAni snehasvedopapAdanaiH||5||  SakyaM karmaNyatAM netuM kimu gAtrANi jIvitAm||6||

sa0-hi-yasmAt, SuSkANyapi kASThAni snehasvedasaMyojanena karmaNyatAM netuM Sakyante| kimuta jIvatAM gAtrANi na Sakyante ? Sakyanta evetyarthaH| Sakyamiti pUrvoktakramamAtre napuMsakatvamekatvaM ca| yathA kAlidAsasya-"SakyamaGgulibhiruddhRtairadhaH SAKinAM patitapuSpakomalaiH| patrajarjaraSaSiprabhAlavairebhirutkacayituM tavAlakAn||" iti|

 harSatodarugAyAmaSophastamphagrahAdayaH||6||  svinnasyASu praSAmyanti mArdavaM copajAyate||7||

sa0-svinnasya puMso harSAdayaH SIghraM praSAmyanti| mRdutvaM ca gAtreSu jAyate|

 snehaSca dhAtUn saMSuSkAn puSNAtyASUpayojitaH||7||  phalamagniphalaM puSTiM prANAMScAsyAphivardhayet||8||

sa0-tathA, sninnasya sneha upayojito dhAtUn viSuSkAn drAgeva puSNAti| tathA, asya-vAtarogiNo, bhalAdInabhivardhayet|

 asakRttaM punaH snehaiH svedaiSca pratipAdayet||8||  tathA snehamRdau koSThe na tiSThantyanilAmayAH||9||

sa0-taM-AturaM, punaH snehasvedAbhyAM yojayet| tathA-evaM kRte snehamRdau koSThe sati sarve vAtarogA naSyanti|

 yadyetena sadoSatvAtkarmaNA na praSAmyati||9||  mRduphiH snehasaMyuktairpheSajaistaM viSodhayet||10||

sa0-anena karmaNA cenna praSAmyati vAtAmayastadA taM-vAtAmayinaM, mRdubhirdravyaiH-karNikArAdibhiH, snehAnvitairviSodhayet|

 ghRtaM tilvakasiddhaM vA sAtalAsiddhameva vA||10||  payasairaNDatailaM vA pibeddoSaharaM Civam||11||

sa0-tilvakena pakvaM sAtalayA vA pakvaM kSIreNa vA sahairaNDatailaM pibet| tacca pItaM doSaharaM SivaM ca syAt|

nanu, kimityanulomanaM kriyate ? ityAha-

 snigdhAmlalavaNoSNAdyairAhArairhi malaScitaH||11||  sroto baddhvA~anilaM rundhyAttasmAttamanulomayet||12||

sa0-yasmAt snigdhAdibhirAhArairmalaScitaH srotAMsi ruddhvA vAyuM rundhyAt, tasmAnmArutamanulomayet|

 durbalo yo~avirecyaH syAttaM nirUhairupAcaret||12||  dIpanaiH pAcanIyairvA phojyairvA tadyutairnaram||13||  saMSuddhasyotthite cAgnau snehasvedau punarhitau||13||

sa0-yo naro durbhalo virecanAnarho bhavet taM-naraM, nirUhairupAcaret| kimbhUtaiH ? dIpanai pAcanIyaiSca| athavA, tadyutaiH-dIpanIyapAcanIyayutaiH, bhojyairupAcaret| anantaraM samyakSuddhasya vahnau cotthite sati punarapi snehasvedau hitau|

vAtaSoNitacikitsitadhyAyaH

vAtaSoNitino raktaM snigdhasya bahuSo haret||1||  alpAlpaM pAlayan vAyuM yathAdoSaM yathAbalam||1||  athAto vAtaSoNitacikitsitaM vyAKyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-vAtaSoNitino narasya snigdhasya sato bhahUn vArAn lohitamalpAlpaM haredvAtakopabhayAt| ata evAha,-pAlayan vAyum, tathA yathAdoSaM-doSAnatikrameNa, tathA bhalAnatikrameNa| yathAdoSamityupalakSaNArtham, dUSyAdyanatikrameNApi raktaM haret|

 rugrAgatodadAheSu jalaukophirvinirharet||2||  SRGgatumbaiScimicimAkaNDUrugdUyanAnvitam||2||  pracCAnena sirAphirvA deSAddeSAntaraM vrajat||3||

sa0-vamanaM-UrdhvaM mukhena doSaharaNam ,  tasya kalpa:-kalpanaM yojanamityartha:| CeSamAyuSkAmIyAdhyAyavadvyAkhyeyam| 


A0 ra0-CrIgaNeCAya namaH|  atha kalpasthAnArambhaH|  vamanakalpaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-atheti|  atha vamanakalpaH|  tatra saGgrahe (ka. a. 1)-"vamandravyANAM madanaphalajImUtakekSvAkudvikoCAtakIkuTajaphalAni CreSThAni|  teSvapi madanaphalam|  doSadUSyAdivaCAccaiSAmetatkalpanAnAM ca prAdhAnyam|  doSAdInAmeva cAtibahvavasthAbhedAdvamanAdiSu kalpanAnAM vyApadAM sAdhanAnAM ca yadasaGkhyeyatvaM, ato buddhimatAM vikalpamArgadarCanArthamudAharaNamAtraM kalpasiddhisthAnamupadekSyate|" iti|

atha madanakalpaH||1||  vamane madanaM CreSThaM, trivRnmUlaM virecane||1||  nityamanyasya tu vyAdhiviCeSeNa viCiSTatA||1||

vamanakalpAdhyAyah

sa0-vamanaviSaye nityaM madanaM CreSTham , nirapAyitvAdanyadravyaviSaye~api vA tasyopayogAt sarvatrAniSiddhaprasaratwAcca| lAghavamicchaMCca tantrakRdidamavocat-`trivRnmUlaM virecane'iti| yathA madanaM vamane nityaM CreSThaM , tathA trivRnmUlaM virecane ,  nirapAyitvAdihetunA| madanaM varjayitwA  vyAdhivaCAdanyasya-jImUtAdeH , viCiSTatA| vakSyati hi (Clo. 19)-  "jImUtaM tu viCeSataH| prayoktavyaM jvaraCvAsakAsahidhmAdirogiNAm| " iti| evaM trivRnmUlaM varjayitwA parasya virecanadravyasya vyAdhiviCeSeNa viCiSTatvam, na tu trivRnmUlavatsarvatrAniSiddhaprasaratvaM nirapAyitvaM ca| tathA coktam (saGgrahe sU. a. 13)-  "trivRtsukhavirecanAnAm| " iti| tadevaM vamane madanaM CreSThaM trivRnmUlaM viracane sarvadeti sthitam|

A0 ra0-mAnatrivRtoH CreSThatvamAha-vamana iti|  nityaM avyabhicAreNa|

 phalAni nAtipANDUni na cAtiharitAnyapi||2||  AdAyAhni praCastarkSe madhye grISmavasantayoH||2||  pramRjya kuCamuttolyAM kSiptvA badhvA pralepayet||3||  gomayenAnu muttolIM dhAnyamadhye nidhApayet||3||  mRdubhUtAni madhviSTagandhAni kuCaveSTanAt||4||  niSkRSTAni gate~aSTAhe CoSayettAnyathAtape||4||  teSAM tataH suCuSkANAmuddhRtya phalapippalIH||5||  dadhimadhvAjyapalalairmRditvA CoSayetpunaH||5||  tataH suguptaM saMsthApya rkAyakAle prayojayet||6||

sa0-athaCabdo~atra prastutau madanasya prastAve| madanasya phalAni pANDUni gRhItvA, na  tvatipANDUnyatikrAntapAkatwAt, na cAtiharitAnyAmatvAt| kadA~a~adAya ? praCastanakSatre divase| kasminnRtau ? madhye grISmavasantayoH| evamRtusandhau gRhItAni pramRjya-vyapagatamalAdidoSANi kRtwA, kuCamayyAM muttolyAM-mUTikAyAM, kSiptvA punarupariSTAdbaddhdvA ca tato gomayena tAM muttolIM limpet| anantaraM dhAnyamadhye nidhApayet-sthApayet| kuCAnAM samUho racanAviCeSaniSpAditaH kuCamuttolItyucyate| mRdubhItAni tAni madhviSTagandhAni- kadAcinmadhugandhAni kadAcidiSTagandhAni,kuCaveSTanAdaSTAhena jJAtvA anantaramaSTAhe~atikrAnte kuCamuttolyAH niSkRSTAni-bahiSkRtAni, anantaramAtape CoSayet| tataH-anantaraM   teSAM-madanaphalAnAM, [suSThu] CuSkANAM phalapippalIruddhRtya dadhimadhvAjyapalalairmRditvA-saGkSudya,punarAtape CoSayet| tataH-anantaraM, suSThu guptaM dhArayitvA kAryakAle-vamanAvasare, tAH prayojayet|

A0 ra0-madanasaMskAramAha-phalAnIti|  phalAni-madanaphalAni|  pramRjya-viCodhya|  kuCamuttolyAM-kuCamayarajjuveSTanikAyAm|  tAM ca muttolIM rajjubhirbaddhvA gomayena lepayet|  anu-paCcAt, dhAnyarACau nidhApayet|  saGgrahe tu (ka. a.1) -"yavabusamASaCAlivrIhikulatthamudgAnyatamarACau" iti|  tato~aSTAhe gate mRdubhUtAni madhuvadiSTagandhAni kuCaveSTanAnniSkRSya Atape CoSayet|  tataH suCuSkANAM phalapippalIH-majjAnaM, uddharet|  tato dadhyAdibhirmardayet|  tataH punaH CoSayet|  tato guptaM sthApayet|  saGgrahe tu (ka. a. 1)-"navaM kalaCamarajaskamAkaNThaM pUrayitvA" ityadhikam|

 athAdAya tato mAtrAM jarjarIkRtya vAsayet||6||  CarvarIM madhuyaSTyA vA kovidArasya vA jale||7||  karbudArasya bimbyA vA nIpasya vidulasya vA||7||  CaNapuSpyAH sadApuSpyAH pratyakpuSpyudake~athavA||8||  tataH pibetkaSAyaM taM prAtarmRditagAlitam||8||  sUtroditena vidhinA sAdhu tena tathA vamet||9||

vamanavirecanavyApatsiddhiradhyAyaH

sa0-ajIrNinastathA bahuCleSmiNo virecanamatitIkSNoSNalavaNahRdyamatiprabhUtaM ca pItamUrdhvaM yAti|  tatra-tasminnUrdhvaM vrajati, pUrvoktA(ditA) vyApat-iSTahAnirmalodaya iti|  tatra tathaiva siddhiH-cikitsitam|  tathA, anantaraM virecanasyordhvagamanAdaviriktaM punaH snigdhaM virecayet|  tathaiva pUrvaM virecanAtikramaM smarannito~aparAdhAtpUrvaM virecane na viriktastamatikramaM pariharan virecayedityarthaH|  tathA~api-evamanuSThIyamAne tadvirecanauSadhaM pItaM, yadyACaye-koSThalakSaNe, na tiSThati-tatra sthitiM na badhnAti Urdhvameva punareti, tatastRtIyaM virecanauSadhaM-AragvadhAdi, nAvacArayet|  yadi tu sAtmyaM hRdyaM nirapAyaM vA bheSajaM tadA tRtIyamapyavacArayet|

A0 ra0-virecanasya pratikUlAM gatimAha-ajIrNina iti|  tatra-virecane|  pUrvoditA-vamanoktA, vyApat-iSTahAnirmalodaya ityeSA, siddhiCca-taM snigdhaM punarvirecayedityeSA|  tathA~api-tenApi prakAreNa, yadyACaye virecanaM na tiSThati-UrdhvaM yAti, tataH-anantaraM, tRtIyaM prayogaM nAvacArayet, yadi tu sAtmyaM hRdyaM nirapAyaM vA bheSajaM tadA tRtIyamapyavacAreyet|

 asnigdhasvinnadehasya purANaM rUkSamauSadham||5||  doSAnutkleCya nirhartumaCaktaM janayedgadAn||6||  vibhraMCaM CvayathuM hidhmAM tamaso darCanaM tRSam||6||  piNDIkodveSTanaM kaNDUmUrvoH sAdaM vivarNatAm||7||  snigdhasvinnasya vA~atyalpaM dIptAgnerjIrNamauSadham||7||  CItairvA stabdhamAme vA samutkleCyAharanmalAn||8||  tAneva janayedrogAnayogaH sarva eva saH||8||

vamanavirecanavyApatsiddhiradhyAyaH

sa0-asnigdhasvinnaCarIrasya purANaM rUkSaM virecanauSadhamupayuktaM doSAnutkleCya-pracyAvya, nirhartumaCaktaM vibhraMCAdikAn gadAn janayet|  athavA, snigdhasvinnasya cauSadhamatyalpaM-mAtrAhInaM, dIptAgnerjIrNaM-pariNataM, syAt|  CItairvA stabdhabheSajamAme vA stabdhaM sat [malAn-] doSAn, utkleCyAnirharat pUrvoktAneva rogAn janayet|  saH-evaMbhUtaH, sarva evAyogaH|

A0 ra0-grathitatvapAkagauravANyAha-asnigdheti|   tatra "vivarNatAm" ityantena grathitatvam|  "auSadham" ityantena pAkam|  CeSeNa gauravam|  vibhraMCaM-iSTahAnim|  jIrNaM-pakvam|  CItaiH-auSadhapAnAnantaramantarbahirvA sevitaiH, auSadhaM stabdhaM bhavati|  tadvadAme-apakvadoSe|  tAneva-vibhraMCAdIn|  saGgrahe tu (ka. a. 3)- "snigdhasvinnasya ca vamanamakRtvA virecanaM pItavataH sAmasya vA mRdu vA viriktasyAdhobhAge~atyarthagurustabdhodaratA CUlo vAtapurISasaGgaCca bhavati|" ityuktam|

kalpasiddhisthAnam

 atha sudhAkalpaH||42||  sudhA bhinatti doSANAM mahAntamapi saJcayam||42||  ACveva kaSThavibhraMCAnnaiva tAM kalpayedataH||42||  mRdau koSThe~abale bAle sthavire dIrgharogiNi||43||  kalpyA gulmodaragaratvagrogamadhumehiSu||43||  pANDau dUSIviSe Cophe doSavibhrAntacetasi||44||  sA CreSThA kaNTakaistIkSNairbahubhiCca samAcitA||44||  dvivarSAM vA trivarSAM vA CiCirAnte viCeSataH||45||  tAM pATayitvA CastreNa kSIramuddhArayettataH||45||  bilvAdInAM bRhatyorvA kvAthena samamekaCaH||46||  miCrayitvA sudhAkSIraM tato~aGgAreSu CoSayet||46||  pibetkRtvA tu guTikAM mastumUtrasurAdibhiH||47||

virecanakalpAdhyAyaH

sa0-sudhA-guDA, doSANAM mahAntamapi saJcayaM hanti|  evaMguNAmapi tAM-sudhAM, bhiSak mRdukoSThAdiSu ato na kalpayet|  CIghrameva kaSTavibhraMCAditi|  kalpayedityatisarjane liG|  tarhi kveyaM prayojyA ?  ityAha-kalpyeti|  gulmAdiSu kalpyA sAsnuk, tIkSNairbahubhiH kaNTakaiCcitA CreSThA syAt|  tAM-sudhAM, dvivarSAmathavA trivarSAM viCeSeNa CiCirAnte kAryavaCAdanyasminnapi Rtau CastreNa pATayitvA tataH-sudhAtaH, kSIramuddhArayet|  dve varSe pramANamasyA iti Thak|  tasya rasAllugiti luk|  tataCca TAp|  tataH-anantaraM, bilvAdInAM kaNTakArImahoTikayorvA kvAthena ekaCaH-ekenaikena, samaM melayitvA sudhAkSIramanantaramaGgAreSu tadubhayamapi CoSayet|  tato guTikAM kRtvA yathAyogaM mastvAdibhiH pibet|

A0 ra0- snuhIkalpamAha-sudheti| tAM-sudhAm, mudukoSThAdiSu na kalpayet| kaSTavibhraMCAM-duHsahavyApadam| ataH-atiyogabhayAt| gulmAdiSu tu kalpyA| madhumehaH-madhupramehaH| dUCIviSaM-viSapratiSedhoktam| sA-sudhA, bahutIkSNAgrakaNTakA CreSThA| bilvAdInAM-bRhatpaJcamUloktAnAm| samaM-samamAtram| ekaCaH-ekasyaikasya kvAthena kramAnmiCraNaM CoSaNaM ca| vA CabdAddhRhatIdvayasya bhinnaH prayogaH|

 iti sudhAkalpaH||4||  trivRtAdInnava varAM svarNakSIrIM sasAtalAm||47||  saptAhaM snukpayaH pItAn rasenAjyena vA pibet||48||  tadvadvyoSottamAkumphanikumphAgnIn guDAmphunA||48||

sa0-trivRtAdInnaveti 'trivRcchyAmA rAjavRkSastilvakaCca tathA sudhA|  CaGkhinI saptalA dantI dravantIti [smRtA nava||]' iti|  tadetAn trivRtAdIMstathA tripAlAM svarNakSIrIM sAtalAM ca sapta vAsarAn snukpayaH pItAn-snukkSIrabhAvitAn, mAMsarasena ghRtena vA pibet|  tathaiva vyoSAdIn guDAmbunA pibet|

A0 ra0- prayogAntaramAha-trivRtAdIniti| trivRtAdInnava-trivRt CyAmA AragvadhastilvakaH snuhI CaGkhinI satpalA dantI dravantI ceti| atra snuhI kANDaM, na kSIram, tasya bhAvanAsAdhanatvAt| varA-triphalA| sAtalA-satpalA-satpalA, tasyAHpunaruktatvAt svarNakSIrIM sasAtalAmiti bhinnaH prayogaH| ata eva triphalAprayogo~api bhinnaH| rasena-mAMsarasena| vyoSAdiprayogo~aapi tadvat| tasya tu pAnaM guDodakena| saGgrahe tu (ka. a. 2)- " adyAcchAmAtrivRvkAthaM snukkSIghRtaphANitaiH| kAsArirasayUSAdyairyuktaM vA snukpayaH pibet|| nikumbhakumbhaCamyAkaCaGkhinIsatpalArajaH| rAtrau mUtre divA gharme saptAhaM sthApayedanu|| snukkSIre~api tatastena mAlyaM vAso~avacUrNitam| Ajighran prAvRNAnaCca mRdukoSTho viricyate||" iti

 iti CaGkhinIsaptalayoH kalpaH||5||  atha CaGkhinIsaptalayoH kalpaH||49||  nAtiCuSkaM phalaM grAhyaM CaGkhinyA nistuSIkRtam||49||  saptalAyAstathA mUlaM te tu tIkSNavikASiNI||49||  CleSmAmayodaragaraCvayathvAdiSu kalpayet||50||  akSamAtraM tayoH piNDaM madirAlavaNAnvitam||50||  hRdroge vAtakaphaje tadvadgulme~api yojayet||51||

A0 ra0 - dantIdravantyoH kalpamAha-dantIti| hataH-nACayataH| abhiSyaNNatanuH-[rAklinnadehaH| pANDvAmayAdiSu gavAdimAMsarasaiH| visarpAdiSu tatkvAthAdisiddhaM ghRtam| kakSAkSudrarogeSUktA (hR. u.a. 31/11)| gulmAdiSu ghRtavatsiddhaM tailam| CakRtsaGgAdiSu ghRtavatsiddho mahAsnehaH| saGgrahe tu (ka. a. 2)-" dantyA rase~ajaCRGgyACca guDakSaudraghRtAnvitaH| lehaH siddho virekArthe dAhasantApamehanut|| vAtatarSe jvare paitte syAtsa evAjagandhayA| dantIdravantyormUlAni paceddhAtrIrase tataH|| trInaMCAn phANitAddvau ca bhRjjettaile ghRte ~athavA| CyAmAdikalkayukto~ayaM lehaH siddho virecanam|| pathyAkSadaCamUlAnAM tadvallehAH pRthagrasaiH| tayorbilvasamaM varNaM tadrasenaiva bhAvitam|| vibaddhaviCi vAtotthe gulme cAmlaM yutaM hitam| mudgAdisidvaistanmUlairyUSAdIMCca vikalpayet|| dantIdravantImaricasvarNakSIrIyavAnakam| saCuNThyagnikapRthvIkaM cUrNitaM saptavAsarAn|| mUtrabhAvitamAjyena pibejjIrNe ca tarpaNam| sarvadA sarvarogeSu bAle vRddhe ca taddhitam|| durbhuktAjIrNapArCvArttigulmaplIhodareSu ca| gaNDamAlAsu vAte ca pANDuroge ca Casyate||" iti|

sa0-yathA trivRtAyA vidhAnamuktaM "atha kAle tataCcUrNaM kiJcinnAgarasaindhavam|"(Clo.7)   ityAdi, tathaiva harItakyA api vidhAtavyamityarthaH|
sa0-guDasyASTapale pathyAviMCatirdantIcitrakayoH palaM palaM pratyekaM syAt|  pippalItrivRtayoH karSAvubhau|  daCa modakAnevaM prakalpyaikamekaM modakaM daCame daCame dine yojayet|  paCcAduSNAmbu pibet|  amunA vidhinA sarvAn modakAn bhakSayet|  ete modakA niSparihArAstathA~aCeSavyAdhinibarhaNAH syuH|  viCeSeNa grahaNyAdInAM hitAH|  sambandhamAtrasya vivakSitatvAdatra SaSThI, anyathA tu hitayoge caturthI syAt|

A0 ra0-  prayogAntaramAha-guDasyeti| pathyAviMCatiriti phalAnAM viMCatiH, palAnAm| "saGkhayA phalAnAM CataCo~apalA syAt" iti vacanAt| sarvasya cUrNasya guDapAkena daCa modakAn prakalpya, daCame daCame~ahanyekaM khAdet| evaM sarvAn khAdeddivasadvyaCItyA| saGgrahe tu (ka. a. 2)- "viCeSAdgrahaNICophapANDumehodarApahAm| pibetpathyAM sasindhUtthaviDaGgoSaNanAgarAm|| mUtreNa vatsakAdervA niryUheNa harItakIm| pathyAnAgaracUrNaM vA saMyuktaM nIlinIphalaiH|| guDena bhakSayettoyaM kavoSNaM prapibedanu| pathyAtrivRdUbhyAM guTikAH kAryA drAkSArasaplutAH|| mASapramANAstAH CuSkA yakSmI lihyAddhRtaplutAH| pathyAtrivRtpaTUSNAmbu sarvaCreSThaM virecanam|| snukkSIrabhAvite pathyAcUrNe kurvIta modakAn| kolAsthimAtrAn CuSkAMCca navanItena lehayet|| gulmodarayakRtplIhaCUlAnAhavibandhinaH| lihyAderaNDatailena kuSThaM trikaTukAnvitam|| sukhodakaM cAnu pibet sukhametadvirecanam|" iti|

ryuktAni deyAni virecanAni||2||  62 1/2||2||  iti CrIvaidyapatisiMhaguptasUnuCrImadvAgphaTaviracitA

		virecanakalpo nAma dvitIyo~adhyAyaH||2||

virecanakalpAdhyAyaH

sa0-alpasya-vIryeNa mAtrayA vA kadAcidalpauSadhayogasya, kenacittattadyogyauSadhasaMCleSeNa tasya mahArthatvaM kAryam|  tathA kAlena-madhyAhnAdinA, tathA saMskAreNa-tadyogyena guNAntarotpAdanena, tathA yuktyA-yojanAprakAraviCeSeNa, tathA vIryeNa prabhUtasya-mAtrayA~athavA mahArthasya, kadAcit kenaciddravyeNa viCleSaM kRtvA tasyAlpakarmatvaM kAryam|  tathA kAlena pratyUSAdinA mandavIryeNa, tathA saMskAreNa-guNAntarAdhAnena, tathA yuktyA-tAdRCyA, alpaCaktitvalakSaNaM karma kAryam|  tvakkesarAdibhistaistaiH-anyaiCca tathAvidhaiH, manonukUlaiH-mAnasapriyaiH, auSadhairyuktAni virecanAni deyAni|  evaM kRte sati samyagyogo virecanasya syAditi|  upajAtirvRttam|

	kAyAM sarvAGgasundarAkhyAyAM paJcame kalpasiddhisthAne vire-

 vamanaM mRdukoSThena kSudvatA~alphakaphena vA||1||  atitIkSNahimastokamajIrNe durbalena vA||1||  pItaM prayAtyadhastasminniSTahAnirmalodayaH||2||  vAmayettaM punaH snigdhaM smaran pUrvamatikramam||2||

atha madanakalpaH||1||  vamane madanaM CreSThaM, trivRnmUlaM virecane||1||  nityamanyasya tu vyAdhiviCeSeNa viCiSTatA||1||

sa0-vamanaviSaye nityaM madanaM CreSTham , nirapAyitvAdanyadravyaviSaye~api vA tasyopayogAt sarvatrAniSiddhaprasaratwAcca| lAghavamicchaMCca tantrakRdidamavocat-`trivRnmUlaM virecane'iti| yathA madanaM vamane nityaM CreSThaM , tathA trivRnmUlaM virecane ,  nirapAyitvAdihetunA| madanaM varjayitwA  vyAdhivaCAdanyasya-jImUtAdeH , viCiSTatA| vakSyati hi (Clo. 19)-  "jImUtaM tu viCeSataH| prayoktavyaM jvaraCvAsakAsahidhmAdirogiNAm| " iti| evaM trivRnmUlaM varjayitwA parasya virecanadravyasya vyAdhiviCeSeNa viCiSTatvam, na tu trivRnmUlavatsarvatrAniSiddhaprasaratvaM nirapAyitvaM ca| tathA coktam (saGgrahe sU. a. 13)-  "trivRtsukhavirecanAnAm| " iti| tadevaM vamane madanaM CreSThaM trivRnmUlaM viracane sarvadeti sthitam|

sa0-vamanavirecanayorvyApat-ayathACAstramanuSThIyamAnayorgadotpattiH, tasyA vamanavirecanavyApadaH siddhiH-sAdhanaM cikitsitaM, tAM varNayiSyAmaH|

A0 ra0 -vamanavirecanavyApatsiddhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-atheti|  vyApadaCcoktAH saGgrahe (ka. a. 3)- "pratikUlA gatiH pAko grathitatvaM sagauravam|  doSotkleCo bhRCAdhmAnaM parikartaH parisravaH||  pravAhikA hRdgrahaNaM sarvagAtraparigrahaH|  saha dhAtusraveNaitA dvAdaCoktAH sasAdhanAH||  vyApado yogavibhraMCAdvividhe~api virecane|" iti|

 vamanaM mRdukoSThena kSudvatA~alphakaphena vA||1||  atitIkSNahimastokamajIrNe durbalena vA||1||  pItaM prayAtyadhastasminniSTahAnirmalodayaH||2||  vAmayettaM punaH snigdhaM smaran pUrvamatikramam||2||

A0 ra0-vamanasya pratikUlAM gatimAha-vamanamiti|  atiCabdastIkSNAdibhistribhiH sambadhyate|  tasmin-vamane|  iSTahAniH-yadarthaM vamanaM tasyAniSpatiH|  malodayo-doSotkleCaH|  taM-tathAbhUtam, snigdhaM kRtvA punarvAmayet, yena sA vyApajjAtA tatpariharan|

sa0-evaMvidhena puruSeNaivaMvidhaM vamanaM pItamadhaH prayAti|   tasmin-vamane~adhastAtprayAte sati, iSTahAniH-abhipretasya vamanakAryasyAniSpattiH|  tathA malasya-vamanasAdhyasya CleSmaNaH kevalasyAnyadoSayuktasya vA, udayaH-svasthAnasthasyaivAmayakaraNaM praticalapravalake ca|  taM-puruSaM pItavamanamapyavAntaM, punaH snigdhaM vAmayet|  pUrvaM snigdhamapIti punaH CabdasyArthaH|  kathaM vAmayet ?  smaran pUrvamatikramam, yato~atikramAt pItavamano~apyasau puruSo vamanakarmaNaH phalaM nAptavAn|  tamatikramaM-aparAdhaM, smaran cetasi kurvANo, na tvevameva, vAmayet|

 ajIrNinaH CleSmavato vrajatyUrdhvaM virecanam||3||  atitIkSNoSNalavaNamahRdyamatiphUri vA||3||  tatra pUrvoditA vyApatsiddhiCca, na tathA~api cet||4||  ACaye tiSThati tatastRtIyaM nAvacArayet||4||  anyatra sAtmyAddhRdyAdvA pheSajAnnirapAyataH||5||

sa0-ajIrNinastathA bahuCleSmiNo virecanamatitIkSNoSNalavaNahRdyamatiprabhUtaM ca pItamUrdhvaM yAti|  tatra-tasminnUrdhvaM vrajati, pUrvoktA(ditA) vyApat-iSTahAnirmalodaya iti|  tatra tathaiva siddhiH-cikitsitam|  tathA, anantaraM virecanasyordhvagamanAdaviriktaM punaH snigdhaM virecayet|  tathaiva pUrvaM virecanAtikramaM smarannito~aparAdhAtpUrvaM virecane na viriktastamatikramaM pariharan virecayedityarthaH|  tathA~api-evamanuSThIyamAne tadvirecanauSadhaM pItaM, yadyACaye-koSThalakSaNe, na tiSThati-tatra sthitiM na badhnAti Urdhvameva punareti, tatastRtIyaM virecanauSadhaM-AragvadhAdi, nAvacArayet|  yadi tu sAtmyaM hRdyaM nirapAyaM vA bheSajaM tadA tRtIyamapyavacArayet|

A0 ra0-virecanasya pratikUlAM gatimAha-ajIrNina iti|  tatra-virecane|  pUrvoditA-vamanoktA, vyApat-iSTahAnirmalodaya ityeSA, siddhiCca-taM snigdhaM punarvirecayedityeSA|  tathA~api-tenApi prakAreNa, yadyACaye virecanaM na tiSThati-UrdhvaM yAti, tataH-anantaraM, tRtIyaM prayogaM nAvacArayet, yadi tu sAtmyaM hRdyaM nirapAyaM vA bheSajaM tadA tRtIyamapyavacAreyet|

 asnigdhasvinnadehasya purANaM rUkSamauSadham||5||  doSAnutkleCya nirhartumaCaktaM janayedgadAn||6||  vibhraMCaM CvayathuM hidhmAM tamaso darCanaM tRSam||6||  piNDIkodveSTanaM kaNDUmUrvoH sAdaM vivarNatAm||7||  snigdhasvinnasya vA~atyalpaM dIptAgnerjIrNamauSadham||7||  CItairvA stabdhamAme vA samutkleCyAharanmalAn||8||  tAneva janayedrogAnayogaH sarva eva saH||8||

sa0-asnigdhasvinnaCarIrasya purANaM rUkSaM virecanauSadhamupayuktaM doSAnutkleCya-pracyAvya, nirhartumaCaktaM vibhraMCAdikAn gadAn janayet|  athavA, snigdhasvinnasya cauSadhamatyalpaM-mAtrAhInaM, dIptAgnerjIrNaM-pariNataM, syAt|  CItairvA stabdhabheSajamAme vA stabdhaM sat [malAn-] doSAn, utkleCyAnirharat pUrvoktAneva rogAn janayet|  saH-evaMbhUtaH, sarva evAyogaH|

A0 ra0-grathitatvapAkagauravANyAha-asnigdheti|   tatra "vivarNatAm" ityantena grathitatvam|  "auSadham" ityantena pAkam|  CeSeNa gauravam|  vibhraMCaM-iSTahAnim|  jIrNaM-pakvam|  CItaiH-auSadhapAnAnantaramantarbahirvA sevitaiH, auSadhaM stabdhaM bhavati|  tadvadAme-apakvadoSe|  tAneva-vibhraMCAdIn|  saGgrahe tu (ka. a. 3)- "snigdhasvinnasya ca vamanamakRtvA virecanaM pItavataH sAmasya vA mRdu vA viriktasyAdhobhAge~atyarthagurustabdhodaratA CUlo vAtapurISasaGgaCca bhavati|" ityuktam|

 taM tailalavaNAphyaktaM svinnaM prastarasaGkaraiH||9||  nirUDhaM jAGgalarasairphojayitvA~anuvAsayet||9||  phalamAgadhikAdArusiddhatailena mAtrayA||10||  snigdhaM vAtaharaiH snehaiH punastIkSNena Codhayet||10||

sa0-taM-utkliSTadoSaM, tailalavaNAbhyaktaM prastarasaGkarAkhyaiH svedaiH svinnaM tathA nirUDhaM jAGgalarasairbhojayitvA phalAdisiddhatailena mAtrayA~anuvAsayet|  vAtaharaiH snehaiH snigdhaM punastIkSNena virecanena viCodhayet|

A0 ra0-taM-trividhAyoginaM, nirUDhaM-samUtraistIkSNairnirUhaiH, saGgrahe (ka. a. 3) tathoktatvAt, madanaphalAditailenAnuvAsayet|

 bahudoSasya rUkSasya mandAgneralpamauSadham||11||  sodAvartasya cotkleCya doSAn mArgAn nirudhya taiH||11||  bhRCamAdhmApayennAbhiM pRSThapArCvaCirorujam||12||  CvAsaM viNmUtravAtanAM saGgaM kuryAcca dAruNam||12||  abhyaGgasvedavartyAdi sanirUhAnuvAsanam||13||  udAvartaharaM sarvaM karmAdhmAtasya Casyate||13||  paJcamUlayavakSAravacAbhUtikasaindhavaiH||14||  yavAgUH sukRtA CUlavibandhAnAhanACanI||14||

sa0-bahudoSasya rUkSasya tathA mandAgneralpamauSadhaM yojitaM tathodAvartavato doSAnutkleCya mArgAn nirudhya taiCca doSairbhRCaM nAbhimAdhmApayet|  tathA pRSThAdirujAdIn kuryAt|  AdhmAtasya narasyAbhyaGgAdikaM karma udAvartaharaM sarvaM Casyate|  paJcamUlAdibhiH sukRtA yavAgUH CUlAdinACanI|

A0 ra0-doSotkleCabhRCAdhmAne Aha-bahudoSasyeti|  tatra "utkleCya doSAn" ityantena doSotkleCam|  CeSeNa bhRCAdhmAnam|  uktaM hi saGgrahe (ka. a. 3)- "kapholbaNasyAtisnigdhasya gurukoSThasya mandAgnervA mRdupraNItamauSadhaM bhRCamutkleCya doSAn jADyatandrAdaurbalyAGgasAdAn janayati|  tacchIghramullikhet|  laGghitaM ca sandhukSitAgniM punaH snigdhaM tIkSNOSNairviCodhayet|  saCeSAnnAya vAtaCleSmavate rUkSAya sodAvartAya mandAgnaye vA CItaM rUkSaM vA dattamauSadhaM bhRCamAdhmAnaM karoti|  tatra malasaGgAtsamunnahyatyudaramantaHCUlaM dRtivatpArCvayorApUrNatA CiraHpRSTharujA CvAsaH pAyuvastinistodaCca bhavati|  tamudAvartAnAhaharAbhyaGgasvedavartidIpanacUrNabastikriyAbhirupAcaret|" iti|  taiH-utkliSTadoSaiH|  nAbhiM-nAbhisamIpamudaram|  paJcamUlAdiyavAgUH sukRtA-trikaTulavaNasnehayutA|  paJcamUlaM-mahat|  uktaM hi vRndena (jvarAtisArAdhikAra Clo.16)- "paJcamUlIti sAmAnyAdbhAhyA pitte kanIyasI|  mahatI paJcamUlI tu vAtaCleSamottare hitA||" iti|  bhUtikaM-rohiSam|  saindhavasYa kvAthyadravyeSUktAvapi siddhAyAM yavAgvAM lavaNasthAne prayogaH|  ata eva sukRtACabdena kRtAkhyo bheda ucyate|

 pipalIdADimakSArahiGguCuNThyamlavetasAn||15||  sasaindhavAn pibenmadyaiH sarpiSoSNodakena vA||15||  pravAhikAparisrAvavedanAparikartane||16||

sa0-pippalyAdIn madyena sarpiSoSNAmbunA vA pibet pravAhikAdiSu|

A0 ra0-pravAhikAditraye bheSajamAha-pippalIti|  pippalyAdicUrNaM madyAdyanyatamena pravAhikAdiSu tisRSu vyApatsu pibet|  vedanayA parikartanaM-chedanamiva|  saGgrahe tu (ka. a. 3)-"kSAmeNAlpabalena  mRdukoSThAgninA rUkSeNa snigdhena vA svinnena sAmena vA balavadauSadhamupayuktaM sapittamanilaM paridUSya parikartikAmApAdayati|  tatra nAbhibastigudameDhre sadAhaM parikartanamanilasaGgo viSTambhaCca|  taM kRSNatilamadhukamadhuyuktaiH picchAbastibhirAsthApayet|  kSIrivRkSaCRtakSIreNa vA, CItAmbupariSiktaM cainaM payasA bhuktavantaM ghRtamaNDena yaSTImadhukatailena vA~anuvAsayet|  kSAmasya ca madhuro bRMhaNaCca sarvo vidhiriSTaH|  sAme dIpano laGghanaCca, laghurUkSoSNaM cAnnapAnam|  nirAmIbhUte cAnubandhe laghukSArAmlam|  vAte~adhike dadhi sAmlaM dADimatvacA yuktaM bhojane pAne ca yuJjIta|  sadADimarasaM sarpiH pibet|  uSNAmbunA vA tiladevadArukalkam|  krUrakoSThasya bahudoSasyAlpamalpaguNaM mRdusnigdhaM vA CodhanamavacAritamutkleCya doSAnna nirharati, alpAlpaM ca pittakaphasaMsRSTaM parisravati, viSTambhagauravaCophakoThakaNDUpANDutAGgasAdagudaCUlAni cApAdayati|  taM tiniCadhavACvakarNapalACabalAniryUhairmadhuyuktairAsthApayet|  upaCAntaparisravaM ca punarupasnigdhaM tIkSNaiH Codhayet|  Cuddhe ca dIpanAMCcUrNAsavAriSTAdIn yojayet|  pItauSadho yadA vegamudIrayati nigRhNAti vA, tadA pravAhikA~asya jAyate|  tasyAM sadAhaCUlaM sapicchaM CvetaM kRSNaM saraktaM vA bhRCaM pravAhamAnaH kaphamupaviCati|  taM paristravavidhinopacaret|" iti|

 pItauSadhasya vegAnAM nigrahAnmArutAdayaH||16||  kupitA hRdayaM gatvA ghoraM kurvanti hRdgraham||17||  hidhmApArCvarujAkAsadainyalAlAkSivibhramaiH||17||  jihvAM khAdati niHsaMjJo dantAn kaTakaTAyayan||18||  na gacchedvibhramaM tatra vAmayedACu taM bhiSak||18||  madhuraiH pittamUrcchArtaM kaTubhiH kaphamUrcchitam||19||  pAcanIyaistataCvAsya doSaCeSaM vipAcayet||19||  kAyAgniM ca balaM cAsya krameNAbhipravardhayet||20||  gh||21||

A0 ra0-hRdgrahamAha-pItauSadhasyeti|  akSivibhramaH-utdhRtAkSatvam|  kaTakaTAyayan-kaTatkaTaditi kArayan, "lohitAdiDAjUbhyaH kyaS" iti kyaSantANNica|  saGgrahe tu (ka. a. 3)-"tasmai bhiSak CIghramamuhyannabhyaGgapUrvaM dhAnyasvedena parisvedya tIkSNamavapIDaM dadyAt|  yathAdoSocchrAyaM ca bastIn vitaret|" iti|

sa0- pItauSadhasya vegAnAM nigrahAdvAtAdayaH kupitA hRdayaM gatvA ghoraM hRdgrahaM kurvanti|  hidhmAdiyuktaH sa ca hRdgrahAdimAn jihvAM khAdati niHsaMjJaH san|  tathA dantAn kaTakaTAyate|  tatra tasminnavasthAviCeSe, bhiSagACveva taM-rogiNaM, saMCayaM hitvA vAmayet|  madhuraiH pittamUrcchArtaM vAmayet|  kaphamUrcchitaM kaTubhirvAmayet| vAmayitvA cAsya doSaCeSaM pAcanIyairdravyairvipAcayet|  kAyAgniM balaM ca krameNAsyAbhipravardhayet|

 pavanenAtivamato hRdayaM yasya pIDyate||20||  tasmai snigdhAmlalavaNAn dadyAtpittakaphe~anyathA||21||

sa0-yasyAtivamataH pavanena hRdayaM pIDyate, tasmai rogiNe snigdhAmlalavaNaM dadyAt|  pittakaphe kupite, anyathA-madhuraCItAdikaM, dadyAdityarthaH|

A0 ra0-hRdgrahaviCeSe bheSajamAha-pavaneneti|  anyatheti rUkSamadhurakaTutiktakaSAyAn yogAn dadyAt|

 phItauSadhasya vegAnAM nigraheNa kaphena vA||21||  ruddho~ati vA viCuddhasya gRhNAtyaGgAni mArutaH||22||  stamphavepathunistodasAdodveSTArtiphedanaiH||22||  tatra vAtaharaM sarvaM snehasvedAdi Casyate||23||

sa0-pItabheSajasya vegAnAM nigraheNa kaphena vA ruddho~ati viCuddhasya vA vAyuraGgAni gRhNAti stambhAdibhiH|  tatra sarvaM vAtaharaM snehasvedAdi Casyate|

A0 ra0-sarvagAtraparigrahamAha-pItauSadhasyeti|  saGgrahe tu (ka. a. 3)- "asnigdhasvinnenAbrahmacAriNA vegadhAriNA mRdukoSThena sukumAreNa vA rUkSamauSadhamatimAtraprayuktamativirekAdvAyuM prakopayati|  tena sarvAGgapragrahe viCeSAtpArCvapRSTha CroNimanyAmarmasu CUlaM mUrcchA bhramaH kampaH stambho nistodo bheda udveSTanaM saMjJAnACaCca syAt|  tamabhyajya dhAnyaiH svedayitvA yaSTImadhuvipakvena tailenAnuvAsayet, vAtaharaM cAnnapAnam|" iti|

kalpasiddhisthAnam

vamanavirecanavyApatsiddhiradhyAyaH

 athAto vamanavirecanavyApatsiddhiM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtredayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-vamanavirecanayorvyApat-ayathACAstramanuSThIyamAnayorgadotpattiH, tasyA vamanavirecanavyApadaH siddhiH-sAdhanaM cikitsitaM, tAM varNayiSyAmaH|

A0 ra0 -vamanavirecanavyApatsiddhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-atheti|  vyApadaCcoktAH saGgrahe (ka. a. 3)- "pratikUlA gatiH pAko grathitatvaM sagauravam|  doSotkleCo bhRCAdhmAnaM parikartaH parisravaH||  pravAhikA hRdgrahaNaM sarvagAtraparigrahaH|  saha dhAtusraveNaitA dvAdaCoktAH sasAdhanAH||  vyApado yogavibhraMCAdvividhe~api virecane|" iti|

 vamanaM mRdukoSThena kSudvatA~alphakaphena vA||1||  atitIkSNahimastokamajIrNe durbalena vA||1||  pItaM prayAtyadhastasminniSTahAnirmalodayaH||2||  vAmayettaM punaH snigdhaM smaran pUrvamatikramam||2||

A0 ra0-vamanasya pratikUlAM gatimAha-vamanamiti|  atiCabdastIkSNAdibhistribhiH sambadhyate|  tasmin-vamane|  iSTahAniH-yadarthaM vamanaM tasyAniSpatiH|  malodayo-doSotkleCaH|  taM-tathAbhUtam, snigdhaM kRtvA punarvAmayet, yena sA vyApajjAtA tatpariharan|

sa0-evaMvidhena puruSeNaivaMvidhaM vamanaM pItamadhaH prayAti|   tasmin-vamane~adhastAtprayAte sati, iSTahAniH-abhipretasya vamanakAryasyAniSpattiH|  tathA malasya-vamanasAdhyasya CleSmaNaH kevalasyAnyadoSayuktasya vA, udayaH-svasthAnasthasyaivAmayakaraNaM praticalapravalake ca|  taM-puruSaM pItavamanamapyavAntaM, punaH snigdhaM vAmayet|  pUrvaM snigdhamapIti punaH CabdasyArthaH|  kathaM vAmayet ?  smaran pUrvamatikramam, yato~atikramAt pItavamano~apyasau puruSo vamanakarmaNaH phalaM nAptavAn|  tamatikramaM-aparAdhaM, smaran cetasi kurvANo, na tvevameva, vAmayet|

 ajIrNinaH CleSmavato vrajatyUrdhvaM virecanam||3||  atitIkSNoSNalavaNamahRdyamatiphUri vA||3||  tatra pUrvoditA vyApatsiddhiCca, na tathA~api cet||4||  ACaye tiSThati tatastRtIyaM nAvacArayet||4||  anyatra sAtmyAddhRdyAdvA pheSajAnnirapAyataH||5||

sa0-ajIrNinastathA bahuCleSmiNo virecanamatitIkSNoSNalavaNahRdyamatiprabhUtaM ca pItamUrdhvaM yAti|  tatra-tasminnUrdhvaM vrajati, pUrvoktA(ditA) vyApat-iSTahAnirmalodaya iti|  tatra tathaiva siddhiH-cikitsitam|  tathA, anantaraM virecanasyordhvagamanAdaviriktaM punaH snigdhaM virecayet|  tathaiva pUrvaM virecanAtikramaM smarannito~aparAdhAtpUrvaM virecane na viriktastamatikramaM pariharan virecayedityarthaH|  tathA~api-evamanuSThIyamAne tadvirecanauSadhaM pItaM, yadyACaye-koSThalakSaNe, na tiSThati-tatra sthitiM na badhnAti Urdhvameva punareti, tatastRtIyaM virecanauSadhaM-AragvadhAdi, nAvacArayet|  yadi tu sAtmyaM hRdyaM nirapAyaM vA bheSajaM tadA tRtIyamapyavacArayet|

A0 ra0-virecanasya pratikUlAM gatimAha-ajIrNina iti|  tatra-virecane|  pUrvoditA-vamanoktA, vyApat-iSTahAnirmalodaya ityeSA, siddhiCca-taM snigdhaM punarvirecayedityeSA|  tathA~api-tenApi prakAreNa, yadyACaye virecanaM na tiSThati-UrdhvaM yAti, tataH-anantaraM, tRtIyaM prayogaM nAvacArayet, yadi tu sAtmyaM hRdyaM nirapAyaM vA bheSajaM tadA tRtIyamapyavacAreyet|

 asnigdhasvinnadehasya purANaM rUkSamauSadham||5||  doSAnutkleCya nirhartumaCaktaM janayedgadAn||6||  vibhraMCaM CvayathuM hidhmAM tamaso darCanaM tRSam||6||  piNDIkodveSTanaM kaNDUmUrvoH sAdaM vivarNatAm||7||  snigdhasvinnasya vA~atyalpaM dIptAgnerjIrNamauSadham||7||  CItairvA stabdhamAme vA samutkleCyAharanmalAn||8||  tAneva janayedrogAnayogaH sarva eva saH||8||

sa0-asnigdhasvinnaCarIrasya purANaM rUkSaM virecanauSadhamupayuktaM doSAnutkleCya-pracyAvya, nirhartumaCaktaM vibhraMCAdikAn gadAn janayet|  athavA, snigdhasvinnasya cauSadhamatyalpaM-mAtrAhInaM, dIptAgnerjIrNaM-pariNataM, syAt|  CItairvA stabdhabheSajamAme vA stabdhaM sat [malAn-] doSAn, utkleCyAnirharat pUrvoktAneva rogAn janayet|  saH-evaMbhUtaH, sarva evAyogaH|

 asmAdanantaraM bastivyApatsiddhirvyAkhyAyate----||1||

A0 ra0-

 athAto bastivyApatsiddhiM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-athAta iti pUrvavat| (asamyak prayukteSu bastiSu yA vyApadaH, tAsAM sAdhanAyAsyAdhyAyasyArambhaH|)

A0 ra0-bastivyApatsiddhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAtuM pratijAnIte-atheti|  bastivyApadaCca dvAdaCoktAH saGgrahe (ka.a.6)- "vibandhagauravAdhmAnaCirorugvAhanordhvagAH|  kukSiCUlAGgarughidhmAhRtpIDAkartanasravAH||  ayogAdatiyogAcca basteH syuH SaT SaDApadaH|" iti|

 asnigdhasvinnadehasya gurukoSThasya yojitaH||1||  CIto~alpasnehalavaNadravyamAtro ghano~api vA||1||  bastiH saGkSobhya taM doSaM durbalatvAdanirharan||2||  karotyayogaM tena syAdvAtamUtraCakRdagrahaH||2||  nAbhibastirujA dAho hRllepaH Cvayathurgude||3||  kaNDUrgaNDAni vaivarNyamaratirvahnimArdavam||3||  kvAthadvayaM prAgvihitaM madhyadoSe~atisAriNi||4||  uSNasya tasmAdekasya tatra pAnaM praCasyate||4||  phalavartyastathA svedAH kAlaM jJAtvA virecanam||5||  bilvamUlatrivRddAruyavakolakulatthavAn||5||  surAdimUtravAn bastiH saprAkpeSyastamAnayet||6||

sa0-astrigdhAdiguNasya puMsaH CiCirastathA~alpasnehalavaNo~alpadravyamAtraH-alpadravyakalpaH(lkaH), tathA ghano-bahudravyakalko, bastiryojitaH san bastisAdhyaM doSaM saGkSobhya durbalatvAdanirharan ayogaM karoti|  tena-ayogena, vAtAdigrahaH syAt|  prAk-atisAracikitsite (ci. a. 9/6) kvAthadvayaM-pAcanayugulaM-madhya doSe~atisAriNi vihitaM bhUtIkapippalyAdireko bilvadhaniko dvitIyaH, tasmAt-kvAthadvayAt, ekasya-anyatarasya kvAthasyoSNasya, tatrAvasthAyAM pAnaM praCasyate, tathA phalavartayaH svedACca nAnAvidhAH, avasthACca jJAtvA virecanaM Casyate|  tathA bilvAdimAn bastistathA surAdimAn bastiH, saprAkpeSyaH-"balAM guDUcIM" (ka. a. 4/1) ityAdau bastau yaH peSyo yavAnyAdikRt tena prAkpeSyeNa saha vartata iti saprAkpeSyaH|  tamatra dattavastinotkliSTaM doSamAnayet-AkarSayet|

A0 ra0-vibandhAkhyAM vyApadamAha-asnigdheti|  dravyaMkvAthyaM peSyaM ca|  taM doSaM-yadarthaM dattaH|  kvAthadvayaM-"pibet prakavathitAstoye madhyadoSo viCoSayan|  bhutIkapippalICuNThIvacAdhAnyaharItakIH||  athavA bilvadhanikAmustanAgaravAlakam|" (hR.ci.a. 915) ityuktam|  bhUtIkaM-kaTtRNam|  prAkpeSyaM-"pUtoyavAnIphalabilvakuSThavacACatAvhAghanapippalInAm|  kalkaiH (hR.ka.a. 4/2) ityuktam|  surA-madirA|  AdiCabdAdanyadapyamlam|  
gauravAkhyAM vyApadaM tvAha saGgrahe (ka.a. 6)-"saCeSAme nirUheNa mRdunA doSa IritaH|  mUrcchayatyanilaM mArgaM rUNadhdyagniMhinasti ca||  gauravaklamahRcchUladAhasammohaveSTanam|  tataH kuryAdupacarettaM rUkSasvedapAcanaiH||  pippalIkaTtRNoCIradArumUrvACRtaM jalam|  pibetsauvarcalonmiCraM dIpanaM hRdviCodhanam||   vacAnAgaraCaThyo vA ghRtamaNDena mUrcchitAH|  peyAH prasannayA vA syurariSTanAsavena vA||  dAru trikaTukaM pathyAM palACaM citrakaM CaThIm|  piSThvA kuSThaM ca mUtreNa pibet kSArAMCcha dIpanAn||  bastimasya vidadhyAcca samUtraM dACamUlikam|" iti|

 yukto~alpavIryo doSADhye rUkSe krUrACaye~athavA||6||  bastirdoSAvRto rUddhamArgo rundhyAtsamIraNam||7||  sa vimArgo~anilaH kuryAdAdhmAnaM marmapIDanam||7||  vidAhaM gudakoSThasya muSkavaGkSaNavedanAm||8||  ruNaddhi hRdayaM CUlairitaCcetaCca dhAvati||8||  svabhyaktasvinnagAtrasya tatra vartiM prayojayet||9||  bilvAdiCca nirUhaH syAtpIlusarSapamUtravAn||9||  saralAmaradArubhyAM sAdhitaM cAnuvAsanam||10||

sa0-doSADhye tathA rUkSe krUrakoSThe vA bastiralpavIryo datto doSaiH-vAyvAdyavarakairAvRtaH, anantaraM sa bastI ruddhamArgaH-pratihatagatiprasaraNo, vAyuM rundhyAt|  so~anilo vimArgaga AdhmAnaM kuryAt|  tathA hRdayAdInAM marmaNAM vyadhanaM-pIDanaM, tathA gudakoSThasya vidAhaM, tathA muSkavaGkSaNavedanAM ca kuryAt|  tathA CUlaiH-nAnAvidhAbhirbhagnaruddhamRditapIDitAvanaddhAdibhiH pIDAbhiH, hRdayaM ruNaddhi-AvRNoti|  hRdayamAvRtyAnantaram, itaCcetaCca-aniyate deCe, dhAvati pavanaH|  tatra-avasthAviCeSe, suSTvabhyaktAGgasya svinnAGgasya ca phalavartiM prayojayet|  bilvAdikaCca niruhaH syAt pIlusarSapamUtravAn|  saraladevadArubhyAM sAdhitaM tailaM cAnuvAsanaM syAt|

A0 ra0-AdhmAnAkhyAM vyApadamAha-yukta iti|  bilvAdiH-vibandhavyApadyuktaH|  pIlu-pIluphalam|  
CirorujAkhyAM vyApadaM tvAha saGgrahe (ka.a. 6)-"bahudoSe~abale krUrakoSThe bastistanurmRduH|  CIto~alpaCchAvRto doSaiH pratihanti samIraNam||  UrdhvaM so~anusaran dehaM kuryAdvAyuH Cirorujam|  grIvAstambhaM pratiCyAyaM bAdhiryaM dRSTivibhramam||  tamuSNatailalavaNapradigdhasvinnamarditam|  tIkSNairdhUmaiH pradhamanairnasyairAsyavirecanaiH||  virekairbastibhiCchACu yojayedAnulomikaiH|" iti|  
vAhAnAkhyAM ca vyApadamAha saGgrahe (ka.a. 6)-"snigdhasvinne mahAdoSe bastimRdvalpabheSajaH|  utkleCyAlpaM hareddoSaM janayecca pravAhikAm||  CophaM bastAvapAne ca sadanaM corujaGghayoH|  vibaddhamAruto janturabhIkSNaM sa pravAhate||  svedAbhyaGgAnniruhAMCcha  CodhanIyAnulomikAn|  vidadhyAllaGghayitvA ca vRttiM tasya viriktavat||" iti|

 kurvato vegasaMrodhaM pIDito vA~atimAtrayA||10||  asnigdhalavaNoSNo vA bastiralpo~alpabheSajaH||11||  mRdurvA mArutenordhvaM vikSipto mukhanAsikAt||11||  nireti mUrcchAhRllAsatRDdAhAdIn pravartayan||12||  mUrcchAvikAraM dRSTvA~asya siJcecchItAmbunA mukham||12||  vyejadAklamanACAcca prANAyAmaM ca kArayet||13||  pRSThapArCvodaraM mRjyAt karairuSNairadhomukham||13||  keCeSUtkSipya dhunvIta bhISayedvyAladaMSTribhiH||14||  CastrolkArAjapuruSairbastireti tathA hyadhaH||14||  pANivastrairgalApIDaM kuryAnna mriyate tathA||15||  prANodAnanirodhAddhi suprasiddhatarAyanaH||15||  apAnaH pavano bastiM tamACvevApakarSati||16||  kuSThakramukakalkaM ca pAyetAmlasaMyutam||16||  oSNyAttaikSNyAtsaratvAcca bastiM so~asyAnulomayet 
gomUtreNa trivRtpathyAkalkaM vA~adhonulomanam||17||  pakvACayasthite svinne nirUho dACamUlikaH||18||  yavakolakulatthaiCca vidheyo mUtrasAdhitaiH||18||  bastirgomUtrasiddhairvA sAmRtAvaMCapallavaiH||19||  pUtIkaraJjatvakpatraCaThIdevAhvarohiSaiH||19||  satailaguDasindhUttho virekauSadhakalkavAn||20||  bilvAdipaJcamUlena siddho bastiruraHsthite||20||  CiraHsthe nAvanaM dhUmaH pracchAdyaM sarSapaiH CiraH||21||

sa0-vegasaMrodhaM-vegavidhAraNaM, kurvataH puMso yaH pIDito bastiratimAtrayA vA pIDito~asnigdhalavaNoSNo vA tathA~alpo mAtrayA, alpabheSajaCca mRdurvA, sa tathAbhUto mArutenordhvaM kSipto mUkhanAsikAt nireti-nirgacchati|  mUrcchAdIn pravartayet(yan)|  
	asya tu-tathAvidhabasteH puruSasya, mUrcchAdivikAraM dRSTvA CItAmbunA mukhaM siJcet|  tathA klamanACaM yAvat taM tAlavRntAdinA vIjayet|  tathA taM puruSaM prANAyAmaM ca kArayet,  prANAyAmena hyUrdhvaM vikSipto bastiradho yAti|  uSNaiH karaiH pRSThaM pArCvamudaraM ca mRjyAt|  tathA taM puruSamadhomukhaM kRtvA keCairutkSipyordhvaM nItvA vapurdhunvIta|  tathA vyAlAdibhirbhISayet|  tathordhvaM pravRtto bastiryasmAdadho gacchati|  tathA pANivastrairgalApIDaM kuryAdyathA na mriyeta|  evaM sati prANodAnanirodhaH sampadyate, prANodAnanirodhAdyasmAdadhogaH suprasiddhatarAyano bhUtvA~apAno vAyustaM bastiM drAgevApakarSati-UrdhvAdadhaH kSipati|  suSThu-prakarSeNa, prasiddhataramayanaM yasya sa suprasiddhatarAyanaH|  kuSThAdikalkaM cAmlasaMyutaM pAyayet| [ saH ] kalkaH, asya-Aturasya, uSNAdiguNayogAttaM bastimanulomayet|  trivRtAdikalkaM pItaM gomUtreNAdhonulomanam|  pakvACayasthite doSe snigdhe (svinne) niruho dACamUliko vidhAtavyaH|  yavAdibhiCca gomUtrasAdhitairbastirvidheyaH|  athavA gomUtrasiddhairguDUcyAdibhistailaguDasaindhavayukto bastirvirekadravyakalkavAn vidheyaH|  urasi sthite bilvAdipaJcamUlena siddho bastirvidhAtavyaH|  Cirasi sthite bastau nasyaM dhUmaCca, CiraCca sarSapakalkena pracchAdanIyam|

A0 ra0-UrdhvamArutAkhyAM vyApadamAha-kurvata iti|  mRjyAt-mardayet|  bhISayet-trAsayet|  pANibhiCca vastraiCca|  suprasiddhataraM-gudaM meDhraM ca, ayanamasya sa tathA|  kramukaM-pUgaH|  daCamUlayavAdInAM mUtre kvAthaH, amRtAdInAM vA saptAnAm|  amRtA-guDUcI|  tvak patraM ca pUtIkaraJjasya|  tailAdiyogastu dvayorapi kvAthayoH, bilvAdikvAthasyApi|  ityayogavyApadaH|

 asnigdhasvinnadehasya gurukoSThasya yojitaH||1||  CIto~alpasnehalavaNadravyamAtro ghano~api vA||1||  bastiH saGkSobhya taM doSaM durbalatvAdanirharan||2||  karotyayogaM tena syAdvAtamUtraCakRdagrahaH||2||  nAbhibastirujA dAho hRllepaH Cvayathurgude||3||  kaNDUrgaNDAni vaivarNyamaratirvahnimArdavam||3||  kvAthadvayaM prAgvihitaM madhyadoSe~atisAriNi||4||  uSNasya tasmAdekasya tatra pAnaM praCasyate||4||  phalavartyastathA svedAH kAlaM jJAtvA virecanam||5||  bilvamUlatrivRddAruyavakolakulatthavAn||5||  surAdimUtravAn bastiH saprAkpeSyastamAnayet||6||

sa0-astrigdhAdiguNasya puMsaH CiCirastathA~alpasnehalavaNo~alpadravyamAtraH-alpadravyakalpaH(lkaH), tathA ghano-bahudravyakalko, bastiryojitaH san bastisAdhyaM doSaM saGkSobhya durbalatvAdanirharan ayogaM karoti|  tena-ayogena, vAtAdigrahaH syAt|  prAk-atisAracikitsite (ci. a. 9/6) kvAthadvayaM-pAcanayugulaM-madhya doSe~atisAriNi vihitaM bhUtIkapippalyAdireko bilvadhaniko dvitIyaH, tasmAt-kvAthadvayAt, ekasya-anyatarasya kvAthasyoSNasya, tatrAvasthAyAM pAnaM praCasyate, tathA phalavartayaH svedACca nAnAvidhAH, avasthACca jJAtvA virecanaM Casyate|  tathA bilvAdimAn bastistathA surAdimAn bastiH, saprAkpeSyaH-"balAM guDUcIM" (ka. a. 4/1) ityAdau bastau yaH peSyo yavAnyAdikRt tena prAkpeSyeNa saha vartata iti saprAkpeSyaH|  tamatra dattavastinotkliSTaM doSamAnayet-AkarSayet|

A0 ra0-vibandhAkhyAM vyApadamAha-asnigdheti|  dravyaMkvAthyaM peSyaM ca|  taM doSaM-yadarthaM dattaH|  kvAthadvayaM-"pibet prakavathitAstoye madhyadoSo viCoSayan|  bhutIkapippalICuNThIvacAdhAnyaharItakIH||  athavA bilvadhanikAmustanAgaravAlakam|" (hR.ci.a. 915) ityuktam|  bhUtIkaM-kaTtRNam|  prAkpeSyaM-"pUtoyavAnIphalabilvakuSThavacACatAvhAghanapippalInAm|  kalkaiH (hR.ka.a. 4/2) ityuktam|  surA-madirA|  AdiCabdAdanyadapyamlam|  
gauravAkhyAM vyApadaM tvAha saGgrahe (ka.a. 6)-"saCeSAme nirUheNa mRdunA doSa IritaH|  mUrcchayatyanilaM mArgaM rUNadhdyagniMhinasti ca||  gauravaklamahRcchUladAhasammohaveSTanam|  tataH kuryAdupacarettaM rUkSasvedapAcanaiH||  pippalIkaTtRNoCIradArumUrvACRtaM jalam|  pibetsauvarcalonmiCraM dIpanaM hRdviCodhanam||   vacAnAgaraCaThyo vA ghRtamaNDena mUrcchitAH|  peyAH prasannayA vA syurariSTanAsavena vA||  dAru trikaTukaM pathyAM palACaM citrakaM CaThIm|  piSThvA kuSThaM ca mUtreNa pibet kSArAMCcha dIpanAn||  bastimasya vidadhyAcca samUtraM dACamUlikam|" iti|

 yukto~alpavIryo doSADhye rUkSe krUrACaye~athavA||6||  bastirdoSAvRto rUddhamArgo rundhyAtsamIraNam||7||  sa vimArgo~anilaH kuryAdAdhmAnaM marmapIDanam||7||  vidAhaM gudakoSThasya muSkavaGkSaNavedanAm||8||  ruNaddhi hRdayaM CUlairitaCcetaCca dhAvati||8||  svabhyaktasvinnagAtrasya tatra vartiM prayojayet||9||  bilvAdiCca nirUhaH syAtpIlusarSapamUtravAn||9||  saralAmaradArubhyAM sAdhitaM cAnuvAsanam||10||

sa0-doSADhye tathA rUkSe krUrakoSThe vA bastiralpavIryo datto doSaiH-vAyvAdyavarakairAvRtaH, anantaraM sa bastI ruddhamArgaH-pratihatagatiprasaraNo, vAyuM rundhyAt|  so~anilo vimArgaga AdhmAnaM kuryAt|  tathA hRdayAdInAM marmaNAM vyadhanaM-pIDanaM, tathA gudakoSThasya vidAhaM, tathA muSkavaGkSaNavedanAM ca kuryAt|  tathA CUlaiH-nAnAvidhAbhirbhagnaruddhamRditapIDitAvanaddhAdibhiH pIDAbhiH, hRdayaM ruNaddhi-AvRNoti|  hRdayamAvRtyAnantaram, itaCcetaCca-aniyate deCe, dhAvati pavanaH|  tatra-avasthAviCeSe, suSTvabhyaktAGgasya svinnAGgasya ca phalavartiM prayojayet|  bilvAdikaCca niruhaH syAt pIlusarSapamUtravAn|  saraladevadArubhyAM sAdhitaM tailaM cAnuvAsanaM syAt|

A0 ra0-AdhmAnAkhyAM vyApadamAha-yukta iti|  bilvAdiH-vibandhavyApadyuktaH|  pIlu-pIluphalam|  
CirorujAkhyAM vyApadaM tvAha saGgrahe (ka.a. 6)-"bahudoSe~abale krUrakoSThe bastistanurmRduH|  CIto~alpaCchAvRto doSaiH pratihanti samIraNam||  UrdhvaM so~anusaran dehaM kuryAdvAyuH Cirorujam|  grIvAstambhaM pratiCyAyaM bAdhiryaM dRSTivibhramam||  tamuSNatailalavaNapradigdhasvinnamarditam|  tIkSNairdhUmaiH pradhamanairnasyairAsyavirecanaiH||  virekairbastibhiCchACu yojayedAnulomikaiH|" iti|  
vAhAnAkhyAM ca vyApadamAha saGgrahe (ka.a. 6)-"snigdhasvinne mahAdoSe bastimRdvalpabheSajaH|  utkleCyAlpaM hareddoSaM janayecca pravAhikAm||  CophaM bastAvapAne ca sadanaM corujaGghayoH|  vibaddhamAruto janturabhIkSNaM sa pravAhate||  svedAbhyaGgAnniruhAMCcha  CodhanIyAnulomikAn|  vidadhyAllaGghayitvA ca vRttiM tasya viriktavat||" iti|

 kurvato vegasaMrodhaM pIDito vA~atimAtrayA||10||  asnigdhalavaNoSNo vA bastiralpo~alpabheSajaH||11||  mRdurvA mArutenordhvaM vikSipto mukhanAsikAt||11||  nireti mUrcchAhRllAsatRDdAhAdIn pravartayan||12||  mUrcchAvikAraM dRSTvA~asya siJcecchItAmbunA mukham||12||  vyejadAklamanACAcca prANAyAmaM ca kArayet||13||  pRSThapArCvodaraM mRjyAt karairuSNairadhomukham||13||  keCeSUtkSipya dhunvIta bhISayedvyAladaMSTribhiH||14||  CastrolkArAjapuruSairbastireti tathA hyadhaH||14||  pANivastrairgalApIDaM kuryAnna mriyate tathA||15||  prANodAnanirodhAddhi suprasiddhatarAyanaH||15||  apAnaH pavano bastiM tamACvevApakarSati||16||  kuSThakramukakalkaM ca pAyetAmlasaMyutam||16||  oSNyAttaikSNyAtsaratvAcca bastiM so~asyAnulomayet 
gomUtreNa trivRtpathyAkalkaM vA~adhonulomanam||17||  pakvACayasthite svinne nirUho dACamUlikaH||18||  yavakolakulatthaiCca vidheyo mUtrasAdhitaiH||18||  bastirgomUtrasiddhairvA sAmRtAvaMCapallavaiH||19||  pUtIkaraJjatvakpatraCaThIdevAhvarohiSaiH||19||  satailaguDasindhUttho virekauSadhakalkavAn||20||  bilvAdipaJcamUlena siddho bastiruraHsthite||20||  CiraHsthe nAvanaM dhUmaH pracchAdyaM sarSapaiH CiraH||21||

sa0-vegasaMrodhaM-vegavidhAraNaM, kurvataH puMso yaH pIDito bastiratimAtrayA vA pIDito~asnigdhalavaNoSNo vA tathA~alpo mAtrayA, alpabheSajaCca mRdurvA, sa tathAbhUto mArutenordhvaM kSipto mUkhanAsikAt nireti-nirgacchati|  mUrcchAdIn pravartayet(yan)|  
	asya tu-tathAvidhabasteH puruSasya, mUrcchAdivikAraM dRSTvA CItAmbunA mukhaM siJcet|  tathA klamanACaM yAvat taM tAlavRntAdinA vIjayet|  tathA taM puruSaM prANAyAmaM ca kArayet,  prANAyAmena hyUrdhvaM vikSipto bastiradho yAti|  uSNaiH karaiH pRSThaM pArCvamudaraM ca mRjyAt|  tathA taM puruSamadhomukhaM kRtvA keCairutkSipyordhvaM nItvA vapurdhunvIta|  tathA vyAlAdibhirbhISayet|  tathordhvaM pravRtto bastiryasmAdadho gacchati|  tathA pANivastrairgalApIDaM kuryAdyathA na mriyeta|  evaM sati prANodAnanirodhaH sampadyate, prANodAnanirodhAdyasmAdadhogaH suprasiddhatarAyano bhUtvA~apAno vAyustaM bastiM drAgevApakarSati-UrdhvAdadhaH kSipati|  suSThu-prakarSeNa, prasiddhataramayanaM yasya sa suprasiddhatarAyanaH|  kuSThAdikalkaM cAmlasaMyutaM pAyayet| [ saH ] kalkaH, asya-Aturasya, uSNAdiguNayogAttaM bastimanulomayet|  trivRtAdikalkaM pItaM gomUtreNAdhonulomanam|  pakvACayasthite doSe snigdhe (svinne) niruho dACamUliko vidhAtavyaH|  yavAdibhiCca gomUtrasAdhitairbastirvidheyaH|  athavA gomUtrasiddhairguDUcyAdibhistailaguDasaindhavayukto bastirvirekadravyakalkavAn vidheyaH|  urasi sthite bilvAdipaJcamUlena siddho bastirvidhAtavyaH|  Cirasi sthite bastau nasyaM dhUmaCca, CiraCca sarSapakalkena pracchAdanIyam|
