 dhanve sAdhAraNe deCe same sanmRttike Cucau||1||  CmaCAnacaityAyatanaCvabhravalmIkavarjite||1||  mRdau pradakSiNajale kuCarohiSasaMstRte||2||  aphAlakRSTe~anAkrAnte pAdapairbalavattaraiH||2||  Casyate bheSajaM jAtaM, yuktaM varNarasAdibhiH||3||  jantvajagdhaM davAdagdhamavidagdhaM ca vaikRtaiH||3||  bhUtaiCchAyAyAtapAmbvAdyairyathAkAlaM ca sevitam||4||  avagADhamahAmUlamudIcIM diCamACritam||4||

sa0-dhanvadeCe, tathA sAdhAraNe deCe, tathA same-animnonnate, tathA sanmRttike, tathA CmaCAnAdivarjite, caityaM-dinacaryAdhyAye (hR. sU. a. 2/33) uktam|  tathA mRdau-susparCe, tathA pradakSiNaM-anukUlaM jalaM yasmin, tathA kuCarohiSasaMstRte, tathA~aphAlakuSTe-khile, tathA vRkSairmahattarairanAkrAnte deCe, yadbheSajaM jAtaM yuktaM yathAsvam varNarasAdibhiH, tadbheSajaM Casyate|  tathA jantubhiH- kITaiH, ajagdhaM-abhakSitaM, davena-dAvAgninA, adagdhaM-apruSTaM, tathA~avidagdhaM vaikRtairbhUtaiH-svabhAvaM parityajya dharmabAdhAdvikRtairAkACA(pRthivyA)dibhiryadanAsevitaM tadavidagdham|  vikRtameva vaikRtam, prajJAditvAdaN|  tathA chAyAdibhiryathAkAlaM kAlamanatikramya sevitaM, yadA tasyabhejaSasya vRddhau chAyAdInAmanyatamaM vastujAtamupayujyate tadA tena sevitamityarthaH|  tathA~avagADhaM-dUraM gataM, mahat-pRthu, mUlaM yasya tadavagADhamahAmUlam|  tathodicIM-uttarAM, diCamACritaM-tAmACritya sthitam|

A0 ra0-  sa ca deCaguNakAlakalpanAmAnaiH paJcadhA| tatra deCamAha-dhanva iti| dhanve-jAGgale| sanmRttike-snigdhakRSNasuvarNavarNamadhurarasamRttike| AyatanaM-vadhasthAnaM devayajanAgAraM ca| guNamAha-yuktamiti| avagADhaM-gambhIram| saGgrahe tu (ka. a. 8)- "viCeSatastvaCmavatI sthirA gurvI CyAmA kRSNA va sthUlatRNavRkSasasyaprAyA pRthvI svaguNabhUyiSThA| nAnAvarNA laghupuSpavatI praviralapANDuvRkSaprarohA~agniguNabhUyiSThA| rUkSA rAsabhabhasmavarNA rukSatanukoTaravRkSaprAyA~alparasaprarohA~anilaguNabhUyiSThA| mRdvIsamA CvabhravatyavyaktarasajalA mahAparvatavRkSA CyAmA~a~akACaguNabhUtiSThA| tatrAmbupRthvIguNabhuyiSThAsu bhUmiSu jAtAni virecanAni bRMhaNAni ca Casyante| analAnilAkACaguNabhUyiSThAsu vamanAni| sarvaguNayuktAsUbhayato bhAgAni| AkACaguNabhUyiSThAsu CamanAni| evaM balavattamAni bhavanti| teSAM CAkhApalACamaciraprarUDhaM varSAvasantayorgrAhyam| grISme mUlAni CiCire vA CIrNaprarUDhaparNAnAm| Caradi tvakkandakSIrANi| hemante sArANi| yathartu puSpaphalam| anye punarAhuH, saumyAnyauSadhAni saumyeSvRtusSu, AgneyAnyAgneyeSu, evamavyApannAnyApUrNatararasavIryANi bhavanti|" iti| etacca " yathAkAlaM ca sevitam" ityatra tantrakAreNa saGgRhItam|

 [mahendrarAmakRSNAnAM brAhmaNAnAM gavAmapi||1||  tapasA tejasA vA~api praCAmyadhvaM CivAya vai||1||  mantreNAnena matimAn sarvamapyauSadhaM nayet||5||  ]
atha kalyANacaritaH CrAddhaH CucirupoSitaH||5||  gRhNIyAdauSadhaM susthaM sthitaM kAle ca kalpayet||5||  sakSIraM tadasampattAvanatikrAntavatsaram||6||  Rte guDaghRtakSaudradhAnyakRSNAviDaGgataH||6||  payo bASkayaNaM grAhyaM viNmUtraM tacca nIrujAm||7||  vayobalavatAM dhAtupicchaCRGgakhurAdikam||7||

sa0-athetyAnantaryamaGgalasUcakam| bheSajamevaMvidhaM viditvA~anantaraM kalyANaM-svastyayanAdi, caritaM-anuSThitaM, yenAsau kalyANacaritaH, tathA CrAddhaH-bheSajaharaNaM prati CraddhAvAn, tathA CuciH-snAnAdinA CuddhaH tathopoSitaH-kRtopavAsaH, evaMvidhamauSadhamevaMvidhaH pumAn gRhNIyAt| tacca bheSajaM [susthaM-] svasthaM kRtvA, sthitaM kAle sakSIraM-ArdraM, kalpayet|  tadasampattau tu tathAvidhasya sakSIrasyauSadhasyAsampattau, anatikrAntavatsaraM bheSajaM kalpayet| kiM sarvaM dravyamanatikrAntavatsaraM kalpayet? Rta ityAdi|  guDAdIn varjayitvA paramauSadhamanatikrAntavatsaraM kalpayet| guDAdIMstu atikrAntavatsarAn kalpayet|  

kSIraM baSkayaNyAH sambandhi grAhyam| viT mUtraM ca, taccakSIraM ca, nIrujaM-apagatadoSaM, grAhyam| vayobalavatAM dhAtupicchAdikaM grAhyam|  AdigrahaNAt cikitsitopayogi keCanakhacarmAdikaM gRhyate|  vayaHCabdopAdAnAt viCiSTaM taruNaM vayo gRhyate, na hyavayAH kaCcidasti|

A0 ra0- grahaNasthApanAvacAraNAvadhimAha-atheti| CrAddhaH-CraddhAvAn| sakSIraM-Ardram, tadabhAve CuSkam| tacca varSAvadhi, ghRtAdIni vinA| dhAnyaM-CAlyAdi| kRSNA-pippilI| bASkayaNaM,-baSkayaNI-prauDhavatsA, tasyA viNmutraM kSIraM ca| tannIrujAM-arogANAM, taruNAnAM balinAM ca grAhyam| dhAtvAdikaM tadvat| saGgrahe tu (ka. a. 8)- "atha maGgalAcAraH kalyANavRttiH CuciH CuklvAsAH saMpUjya devatAmaCvinau gobrAhyNAMCca kRtopavAsa udaGnukhaH prAGnukho vAgRNhIyAt| gRhItvA cAnurUpaguNavadbhAjanasaMsthAnyAgAreSu pUrvottaradvAreSu nivAtapravAtaikadeCeSu nityapuSpopahArabalikarmasu, agnisalilopasvedadhUmarajomUSikacatuSpadAmanabhigamanIyAni svavacchannAni CikyeSvAsajya sthApayet|" iti|

 kaSAyayonayaH paJca rasA lavaNavarjitAH||8||  rasaH kalkaH CRtaH CItaH phANTaCceti prakalpanA||8||  paJcadhaiva kaSAyANAM pUrvaM purvaM balAdhikA||9||

sa0-kaSAyasya yonayaH-AkarAH, lavaNavarjitA madhurAdayaH paJca rasAH|  tebhya eva kaSAyAH-svarasAdayaH, paJca sambhavanti|  lavaNasya tu svarasakalpanAyogo na sambhavati, sadaiva CuSkarUpatvAt|  kalkakalpanA~api na sambhavati, yato yad dravyaM draveNa siktaM pINDIbhavati na tu vilIyate tat kalkasaMjJAmAsAdayati|  tathA yad dravyaM kvAthayitvA jalAduddhriyate dravyAvayavAstUdakamanupraviCanti, tatraiva CRtakalpanA|  lavaNasya tu vilInarUpatvAdevaM na sambhavati iti CRtakalpanAyA apyasambhavaH|  evaM CItaphANTayorapyanenaiva nyAyenAsambhava ityuktaM lavaNavarjyA rasAH kaSAyayonaya iti|  muninA~apyuktaM (ca. sU. a. 4/6)-["kalpanAvaCataH paJcAnAM rasAnAM kaSAyasaMjJAvyavahAra iti|  lavaNasya kalpanAyogAbhAvAt ] madhurakaSAyo~amlakaSAyastiktakaSAyaH kaTu kaSAyaH kaSAyakaSAyaCceti|" iti|  rasAnAM svarasAdi kalpanAyogo na sambhavati|  uktaM caitat|  tasmAt guNaguNinorabhedopacArAdiha rasagrahaNena tadACrayANAM dravyANAM grahaNaM mantavyam|  rasaH kalkaH CRtaH CItaH phANTaCceti prakalpanA paJcadhaiva kaSAyANAM svarasAdInAm|  sA ca kalpanA pUrvaM pUrvaM-yathApUrvaM, balAdhikA-adhikaCaktiH|  evaM phANTAkhyA kalpanA sabalA|  tato~apyadhikaCaktiH CItAkhyA|  tato~apyadhikavIryA CRtAkhyA| tato~apyadhikaCaktiH kalkAkhyA|  kalkAkhyAyAM cUrNAkhyAyACca kalpanAyA antarbhAvAdapRthaggrahaNam|
kalkAkhyAyACca kalpanAyAH svarasAkhyA kalpanA adhikaCaktiH|  nanu, cUrNAdanantaraM kalkaH kriyate na tu kalkAdanantaraM cUrNam|  tasmAt paJcAnAM kalpanAnAM madhye cUrNakalpanaiva nirdeSTuM yuktA, na tu kalkakalpanA|  yuktamAha bhavAn|  kintu lavaNasya kaSAyasaMjJAyAM samAveCo mAbhUditi kalpanAnAM madhye kalka iti nirdeCaH kRto na cUrNa iti|  tasmAllavaNe na sambhavati kaSAyasaMjJAsamAveCaH|

A0 ra0- kalpanAmAha-kaSAyayonaya iti| dravyAduddhRtasArabhAgaH kaSAyaH| lavaNasya tadabhAvatvAdayonitvam| te rasAdayo yathApurvaM balavattarAH| [tantrAntare-"rasaH vkAtho himaH phANTaH kalkaCcUrNaM vivartikA| lehaH sneho~atha sandhAnaM daCaitA dravyakalpanAH|| sadyaH samuddhRtAt kSuNNAt paTaniSpIDitAt stravet|  dravyAttu sa ca niryAso rasaH svarasa ucyate|| dviraSTapalike toye kSuNNadravyapalaM smRtam| turyaCeSaM sa niryUhaH smRtaH vkAthaH kaSAyakaH|| CRtaH kaSAyo niryUhaH kvAtho yUSaH kRtaCca saH| kRtayUSaH pramathyA ca dravyAtkAlIkRtA smRtA|| dvipala mAnametasya kecidAhuCcatuH| palam|" iti|]

 sadyaHsamuddhRtAt kSuNNAdyaH sravetpaTapIDitAt||9||  svarasaH sa samuddiSTaH-------------------------||10||

sa0-sadyaH-tatkSaNaM, samabhUmeH samyaguddhRtaM-utkhAtaM, anantaraM kSuNNaM-piSTaM, sadyaHsamuddhRtakSuNNaM, tasmAdvastrapIDitAdyaH sravet sa svarasaH kalpanAkaSAyaH samuddiSTaH-saMjJAyAM saGketitaH|

A0 ra0- rasalakSaNamAha-sadya iti| yasmin dine samuddhRtaM tasminneva dine prakSAlya kSuNNaM paTapIDitaM ca yaddravyaM tasya rasaH|

 -------------------------kalkaH piSTo dravAplutaH||10||  cUrNo~aplutaH--------------------------------------||10||

sa0-draveNA~a~aplutaH piSTaH san kalka iti kalpanAkaSAyaH saGketitaH|  yat dravyaM draveNa aplutaM-CuSkameva piSTaM, sa kalpanAkaSAyaCcUrNa iti gaditaH|  tena kalkasyaivAyaM bheda iti, nAsau kalpaneti CaGkanIyam|

A0 ra0- kalkalakSaNamAha-kalka iti| CuSkaM dravyaM draveNAplutya piSTaM kalkaH, anAplutya-cUrNaH| saGgrahe tu (ka. a. 8)- " upaladaCanApiSTastu kalkaH| sUkSmatAntavacyutaCcUrNaH| tasya samastadravyAparityAgAdAplutoyogAcca  kalkAdabhedaH| iti| daCanapeSaNe lAlaiva dravaH| kalkasya peSaNe pAne cAplutatvam| cUrNasya pAna eva| samasygrahaNe~apyaCakyapeSaNasya tyAgAnna kaSAyalakSaNAbhAvaH|

 ------------CRtaH kvAthaH----------------------||10||

sa0-yat dravyaM draveNA~a~aplutya CRtaM sa kalpanAkaSAyaH kvAtha iti kathyate|

A0 ra0-CRtalakSaNamAha-CRta iti kvAthanoddhRtaH CuSkadravyarasaH-CRtaH| saGgrahe tu (ka. a. 8)- " sa tu bhedyAnyau SadhAnyaNuCo bhedayitvA chedyAni ca chedayitvA prakSAlyodakena Cucau rUkSAyAmadhaH pralitpAyAM tAmrAyomRnmayAnyatamasthAlyAM samAvApya bavhalpapAnIyagrAhitAmauSadhAnAmAkalayya yAvatA muktarasatA syAttAvadudakamAsecayecchoSayecca|  athAgnAvadhiCritya mahatyAsane sukhopaviSTaH sarvataH satatamavalokayan darvyA ca vighaTTayan mRdunA paritaH samupagacchatA~analena sAdhayet| avatArya ca supariCrutaM yathArhasparCaM prayuJjIta| kSIrAdisahitaM ca dravyaM na samyaGnuktarasaM bhavatIti vArikvAthapUrvakaM kSIrAdyaistadupadeCe~anupadagdhaM kvAthayet|" iti| tadupadeCe-kSIrAdivkAthopadeCe, vArikvAthaM kRtvA taM kvAthaM kSIrAdyaiH  saha samaM kSIrAdiCeSaM kvAthaye| evaM hyanupadagdhaM dravyaM  bhavati| kevalakSIrAdipAke tUpadagdhaM syAt|

 ------------------------CIto rAtriM drave sthitaH||10||

sa0-yat dravyaM drave sakalAM rAtriM sthitaM sa kalpanAkaSAyaH CIta ityucyate|

A0 ra0- CItalakSaNamAha-CIta iti| kvathanaM vinA kvAthavatsakalarAtristhApitoddhRtaH-CItaH|

 sadyo~abhiSutapUtastu phANTaH-----------------------||11||

sa0-yat dravyaM drave~abhiSutya sadyaH pUtaM kriyate sa kalpanAkaSAyaH phANTa iti saGketitaH|

A0 ra0- phANTalakSaNamAha-sadya iti| sadyaH-AloDanasamanantarameva pUtaH-phANTaH| abhiSutaH-AloDitaH| AloDanaM coSNodakena| uktaM hi saGgrahe (ka. a. 8)- "uSNAmbhasi kSuNNAbhiSutapUtaM phANTaH|" iti|

 ---------------------------------tanmAnakalpane||11||  yuJjyAdvyAdhyAdibalatastathA ca vacanaM muneH||11||  mAtrAyA na vyavasthA~asti vyAdhiM koSThaM balaM vayaH||12||  Alocya deCakAlau ca yojyA tadvacca kalpanA||12||

sa0-mAnaM ca kalpanA ca mAnakalpane, teSAM-svarasAdInAM, mAnakalpane [tanmAnakalpane]|  te vyAdhyAdibalena yuJjayAt|  AdiCabdena koSThabalAdInAM grahaNam|  tatra samyagrasavIryAdIn doSadhAtvAdyAlocya prathamamanantaraM vyAdhyAdibalaM ca, tataH svarasAdInAM mAnakalpane yuJjyAt, na niyamaM kRtvetyata Aha-tathA ca vacanaM muneH|  mAtrAyA na vyavasthA~asti vyAdhiM koSThaM balaM vayaH|  Alocya deCakAlau ca yojyA tadvacca kalpaneti|

A0 ra0- uktAnAM kalpanAnAM vakSyamANAnAM ca mAnAnAM viSabhedAnAha-tanmAneti| vyAdhibalAnusAreNa yA kalpanAyayA mAtrayA yasyocitA tAM tayA tasya yuJjyAt|

dravyakalpAdhyAyaH

sa0-kaSAyasya yonayaH-AkarAH, lavaNavarjitA madhurAdayaH paJca rasAH|  tebhya eva kaSAyAH-svarasAdayaH, paJca sambhavanti|  lavaNasya tu svarasakalpanAyogo na sambhavati, sadaiva CuSkarUpatvAt|  kalkakalpanA~api na sambhavati, yato yad dravyaM draveNa siktaM pINDIbhavati na tu vilIyate tat kalkasaMjJAmAsAdayati|  tathA yad dravyaM kvAthayitvA jalAduddhriyate dravyAvayavAstUdakamanupraviCanti, tatraiva CRtakalpanA|  lavaNasya tu vilInarUpatvAdevaM na sambhavati iti CRtakalpanAyA apyasambhavaH|  evaM CItaphANTayorapyanenaiva nyAyenAsambhava ityuktaM lavaNavarjyA rasAH kaSAyayonaya iti|  muninA~apyuktaM (ca. sU. a. 4/6)-["kalpanAvaCataH paJcAnAM rasAnAM kaSAyasaMjJAvyavahAra iti|  lavaNasya kalpanAyogAbhAvAt ] madhurakaSAyo~amlakaSAyastiktakaSAyaH kaTu kaSAyaH kaSAyakaSAyaCceti|" iti|  rasAnAM svarasAdi kalpanAyogo na sambhavati|  uktaM caitat|  tasmAt guNaguNinorabhedopacArAdiha rasagrahaNena tadACrayANAM dravyANAM grahaNaM mantavyam|  rasaH kalkaH CRtaH CItaH phANTaCceti prakalpanA paJcadhaiva kaSAyANAM svarasAdInAm|  sA ca kalpanA pUrvaM pUrvaM-yathApUrvaM, balAdhikA-adhikaCaktiH|  evaM phANTAkhyA kalpanA sabalA|  tato~apyadhikaCaktiH CItAkhyA|  tato~apyadhikavIryA CRtAkhyA| tato~apyadhikaCaktiH kalkAkhyA|  kalkAkhyAyAM cUrNAkhyAyACca kalpanAyA antarbhAvAdapRthaggrahaNam|
kalkAkhyAyACca kalpanAyAH svarasAkhyA kalpanA adhikaCaktiH|  nanu, cUrNAdanantaraM kalkaH kriyate na tu kalkAdanantaraM cUrNam|  tasmAt paJcAnAM kalpanAnAM madhye cUrNakalpanaiva nirdeSTuM yuktA, na tu kalkakalpanA|  yuktamAha bhavAn|  kintu lavaNasya kaSAyasaMjJAyAM samAveCo mAbhUditi kalpanAnAM madhye kalka iti nirdeCaH kRto na cUrNa iti|  tasmAllavaNe na sambhavati kaSAyasaMjJAsamAveCaH|

 athAta unmAdapratiSedhaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

bhUtapratiSedhAdanantaramunmAdApasmArapratiSedha ucyate, cikitsAsAmAnyAt|   tatrApyapasmArAdunmAdasya pUrvamupanyAso bahuvaktavyatvAdityAha-

	sa0-unmAdasya pratiSedha-cikitsitaM, bhaNiSyAmaH|

 unmAdAH SaT pRthagdoSanicayAdhiviSodbhavAH||1||

sa0-pratyekaM doSaistrayaH sAnnipAtika Adhijo viSajaCceti|

 unmAdo nAma manaso doSairunmArgagairmadaH||1||

sa0-unmAdo doSaiH-vAtapittakaphaiH, unmArgagaiH-apathaprasthitaiH, manaso yo madaH sa unmAdo nAma roga ucyate|  


	

CArIramAnasairduSTairahitAdannapAnataH||2||  vikRtAsAtmyasamalAdviSamAdupayogataH||2||  viSaNNasyAlpasattvasya vyAdhivegasamudgamAt||3||  kSINasya ceSTAvaiSamyAt pUjyapUjAvyatikramAt||3||  AdhibhiCcittavibhraMCAd viSeNopaviSeNa ca||4||  ebhirhi hInasattvasya hRdi doSAH pradUSitAH||4||  dhiyo vidhAya kAluSyaM hatva mArgAn manovahAn||5||  unmAdaM kurvate, tena dhIvijJAnasmRtibhramAt||5||  deho duHkhasukhabhraSTo bhraSTasArathivadrathaH||6||  bhramatyacintitArambhaH-------------------------||6||

sa0-CArIramAnasairdoSairduSTairyAvadupaviSeNa ceti|  ebhiH-amIbhirhetubhiH, doSA hRdaye pradUSitAH santo hInasattvasya puMso buddheH kAluSyaM kRtvA tathA cittavahAni srotAMsi hatvonmAdaM kurvate|   tena-unmAdena, deho buddhibhramAnnaSTasukhaduHkho bhraSTasArathiriva ratho bhramati|  acintitaH-anirUpitakriyaH, ArambhaH-udyamo, yasya sa evam|  

	

 ----------------------tatra vAtAtkRCAGgatA||6||  asthAne rodanAkroCahasitasmitanartanam||7||  gItavAditravAgaGgavikSepAsphoTanAni ca||7||  asAmnA veNuvINAdiCabdAnukaraNaM muhuH||8||  AsyAtphenAgamo~ajasramaTanaM bahubhASitA||8||  alaGkAro~analaGkArairayAnairgamanodyamaH||9||  gRddhirabhyavahAryeSu tallAbhe cAvamAnatA||9||  utpiNDitAruNAkSitvaM jIrNe cAnne gadodbhavaH||10||

sa0-vAtAdunmAde sati kRCAGgAdilakSaNaM ca jIrNe cAnne gadodbhava ityantam|  asthAne-aprasaGge, rodanAdIni|  asAmnA auddhatyena, punaHpunaH veNuvINAdivAdyasyAnukaraNam|

 pittAtsantarjanaM krodho muSTiloSTAdyabhidravaH||10||  CItacchAyodakAkAGkSA nagnatvaM pItavarNatA||11||  asatyajvalanajvAlAtArakAdIpadarCanam||11||

sa0-pittAdunmAde sati santarjanakrodhAdayaH syuH|  asatyAnAM jvalanAdInAM darCanam|

 kaphAdarocakaCchardiralpehAhAravAkyatA||12||  strIkAmatA rahaHprItirlAlAsiGghANakasrutiH||12||  baibhatsyaM CaucavidveSo nidrA CvayathurAnane||13||  unmAdo balavAn rAtrau bhuktamAtre ca jAyate||13||

sa0-kaphAdunmAde satyarocakAdayaH syuH|  tathA rAtrau balavAn sadyo bhukte ca syAt|

 sarvAyatanasaMsthAnasannipAte tadAtmakam||14||  unmAdaM dAruNaM vidyAt taM bhiSak parivarjayet||14||

sa0-AyatanAni-nimittAni, saMsthAnAni-liGgAni, sarvANi tridoSaviSayANyAyatanAni saMsthAnAni ca yasmin sannipAte|  tadAtmakaM-tridoSottham, unmAdaM dAruNaM-mAraNAtmakaM, vidyAt|  taM-unmAdaM, nopakramet|  


	

dhanakAntAdinACena duHsahenAbhiSaGgavAn||15||  pANDurdIno muhurmuhyan hAheti paridevate||15||  rodityakasmAnmriyate tadguNAn bahu manyate||16||  CokakliSTamanA dhyAyan jAgarUko viceSTate||16||

sa0-dhanAdinACena duHsahenAbhiSaGgavAnunmAdaH syAt|  tena pANDvAdikaH sannidamidaM karoti|  tathA CokakhinnacetAH san dhyAyan jAgaraNaCIlo viceSTate|

 viSeNa CyAvavadano naSTacchAyAbalendriyaH||17||  vegAntare~api sambhrAnto raktAkSastaM vivarjayet||17||

sa0-viSeNonmAde CyAvavadanaH syAt|  taM varjayet-nopakramet|

 athAnilaja unmAde snehapAnaM prayojayet||18||  pUrvamAvRtamArge tu sasnehaM mRdu Codhanam||18||

sa0-athedRCyunmAdalakSaNe~avagate sati pavanajo ya unmAdastasmin snehapAnaM pUrvaM kArayet|  AvRtavartmani tvanile sasnehaM mRdu CodhanaM pUrvaM snehapAnAt kArayet|

 kaphapittabhave~apyAdau vamanaM savirecanam||19||  sasnigdhasvinnasya bastiM ca CirasaH savirecanam||19||  tathA~asya Cuddhadehasya prasAdaM labhate manaH||20||

sa0-kaphabhave pittabhave conmAde snigdhasvinnasya narasya yathAsaGkhyaM vamanaM virecanaM ca kArayet|  apiCabdAnna kevalaM pavanajesnehapAnamAdau, yAvat kaphapittotthe~api kAryamiti gamayati|  tathA ca muniH(?)-"unmAdaM snehapAnena pUrvaM sarvamupAcaret|" iti|  bastiM CirasaH savirecanaM triSvapyunmAdeSu kArayet|  tathA ca-evaM, CuddhaCarIrasya sato manaH prasIdati|

 itthamapyanuvRttau tu tIkSNaM nAvanamaJjanam||20||  harSaNACvAsanottrAsabhayatADanatarjanam||21||  abhyaGgodvartanAlepadhUpAn pAnaM ca sarpiSaH||21||  yuJjyAttAni hi Cuddhasya nayanti prakRtiM manaH||22||

sa0-evamapyupakrAnta unmAde~asyAnubandhe sati tIkSNaM nAvanAJjanaM yuJjyAt, harSaNAdi ca|  kutaH ?  yasmAdetAni kRtAni Cuddhadehasya cittaM prakRtiM prApayanti|

 hiGgusauvarcalavyoSairdvipalAMCairghRtADhakam||22||  siddhaM samUtramunmAdabhUtApasmAranutparam||23||

sa0-hiGgvAdibhirdvipalikairghRtasyADhakaM gomUtreNa saha pacet|  taccopayuktaM paramamunmAdAdijit|

 dvau prasthau svarasAd brAhayA ghRtaprasthaM ca sAdhitam||23||  vyoSaCyAmAtrivRddantICaGkhapuSpInRpadrumaiH||24||  sasaptalAkRmiharaiH kalkitairakSasammitaiH||24||  palavRddhyA prayuJjIta paraM mAtrA catuSpalam||25||  unmAdakuSThApasmAraharaM vandhyAsutapradam||25||  vAksvarasmRtimedhAkRd dhanyaM brAhmIghRtaM smRtam||26||

sa0-brAhmIsvarasAtprasthadvayaM ghRtasya prasthaM vyoSAdibhiH kArSikai rajIkRtaiH pakvaM palavRddhyA-palaM prathame~ahni dvipalaM dvitIye~ahni tripalaM tRtIye~ahni catuSpalaM caturthe~ahne tataH paraM catuSpalamityevaM, prayuJjIta|  tacconmAdAdijidvandhyAsutapradaM vAgAdikRcchivaM ca brAhmIghRtaM smRtam|

 varAviCAlAbhadrailAdevadArvelavAlukaiH||26||  dvisArivAdvirajanIdvisthirAphalinInataiH||27||  bRhatIkuSThamaJjiSThAnAgakesaradADimaiH||27||  vellatAlIsapatrailAmAlatImukulotpalaiH||28||  sadantIpadmakahimaiH karSAMCaiH sarpiSaH pacet||28||  prasthaM bhUtagrahonmAdakAsApasmArapApmasu||29||  pANDukaNDUviSe CoSe mohe mehe gare jvare||29||  aretasyaprajasi vA daivopahatacetasi||30||  amedhasi skhaladvAci smRtikAme~alpapAvake||30||  balyaM maGgalyamAyuSyaM kAntisaubhAgyapuSTidam||31||  kalyANakamidaM sarpiH CreSThaM puMsavaneSu ca||31||

sa0-varAdibhiH karSapramANairghRtaprasthaM pacet|  taccopayuktaM bhUtagrahAdiSu CreSThaM balyAdiguNaM ca|  kalyANakAkhyametatsarpiH puMsavaneSu ca varam|  atra ca bhadrailA-sthUlailA|

 ebhyo dvisArivAdIni jale paktvaikaviMCatim||32||  rase tasmin pacetsarpirgRSTikSIracaturguNam||32||  vIrAdvimedAkAkolIkapikacchUviSANibhiH||33||  CUrpaparNIyutairetanmahAkalyANakaM param||33||  bRMhaNaM sannipAtaghnaM pUrvasmAdadhikaM guNaiH||34||

sa0-ebhyo-varAdibhyo, madhyAdAdyAni sapta hitvA, dvisArivAdInyekaviMCatiM jale SoDaCaguNe snehApekSayA pacedyAvatsnehAccaturguNaH kvAthaH|  tasmin snehacaturguNe rase sarpirgRSTikSIracaturguNaM vIrAdibhiH snehakvathitaiH pAdikaiH kalkIkRtaiH pacet|  etanmahAkalyANakaM nAma ghRtaM pUrvasmAt-kalyANakAt, guNairatiriktam|  atra dvisArivAdinAM pAThAdevaikaviMCatitvaM cet atadguNasaMvijJAno~ayaM bahuvrIhiriti kasyacid bhrAntiH syAt|  evaM ca sArivAdidvayasya grahaNaM na prApnuyAdityekaviMCatigrahaNam

 jaTilA pUtanA keCI cAraTI markaTI vacA||34||  trAyamANA jayA vIrA corakaH kaTurohiNI||35||  vayaHsthA CUkarI chatrA sAticchatrA palaGkaSA||35||  mahApuruSadantA ca kAyasthA nAkulIdvayam||36||  kaTambharA vRCcikAlI CAliparNI ca tairghRtam||36||  siddhaM cAturthikonmAdagrahApasmAranACanam||37||  mahApaiCAcakaM nAma ghRtametadyathA~amRtam||37||  buddhimedhAsmRtikaraM bAlAnaM cAGgavardhanam||38||

sa0-jaTilAdibhirghRtaM pakvaM cAturthikAdinACanam|  jaTilAmAMsI|  pUtanA-harItakI|  keCI-gandhamAMsI|  caraTI-padmacAriNI|  markaTI-kapikacchUH|  jayA-araNikA|  vIrA-kAkolI|  corakaH-caNDA|  vayaHsthA-dhAtrI|  CUkarI-vRddhadArukaH|  chatrA-dhAnyakam|  aticchatrA-CatapuSpA|  palaGkaSA-lAkSA|  mahApuruSadantA-CatAvarI|  kAyasthA-kSIrakAkolI|  nAkulIdvayaM-sarpAkSI sarpasugandhA ca|  mahApaiCAcakasaMjJaM cAturthikAdinACanam|  tathA~amRtatulyaM mahAguNatvAt|  buddhyAdikaM CiCUnAM ca saMvardhayati|

 brAhmImaindrIM viDaGgAni vyoSaM hiGgu jaTAM murAm||38||  rAsnAM viSaghnAM laCunaM viCalyAM surasAM vacAm||39||  jyotiSmatIM nAgavinnAmanantAM saharItakIm||39||  kAGkSIM ca hastimUtreNa piSTvA chAyAviCoSitA||40||  vartirnasyAJjanAlepadhUpairunmAdasUdanI||40||

sa0-brAhmyAdibhirgajamUtrapiSTA vartiCchAyAyAM viCoSitA nasyAdibhirunmAdahRt|  viSaghnA-ativiSA|  viCalyA-lAGgalI|  nAgavinnA-nAgadantI|  kAGkSI-saurASTrikA|

 avapIDACca vividhAH sarSApAH snehasaMyutAH||41||  kaTutailena cAbhyaGgo dhmApayeccAsya tadrajaH||41||  sahiGgustIkSNadhUmaCca sUtrasthAnodito hitaH||42||

sa-"kalkAdyairavapIDastu" (hR.sU.a. 20/7) iti kathito~avapIDaH|  te~avapIDAH sarSapatailayutA hitAH|  abhyaGgaCca sarSapatailena|  tathA~asya tadrajaH-sarSapacUrNaM, ghrANe dhmApayet|  tathA sUtrasthAnoktastIkSNo dhUmo (a. 21/17) hiGgunA saha hitaH|

 -----------------------------paittike tu praCasyate||44||  tiktakaM jIvanIyaM ca sarpiH snehaCca miCrakaH||45||  CItAni cAnnapAnAni madhurANi laghUni ca||45||

 prakSipyAsalile kUpe CoSayedvA bubhukSayA||47||  ACvAsayetsuhRttaM vA vAkyairdharmArthasaMhitaiH||47||  bRyAdiSTavinACaM vA darCayedadbhutAni vA||48||  baddhaM sarSapatailAktaM nyasedvottAnamAtape||48||  kapikacchvA~athavA taptairlohatailajalaiH spRCet||49||  kaCAbhistADayitvA vA baddhaM Cvabhre viniHkSipet||49||  athavA vItaCastrACmajane saMtamase gRhe||50||  sarpeNoddhRtadaMSTreNa dAntaiH siMhairgajaiCca tam||50||  (trAsayecchastrahastairvA kirAtArAtitaskaraiH||51||  )
athavA rAjapuruSA bahirnItvA susaMyatam||51||  bhApayeyurvadhenainaM tarjayanto nRpAjJayA||51||  dehaduHkhabhayebhyo hi paraM prANabhayaM matam||52||  tena yAti CamaM tasya sarvato viplutaM manaH||52||

sa0-athavA jalavarjite kUpe prakSipya kSudhA CoSayet|  athavA taM-unmAdavantaM, suhRt dharmArthayutairvAkyairACvAsayet-sAntvayet|  athavA~asya putrAdervinACaM-vighAtaM, taM brUyAt|  adbhutAni vA taM darCayet|  athavA kaTutailenAbhyaktaM badhvA tamuttAnaM kRtvA~a~atape nyaset|  kapikacchvA, athavA taptairlohAdibhiH|  athavA carmakaCAbhirahatya baddhaM santamavaTe viniHkSipet|  CastrAdivarjite tvagAre(~andhakAre) bhavane vA badhvA vinikSipet|  nanu ca, ekasya CUnyagRhe sthitirunmAdasya nidAnamuktam|  yacca yasya nidAnaM tadeva tasya kathaM cikitsitaM syAt ?  naiSadoSaH|  tadarthakAribheSajatvAt| tadarthakAriNi hi bheSajeyadeva nidAnaM tadevauSadham|  yathA,-tucchadagdhe~agnipratapanam, madAtyaye madyapAnamiti|  tadvadihApyavagantavyam|  athavA samutpATitadaMSTreNa sarpeNa bhApayet, dAntairgajAdibhirvA|  rAjapuruSA bahirnItvA taM suSTu yantritaM kRtvA rAjAjJayA tarjayanto vadhena bhApayeyuH|  yato dehaduHkhabhayebhyaH sakACAt paraM-atiCayena, prANabhayaM matam|  tena-bhayena, itaCcetaCcittaM viplutamunmAdinaH Camameti|

 siddhA kriyA prayojyeyaM deCakAlAdyapekSayA||53||

sa0-iyaM kriyA deCAdyapekSayA siddhA prayojanIyA

 kAmaCokabhayakrodhaharSerSyAlobhasambhavAn||54||  parasparapratidvandvairebhireva CamaM nayet||55||

 bhUtAnubandhamIkSeta proktaliGgAdhikAkRtim||55||  yadyunmAde tataH kuryAdbhUtanirdiSTamauSadham||56||

sa0-bhUtaiH-devAdibhiH pUrvoktaiH, anubandhaH-anuSaGgaH, tamanantarokta AgantAvunmAde yadIkSeta tato bhUtapratiSedhoktamauSadhaM kuryAt|  nanu, kathamIkSaNaM kartuM Cakyate ?  iti viCeSaNadvAreNa hetumAha-proktaliGgAdhikAkRtimiti|  proktAni pUrvaM SaDvidhasyonmAdasya yAni liGgAni tebhyo~adhikA~a~akRtiH-lakSaNaM, yasya-bhUtAnubandhasya, taM tathAvidham|

 baliM ca dadyAtpalalaM yAvakaM saktupiNDikAm||56||  snigdhaM madhuramAhAraM taNDulAn rudhirokSitAn||57||  pakvAmakAni mAMsAni surAM maireyamAsavam||57||  atimuktasya puSpANi jAtyAH sahacarasya ca||58||  catuSpathe gavAM tIrthe nadInAM saGgameSu ca||58||

 athAto~apasmArapratiSedhaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

 smRtyapAyo hyaposmAraH sa dhIsattvAbhisaMplavAt||1||  jAyate~abhihate citte cintACokabhayAdibhiH||1||  unmAdavatprakupitaiCcittadehagatairmalaiH||2||  hate sattve hRdi vyApte saMjJAvAhiSu kheSu ca||2||  tamo viCan mUDhamatirbIbhatsAH kurute kriyAH||3||  dantAn khAdan vaman phenaM hastau pAdau ca vikSipan||3||  paCyannasanti rUpANi praskhalan patati kSitau||4||  vijihyakSibhruvo doSavege~atIte vibudhyate||4||  kAlAntareNa sa punaCcaivameva viceSTate||5||

sa0-smRterapAyo-vinACaH, apasmAra ucyate| sa ca-smRtivinACo, buddhyAdivinACAccitte cintAdyabhihate, tathonmAdavaccittadehagatairdoSaiH prakRpitaiH sattve hate, hRdaye vyApte, tathA saMjJAvAhiSu srotaHsu vyApteSu satsu, jAyate|  tasmiMCca jAte sati mUDhamatiH san tamo-mohaM, viCan bIbhatsAH-ninditAH, kriyAHkurute|  na tu tamo dravyaviCeSa iha gRhyate, tasya divA~asambhavasyApi darCanaM sambhAvyata eva, rogasvabhAvAt|  ata eva vakSyati,-"paCyannasanti rUpANi" iti|  tA eva kriyA vakti-dantAnityAdi yAvadvijihvAkSibhruva iti|  vijihyamakSibhruvaM yasya sa evam|  akSibhruvaCabdo~acaturAdinipAtaH|  doSavege cAtikrAnte vibudhyate-prakRtiM yAti|  kAlAntaraiNa saH-apasmarIm evameva-pUrvavat, karoti|

 apasmAraCcaturbhedo vAtAdyairnicayena ca||5||

sa0-apasmAraCcatuHprakAraH|  katham ?  ityAha-vAtAdibhiH sannipAtena ca|

 rUpamutpatsyamAne~asmin hRtkampaH CUnyatA bhramaH||6||  tamaso darCanaM dhyAnaM bhrUvyudAso~akSivaikRtam||6||  aCabdaCravaNaM svedo lAlAsiGghANakasrutiH||7||  avipAko~arucirmUrcchA kukSyATopo balakSayaH||7||  nidrAnACo~aGgamardastRT svapne gAnaM sanartanam||8||  pAnaM tailasya madyasya tayoreva ca mehanam||8||

sa0-asminnapasmAra udbubhUSati sati hRtkampAdayaH syuH|  gAnAdi syAt, tailamadyayoH pAnaM syAt, tathA tayoreva-taila madyayoH, mehanaM-mUtraNaM, syAt|

 tatra vAtAtsphuratsakthiH prapataMCca muhurmuhuH||9||  apasmarati saMjJAM ca labhate visvaraM rudan||9||  utpiNDitAkSaH Cvasiti phenaM vamati kampate||10||  Avidhyati CirodantAn daCatyAdhmAtakandharaH||10||  parito vikSipatyaGgaM viSamaM vinatAGguliH||11||  rUkSCyAvAruNAkSitvaGnakhAsyaH kRSNamIkSate||11||  capalaM paruSaM rUpaM virUpaM vikRtAnanam||12||

sa0-tatra-teSu madhyAt, vAtAdapasmAre sati sphuratsakathyAdikaH syAt|

 apasmarati pittena muhuH saMjJA ca vindati||12||  pItaphenAkSivaktratvagAspAlayati medinIm||13||  bhairavAdIptaruSitarUpadarCI tRSAnvitaH||13||

sa0-pittenApasmAre sati punaHpunaH saMjJAM-cetanAM ca labhate|  pItaphenAkSimukhatvaM syAt|  atra ca vaktragrahaNenaivAkSigrahaNe siddhe~akSigrahaNamatiCayArtham|  tathA~a~asphAlayati medinImityAdi ca syAt|

 athAto~apasmArapratiSedhaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

asmAdanantaramapasmArapratiSedha ucyate, cikitsAsAmAnyAt|

 smRtyapAyo hyaposmAraH sa dhIsattvAbhisaMplavAt||1||  jAyate~abhihate citte cintACokabhayAdibhiH||1||  unmAdavatprakupitaiCcittadehagatairmalaiH||2||  hate sattve hRdi vyApte saMjJAvAhiSu kheSu ca||2||  tamo viCan mUDhamatirbIbhatsAH kurute kriyAH||3||  dantAn khAdan vaman phenaM hastau pAdau ca vikSipan||3||  paCyannasanti rUpANi praskhalan patati kSitau||4||  vijihyakSibhruvo doSavege~atIte vibudhyate||4||  kAlAntareNa sa punaCcaivameva viceSTate||5||

sa0-smRterapAyo-vinACaH, apasmAra ucyate| sa ca-smRtivinACo, buddhyAdivinACAccitte cintAdyabhihate, tathonmAdavaccittadehagatairdoSaiH prakRpitaiH sattve hate, hRdaye vyApte, tathA saMjJAvAhiSu srotaHsu vyApteSu satsu, jAyate|  tasmiMCca jAte sati mUDhamatiH san tamo-mohaM, viCan bIbhatsAH-ninditAH, kriyAHkurute|  na tu tamo dravyaviCeSa iha gRhyate, tasya divA~asambhavasyApi darCanaM sambhAvyata eva, rogasvabhAvAt|  ata eva vakSyati,-"paCyannasanti rUpANi" iti|  tA eva kriyA vakti-dantAnityAdi yAvadvijihvAkSibhruva iti|  vijihyamakSibhruvaM yasya sa evam|  akSibhruvaCabdo~acaturAdinipAtaH|  doSavege cAtikrAnte vibudhyate-prakRtiM yAti|  kAlAntaraiNa saH-apasmarIm evameva-pUrvavat, karoti|

 apasmAraCcaturbhedo vAtAdyairnicayena ca||5||

sa0-apasmAraCcatuHprakAraH|  katham ?  ityAha-vAtAdibhiH sannipAtena ca|

 rUpamutpatsyamAne~asmin hRtkampaH CUnyatA bhramaH||6||  tamaso darCanaM dhyAnaM bhrUvyudAso~akSivaikRtam||6||  aCabdaCravaNaM svedo lAlAsiGghANakasrutiH||7||  avipAko~arucirmUrcchA kukSyATopo balakSayaH||7||  nidrAnACo~aGgamardastRT svapne gAnaM sanartanam||8||  pAnaM tailasya madyasya tayoreva ca mehanam||8||

sa0-asminnapasmAra udbubhUSati sati hRtkampAdayaH syuH|  gAnAdi syAt, tailamadyayoH pAnaM syAt, tathA tayoreva-taila madyayoH, mehanaM-mUtraNaM, syAt|

 tatra vAtAtsphuratsakthiH prapataMCca muhurmuhuH||9||  apasmarati saMjJAM ca labhate visvaraM rudan||9||  utpiNDitAkSaH Cvasiti phenaM vamati kampate||10||  Avidhyati CirodantAn daCatyAdhmAtakandharaH||10||  parito vikSipatyaGgaM viSamaM vinatAGguliH||11||  rUkSCyAvAruNAkSitvaGnakhAsyaH kRSNamIkSate||11||  capalaM paruSaM rUpaM virUpaM vikRtAnanam||12||

sa0-tatra-teSu madhyAt, vAtAdapasmAre sati sphuratsakathyAdikaH syAt|

 apasmarati pittena muhuH saMjJA ca vindati||12||  pItaphenAkSivaktratvagAspAlayati medinIm||13||  bhairavAdIptaruSitarUpadarCI tRSAnvitaH||13||

sa0-pittenApasmAre sati punaHpunaH saMjJAM-cetanAM ca labhate|  pItaphenAkSimukhatvaM syAt|  atra ca vaktragrahaNenaivAkSigrahaNe siddhe~akSigrahaNamatiCayArtham|  tathA~a~asphAlayati medinImityAdi ca syAt|

 kaphAccireNa grahaNaM cireNaiva vibodhanam||14||  ceSTA~alpA bhUyasI lAlA CuklanetranakhAsyatA||14||  CuklAbharUpadarCitvaM----------------------||15||

sa0-kaphAccireNa kAlena grahaNam|  cireNaiva vimokSaNaM syAt|  CceSTA~alpetyAdi ca|

 -------------------------sarvaliGgaM tu varjayet||15||

sa0-sarvaliGgamapasmAraM varjayet-nopakramet|

 athA~a~avRtAnAM dhIcittahRtkhAnAM prAkprabodhanam||15||  tIkSNaiH kuryAdiapasmAre karmabhirvamanAdibhiH||16||

sa0-atha-evamapasmArasvarUpamavagamya, dhIcittahRdayasrotasAM pUrvaM prabodhanaM kuryAt|  kaiH ?  vamanAdibhiH tIkSNaiH karmabhiH|

 vAtikaM bastibhUyiSThaiH, paittaM prAyo virecanaiH||16||  ClaiSmikaM vamanaprAyairapasmAramupAcaret||17||

sa0-vAtikamapasmAraM bastiprAyairupAcaret|  paittaM virecanaprAyairupAcaret|  ClaiSmikaM vamanaprAyairupAcaret|

uttarasthAnam

apasmArapratiSedhAdhyAyaH

 sarvataH suviCuddhasya samyagACvAsitasya ca||17||  apasmAravimokSArthaM yogAn saMCamanAn CRNu||18||

sa0-sarvataH-adha upariSTAcca viCuddhasya, tathA samyagACvAsitasya ca-kRtapeyAdyannasaMsargikasya ca samyagACvAsanaM sampadyate|  tasyApasmAriNaH, apasmAraviCodhanAya vakSyamANAnimAn yogAnAkarNaya| 


	

 gomayasvarasakSIradadhimUtraiH CRtaM haviH||18||  apasmArajvaronmAdakAmalAntakaraM pibet||19||

sa0-gomayasvarasAdibhirghrutaM pakvamapasmArAdighnaM pibet|

 dvipaJcamUlatriphalAdviniCAkuTajatvacaH||19||  saptaparNamapAmArgaM nIlinIM kaTurohiNIm||20||  CamyAkapuSkarajaTAphalgumUladurAlabhAH||20||  dvipalAH saliladroNe paktvA pAdAvaCeSite||21||  bhArgIpAThADhakIkumbhanikumbhavyoSarohiSaiH||21||  mUrvAbhUtIkabhUnimbaCreyasIsArivAdvayaiH||22||  madayantyagniniculairakSAMCaiH sarpiSaH pacet||22||  prasthaM tadvad dravaiH pUrvaiH paJcaganyamidaM mahat||23||  jvarApasmArajaTharabhagandaraharaM param||23||  CophArCaHkAmalApANDugulmakAsagrahApaham||24||

sa0-dvipaJcamUlAdIni pRthag dvipalapramANAni jaladroNe paktvA pAdAvaCeSite kvAthe bhArgyAdibhiH karSACaiH kalkIkRtairghRtasya prasthaM tadvat pUrvaiH-gomayasvarasAdibhirdravaiH, pAcayet|  mahadidaM paJcagavyaM paraM jvarAdiharam, CophAdighnaM ca|  bahudravyayogAccAsya mahattvam, yathA mahAkalyANakAdeH|

 brAhmIrasavacAkuSThaCaGkhapuSpICRtaM ghRtam||24||  purANaM medhyamunmAdAlakSmyapasmArapAomajit||25||

sa0-brAhmyAdibhiH purANaM sarpiH pakvaM medhyamunmAdAdijit|

 tailaprasthaM ghRtaprasthaM jIvanIyaiH palonmitaiH||25||  kSIradroNe pacetsiddhamapasmAravimokSaNam||26||

sa0-tailaprasthaM ghrutaprasthaM jIvaniyaiH rajIkRtaiH palapramANaiH kSIradroNe pacet| 
 tatsiddhamapasmAravimocanam|

 kaMse kSIrekSurasayoH kACmarye~aSTaguNe rase||26||  kARSikairjIvanIyaiCca sarpiHprasthaM vipAcayet||27||  vAtapittodbhavaM kSipramapasmAraM nihanti tat||27||

sa0-kSIrekSurasayoH kaMse-ADhake, tathA kACmaryarase~aSTaguNe-aSTaprasthaparimANe, ghRtAdasyASTaguNatvam|  jIvaniyaiHkArSikairghRtaprasthaM vipAcayet|  tat vAtapittajamapasmAraM CIghrameva nihanti|  nanu, dvandvajasyApasmArasyAsambhavAt kathamuktaM vAtapittodbhavaM hantIti? ucyate|  vAtapittotthayordvayorapyapasmArayorhantItyetadihokta mityadoSaH|

 tadvat kACavidArIkSukuCakvAthaCRtaM payaH||28||

sa0-tadvat-pUrvavat, kACAdikvAthe CRtaM kSIraM syAt|

 kUSmANDasvarase sarpiraSTAdaCaguNe CRtam||28||  yaSTIkalkamapasmAraharaM dhIvAksvarapradam||29||

sa0-kUSmANDasvarase~aSTAdaCaguNe madhuyaSTikAkalkaM ghRtaprasthaM pakvamapasmArajit budhdyAdipradaM ca|

 kapilAnAM gavAM pittaM nAvane paramaM hitam||29||  CvaCRgAlabiDAlAnaM siMhAdInAM ca pUjitam||30||

sa0-kapilAnAM gavAM pittaM nasye suSTru hitam, na kRSNAnAm gavAm, acintyatvAtprabhAvasya|  CvAdInAmapi pittaM hitam|

 godhAnakulanAgAnAM pRSatarkSagavamapi||30||  pitteSu sAdhitaM tailaM nasye~abhyaGge ca Casyate||31||

sa0-godhAdInAM ca pitteSu sAdhitaM tailaM nasye~abhyaGge ca Casyate|

vartmarogavijJAnIyAdhyAyaH

athAto vartmarogavijJAnIyamadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

apasmArAdanantaraM CAlAkyamupakramyate|  yathaiva hRdayAkhyamahAmarmACritairapasmAro janyate tathaiva murdhAkhyamahAmarmACritairUrdhvajatrUtthA rogA janyante|  teSAmapi ca madhye cakSUrogANAM 

sa0-vartmani rogA vartmarogAH,-kRcchronmIlAdayaH, teSAM vijJAnaM-bodhaH, sa vidyate yasminniti chaH, tasya pUrvavalluk|

 sarvaroganidAnoktairahitaiH kupitA malAH||1||  acakSuSyairviCeSeNa prAyaH pittAnusAriNaH||1||  CirAbhirUrdhvaM prasRtA netrAvayavamACritAH||2||  vartma sandhiM sitaM kRSNaM dRSTiM vA sarvamakSi vA||2||  rogAn kuryuH--------------------------------------------||3||

sa0-sarvaroganidAne uktAni-abhihitAni yathAyogaM tiktoSaNAdIni, tairAhAravihAraiH prakupita malA rogAn kuryuH|  viCeSAdacakSuSyairAhAravihAraiH kupitA malAH prAyo-bAhulyena, pittAnusAriNastathA CirAdibhiH karaNabhUtAbhirUrdhvaM jatruNaH prasRtAstathA netrasya sambandhinamavayavaM-vakSyamANaM vartmAdikaM, ACritAH|  vartmetyAdi|  vACabdaH pratyekaM yujyate, vartma vA sandhiM vA sitaM vA~asitaM vA dRSTiM vA sakalaM locanamACritAH|  iti sAmAnyena nayanarogANAM samprAptiH|

 ----------calastatra prApya vartmACrayAH sirAH||3||  suptotthitasya kurute vartmastambhaM savedanam||3||  pAMCupUrNAbhanetratvaM kRcchronmIlanamaCru ca||4||  vimardanAt syAcca CamaH kRcchronmIlaM vadanti tat||4||

sa0-tatra-teSu vartmAdyACriteSu madhye, vartmACrayAH sirA vAyuH prApya suptotthitasya narasya vartmastambhaM kurute, rujayA saha|  tathA paMCupUrNAbhanayanatvaM kRcchreNonmIlanamaCru ca kurute|  vimardanAt-malanAcca, CamaH syAt|  taM-IdRksvarUpaM, kRcchronmIlAkhyaM netrerogaM vadanti|

 cAlayan vartmanI vAyurnimeSonmeSaNaM muhuH||5||  karotyaruG nimeSo~asau---------------------||5||

sa0-vAyurvatmanI cAlayan nimeSonmeSaNaM pIDArahitaM punaH punaH karoti|  asau nimeSAkhyo rogo jJeyaH|

 ----------------------------------vartma yattu nimIlyate||5||  vimuktasandhi niCceSTaM hInaM vAtahataM hi tat||6||

sa0-yatpunarvartma vimuktasandhi tathA niCceSTaM hInam ca nimIlyate taM vAtahatAkhyaM rogaM vadanti, 'munayaH' iti CeSaH|

 kRSNAH pittena bahvyo~antarvartma kumbhIkabIjavat||6||  AdhmAyante punarbhinnAH piTikAH kumbhisaMjJitAH||7||

sa0-pittena kRSNavarNAH piTikA bahvyo vartmanormadhye kumbhIkabIjatulyAstathA bhinnAH satyaH punaradhmAyante, tAH kumbhIsaMjJAH|

 sadAhakledanistodaM raktAbhaM sparCanAkSamam||7||  pittena jAyate vartma pittotkliSTamuCanti tat||8||

sa0-pittena sadAhakledanistodaM tathA raktAkAraM sparCanAkSamaM vartma jAyate, tat pittotkliSTamuCanti-kathayanti|

 karoti kaNDUM dAhaM ca pittaM pakSmAntamAsthitam||8||  pakSmaNAM CAtanaM cAnu pakSmaCAtaM vadanti tam||9||

sa0-pittaM pakSmAntamAsthitaM kaNDUm dAhaM ca karoti|  anupaCcAt, pakSmANAM CAtaM karoti|  taM pakSmaCAtaM varNayanti|

 pothakyaH piTikAH CvetAH sarSapabhA ghanAH kaphAt||9||  CophopadeharukkaNDUpicchilACrusamanvitAH||10||

sa0-kaphAt piTikAH sitAH sarSapopamA ghanAH-nibiDAH, CophAdiyutAH pothakIsaMjJAH|

 kaphotkliSTaM bhavedvartma stambhakledopadehavat||10||

sa0-stambhAdiyutaM vartma yad bhavet tatkaphotkliSTaM nAma|

 arCo~adhimAMsaM vartmAntaH stabdhaM snigdhaM sadAharuk||13||  raktaM raktena tatsrAvi chinnaM chinnaM ca vardhate||13||

sa0-adhikamAMsaM ca vartmAbhyantarasthitamarCo nAma raktena syAt|  raktaM varNataH, tathA stabdhatAdiguNaM syAt|  tathA tatsrAvitadraktaM sravatyabhIkSNam|  tat punaHpunaschinnamapi vardhate|

sa0-kumbhIkAvartma likhitaM vRddhipatrAdinA saindhavalavaNena pratisAritaM sat madhuyaSTikAdikvAthena pariSecayet|  


	

nivAte~adhiSThitasyAptaiH CuddhasyottAnaCAyinaH||3||  bahiH koSNAmbutaptena sveditaM vartma vAsasA||3||  nirbhujya vastrAntaritaM vAmAGguSThAGgulIdhRtam||4||  na sraMsate calati vA vartmaivaM sarvatastataH||4||  maNDalAgreNa tattiryak kRtvA CastrapadAGkitam||5||  likhettenaiva patrairvA CAkaCophAlikAdijaiH||5||  phenena toyarACervA picunA pramRjannasRk||6||  sthite rakte sulikhitaM sakSaudraiH pratisArayet||6||  yathAsvamuktairanu ca prakSAlyoSNena vAriNA||7||  ghRtena siktamabhyaktaM badhnIyAnmadhusarpiSA||7||  UrdhvAdhaH karNayordattvA piNDIM ca yavasaktubhiH||8||  dvitIye~ahani muktasya pariSekaM yathAyatham||8||  kuryAccaturthe nasyAdIn muJcedevAhni paJcame||9||

sa0-nivAte sthAne AptairadhiSThitasya-kRtACrayasya, tathA Cuddhasya-vamanavirecanAdinA, uttAnaM nityaM Cete tasya vartma vAsasA koSNAmbunA taptena sveditaM sannirbhujya-kuTilIkRtya, vastrAntaritaM vAmAGguSThAGgulIbhyAM dhRtamevaM na sraMsate|  na vA calati sarvataH|  anantaraM tadvartma tiryaG maNDalAgreNa CastrapadAGkitaM kRtvA tenaiva CastreNa CAkAdipatrairvA samudraphenena vA likhet|  kiM kurvan ?  picunA-karpaTAdiyojitena, raktaM pramRjan|  rakte sthite-avahati, sulikhitaM tadvartma jJAtvA sakSaudrairyathAsvaM kathitaiH saindhavAdibhiH pratisArayet|  paCcAccoSNena vAriNA prakSAlya sarpiSA siktamanantaramabhyaktaM madhusarpiSA UrdhvAdhaH karNayoryavasaktubhiH piNDIM ca dattvA~avabadhnIyAt|  dvitIye divase muktasya vartmano yathAsvaM pariSekaM kuryAt|  caturthe divase nasyAdIn kuryAt| 
 paJcame divase muJcedeva-nAnyatkiJcitkuryAt|

sa0-atilekhanAdrujAdIni syuH|  tasmin-atilekhane, snehasvedAdiko vAtaghno vidhiH kAryaH|

 abhyajya navanItena CvetarodhraM pralepayet||11||  eraNDamUlakalkena puTapAke pacettataH||12||  svinnaM prakSAlitaM CuSkaM cUrNitaM poTalIkRtam||12||  striyAH kSIre chagalyA vA mRditaM netrasecanam||13||

sa0-CvetarodhraM navanItenAbhyajya eraNDamUlakalkena pralepayet|  anantaraM puTapAke pacet|  svinnaM prakSAlitaM CuSkaM cUrNitaM poTalIkRtaM sat yuvatIkSIreNa chagalyA vA kSIreNa marditaM netre secanaM hitam|

sa0-atilikhite vartmani navanItenAktaM CvetarodhraM CAlitandulakalkena liptaM baddhaM pariSkRtaM-pUrvavatparikalpitaM puTapAkIkRtaM svinnaM prakSAlitaM CuSkaM cUrNitaM poTalIkRtaM cetyarthaH, tat dadhimastunA mRditaM sekaM kuryAt|  dadhigrahaNaM takramastvAdinivRttyai|  athavA kevalena-kalkarodhrarahitena, mastunA jAGgalamAMsACino narasya sekaM kuryAt|  apiH svedanAdisamudAyavikalpArthaH|

 piTikA vrIhivakreNa bhittvA tu kaThinonnatAH||15||  niSpIDayedanu vidhiH pariCeSastu pUrvavat||15||

sa0-kaThinonnatAH piTikAH vrIhivakreNa bhittvA~anu niSpIDayet|  pariCeSo vidhiH-pralepanakSAlanabandhanasecanAdiH, pUrvavatkAryaH|

asmAdanantaraM dRSTirogavijJAnamAha|  tatrApi pUrvaM timiraM lilakSayiSurAha- 
sa0-[ male- ] doSe vAtAdyanyatame, sirAnusAriNi tathA prathamaM-bAhyaM, paTalaM Crite satyavyaktaM rUpaM paCyati|  vyaktamapi kadAcinnimittamantareNa paCyati|  eSa timirAkhyo roga iti vakSyamANena sambandhaH|

 prApte dvitIyaM paTalamabhUtamapi paCyati||2||  bhUtaM tu yatnAdAsannaM dUre sUkSmaM ca nekSate||2||  dUrAntikasthaM rUpaM ca viparyAsena manyate||3||  doSe maNDalasaMsthAne maNDalAnIva paCyati||3||  dvidhaikaM dRSTimadhyasthe bahudhA bahudhAsthite||4||  dRSTerabhyantaragate hnasvavRddhaviparyayam||4||  mAntikasthamadhaHsaMsthe dUragaM nopari sthite||5||  pArCve paCyennapArCvasthe timirAkhyo~ayamAmayaH||5||

sa0-dvitIyaM paTalaM prApte~abhUtamapi paCyati, na kevalaM bhUtam|  bhUtaM tu yatnena paCyati, taccAsannameva|  dUre na ca sUkSmaM paCyati|  dUrAntikasthaM ca rUpaM vaiparItyena manyate,-dUrasthaM nikaTasthaM, nikaTasthaM dUrasthamityarthaH|  doSe maNDalasaMsthAne dvitIyapaTalACrite eva maNDalAnIvAlokate|  dRSTimadhyasthe doSa ekameva vastu dviprakAraM paCyati|  bahudhAsthite doSa ekameva vastu bahuprakAraM paCyati|  dRSTerabhyantarACrite doSe hrasvaM ca vRddhaM ca tayorviparyayaH|  hrasvaM ca mahAntaM, mahAntaM ca hrasvamiti vaiparItyena paCyati|  adhaHsthite doSe samIpasthaM padArthaM nekSate|  upariSTAtsthite doSe dUragaM na paCyati|  pArCvasthe doSe pArCve rUpaM na paCyet|  ayaM sarva eva timirasaMjJo rogaH|

 prApnoti kAcatAM doSe tRtIyapaTalACrite||6||  tenordhvamIkSate nAdhastanucailAvRtopamam||6||  yathA varNaM ca rajyeta dRSTirhIyeta ca kramAt||7||

sa0-evamapyupekSamANasyAcikitsitasya tRtIyaM paTalaM muktvA caturthapaTalaM gato malo-doSaH, liGganACaM-dRSTinACaM ca, kurvan dRSTimaNDalaM chAdayet|  

	
	

 tatra vAtena timire vyAviddhamiva paCyati||8||  calAvilAruNAbhAsaM prasannaM cekSate muhuH||9||  jalAni keCAn maCakAn raCmIMCcopekSite~atra ca||9||  kAcIbhUte dRgaruNA paCyatyAsyamanAsikam||10||  candradIpAdyanekatvaM vakramRjvapi manyate||10||  vRddhaH kAco dRCaM kuryAdrajodhUmAvRtAmiva||11||  spaSTAruNAbhAM vistIrNAM sUkSmAM vA hatadarCanAm||11||  sa liGganACo------------------------------------||12||

sa0-tatra-timireSu madhye, pavanena timire sati vyAviddhamiva paCyati|  tathA calaM dhUmAvilamaruNAbhAsaM muhuH-punaH-prasannaM cAlokate-prakRtisthanayanena paCyati, pavanasya calarUpatvAt|  tathA jAlAdIni muhuH paCyati|  AsyaM-mukhaM, anAsikaM-nAsikArahitaM, paCyati|  tathA candradIpAdInAmanekatvaM vakramavakramiva ca manyate|  vRddhaH kAco rajodhUmAvRtAmiva ca dRSTiM kuryAt|  tathA spaSTA~aruNA~a~abhA yasyAstAm|  tathA vistIrNAM sUkSmAM vA|  tathA hatadarCanAm|  sa evaMbhUto liGganACaH|  iti vAtajAstimirakAcaliGganACA uktAH|

 bhRGganIlA nirAlokA dRk snigdhA liGganACataH||15||  dRSTiH pittena hrasvAkhyA sA hRsva hrasvadarCinI||15||

 bhavetpittavidagdhAkhyA pItA pItAbhadarCanA||16||

sa0-nanu, dRSTirogavijJAnAdanantaraM dRSTirogapratiSedho jJApyaH|  upapannamAha bhavAn|  kiM tu dRSTitogacikitsitasya bahuvaktavyatvAt pRthagadhyAyo vaktuM yuktaH|  tatrApi kramaprAptastimirapratiSedha iti timirapratiSedhArambha eva yuktaH|  kAcAdInAM tvalpavaktavyatvAdatraivAbhidhAnam|  tato bahuvaktavyatvAt pRthagadhyAyo liGganACasya|  iti sarvaM yuktam|

 yaSTImadhudvikAkolIvyAghrIkRSNAmRtotpalaiH||12||  pAlikaiH sasirAdrAkSairghRtaprasthaM pacetsamaiH||13||  ajAkSIravarAvAsAmArkavasvarasaiH pRthak||13||  mahAtraiphalamityetatparaM dRSTivikArajit||14||

 traiphalenAtha haviSA lihAnastriphalAM niCi||14||  yaSTImadhukasaMyuktAM madhunA ca pariplutAm||15||  mAsamekaM hitAhAraH pibannAmalakodakam||15||  sauparNaM labhate cakSurityAha bhagavAnnimiH||16||

sa0-paTolAdikaM parpaTAntaM pRthak palonmitamAmalakAnAM prasthaM nalvaNe-droNe~ambhasi, kvAthayet|  tadADhake mustAdibhiH sapippalIkaiH piSTaiH-kalkitaiH, ardhapalikairghRtaprasthaM vipAcayet|  tacca ghRtaM ghrANAdirogajit, vidradhyAdirogajit, viCeSeNa CukrAdighnam|  etatpaTolAdyaM ghRtam|

 alaM ca sauvIrakamaJjanaM ca
		  tAbhyAM samaM tAmrarajaH susUkSmam||56||  pilleSu romANi niSevito~asau
		  cUrNaH karotyekaCalAkayA~api||56||

sa0-haritAlaM sauvIrAJjanaM [ca]| tAbhyAM dvAbhyAM tulyaM tAmracUrNaM sUkSmam| eSa cUrNo niSevita ekayA~api CalAkayA pilleSu romANi karoti| upajAtiH|

 lAkSAnirguNDIbhRGgadArvIrasena
		  CreSThaM kArpAsaM bhAvitaM saptakRtvaH||57||  dIpaH prajvAlyaH sarpiSA tatsamutthA
		  CreSThA pillAnAM ropaNArthe maSI sA||57||

sa0-lAkSAdirasena CreSThaM kArpAsaM saptavArAn bhAvitam| tena kArpAsena sarpiSA dIpaH prajvAlyaH| tatsamutthA maSI pillAnAM ropaNArthe CreSThA| vaiCvadevIvRttam|

 vartmAvalekhaM bahuCastadvacchoNitamokSaNam||58||  punaHpunarvirekaM ca nityamACcyotanAJjanam||59||  nAvanaM dhUmapAnaM ca pillarogAturo bhajet||59||

sa0-pillarogI vartmAvalekhAdikaM punaHpunarbhajet|

 pUyAlase tvaCAnte~ante dAhaH sUkSmaCalAkayA||60||

sa0-pUyAlase punaraCAnte satyante sUkSmaCalAkayA dAho hitaH|

uttarasthAnam

karNarogavijJAnIyAdhyAyaH

 )

pratiCyAyajalakrIDAkarNakaNDUyanairmarut||1||  mithyAyogena Cabdasya kupito~anyaiCca kopanaiH||1||  prApya CrotrasirAH kuryAcchUlaM srotasi vegavat||2||  ardhAvabhedakaM stambhaM CiCirAnabhinandanam||2||  athAtaH karNarogavijJAnIyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||  cirAcca pAkaM pakvaM tu lasIkAmalpaCaH sravet||3||  CrotraM CUnyamakasmAcca syAtsaJcAravicAravat||3||

nayanAmayAdanantaraM dUragrahaNasAdharmyeNa karNarogAnAha| yathA hi cakSurdUradeCasthamapi paCyati tathA CrotraM dUrasthamapi CRNotItyAha-
	 sa0-pratiCyAyetyAdibhiH Cabdasya ca mithyAbhiyogena pavanaH kupito~aparairapi sarvanidAnaiH kupitaH CrotrasirAH prApya srotasi-karNavivare, CUlaM vegavat kuryAt| tathA~ardhAvabhedakaM CirorogaM stambhaM karNasyaiva, tathA CItasyAnabhinandanaM cireNa ca pAkaM kuryAt| pakvaM tu CrotramalpaCo lasIkAM sravet| akasmAcca CUnyaM syAt| saJcAravicAravacca-sthagitAsthagitaM ca yathA, syAt|

 CUlaM pittAt sadAhoSACItecchACvayathujvaram||4||  ACupAkaM prapakvaM ca sapItalasikAsruti||4||  sA lasIkA spRCedyadyattattatpAkamupaiti ca||5||

sa0-pittena CUlaM dAhAdyanvitaM syAt| tatra USA-prAdeCikaH santApaH| dAhaH-sarvAGgINastIvroSmA sadA~aratimAn| tathA~a~aCu pAko yasmiMstadevam| tathA prapakvaM ca sapItalasikAsruti syAt| sA ca lasIkA yadyadaGgaM spRCet tat tat pAkaM gacchati|

 kaphAcchirohanugrIvAgauravaM mandatA rujaH||5||  kaNDUH CvayathuruSNecchA pAkAcchvetaghanasrutiH||6||

sa0-kaphAcchirAdigauravaM jAyate| rujo mandatvaM kaNDvAdi ca syAt| pAkAcchvetA ghanA ca srutiH syAt|

 karoti CravaNe CUlamabhighAtAdidUSitam||6||  raktaM pittasamAnArti kiJcidvA~adhikalakSaNam||7||

sa0-raktamabhighAtAdidUSitaM karNe CUlaM karoti| kimbhUtaM raktam ? pittena samA pIDA yasmiMstadevam| kiJciccAdhikalakSaNam|

 CUlaM samuditairdoSaiH saCophajvaratIvraruk||7||  paryAyAduSNaCItecchaM jAyate CrutijADyavat||8||  pakvaM sitAsitAraktaghanapUyapravAhi ca||8||

sa0-samuditaiH-sannipatitairdoSaiH, CUlaM CophAdiyutaM jAyate| tathA paryAyeNoSNaCItecchaM CrutijADyayuktaM ca| pakvaM sitAsitAraktaghanaM pUyaM pravahati|

 CabdavAhisirAsaMsthe CRNoti pavane muhuH||9||  nAdAnakasmAdvividhAn karNanAdaM vadanti tam||9||

sa0-CabdavAhinISu sirAsu gate vAte muhuH CabdAn vividhAnakasmAcchRNoti| taM karNanAdaM vadanti|

 CleSmaNA~anugato vAyurnAdo vA samupekSitaH||10||  uccaiH kRcchrAcchrutiM kuryAdbadhiratvaM krameNa ca||10||

sa0-vAyuH CleSmaNA~anugataH karNanAdo vA samupekSitaH-acikitsitaH, karNe-Crotre, uccaiH kRcchrAcchrutiM-CravaNaM, kuryAt| krameNa badhiratvaM-bAdhiryaM ca, kuryAt|

 vAtena SoSitaH SleSmA Sroto limpettato phavet||11||  ruggauravaM pidhAnaM ca sa pratInAhasaMjJitaH||11||

sa0-vAtena SleSmA SoSitaH Sroto limpet| tato ruggauravaM tasya srotaso gurutvaM syAt, sthaganaM ca| sa pratInAhasaMjJako gadaH|

 kaNDUCophau kaphAcchrotre sthirau tatsaMjJayA smRtau||12||

sa0-kaphAt kaNDUCophau karNe sthirau tatsaMjJau kaNDUCophAkhyau bhavataH|

 kapho vidagdhaH pittena sarujaM nIrujaM tvapi||12||  ghanapUtibahukledaM kurute pUtikarNakam||13||

sa0-kaphaH pittena vidagdhaH sarujaM nIrujaM vA ghanapUtibahukledaM pUtikarNakamanugatArthaM kurute|

 vAtAdidUSitaM CrotraM mAMsAsRkkledajA rujam||13||  khAdanto jantavaH kuryustIvrAM sa kRmikarNakaH||14||

sa0-vAtAdibhiH dUSitaM CrotraM jantavo bhakSayanto mAMsAdikledajAM tIvrAM rujaM kuryuH| sa kRmikarNakAkhyaH|

 CrotrakaNDUyanAjjAte kSate syAtpUrvalakSaNaH||14||  vidradhiH, pUrvavaccAnyaH-----------------------||15||

sa0-CrotrakaNDUyanAjjAte kSate pUrvoktalakSaNo vidradhiH syAt| nidAne hyevamuktam (hR. ni. a. 11| 2)- "yaH Copho bahirantarvA mahAmUlo mahArujaH| vRttaH syAdAyato yo vA smRtaH SoDhA sa vidradhiH||" iti| tadvadiha vidradhisAmAnyAt karNavidradhireka evoktaH|

 ---------------------------Copho~arCo~arbudamIritam||15||  teSu ruk pUtikarNatvaM badhiratvaM ca bAdhate||15||

sa0-arCo~arbudaM ca tadIritamiti karNArCaH karNArbudamiti| tatra hyuktam (hR. u. a. 8|13)- "arCo~adhimAMsaM vartmAntaH stabdhaM snigdhaM sadAharuk| raktaM raktena tatsrAvi chinnaM chinnaM vivardhate||" iti| arbudasya tu lakSaNam (hR. u. a. 8|24)- "vartmAntarmAMsapiNDAbhaH Cvayathurgrathito~arujaH| sAsraiH syAdarbudo doSairviSamo bAhyataCcalaH||" iti| teSu-arCo~arbudeSu, rug bAdhate pUtikarNatvaM badhiratvaM ca|

 garbhe~anilAtsaGkucitA CaSkulI kucikarNakaH||16||

sa0-vAtAdgarbhe-abhyantare, saGkucitA CaSkulI kucikarNasaMjJaH|

 eko nIruganeko vA garbhe mAMsAGkuraH sthiraH||16||  pippalI pippalImAnaH-------------------------||17||

sa0-mAMsAMGkuro garbhe sthira eko~aneko vA nIrujaH pippalItyucyate, karNapippalItyarthaH| sa ca mAMsAMGkuraH pippalImAnaH|

 ---------------------------------sannipAtAdvidArikA||17||  savarNaH sarujaH stabdhaH CvayathuH, sa upekSitaH||17||  kaTutailanibhaM pakvaH sravet kRcchreNa rohati||18||  saGkocayati rUDhA ca sA dhruvaM karNaCaSkulIm||18||

sa0-sannipAtena vidArikAkhyaH CvayathuH stabdhastathA savarNaH sarujaH| sa upekSitaH san kaTutailanibhaM sravet| kRcchreNa rohati| sA ca vidArikA rUDhA satI niCcitaM karNaCaSkulIM saGkocayati|

 sirAsthaH kurute vAyuH pAlICoSaM tadAhvayam||19||

sa0-sirAstho vAyuH pAlICoSaM tadAhvayaM-pAlICoSasaMjJaM, kurute|

 kRCA dRDhA ca tantrIvat pAlI vAtena tantrikA||19||  sukumAre cirotsargAtsahasaiva pravardhite||20||  karNe CophaH saruk pAlyAmaruNaH paripoTavAn||20||  paripoTaH sa pavanAt----------------------||21||

sa0-vAtena pAlI kRCA dRDhA ca tantrIva syAt| sA tantrIketyucyate|
	 sa0-sukumAre karNe cirotsargAt sahasaiva-na tu CanaiH, pravardhite CvayathuH pAlyAM saruk tathA lohitaH paripoTavAMCca| paripoTaH-sphuTanam| sa vAtAt paripoTasaMjJaH syAt|

 ----------------------utpAtaH pittaCoNitAt||21||  gurvAbharaNabhArAdyaiH CyAvo rugdAhapAkavAn||21||  CvayathuH sphoTapiTikArAgoSAkledasaMyutaH||22||

sa0-pittaCoNitAt sa evotpAtasaMjJaH| gurvAbharaNabhArAdibhirhetubhUtaiH prakupitAt pittaCoNitAt Copho rugAdimAn sphoTAdisaMyutaH| CyAvo~anugatArthaH|

 pAlyAM Copho~anilakaphAtsarvato nirvyathaH sthiraH||22||  stabdhaH savarNaH kaNDUmAnunmantho galliraCca saH||23||

sa0-vAtakaphAt pAlyAM CophaH sarvato nirvyathaH sthiraH stabdhaH samAnavarNaH kaNDUyuta unmantha ucyate| sa eva gallirAkhyaH|

karNarogapratiSedhAdhyAyaH

 )
	karNaCUle pavanaje pibedrAtrau rasACitaH||1||  vAtaghnasAdhitaM sarpiH, karNaM svinnaM ca pUrayet||1||  patrANAM pRthagaCvatthabilvArkairaNDajanmanAm||2||  tailasindhUtthadigdhAnAM svinnAnAM puTapAkataH||2||  athAtaH karNarogapratiSedhaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||  rasaiH kavoSNaistadvacca mUlakasyAralorapi||3||

asmAdanantarametaccikitsocyata ityAha-
 sa0-vAtodbhave karNaCUle mAMsarasena bhojito vAtaghnadravyasAdhitaM ghRtaM niCi pibet|
	
	 karNaM ca svinnaM santaM pRthagaCvatthAdijAnAM patrANAM tailasaindhavadigdhAnAM puTapAkataH svinnAnAM rasaiH koSNaiH pUrayet| tathaiva mUlakasya rasena syonAkasya ca rasena pUrayet|

 gaNe vAtahare~amleSu mUtreSu ca vipAcitaH||3||  mahAsneho drutaM hanti sutIvrAmapi vedanAm||4||

sa0-vAtahare gaNe~amleSu mUtreSu ca-gomUtrAdiSu, vipAcito mahAsneho drAgeva sudAruNAmapi pIDAM jayati|

 mahataH paJcamUlasya kASThAtkSaumeNa veSTitAt||4||  tailasiktAtpradIptAgrAt snehaH sadyo rujApahaH||5||  yojyaCcaivaM bhadrakASThAtkuSThAtkASThAcca sAralAt||5||

sa0-mahataH paJcamUlasya ekatamAt kASThAt kSaumeNa veSTitAt tailasiktAt prajvalitAt grAhyaH snehaH| sa karNe niSiktaH sadyo rujAhRt|
 sa0-evaM-anenaiva vidhinA, devadArukASThAt kuSThAt saralakASThAcca cyutaH sneho-raso, yojyaH|

 vAtavyAdhipratiCyAyavihitaM hitamatra ca||6||  varjayecchirasA snAnaM CItAmbhaHpAnamahnyapi||6||

sa0-vAtavyAdhau pratiCyAye ca yadvihitaM bheSajaM taccAtra hitam|
 sa0-CirasA saha snAnaM varjayet| CItajalapAnaM divA~api na kAryam, rAtrau tu sarvathA varjyamevetyarthaH|

 pittaCUle sitAyuktaghRtasnigdhaM virecayet||7||  drAkSAyaSTiCRtaM stanyaM Casyate karNapUraNam||7||

sa0-pittaCUle sitAnvitaghRtena snigdhaM virecayet| drAkSAmadhukasiddhaM strIkSIraM karNapUraNaM hitam|

 yaSTyanantAhimoCIrakAkolIrodhrajIvakaiH||8||  mRNAlabisamaJjiSThAsArivAbhiCca sAdhayet||8||  yaSTImadhurasaprasthakSIradviprasthasaMyutam||9||  tailasya kuDavaM nasyapUraNAbhyaJjanairidam||9||  nihanti CUladAhoSAH kevalaM kSaudrameva vA||10||

sa0-yaSTyAdibhiH kalkairmadhukakvAthaprasthena kSIrasya dviprasthena ca saMyutaM tailakuDavaM sAdhayet| nasyakarNapUraNAbhyaJjanairidaM CUlAdIn hanti| kevalaM kSaudraM vA|

 yaSTyAdibhiCca saghRtaiH karNau dihyAtsamantataH||10||

sa0-yaSTyAdibhiH-pUrvoktaiH, sasarpikaiH karNau ca parito limpet|

 vAmayet pippalIsiddhasarpiHsnigdhaM kaphodbhave||11||  dhUmanAvanagaNDUSasvedAn kuryAtkaphApahAn||11||

sa0-kaphotthe pippalIpakvaghRtasnigdhaM vAmayet| dhUmAdIMCca kaphaghnAn vidadhyAt|

 laCunArdrakaCigrUNAM muruGgyA mUlakasya ca||12||  kadalyAH svarasaH CreSThaH kaduSNaH karNapUraNe||12||

sa0-laCunAdInAM pRthak pRthak svarasaH karNapUraNe koSNaH CreSThaH|

 arkAGkurAnamlapiSTAMstailAktAMllavaNAnvitAn||13||  sannidhAya snuhIkANDe korite tacchadAvRtAn||13||  svedayetpuTapAkena sa rasaH CUlajitparam||14||

sa0-arkAGkurAnamlena-kAJikena, piSTAMstailena rUkSi(Si)tAn lavaNAnvitAn snuhIkANDe korite sannidhAya tasyAH-snuhyAH, patrairAvRtAn puTapAkena svedayet| sa rasaH paraM CUlajit|

 )avaCyAyAnilarajobhASyAtisvapnajAgaraiH||1||  nIcAtyuccopadhAnena pItenAnyena vAriNA||1||  atyambupAnaramaNacchardibASpagrahAdibhiH||2||  kruddhA vAtolbaNA doSA nAsAyAM styAnatAM gatAH||2|| athAto nAsArogavijJAnIyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||  janayanti pratiCyAyaM vardhamAnaM kSayapradam||3||

 sarva eva pratiCyAyA duSTatAM yAntyupekSitAH||9||  yathoktopadravAdhikyAtsa sarvendriyatApanaH||10||  sAgnisAdajvaraCvAsakAsoraHpArCvavedanaH||10||  kupyatyakasmAdbahuCo mukhadaurgandhyaCophakRt||11||  nAsikAkledasaMCoSaCuddhirodhakaro muhuH||11||  pUyopamAsitAraktagrathitaCleSmasaMsrutiH||12||  mUrcchanti cAtra kRmayo dIrghasnigdhasitANavaH||12||  pakvaliGgAni teSvaGgalAghavaM kSavathoH CamaH||13||  CleSmA sacikkaNaH pIto~ajJAnaM ca rasagandhayoH||13||

sa0-sarva eva pratiCyAyA upekSitA duSTatvaM yAnti| sa tu-duSTapInaso, yathoktopadravANAM-mukhaCoSAdInAM, AdhikyAddhetoH sarvendriyatApano-nAsAcakSurAdInAM khedakaH, agnisAdAdiyutaCca syAt| tathA sahasaiva punaH punaH kupyati| mukhadaurgandhyAdikaraH, tathA nAsikAkledAdikaro muhuH pUyasadRCakRSNaraktapiNDitaCleSmasrutiH| atra ca kRmayo mUrcchanti dIrghAH snigdhAH CvetAH susUkSmACca|

	 bhRCakSavAkhyaM lakSayitumAha-

 ---------------------------nAsAnAhe tu jAyate||17||  naddhatvamiva nAsAyAH CleSmaruddhena vAyunA||17||  niHCvAsocchvAsasaMrodhAt srotasI saMvRte iva||18||

sa0-nAsAnAhAkhye roge jAte sati ghrANasya naddhatvaM-ApUramiva, jAyate| CleSmaNA ruddhena vAtena niHCvAsocchAsasaMrodhAt srotasI saMvRte iva syAtAm|

	sarveSu pInaseSvAdau nivAtAgArago bhajet||1||  snehanasvedavamanadhUmagaNDUSadhAraNam||1||  vAso gurUSNaM CirasaH sughanaM pariveSTanam||2||  laghvamlalavaNaM snigdhamuSNaM bhojanamadravam||2|| athAto nAsArogapratiSedhaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||  dhanvamAMsaguDakSIracaNakatrikaTUtkaTam||3||  yavagodhUmabhUyiSThaM dadhidADimasArikam||3||  bAlamUlakajo yUSaH kulatthotthaCca pUjitaH||4||  kavoSNaM daCamUlAmbu jIrNAM vA vAruNIM pibet||4||  jighreccorakatarkArIvacAjAjyupakuJcikAH||5||


	 sa0-pInaseSvakhileSvapi nivAtaveCmasthitaH san snehanasvedanavamanadhUmAn gaNDUSadhAraNaM ca sevet| tathA vastraM gurUSNasvabhAvaM kauCeyAvikAdibhirmUrdhnaH pariveSTanaM sughanaM bhajet| tathA bhojanaM laghvAdiguNaM bhajet| dADimaM CreSThaM-dADimasAram| dadhidADimasAdhitamiti kecit paThanti| bAlamUlakottho yUSaH kulatthajaCca yUSaH pUjitaH| daCamUlAmbu koSNaM prasannAM vA jIrNAM-purANAM, pibet|
 sa0-corakAdIn jighret|

 vyoSatAlIsacavikAtintiDIkAmlavetasam||5||  sAgnyajAji dvipalikaM tvagelApatrapAdikam||6||  jIrNAdguDAttulArdhena pakvena vaTakIkRtam||6||  pInasaCvAsakAsaghnaM rucisvarakaraM param||7||

sa0-vyoSAdikaM pRthak dvipaladadhnaM, tvagAdikaM dvikArSikaM, purANaguDena paJcACatpalapramANena pakvena vaTakIkRtametat pInasAdihRt paraM rucyAdikRt|

 CatAhvAtvag~a~abalA mUlaM syonAkairaNDabilvajam||7||  sAragvadhaM pibeddhUmaM vasAjyamadanAnvitam||8||  athavA saghRtAn saktUn kRtvA mallakasampuTe||8||

sa0-CatAhvAdikaM vasAdiyutaM dhUmaM pibet| mallakasampuTe vA saktUn sasarpiSkAn kRtvA dhUmaM pibet|

 tyajetsnAnaM CucaM krodhaM bhRCaM CayyAM himaM jalam||9||

sa0-snAnAdIni tyajet|

	 

 pibedvAtapratiCyAye sarpirvAtaghnasAdhitam||9||  paTupaJcakasiddhaM vA vidAryAdigaNena vA||10||  svedanasyAdikAM kuryAt cikitsAmarditoditAm||10||

sa0-vAtapratiCyAye vAtaghnaiH-rAsnAdibhiH, sAdhitaM ghRtaM pibet| saindhavAdibhiH paJcabhirlavaNairvA siddhaM, 'vidAripaJcAGgula' (hR. sU. a. 15|9) ityAdinA vA siddhaM ghRtaM pibet| tathA, arditoktAM cikitsAM svedAdikAM kuryAt|

 pittaraktotthayoH peyaM sarpirmadhurakaiH CRtam||11||  pariSekAn pradehAMCca CItaiH kurvIta CItalAn||11||  dhavatvak~a~atriphalACyAmACrIparNIyaSTitilvakaiH||12||  kSIre daCaguNe tailaM nAvanaM saniCaiH pacet||12||

sa0-pittotthe raktaje ca pratiCyAye madhuradravyaiH CRtaM sarpiH pAtavyam| pariSekAdIn CItavIryaiH CItalAn kuryAt|

	 dhavatvagAdibhistailaM kSIre daCaguNe haridrAnvitairnAvanaM pacet|

 kaphaje laGghanaM lepaH Ciraso gaurasarSapaiH||13||  sakSAraM vA ghRtaM pItvA vamet, piSTaistu nAvanam||13||  bastAmbunA paTuvyoSavellavatsakajIrakaiH||14||  kaTutIkSNairghRtairnasyaiH kavalaiH sarvajaM jayet||14||

sa0-kaphaje laGghanaM hitam| tathA Ciraso gaurasarSapairlepaH|
	 ghRtaM sayavakSAraM pItvA vamet|
	 chAgamUtreNa ca piSTaiH saindhavAdibhirnasyaM hitam|
ghRtaiH kaTutIkSNairnasyaiH kavalaiCca sAnnipAtikaM pratiCyAyaM jayet|

 yakSmakRmikramaM kurvan yApayedduSTapInasam||15||  vyoSorubUkakRmijiddArumAdrIgadeGgudam||15||  vArtAkabIjaM trivRtA siddhArthaH pUtimatsyakaH||16||  agnimanthasya puSpANi pIluCigruphalAni ca||16||  aCvaviD~a~arasamUtrAbhyAM hastimUtreNa caikataH||17||  kSaumagarbhAM kRtAM vartiM dhUmaM ghrANAsyataH pibet||17||

sa0-duSTapInasaM yApayet, yakSmaharaM kRmiharaM ca cikitsitaM kurvan|

	 vyoSAdiCigruphalAntAni turagaviD~a~arasamUtrAbhyAM hastimUtreNa caikataH piSTAni kSaumagarbhAM kRtAM vartiM nAsayA mukhena ca pibet|

 kSavathau puTakAkhye ca tIkSNaiH pradhamanaM hitam||18||  CuNThIkuSThakaNAvelladrAkSAkalkakaSAyavat||18||  sAdhitaM tailamAjyaM vA nasyaM kSavapuTapraNut||19||

sa0-kSavathau puTakAkhye ca roge tIkSNaiH pradhamanaM hitam|
	 CuNThyAdikalkakvAthavat tailaM ghRtaM vA sAdhitaM nasyaM kSavaM puTaM ca hanti|

 nAsACoSe balAtailaM pAnAdau bhojanaM rasaiH||19||  snigdho dhUmastathA svedo nAsAnAhe~apyayaM vidhiH||20||  pAke dIptau ca pittaghnaM tIkSNaM nasyAdi saMsrutau||20||

sa0-nAsACoSe balAtailaM pAnanasyAdau hitam| bhojanaM mAMsarasairhitam| tathA snigdho dhUmaH svedaCca hitaH|

	 sa0-nAsAnAhe~apyeSa eva vidhiH-cikitsetyarthaH|

	 sa0-nAsApAke dIptau ca pittaghnaM cikitsitam| saMsrutau-srAve, tIkSNaM nasyAdi hitam|

 )
mAtsyamAhiSavArAhapiCitAmakamUlakam||1||  mASasUpadadhikSIrasuktekSurasaphANitam||1||  avAkCayyAM ca bhajato dviSato dantadhAvanam||2||  dhUmarcchardanagaNDUSAnucitaM ca sirAvyadham||2|| athato mukharogavijJAnIyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||  kRddhAH CleSmolbaNA doSAH kurvantyantarmukhaM gadAn||3||

	sa0-mAtsyamAhiSavArAhapiCitAdi bhajato dantadhAvanaM dviSataH-asevamAnasya, dhUmAdikaM cocitaM dviSataH, sirAvyadhaM ca dviSataH, CleSmolbaNA doSAH kRddhA mukhasyAntare gadAn kurvanti|

 tatra khaNDauSTha ityukto vAtenauSTho dvidhA kRtaH||3||

sa0-teSu mukharogeSu madhye pavanAdoSTho dvidhA kRtaH khaNDauSTha iti gaditaH|

 oSThakope tu pavanAt stabdhAvoSThau mahArujau||4||  dAlyete paripATyete paruSAsitakarkaCau||4||

sa0-pavanAdoSThakope tvoSThau stabdhau mahArujau dAlyete tathA paripATyete iva|  tathA paruSau kRSNau rUkSau dRCyete|

 pittAttIkSNAsahau pItau sarSapAkRtibhiCcitau||5||  piTikAbhirbahukledAvACupAkau--------------------||5||

sa0-pittenauSThau tIkSNaM na sahete|  pItau ca syAtAm|  tathA ca sarSapAkRtibhiH piTikAbhiCcitau bahukledau CIghrapAkau ca|

 -----------------------------------------kaphAtpunaH||5||  CItAsahau guru CUnau savarNapiTikAcitau||6||

sa0-kaphena CItAsahau guru CUnau savarNaiH piTakairAcitau syAtAm|

 sannipAtAdanekAbhau durgandhAsrAvapicchilau||6||  akasmAnmlAnasaMCUnarujau viSamapAkinau||7||

sa0-sannipAtAdoSThau nAnAvarNapiTakairAcitau durgandhasrAvapicchilau sahasaiva mlAnau kadAcitsaMCUnau viSamapAkinau vA|

 raktopasRSTau rudhiraM sravataH CoNitaprabhau||7||  kharjUrasadRCaM cAtra kSINe rakte~arbudaM bhavet||8||

saM-raktena yuktau rudhiraM sravantau raktaprabhau ca|  kSINe rakte kharjUrAkAramarbudamoSThau syAt|

 mAMsapiNDopamau mAMsAtsyAtAM mUrcchatkRmI kramAt||8||

sa0-mAMsena mAMsapiNDopamAvoSThau|  krameNa ca mUrcchatkRmI syAtAm|  mUrcchanti kRmayo yayoriti mUrcchatkRmI|  tayoH kRmayo jAyanta ityarthaH|

 tailAbhaCvayathukledau sakaNDvau medasA mRdU||9||  kSatajAvavatIryete pATyete cAsakRtpunaH||9||  grathitau ca punaH syAtAM kaNDUlau daCanacchadau||10||

sa0-medasA tailAbhaH CophaH kledaCca yayostAvevam|  tathA kaNDUyutau mRdU cauSThau syAtAm|

	sa0-kSatajAvasakRdavadIryete paripATyete-bhedyete iva, grathitau ca punaroSThau syAtAM sakaNDUkau ca|

 jalabudbudavadvAtakaphAdoSThe jalArbudam||10||

sa0-vAtakaphAt jalabudbudAkAraM jalArbudamoSThe syAt|  ityekAdaCa oSThe|

 ---------------upakuCaH pAkaH pittAsRgudbhavaH||21||  dantamAmsAni dahyante raktAnyutsedhavantyataH||22||  kaNDUmanti sravantyasramAdhmAyante~asRji sthite||22||  calA mandarujo dantA pUti vaktraM ca jAyate||23||

khaNDauSThasya vilikhyAntau syUtvA vraNavadAcaret||1||  athAto mukharogapratiSedhaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

pa0 ca0-khANDauSThasya-chinnauSThasya snigdhasvinnasya, oSThaprAntau vilikhya suSliSTau kSaumasUtreNa syUtvA sadyovraNavadupacAraM kuryAt,-CatadhautaghRtAbhyaktAM vraNasyopari kavalikAM dadyAt|

 yaSTijyotiSmatIrodhraCrAvaNIsArivotpalaiH||1||  paTolyA kAkamAcyA ca tailamabhyaJjanaM pacet||2||  nasyaM ca tailaM vAtaghnamadhuraskandhasAdhitam||2||

pa0 ca0-sarjarasasikthakagugguludevadArubhiH siddhena mahAsnehena-sarpirmajjavasAtailAkhyenAktaH, picurvAtauSThe-vAtaja oSThakope, hitaH| 

	pa0 ca0-tenaiva-mahAsnehena, madhuyaSTIcUrNayuktena vAtauSThe vA pratisAraNaM hitam|

 nADyoSThaM svedayeddugdhasiddhaireraNDapallavaiH||4||  khaNDauSThavihitaM nasyaM tasya mUrdhni ca tarpaNam||5||

pa0 ca0- oSThaM-vAtauSThaM, dugdhasiddhaireraNDapallavairnADyA svedayet|

 pittAbhighAtajAvoSThau jalaukobhirupAcaret||5||  rodhrasarjarasakSaudramadhukaiH pratisAraNam||6||

pa0 ca0-pittajamabhighAtajamo(jaM cau)SThakopaM jalaukobhirupAcaret-cikitsettAbhI raktaM srAvayet|

 --------------------------oSThe tu kaphAture||7||  pAThAkSAramadhuvyoSairhRtAsre pratisAraNam||8||  dhUmanAvanagaNDUSAH prayojyACca kaphacchidaH||8||

 svinnaM bhinnaM vimedaskaM dahenmedojamagninA||9||  priyaGgurodhratriphalAmAkSikaiH pratisArayet||9||  sakSaudrA gharSaNaM tIkSNA bhinnaCuddhe jalArbude||10||  avagADhe~ativRddhe vA kSAro~agnirvA pratikriyA||10||  AmAdyavasthAsvalajIM gaNDe CophavadAcaret||11||

	sa0-dhUmAdibhiH CirogatA doSA rogAn janayanti|

 --------------------------tatra mArutakopataH||3||  nistudyete bhRCaM CaGkhau ghATA sambhidyate tathA||4||  bhruvormadhyaM lalATaM ca patatIvAtivedanam||4||  bAdhyete svanataH Crotre niSkRSyeta ivAkSiNI||5||  ghUrNatIva CiraH sarvaM sandhibhya iva mucyate||5||  sphuratyati sirAjAlaM kandharAhanusaGgrahaH||6||  prakACAsahatA ghrANasrAvo~akasmAdyathACamau||6||  mArdavaM mardanasnehasvedabandhaiCca jAyate||7||  CirastApo~ayam-----------------------------||7||

sa0-tatra-teSu madhye, vAtakopAt CaGkhanistodAdayaH syuH|  tathA mardanAdibhirmArdavaM jAyate|  ghUrNatIveti ghUrNastudAdiH|  ayamIdRCaH CirastApa ucyate|

 -------------ardhe tu mUrdhnaH so~ardhAvaphedakaH||7||  pakSAtkupyati mAsAdvA svayameva ca CAmyati||8||  ativRddhastu nayanaM CravaNaM vA vinACayet||8||

saM-ardhe tu CirasaH, ardhAvabhedaka ucyate|  sa ca pakSeNa kupyati|  mAsena vA kupyati|  svayameva-cikitsitaM vinaiva, upaCAmyati|  ativRddhastvayaM locanaM karNaM vA hanyAt|

 CorobhitApe pittotthe CorodhUmAyanaM jvaraH||9||  svedo~akSidahanaM mUrcchA niCi CItaiCca mArdavam||9||  aruciH kaphaje mUrdhno gurustimitaCItatA||10||  CirAnispandatA~a~alasyaM rUGmandA~ahnyadhikAniCi||10||  tandrA CUnAkSikUTatvaM karNakaNDUyanaM vamiH||11||  raktAt pittAdhikarujaH sarvaiH syAtsarvalakSaNaH||11||

sa0-kaphaje CirobhitApe~arucyAdayaH syuH|  divA pIDA mandA bhavati, vibhAvaryAmadhikA|  tathA tandrAdayaH syuH|

sa0-saGkIrNairAhAraiH Cirasi kledite rudhire mAMse ca sannipAte ca kopite kRmayo mUrdhni jAyante|  te ca mUrdhnau raktaM pibanto dAruNAH pIDA manovibhraMCakAriNIrjanayanti|  jvarAdayaCca syuH| tathA kapAle tAluCirasoH kaNDvAdyAH syuH| tathA tAmrAcchasiGghANakatvaM karNanAdaCca kRmije syAt|

 vAtolbaNAH CiraHkampaM tatsaMjJaM kurvate malAH||15||  pittapradhAnairvAtAdyaiH CaGkhe CophaH saCoNitaiH||16||  tIvradAharujArAgapralApajvaratRDbhramAH||16||  tiktAsyaH pItavadanaH kSiprakArI sa CaGkhakaH||17||  trirAtrAjjIvitaM hanti sidhyatyapyACu sAdhitaH||17||

sa0-vAtAdhikA doSAH CiraHkampaM CiraH kampAkhyaM kurvate|
	sa0-pittAdhikairdoSaiH saraktaiH CaGkhe Copho~atidAhAdayaCca syuH|  sa ca CaGkhakastiktAsyaH pItavarNamukhaH kSiprakArI ca syAt|  tiktaM-tiktasvAdamAsyaM, yasmin CaGkhake saH|  evamanyadapi yojyam|  sa cAnupakrAntastrirAtreNa jIvitaM harati|  CIghraM ca cikitsitaH sidhyatyapi|  apiCabdAt kadAcinna sidhyati|

 pittAnubaddhaH CaGkhAkSibhrUlalATeSu mArutaH||18||  rujaM saspandanAM kuryAdanusUryodayodayAm||18||  AmadhyAhnaM vivardhiSNuH kSudvataH sA viCeSataH||19||  avyavasthitaCItoSNasukhA CAmyatyataH param||19||  sUryAvartaH sa ityuktA daCa rogAH CirogatAH||20||

sa0-pittAnubaddho mArutaH CaGkhAdiSu rujaM saspandanAM kuryAt|  kimbhUtAM rujam ? anusUryodayaM udayo yasyAH sA tAm|  AmadhyAhnaM-madhyAhnaM maryAdIkRtya vardhanaCIlA, sA pIDA bubhukSitasya viCeSeNa|  tathA~aniyataCItoSNasukhA|  ato-madhyAhnAt, paraM CamaM gacchati|  saH-ityevaM, sUryAvarta uktaH|
sa0-daCaite mUrdhagatA rogA uktAH|

 Cirasyeva ca vakSyante kapAle vyAdhayo nava||20||  kapAle pavane duSTe garbhasthasyApi jAyate||21||  savarNo nIrujaH CophastaM vidyAdupaCIrSakam||21||

 yathAdoSodayaM brUyAt piTikArbudavidradhIn||22||  kapAle kledabahulAH pittAsRkCleSmajantubhiH||22||  kaGgusiddhArthakanibhAH piTikAH syuraruMSikAH||23||

CirobhitApe~anilaje vAtavyAdhividhiM caret||1|| 

athAtaH CirorogapratiSedhaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||


	sa0-pavanaje CirobhitApe vAtavyAdhicikitsitaM kuryAt|

 ghRtamaktaCirA rAtrau pibeduSNapayonupaH||1||  mASAn kulatthAn mudgAn vA tadvatkhAdeddhRtAnvitAn||2||  tailaM tilAnAM kalkaM vA kSIreNa saha pAyayet||2||  piNDopanAhasvedACca mAMsadhAnyakRtA hitAH||3||  vAtaghnadaCamUlAdisiddhakSIreNa secanam||3||  snigdhaM nasyaM tathA dhUmaH CiraHCravaNatarpaNam||4||

sa0-abhyaktaCirA rAtrau ghRtaM pibet|  paCcAduSNaM kSIraM pibet| 

	mASAdIn ghRtAnvitAn khAdet, tadvat-uSNapayonupaH san|

	tilAnAM tailaM kalkaM vA kSIreNa saha pAyayet|  

	piNDasvedA upanAhasvedACca mAMsayuktairdhAnyaiH kRtA hitAH|

	vAtaharadaCamUlAdinA siddhena kSIreNa secanaM hitam|

	snigdhaM ca nasyAdikaM hitam|

 varaNAdau gaNe kSuNNe kSIramardhodakaM pacet||4||  kSIrAvaCiSTaM tacchItaM mathitvA sAramAharet||5||  tato madhurakaiH siddhaM nasyaM tat pUjitaM haviH||5||  varge~atra pakvaM kSIre ca peyaM sarpiH saCarkaram||6||

sa0-varaNasairyeketyAdigaNe(hR.sU.a. 15/21) jarjarite kSIramardhodakaM pacet|  tat kSIrAvaCiSTaM CItIbhUtaM mathitvA sAramAharet|  anantaraM 
taddhataM madhuradravyaiH pakvaM nasyaM CreSTham|
saM-asminneva varaNAdau varge kSIre ca ghRtaM pakvaM saCarkaraM peyam|

 kArpAsamajjA tvaGmustA sumanaHkorakANi ca||6||  nasyamuSNAmbupiSTAni sarvamUrdharujApaham||7||  CarkarAkuGkumaCRtaM ghRtaM pittAsRganvaye||7||

sa0-kArpAsamajjAdInyuSNajalena piSTAni sarvamUrdharujAghnaM nasyam| 

	sa0-CarkarAkuGkumaCRtaM sarpiH pittAsRgutthe [nasyaM] hitam|

	sa0-asmiMCca vAtodrekabhayAllohitaM nAvasecayet|

sa0-CirISabIjAdibhirnasyaM syAt|  CAliparNIkvAtho vA nasyam|  prapunnATabIjamamlena piSTaM lepaH|  

	sa0-sUryAvarte~apyeSa evopakramaH|  tasmiMCca sirayA raktaM srAvayet|

 CirobhitApe pittotthe snigdhasya vyadhayetsirAm||11||  CItAH CiromukhAlepasekaCodhanabastayaH||12||  jIvanIyaCRte kSIrasarpiSI pAnanasyayoH||12||  kartavyaM raktaje~apyetat pratyAkhyAya ca CaGkhake||13||

	tathA CiromukhAlepAdayaH CItA hitAH|  

	jIvanIyaiH CRte kSIraghRte pAnanasyayorhite|  

	sa0-rakteje~apyetaccikitsitaM kAryam|

	CaGkhake ca pratyAkhyAyaiSa evopakramaH kAryaH|

	sa0-sannipAte miCramAcaret|

 )
vraNo dvidhA nijAgantuduSTaCuddhavibhedataH||1||  nijo doSaiH CarIrotthairAganturbAhyahetujaH||1||  doSairadhiSThito duSTaH CuddhastairanadhiSThitaH||2||  athAto vraNapratiSedhaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-vraNo dviprakAro-nijAgantubhedAd duSTaCuddhabhedAcca|  nijo vraNaH CArIraidoSairbhavati|  AganturbAhyahetUdbhavaH|  doSairadhiSThito duSTaH|  Cuddho yo doSairanadhiSThitaH|

 saMvRtatvaM vivRtatA kAThinyaM mRdutA~ati vA||2||  atyutsannAvasannatvamatyauSNyamatiCItatA||3||  raktatvaM pANDutA kArSNyaM pUtipUyaparisrutiH||3||  pUtimAMsasirAsnAyucchannatotsaGgitA~atiruk||4||  saMrambhadAhaCvayathukaNDvAdibhirupadrutaH||4||  dIrghakAlAnubandhaCca vidyAdduSTavraNAkRtim||5||

sa0-saMvRtatvAdiryo vraNastaM duSTavraNAkRtiM vidyAt|

 sa paJcadaCadhA doSaiH saraktaiH-------------------||5||

sa0-sa ca paJcadaCaprakAro raktasahitairdoSaiH syAt|  tatra pRthag doSaistrayaH, saMsargajAstrayaH, sannipAtenaika iti [sapta]|  evaMbhUtA raktasahitaiH sapta|  evaM caturdaCa|  raktena kevalenaika iti paJcadaCa|  nanu, prAgabhyadhAyi (hR.sU.a.29/6)-"CUlaMnarte~anilAddAhaH pittAcchophaH kaphodayAt|  rAgo raktAcca pAkaHsyAt" ityAdi| tadihaikadoSajatvaM dvidoSajatvaM raktarahitatvaM cocyamAnaM pUrvAparavyAhataM syAt|  atrocyate|  kAsasamprAptivadatra nyAyo bodhyaH|  tathA hyekadoSaje~api kAse doSAntarasyAnubandhatvamurarIkRtya dvidoSajAnusAreNa yathopakramastathehApIti nAtra purvAparavyAhatatvam|

 ----------------------------------tatra mArutAt||5||  CyAvaH kRSNo~aruNo bhasmakapotAsthinibho~api vA||6||  mastumAMsapulAkAmbutulyatanvalpasaMsrutiH||6||  nirmAMsastodabhedADhyo rUkSaCcaTacaTAyate||7||

sa0-teSu madhye mArutAt CyAvAdiguNo mastvAditulyatanvalpavisrAvastathA nirmAMsAdiguNaH syAt|

 pittena kSiprajaH pIto nIlaH kapilapiGgalaH||7||  mUtrakiMCukabhasmAmbutailAbhoSNabahusrutiH||8||  kSArokSitakSatasamavyatho rAgoSmapAkavAn||8||

sa0-pittena vraNaH kSiprodbhavaH pItAduguNo mUtrAdisadRCabahusrAvaH kSArokSitatulyarujo rAgoSmapAkavAn|

 kaphena pANDuH kaNDUmAn bahuCvetaghanasrutiH||9||  sthUloSThaH kaThinaH snAyusirAjAlatato~alparuk||9||

sa0-kaphena pANDuH kaNDUyuto bahuCuklaghanasrAvaH sthUlauSThaH kaThinastathA srAyusirAjAlatato~alparujaH|

 pravAlarakto raktena saraktaM pUyamudgiret||10||  vAjisthAnasamo gandhe yukto liGgaiCca paittikaiH||10||

sa0-raktena vidgumalohitaH saraktaM pUyaM sravet|  turagasthAnatulyo gandhena|  tathA paittikairliGgairyutaH|

 dbAbhyAM tribhiCca sarvaiCca vidyAllakSaNasaGkarAt||11||

sa0-dvAbhyAM tribhiH sarvaiCca lakSaNAnAM saGkarAt saMsargajAdIn vidyAt|

 jihvAprabho mRduH ClakSNaH CyAvauSThapiTikaH samaH||11||  kiJcidunnatamadhyo vA vraNaH Cuddho~anupadravaH||12||

sa0-jihvAprabhAdiguNo vraNo~anupadravaH CuddhaH syAt|

 tvagAmiSasirAsnAyusandhyasthIni vraNACayAH||12||  koSTho marma ca tAnyaSTau duHsAdhyAnyuttarottaram||13||

sa0-tvagAdIni vraNACrayAstathA koSTho marma cetyaSTAvRttarottaraM duHsAdhyAni|

pAtaghAtAdibhirdvedhA bhaGgo~asthnAM sandhyasandhitaH||1||  prasAraNAkuJcanayoraCaktiH sandhimuktatA||1||  itarasmin bhRCaM CophaH sarvavasthAsvativyathA||2||  aCaktiCceSTite~alpe~api pIDyamAne saCabdatA||2||  athAto bhaGgapratiSedhaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||  samAsAditi bhaGgasya lakSaNaM, bahudhA tu tat||3||  bhidyate bhaGgabhedena tasya sarvasya sAdhanam||3||  yathA syAdupayogAya tathA tadupadekSyate||4||

sa0-pAtAdibhirasthnAM bhaGgaH|  sa ca dvedhA-dviprakAraH, sandhInAM bhaGgo~asandhervA|  sandhibhaGge prasAraNa AkuJcane cACaktiH sandhimuktatA ca|
itarasmin-asandhibhaGge, atiCophaH, sarvAsvavasthAsvatiCayena rujA, alpe~api ceSTite~aCaktiH, pIDyamAne ca saCabdatA, syAt|  iti saGkSepeNa bhaGgasya lakSaNamuktam|

	taccabhaGgabhedenAnekadhA bhidyate|  

	saM-tasya-bhaGgasya, sarvasya sAdhanaM-cikitsitaM, yathopayogAya syAt tathopadekSyate|

 prajyANudAri yattvasthi sparCe CabdaM karoti yat||4||  yatrAsthileCaH praviCenmadhyamasthno vidAritaH||5||  bhagnaM yaccAbhighAtena kiJcidevAvaCeSitam||5||  unnamyamAnaM kSatavadyacca majjani majjati||6||  tadduHsAdhyaM kRCACaktavAtalAlpACinAmapi||6||  bhinnaM kapAlaM yat kaTyAM sandhimuktaM cyutaM ca yat||7||  jaghanaM prati piSTaM ca bhagnaM yattadvivarjayet||7||

sa0-prAjyACca te~aNavaCca prAjyANavaH,-prabhUtasUkSmAH|  tairdrArAH-dAraNAni, vidyante yatrAsthni tat|  prabhUtANudAri yadasthi tadduHsAdhyam|  yaccAsthi sparCe-sparCane sati, CabdaM karoti tacca duHsAdhyam|  yatrAsthileCo dAritaH-pATitaH, asthnAM madhyaM praviCet tacca duHsAdhyam|  yaccAbhighAtena bhagnam|  kimbhUtam ?  kiJcidevAvaCeSitaM bhavet, tacca duHsAdhyam|  yacconnamyamAnaM kSatasamaM syAt, tacca duHsAdhyam|  tathA yanmajjani majjati, tathA kRCAdInAmapi yat, tacca duHsAdhyam| 
saM-kaTyAM-kaTipradeCe, yatkapAlaM bhinnaM vidAritaM yacca sandhivimuktaM yacca sandheCcayutaM yacca jaghanaM prati piSTaM bhagnaM ca yat tadvivarjayet-pariharet|

 asaMCliSTakapAlaM ca lalATaM cUrNitam tathA||8||  yacca bhagnaM bhavecchaGkhaCiraHpRSThastanAntare||8||  samyagyamitamapyasthi durnyAsAddurnibandhanAt||9||  saGkSobhAdapi yadgacchedvikriyAM tadvivarjayet||9||  Adito yacca durjAtamasthisandhirathApi vA||10||  taruNAsthIni bhujyante, bhajyante nalakAni tu||10||  kapAlAni vibhidyante, sphuTantyanyAni bhUyasA||11||

sa0-lalATamasaMCliSTakapAlaM-bhinnaM, cUrNitaM ca nopakramet|  CaGkhaCiraHpRSThastanAnAM madhye yacchinnaM bhavet, tacca varjayet|
	saM-tathA~asthi samyaguddhRtamapi durnyAsAdinA yad vikriyAM gacchet, tacca varjayet|  
	AditaH-prathamameva, yaccAsthi durjAtaM-asamyagutpannaM syAt, tacca duHsAdhyam|  athavA~asthisandhiryo durjAtaH syAt, sa ca duHsAdhyaH|  durjAtaM ca durjAtaCca durjAtam|  "napuMsakamanapuMsakena" ityekaCeSaH|
	saM-tathA taruNAsthIni-nAsAkarNAkSikoSANi, bhujyante-kuTilIkriyante|  tathA nalakAni bhaGgaM yAnti|  kapAlAni ca vidAryante|  anyAni cAsthIni bAhulyena sphuTanti|  etatsarvaM duHsAdhyam|

 athAvanatamunnamyamunnataM cAvapIDayet||11||  AcchedatikSiptamadhogataM copari vartayet||12||  AJchanotpIDanonnAmacarmasaGkSepabandhanaiH||12||  sandhIn CarIragAn sarvAn calAnapyacalAnapi||13||  ityetaiH sthApanopAyaiH samyak saMsthApya niCcalam||13||  paTTaiH prabhUtasarpirbhirveSTayitvA sukhaistataH||14||  kadambodumbarACvatthasarjArjunapalACajaiH||14||  vaMCodbhavairvA pRthubhistanubhiH suniveCitaiH||15||  suClakSNaiH sapratistambhairvalkalaiH Cakalairapi||15||  kuCAhvayaiH samaM bandhaM paTTasyopari yojayet||16||

sa0-atha-eSAM bhaGgasthitiM jJAtvA, avanatamasthyunnamanIyam|  unnataM cAsthyavapIDayet|  atikSiptamasthyAJchet|  adhastAdgataM copari vartayet|  
	saM-iti-evaMprakAraiH, etaiH-AJchanAdibhiH sthApanopAyaiH, sarvAJcharIragAn sandhIMCcalAnacalAMCca niCcalaM saMsthApya vastrakhaNDajaiH paTTairbahusarpiSkaiH sukhAvahairveSTayitvA~anantaraM kadambAdijairvalkalairvaMCotthairvA CakalaiH-khaNDaiH, vistIrNaistathA tanubhiH-na tu sthUlaiH, suniveCitaistathA komalaistathA pratistambhayuktaiH kuCAsaMjJaiH samaM bandhaM paTTasyopari kuryAt|

 Cithilena hi bandhena sandhisthairyaM  na jAyate||16||  gADhenAti rujAdAhapAkaCvayathusambhavaH||17||

sa0-Clathena bandhena sandheH sthairyaM na sampadyate|  atigADhena tu bandhena rujAdyudbhavaH|

sa0-tato nyagrodhAdigaNadravyakaSAyeNa CItena secayet bhaGgasandhIn|  taM-sarujaM, paJcamUlaCRtena kSIreNa secayet|

sa0-bhagno naro gRSTikSIraM ghRtasahitaM madhuradravyasAdhitaM CItalaM lAkSayA yuktaM prAtaH pibet|

sa0-pAtAdibhirasthnAM bhaGgaH|  sa ca dvedhA-dviprakAraH, sandhInAM bhaGgo~asandhervA|  sandhibhaGge prasAraNa AkuJcane cACaktiH sandhimuktatA ca|
itarasmin-asandhibhaGge, atiCophaH, sarvAsvavasthAsvatiCayena rujA, alpe~api ceSTite~aCaktiH, pIDyamAne ca saCabdatA, syAt|  iti saGkSepeNa bhaGgasya lakSaNamuktam|

	taccabhaGgabhedenAnekadhA bhidyate|

 mathyamAne jalanidhAvamRtArthaM surAsuraiH||1||  jAtaH prAgamRtotpatteH puruSo ghoradarCanaH||1||  dIptatejACcaturdaMSTro harikeCo~analekSaNaH||2||  jagadviSaNNaM taM dRSTvA tenAsau viSasaMjJitaH||2||  huMkRto brahmaNA mUrtI tataH sthAvarajaGgame||3||  so~adhyatiSThannijaM rUpamujjhitvA vaJcanAtmakam||3||

sa0- sarpAdidaMSTrAsu tu yadvyavasthitaM tajjaGgamam| tacca dAruNam|  daMSTretyupalakSaNArtham, nakhaviSANamUtrAdInAmapi puro viSatvena vakSyamANatvAt|

 tIkSNoSNarUkSaviCadaM vyavAyyACukaraM laghu||7||  vikASi sUkSmamavyaktarasaM viSamapAki ca||8||

sa0- tatsarvaM viSaM tIkSNAdiguNaM syAt| guNanirdeCanAdasya raukSyAdvAtamuSNatvAt pittaM karotIti jJApyate| nanu, raukSyAdibhirguNairvAyoH kopo na yujyate, raukSyAdInAM guNatvAdvAyoCca dravyatvAt|  brUmaH|  vAyorye raukSyAdayo guNAsteSAmeva viSasthai raukSyAdibhirguNairvRddhiH kriyate| te ca vAyorAtmabhUtAH, tannACe vAyornACaH syAt, yathA tantunACe paTanACaH| tasmAdyuktaH pavanasya raukSyAdibhirguNaiH prakopaH| evaM pitte~api yojyam| kaTvamlAdikathane~api viSasyAvyaktarasatvam, anekarasasambhavAdekasyApi ca vyaktasyAnupalabdheH| vyavAyitvaM cAsya drAgevAkhilakAyasya vyApteH| tathA apAki,-viSasya hi mantratantrAbhyAmantareNa pAkAbhAvAt, pakve~apyanne viSasyApakvasyevopalabdheH| ata eva Camitamapi kiJcitkAraNaM prApya punaH kupyati|

 ojaso viparItaM tat tIkSNAdyairanvitaM guNaiH||8||  vAtapittottaraM nRNAM sadyo harati jIvitam||9||

saM-tathA viSamojaso viparItaM tIkSNAdibhirdaCabhirguNairyuktam|  tIkSNAdyairanvitamiti hetau prathamA|  tIkSNAdiguNayuktatvAdojaso viparItamityarthaH|  tathA vAtapittotaraM narANAM drAgeva jIvitaM  harati|
