sa0-yasmAdaviCuddhe CarIre rAsAyano vidhirupayukto vAjIkaro vopayukto niSphalaH syAt|  yathA maline vastre raGgaH|  malinaM hi vastraM na rajyate|

 rasAyanAnAM dvividhaM prayogamRSayo viduH||5||  kuTIprAveCikaM mukhyaM vAtAtapikamanyathA||5||

sa0-munayo rasAyanAnAM prayogaM dviprakAraM jAnanti|  tatra mukhyaM kuTIpraveCanirvRttam|  vAtAtapikamanyathA-amukhyamityarthaH|

 pure prApyopakaraNe harmyanirvAtanirbhaye||6||  diCyudIcyAM Cubhe deCe trigarbhAM sUkSmalocanAm||6||  dhUmAtaparajovyAlastrImUrkhAdyavilaGghitAm||7||  sajjavaidyopakaraNAM sumRSTAM kArayetkuTIm||7||

sa0-kva tatkurvIta ?  pure, prApyopakaraNIye, harmyaM-dhavalagRhaM, nivAtaM nirbhayaM ca yasmin tasmin, tathodIcyAM diCi, Cubhe-durbhikSamarakAdirahite, kuTIM trigarbhAM kArayet|  prathamamekaM gRham, tasyAbhyantare dvitIyam, tasyAbhyantare tRtIyam, evaM trigarbhA|  trayo garbhAH-antarANi, yasyA iti kRtvA|  tathA sUkSmagavAkSAm|  tathA dhUmAdibhiraviliGghitAM-anAkrAntAm|   tathA praguNAni vaidyopakaraNAni-bheSajAdIni, yasyAM tAM tathAvidhAm|  sumRSTAM-upalepanAdikaraNena CuddhAm|

 atha puNye~ahni sampUjya pUjyAMstAM praviCecchuciH||8||  tatra saMCodhanaiH CuddhaH sukhI jAtabalaH punaH||8||  brahmacArI dhRtiyutaH CraddadhAno jitendriyaH||9||  dAnaCIladayAsatyavratadharmaparAyaNaH||9||  devatAnusmRtau yukto yuktasvapnaprajAgaraH||10||  priyauSadhaH peCalavAgArabheta rasAyanam||10||

sa0- atha-kRtamaGgalaH, Cubhe divase CuciH pUjyAn-gurumitrAdIn, sampUjya tAM-pUrvopavarNitAM kuTIM, praviCet|  tasyAM kuTyAM kRtasanniveCaH saMCodhanaiH CuddhaH|  sukhI-arogaH|  etacca bAhulyenoktam|  CilAjatucyavanaprACAdInAM vyAdhiSvapyanujJAtatvAt|  tathA ca vakSayati (Clo.142)-"na so~asti rogo bhuvi sAdhyarUpo jatvaCmajaM yaM na jayetprasahya|" iti|  tathA (Clo.39)-"ityeSa cyavanaprACo yaM prACya cyavano muniH|  jarjarito~apyAsInnArInayananandanaH|| kAsaM CvAsaM kSayaM CophaM vaisvaryaM ca vyapohati||" iti|  punarjAtabalaM iti prakRtibalena yo balavAnnAsIttasya saMCodhanena balahInatvena punarjAtabalo bRMhaNAhArAdinA yadA, sa tadA rasAyanamArabhetetyarthaH|  asaJjAtabalo hyutkRSTavIryANAM rasAyanAnAM vIryaM soDhuM na kSamata iti punarjAtabala ityuktam|  brahmacArItyuktaM nivRttastrIsaGgaparam|    tathA jAtasantoSaH|  CraddhAluralolupaCca|  tathA dAnarataH dayAditatparaH|  tathA devatAbhaktaH|  yuktau svapnaprajAgarau yasya sa evam|  tathA bheSajAnurAgavAn madhuravacanaH|

 harItakImAmalakaM saindhavaM nAgaraM vacAm||11||  haridrAM pippalIM vellaM guDaM coSNAmbunA pibet||11||  snigdhasvinno naraH pUrvaM, tena sAdhu viricyate||12||

sa0- harItakyAdikaM yogamuSNajalena prAk snigdhasvinno naraH pibet|  tena yogena samyag viricyate|

 tataH CuddhaCarIrAya kRtasaMsarjanAya ca||12||  trirAtraM paJcarAtraM vA saptAhaM vA ghRtAnvitam||13||  dadyAdyAvakamACuddheH purANaCakRto~athavA||13||

sa0- anantaraM, CuddhadehAya kRtapeyAdikakramAya ca trirAtraM paJcarAtraM vA saptAhaM vA sarpiryutaM yAvakaM dadyAt|  athavA purANaCakRtaH CuddhiM yAvat tAvadyAvakaM sasarpiSkaM dadyAt|  trividhamalApekSayA trividhaM parijJAnam,-hInapurISasya trirAtram, madhyapurISasya paJcarAtram, utkRSTapurISasya saptarAtramiti|  tathA hi [madhya]bahuvarcaskasya paJcarAtreNa saptarAtreNa vA malaH Cuddhyati, alpamalasya trirAtreNaiva, iti trividhaM parijJAnaM yuktam|  bahutaramalasya bahutarairevAhobhiH CuddhiH syAdityuktavAn'ACuddheH purANaCakRto~athavA' iti|

 itthaM saMskRtakoSThasya rasAyanamupAharet||14||  yasya yadyaugikaM paCyetsarvamAlocya sAtmyavit||14||

sa0-evaM saMskRtakoSThasya narasya yasya yadrasAyanaM yaugikamupalabhyate, sAtmyajJo bhiSak sarvamAlocya tasya tadrasAyanamupAharet| ["haraNAt sarvatogANaM yA~asAvuktA harItakI|  pathyatvAtsarvadhAtUnAM pathyA, CivatayA CivA||  yasmAdvijayate vyAdhIn samagrAn vijayA tataH|  abhayaM sarvarogebhyo bhavatyAyuCca CACvatam|| yataH CIlayatAmenAM teneyamabhayA smRtA|  navA vRttA ghanA snigdhA gurvI majjati cApsu yA|| bAlasya sA prayoktavyA navanItasamanvitA|   vAte sasarpirlavaNA pitte saguDaCarkarA|| kaphe sapippalIkSaudrA sarvadA sA praCasyate|" iti vRddhavAgbhaTAt (saM.u. a. 49)|]

 pathyAsahasraM triguNadhAtrIphalasamanvitam||15||  paJcAnAM paJcamUlAnAM sArdhaM palaCatadvayam||15||  jale daCaguNe paktvA daCabhAgasthite rase||16||  Apothya kRtvA vyasthIni vijayAmalakAnyathA||16||  vinIya tasminniryUhe yojayetkuDavAMCakam||17||  tvagelAmustarajanIpippalyagurucandanam||17||  maNDUkaparNIkanakaCaGkhapuSpIvacAplavam||18||  yaSTyAhvayaM viDaGgaM ca cUrNitaM tulayA~adhikam||18||  sitopalArdhabhAraM ca pAtrANi trINi sarpiSaH||19||  dve ca tailAt pacetsarvaM tadagnau lehatAM gatam||19||  avatIrNaM himaM yuJjyAdviMCaiH kSaudraCataistribhiH||20||  tataH khajena mathitaM nidadhyAd ghRtabhAjane||20||  yA noparundhyAdAhAramekaM mAtrA~asya sA smRtA||21||  SaSTikaH payasa cAtra jIrNe bhojanamiSyate||21||  vaikhAnasA vAlakhilyAstathA cAnye tapodhanAH||22||  brahmaNA vihitaM dhanyamidaM praCya rasAyanam||22||  tandrACramAklamavalIpalitAmayavarjitAH||23||  meghAsmRtibalopetA babhUvuramitAyuSaH||23||

sa0- abhayAnAM sahasramAmalakasahasratritayayutam|  tathA paJcAnAM paJcamUlAnAM palaCatadvayaM sArdhaM salile daCaguNe paktvA daCAMCasthite rasa Apothya-mRditvA, harItakyAmalakAni vyasthIni kRtvA tasmin kvAthe prakSipya kuDavapramANaM tvagelAdikaM cUrNitaM yojayet|  kanakaM-nAgakesaram|  vyasthInIti "napuMsakamanapuMsakena" ityekaCeSaH|  palaCatenAdhikaM CarkarAyA ardhabhAram, ghRtasya trINyADhakAni, dve cADhake tailAt, tatsarvaM vahnau pacet|  tacca lehatAM gatamavatIrNaM CItaM kSaudraCataistribhirviMCatyadhikairyuJjIta|  viMCairiti 'viMCateH pUraNe' iti pUraNe~arthe DibhiH| 'viMCaterDit' iti Tilope viMCaCabdaH|  anantaraM khajenAloDitaM ghRtabhANDe nidadhyAt|  yA-mAtrA, ekamAhAraM-sAyaMtanaM, noparundhyAt sA~asya rasAyanasya mAtrA smRtA|  AhAramekamiti vacanAcca prathamAhArakAlasya rasAyanamAtrayA~avaCyamuparodhaH kArya iti vedayati|  asmiMCca lehe jIrNe SaSTikaH kSIreNa saha bhojanamiSTam|  vaikhAnasAdayo brahmaNA nirmitametadupayujya rasAyanaM tandrAdivarjitA medhAdiyutA amitajIvitACcAbhUvan|  dhanyamiti dhanAya hitam|  nanu, rasAyanasya dhanArjanopAyatvAbhAvAt kathaM dhanyatvam ?  atra brUmaH|  kArye kAraNopacArAdevamuktam|  tathA hi rasAyanamidamAmayaghnatvAdArogye ca sati medhAsmRtyAyuktasya dhanAyodyamaM kurvato~avaCyaM dhanasampa[mprA]ttiriti yuktameva|  nanu, AmayavarjaitA ityanenaivoktArthatvAt tandrAdigrahaNamavAcyameva|  atrAcakSamahe|  Amayavarjite svAsthyAnuvRttikaraNasAmarthyamasya rasAyanasyAvAdIttantrakRt|  tandrAdigrahaNaM ca roganACe~apyasya jyAyastvamiti pratipAdanArtham| ["abhayAmalakabibhItakapaJcAtmakapaJcamUlaniryUhe|  vallIpalACakarase dviguNe kSIre~aSTaguNe ca vipaceta||  ghRtasya kumbhaM madhukaM madhUkaM kAkoliyugmaM ca balAM svaguptAm|  sakSIraCuklAmRSabhaM sajIvaM sukhAmbupastacca pibedguNADhyam|| (sam. u. a. 49)"]

uttarasthAnam

rasAyanavidhiradhyAyaH

 dIrghamAyuH smRtiM medhAmArogyaM taruNaM vayaH||1||  prabhAvarNasvaraudAryaM dehendriyabalodayam||1|| athAto rasAyanavidhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||  vAksiddhiM vRSatAM kAntimavApnoti rasAyanAt||2||  lAbhopAyo hi CastAnAM rasAdInAM rasAyanam||2||

sa0- dIrghAyuHprabhRtIn rasAyanAdadhigacchati|  kasmAdetAni rasAyanAllabhyante?  ityAha-lAbhopAya iti|  yasmAt CreSThAnAM rasarudhirAdInAM yo lAbhopAyaH, sa rasAyanamucyate|

 pUrve vayasi madhye vA tatprayojyaM jitAtmanaH||3||  snigdhasya srutaraktasya viCuddhasya ca sarvathA||3||

sa0-tat-rasAyanaM, jitAtmanaH puruSasyAdye vayasi-atibAlyAtikrAntamAtre, athavA madhyame vayasi prayojyam|  kIdRCasya puMsaH ?  snigdhetyAdi|  snigdhAdiguNayuktasya, tathA sarvathA adha upariSTAcca Cuddhasya|

 aviCuddhe CarIre hi yukto rAsAyano vidhiH||4||  vAjIkaro vA maline vastre raGga ivAphalaH||4||

sa0-yasmAdaviCuddhe CarIre rAsAyano vidhirupayukto vAjIkaro vopayukto niSphalaH syAt|  yathA maline vastre raGgaH|  malinaM hi vastraM na rajyate|

 rasAyanAnAM dvividhaM prayogamRSayo viduH||5||  kuTIprAveCikaM mukhyaM vAtAtapikamanyathA||5||

 pure prApyopakaraNe harmyanirvAtanirbhaye||6||  diCyudIcyAM Cubhe deCe trigarbhAM sUkSmalocanAm||6||  dhUmAtaparajovyAlastrImUrkhAdyavilaGghitAm||7||  sajjavaidyopakaraNAM sumRSTAM kArayetkuTIm||7||

sa0-kva tatkurvIta ?  pure, prApyopakaraNIye, harmyaM-dhavalagRhaM, nivAtaM nirbhayaM ca yasmin tasmin, tathodIcyAM diCi, Cubhe-durbhikSamarakAdirahite, kuTIM trigarbhAM kArayet|  prathamamekaM gRham, tasyAbhyantare dvitIyam, tasyAbhyantare tRtIyam, evaM trigarbhA|  trayo garbhAH-antarANi, yasyA iti kRtvA|  tathA sUkSmagavAkSAm|  tathA dhUmAdibhiraviliGghitAM-anAkrAntAm|   tathA praguNAni vaidyopakaraNAni-bheSajAdIni, yasyAM tAM tathAvidhAm|  sumRSTAM-upalepanAdikaraNena CuddhAm|

 atha puNye~ahni sampUjya pUjyAMstAM praviCecchuciH||8||  tatra saMCodhanaiH CuddhaH sukhI jAtabalaH punaH||8||  brahmacArI dhRtiyutaH CraddadhAno jitendriyaH||9||  dAnaCIladayAsatyavratadharmaparAyaNaH||9||  devatAnusmRtau yukto yuktasvapnaprajAgaraH||10||  priyauSadhaH peCalavAgArabheta rasAyanam||10||

sa0- atha-kRtamaGgalaH, Cubhe divase CuciH pUjyAn-gurumitrAdIn, sampUjya tAM-pUrvopavarNitAM kuTIM, praviCet|  tasyAM kuTyAM kRtasanniveCaH saMCodhanaiH CuddhaH|  sukhI-arogaH|  etacca bAhulyenoktam|  CilAjatucyavanaprACAdInAM vyAdhiSvapyanujJAtatvAt|  tathA ca vakSayati (Clo.142)-"na so~asti rogo bhuvi sAdhyarUpo jatvaCmajaM yaM na jayetprasahya|" iti|  tathA (Clo.39)-"ityeSa cyavanaprACo yaM prACya cyavano muniH|  jarjarito~apyAsInnArInayananandanaH|| kAsaM CvAsaM kSayaM CophaM vaisvaryaM ca vyapohati||" iti|  punarjAtabalaM iti prakRtibalena yo balavAnnAsIttasya saMCodhanena balahInatvena punarjAtabalo bRMhaNAhArAdinA yadA, sa tadA rasAyanamArabhetetyarthaH|  asaJjAtabalo hyutkRSTavIryANAM rasAyanAnAM vIryaM soDhuM na kSamata iti punarjAtabala ityuktam|  brahmacArItyuktaM nivRttastrIsaGgaparam|    tathA jAtasantoSaH|  CraddhAluralolupaCca|  tathA dAnarataH dayAditatparaH|  tathA devatAbhaktaH|  yuktau svapnaprajAgarau yasya sa evam|  tathA bheSajAnurAgavAn madhuravacanaH|

 harItakImAmalakaM saindhavaM nAgaraM vacAm||11||  haridrAM pippalIM vellaM guDaM coSNAmbunA pibet||11||  snigdhasvinno naraH pUrvaM, tena sAdhu viricyate||12||

sa0- harItakyAdikaM yogamuSNajalena prAk snigdhasvinno naraH pibet|  tena yogena samyag viricyate|

 tataH CuddhaCarIrAya kRtasaMsarjanAya ca||12||  trirAtraM paJcarAtraM vA saptAhaM vA ghRtAnvitam||13||  dadyAdyAvakamACuddheH purANaCakRto~athavA||13||

sa0- anantaraM, CuddhadehAya kRtapeyAdikakramAya ca trirAtraM paJcarAtraM vA saptAhaM vA sarpiryutaM yAvakaM dadyAt|  athavA purANaCakRtaH CuddhiM yAvat tAvadyAvakaM sasarpiSkaM dadyAt|  trividhamalApekSayA trividhaM parijJAnam,-hInapurISasya trirAtram, madhyapurISasya paJcarAtram, utkRSTapurISasya saptarAtramiti|  tathA hi [madhya]bahuvarcaskasya paJcarAtreNa saptarAtreNa vA malaH Cuddhyati, alpamalasya trirAtreNaiva, iti trividhaM parijJAnaM yuktam|  bahutaramalasya bahutarairevAhobhiH CuddhiH syAdityuktavAn'ACuddheH purANaCakRto~athavA' iti|

 itthaM saMskRtakoSThasya rasAyanamupAharet||14||  yasya yadyaugikaM paCyetsarvamAlocya sAtmyavit||14||

sa0-evaM saMskRtakoSThasya narasya yasya yadrasAyanaM yaugikamupalabhyate, sAtmyajJo bhiSak sarvamAlocya tasya tadrasAyanamupAharet| ["haraNAt sarvatogANaM yA~asAvuktA harItakI|  pathyatvAtsarvadhAtUnAM pathyA, CivatayA CivA||  yasmAdvijayate vyAdhIn samagrAn vijayA tataH|  abhayaM sarvarogebhyo bhavatyAyuCca CACvatam|| yataH CIlayatAmenAM teneyamabhayA smRtA|  navA vRttA ghanA snigdhA gurvI majjati cApsu yA|| bAlasya sA prayoktavyA navanItasamanvitA|   vAte sasarpirlavaNA pitte saguDaCarkarA|| kaphe sapippalIkSaudrA sarvadA sA praCasyate|" iti vRddhavAgbhaTAt (saM.u. a. 49)|]

 pathyAsahasraM triguNadhAtrIphalasamanvitam||15||  paJcAnAM paJcamUlAnAM sArdhaM palaCatadvayam||15||  jale daCaguNe paktvA daCabhAgasthite rase||16||  Apothya kRtvA vyasthIni vijayAmalakAnyathA||16||  vinIya tasminniryUhe yojayetkuDavAMCakam||17||  tvagelAmustarajanIpippalyagurucandanam||17||  maNDUkaparNIkanakaCaGkhapuSpIvacAplavam||18||  yaSTyAhvayaM viDaGgaM ca cUrNitaM tulayA~adhikam||18||  sitopalArdhabhAraM ca pAtrANi trINi sarpiSaH||19||  dve ca tailAt pacetsarvaM tadagnau lehatAM gatam||19||  avatIrNaM himaM yuJjyAdviMCaiH kSaudraCataistribhiH||20||  tataH khajena mathitaM nidadhyAd ghRtabhAjane||20||  yA noparundhyAdAhAramekaM mAtrA~asya sA smRtA||21||  SaSTikaH payasa cAtra jIrNe bhojanamiSyate||21||  vaikhAnasA vAlakhilyAstathA cAnye tapodhanAH||22||  brahmaNA vihitaM dhanyamidaM praCya rasAyanam||22||  tandrACramAklamavalIpalitAmayavarjitAH||23||  meghAsmRtibalopetA babhUvuramitAyuSaH||23||

sa0- abhayAnAM sahasramAmalakasahasratritayayutam|  tathA paJcAnAM paJcamUlAnAM palaCatadvayaM sArdhaM salile daCaguNe paktvA daCAMCasthite rasa Apothya-mRditvA, harItakyAmalakAni vyasthIni kRtvA tasmin kvAthe prakSipya kuDavapramANaM tvagelAdikaM cUrNitaM yojayet|  kanakaM-nAgakesaram|  vyasthInIti "napuMsakamanapuMsakena" ityekaCeSaH|  palaCatenAdhikaM CarkarAyA ardhabhAram, ghRtasya trINyADhakAni, dve cADhake tailAt, tatsarvaM vahnau pacet|  tacca lehatAM gatamavatIrNaM CItaM kSaudraCataistribhirviMCatyadhikairyuJjIta|  viMCairiti 'viMCateH pUraNe' iti pUraNe~arthe DibhiH| 'viMCaterDit' iti Tilope viMCaCabdaH|  anantaraM khajenAloDitaM ghRtabhANDe nidadhyAt|  yA-mAtrA, ekamAhAraM-sAyaMtanaM, noparundhyAt sA~asya rasAyanasya mAtrA smRtA|  AhAramekamiti vacanAcca prathamAhArakAlasya rasAyanamAtrayA~avaCyamuparodhaH kArya iti vedayati|  asmiMCca lehe jIrNe SaSTikaH kSIreNa saha bhojanamiSTam|  vaikhAnasAdayo brahmaNA nirmitametadupayujya rasAyanaM tandrAdivarjitA medhAdiyutA amitajIvitACcAbhUvan|  dhanyamiti dhanAya hitam|  nanu, rasAyanasya dhanArjanopAyatvAbhAvAt kathaM dhanyatvam ?  atra brUmaH|  kArye kAraNopacArAdevamuktam|  tathA hi rasAyanamidamAmayaghnatvAdArogye ca sati medhAsmRtyAyuktasya dhanAyodyamaM kurvato~avaCyaM dhanasampa[mprA]ttiriti yuktameva|  nanu, AmayavarjaitA ityanenaivoktArthatvAt tandrAdigrahaNamavAcyameva|  atrAcakSamahe|  Amayavarjite svAsthyAnuvRttikaraNasAmarthyamasya rasAyanasyAvAdIttantrakRt|  tandrAdigrahaNaM ca roganACe~apyasya jyAyastvamiti pratipAdanArtham| ["abhayAmalakabibhItakapaJcAtmakapaJcamUlaniryUhe|  vallIpalACakarase dviguNe kSIre~aSTaguNe ca vipaceta||  ghRtasya kumbhaM madhukaM madhUkaM kAkoliyugmaM ca balAM svaguptAm|  sakSIraCuklAmRSabhaM sajIvaM sukhAmbupastacca pibedguNADhyam|| (sam. u. a. 49)"]

uttarasthAnam

rasAyanavidhiradhyAyaH

 abhayAmalakasahasraM nirAmayaM pippalIsahasrayutam||24||  taruNapalACakSaradravIkRtaM sthApayedbhANDe||24||  upayukte ca kSAre chAyAsaMCuSkacUrNitaM yojyam||25||  pAdAMCena sitAyACcaturguNAbhyAM madhughRtAbhyAm||25||  tadghRtakumbhe bhUmau nidhAya SaNmAsasaMsthamuddhRtya||26||  prAhNe prACya yathAnalamucitAhAro bhavetsatatam||26||  ityupayuJjyACeSaM varSaCatamanAmayo jarArahitaH||27||  jIvati balapuSTivapuHsmRtimedhAdyanvito viCeSeNa||27||

sa0- abhayAmalakAnAM sahasraM dRDhaM kaNAsahasrAnvitamajIrNapalACakSAradravIkRtaM bhAjane sthApayet|  kSAre copayukte sati chAyAyAM CuSkaM cUrNitaM ca CarkarAyACcaturthAMCena caturguNAbhyAM ghRtamAkSIkAbhyAM yojyam|  etadghRtakumbhe nidhAya bhUmau SaNmAsasthitaM samuddhRtya pUrvAhNe yathAgni bhuktvA sAtmyAhAraH sadA syAt|  tisra AryAH|  

	evametatsarvamupayujya saMvatsaraCataM nIrogo jarArahito jIvati|  viCeSeNa balAdiyutaH|  gItirAryA|

 nIrujArdrapalACasya chinne Cirasi tatkSatam||28||  antardvihastaM gambhIraM pUryamAmalakairnavaiH||28||  AmUlaM veSTitaM darbhaiH padminIpaGkalepitam||29||  AdIpya gomayairvanyairnirvAte svedayettataH||29||  svinnAni tAnyAmalakAni tRptyA
			khadennaraH kSaudraghRtAnvitAni||30||  kSIraM CRtaM cAnu pibetprakAmaM 
			tenaiva varteta ca mAsamekam||30||  varjyAni varjyAni ca tatra yatnAt 
			spRCyaM ca CItAmbu na pANinA~api||31||  ekAdaCAhe~asya tato vyatIte
			patanti keCA daCanA nakhACca||31||  athAlpakaireva dinaiH surUpaH 
			strISvakSayaH kuJjaratulyavIryaH||32||  viCiSTamedhAbalabuddhisattvo

sa0-nIrujo-jantvAdibhiranupadruto, yaH palACastasya Cirasi chinne~antardvihastamAtraM tatkSataM-suSirIkRtaM, gambhIraM navairAmalakaiH pUraNIyam|  pUrNaM yAvaddarbhairveSTitaM padminIkardamena lepitaM tata AraNyairgomayairAdIpya nivAte svedayet|  tAni cAmalakAni svinnAni kSaudraghRtayutAni tRptyA puruSaH khAdet|  paCcAddugdhaM kvathitaM bahu pibet|  tenaiva ca dugdhena mAsamekaM varteta|  indravajrA|

 athAto vAjIkaraNavidhimadhyAyaM vyAkhyAsyAmaH||2||  iti ha smAhurAtreyAdayo maharSayaH||2||

sa0-vAjIvayena samarthaH kriyate, tadvAjIkaraNam, tasyAdhyAyaH|  CeSamAyuSkAmIyavadyojyam|

 vAjIkaraNamanvicchetsatataM viSayI pumAn||1||

sa0-viSayI yaH puruSaH, sa satataM vAjIkaraNamauSadhamanvicchet|  puMgrahaNaM strISaNDhAdinivRttyartham, anyathA yathA paJcakarmANi RtuvidhAnAdi ca sAmAnyoktatvAt stryAdInAmapi prasajjati, tathedamapi vijJAyate, tasmAttadvyavacchedArthaM puMgrahaNam|  satatagrahaNenaitaddyotayati,-yathA rasAyanamupayuktaM cirakAlamanuvartate na tathA vAjIkaraNamiti|  api tu yasminnevAhni prayujyate tasminneva kAryakaraNasamarthaM prAyeNa syAditi satataM-anavarataM, vAjIkaraNamanvicchedityuktam| 
vAjIkaraNena ko~arthaH syAt ?  ityAha-

 tuSTiH puSTirapatyaM ca guNavattatra saMCritam||1||  apatyasantAnakaraM yatsadyaH saMpraharSaNam||2||

sa0-tatra vAjIkaraNe tuSTyAdi saMCritam|  apatyaM kimbhUtam ? guNavat, na tu durapatyaM kulAGgArarUpam|  yato~apatya[nAM] santAnakaraM-avicchedasthitikaraM ca, yacca sadyaH-CIghrameva, saMpraharSaNaM vAjIkaraNam|

 vAjIvAtibalo yena yAtyapratihato~aGganAH||2||  bhavatyatipriyaH strINAM yena yenopacIyate||3||  tadvAjIkaraNaM taddhi dehasyorjaskaraM param||3||

sa0-yena vAjIkaraNena turaGga ivApratihatasAmarthyastarUNIH saMgacchati, tathA yena yoSitAmativallabhaH syAt, tathA yenopacayaM prApnopti, tadvAjIkaraNamucyate|  taddhi CarIrasyorjaskaramatiCayena|

	nanu, vAjIkaraNamupAyaheturviSayANAmihaiva bandhanadarCanAt| uktaM ca tantrAntare-"koCakAro yathaivAMCUnupAdatte vandhavahAn" ityAdi|  tasmAnnArtho vAjIkaraNenetyAha-

 dharmyaM yaCasyamAyuSyaM lokadvayarasAyanam||4||  anumodAmahe brahmacaryamekAntanirmalam||4||

sa0-yato dharmAdanapetaM-dharmyaM, brahmacaryaM tadanumodAmahe|  tathA yaCasyAdihetuH|  tathA lokadvaye-ihaloke paraloke ca, rasAyanamiva rasAyanaM, sadopakAratvAt|  tathA ekAntenasarvathA, nirmalam|  yato brahmacaryam|  na tu brahmacaryavat svadArAdi(re)Su putrAdyarthameva nirmalam|  ato hetostadanumodAmahe|  kintvAbhyudayikaM mArgamACritya vAjIkaraNopadeCaH|  dvividho hi mArgaH,-naiHCreyasika AbhyudayikaCca|  tatra naiHCreyasikaM mArgaM samanusRtya brahmacaryopadeCaCca koCakAradRSTantaCca kleCanACakRcca|  AbhyudayikaM ca mArgamACrityAyamupadeCa ityatrAha|

 alpasarvasya tu kleCairbAdhyamAnasya rAgiNaH||5||  CarIrakSayarakSArthaM vAjIkaraNamucyate||5||

sa0-stokasattvasya puMsaH kleCairviSayotthaiH pIDyamAnasya rAgiNaH-kAminaH, CarIrakSayarakSArthaM vAjIkaraNmucyate|  anena CAstrakRtA, aparaiCca tantrakAraiH|

 kalyasyodagravayaso vAjIkaraNasevinaH||6||  sarveSvRtuSvaharaharvyavAyo na nivAryate||6||

sa0-kalpa(lya)sya-samarthasya, tathA yauvanasthasya, vAjIkaraNaM satataM kurvataH, tasya sarveSveva RtuSu dine dine vyavAyo maithunaM, na niSidhyate|

 atha snigdhaviCuddhAnAM nirUhAn sAnuvAsanAn||7||  ghRtatailarasakSIraCarkarAkSaudrasaMyutAn||7||  yogavidyojayetpUrvaM kSIramAMsarasACinAm||8||  tato vAjIkarAn yogAn CukrApatyabalapradAn||8||

sa0-atha-kRtamaGgalasya, snigdhasya tathA viCuddhasya tathA kSIrAdyACino yogavit-vaidyaH, prAGh nirUhAn sAnuvAsanAn ghRtAdisaMyuktAn kArayet|  tataH-anantaraM, vAjIkarAn yogAn yojayet|  kimbhUtAn ?  CukrAdipradAn|

 acchAyaH pUtikusumaH phalena rahito drumaH||9||  yathaikaCcaikaCAkhaCca nirapatyastathA naraH||9||

sa0-acchAyatvAdibhirguNairyukto~arthinAM yathA taruranACrayaNIyaH, tathA tAdRCo mAnavo nirapatya iti|  ekavacanenaiva ekArthasya labdhatvAdekagrahaNaM kevalArthapratipattyartham|  ekaH kevalomAdhavIlatAdirahitaH|

 skhaladgamanamavyaktavacanaM dhUlidhUsaram||10||  api lAlAvilamukhaM hRdayAhlAdakArakam||10||  apatyaM tulyatAM kena darCanasparCanAdiSu
kiM punaryadyaCodharmamAnaCrIkulavardhanam||11||

sa0-skhaladgamanAdikamapatyaM kena padArthena darCanAdiSu samAnam|  kiM punaryadyaCAdivardhanAt tasya kena tulyatA bhavet ?  apatyaCabdasya puMstvamatra cintyam(?)|  tatkila nitarAM sukhapradamityarthaH|

sa0-CarAdInAM mUlAni kaNTakAryACca, tathA jIvakAdIn, tripalikAn bhAgAn pRthak, mASANAmADhakaM ca, etatsarvaM jaladroNadvaye pAcayet|  tena rasenADhakaCeSeNa ghRtADhakaM dattvA vidAryAdirasAdInAM ca pRthakpRthagADhakaM dattvA kSIrADhakacatuSTayaM ca dattvA pacet|  vIrAdIn kalkAn sAmAnyaparibhASoktapramANAnnikSipet|  tat-ghRtaM, pakvaM pUtaM pRthak CarkarAtugayoCcUrNaprasthena kaNAyAH palacatuSTayena maricapalena ca yojayet|  tvagAdibhiH ClakSNaiH pRthagardhapalonmitaiH kSaudrasya kuDavayugalena yojayet|  tato miCritAt palamAtraM pratidinaM bhakSayet, mAMsarasakSIrabhojI san|  tenopayuktena turaGga ivArohati|  caTaka iva hRSyati|

 vidArIpippalICAlipiyAlekSurakAdrajaH||21||  pRthak svaguptAmUlacca kuDavAMCaM tathA madhu||22||  tulArdhaM CarkarAcUrNAt prasthArdhaM navasarpiSaH||22||  so~akSamAtramataH khAdet yasya rAmACataM gRhe||23||

sa0-vidAryAdInAM cUrNaM kapikacchumUlAcca cUrNaM pRthak kuDavamAtraM, mAkSikasya ca kuDavaH, CarkarApalAni paJcACat, pratyagraghRtasya palAni SoDaCa, ataH-saMyojitAt, karSamAtraM sa khAdet yasya bhavane kAntACatamasti|

 sAtmaguptAphalAn kSIre godhUmAn sAdhitAn himAn||23||  mASAn vA saghRtakSaudrAn khAdan gRSTipayo~anupaH||24||  jAgarti rAtriM sakalAmakhinnaH khedayan striyaH||24||

sa0-godhUmAn sakapikacchuphalAn dugdhe sAdhitAn himAn mASAn vA ghRtamAkSikAnvitAn khAdan gRSTikSIramanu pibedyaH, sa sarvAM rAtrimakhinno rAmA ramayan jayati(jAgarti)|

 bastANDasiddhe payasi bhAvitAnasakRttilAn||25||  yaH khAdetsasitAn gacchetsa strICatamapUrvavat||25||

sa0-chAgalANDapakve kSIre tilAnasakRdbhAvitAn saCarkarAn yaH khAdet, sa kAntACatamapUrva iva yAti|

 cUrNaM vidAryA bahuCaH svarasenaiva bhAvitam||26||  kSaudrasarpiryutaM lIDhvA pramadACatamRcchati||26||

sa0-CRgAlikAyACcUrNaM vidArIsvarasenaiva bahuCo bhAvitaM madhughRtayuktaM lIDhvA rAmACataM yAti|

sa0-kRSNAmalakacUrNaM dhAtrIsvarasena subhAvitaM CarkarAkSaudraghRtairlIDhvA yo~anu kSIraM pibet, sa puruSo~aCItivarSo~api taruNa iva hRSyati|

 karSaM madhukacUrNasya ghRtakSaudrasamanvitam||28||  payo~anupAnaM yo lihyAnnityavegaH sa nA bhavet||29||

sa0-madhuyaSTikAcUrNasya karSaM ghRtakSaudrayutaM kSIrAnupAnaM yo leDhi, so~apraNaSTavegaH puruSaH syAt|

sa0-karkaTaCRGgyAH kalkaM kSIreNAloDya yaH pibedcharkarAsarpiHkSIrAnnabhuk, sa rAmAsu vRSAyate|

saM-bhagavan-punarvaso, kecinnarA Atmavanto hitAhAravihArA api rogiNaH pratyakSAnumAnAdyairupalabhyante|  Atmavanto~apItyapiCabdAdanAtmavanto~api|  kadAcit CeSapAdatrayavikalatvena rogitvaM syAt, netyAha-dravyopasthAtRsampannA vRddhavaidyamatAnugA iti|  tathA~a~amayACca prANACcAmayaprANAH, kSIyamANA AmayaprANA yeSAM ta evam, kecidrogAdvimucyamAnAH kecicca mriyamANA ityarthaH|  viparItAstathA~apara iti anAtmavanto dravyopasthAtRvikalA vRddhavaidyamatAnanusAriNaCcaivaMbhAvA dRCyante|  tasmAt-anantaroktAtkAraNAt, hitAhitavibhAgasya tantroktaM phalamaniCcitaM-anaikAntikam|  aniCcitaphalatvAcca kAraNAt CAstraM-AyurvedAkhyaM, kiM CAsti ?  na-kiJcicchikSayatIti|  ataCcaitadArambho niSphalaH kAkadantaparIkSACAstravat|  

	iti vikalpayataH CiSyagaNasya-jAtUkarNyabheDAdeH, bhagavAn punarvasustattvaM-paramArthaM, kArtsnyena-sAmastyena, jagAda|  kimbhUtasya CiSyagaNasya ?  agniveCo mukhyaH-pradhAno, yasya tasyeti|  
	

na cikitsA~acikitsA ca tulyA bhavitumarhati||63||  vinA~api kriyayA svAsthyaM gacchatAM SoDaCAMCayA||63||

sa0-cikitsA-catuSpAtSoDaCaguNayuktA, acikitsA-hitAhitavibhAgAparAmarCe yatkiJcanakAritA, sA tulyA bhavituM nArhati|  keSAm ?  kriyAM vinA svAsthyamapi gacchatAm|  apiCabdo bhinnakramaH, svAsthyamapI~atyato~anantaraM draSTavyaH|  kimbhUtayA kriyayA ? SoDaCAMCayA|  tadayaM bhAvaH,-SoDaCa bhAgayA cikitsayA vinA yatra rogopaCAntiH syAt, tatrApi cikitsayA kSiprataraM tatsAdhanaM cikitsA viCiSTA|  tathA cikitsAsAdhyAnAM rohiNikAdInAM cikitsAmantareNa CAntirnAsti|  tadevamapi cikitsayA tulyA~acikitsA na bhavitumarhatIti|

 AtaGkapaGkamagnAnAM hastAlambo bhiSagjitam||64||  jIvitaM mriyamANAnAM sarveSAmeva nauSadhAt||64||

sa0-tasmAdAtaGka eva paGko duruttaratvAttasmin magnAnAM taptAnAM, bhiSagjitaM-tadupadeCakaCAstraM, upacArAdevamuktam|  tadbhiSagjitaM hastAlambo-hastAlambatulyam|  mriyamANAnAM sarveSAmevAsAdhyAnAmapi bheSajAjjIvitaM na ca bhavati|

 na hyupAyamapekSante sarve rogA, na cAnyathA||65||  upAyasAdhyAH sidhyanti,nAheturhetumAn yataH||65||

sa0-yasmAt sarve rogAH-asAdhyA api, upAyaM-catuSpAdalakSaNaM cikitsitaM, nApekSante, asAdhyarogANAM cikitsAnirapekSatvAt|  ye copAyasAdhyA rogAH-rohiNyAdayaH, te~anyathA cikitsAmantareNa, naiva sidhyanti|  yato yo~ahetuH sa hetumAnna bhavati|  api tu niryuktika evAyaM hetuvAdaH, yaccikitsAkhyena hetunA vinaiva rogopaCAntirddaCya iti|

 yaduktaM sarvasampattiyuktayA~api cikitsayA||66||  mRtyurbhavati, tannaivaM nopAye~astyanupAyatA||66||

sa0-yattUktaM sarvasampattiyuktayA~api cikitsayA mRtyurbhavati|  dRCyante bhagavan kecidAtmavanto~api rogiNaH|  yAvatkSIyamANAmayaprANAH ityAdi|  tadevaM na bhavati, yathA tvaM vadasi|  yasmAnna upAye~anupAyatA~asti|  yo hi yasya yayA yuktyopAyaH prathitaH, sa na kadAcittasyAnupAyaH|  yathA,-ghaTasya mRddaNDacakrAdisAmagrIviCeSo na kadAcidanupAyo bhaviturmahati|  tasmAccatuSpAccikitsAsAdhyasya rogasyopAya eva cikitsA, na tvanupAyaH|

 api copAyayuktasya dhImato jAtucit kriyA||67||  na sidhyeddaivavaiguNyAnna tviyaM SoDaCAtmikA||67||

sa0-dhImataH-prAjJasya narasya, upAyayuktasyApi daivAparAdhAt iyaM SoDaCAtmikA kriyA kadAcinna sidhyati|  ta(ya)smAdAyuH parIkSya sAdhyAsAdhyavibhAgjJo jJAnapUrvaM cikitsAyAM vaidyaH pravartate tasmAddaivavaiguNyam|  vimalavipulamatyA samyak paricchedAccikitsAyA rogaviSaye pravRttAyAH siddhireva syAnnAsiddhiH|  yasmAdyo yatropAyaH, sa tatrAnupAyo na bhavati|  muninA~apyuktam (ca.sU. a. 10/7)-"sAdhyAsAdhyavIbhAgajJo jJAnapUrvaM cikitsakaH|  kAle cArabhate karma yattatsAdhayati dhruvam||" iti|


uttarasthAnam

vAjIkaraNavidhiradhyAyaH

kasyAsiddho~agnitoyAdiH svedastambhAdikarmaNi||68||  na prINanaM karSaNaM vA kasya kSIraM gavedhukam||68||  kasya mASAtmaguptAdau vRSyatve nAsti niCcayaH||69||  viNmUtrakaraNAkSepau kasya saMCayitau yave||69||  viSaM kasya jarAM yAti mantratantravivarjitam||70||  kaH prAptaH kalyatAM pathyAdRte rohiNikAdiSu||70||

sa0-kasya puruSasya vahniH svedakarmaNi, stambhanakarmaNi ca toyaM, na siddham|  AdiCabdAnmUrcchApagamAdau CItAnilAdiH|  api tu sarvasyaiva siddho~anvayavyatirekAt|  evaM yAvadrohiNikAdiSviti vyAkhyeyam|  evaM niCcitaphalA cikitseti sthitam|

 api cAkAlamaraNaM sarvasiddhAntaniCcitam||71||  mahatA~api prayatnena vAryatAM kathamanyathA||71||

sa0-na kevalaM pUrvoktAddhetoCcikitsAtantraM saphalam|  yataCcAkAlamaraNaM sarvasiddhAntaniCcitam|  tadanyathA-cikitsACAstramantareNa, parameNApi yatnena kathaM-kena prakAreNa, nirvAyatAm ? na kenacidityarthaH|  


	

candanAdyapi dAhAdau rUDhamAgamapUrvakam||72||  CAstrAdeva gataM siddhiM jvare laGghanabRMhaNam||72||

sa0-dAhAdau viSaye candanAdi cAgamapUrvakameva lokarUDham, na tvevameva|  tathA CAstrAdeva-cikitsAkhyAt, sakalalokaprasiddhaM jvare laGghanabRMhaNaM bhaktacchedakSIrAdi siddhimupagatam, nAnyasmAt|

 catuSpAdguNasampanne samyagAlocya yojite||73||  mA kRthA vyAdhinirghAtaM vicikitsAM cikitsite||73||

sa0-tasmAccatuSpAdA[nAM] ye guNAH-AyuSkamIyoktAH (hR.sU.a. 1/27), taiH sampanne-yukte, tathA suSThu nirUpya deCakAlAdIn yojite cikitsite, vyAdhinirghAtaM prati vicikitsAM-saMCayaM, mA kRthAH|

 etaddhi mRtyupACAnAmakANDe chedanaM dRDham||74||  rogontrAsitabhItAnAM rakSAsUtramasUtrakam||74||

sa0-yataCcAkANDe-akAle, mRtyupACAH-jvarAdayasteSAM etat-cikitsACAstraM, dRDhaM-sAraM, chedanam|  tathA samutpannebhyo jvarAdibhyastrastAnAM CaGkayA bhItAnAM sUtrarahitaM rakSAsUtrakaM, tatkAryakaraNAdityarthaH|  tasmAdadhyetavyaM cikitsACAstram|

 etattadamRtaM sAkSAjjagadAyAsavarjitam||75||  yAti hAlAhalatvaM tu sadyo durbhAjanasthitam||75||

sa0-tathaitat-cikitsACAstraM, tat-sakalalokaprasiddhaM, sAkSAt-svarUpeNa, amRtaM mRtyujaye, ta(ya)t lokaprasiddhaM jagataH surAsurarUpasya, AyAsAdutpannaM kSIrodamathanakAle, tena varjitamidam|  amRtamapi durbhAjanasthitaM sadyaH-CIghrameva, viSatvaM yAti|


ajJAtaCAstrasadbhAvAn CAstramAtraparAyaNAn||76||  tyajeddUrAd bhiSakpACAn pACAn vaivasvatAniva||76||

sa0-ajJAtaH CAstrasadbhAvaH-paramArtho, yaistAMstathAvidhAn bhiSakpACAn dUratastyajet|  tathA CAstramAtraparAyaNAn-CAstrapAThamAtraCaraNAn|  ata eva viSasAmAnyataH CAstrapAThamAtratvena niSiddham|  tathA CAstraparamArthAnavabodhAcca viSatvam|  kAniva ?  vaivasvAtAn-yamasambandhinaH, pACAn yathA|  iti tAvadasampUrNAn|


	

bhiSajAM sAdhuvRttAnAM bhadramAgamaCAlinAm||77||  abhyastakarmaNAM bhadraM bhadraM bhadrAbhilASiNAm||77||

sa0-suvaidyAnAM saccaritAnAmiha loke~anyatra ca sadaiva bhadram|  kiMvidhAnAm ?  Agamena-granthato~arthataH, ClAghituM CIlaM yeSAM teSAm|  IdRCA apyanabhyastakarmANo na ClAghArhAH syurityAha, abhyastaM-asakRttailalehAdipAkAdyanuvAsananirUhAdiyojanaM ca, [karma] yaisteSAM lokadvaye~api bhadram|  sarvasattvAnAM putramitrAdirUpeNa bhadramiva hitaM sukhaM cAbhilaSanti-icchanti ye, teSAmapi bhadraM-Castam|

	

 iti tantraguNairyuktaM tantradoSairvivarjitam||78||  cikitsACAstramakhilaM vyApya yat paritaH sthitam||78||  vipulAmalavijJAnamahAmunimatAnugam||79||  mahAsAgaragambhIrasaGgrahArthopalakSaNam||79||  aSTAGgavaidyakamahodadhimanthanena
			yo~aSTAGgasaGgrahamahAmRtarACirAptaH||80||  tasmAdanalpaphalamalpasamudyamAnAM
			prItyarthametaduditaM pRthageva tantram||80||

sa0-tantryate-dhAryate CarIramaneneti tantram, tasya guNAstantraguNAH,-yaistantramalaGkriyate tantrayuktyAdayaH, tairevaZMprakArairyuktam|  tathA coktaM saGgrahe (u. a.50)-"alaGkRtaM yuktipadaiH sadratnairiva kAJcanam|  SaTtriMCatA~arthadurgeSu bhiSajAM saGkramairiva||  tatrAdhikaraNaM yogo hetvartho~arthaH padasya ca|  pradeCoddeCanirdeCavAkyaCeSAH prayojanam||  upadeCApadeCAtideCArthApattinirNayAH|  prasaGgaikAntanaikAntAH sApavargo viparyayaH||  pUrvapakSavidhAnAnumatavyAkhyAnasaMCayAH|  atItAnAgatApekSAsvasaMjJohyasamuccayAH|| nidarCanaM nirvacanaM niyogo~atha vikalpanam|  pratyutsArastathoddhAraH sambhavastantrayuktayaH||" iti|

 idamAgamasiddhatvAtphratyakSaphaladarCanAt||81||  mantravatsaMprayoktavyaM na mImAMsyaM kathaJcana||81||

saM-idaM-anantarAbhihitaM tantraM, mantravadAcaritaM saMprayoktavyam|  na kathaJcidapi mImAMsyam,-kimidaM syAdvA naveti saMCayo na kArya ityarthaH|  kasmAt ?  suviCuddhajJAnebhyo mahAmunibhya Agamena CuddhatvAt, tathA pratyakSaPalasya-jvaracikitsAdikasya, darCanAt|
